1a1(gso rig): sbyor ba brgya pa klu sgrub kyi mdzad pa bzhugs
1b1(gso rig): rgya gar skad du/ yog shA ta// bod skad du/
1b2(gso rig): sbyor ba brgya pa/ sangs rgyas sman gyi bla ba DUr+yang
2a1(gso rig): la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa klu sgrub la phyag 'tshal lo// ring du grags pa'i gso spyad nas// mthara'
2a2(gso rig): yas rgyud kyi gces pa blangs// sman pa mkhas par rab mchong pa'i// sbyor ba rgya yis bcings par bya// bdud rtsi lta bu'i
2a3(gso rig): gyis/ lus ni nad med 'byung ba yin// gso sa par sman pa yis// nang rgya mtshan nyid yos
2b1(gso rig): sle rjes sgra skad byi cher bca' skra dang // byi cher glu sgang tik+Sh+Na parbaT// bA sA byi cher bca' sgra gra sgang rnams// bsnol thang rlung ma khris pa kan rims la btug// k+Shutra swa tres pa
2b2(gso rig): sgra pan+d+ha ra// bskol ba'i thang byas bad kan rlung mchog la// lud pa dbugs mi bde bcas dang ka med// gzhogs gzer nyes gsum las byung rim la'ang bsngags//
2b3(gso rig): dong ka drod sman nar rtsa gla sgang dang // hong len a ru ra rnams bskol ba'i thang // gzer bcas tshad 'khru bad rlung ldan rims la// phan no dred skyed bzhu ba byas pas kyang //
2b4(gso rig): rgun 'brum gla sgang heng len a ru ra// dong ka parba ta ka'i thang byas la// mkhris byung rims dang bslab btsal brgyal ba dang // mgo 'khor tsha skam
3a1(gso rig): skom dang ldan rnams la// kaN+Da kA ri bca' sga sle tres bskol// dro sman nar mo bsres pa'i thang 'thungs pas// gsus gzer lung pa tshad rnying dang ka med// pho ba'i nad chab dbugs mi bde rnams 'joms// byi tsher parA Ta kAs
3a2(gso rig): ru ra ba sha hong len tit+pa pr-i yaM ku/ ka ra cher btab bskol ba'i thang 'thungs pas// skom dang khrag mkhris rims dang tshad ldan 'joms// rims nang gso ba'i spyad do// skyer rtsa 'bras bu gsum dang bi shA lA// sgyer rtsa phye mar byas la nges par bskol//
3a3(gso rig): thang la sbrang rtsi ldan pa 'thungs pa yis// gcin kha sI ba'i nad skyes ma lus 'joms// u dI ts+ya dang ka bde bong nga dkar// gla sgang dug mo nyung bcas zang byas pa// tshang pa gzer bcas khrag 'khru dang bcas la// yun ring zhugs pa'i 'khru ba rnams
3a4(gso rig): la phan// gla sgang bca' sga bong nga dkar por bcas// sle tres cha mnyam chu la bskol 'thungs pas// me drod zhan pa'i rkun gyi nad rnams dang // tshad zin 'khru ba'i nad kyang sel bar 'gyur// bag nad lto ba nA dang sbya rbab na// spos dang mam pa dang kan mgul
3a5(gso rig): 'gags la// pu narna bA thang shing a ru ra// sle tres pa gcin gu gul ldan pa btung // bla sgang shi gru thang shing dan+ti 'bras// bi ta gro sman nar phye bcas thang gis// rgyun tu kha rkub nas 'byung srin bu dang // srin las skyes 'di nad kyang 'jams
3a6(gso rig): par 'gyur// suk+She dro sman shing mngar na le sham// a sma b+he dang a re bA sha gze// brag zhun gtso cher bskol ba'i thang 'thungs na// rde'u gseg ma dang bcas gcin sri sel// brag zhun asma b+he dang suk+te dang // dro sman phye ma 'dra
3b1(gso rig): bkrus chu btab btung // yang na bu ram dang bcas 'thungs tsam na// gcin sri 'chil thug pa'ang 'tsho bar 'gyur// dong ka dang ni gze ma a ru ra// byi tsher asmA bI ta ba sha ka/ bskol ba'i thang la sbrang rtsi ldan 'thungs na// cha
3b2(gso rig): zhing gzer bcas gcin sri grol bar 'gyur// dong ka dang ni sle tres bA sha rnams// e ra Na mar khu la bskol thang 'thungs na// rlung byung rnam 'gyur ma lus khrag gau nad// steng 'og lus kun nas 'dzag rim pas 'joms// tar+N+Na la
3b3(gso rig): ka'i rtsa ba lig bu mig/ 'bras kyi chun la sbrang rtsi ldan 'thungs na// kun gyis bskyed pa'i khrag nad nges par 'joms// dbugs mi bde la d+hArbA bca' skas so// bi ha ti gnyis e ra Na ka bed dang // ma tu asma k+Sha ra shing kun gzi/
3b4(gso rig): sen+na e raN mar khur bsres byas thang // rked pa snying nu pho mtshan gzer bas btung // shing kun shu dag kha ru bca' sga dang // go snyod a ru puSh+ka ru rta rnams// phyi ma'i cha 'phel phye mar byas rnams kyis// lto sman rims rnying gsung nad
3b5(gso rig): rnams la'o// bca' sga shing kun ru tsa cha snyam phyed// sga chu la bskol bad kun rlung byung dang // rtsib logs snying rgyab gsus gzer gsung rnams la// btung ngo de bzhin nas khrus rtug 'gags la'o// 'jam 'bras lo ma'i bI shA lA tsa
3b6(gso rig): bya// tsai tra tsha gsum lan tshwa gtso cher btsegs// bsregs pa'i thal ba zho la sbyar 'thungs pas// dmu sbran sbya rbab rkub kyi nad rnams sel// shing kun shu dag bca' sga sArtsi ka/ kha ru phyi ma nyis 'gyur phye mar byas// chu
4a1(gso rig): dron btab 'thungs sna tshogs gsung gzer dang // snying nang sman dang stod du rlung 'tshangs 'joms// shing rmi tsha gsum 'bras gsum kaN+Da ka/ b+hAr+thi puSh+kardza DA tshA sna lnga// phye ma chu dron btab 'thungs skyigs bu lung/
4a2(gso rig): dang ka med chab stong rlung mi bde 'joms// dzaM bu dug nyung arge shi gru s+yA hi bos shing byA g+h+r-i br-i ha tI// pA ri ka bed chos shing dzI DA a pA marmA nim+bi tsa tA ka/ gaSha puSh+Te ra Da la dang sin+di ldan pa bsregs thal bskol ba mo/ sngar bshad
4a3(gso rig): shing kun la sogs pa'i// khu ba lto sbran pad kan nad la btung // tsaM byA skyur bu che gsum pase yab bcas// ba lu dz+r-IM ra bcu gang tsi traka/ phye ma cha mnyam bur bsres dri gsum ldan// gre mdzer cham pad dang ka med la
4a4(gso rig): bsngags// ba lu tsa bya na sham mtshungs gnyis pa// mu la bcu gang dro ci'o sga gsum 'gyur// bu ram sum 'gyur dri bzang ril byar mur// grang bzhi glo rims gzer ba'i gzhang 'brum sel// sga drod na le she nA 'dab
4a5(gso rig): shing tshwa// suk+Sh+me mtha' rims gang 'phel phye mar byas// 'di dag cha 'dra'i ker 'gam gzhang med zhan// dbugs dang mi bde sgron mgul snying nad la'o// sain+na shing kun 'bras gsum la la phung // tshe gsum bu ram
4a6(gso rig): rnams ril bur byas// de rnams mur zhing myangs pos tshim thob cing // me drod zhan las rab tu byung ba'ang sel// lcags phye tsha gsum rgya shug cha thams cad// mA kI phye ma dang mnyam de rnams bza'// rgun 'brum ldan pa'i
4b1(gso rig): rjes su dar 'thungs pas// skya rbab nad la phan zhing ring du 'gro// bu ram ldan pa'i bca' sga'i drod sman nar// gsum pa a ru ra 'am bal po'i se'u// bad kan tshad snying gzhang 'brum nad rnams dang // rtug pa 'gags pa rnams la'ang
4b2(gso rig): rtag tu bya// bca' sga gla sgang a ru ra phye la// bu ram ldan pa la ni ril bu bya// lud pa dbugs mi bde dang cho ches rnams/ kha ru ril bu mur bas bzlog par 'gyur// n+ya gro ut+pal ru rta mA k+Shi ka/ phye ma 'bras che bcas pa
4b3(gso rig): ril bu bya// sru ba kha ru mur bas skom dad dang // rab tu 'phel ba myur du 'joms par 'gyur// ldong ros drod sman nar mo na le sham// phye ma ka piR+Ya sbyar khu bar ldan// 'bras phye che mnyam mak+Shi ka bsres pa'i//
4b4(gso rig): bus pas lan gcig ma yin skyug pa 'joms// sna khrag 'dzag la durba'i khu ba'am// bal se'u me tog khu sbyar nges par bstan// bud med nu zho rgya skyegs khu ba 'am// bI Da mak+Shi kas kyang i ku 'joms// skyu ru spos
4b5(gso rig): dkar khu ba kha ru tsha// de rnams bsres pa so bi ri la btags// des 'dir myur bar gzhi nas med byed cing // ji lta'i skyigs bu slar mi 'byung ba yin// dur+b+ha sain+na thal ka a ru ra// ku the ra kA kany+dzi ka dar btags//
4b6(gso rig): gsum pas byug pa 'am ru ma'i 'og btags pas// shu ba dang ni g.yan pa rnam par 'joms// sU ha tsi tra b+h+ri ga an dang // mya ngan meng shun ru rta tsha ba gcin// btses pa'i mar khus shu ba mdze glang shu// gdug pa'i rma dang za
5a1(gso rig): 'brum ser kha 'phrog/ gu gul mig sman phra tshil sin+d+ha ra// pa ma cha mnyam cha ba'i mar khus bco// khyo rngo za cag gos ni lus skams la// lan cig byugs pa'i nus pa gzhi nas 'don// bub+hAr+thi kA ru mur+N+Na srA/
5a2(gso rig): rgya skyegs dang ni brjod dang yung ba rnams// drug 'gyur dur bra la bsnol grub pa nA// byugs pas grang dang tsha ba'i rims 'joms so// kar+Na kA ri swe tres bA sha ka/ phye mar zhun mar l-i bskol grub pa de// 'thungs pas tshang rnying lud gzer dbugs mi
5a3(gso rig): bdedu me drod zhan pa'i pho ba'i nad la phan// bA sha seng ldeng ba To la ba tra// nimra shing tshwa sle tres ta ma la// ki phye mar sar la bskol myur grub na// me dpal mkhris bskrun mdze las brgyal bar 'gyur// drug pas khrag dang bcas pa brgya
5a4(gso rig): yi skyon// rab 'khrugs las skyes yan lag lus kun gzer// bye brag me dpal chang gis ra ro ba// rmongs pa chang 'thungs las skyes rnam 'gyur la// kanan+ta kA ri nim+ba pa to la// sle tres 'bras gsum 'jam 'bras pa sha ka/
5a5(gso rig): phye tshong ra rnying la ni cho gas gtso// myur du grub 'dis mdze las myur du rgyal// kar ku sh+maN+Da ka cho ga bzhin du btsos skams nas// mar bskol kar btab tshe gsum ze rwa ldan par btso// 'di bsten byis rgan khrag 'dzag rlung
5a6(gso rig): 'joms bud med la phod cing // zas skom lud khrag mkhris skyug dbugs mi bde dang gzhang 'brum 'joms// ba gcin skyu ru mak+Shi ka dro sman// kha ru po son du pa dan+ti dang // rwa rta rnams btso ring bu mthe bong 'dra// ma
5b1(gso rig): bsdus chub bcug de yi nad 'phrog byed// lus gso ba'i dpyad rdzogs so// / kAr bcas gur gum tshwa mnyam mar la bcos// cho ga bzhin rlung khrag las byung ba'i// sprin ma mu 'gram rna mig mgo bo yi// phyed gzer
5b2(gso rig): nyi 'khor las byung nad 'joms so// a ru ba ru skyu ru nang sa bon// sum gnyis gcig gi cha rnams zho la btags// mig sran de yis mchi ma mang 'byung zhing // mig tsha rab tu 'khrug pa'ang 'joms par 'gyur// a ru saun+d+ra pa dang
5b3(gso rig): lig bu mig/ btsag yug dang bcas chu la bsres btags te// mig gi phyi rol rab tu byugs byas pas// 'di yis mig kis nad kun zhi bar 'gyur// sau b+hi la sain+na seng phro ma btags// de nas mar btsos ras dkar po laM btsags//
5b4(gso rig): de yis mig la byug byas mkhris bskyed nad// dmar tshig dang ni sha mdzer nges par 'joms/ khrag bskyed kA ra rgya mtsho'i sbu bas 'joms// ba byung gro sman nar mo srod long la'o// lug mig tsha ba gsum gyis mig 'gribs la/
5b5(gso rig): ling tog dkar la mAk+Sha sbrang rtsis so// nag tshur lig mig dkar bcas rgya mtsho'i sku// nal sham sam kha sen+na btsag yug dang // ldong ros cha mnyam mAk+Shi ka bsres btags// rab rib khus bskyed rdzi nang tshag po 'joms// sle tres
5b6(gso rig): pu shel lcags phye dug nyung nal shi sain+ne kan+da la// lig mig rdo dreg spang spos yung ba spang ma sang kha rgya mtsho'i lbu// mtshungs pa phye ma lcags snod du bzhag sbrang rtsi ldan pas sha mdzer dang // rab rib ling tog khrag 'dur mig
6a1(gso rig): sha'i nad la nye bar byug pa'ang bsngags// shing mngar ut+pal rgya mtsho'i lbu ba shing tsha pu shel gi hang bcod// spang pos tsan dan sa khwa btsag yug ba lu lig mig nag tshur gdag/ de ltar thams cad cha mnyam
6a2(gso rig): mig sman 'di yis mig 'brum mig nag tsha// mchi khrag skya rib mig sha gzer nad 'phrog la bsngags pas rtag tu byug/ mig gi sman dpyad rdzogs so// / thab shing bong nga dkar po sle tres btsas/
6a3(gso rig): dug nyung hong len ma nu bA tra'i thang // ba gcin la grub sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa// mgrin pa'i nad dang kun la btung bar bya// kU ra te dza ba ta paM thA dang // lig mig sgyer rtsa yung ba gro sman nar// ril bu sbrang rtsi la byas kha nAng du/
6a4(gso rig): mur bar bya'o mgrin pa'i nad kun la// skyer rtsa gla skad dzA ti'i me tog gi// lo gsar rgun 'brum dug nyung 'bras gsum bskal// sbrang rtsi ldan pas lus kyi kha sgo'i nang // lce yi nad rnams dus su zhi bar byed// ru rta dang ni sbyor ba'i
6a5(gso rig): rtsa ba seng phro ma btsod// yung hong gla sgong bA thA te dza ni// zhi ba btags so rnams ldeg par byed pa dang // gzer zhing 'khrug la nad khrag 'byin par byed// sau bI ra tsu kra sge'u ga sher ma tu/ khu ba sha rnams gu gul son+na
6a6(gso rig): rnams// gang zhig tsha ba'i mar khu la bskol te// na bar thug pas rna ba'i zug rngu sel// ba sha ni mAM pa To la parba ta// be tsa sh+ya sgyer rtsa dang // klu skang ti k+Sho pu shel gyi tshor tshe ga sum tra yin k+ta tsan+dan rnams// zhu ne mar lo grub steng 'og
6b1(gso rig): nas skyes rnam 'gyur sna dang mig gi gzer la sogs// pags nad rims dang khong 'bras rma yi zug rngu mig nad skya rib rnams la bsngags// sbyar tsa dug nyung nim+ba parba Ta dang ro sman byi cher shing mngar dang // tra yan+ti d+hong 'bras gsum tik+ta br-i sha
6b2(gso rig): pa two l-i dang gla skab mngar// de rnams phye mar bskol ba zhun mar la grub 'di ni mig la phan pa yin// mkhris pa khrag las byung dang skya rib rab rib rnams dang stod kyi nad rnams la// e raN dkar po'i rtsa ba dang ni shu dag dang / sha taM puSh+pa
6b3(gso rig): bri ha ti'i 'bras bu gzhan yang // ta kho ra yi mar khu'o mar bcas las grub// rab rib stod dang gtso che'i nad dang gzhan pa'ang 'joms// zug rngu zad par byed pa gnyis pa rdzogs so// / dung dang mu shwa ka dag
6b4(gso rig): me lces bsregs pa'i thal ba snod du thug par byas te/ de nyid slar chu la btso zhing bskol ba'i thal ba mar khu'i cho ga rnams// sbyor ba de yis gdug pa'i rma dang rma tsha spangs 'bur tsa yi nad rnams dang // rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan par brdol
6b5(gso rig): ba'i pags nad yun ring mgul ba'i nad rnams lo// shing mngar dang bcas skyer rtsa shug pa ut+pal dang // pri ya~M ku dang seng phrom dkar po tsan+dan rnams// mar khu dang ni 'o mar gtso zhing sbyar bar bya// chu rnams dang ni gzur dang
6b6(gso rig): ba 'joms par 'gyur// dzA ti nim+ba pa To la dang phaT hong len skyer rtsa yung ba dang / btsod dang thal tres a ru pu shel pra tshil pangs ma shing mder 'jam 'bras rnams// mar la grub pa 'di yis kho nad phra mo dang ni gnad gzer tsa ya~M
7a1(gso rig): nang // nad dam gzer bcas 'pho zhing 'byung ba'i rma yi nad rnams dang ni 'byang ba 'byin// zug rngu zad byed gsum pa rdzogs so// / na le shaM dkar po shwa ri Sha 'i// me tog khu bas brgya phrag bsgo
7a2(gso rig): bar bya// sbrul gyis sos btab brgyal bar gyur pa la// rab tu sbyar bya btung dang mig sman la// rma bya'i mkhris pa tan+d+ha la yi ka/ kA kaN+Da bcas mi nyung 'thung byas pas// 'gro ba'i dug dang brtan mchog dug gI ni// 'tshe ba dang bcas myur du
7a3(gso rig): 'byin par byed// til btags mar khu la ni bu ram dang // de bzhin arka'i lo ma cha mnyam btung // sprin gyi tshogs la 'phral du rlung byung ltar// khyi spyi'i dug mchog myur du 'byin par 'gyur// khang pa'i du ba gu gul dang ldan pa// hA
7a4(gso rig): dzi gan+d+ha tan+d+ha li ya bcas// ba yi gcin la btags byas snying nad dang // brtan mchog 'gro ba'i dug rnams 'phrog par 'gyur// spang spos pu shel ba bla kaun+ti dza la sle tres ldong ros g+hi haM paR+Ya ke shi dang // sprig tsan+d+ra lung ba ru rta ka ra
7a5(gso rig): la NA rdo dreg sUk+Sh+me gur kum shing shug pa// cha mnyam yungs kar brgyad cha nA ga gi sar me tog cha bzhis lde gus kun tu longs spyod cing // phun sum tshogs bya shaM za rims dang dug gi nad rnams 'joms 'gyur zla ba shwa ra ba lta bur grags/
7a6(gso rig): dug nod sel po'i rgyud rdzogs so// / yungs dkar 'bras gsum shi ri Sha ka tra b+hI shwe 'jam 'bras sde tres dang // btsod dang ser po gnyis dang tsha ba gsum dang srang spos shu dag shing dran rnams// ra yi gcin la btags
7b1(gso rig): byas 'thung sogs bsten pas sbrul gyis sos btab gdon kun dang // gshed byed smyo byed sha za dang ni srin po 'joms shing brlag par byed par 'gyur// karba sa'i rus pa dang ni rma bya'i 'dab ma bri ha hi rnams dang // ni rma l+ya po son cha shing tsha cu kang
7b2(gso rig): byi la'i brtug pa bA sha kA dang ke sha sbrul lpags dang // glang po'i so dang shrI ka shing kun nal sham dkar po cha mnyam bdug byas pas// gshed byed smyo byed sha za srin po lha rnams zhugs pa'i rims ni 'joms par dran// tsha ba gsum dang nga
7b3(gso rig): la gur kum dro sman nar mo'i rtsa ba k+ShI ra si hi yung ba ru r+t+ta nyung kar gnyis dang am+b+ha dug nyung sgog skya 'bras bu gsum dang pu shel tse dang ho lon shu tag spangs ma shing mngar bA la dmar po ldong ros shug pa zhes grags pa/
7b4(gso rig): rti rgya spos ma d+hA ka sA pri yaM ku dang bong nga dkar po lig bu mig dang tsa bya thang shing bcas pa phye mar byas pa mar dang srog chags brgyad kyi gcin gyi cha la bskol ba bshad 'thungs pas 'byung po 'bros shing de yi gdon rnams mchog tu
7b5(gso rig): 'joms par 'gyur// rgya spos shing mngar 'jam 'bras rgya skyegs pa Do la'i lo ma rak+ta pa TI kI shu dgA pa tra la dang shing kun yungs ka ra si hi ser gnyis la tA hong len dang // po son cha gsum kA kAN+Da thab shing bi taM a dza g+han+d+ha ma rA// arko Da
7b6(gso rig): dang koSh+To kI na shaM nam+ba sle tres dug mo nyung // ru rta shu ka ta ru puSh+pa bA la shing mngar a pa ra dzi ta/ dan+ti tsi tra ka bed cha mnyam phye ba gcin gyi sde dang mar la bskol// yun ring du bzhag kun gyi rim par sbyor bas myur du 'joms par 'gyur ba yin//
8a1(gso rig): 'byung po chen po'i gdon kun dang ni smyo byed des byas mdze rims zhi ba Sh+Thashad// 'byung po zhi bar byed pa'i rgyud ba rdzogs na// sbyor yungs dug mo nyung gos bon dang // sau ho dang na shong mngar chamanyam
8a2(gso rig): go// de rnams thang byas bu chung ma yi ni// bu nad dang ni 'khru ba kuno la phan// ka bed puSh+pa d+hA ta ka dza la// seng phrom dang bcas ga dza bi pr-I l-I/ thang la mA k+Shi ka bsres byug pa dang // 'khru ba rnams la byis pa la sbyar bya// shrI gA dronar bong nga dkar po phye mang
8a3(gso rig): byas sugro rim stug pa'i nad rnams 'joms pa la// mAk+Shi kA bcas bong dkar de bzhin gcig/ byis pa'i nad sel ba'i rgyud drug pa rdzogs so// / sgyu rlung phye drug cu rtsa bzhi'i srang sa rang gi khu bsgos sbrang rtsi ming dang cha mnyam zhing // nga
8a4(gso rig): sman nar mo srang brgyad ka ra nyis 'gyur cha ldan thal ba'i phung po'i nang du bzhag par bya// dbyar gyi mtha' ru de brten skra dkar dang bral gzugs dang kha dog dang ni spobs pa dang ldan zhing // nad mod blo dang yid gzhungs dran pa tshig bsal stobs dang ldan zhing sems stobs
8a5(gso rig): ldan par 'gyur ba yin// shing mang ra dang ni sbrang rtsi mar dang ni// lo ma dang sbyar rjes su bston pa yis// lum po rtug pa rab tu thoba' gyur nas// dga' zhing 'khrig pa yang yang nus par 'gyur// shing yang bcu gang sen+ta d+ho sman nar// ka ra dang ni 'bras bu gsum
8a6(gso rig): ldan// tshe sbyin ro tsa shin tu yid bzhungs shing // rgas dang nad rnams rnam par 'joms par 'gyur// gze ma skyu ru sle tres phye mar byas// sbrang rtsi mar dang ldan pa bsten pa yis// ro rtsa brtan zhing sdug bsngal rnam 'gyur zhing // skra gnag tshe lo brgyar ni 'tsho bar 'gyur//
8b1(gso rig): nim+ba'i mar khu rang bzhin gnas byas pa// cho ga ji lta ba bzhin btung ba dang // 'o ma mar dang rab sbyar de zla bas// skra dkar dang ni rgas pa rnam par 'byin// gze ma k+Sha ra dang rtsa ba bcu bA na rA nA gA bA la ba lnga// phye ma 'o thug byas 'di btung bar bya// de yis 'khrig pa
8b2(gso rig): lan brgyar nus pa yin// rta ltar byed pa bdun pa rdzogs so// // shing mang thang skol sain+na pa ldan zhing // dug nyung dro nar po son phye mar bsre// sbrang rtsi bcas pa 'di dge slon la sbyar// mgrin nad kha dang gre 'gags nad rnams
8b3(gso rig): la// si ba'i ra la a ru ra thang bskol// dro nar a ru dan+ti phye phye ldan// e ra mar khu dang bcas 'khru la de// bshal gyi sbyor bas nad rnams 'joms par 'gyur// ra sna po son cha dang 'bras gsum sle tros rtsa ba bcu dang bA lA dang // mar khu sen+na pa
8b4(gso rig): bcas pa la maM si bcos ldan sbrang rtsi bur ram bcas// sha ta puSh+pa sle tres ru rta ka pe ta pri yaM ku dang dro sman nar// shu dag phye ma kany+dzi ba 'o gcin bcas ma btang rlung nad rnams la phan// ba la phyi ma mar khu la bskol dri bzang dang // bcud grub
8b5(gso rig): ba dang 'o ma zho dang sgyu chu rnams// de bzhin sa hA tsa rA sA sle tres dang // ba ri re rer bskol bas rlung 'joms so// sbyar bar bya'o bca' sga 'am bu ram la// yang na sain+d+ra pa bcas dro nar la'o// sna khA 'jim pa 'gram pa dpung pa dang // rgyab dang mgo
8b6(gso rig): mig mgul 'gags nad rnams la// las lnga'i le'u brgyad pa rdzogs so// / rims la gtso cher barba pa Ta ka sbyar bya skom dad che la skyu ru re dang skyug pa la// tsha ba lnga skyes gzer la 'jam rtsi rengs la gi ri dza dang gcin
9a1(gso rig): s+t+rI s+thA ru ra li khu bas so// rlung gi nad la rA sna dmu rdzing mcher ba'i nad la ba gcin cham pa la// dro nar 'phyo la bi taM dug la shu ka rta ru skrangs la gu gul lo// ba sha ka yis khrang sa khris dug nyung gis// 'khru la'o bsre shing he mi lci
9a2(gso rig): gzer la// spos la thang shing srin nad byi ta kas// skya rbab a ru ra dang 'bru gzhin gyis// zad byed nad la 'bras bu gsum bshad gzer ba kun la de ltar khu bas so// mdze la rtag tu seng ldeng khu ba glo la kaN+Da ka ri dang // tshigs nad gze ma mu ra ga byed nA ga bA lA ba
9a3(gso rig): las so// bcud len kun la skyu ru lU bcas gdon// nad la brag zhun bshad rgyud phyi ma'o// / rab tu grub pa'i sbyor ba'i cho ga rdzogs par byas// grub pa'i don rnams rtogs pa'i sman pa mkhas rnams kyis// rtog pa'i sman pa med
9a4(gso rig): par su yis sbyar ba mthong // 'a slar yang 'dir ni cung zad bshad par bya// shugs bkag ma zos gnyid chas skad ches rtsol bzags// gzhon pa la zhon tshang kha ba ska ba rtsub pa rnams// sems bzung 'khrig dang 'jigs dang bsnyung gnas mya ngan drangs// dbyar gyi dus su
9a5(gso rig): rlung ni rab tu 'khrug par 'gyur/ chang dang lan tshwa rno dro til mar khu// khro dang gdung ba lo ma skam po 'a la rnams// zhal sman la sogs ma zhu ma 'phrod zas zos pa// ston gyi dus su mkhris pa rab tu 'khrugs par 'gyur// nyin gnyid mngar dang grangs che sna nya
9a6(gso rig): ba dang // shing tog 'o ma bu ram shing gi rnam 'gyur rnams// snum bag 'grangs ches zos dpalan tsha bu chu rnams// dpyid kyi dus su bdakan rab tu 'khrugs par 'gyur// de ltar 'di rnams rim paso bye brag ston// bdug pa kun ni ldan pa brgyad du shes/
9b1(gso rig): sna tshogs nad ni lus kyi grangs bzhin du// ming rnams ma lus rjes su rtogs par bya// rtsub 'khums 'pho zhing gzer dang sngo bsangs mdog/ yan lag zug che yan lag brkyang bskum byed// shes rmong grang zhing gyong la skom pa rnams// rlung gi la su
9b2(gso rig): mkhas pas rab tu bstan// 'dzag cing rdul 'byung tsha zhing 'dod chags skye// dri nga rnag dang 'ju dang khro ba dang // bslab bcol brgyal dang mgo 'khor lus mdog ser// mkhris pa'i las su mkhas pas rab tu bstan// kha mig sna chu grang lci lus g.ya'
9b3(gso rig): rdulal/ shes pa rmongs shing sna tshogs 'gags pa dang // tsho ches mchil snams yun ring 'byung byed rnams// bad kan las su mkhas pas rab tu bstan// de rnams kyis byas 'di dag rtogs rnams ni// nad kun ming ni du ma'i rnam pa'ang // bye brag kha cig/
9b4(gso rig): skye ba'i dbang gis 'gyur// gang gi 'di rnams ming gzhan kun tu 'gro// rgyud ni le lo yid ni rnam ma dag/ skyon ni rab 'jug bkres dang gcin yang 'byung // gsus lci shes pa rmongs shing dang ga med// de rnams nad ldan de la nad 'byung 'gyur// bcud
9b5(gso rig): dang drod dang brtan dang ro tsa stobs bskyed lan tshwa mngar sbyar mar khu dang // khrus dang drod bsten mas btang sha dang bsten yan lag kun la dril phyis dang // snum gyi dugs dang 'jam rtsis zhi byas bsku byug nye bar bsten pa la sogs pa// bza' dang btung ba gnas dang
9b6(gso rig): sman 'di rnams kyis rlung ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// kha mngar bska ba grang dang rlung yab mtshan mo zla ba'i gzer la gnas pa dang // sa yi khang po chu yi 'khrul 'khor chu la brtse zhing bud med lus la rig/ mar sa ra k+Shi ra dang por lus la bkru sman dang ni khrag gi ha/ taraM spyad
10a1(gso rig): t+ya tha dang brtang pa ga dang sman 'di rnams kyis pakhros pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// rtsub dang k+Sha ra ba\u0f88\u0f90 kha cha ba dang ni 'bad rtsol drag dang ngar snabs sbya // bud meng bsnyen zhing la dub gnyid bcag
10a2(gso rig): chu la rtse zhing rkang pa 'chag par bya// reng bu'i dud bsten mgo bsro khrus dang skyug sman dug dang mas btang la sogs pa// bza' dang btung ba gnas dang sman 'di rnams kyis bad kan nye bar zhi bar 'gyur// 'phrod zas bsnyung dang tsha ba'i chu
10a3(gso rig): btung zhing // zas dang bya na yang zhing kha ba'i bcud// rtsub bral dugs dang 'ju ba bsten pa dang // de bzhin lus kyi steng 'og sbyang bar bya// rgun stod dbyar dang rgun smad rlung gi dus// mkhris pa ston dang so kha tsha ba'i dus// bad kan dpyid ka/
10a4(gso rig): me tog 'ong dus 'khrug/ de la de bzhin phan pa'i sman bsten bya// bad kan 'khrugs la skyug sman sbyar bar bya// mkhris pa'i rnam 'gyur byung la bkrus sman btang // rlung gi bdag nyid rngam rtsis 'joms par 'gyur// 'du 'phrod skyes
10a5(gso rig): la'ang 'dres ma de dag go// rlung la sbyar dang mar khu lan cha dang // mngar ba'i bza' dang ba tung ba rnams kyis so// mkhris pa la ni de bzhin mngar ba dang // kha dang bska ba grang ba rnams kyis so// bad kan la yang kha dang tsha ba dang /
10a6(gso rig): rtsub dang bska ba rno ba'i ro rnams kyis// de rnams bza' bas nye bar 'gro 'gyur ba// nad ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba yin// blo gzhan nyid kyis gang de ma bstan gang zhig bstan// nad rnams rang gis rtags nas ji lta'i tshul//
10b1(gso rig): spyan rnams rjes su rmo sa chung ba rnams la byas// bstan bcos su ni cung zad gtun phab 'bras bur byas// yon tan lhag can sbyor ba brgya pa brjod pa yis// bstod nams bla na med pa byadag gis gang thob pa// de yas
10b2(gso rig): rnam pa sna tshogs nad kyis gzir gyur pa// mtha' yas 'gro ba rnams kyi nad ni med gyur cig/ sbyor ba brgya pa zhes bya ba'i sprin gyi gzhung 'phags pa kru sgrub zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
10b3(gso rig): la pa'i ba chen po bram ze dza d+ha kaN+Ta zhal snga nas dang po rtsa 'grel lan cig gsum nga dus phyis rtswa kar shar phyogs kyi baN+Diti ta prad+ha shrI dz+nyA na ri zha la sde nas stong cung zad gsungs nas/ grub pa'i ning spyi rong 'phags pa
10b4(gso rig): 'jig rten dbang po'i gtsug lag khang la cung zad las mi ring ba/ chen po'i chen po rnams kyi ga nas dpal sher gyis tsug lag khang du snam brtson dam pa sde snod gsum dang / rgyud dang rgyud kyi yan lag rnams las legs
10b5(gso rig): par 'dris shing / khyad par du tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i gzhung don legs par rtogs pa dge slong a mo k+Sha'i gsung gis bskul nas/ mang du thos pa'i lots+tsha pa shAkya'i dge slong dpal nyi ma rgyal mtshan
10b6(gso rig): 
11a1(gso rig): rnam pa lag du rgyan nas drag// gang 'ad 'gyur gsan rnams na nanaltung dunyi ma dang zla ba ltar gyur cig/ la na pa'i 'gyur bstan la dab phyi byas nas sras te
11a2(gso rig): zhus dag legs par bgyis pa 'dis// sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byed par gyur
12a1(gso rig): sman 'tsho ba'i mdoku thub gyis mtha bzhug go//
12b1(gso rig): rgyu gar skad du/ dzI ba sU dza/ bod skad du/ sman 'tsho ba'i mdo/ bam po gcig bya/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sman pa'i mchog ste nyon mongs nad sel de la phyag btsal nas// 'phags
12b2(gso rig): pa'i brtul zhugs drang srong ma gtogs skyes bu blo ldan pas// rung mkhris bad kan gsum dang 'phrod spyad bag bya spyod lam gyis// mi lus 'di thob don yod 'tsho ba'i don tsam bstan par bya// 'dod khro gti mug gsum las rlung mkhris bang
12b3(gso rig): ka na gsum srid de// lus yul dus la sogs pa kun dang bde bcas dbang sgyur zhes// drang srong chen pos gsungs phyir de yi khyad par mdor bsdus nas// tshul brtags zas dang gnas spyad dgongs pa nyi tshe 'dir brjod pa// lus rtsub po sgom sems
12b4(gso rig): rgod tshag mang grang rlung gi mi// dmar ser blo rno khro la drod che dri can mkhris pa'i mi// dkar snum tshig g.yung lci la drod chung gnyid chung bad kan mi// gnyis dang gsum du 'dres pa yang ni de las shes par bya// rgan dang dAr dang byis pa rim gyis blta zhing
12b5(gso rig): shes par bya// ngad can grang ba rlung gi yul te tsha gdung mkhris pa'i sa// rlan can snum bag bde kan yul te 'dres pa de las brtag/ nang par srod ni bad kan tho rangs phyi dro rlung gi dus// nyi ma phyed dang nam phyed mkhris pa'i dus yin shes par bya// dpyad na
12b6(gso rig): bad kan ldang ste dbyar stong rlung gsog ston mkhris ldang // dbyar smad rlung ldang mkhris gsog dgun stod dgun smad bad kan gsog/ ston ni rlung zhi kun stong mkhris zhi dbyar smad bad kan zhi// lus yul dus dag brjod nas ro drug khyad par
13a1(gso rig): mdor bstan pa// mngar kun bsil te bad kan bskyed de rlung mkhris sel byed na// zhun mar bur ma snying ka zer gzem gro pa stan to// su pa skang rtsi stam sa'i sha dranas dang bu la rling // bang ldan se ny+dza shing ram nye bad kan mi skyed
13a2(gso rig): snyoms dro ste mkhris bskyed rlung dang bad kAn sel byed na// srog chags mkhris pa mkhris sel na l-i sham ni krung yang bskyed// skyur du pA mkhri skyed ci bad kan rlung sel na// skyu ru dang bal si ru rI \u0f7f bris pa sel bar byed// ku
13a3(gso rig): mngar ni bsil la dar ba chus bslad mkhris mi skyed/ kha ba bsil te rlung bskyed bad kan mkhris pa sel byed na// shu dag sle tres dro sta 'asred dang sbyang na rlung yang se la// bska ba kun ni bsil ti rlung bskyed bad kan mkhris sel na// a ru ra ni nyes pa
13a4(gso rig): gsum la gnod mi byed de snyoms// chang ran bad kun rlung sel mangs na mkhris pa skyed par byed// lan tshwa dro ste rlung sel bad kan mkhris pa steng byed na// rgya mtsho lce myang cha ni mkhris pa la yang gnod mi byed// mngar dang bska dang lan ma gsum rim pa
13a5(gso rig): bzhin mas lci ste// skyur dang tsha dang kha ba gsum ni de bzhin rim bzhin yang // kha bo bska dang lan cha gsum yang rim bzhin mas rtsu ba ste// mdar dang sbyar dang tsha ba gsum yang de bzhin mngar zhing 'jam// rA mkhris ba kan gsum ka 'dra ste nyid kyis
13a6(gso rig): nyid bskyed pas// lus dang yul dus zas spyod tshul gcig 'dom na nad ldang ste// ji ltar mthun par 'phrod sbyar rlung mkhris bad kan mi ldang pan// de phyir 'phrod dang mi 'phrod la sogs tshul bzhin 'dir bstan pa// rlung ni mngar snum lce dro 'phrod de rtsub
13b1(gso rig): yang bsil mi 'phrod// mkhris pa kha mngar bsil dang 'phrod de tsha skyur dro mi 'phrod// bad kan snum lci bsil dang mi 'phrong rtsub tsha bskyod dang 'phrod// de bas rang gi lus dang dus gnas zas dang 'phrod spyad phyir// dpyid zla gnyis ni bad
13b2(gso rig): kan bskyed dus yin te nad ldang bas// bad kan drang zhing bkru sman smyug sman btang zhing chu tshan btung // gro nas bsregs sha sbrang rtsi la sogs rtsub bska yang ba bza'// sbrang chang rgun chang rga chu sbrang chu bu ram tshang rnying btung // mar tshil la sogs
13b3(gso rig): snum lci kha ra skyur po che phrom dag/ mngar 'jam sbyar na bsil bag yang zhing nyin par log mi bya// chu ches lus bkru mnye zhing las bskyod bcag bya ci ran bya// gnas kyang ha tsa nga mi cha mi grang ran dro grib mar 'dug/ dbyar stong zla gnyis mar 'bri/
13b4(gso rig): dus yin nyal po drag shul spang // ngal dub mi bya bag 'bras 'o ma mar sar sha dag bza'// bu ram tshol ni cung zad bza' ste chang nyung yang ba btung // 'o ma bskol grangs kha ras btab dang dar ba 'thungs na phan// lan tshwa sbyar zhing na le sham la
13b5(gso rig): sogs pa tsha skyur spang // chu 'jam tsam gyis lus bkru sgra snyan mnyan zhing gdags// chad par reg bya nyin par tsog pur gnyid kyis log na phan// gnas kyang bser bu drag po'i ngad med dro min bsil bar 'dug/ dbyar smad zla ba gnyis na mkhris
13b6(gso rig): pa gsog cing rlung ldang ste// phyi rol tshal lus kyi nang grang nad gsum g.yo bas na// rlung nad bsal phyir lus mnye snum bsku sman chu bskol bas bkru// rlung nad sel nges til mar mas btang dugs dang lums kyang bya// zas kyang ha cang tsha min
14a1(gso rig): mngar sgyur med par ran par sbyar// pho ba drod bskyed bag dang mar tshil sbrang rtsi bar 'ga' bza'// yos dang 'bras chan mar khu brug dang zan dron sha dag bza'// chang yang cung zad btung ste chu dang chu grogs spang bar bya// rlan la
14a2(gso rig): mi 'dug mi 'gro lus la char pas gsher mi bya// stobs dang drag shul ngal zhing drub par gyur pa'i bag dang yang // nyin mtshan mi bde nyin par mi log nyal po brtun byed spang // gnas kyang rlan med rlung mi ldang la bsil bar stan gding 'dug/ ston na
14a3(gso rig): gnyis ni mkhris pa skye ba'i dus yin nad ldang bas// bsil mngar bkru sman btang zhing gtar kas khrag kyang ci ran dbyung / kha zhing mngar la bsil ba'i sman yang rtag tu bza' bar bya// dus 'di'i chu ni dug med gtsang dang bkrus shing 'thungs na phan/
14a4(gso rig): zas kyang 'bras nas sran ma sbrang rtsi khA ra shA la sogs// mang zhing kha lA yang ba mar sar 'o ma bza' zhing btung // chang lci drag po'i ro yod mi btung rA rorA mi bya ste// tshul dang til mar mi bza' zil par mi 'gro 'dug mi bya// tsha ba'i zas
14a5(gso rig): dang yul yang zla grogs yid du 'ong ba bsten// chu 'jam tsam gyis lus bkru gos kyang dri ma med pa bgo// rgyan dang dri zhim lus la gdags shing nyi tshan mo lnga ste// gnas kyang dro min bser bus mi phog bsil bag can la 'dug/
14a6(gso rig): dgun stod dgun smad zla bzhi phyi grang nang tshe bad kan gsog/ gos dror bgo zhing rlan dang lhags la bag bya nyi ma'ang lde// zas kyang sha tshon rus khu mar tshig snum bag 'grangs par bza'// mngar sbyar lan tshwa drod bag cher bza' gsar tog 'bru
14b1(gso rig): dag bza'// ran par sna tshogs chang btung ngal ba'i las dag byas kyang sla// rtsal bcag lus sbyang skabs skabs mgo lus til mar bsku zhing mnye// de rjes skyu ru ra la sogs pa sman bskol chus kyang bkru// gnas kyang bsro khang dron por me dang stan stug
14b2(gso rig): ldan par 'dug/ dbyar stod tsha dus dbyar smad rlung dus bkru sman mi btang ste// dgun stod dgun smad grang dang rgas la skyug sman gtar ka spang // dgun gnyis dbyar stod lums dugs mi bya nad kyis gzir kyang sla// de ltar yin yang lus dang nang du
14b3(gso rig): gar mthun brtsam par bya// rlung mkhris bad kan gsum dang 'phrod pas 'tsho ba'i mdo brjod nas// bag byed spyod lamya can dag ring du 'tsho phyir yang bstan pa// med sgra cir yang chos dang rigs pa gzhan dag gsum la 'dzem// sngar byas nang nub bsam
14b4(gso rig): zhing skyon dor phyin chad bag cher bya// byed pa gang la rdul med rang nyam med cing 'dod chen spang // nga rgyal longs spyod spyi brtol tshe min shod dman zhum mi bya// sdig grogs spang zhing dge ba shes bsten te gtong smos dge bcu spyad// gsong des tshul chags
14b5(gso rig): gzhan la gnod min mi la byams par bya// lha dang rgyal por nyer bsam lung mnyam yid dang mthun par bsgrub// rgyal po'i sras dang rma ni chung yang mi brnyas bag cher bya// spyod lam sgyu mas mi bslu bka' khrims yul chos bsrung // gzhan gyis spras
14b6(gso rig): skyon mi brjod gtogs 'dod gtum chos 'gran mi bya// dge slong slob dpon pha ma'i gong du mi 'gro sri zhu skyed// dge sbyong drang srong srog chags ya mtshan gnyen gtod sbrul mi brtse// ma rtogs shing chen mchod rten drung dang lam mdo phug sdong dang /
15a1(gso rig): sems can mang du bsad pa smos dur khrod nyal mi bya// gnyan pa'i mtsho dang chu mig bzang por mi bkru mi bshal te// rnga shing dgon pa'i shing chen mi bcad pa bong gzhom mi bya// mchod rten rgyal mtshan Ar+ya'i grib ma maN+Dal
15a2(gso rig): mi 'gom zhing // mi ro gtor ma yas btags hom khung thal khung bcug mi byaM// na mkha' ban bun nyi ma phyed dang dmar thag chad pa'i tshe// mi bza' mi btung yi ge klog min nyal po las dang spang // nyi ma la sogs 'od zer phra sngags mi ring ring mi blta//
15a3(gso rig): lha khang sgor mi nyal te ri sna grog sngar gnas mi bca'// ya mtshan shes drag mi bsten bud med ngag mi mnyan// bud med rgan la mi rgyo rtsal rgyo sgra 'gros dub mi bya// gang mo che zhing ring du rgod dang dung mo drag po spang // rtag tu mi 'dug ring du mi 'greng
15a4(gso rig): ci nus ran par bcag/ sbrid pa lud pa kha chu mchi ma snabs phyen bshang gcig yal// mi dgag ma bskus bkres skom nad gnyid gnog min myur du bsal// nyal po skegs pa lud pa la sogs tshe lus mjing mi rbu// gral na kha dgab sbrid pa
15a5(gso rig): sgra che ha cang kha mi bgyid// sen mo ring du mi bzhag bregs te phan tshun brud mi bya// mgo lus lag pas mi brdab mgo la drag tu ma ka ste/ don med sa mi bri zhing lag pa mi brda' chu mi bri// mi nus bzhin du l+lI mi 'degs te mya ngan mnan mi bya//
15a6(gso rig): dpyid dang dbyar stod ston ni phyugs mar dus gzhan til mar gyis// rtag tu mgo dang rkang mthil bsku zhing ngar bar lus kyang bsku// ston dpyid ma yin res 'ga' sna dang rna bar til mar blug/ skyer ba'i khaN+Da stang zil dag gis bar bar mig
15b1(gso rig): kyang bsku// rtag tu lus kyi byi dor bya zhing sman sngags rin chen gdags// bser bu drag po mi ro'i dri dang dud pas phog mi bya// chu tshas mgo lus mi bkru bkru sman skyugs sman btang ba dang // cham pa ma zhus btab ste mgo lus mi bkru snum mi bsku// /
15b2(gso rig): skya rengs shar nas tsog por 'dug ste da ring ci bya bsam// langs nas so shing bca' zhing kha yi skyon bsal lag gdong bkru// de nas sman mchog a ru ra ni rtag zos bdud rtsi yin// lug gi mar min mar sar zhun mar rgas sra tshe ring ste// 'di la
15b3(gso rig): sogs pa lus dang tshe la phan pa'i sman zos na// byug pa rgyan dang gos kyis shin tu mdzes byas lha yang mchod// de nas sri zhu'i gnas dang 'khor la snyan brjod 'dzum bstan nas// rje dpon las dang bdag gzhan don la nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed//
15b4(gso rig): dus bzhir dro ba ran par zas bza' ngoms par skom btung ste// thug pa khu tshan la sogs snum lci drod kun sngar bza' zhing // 'bras la sogs pa bsil yang phyis bza' phrad med phyi ma bkam// bab chol ha cang 'grangs par bza' min
15b5(gso rig): myos bar chad mi btung // 'bras kyis 'grangs rjes phye zan mi bza' drod rjes skom mi btung // skyo ma ran par 'thungs na lus rta nang na rgan la gsod// ro drug gang yang gcig la cher zos nad ljang ran par sbyar// 'grangs pa'i rjes la nyal
15b6(gso rig): po bang stobs rta rgyug la sogs spang // shing tog ldam ldum mangs na nad ldang ba mos phog pa gnod// dbyar zla 'bring po tshes la ldam ldum bza' drags nad du 'gyur// nad can lums kyis drangs te mgyogs na nad ldang skran du 'ong //
16a1(gso rig): mtshan pa g.yer ma spangs te zos na cung zad snying la gnad // khrus mchog snang rtsi mar rnying ma mnyam zos nA dug bzhin gnang // mi mnyam tshe chung byas kyang rnaMs rjes chang mu 'thungs na gnod// ma langs zho dang langs
16a2(gso rig): ma thag gi zho dron nad kun slong // chu bya dbyar spang ldum mchog ki lun dbyar zla 'bring po'i sman// sman 'thungs shi ba'i sha gnod ga gon zhor 'dres rims su 'gyur// btsong bsregs sbrang rtsir mi 'phrod lhan cig zos na 'chi bar 'gyur//
16a3(gso rig): ke'u 'am gnag sha lhan cig zos na sman du 'gyur// dgun stod rgya g.yer zos na snying na drags na mig kyang ldeng // mar tshil zos dang mi 'phrod lha ba bza' drags na sa 'byung // bra bo mang du zos na rlung dang lus g.ya' ste// nub mo chu 'thung cha gnon
16a4(gso rig): la phug rnying dang sha skam spang // nya dang kha tsha mar tshil mi 'phrod snod kyang gcig mi bya// nya dang 'o ma lhan cig mang zos nang na zer ma gnod// shing tog chang la sogs te sbyar dang shang tshel phug rlon// yungs rnyings 'di rnams gang yang 'o mar
16a5(gso rig): 'phrong mAn mang zos gnod// 'o tshan 'thungs rjes chu bgrog 'thungs dang rgya sran nag po gnod// zla ba spyang kis zin tshe zan zos so na shu rtswa 'byung // gnas sha2 lhan tshig zos na lus la g.yan pa 'ong // gnag sha phag sha lhan cig bos na
16a6(gso rig): lto yi srin bur 'gyur// nya dang khyim bya'i sha gnyis lhan cig zos na skan du 'gyur/ khyim bya'i sgo nga'i spri dang sgog skya zos na dbugs mi bde/ khyim bya'i sha dang ri bong sha gnyis lhan cig zos na cung zad 'khru// sha mo yungs mar nang du brngos
16b1(gso rig): ba zos na lus la gnod// mi nu'i sa bon kA tsam tsau dang sbrang rtsir 'phrod ma yin// la phug bu ram mi 'phrod zho dang bya gag shar mi 'phrod// de ltar 'phrod zas goms dang rtag tu 'chag pa dang // lang tsho 'ju skas zos dang nyung na gnod pa med
16b2(gso rig): dang bsre// 'phrod pa'i zas zos phyi dro'i las byas nam sros bde bar nyal// de ltar nan tan bag byas mi tshe tshad bzhin 'tsho nges pas// skyes nas lo bcu'i bar du sma mi dbab cing rang gar bzhag/ de nas nyi shu lon te lo bcur bslab dang
16b3(gso rig): rtsol bar bya// de nas lnga bcu lnga lon sum cu rtsa lnga khyud khor du// longs spyod grags pa'i yul srid gtam byas nas// lnga bcu lnga lon phyin chad chos lam yum gyi ched bsgrub phyir// dge la brtson bskyed thos rig goms byed las
16b4(gso rig): sems ci bder gnas// de ltar sus nus maM lus thob pa'i don yod spyod cing dge/ slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub snying pos sman pa rnams la brdzangs pa// sman 'tsho ba'i modado tshogs su bcad pa rdzogs so//
16b5(gso rig): slob dpon klu sgrub kyis bshad pa sman a ba'i cho ga/ sman a ba 'di ni lus kyi rus pa chag pa dang / rkang lag gi rus pa chag pa dang / 'phres pa dang / kha bye ba dang / tshogs 'bur na dang / smas te rma chen po byung ba dang / rlung dang / bad kan
16b6(gso rig): dang mkhris pa dang / dreg nad dang / nga rgan dang / ro spa man chad 'jas pa dang / na ste mi bden yang nad kyi ngos ma zin te tsi na gtol med pa dang / mig nang sna tshogs pa dang / rgos sra bar bya ba dang / ro tsa bar bya ba la sogs pa'i dpyad/ lha chen po gu
17a1(gso rig): lo gris gu la~M gi btsun mo zhes bshad de// a ba yin no// a ba gtang ba'i tshes grangs 'dam pa ni/ tshes bdun dang / brgyad dang / bcu gsum la bzang ngo /
17a2(gso rig): skar ma 'dam pa ni ba ru Na'i dus la bab pa'i chu lbu ste/ bdud rtsi dang 'byor pa'i skar ma la bzang ste sman btang ngo // sman btang ba'i thabs nI nad ci na yang rung ste/ dang por sbrang rtsi las sbyar te btang
17a3(gso rig): de'i 'og tu zhun mar la sbyar te btang / de'i 'og tu 'bru mar la sbyar te btang ngo // sbrang rtsi la sogs pa sna re re 'dra ste/ zhag bdun bdun sbyar zhing 'phul te 'chal lo// phan pa'i sna grangs ni/ lus kyi
17a4(gso rig): rus pa chag pa dang rkang lag chag grum pa byung ngo cog dang lus la rma byung ngo cog dang / snying na ba dang rtsib logs na ba dang / ro stong gzer ba dang / glon pa dang / rus pa chag go cog pa
17a5(gso rig): lhag par phan no// rlung las gyur pa'i nad brgyad cu snyed yod pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad kyi rnam grangs nyi shu dang / bad kan gyi nad nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/ spyir nad brgya nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod pa ril 'byung ngo //
17a6(gso rig): dreg nang dang / grang nad dang tsha grang 'dres pa las gyur pa'i nad dang / mdor na nang ci yang rung ste/ sman a ba btang na nad do cog 'byung ngo zhes lha chen po tshangs pa / gu laM gis bshad pa las
17b1(gso rig): zas so// mgo rab rob yod pa dang long tog dang / spos g.yogs pa dang ldongs pa dang mog g.ya' ba dang na ba dang / maug nang yod da tsog dang / mgul pa man chad na ba dang / sngan
17b2(gso rig): dang / rna ba mi gsang ba dang / klad pa mi bde ba dang / mchin nad dang / snying nad dang / ro stod mi bde ba dang / 'di rnams la 'bras bu gsum las sna gcig kyang zho re re/ lcags phye zho gsum lcags
17b3(gso rig): dog gi nang du chab can rtse gsum las bsgral te gang lus pa dang / btsags la chu dron 'jam tsam gyi nang du sman a bya zhib du btags pa zho gsum btab ste/ 'jam tsam la nub mo nyal gar 'tshal lo//
17b4(gso rig): dgongs 'tshal mi 'tshal na/ dro 'tshal ba'i rjes la 'tshal lo// sman 'di nyin zhag nyi shu tsam btang na/ ldongs pa yang mig gis mthong bar 'gyur ro// yang sbyor ba rnam gcig la 'bras bu gsum
17b5(gso rig): las sna gcig kyang zho re re// lcags phye zho gsum ba mar srang gnyis chab can rtse gsum gyi nang du bskol te/ do ni du/ gang ni lus pa dang / btsugs te dro 'jam tsam gyi nang du a ba btags pa
17b6(gso rig): zho gsum btab la nyal gar 'tshal lo// dgongs 'tshal mi 'tshal ba lta zhig na/ dro 'tshal ba'i rjes la 'tshal lo// 'di bzhin du zhag bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i bar du 'tshal na/ mig phyung ba ma gtogs pa
18a1(gso rig): dmus long dang mdongs pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// lo bcu drug pa gzhon nu tshad du 'gyur/ a 'phye ma mar ldan pa/ dus chag pa sa nub gsum du/ 'thungs
18a2(gso rig): na de yi rus pa ni// rdo rje lta bur sra bar 'gyur// a ba tsha ba gsum de bzhin// tshan gnye shing rtsa ba yas// drug skam rus dang // ludra pa de bzhin dbugs mi bde// snying na pA dang sha tshod la//
18a3(gso rig): de rnams cha ni mnyam byas te// phye mar byas nas nub gsum du// chu dron lhan cig myur du 'dung // 'bras bu gsum ni 'o la dang / mkhas pas de bzhin bsgos bya sa nas// mar ni sum cha gcig
18a4(gso rig): dang ldan// de bzhin a ba bzhi cha gcig/ zan zos 'og tu nub gsum du// 'thungs nas su sha gsum dang 62// gyen du za ba'i ma las rgyab// rab rib rdzi por mig ser dang // tshang rnying g.yan
18a5(gso rig): pa tshor bcas dang // mig gi nad ni thams cad dang // gzhan yang de bzhin klad nad dang // lto nang dang ni snying nad dang // de bzhin yan lag chag pa dang // zhag gsum du ni rab sbyar na// long ba dag ni
18a6(gso rig): mthong bar 'gyur// a ba so ma ra dza dang // rA yi 'o mar skol te btung // 'thungs na rlung ltar mgyogs par 'gyur// a ba phye ma mar sar dang // kha ra de bzhin po po ling // gzhang gi
18b1(gso rig): nang ni thams cad la// 'di las drag pa gang yang med// glang po ba lang khyu mchog dang // rwa dang lug dang mi rnams la// a ba mar dang 'o ma dang // 'thungs na de dag shis 'gyur te// sha
18b2(gso rig): chod rul pa chag pa dang // skem dang snying nad mgo 'khor dang // thams cad nad las rnam par grol// gang gi lus ni skem pa dang // gang zhig sha bkrar gyur pa dang / gang gi lus
18b3(gso rig): ni 'jig pa dang // gal te rus pa nar gyur cing // gso dka' ba yi nad la phan// a ba dang ni nye shing dang // so ma ra dza de bzhin te// snang rtsi bi pi ling de bzhin// mar
18b4(gso rig): dang 'o mar lhan cig btung // zhag bdun bar du sbyang bar bya// 'dod chags rnam par spangs byas te// zhag bdun par du sbyar ba yis// de ni rlung dang
18b5(gso rig): khrag las rgyal/ de bzhin nad rnams kun las rgya'o// slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa sman a ba'i cho ga rdzogs so//
19a1(gso rig): yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa slob dpon pa gol gyis mdzad pa bzhugs so//
19b1(gso rig): rgyu gar d+hA/ aSh+T+rA ga hr-i ya saM hrI nAH/ bod skad du/ yan lag brgyud pa'i snying po bsdus bA zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi zla bai DUr+yA 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
19b2(gso rig): 'dod chags la sogs ma lus pa yi nad// rgyun tu 'brel bas lus kun ma lus khyab// 'dod drung gaut+ti mug khro ba sel ba yi// smon pa sngon med de phyag 'tshal lo// / de nas tshe ring bar 'dod pa'i le'u
19b3(gso rig): bshad par bya'o// rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa drang srong chen po rnams kyis 'di ltar bshad do// tshe ni ring bar 'dod pa yis// chos dang nor dang bde ba sgrub// tshe yi rig byed lung bshad pa// rab tu gus par bya bar gyis// tshangs
19b4(gso rig): bas tshe yi rig byed dran// skye dgu'i bdag la bshad pa yin// de yis tha skar des brgya byin// dA yis rgyun shes drang srong la'o// de yis myi bzhin 'jug la sogs// de rnams kyis rgyud so sor byas// shin tu 'thor ba de rnams
19b5(gso rig): lasasarab gces pal cher btus pa ni// shin tu bsdus min rgyas min par// yan lag brgyud pa'i snying po byas// lus dang byis pa gdon lus stod// mtshan dang mche ba rgas ro tsa// gso dpyang gung la gnas pa yi// yan lag brgyad du de
19b6(gso rig): bshad do// rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan yang // nyes pa rnam gsum mdor bsdus yin// de ni rnam 'gyur ma gyur pas// lus ni 'joms dang gnas pa yin// des khyab gyur kyang snying ga dang // lte ba'i 'og par steng na gnas// na tshod nyin zhag/
20a1(gso rig): zas zos la// de na mtha' dbus sogs rtogs // ngas n+ni 'asnyoms ni// mung mnyam pas mnyam par 'gyur// don ts+tsha ba pra sti ras// mnyam pas kyang ni bar mar 'gyur// skye ba'i dbang po su khrag
20a2(gso rig): gnas// dug can srin bu'i dug dang mtshungs// de ni rang bzhin rnam gsum ste// chu 'bring chen po so sor blta// ma lus pi la khams mnyam pa// mchog yin mnyes pa gnyis pa 'byung spang // de la rlung ni rtsub cing yang // glang zhing sra lnga 'phra
20a3(gso rig): zhing g.yo// mkhris pa snum bcas rno zhing dro// yang zhing dri mnam 'khru zhing gsher// khang kan snum bsil lci ba dang // rtul zhing 'jam brtan 'byar bag can// de gnyis gsum zung 'khrugs pa las// ldan pa dang ni 'dus pa yin//
20a4(gso rig): lus zungs dngas ma khrag ding sha// tshil dang rus rkang khu chu ste// gnod bya bdun yin dri ma gcin// bshang ba rdul la sogs yin// thams cad mnyam pas 'phel 'gyur zhing // de las bzlog pas gnod par 'gyur// ro ni mngar
20a5(gso rig): sbyar lan tshwa dang // tshwa dang kha dang bska ba ste// rdzas drug la gnas de rnams kyang // go rim bzhin du stobs chen yin// de la dang po'i gsum po ni// rlung 'joms tsha sogs bad kan sel// bsku dang kha dang mngar ba ni// mkhris sel gzhan
20a6(gso rig): dge byed pa yin// de ltar rdzas ni rnam pa gsum// zhi 'khrugs tha mal gnas la phan// de la tshe bsil phul byung bas// nus pa rnam pa gnyis su shad// rdzas kyi zhu ba rnam gsum ste// mngar sbyar tsha ba'i bdag nyid can// yon tan lci
20b1(gso rig): rtul bsil dang snum// 'jam dang bska ba mnyen dang brtan// phra dang bcas shing skam bag can// de bzlog pa dang nyi shu yin// dus don las kyi sbyor ba rnams// dman dang log pa lhag pa dang // yang dag sbyor bas ca dang ni// nad
20b2(gso rig): med rgyu gcig yin zhes bya// nad ni nyes pa ma snyoms yin// nyes pa snyom pa nad med yin// de la nad ni rang bzhin gnas// glo bur cha yis gnyis su bshad// de rnams lus sems dbye ba yis// gnas kyang rnam pa gnyis yin no//
20b3(gso rig): 'dod chags gti mug kyang yid kyi// nyes pa gnyis su bstan pa yin// nad pa blta dang reg pa dang // dri ba yis ni yongasu rtag/ nad kyi gzhi yi dang po'i tshul// mtshan nyid nyer bsten 'thob pa yin// sa dang lus kyi bye brag gis// 'di la
20b4(gso rig): yul sa rnam gnyis bshad// skams phal cher rlung bskyed cing // rlan can bad kan 'phel ba yin// cha mnyam nyes pa mnyam pa ste// sa yi phyogs ni gsum du bshad// skad cig la sogs nad kyi skabs// dus su sman ni sbyor bar byed//
20b5(gso rig): mdor na sman ni rnam gnyis te// sbyang ba dang ni zhi ba'o// lus las byung ba'i nad rnams kyi// rim gyis sman gyi dam pa ni// mas btang bkru sman slon sman dang // de bzhin til mar mar sbrang rtsi// blo dang brtan bdag sogs shes po// sems kyi
20b6(gso rig): nyes pa'i sman mchog yin// gso ba dag tu bstan pa ni// sman pa sman dang nang g.yog dang // nang pa yan lag rnam bzhi ste// re re 'ang rnam pa bzhi bzhi yin// sman pa mkhas rtogs gzhung don shes// las rnams mthong zhing gtsang ba yin//
21a1(gso rig): nanatshig mang ba dag/ yon tan mang ldan du tshogs 'thod// na ga mgarnas brtse gtsang sbracan// skem nucung tho dang ldan pa yin// nga ba phyug tsang bcwo nyan// shes par nus shing slob slobs ldas// sman kun
21a2(gso rig): bzod par nus pa'i lus// skyes bu gzhon zhing bdag nyid thul// gnang du ma song rgyu sngar tshul// mtshan nyid chung dang gnod pa med// gnod bya yul dus rang bzhin rnams// mtshungs min yan lag phun sum tshogs// bza' ni rjes su mthun
21a3(gso rig): pA la/ nyes pa lam gcig gsar gso sla// gnad ni mtshon sogs kyis gdab cing // gso ba dka' zhing de las 'dras// tshe yi lhag ma lus phyir 'tsho// go bzlog pa las goms phan nyid// bcos pa'i thabs med nyid du 'gyur//
21a4(gso rig): shin tu phyin ci log par gnas// 'dod dang rmongs dang khro bar byed// 'chi ltas snang zhing dbang po nyams// sman pa rgyal po la stang dang // de dang mi mdza' sdang ba dang // yo byad mi 'byor brel ba dang // nyan du mi btub tshe zad dang // gtum zhing
21a5(gso rig): mya ngan la mnan 'jig/ byas pa mi bzo sman brnyas spang // de nas gzhan yang rgyu 'di yi// le'u bsdus pa bshad bya ste// tshe ring nyin re dus spyod dang // nad med bya dang btung ba dang // zas shes bya dang zas snga ma dang // zas tshod spyan dang
21a6(gso rig): rol gnas// nad shes bya dang de dbye ba// de gso ba dang gso thabs gnyis// skyang sogs sbrum chos khrus btang bya// sman dung khar dor mig bkru dang // gso dang dbyung thabs zug rngu mtshan// gtar dpyad zug rngu dbyung ba'i dpyad// mtshon da
21b1(gso rig): thal sman me btsa' las// mdo gnas le'u sum cu ni// 'di yi lus kyi brjod bya ste// mngal du 'jug dang de yi nad// yan lag gnad kyi bye brag dang // rnam 'gyur bang chen las byung drug/ nad kun 'byung ba'i nad gzhi dang // rims khaka dadugra
21b2(gso rig): mi bde gcod sogs// chang dang gzhang 'brum tshad pa'i nang // chu 'gags gcin ni skye ba dang // khong 'bras dmu rdzing dag dang ni// skya rbab mdze nad rlung gis gzir// dreg nad dag dang bcu drug yin// rims nang gso dang khrag dang ni// lud pa dbus
21b3(gso rig): mi bde dang gcong // son dang tshad nad gzhang 'brum dang // tshad nang pho ba gcin nad gnyis// khong 'bras skran dang dmu rdzing dang // skya rba ba 'or nad me dpal dang // mdze dang sha bkra rlung nad dang // dreg nad gso ba'i dpyad rnams te// le'u nyi shu gnyis 'di
21b4(gso rig): yin// / de las gzhan pa cho ga grub// skyug sman bkru sman cho ga dang // de grub mas btang cho ga dang // mas btang nyes grub drug pa ni// sman yin de nas phyi ma ni// byas pa nyes spyod de'i nad dang // de gdon 'byung por rtogs pa gnyis// spro dang /
21b5(gso rig): brjed byed sogs gnyis gnyis// mig mchu rdzi ma'i grwa mtshams dang // mig 'bras rab rib mthong nyams gsum// gnyis gnyis kun la 'gro ba yin// rna dang sna dang kha dang mgo'o// rma dang chag drug sa mtshan par brdol// 'bras sogs phra
21b6(gso rig): mo'i nad rnams dang // gsang ba'i nad ni tha dad gnyis// dug dang sbrul dang srin bu gdug/ byi ba dang ni bcud kyis len// bu med sa bon gso ba ste// le'u bzhi bcu nyid yin no// de ltar le'u brgya nyi shu// gnas ni drug tu bshad pa yin// yan lag
22a1(gso rig): brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las mdo'i gnas kyi le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas nyan ro zhing spyad pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o// bde gnas tshe ni bsrung ba'i phyir// yud tsam tshangs phyir gnas
22a2(gso rig): te langs// lus kyi bya ba rdzogs byas nas// de nas gtsa 'i cho ga bya// arga n+ya gro d+ha seng ldeng // ka rany+dza ka ku la sogs// bskra dang tsha dang kha ba dag/ rtse 'jam nang par zas spad nas// so dang rnyil lam gnod par// so yi dag byed bca
22a3(gso rig): bya// ma nu smon blo dbugs ma pad// lung pari lu rims/ pa yon can// skom zhing kha bskams snying mig na// mgo bo na bas 'di mi bca'// rtag tu mig sman sbyar khaN+Da// mig la phan pas de phyir bsten// de ni ma yi rang bzhin te// lhag
22a4(gso rig): par bad kan la 'jigs pas// mchi ma 'dzag phyir skyer khaN+Da// zhag bdun zhing ni blugs par bya// de nas sna sman 'khur bkang dor// dud pa so rtsi bsten par bya// so rtsi blo 'grams mkhris pa khrag/ rtsub pas mig ni na ba dang // dus
22a5(gso rig): gis brgyal zhing chang nang gzir// lus skyem gyur la gnod pa yin// rtag tu bsdu byug spyod byed no// de ni rgas del rlung 'joms yin// mig gsal lhas rgyas che 'phel zhing // gnyid lding pags 'ja mAM rtas byed yin// de ni mgo dang na
22a6(gso rig): ba dang // rkang pa khyad par rtag tu bsten// bang kan skyes dang ma zhu dang // bkru sman sogs btang bsku byug spang // yang zhing las ni nus pa dang // me yi drod bskyed tshil 'bri la// lus kyi skabs phyed mkhregs pa nyid// rtsol ba las ni
22b1(gso rig): 'byung bar 'gyur// rlung khris nad can byis pa dang // rgas shing 'khogs pas de spang bya// stobs ldan snum bag za ba dang // grang ba'i dus dang dpyid dus dang // nus ldan dag gi de bsten bya// de las gzhan tshe ba sa nyid// de byas ci
22b2(gso rig): bdar lus dag ni// kun nas yongs su mnye bar bya// rtsol ba de byas zin nas ni// bde bar lus kun gnas par bya// shin tu rtsal bas lung pa ngo // skom dang gtsang can mi dran mun// khrig dang rgya/ rims dang
22b3(gso rig): smon pa 'byung bar 'gyur// rtsol ba mi nyal lam bud med// rgad dang sgra sogs shugs 'byin dang // seng ges glang po drangs pa bzhin// shin tu grags par ma rungs 'gyur// dril phyis bad kan sel ba dag/ tshil ni rab tu zhu
22b4(gso rig): byed cing // yan lag brtan par byed pa dang // pags pa gsal bar byed pa'i mchog/ khrus ni drod skyed ro tsa dang // tshe dang mdangs dang stobs rab bskyed// g.ya' dang dri mngal dang ldan rdul// snyom skom lus tsha mi shes sel//
22b5(gso rig): chu dron gyis ni lus kyi sbrang // thugs shing bkrus pa stobs bskyed yin// de nyid mgor thugs khrus byis na// rtswa dang mig gi stobs 'phrog yin// khrus ni 'gram 'chags mig nang dang // rna ba'i nang dang chad pas 'khru// lto spros
22b6(gso rig): cham pa ma zhu dang // zos ma thag tu rnams la spang // zhu nas phan zhing ran par za// gshang sogs nan gyis brnags mi bya// shugs ma phyung bar gzhan mi bya// gnod las mi bde bar ma yin// sems can thams cad bar 'dod phyir//
23a1(gso rig): rtson pa kun la 'jug par 'dod// bde ba chos med par ma yin// de bas chos la brtson par bya'o// mos pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten// cig shos ring du spang bar ba// 'tshe dang bcu dang 'dod log spyod//
23a2(gso rig): phra ma ngag rtsub brdzun tshig dang // mi 'brel smra dang gnod sems dang // brnab sems lta ba phyin ci log/ de ltar sdig pa'i las rnams bcu// lus ngag yid kyis spang bar bya// phongs pa nad pa mya ngan gzir// ci nus par ni phan gdogs
23a3(gso rig): bya/ 'bu srin grog sbur dag la yang // rang dang 'dra bar rtag tu dalta// lha dang dge slong bram ze dang // sman pa rgan rgyal mgron pos mchod// slong la rgyab kyis phyogs mi bya// brnyas par mi bya tshar mi bcad// gnod par byed partson sa
23a4(gso rig): la'ang // phan gdags pa ni gtso cher bya// 'byor drang rgud la'ang yid gcig bya// rgyu la phrag dog 'bras bu min// dus su phan dang ran par smra// slu ba med cing nges par bya// bzhin 'dzum gsong por smra ba dang // spyod bzang zhi sting
23a5(gso rig): 'jam/ gcig pu bde min thams cad la// yid mi brtan cing dogs mi bya// su yang bdag gi dgra yin dang // bdag ni su yi dgrar gyur dang // brnyas dang bdag la gtso bo ni// mi byams zhes ni smra ma bya// 'gro sam
23a6(gso rig): shes nas ni// gang zhig ji ltar yongs mgu ba// de la de bzhin rjes 'jug cing // gzhan dag dga' byed mdzangs pa yin// dbang po gzir bar mi bya zhing // 'di rab nyams bder bya ba'ang min// tshoms gsum med pa'i rtsom pa la//
23b1(gso rig): me bsten de dang 'gal mi bya// chos rnams kun gyi las la ni// dbu ma'i lam gyis rjes 'jug bya// sgra san kha d+ma ring mo bzhag/ sgo dgu rkang ba dri med bya// khrus la dga' nang dro zhim bsgos// ma lugs bzang zhing mo 'gyu sdug
23b2(gso rig): rin chen grub pa'i gsang sngags dang // sman chen rtag tu bcang bar bya// gdugs dkar lham dang ldan pa ni// gnya' shing gang tsam blta zhing 'gro/ mtshan mo don chen dag la ni// dbyug thogs 'og rakri grogs ldan bya// mchod rten mchod
23b3(gso rig): la mtshan dang // mi shaMs sgrib ma thal phub dang // mi gtsang gsag byung gtor pa dang // khAm+b+ha byes sa nr-i bsgom mAM b+ha// rmya bor rgyu lA te 'gro ma b+ha// maM chen phung por 'gros bya// the tsham bcas pa'i glu shing les// gzhon pa mi bsrun
23b4(gso rig): bzhin mi gazlog/ sbring pa gang mo hA/ la pA la// kha ni gdangs par myi bya'o// sna ni b+hu bar mi zhi // don med saM ris mi bya'o// lus kyi yan lag mo gcu zhing // tsog cog por yang 'dug me bya// lus ngag yid kyi spyod pa ni// snun
23b5(gso rig): la las zlos pa b+ha// dus b+h+ring yAn+d+ha ri gnas sbyi b+ha// matsun mo shing drung ba sbyin mi sa// sum snang mchod rten drung bzhi mdo// lU yi khang pa'ang de bzhin no// gsongs 'brog stong kha stong dang // dur khrod du ni sbyin mo 'ang min//
23b6(gso rig): rnam kun nyi ma la mi blta// mgo yis khur ni bskur mi bya// shin tu phra dang 'ching ba dang // mi gtsang mi sdug rgyun mi blta// chang 'tshong ba dang sbyor ba dag/ sbyin dang lin la spyad mi bya// mdun gyi bser bu nyi chen rdul/ kho mo dang ni rlung
24a1(gso rig): tshub dang // sbring pa sgregs pa lud pa zas// gnyid log nyal po gcus mi bya// gang kha'i grib ma rgyal po sdang // sbrul gdug gcan zan ra can dang // dus mtshams ngag tu zas bza' dang // bud med nyal log sems las dang /
24a2(gso rig): dgra bo'i nar mar zan tshogs 'dus// smad 'tshong tshong pa'i zas dag dang // lus dang mchu dang sen sgra 'byin// lag pa sgra ni sprug pa dang // chu me mchod bya'i bar du 'gro// ro bsregs la bsten dud pa dang // chang sogs chags dang bud med la//
24a3(gso rig): yid rton rang dbang gyur pas spang // blo ldan spyod pa thams cad la// 'jig rten nyid ni slob dpon yin// de bas 'jig rten pa yi don// rtogs par byed pas de nyid bya// snying rjes bslan zhing stong dang ldan// lus dang ngag yid dul ba dang // gzhan gyi
24a4(gso rig): don la rang don sems// de dag dam pa'i spyod mthar thug/ de ltar bdag ni nyin mtshan du// ji lta bur ni gnas 'gro zhes// rtag tu dran pa nyer 'jog pa// sdug bsngal snod du mi 'gyur ro// de ltar spyod pa mdor bsdus pas// gang zhig kun tu
24a5(gso rig): spyod byed pa// tshe dang nad med dbang phyug dang // grags pa 'jig rten rtag 'thob 'gyur// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las mdo'i gnas kyi le'u gnyis pa'o// / de nas dus su spyad pa'i le'u bshad par
24a6(gso rig): 'o// dgun zla ra ba sogs gnyis gnyis// rim bzhin dus ni drug tu bshad// de las dgun zla tha chung sogs// gsum ni byang du 'gro zhes bya// de tshe mi rnams nyin re zhing // mthu 'phrog pa zhes bya ba yin// de tshe shin tu rno zhing tsha// rtsub
24b1(gso rig): ba'i lam gyi ngo bo nyid// nyi ma rlung gi zla ba yi// sa yo yon tan zad par byed// 'dir ni tsha bska kha pa yi// ro rnams stobs ni che ba yin// de bas me ni mthu stobs 'phrog/ lho phyogs su ni 'gro ba'i dus// dbyar la sogs par slar stobs
24b2(gso rig): bskyed pa 'di stobs slar ni bskyed pas na// 'dir ni bsil bas zla ba ni// stobs dang ldan pas nyi ma 'bri// char 'bab pa dang rlung bsil bas// sa steng tsho ba zhi ba na// 'dir ni snum dang sbyar lan tshwa// mngar ba'i ro rnams mthu bskyed do//
24b3(gso rig): dgun che char dang tsha dus su// stobs chung lcug ma dag la 'bring // stobs ldan glang bas bkag pas na// dgun gyi dus su me stobs ldan// de ni rlung gis sbar bas na// zas nyung gyur na lus zungs skems// de bas dgun ni mngar sbyar
24b4(gso rig): dang // lan tshwa'i ro ni bsten par bya// de tshe mtshan mo ring bas na// nang par nyid ni bkres par 'gyur// nges par bya ba byas nas ni// ji skad bshad rdzogs de rjes la// rlung 'joms til mar gyis byug cing // spyi bo til mar gyis
24b5(gso rig): byug mnye// bag yod pa dang stobs 'gyed cing // rkang pas ran par mnye bar bya// de nas bska bas snum bsal lo// cho ga bzhin du khrus dag bya// gur gum gla rtsi dang bcas pa// lus bsku a kai ru yis gdug/ sha tshon khu ba
24b6(gso rig): snum pa dang // bu ram chang dang chang dngas chang // gro dang 'bras khur ma sha dang // 'o ma~M bu ram shing byas bzo'// kha zas gsar dang zhag til mar// dri 'jam chu yis gtsang sbra bya// be'u ras skrag pa dang sogs bgo// dre'u rngog re'u bal la ba
25a1(gso rig): gding rang bzhin dro zhing yang pa yi// gos bgo mal la brten par bya// nyi ma'i 'od la ran par bde// dugs bya lham ni rtag tu bgo/ chung ma gzhon zhing yid 'ong rgyags// nu ma brla dang ro smad rgyas// gur gum gyis
25a2(gso rig): byugs spros kyis gdugs// lus kyi drod kyis grang sel ba'o// sa khang khang pa nyis rim byas// mngag ma'i drod kyis bsros pa ni// grang dang rtsub pa las byung ba'i// nyes pa nam yang mi 'byung ngo // dgun slad dus du lhag par
25a3(gso rig): yang // cho ga 'di nyid bya ba yin// de tshe lhag par grang ba dang // stobs 'phrog las byung rtsub pa yin// dgun nI bad kan kho na sogs// dpyid dus nyi ma'i 'od dris pa// me yi drod nyams nad bskyed de// de bas de ni myur du bsal// rno dang
25a4(gso rig): sdug sman sna sman sogs// yang dang rtsub pa'i kha zas dang // bcag dang lus kyi mnye ba yis// bad kan badro ba'i nad bsal bya// khrus byas ga pur tsan+danA dang // gur gum sogs pas bsku bar bya// nas dang gro ni rnying po dang // sbrang rtsi skam
25a5(gso rig): sa'i bsreg sha bza'// a mra'i khu ba dang sbyar ba'i// khu ba skom du sbyar ba btung // chung ma dri zhim ut+pal gyis// mig dang ldan dang lhan cig bcing // yid ni dga' zhing bder byas pas// grogs dang lhan cig btung bar bya// skyon med chang
25a6(gso rig): rgan dro 'jam dang // bu ram rgun chang sbrang tshang dang // sga chu bskol dang se'u'i chu// sbrang chu'am bla sgang chu btung bya// lho phyogs bser bus bsil ba dang // mtha' ma kun tu chu 'bab la// nyi ma'i 'od ni mi snang dang // ner bu bcag 'dra'i mdangs
25b1(gso rig): ldan pa// khwa byug snyan pa sgra sgrog cing // 'dod pa'i longs spyod ldan+da pa'i sa// sna tshogs me tog ldan pa'i shing // dri zhim skyed mos tshal du ni// dga' 'dun gtAm+b+ha nI sna tshogs pas// phyed dus bde bas bde bar bya//
25b2(gso rig): lci bsil nyin mo nyal ba dang // snum bag mngar sbyar spang bar bya// nyi ma'i 'od zer rab tsha bas// so ga 'phrog pa 'dra ba yin// de bas de tshe lan tshwa tsha// sbyar sol nyi ma'i 'od zer spang // zas ni mngar dang yang ba dang // snum bsil
25b3(gso rig): smra ba nyid bsten bya// rab bsil chu yis lus krus zhing // phye zan kha ra bcas pa bza'// chang mi btung ste 'thung na yang // nyung ba 'am chu mang bsres la btid // gzhan du de ni khwa bskumasna lhod // tsha dang rmongs par byed pa yin//
25b4(gso rig): 'bras chanA kun+d+re ltar dkar dang // skam sa'i srog chags sho dgra bza'// khu ba mI bskya zho dang ni// guram+b+ha smAr sogs g.yos byas btung // phul cher sbyar ba btung bar bya'o// snying po lnga yi btung ba ni// kham phor sor pa la gnas
25b5(gso rig): pa// chu shing rgyas lhur dum bu bsres// sbyar btsos kham phor snod kyis btung // chu nI pa ta las bsgongs shing // ga pur bcas shing shin tu bsil// zla zo ra lta bu'i bza' ba ni// mtshan mo dus su bza' ba dang // zla ba skar ma ltar
25b6(gso rig): dkar ba'i// ma he'i 'o ma bsil mo btung // sA la tA la chen po ni// sprin reg tsha ba'i 'od zer sgrib// rgun 'bru'i snye ma g.yur za zhing // Sh+Tha khri shing dang ldan nags tshal bzang // dri bzang kha ba'i chu yis ni// bsil khang lus dang 'tsham
26a1(gso rig): byas pa// ldum bu 'bras bu 'phyang ba dang // mu shing 'dab dang kalka ra// pad rtsa pad+ma ut+pa la// me tog rgyas pa dang ldan pApar// 'jam pa'i gnas mal bcas nas ni// phye dus nyi mas gdung bas na// nyal ba'am chu yi
26a2(gso rig): khang pa ni// bud med bcos gzugs nu ma lag/ khaM las u shir chu 'bab bya// mtshan mo yang thog rdo thal byugs// zla ba'i 'od kyis bsil bar nyal// mal stan bde bar sems badre zhing // tsan dan lde gu 'phreng ba thogs// rab
26a3(gso rig): tu phra ba'i gos bgos shing // 'dod pa'i rgyun las ldog par bya// tA la'i bsil yab spos chu btab// pad+ma'i 'dab rgyas rlung yab dang // dal gyis legs par g.yob pa dang // rdzi char bser bu dang ldan bya// ga pur mal+li ka 'phreng ba//
26a4(gso rig): mu tIg do shal tsAn dan dkar// ne tso sha ri ka la sogs// sgra snyan yid 'ong sgrogs pa dang // chung ma gdu bu bang rtsa 'dra// pad+ma rgyas pa lta bur mdzes// pad+ma can ni 'gro 'dra / snyom par sel bar byed pa yin// mthu
26a5(gso rig): 'phrogs pas ni na ba'i lus// dman par las kyang dman gyur te// dbyar gyi gnod pas gnod 'gyur te// mkha' lA sbyin 'dus chu yis brlan// chu thigs bcas pa'i rlung dang ni// grang ba drag po ldang ba dang // sa yi
26a6(gso rig): rlangs pa sbyar smin dang // chu ni rnyog pa can dag gis// me drod chud pas gnod par byed// phan tshun gnod pa de la ni// dro zhing me yi stobs bskyed pa// thun mong gang yin bstan par bya// sbyang bas lus ni reg byas pa// zas ni
26b1(gso rig): yang bag khu ba bza'// skam sa'i srog chags sha khu dang // sbrang rtsi chang ni rnying pa btung // dar ba kha ru tshar sbyar ba// tsha ba lnga'i phye ma can// khron pa'i chu ni bskol ba'ang rung // char che'i dus su kha zas ni// rang sbyar lan tshwa snum dang
26b2(gso rig): bcas// skam zhing sbrang rtsir ldan la yang // rlung gis mi 'gro dri zhis byug/ rtag du gos ni sos kyis bdugs// khang bzang steng du ba mo bsil// char gyi zer spangs gnas par bya// klung chu dang sbyar skyo ma dang // nyin nyid rtsol dang nyi tshan
26b3(gso rig): slang tu dbyar lus bsil bar gyur pa la// 'i phral du nyi zer gyis gdungs pas// char 'bab tshe na bsags pa yi// mkhris pa ston ni ldang bar 'gyur// de bsal phyir ni sman mar kha// bkru sman btang dang gtar ga bya// kha dang mngar dang
26b4(gso rig): ska ba dang // bkres tshe zas ni yin pa bza'// 'bras chan mung+ga skyu ru ra// sbrang rtsi skam sa'i pa to la// nyi ma'i zer gyis gdungs pa dang // zla ba'i 'od kyi sil byas la// r-i Shi shar bas dug med pa// nyin mtshan gnyi gar sbyangs chu btung //
26b5(gso rig): dang pa'i dri med chu zhes pa// dri med dri ma sel 'gyur ba// mi 'brug rtsub pa mA yin pa// btung ba la stsogs bdud rtsir mtshungs// tsan dan u shir ga pur dang // mu tig chun 'phyang 'phreng gos mdzes// khwa bzang rdo thal gyis dkar zhing //
26b6(gso rig): zla zer can du mtshan gnas kyang // zil pa thal sman ha cang 'drangs// zho dang til mar zhag nyi tshan// mi bzang chang dang nyin par nyal// mdun gyi bser bu yongs su spang // dgun dang dbyar ni dang po gsum// dpyid ni tha ma'i ro gsum ste/
27a1(gso rig): so ga mngar ste ston ka ni// mngar dang kha dang bska ba bsten// mdor na zas dang skom dag ni// ston dang dpyid ni rtsub pa ste// so ga dbyar mtha' bsil bar bya// gzhan dag du ni de las bzlog rtag tu ro kun bsten pa las/
27a2(gso rig): rang rang dus su lhag par bsten// dus gnyis thog mtha'i zhag bdun ni// dus mtshams yin par shes par bya// der ni snga ma'i cho ga spang // 'og ma rim bzhin bsten par bya// ma spangs nA nI nad 'gyur te// 'phral du nad ni 'ong bar
27a3(gso rig): 'gyur// mdo'i gnas le'u gsum pa'o// / de nas nang mi 'byung bar bya ba'i dpyad kyi le'u bshad par bya'o// / phyi dbugs bshang gci sbrid pa dang // bkres sgom gnyid dang lung
27a4(gso rig): ngal dbugs// sbrul dang sa mI ma skyug pa dang // zla ba'i shugs ni dgag mi gyu// phyen ni bkag par gyur pa yis// sman dang rtug skam gan snyom lci// phyen dang ba/ tro gtso khong du 'gags// myik+sha rdul drod chung snying nadu 'gyur//
27a5(gso rig): 'gags byin pa'i nya 'gyur zhing // rnam pas 'dabs shing klad pa na// khar de mo gtsang 'byung ba dang // snar bshad nang du'ang 'gyur ba yin// gcin po skyugs pa yis yan lag na// rde'u chu sa po mtshan da // dku yi nangan sngar
27a6(gso rig): na / phal cher 'byung ngo dzi yi stan// rang chu bsgra thug lus spring dang // drugs reng sman par mos btang ba pa~M// sa rlom ci shing ba 'gegs pa dang // Tha shing 'gag las byung gri gcong mchung // chu 'gag pa la mam sar ni/ tshe tshad tsamam
27b1(gso rig): rab tu sbyar// sgregs pa bkag na yi ga 'chus// lus 'dar stong dang brang 'gags na// sngo zhing lung ba skyigs bus 'debs// de sman skyigs bu dag dang 'dra// sbrid bkag mgon dbang mi rno// gnye'u rengs kha yo 'gram chag 'gyur// dud
27b2(gso rig): rnon gyis bdug mig sman dang // sna sman nyi ma lta ba yis// sbrid pa 'gags pa bsal bya zhing // snum dang dugs kyang bsten par bya// sgom pa bsgrags pas kha bskams shing // yan lag mi bde rna mi gsang // mgo 'khor myos
27b3(gso rig): shing snying nad 'byung // der bsil cho ga thams cad phan// bkres pas lus zhig yi ga 'chus// lus snyoms nyam chung gzer mgo 'khor// de la zas yang snum dro dang // chung pa dag ni sbyar bar bya// gnyid bkrag khong myos spyi bo mig/
27b4(gso rig): lci zhing snyom la glal 'ong zhing // lus zhig snyam sems de la ni// gnyid log lus mnyes phan pa yin// lud pa bkag pas de 'phel zhing // dbugs mi bde zhing yi ga 'chus// snying na do skem byed skyigs bus 'debos// der
27b5(gso rig): ni lud bsal cho ga bya// ngal dub dbugs ni bkag pa las// sman dang snying nad myos par 'gyur// de la ngal gso bya ba dang // rlung sel ba yi cho ga phan// gla la bkag pa ni sbrid bkagu mtshungs// cho ga thams cad rlung 'joms bya// mchi ma
27b6(gso rig): bkag pas mgo snying na// gnya' rengs yi ga 'chus mgo 'khor// skran bcas sna chu 'dzag 'gyur der// gnyid ngoms chang btung gtam snyan phan// sgyug bro mnags pas me dpal mdze// 'bras dang mig nang g.yan pa rims// sbyi rba ba lung
28a1(gso rig): pa dbugs mi bde// dang gar stong mi bde spangs// kha bkang ngapo dung spyang bar gnas// rtsub zos de nyid sprug pa dang // rtsol dang myur bar gtar ga gdab// bkru sman btang ba'ang bsngags pa yin// khu ba bkag pas de
28a2(gso rig): 'dzag dang // pho mtshan na dang 'or nad rims// snying nad chus 'gags lus zhigs dang // rde'u 'phel dang ma ning 'gyur// de la khyim bya'i sha dang chang // 'bras chan mas btang lus sgying dang // chu so'i nad bsal til mar btsos//
28a3(gso rig): 'o ma bud med gzhon bsten phan// shugs ni bkag dang btsir ba yis// nad ni kun kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// shin tu mang po de yi phyir// gso dpyad mang po 'dir bshad do// de las phal cher rlung du ma// gang phyir 'khrugs par
28a4(gso rig): gyur pas na// de phyir de yi zas skom snyan// mnyam par 'gyur ba sbyar ba bya// 'di dang gzhan du phan 'dod pas// 'dod chen phrag dog zhe sdang dang // ser sna 'dod chags la sogs shugs// rtag dgug po thul bar bya// dri ma rnams ni
28a5(gso rig): sbyang ba'i phyir// ji bzhin dus su nan tan bya// de ni shin tu gsogs gyur na// shas cher 'khrug pas srog rgyun gcod// gnod pa sbyang dang bzhu byas pas// bsal kyang slar ni lngapa srid kyi// gang zhig legs par sbyang pa dag/ de ni slar
28a6(gso rig): yong 'byung mi 'gyur// dus shes pa yis de phan chad// rim pa bzhin du ci rigs par// bcud kyis len rnams grub pa dang // ro tsa'i sbyor ba sbyor bar bya// sman rnams kyis ni lus sbyangs phan// sa lu drug cu pa dang gro/ mung+ga sha dang mar la
28b1(gso rig): sogs// phan pa'i zas kyis rIm lus d+ha// yid 'ong drod skyed sman sbyar ba// yi ga 'bye zhing 'ju byed dang // bsku zhing dril phyis khrus bcas dang // drag po 'jam rtsims btang brtas// des ni me kun stobs ldan zhing // blo
28b2(gso rig): mdog dbang po dri ma med// de bzhin tshe rnying ro tsa dang // dpal dong gzi mdangs thob par 'gyur// 'byung po dug dang rlung dang me// mtshon rmas chag grugs sogs 'byung dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang 'jigs sogs gang // de ni
28b3(gso rig): glo bur nad ces bya// shes rab nyes pa spang ba dang // dbang po nyer zhing dran pa dang // yul dus bdag nyid shes pa dang // dam pa'i spyod pa'i rnam 'jug pa// lhan cig skyes dang glo bur nang // mdor na ma skyes pa yi phyir// skyes pa zhi
28b4(gso rig): bar bya ba'i phyir// cho ga 'di ni bstan pa yin// grang ba las byung nyes tshogs dasbyid kyi // rnam pasal skyo ga las byu dbyar dus na// dbyetsho bsags sbyin bral dus su legs sbyangs nas// sa byung nang ni namA ya 'byung mi 'gyur// rtag tu
28b5(gso rig): phan pa'i zas dang spyod lam bsten// brtags te byed cing yul rnams la mi chags// gtong ldan sems snyoms bden brtson bzod dang ldan// nyams ldan sten par byed na nad med 'gyur// mdo'i gnas le'u bzhi pa'o// /
28b6(gso rig): de nas chu sna tshogs la sogs pa'i bye brag shes par bya ba'i le'u bshang bar bya'o// / mkha' las 'bab pa'i gang+gA'i chu// 'tsho byed ngoms byed yi gar 'ong // tshim zhing sems ni gsal byed pa// slar zhing ro
29a1(gso rig): gsal la zhim// khasil zhing yang ba bdud rtsir mtshungs// nyi zla rlung gis reg gyur pa// de ni yul dus la bltos nas// pal cher phan dang gnod pa yin// gang zhig char 'bab dri ma med// 'bras chan dngul
29a2(gso rig): phor nang gnas pa// ma rul mdog kyang ma gyur pa// gang+gA'i cha se btang bar du// gzhan du mtsho chu ston zla ni// 'bring po min par btang mi bya// ra pa'i Ta ni song bzang bzhag/ 'gyur ba med pa rtag tu btung // de med na ni thang la
29a3(gso rig): gnasaHbar snang ba dang rjes mthun yan// sa phyogs dkar nag gtsang zhing yangs// nyo 'od rlung gis phog pa bsngags// lteng ke 'dam rdzab nya lcims deng // rtswa dang lo ma rnyog ma can// nyi zla rlung gis ma phog pa// mngon du 'bab dang
29a4(gso rig): chu gang lci// lbu ba srogs chags can dang dro// grang ches so yi la mi bzod pa// char gang dus su ma bab dang // dus kyi dang por 'bab pa kang // srog chags gdug dang bsogs 'dres// bshang gci dug 'dres gnod
29a5(gso rig): mi btung // nub phyogs nas ni rgyu mtshor 'bab// gang yang star 'bab rngub med chu// de dag mdor na dge ba yin// de las bzlog pa bzang ma yin// rdo la shugs drug rdebs pa yis// rgyun chang g.yengs pa chu dag dang // gang can ma
29a6(gso rig): la ya las byung // dge'o de nyid brtan g.yung na// srin bu rkang 'bam rnying dang ni// lkog ma klad pa'i nad skyed 'gyur// ra dang nub kyi mtha' las byung // gzhang 'brum skyed do dbang chen 'a bab// dmu kwing rkang 'bam nang skyeng 'gyur//
29b1(gso rig): sa h+ya bin+da'i ri las 'bab// mdze dang skya rbab klang nad 'gyur// pa ri ya tri'i nang kun sel// khron pa rdzing la sogs pa'i chu// skam sa rlan can brag la shes// drod chung sgran yod sbya rba ba dang // dmu rdzing tshad 'khru gzhang 'brum sam// pho
29b2(gso rig): ba'i drod chung 'or nad can// mi btung brnog dka' nyung zad btung // ston ka so ga ma gtogs par// nad med mis kyang cung zad btung // zan zos par mtha' thog mar ni// chu 'thungs ran dang sbom skems 'gyur// chu bsil chang nad
29b3(gso rig): brgyal ba dang // skyugs dang ngal dang mgo 'khor dang // skom dang lus tsha mkhris pa dang // khrag rgyas dug ni sel byed yin// chu chan drod skyed zas 'ju zhing // mgul bde lus yang gcin nad sel// skyigs bu lte spos rlung bad kAn//
29b4(gso rig): rims sar 'phral du zlog byed cing // lud pa cham sar dbugs mi bde// rtsib logs zug la chu tshan bsngags// chu ni bskol la bsgrangs pa dag/ bad kan mi skyed lus yang zhing // mkhris pa can la phan pa yin// de ni zhag lon nyes
29b5(gso rig): gsum bskyed// rgya star chu ni sdum pa dang // ro mngaT ro mi bsal zhing yang // skom dang mkhris pa rlung nad sel// drod skyeng lgang ba'i nad spyod byed// dbyar gyi char chu chu bo'i chu// mchog tu bzang dang ngan par bshad// chu'i sde tshan no//
29b6(gso rig): 'o ma phal cher ro zhu mngar// snum zhing mdangs bskyed lus khrungs 'phel// rlung dang mkhris sel ro tsa byed// bad kan skyed lci bsil ba yin// ba yi 'o mo 'tsho byed cing // bcud kyis len yin glo rdol dang // glo gcod la phan yid gzhungs byed//
30a1(gso rig): stobs sbyang ru zho skyeng dang 'khru// pal dang mgo 'khar myos dpal nyams// lung ba dbugs mi bad bkres skom// rims rnyed gcan ni sra ba dang // khrag dang mkhris pa sel ba yin// ma he 'o ma 'ju drags dang // gnyid
30a2(gso rig): med la phan rab lci bsil// ra ni chu nyung 'thungs zas rgod// kha zhing tsha ba za bas yang // skem dang rims dang dbugs mi bde// khrag dang mkhris pa tshad nad stsal// rnga mo'i 'o ma cung rtsub dro// lan tsha bro zhing drod che yang // rlung dang bad kan lto spos srin//
30a3(gso rig): 'or nAd dmu rdzings gzhang nad sol// bud med nu zho rlung mkhris khrag/ snang pa'i mig nad sel byed de// tshim byed mig dang star blugs pa na// lug gi 'o ma snying gnod tsha// rlung 'joms skyigs bu dbugs mi bde// mkhris pa bad kan skyed
30a4(gso rig): ba yin// ban glang mo yis rab brtan byed// rmig pa gcig pa'i 'o ma tsha// yan lag rlung sel sbyar bcas shing // lan tsha bro zhing rmongs par byed// 'o rlon bad kan skyed cing lci// rigs b+has bsgol bde las gzhan// shin tu bskol na
30a5(gso rig): 'ju dka' lci// bzhos ma thag dro bdud rtsi mtshungs// zho ni ro dang zhu rjes sgyur// rtug stems lci lo rlung na du sel// tshal dang / khu chu stobs bad kan// khrag mkhris drod spyod 'or nang skyed// yaM ga 'byed cing kha zas len// grang ba'i rims dang mi
30a6(gso rig): snyoms rims// cham pa gcin 'gags gyur pa dang // 'khru ba'i nad la rtsu ba mo phan// zho dron dpyid dang so ga dang // ston dus mtshan mo btung mi bya// de ni mung+ga sran tshod dang // sbrang rtse mar dang kho ra sha// sbyar ru ra ni med mi 'thung // rtag tu
30b1(gso rig): ma yin ma langs min// gzhan du rims khrag me dbul dang // mdze dang skya rbab mgo 'khor skyed// da sar yang la bsku zhing sbyar// drod skyed bang kan rlung dag sel// skran nad dmu rdzings gzhang 'brum dang // pho nang mu sra yi ga 'chus// ma
30b2(gso rig): pab sman dang mar ma zhu// sbyar dug smya Nab nad rnams sel// de 'dra zho kha chu 'khru yang // rtsa sbubs sbyong la rtug skam sel// 'phral gyi mar sar ri tsa zhing // bsal zhing mdog stobs drod skyed byed// 'khru gcong rlung mkhris khrag gzhang
30b3(gso rig): 'brum/ glo gcod kha yon lud pa sel// zhun mar blo rno dran gsal zhing // yid gzhungs drod skyed stobs tshe 'phel// mi ka dang byis rgan bu 'dod dang // mdangs bzang rab gzhon skad snyan phan// glo rdol skem dang gcod dang 'bras// mtshon
30b4(gso rig): sbrus mes tshig rgyu la 'ang bsngags// rlung dang mkhris pa dug dang spro// lus skems mdangs nyams rims rnams sel// sman gyi nang na snum mchog ste// bsil zhing nA tshod 'jog pa'i mchog/ zhun mar stobs ni stong dang ldan//
30b5(gso rig): sbyor ba las ni stong byed 'byung // mar-i nIng spro dang brjed byed brgyu la/ klad nang rna mig mngal nad dang // rtswa rnams sbyong zhing 'tsho ba byed pas// nAd las rgyal byed dam pa yin// phrum sar ste dang rgya phrum dang // chur ba la sogs stobs
30b6(gso rig): spyod cing // khu ba gnyid dang bad kan 'phel// rtug skam byad lci nyes dang ldan// ba mar 'o ma mchog yin no// lug las byung ba smad pa yin// 'o ma'i sde tshan no// / bu ram shing khu 'khru lci snum// sha skye ro
31a1(gso rig): bang gcin 'phel// bsil zhing khrag mkhris sel ba dang // ro dang zhu rjes mngar ba yin// de tshe lan tshwa bro zhing sos// bcas na kha ra dag dang 'dra// rtsa brtse mo dbus zos sogs// btsir dang dri ma pags pa dang //
31a2(gso rig): dus ni cung zad lon pa las// 'khrul 'khor can ni rnam 'gyur te// tsha zhing lci la mkhregs par 'gyur// de la khar dkar po'i shing // bsil dang mngar bas mchog yin la// de yi 'og ma sbubs can yin// tshigs brgya pa dang ka ta ra//
31a3(gso rig): bal yul skyes sogs de las rim// cung zad tsha bro bska ba dang // drod bcas cung zad tsha ba bskyed// lbu ba can lci bad kan bskyed// sogs byed gcin ni sbyong byed yin// dkar po bad kan cher mi bskyed// bshang dang gci ba bde bar 'byin//
31a4(gso rig): dmar nag phal cher srin bu khrag/ rkang tshil sha dang bad kan bskyed// rnying pa yid 'ong phan pa yin// sar pa drod 'bri bad kan bskyed// hwags dang khaN+Da ka ra dkar// rim gyis yon tan che ba ste// ro tsa blo gcong blo rdol dang // khrag
31a5(gso rig): dang mkhris pa rlung sel yin// ya ba kha ra tsha zhing mngar// bska ste yon tan de dang 'dra// kha ra kar kun tsha dang skom// sgyu dro brgyal dang khrag mkhris sel// bu ram shing bsdus kha ra dang // dbu ba tsan mchog tha ma yin// sbrang rtsi mig
