31a6(gso rig): phran gcod sgrom dang // bad kan skyigs bu khrag mkhris 'joms// tshil che mdze nad gcin nad skyug/ lung pa dbugs mi bde tshad sel// rma sbyong rma 'tsho chag drug sbyor// rlung ni skyed par byed pa yin// rtsub cing bska la mngar ba ste//
31b1(gso rig): sbyong rno ba dang 'dra// rgyu nang tshus ga ga tsha bar ldan// ba smyats+tsha gastod par 'gyur// sdug spyan sman myur mas btud la// s+yA d+ha ba 'am bkag pa med// nA ma shing go sna char /
31b2(gso rig): 'bru mar rang gnas lta bu yin// de lA til mar til dang mtshungs// gtso bo rno zhing khyab pa yin// pags pa'i nyes sel mig la gnod // tsha zhing ron la bad kun bskyed// skem po dag ni sha bskyed cing // sbom po'i sha 'dri
31b3(gso rig): mkhregs par 'ong // hUMg 'gags srin bu 'joms pa dang // sbyar bas nad rnams thams cad sel// e raN+Da dkar tsha zhing kha// zhu rjes mngar lci 'khru ba yin// brlig rlugs sman rlung bad kan dang // lho nang ljang dub rims nang sal//
31b4(gso rig): 'or nang rkeng pa gsang ba'i nang // lto ba ro rgyub nad la phan// e rot+ta ni dmar po'i mar// rno tsho dring rab 'byil 'dred// yungs mar tsha dro rno ba dang // bang kan rlung sel khu ba 'bri// yang zhing khrag mkhris skyed byed la// sha bkra mdze
31b5(gso rig): 'brus rma 'bu sel// ba ru rA'i mar mngar bsil m+b+hi// sgra bskyed rlung dang mkhris pa sel// nim dmar rab tu tshe min kha// lta srin mkhris pa bad kan sel// zar ma le brgan rtsi yi mar// dro zhing pags nang pad mkhris bskyed// zhag
31b6(gso rig): dang rkang ni rlung 'joms shing // stobs dang khu chu bod kan bskyod// sha ni rang dngos rjes mthun la// tshil yang de dang 'dra ba shes bya// til mar la sogs pa'i sde tshan no// / chang ni drong 'bar yi ga 'byed// rno zhing rjong
32a1(gso rig): bskyed khong rta dga'// mngar bcas kha zhing tsha ba dang // zhu rjes sbyar zhing cung zad 'khru// bska bcas gdangs snyan nang med dang // spobs bskyed mdog 'gyur khong yang zhing // gnyid med pa dang gnyid che la/
32a2(gso rig): phan zhing khrag dang mkhris pa bskyed// rigs 'thungs skem dang sbom phan zhing // rtsub sna lus sgo khyab cing sbyong // rlung dang bad kan sel ba yin// gzhan du brten na dug dang mtshungs// chang gsar lci zhing nyes bskyed yin//
32a3(gso rig): chang rnying de las gzhan du byed// tsha ba'i spyod pas ldan mi btung // sun cing bkres nyin nad pas min// shin tu rno min sar pa dang // legs par ma bslangs rnyog can min// 'bru chang skran dang dmu rdzing dang // rtug skom blo gcod
32a4(gso rig): sel ba dang // rlung 'joms tshil dang khrag bskyed cing // gcin bder 'byin cing bad kan bskyed// chang dngas yon tan de 'dra las// yang 'ong yang zhing rno ba dang // gzer dang lud pa dbugs mi bde// skyug bro bshang 'gags spos
32a5(gso rig): cham 'joms// ba tu ra chang yang zhing phan// shin tu ra ror mi 'gyur zhing // rma dang skya rbab mo dze nang la// ha cang gnod par mi 'gyur zhing // rdzas bzhin yon tan rjes mthun chang // chang gi yon tan kun las lhag/ pho nad skya rbab
32a6(gso rig): mdze gzhang 'brum// lus skem sbrang 'or spu rdzing rims// sman dang srin bu mcher nang sel// ro ni bska zhing tsha rlung bskyed// rgun chang nang skyong snying la phan// shin tu dro min mngar zhing 'khru// mkhris rlung cung zad bskyed skya rbab//
32b1(gso rig): gcin nang gzhang 'brum srin nad sel// bu ram chang ni gcin rtug 'gags// 'byin zhing ngoms la drod bskyed yin// bu ram shing chang rlung mkhris bskyed// snum dang bad kan las byung 'joms// tshil 'or dmu rdzing gzhang 'brum
32b2(gso rig): sel/ de bas khu ba bskol mchog yin// spang chung 'grib byed rno ba yin// gcin nang cham pa lung pa sol// tshwa ni khrag mkhris pad kan dag/ 'jo zhing rlung ni snyoms byed la// rab tu tsha zhing rno rtsub sbyar// yid 'ong yi ga 'bye zhing
32b3(gso rig): 'khru drod bskyed reg na bsil ba dang // sgyu rbab srin+da sel mig la gnod// bu ram bu shing rgun chang dang // tshwa ni phyi ma phyi ma yang // sdong bu rtsa ba 'bras sogs las// mnan byas de dang 'drar shes bya// rdo gu la sogs bshur ba
32b4(gso rig): gzhan// dus kyi skyur po yang zas len// 'bras khu'i rang sgyur 'khru rno che// mkhris pa skyed byed bskus na bsil// ngal dang rmya sel yi ga 'bye// drod bskyed chu so'i nad sel yin// mas btang la phan yid du 'ong // yang zhing rlung
32b5(gso rig): dang bAd kan 'joms// ba gcin ra lug ma he dang // glang po rta bong rnga mo'i gcin// mkhris bskyed rtsub cing rno la tsha// 'thungs rjes tsha dro ro tsha ste// srin nad 'or nad dmu rdzing spos// gzer dang skya rbab bad kan rlung // dug skan
32b6(gso rig): sgra yi ge 'chus// mdze dang gzhang 'brum myur du 'joms// de ltar chu bo bu ram shing // til mar tshong gi sde tshoms rim// gsher ba'i rdzas phyogs gcig pa 'di// rags rim ji bzhin bstan pa yin// yan lag brgyad pa'i
33a1(gso rig): snying po bsdus pa las// mnga'i gnas kyi le'u lnga pa'o// / de nas kha zas kyi tshul brtag cing shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// rtsa sngar 'bras cher ka ma la// drug cu pa dang bya yis blang /
33a2(gso rig): sgron bu'i mchu dang rtse rnon dang // ro 'dra'i 'bras 'dra dri bzang dang // ba dang ka dang gser mdog can// gang gzhan 'bras ni bzang po rnams// ro mngar zhu rjes mngar zhing snum// ro tsa bshang gci bska zhing chung // ro rjes bska zhing phan pa dang //
33a3(gso rig): yang zhing gcin mang bsil ba yin// de la rtse rno'i nang rtsa snar// mchog yin skom dang nyes gsum sel// de yi 'og tu 'bras chen sman// de'i 'og ka la ma de'i 'og/ nas 'dra ha ya na car ma// de sha da ka la sogs ni// ro mngar dri zhim
33a4(gso rig): lci la snum// khu ba'i rjes sgyur bad mkhris bskyed// bshang dang gci ba thur ngu 'byin// snga ma snga ma spang pa yin// 'bras nad drug cu pa mchog ste// rtsa ser shun pa gnag pa dag/ snum zhing 'ardzu sra bstan zhing mngar// nyes pa gsum
33a5(gso rig): sel bsil rtug 'dril// de la rim bzhin thub chen dang // shun nag rgya skyegs tshigs ma 'dra// khyim bya'i skrong 'dra 'ur pa'i mig/ phug ron 'bras dang su kha ra// ba ra kha dang ut+pal dmar// tsi na ston skyes d+ha d+hu ra// gan+d+ha na dang ku ru biH/
33a6(gso rig): yon tan rim bzhin chung zhes bya// 'bras gzhan mngar zhing zhu rjes sbyar// ma khris pa bskyed cing lci ba dang // gcin rtug mang zhing tsha ba yin// pa ta la nyid nyes gsum bskyed// ci tse khre dang ni pa ra// khre rgod sne 'bras sogs bsil yang // rtsa'i
33b1(gso rig): 'bru de dag rlung bskyed cing // khong rtsub bad kan mkhris pa sel// de la khre ni rtas byed cing // lus kyi chag grugs 'byor par byed// khre rgod mchog tu 'khru gcod cing // reg na bsil la dug sol yin// nang ni rtsub bsil lci la mngar//
33b2(gso rig): cung zad khong 'khru bshang rlung 'phel// ro tsa rtun byed gcin dang ni// tshil dang mkhris pa bad kan sel// cham pa lud pa dbugs mi bde// da rgan lkog nad pags nad sel// nang rgod cung zad sman pa yin// mig skyes 'bras nas rtsub
33b3(gso rig): cing tsha// gro ni ro tsa snum bsil lci// 'tsho byed rlung dang mkhris pa sel// chag grugs 'byor byed mngar ba dang // sha mkhregs byed cing cung zad 'khru// nan ti mu ga ro bska zhing // bsil zhing mdur yang phan pa yin// gra ma can gyi
33b4(gso rig): 'bru sna tshogs kyi sde tshan no// / mon sran sde dkar sran chung sogs// gang bu can 'bru rtsa sgo bkag/ ro bska mngar zhing 'khru ba gcod// zhu rjes tshal bsil zhing yang // tshil dang khrag dang mkhris pa la//
33b5(gso rig): bskus shing blugs na phan pa yin// 'di las mung+ga mchog rlung chung // sran ma shin tu rlung bskyed yin// mon sran dkar po rlung bskyed cing // rtsub cing lci la bshang ba 'phel// rgyu sran nag tsha zhu rjes bsgyur// khu chu'i rde'u cha ma lung
33b6(gso rig): paHdbugs mi bde rlung bad gzhang 'brum// 'joms shing khrag mkhris mchog tu bskyed// niSh+Ta bo ni rlung khrag ma khris// nu zho gcin 'phel lci zhing 'khru// tsha byed mig gnod khu ba 'bri// bad kan 'or nad dug rnams sel// ma sha snum
34a1(gso rig): stobs bad kAn bskyed// bshang gci mkhris pa 'phel byed 'khru// lci zhing tsha la rlung 'joms dang // khu ba 'phel zhing 'byin par byed// ka kan du la phra sral phre'u// yon tan mon sran dre'u dang 'dra//
34a2(gso rig): til 'bru dro zhing pags pa 'jam// bsil zhing skra dang stobs bskyed la// lci zhing gcin nyung zhu rjes che// yi gzhungs drod bskyed bad mkhris bskyed// zar ma snum mngar kha zhing dro// lci zhing bad kan mkhris pa bskyed// mig gnod khu
34a3(gso rig): skems zhu rjes tsha// le brgan rtsi 'bras de dang 'dra// gra ma can las nas rgod dang // ma sha gang bu can tha chad// 'bru yi gsar thog bad kan bskyod// lor lon 'bru ni yang ba yin// myur bskyed de bzhin sran ma ni// snyun med legs/
34a4(gso rig): brngos tshod ma yang // gang bu chags pa'i 'bru sna tshogs kyi sde tshan no// // 'bras thug sla bska gar ba dang // 'bras chan rnams ni snga ma bzhin// yang ngo de las sla ba ni// dge zhing rlung ni lugs
34a5(gso rig): mthun byed// skom bsta nyes pa lhag ma 'joms// 'ju zhing lus gzungs mnyam par byed// rtsa sbubs mnyen byed rdul ba dang // me yi drod ni skyed par byed// thug bska bkres skom nyams chung ba ste// lto nad rims nad sel ba
34a6(gso rig): yin// dri ma 'gag la phan pa dang // drod bskyed nad ni 'ju bar byed// thug gar 'khru gcod yi gar 'ong // skom sel drod bskyed rma dang mig/ bkru sman rjes dang nyams chung dang // snum 'thungs rjes la phan pa yin// 'bras chan legs
34b1(gso rig): bkrus khu brtsegs tshos// rlangs pa dang ni bral ba dang // gang yang tshwa ba'i sman rnams kyis// bskol ba'i 'bras chos yang ba yin// de las bzlog pa gang zhig ni// sha khu 'o ma bskol sogs lci// de ltar rdzas dang bya sbyor dang //
34b2(gso rig): tshad la sogs pa kun shes bya// khu ba nyams rtas tshim byed cing // ro tsa mig phan rma la gnod// mon sran rde'u sbyangs dang rmya// lkog ma mig nad dag la phan// ku la tA khu rlung dang skrun// ro smad slar gzer gnod pa sel// til tshogs g.yos
34b3(gso rig): su sbyar byas nas// tshong ma skam dang myu gu dang // skyur por chang bu bcug pa ni// mig gnod nyes bskyed rmya byed lci// dri 'dzin lus rta ro tsa zhing // snum zhing stobs bskyed yi ga 'byed// rgun chu'i btung ba ngal dub dang // bkres sel tshim
34b4(gso rig): par byed cing lci// rtug skam gcin mang yi gar 'ong // de yi yon tan sman bzhin blta// 'bras yos skom dang skyug tshad 'khru// gcin mang tshil dang bad kan sel// lud pa mkhris pa nyer zhi byed// drod bskyed yang zhing bsil ba yin//
34b5(gso rig): srus len lci zhing stobs bskyed la// khad kan bshang ba sra byed cing // nas yos rtug mkhregs rtsub pa dang // skom zhing khong 'khrug lci ba yin// nas phye khong yang bkres skom dang // bal dub mig nad rma la phon// skyo mar byas pa 'thungs pa
34b6(gso rig): saTha' bral du stobs ni spyod byed yin// chu dang phye sbrel mi bza' zhing // dus gnyis mtshan mo'ang 'phrang med min// 'drangs rjes mi bza' sos bcad min// ha cang 'drangs ches bza' mi bya// 'ba' cha nyam 'bri rtsub pa dang // bshang mkhrig
35a1(gso rig): mig la gnod pa yin/ shwa g.yos spros sbyar snum zhing lci// stobs bskyed sha 'phel rtas byed yin// mung+ga g.yos sbyar lci ba dang // stan gyi cha dang yon tan 'dra// khur ba mdag bcos drog le dang // sa blang da nur mya
35a2(gso rig): sol bsregs// khur ba 'di rnams rigs gcig kyang // phyi ma phyi ma yang ba yin// g.yos su byas pa'i zas kyi sde tshan no// / sha ba dgo pa ku rang+ga// rkyang dang ri sha ri dgas ma// ri bong dang sgo tsa ru ka/ ldang sgo la
35a3(gso rig): sa raM dgas yin// la tsa brti brti ka/ go cha dmar dang gong mau dang // sreg pa u pa tsa tra dang // ka piny+tsi ku ru pa// parta ka dang brti ka/ gong mo sreg dang rma bya dang // khyim bya dang ni ba da ra// go nan dang ni ri la gnas// sha ra b+ha dang in+d+ra ba//
35a4(gso rig): ri bya 'di dag zas khron to// shang shang te'u du du ha// bung 'dra ne tso sha ri ka/ la ta khu byug ha ri ka/ bye'u laM sogs mtshus rko yin// sbal ba sbrul dang sbyin 'khor dang // be dur la sogs khung na ga nas// ba lang rta bong dre'u dang // stag gzig
35a5(gso rig): seng ge dom spre'u// byi la byi ba spyang ki dang // sre mo dang ni dred dag dang // wa dang 'phar ba khra dang ni// chun lag khra spyang bya rog gi/ bya rigs khra sngon bya ku ra// bya rgod 'ug pa ka ling+ga// dud can ma du ha la sogs// gcan zan bya dang rtsal mthus za//
35a6(gso rig): phag rgod ru ru ma he sbyin// ro hi ta dang glang po che// mdze rgod g.yag rgod bse dang ni// skyug glang zhes grags ri dgas che// chur gnas ngang pa sa ra sa// chu sbyar ka ran dang bya gla// rgya dang khrung khrung ngur pa dang // so bya ka tam+ba sogs yin// nya ro hi ta ba ti
35b1(gso rig): nany+tsa phyis rus sbal kum+b+hi ra// karta dung sram shaM pu ka/ nye ldang bar mi tsan+ti ka// bu lu chu srin nag khra dang // nya bo che ni byis pa gsod// dza ri tsi ri tsi ma sogs// de ltar cha ni brgyad du bshad// ra lug gzas kyi spyod yul ni// 'dres pas rigs
35b2(gso rig): gcig nges ma yin// thog ma tha ma skam gsher gnas// bar ma gnyis po thun mong bshad// de las skam sa'i sha rtug 'gags// bsil ba dang ni yang ba yin// 'dus pa mkhris pa shas che zhing // rlung 'bring bad kan chung la phan//
35b3(gso rig): ri bo ba sha ni drod bskyed rtsub// zhu rjes tsha zhing 'khru gcod gsil// brta ka la sogs pa'i sha/ cung zad snum gro lci rtas byed// de rnams las kyang rgya bya'i sha/ yid gzhungs drod stobs khu ba 'phel// bshang skams mdog bzang rlung shas
35b4(gso rig): che// 'dus pa sel ba'i dam pa yin// rma bya'i sha ni bzang min yang // rna mig skad 'gags rgas sar phan// khyim bya de 'dra'i ro rtsa la// grong gnas lci zhing bang kAn bskyed// gong mo u pa tsa krar bcas// yid gzhungs drod skyed yi gar 'ong //
35b5(gso rig): thi ba zhar ba'i sha lci zhing // tsha bro nyes pa thams cad bskyed// bye'u bad kan bskyed cing snum// rlung 'joms khu ba rab tu 'phel// sde tshan de las phyi ma rnams// rim bzhin lci dro snum zhing mang// gcin mang ro tsa stobs bskyed cing // rlung 'joms par
35b6(gso rig): kan mkhris pa bskyed// de las ri dgas chen po bsil// rtsal mthus sha rlon za ba'i yang // ro rjes lan tshwa bro zhu rjes// tsha zhing sha ni 'phel bar byed// gzhang 'brum rnying pa pho ba grang // rkem nad nyen la mchog tu phan// ra sha shin tu bsil min zhing //
36a1(gso rig): lI snu ma ma yin nyes med yin// lus dang khams ni mnyam pas na// bang kan mi bskyed lus rtas byed// lug sha de las bzlog pa ste// lus rtas yin par shes par bya// ba lang sha ni lung skam dang // ngal dang tshas ches ma
36a2(gso rig): snyoms rims// cham dang ni skem pa dang // rlung nad gcig pu na pa sel// ma he sha ni lci zhing tsha// gnyid che rtan byed shas cher bskyed// phag rgod sha ni de 'dra zhing // ngal sel zas len khu stobs skye// nya ni mchog tu bang kan bskyed// tsi li tsi mnyes
36a3(gso rig): gsum bskyed// la bai ro he ta sbyin 'khor// shaM ba rang rang sde tshan mchog/ sha ni 'phral bsang dag pa dang // dar la bab pa bston par bya// rang shi ring dang shin tu tshe// nang chu dug gi shi ba spang // pho dang mo yi stod smad phyed// lci ste sbrum ma thams
36a4(gso rig): cad lci// rkang bzhi mo yi yang ba yin// bya rnams kyi ni pho yi yang // mgo bo ro stong brang dang rgyab// rked pa dbyi yi lci ba yin// de bzhin pho ba rgyu ma sogs// go rim bzhin du lci ba yin// khrag la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams// phyi ma phyi ma'i lci
36a5(gso rig): yin// sha las rlig pa pho mtshan dang // mkhal ma mtshar ba gzhang dag lci// sha'i sde tshan no// // tshod ma pa ta sha ti dang // su sha su ni shra na dang // sa ta na tsa rgya sne'u sogs// nyes pa gsum 'joms rtug sri yang /
36a6(gso rig): de las su ni sha na gro/ ro tsa ra dza k+Sha pa ti// pho ba gzhang 'brum nang sel mchog/ rgya sne'u rtug skam 'joms pa yin// mon sderu dme ru nyes gsum 'joms// mdze sel ro tsa bcur len dro// khru zhing mgul ba snyan par byed// rtsang gi ri sbyar mi
36b1(gso rig): drod bskyed// pho ba gzhung 'brum bad kan rlung // drod che 'khru gcod yang bA yin// pa to la dang sap+ta la// nim+ba shang+ga sh+ma sle tres// a pa lcu gu s+tha'i myu gu// bri ha tAM dang ba sha dang // ti la brni ku ta la// mA du ka 'du ba karto ta// ka ra be la parta dang /
36b2(gso rig): ti dang ni ka ta ya/ go dzi ha dang brta ka/ ba na tik+ShA ka ri raM// ku li ka dang nan+ti dang // ku tse la shag ku nad ni// ka ti laM dang ke'u bu kaM/ ko taM ko sha ta ka dang // kaR+sha 'jam bsil kha zhing tsha// bsha nga sr-i rlung bskyed bad mkhris sa la// pa to la
36b3(gso rig): srin nang sel// zhu rjes mngar zhing yi ga 'byed// bri ha tI gnyis mkhris bskyeng 'khru// drong bskyed rlung ni 'joms pa yin// bri sha rlon dang lud pa 'joms// khrag mkhris sel ba'i dam pa yin// ka ra be laM kha ba dang // drod bskyed bad kan
36b4(gso rig): sel mchog yin// brta ka ro kha zhing tsha// mngar gro bad kan rlung dag sel// lan tshwar bcas pa me drod bskyed// yid 'ong zas len mkhris mi bskyed// ka ri raM ni spos byed cing // ro bska mngar zhing kha ba yin// ko sha ta ka bal gu dza// khru zhing
36b5(gso rig): drod ni skyed byed yin// tan+na li bsil rtsub pa dang // ro mngar zhu rjes mngar zhing yang // chang nad mkhris nang dug khrag sel// muny+tsa las byung rlung khris sel// snum sel lci zhing mngar ba dang // lus rtas khu ba 'phel ba'i mchog/ pa la kA/
36b6(gso rig): lci 'khru bar byed// utwo da ka chang nang 'joms// tsu tsu ba la k+Sha 'dra las// de ni 'khru gcod bdag nyid can// bi dA ri ni rlung mkhris sel// gcin mang mngar zhing bsil ba yin// 'tsho bar byed cing lkog nang sel// lus rta ro tsa lci bcud len//
37a1(gso rig): dzI ban+ti mngar bsil ba dang // mig la phan zhing nyes gsum sel// ku sman ta Tu sha ka ling // kar+tha dang ni erba ru// da na dIs zhes bya ba dang // da na dIs dang ga gon dang // tsin+ta ka dang tsi ra bi ta// bang rlung bskyed
37a2(gso rig): cing 'khru gcin mang // bshang sri lci zhing zhu rjes mngar// 'khri shing 'bras bu nang na mchog/ ku sman nga ste rlung mkhris sel// gcin nang sel zhing ro tsa ra byed// ga gon shin tu gcin mang yin// ku ba shin tu rtsub pa yin// ka
37a3(gso rig): ling+ga dang erba ru// tsiR+Ya mkhreg zhon mkhris sel bsil// smin pa de las gzhan du byed// 'bras bu'i lus rnyings lan tshar bcas// mkhris bskyed pad kan rlung nad sel// yi ga 'bye zhing dro yid 'ong // hen langs lto spos
37a4(gso rig): sel zhing yang // pad rtsa rtsa ba ut+pa la// ku mu ut+pal chu ba dang // chus pa ka lu ka ta dang // sring+ga dang ka sha ru ka/ kron tsa da na ka lo rgya// rtsub cing bshang sri bsil zhing lci// ka laM pa dang na lI ka/ mar she zhes ni bya ba dang // ku
37a5(gso rig): tin+na ra sku ba kha// seng phrom yungs ma lo ni ka/ ka ru da ka ga be du// 'tsho byed dang ni dzuny+tsu dang // e da ga dza dag dang ni// ya ba shA ka lcam pa dang // a lu ka sogs thams cad dang // sram lo shing mngar lo ma dag/ mngar zhing rtsub
37a6(gso rig): la lan tshwa bro// bad kan rlung bskyed lci ba dang // bsil zhing bshang lci 'byung sla byed// phal cher zhu nas bshang gci mkhregs// tshos shing khu ba legs btsir la// mar cher btab pa nyes mi bskyed// seng phrom 'dab ma zhes bya gang //
37b1(gso rig): de ni rgya sne'u dang 'drar 'dod// tarka ri pa ra na ya ngar// kha bcas rlung dang bad kan sel// puraR+Ya rna rnam gnyis ka la sha// cung zad tsha bro kha zhing tsha// drong bskyed khong 'khru sbyar dug dang // 'or nad bad kan rlung nad 'joms// tsi ri bi
37b2(gso rig): ri'i myu gu ni// drod bskyed rlung dang bad sel khru// nye shing myu gu kha ba ste// ro tsa nyes pa gsum sel yin// smyug ma'i myu gu rtsub pa dang // khong tsha rlung dang mkhris pa bskyed// pa tu ra ni drod bskyed kha// mcher pa gzha/ 'brum pang rlung
37b3(gso rig): sel D+hau ka sa mar+d+ha srin lud pa// ba kan sel zhing zhu byed 'khru// le brgan rtsi tshod rtsub sbyar tsha// lci zhing ma khris po bskyed la 'khru// yungs kar tshong ma lci zhing tsha// bshang dang lci 'gags nyes kun bskyed// la phug gzhon nu ro/
37b4(gso rig): mi gsal// cung zang tshwa pro kha dang bcas// gang yin de ni nyos kun sel// yang zhing cung zad tshwa ba dang // skran dang lung gcod dbugs mi pade// rma dang mig nad lkog nad sel// skad 'gags drod chung rtug skam dang // cham pa'i nad ni 'joms
37b5(gso rig): pa yin// nar sen ro dang zhu rjes tsha// drod skyed byed cing nyes gsum bskyed// bad kan bskyed lci btsos pa ni// snum zhing de yang rlung sel yin// skam po rlung dang bad kan sel// rjen pa thams cad nyes bskyed yin// nyung ma tsha zhing dro bA dang // bang
37b6(gso rig): kan rlung se la mkhris pa bskyed// shan+ta mu la mkhris sel zhing // bsil zhing zhu rjes mngar pa dang // ro mngar kha zhing bska ba ste// bad kan dug kyang sel bar byed// sku the ra bye'u rug shi khru// su mu kha dang ske tshe dang // bu srin dang pa ni dzi// dzaMn+ti ga le dang
38a1(gso rig): dzaM bI ra// de la sogs pa'i ldum rnams ni// gshang gci sra zhing me drod bskyed// khong dA tsa byed kha rdzu 'tsha// yid 'ong lus dro yi ga 'byed// mig gnod khu ba srin 'joms no// skrang par byed dang yang ba yin/
38a2(gso rig): bye rug skyigs lung dbugs mi bde// rtsib logs zug dug kha gnam sel// su mu kha ni rab tsha min// sbyar dug 'or nad sel ba yin// 'u su'i lo ma kha zhing mngar// gtson mang mkhris pa bskyed ma yin// sgog skya rab tu tsha zhing rno// zhu rjes tsha zhing
38a3(gso rig): 'khru ba dang // zhim zhing sgra bskyed lci ro tsa// snum zhing drod bskyed yi ga 'byed// sha bkra mdze skran gzhang 'brum dang // gcin nang srin dang bang kan rlung // skyigs bu cha pa dbugs mi bde// lung pa sel te khrag mkhris bskyed// kun dong de las yon
38a4(gso rig): tan dman// bad kan bskyed mkhros rab mi bskyed// ke'u btsos dug sbyar zos pa yis// bad kan rlung dang gzhang 'brum sel// rno zhing rtug pa sri ba dang // de ni mkhris can la phan yin// su ra drod bskyed kha zas len// bad sel dri ma stong zhing yang //
38a5(gso rig): mchog tu gzhang 'brum dag la phan// spang phrum shin tu nyes bskyed yin// me tog 'dab ma 'bras yal ga/ sdong bu rim bzhin lci ba yin// tshong ma'i rab mchog 'tsho byed yin// yungs kar tshod ma tha chad yin// tshod rdang rnams kyi sde tshan no// /
38a6(gso rig): rgun 'brum 'brum 'bras bu'i mchog yin te// ro tsa mig sman bshang gci sla// mngar zhing zhu rjes snum pa dang // cung zad bska zhing bsil la lci// rlung dang khrag mkhris sil byed cing // kha nang kha bro chang nad dang // skom lud tshad rims dbugs mi
38b1(gso rig): bde// skad mdzer gro brdol gro gcod sel// bal po se'u sngar mkhris rgyas dang // nyes pa gsum po sel ba yin// sgyur ba mkhris bskyed min cung dro// rlung dang bad kan 'joms par byed// se'u kun kyang yid 'ong snum// yang zhing bshang sra
38b2(gso rig): drod zas len// mo tsha 'bra go pa nas// rgya star ba ru sha ka dang // a mra ta la ka sgra 'bras// ra dza da na ma du'i 'bras// rgyu shug so bi ra a la// pha lU sle ma ta'i 'bras bu// ta mal+li shu star ga'i 'bras// myu gu la dang rgya kham dang // a ru ma nA pi yal
38b3(gso rig): 'bras/ rtas byed lci zhing bsil ba yin// lus tsha glo brdol glo gcong sel// khrag dang mkhris pa snyoms par byed// zhu rjes mngar zhing snum pa dang // bshang lci ba da kan khu ba 'phel// ta la'i 'bras bu mkhris bskyed 'khru// kaSh+ka ri 'bras
38b4(gso rig): bsil ba dang // bshang gci 'gags pa sel byed cing // sgra bskyed yid gzhungs bcud len 'gyur// pa ta ma sngogs dro ba dang // bad kan mkhris pa bskyed cing 'khru// snum zhing mchog tu rlung skyed byed// pi lU ya'i 'bras tshwa ba min// pi lA
38b5(gso rig): ya yi tshig gu mang// ro tsa mkhris pa rlung nad sel// rgya shu gA tshi gu'i yon tan ni// de 'dra skam rlon lud pa sel// bil 'bras sbyin pa 'ju dka' zhing // nyes bskyed phyen ni dri ngan byed// ma smin drod bskyed pad rlung sel// de dag gnyi ga 'khru ba
38b6(gso rig): gcod ma smin ka bing mgul nad dang // nyes pa kun bskyed smin pa ni// nyes 'joms skyigs bu smon blo sel// kun kyang 'khru gcod dug 'joms yin// 'dzam bu'i shing tog bshang sri lci// bsil zhing shin tu rlung bskyed yin// bshang dang lci ba
39a1(gso rig): gcod byed cing // lkog ma la gnod pang mkhris sel// a mra'i 'bras bu ma smin rlung // khrag mkhris skyed byed rus chag pa// bad kan mkhris bskyed smin rlung bskyed// lci mngar bad kan khu ba 'phel// br-ik+Sha aM la rtsub
39a2(gso rig): bshang sri// lci tsha bad kan rlung dag 'joms// sha mya tsha lci sgra gnod rtsug/ pi lu'i 'bras bu mkhris pa bskyed// bad kan rlung nod sel zhing 'khru// mcher ba gzhang 'brum snyan srin sel// pi lu mngar zhing kha ba gang // shin tu tsha min nyes gsum
39a3(gso rig): 'joms// ba lu shun kha tsha zhing snum// rlung nad sel bar byed pa yin// ba lung 'bras sha rtas byed mngar// rlung dang mkhris pa sel zhing lci// de yi rkang yang skyigs lud pa// dbugs mi bde dang chang nad sel// kha skam rlung dang bad kan dang //
39a4(gso rig): tug sra skyug bro yi ga 'chus// sman dang gzhang 'brum gzar nad dang // me drod chung ba nyid sel to// na ram ga 'bras mngar cung sbyar// yi gar 'ong zhing kho zas len// lci zhing rlung ni rab bskyed pa'i// yon tan ldan par shes par bya// bse
39a5(gso rig): shing 'bras bu'i shun pa sha/ khong rtas byed cing mngar la bsil// de rus me mnyam yid gzhungs byed// bad kan rlung ni sel ba'i mchog/ ku shu rnam gnyis lci ba ste// mngar sgyur bsil dang tsha ba yin// yi ga 'bye zhing me rab 'bri// khaM sha yi
39a6(gso rig): ga 'byed cing mngar// sman pa myur du 'ju bar 'gyur// shin tu tsha min lci nyes bskyed// rgun 'brum pa ru sha ka dang // ka ra ma ra dang bcas rlon sbyar// mkhris pa bad kan bskyed cing 'khru// lci zhing nus tsha rlung 'joms so// rgya shug sgyur thung li
39b1(gso rig): gu che/ a mra ka ta de bzhin no// e ra ba ti su ra dang // mri ka lin+da dzI bir bcas// smin dang ka ra mar du skam// mkhris pa shin tu skyed byed min// am+bi ka dang rgya shug sbyar// skam po drong bskyed 'khru ba dang // skom dang ngal dang rmyab sel// yang
39b2(gso rig): shing rlung dang bad kan 'joms// de las 'bras bu kun tha chad// li ku rtsi ste nad kun spong // kha ba me dang rlung gnod nyen// sbrul gyi kha chu sogs pas phog/ srin bus zos dang chu nang ltung // sa ngan dus min skyes pa dang // 'bru gzhan
39b3(gso rig): 'dres shing mthu nyams dang // shin tu rnyings gyur 'bru spang bya// tshod ma'ang de bzhin rtsub par ni// g.yas pa dag dang mi snyi dang // ro ni smin par ma gyur dang / ka/ la phug ma rtogs skam po dang // 'bras bu'ang phol cher de bzhin te/
39b4(gso rig): bil+la ma rtogs rlon pa sbyang // 'bras bu'i sde tshan no// / lan tshwa kun kyang bad kan bskyed// 'phra zhing bshang gci 'byin la 'jam// rlung 'joms 'ju byed tsha zhing rno// yi ga 'bye zhing bad mkhris bskyed// de la
39b5(gso rig): lce myang tsha mngar bcas// ro tsa yid 'ong nyes gsum sel// yang zhing tsha la mig la phan// tsha ba mi skyed me drod bskyed// rtsa bas ru tshwa yang yid 'ong zhing // sgeg pa sbyong zhing dri zhim la// zhu rjes tsha zhing bshang sre sil// drod skye yi ga 'byor byed
39b6(gso rig): yin// kha ru tsha ni stod bad kan// smad kyi drung 'byin drod bskyed la// bshang 'gag lto spos rtug skam dang // gzer zug lus lci sel ba yin// rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa zhu rjes mngar// lci zhing bad kan rnam 'phel byed// bkod ma'i lan tsha cung zad kho// tshwa
40a1(gso rig): dang ba tsha rno byed gsher// kha ru tsha nag yon tan dri// ma gtogs yon tan bi tar mtshungs// mtsha tsha yang ste sa skam tsha// bad kan bskyed cing 'ju dka' lci// lan tshwa rnams kyi sbyor ba la//
40a2(gso rig): rgyam tshwa la sogs rab tu sbyar// nas tshig 'khus pa'i lan tshwa ni// skran dang snying nad skya rbab dang // pho ba mcher pa lkog nad dang // lud pa gzhang 'brum dbugs mi bde// lto spos bad kan sel ba yin// sau rdzi ka sogs
40a3(gso rig): thal tshwa kun// rab rno tsha zhing srin sel yang // khrag mkhris skyed byed smin byed la// gcod cing mi zhim rnam par 'byed// nas tshig 'khus tsha kha bas na// mdog mdangs khu ba sgra mig gnod// shing kun rlung dang bad kan sel//
40a4(gso rig): gzer 'joms mkhris pa skyed byed de// zhu rjes ro tsa yig 'byor// drod bskyed zas 'ju yang ba yin// a ru ra bska zhu rjes mngar// rtsub cing lan tshwa'i ro med yang // drod che zas 'ju yid gzhungs byed// na tshod la 'jog dam pa yin//
40a5(gso rig): dro zhing 'khru la tshe la phan// blo dang dbang gsal stobs rab bskyed// mdze dang bzhin lus mdog mi sdug/ skad 'gags rims rnying mi bzang rims// klad pa mig nad skyu rbab dang // mig ser pho ba'i nad rnams dang // skem bcas 'or dang
40a6(gso rig): gcin nad sel// tshad 'khru rmongs bag myos rlon srin// mchil ma lud pa dbugs mi bde// gzhang 'brum mtshar ba lto spos dug/ gsus 'phel rgyun 'gags skran dang ni// dargan na dang yi ga 'chus// rlung dang bad kan las gyur nad//
40b1(gso rig): de dang de ni sel byed yin// skyu ru ra yang de 'dra bsil// ro sgyur bad mkhris sel te las// yon tan cung dman pa ru ra// zhu rjes tsha mngar sku mig phan// 'bras bu gsum po 'di dag ni// bcud kyis len mchog mig nad sel// rma 'tsho bags nad
40b2(gso rig): rmA reng dang // tshil ches lce sti bang khrag sel// shing tshe sug spel pa tra gsum// ge sar bcas pa dri bzang bzhi// na le sham ni mkhris bskyed no// rtsub cing drod bskyed yi ga 'byed// ro dang zhu rjes dag kyang tsha// bang kan 'joms shing yang ba
40b3(gso rig): yin/ pi pi ling rlon bang bskyed mngar// bsil zhing lci la snum pa yin// skam po de las bzlog pa yin// snum zhing ro tsa ro tsha la// zhu rjes mngar zhing bang rlung dang // lud pa dbugs mi bde sel 'khru// de gnyis bcud len ma gtogs pa//
40b4(gso rig): gzhan las shas cher sbyar mi bya// dong gra drod bskyed ro tsa dang // 'khru gcod yid 'ong 'khregs pa sel// yi ge 'bye yang zhu rjes mngar// khong snum drod che bad rlung sel// sge'u gsher de 'dra de dag ni// che ba gsum ste sha sbom dang // me drod nyams
40b5(gso rig): dang dbugs mi bde// lud pa rkang 'bam tshe paM 'joms// dbyi mod pi bi ling rtsa ba// nal shaM yon tan cung zad chung // tsi tra ka stobs me dang mnyam// 'or nad gzhang 'brum srin mdze sel// 'di rnams las ni na le shaM/ ma gtogs tsha ba lnga
40b6(gso rig): zhes bshad// sgra cher dmu rdzing lto spos dang // gzer 'joms drod ni bskyed pa'i mchog/ bil+la ka sha taR+sha ri// pa ta la dang tun+du ka/ rtsa chen lnga po bska kha dro// rlung dang bangad kan sel byed yin// aM shu ma ti bri ha tI// gnyis gnyis gze rtsa chu lngar
41a1(gso rig): shang // zhu rjes ro mngar ha cang ni// bsil dang tsha min nyes kun sel/ kha la su nA e raN+Da// su bya pad ni sna gnyis rtsa// 'bring yin pang kan rlung 'joms yin// shin tu mkhris pa mi bskyed 'khru// nye'u shing ka
41a2(gso rig): ko li 'tsho byed// dzI ba ka dang ri shar bshad// 'tsho byed ces bya mig la pan// ngo tsa rlung dang mkhris pa ya la// 'jug ma ku sha 'bras gur shing // 'dum rtsa rtsar bshang lnga mkhris sel// gra ma gang bu g.yos sbyor zag/ sha dang tshong ma
41a3(gso rig): shing rtog sman// zas cha cung zad tshan bsdus 'di// rtag tu dgos pa yod par sgra// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// mdo'i gnas kyi le'u drug pa'o// / de nas kha zas bsrung ba'i le'u bshad par
41a4(gso rig): bya'o// rgyal pos pho brang nye 'khor du// srog 'tsho slob dpon bzhag par bya// de ltar byas pas thams cad du// thams cad las ni bsrung bar 'gyur// khyad par du ni sa bdag gi/ zas skom dug las bsrung bar bya// chos la sogs dang gang
41a5(gso rig): 'brel pa'i// 'byor pa de la rag las so// 'bras chan dug bcas bsher bag kyang // skam bag can ni 'dra bar 'gyur// yun ring tshos par gyur pa dang // tshos pa'ang zhag lon lta bur 'gyur/ rlangs pa rma bya'i mgrin 'dra zhing // khong
41a6(gso rig): myos brgyal dang lus rdul bskyed// dri dang mdog sogs nyams par 'gyur// rul zhing rma bya'i sgro ltar mtsher// tshong ma myur du bskams pa dang // bskol ba'i mdog ni rnag 'gyur zhing // der gzugs chung ba 'am che ba 'am// mi sdug pa 'am
41b1(gso rig): mi snang 'gyur// dbu ba steng byung ri mo 'tsham// kha chu 'dra dang chu bur 'byung // btung ba mngar sbyar tshong ma dang // shA dag mtshams bye ro dang bral// sha khu ri mo sngor snang zhing // 'o ma zangs mdog zho dri ma// dar ba la ni ser dang gnag/
41b2(gso rig): mar khu chu dang 'dra bar snang // chang dang chu rnag sbrang rtsi la// ljang snang til mar dag la dmar// shi tog ma smin par ni snang // smin pa dag ni yongs su 'drul// kha zas rlon dang skom pa dag/ rnyings shing mdog ni nyams par 'gyur// snyi ba dang
41b3(gso rig): ni sra ba dag/ reg pas go ni bzlog par 'gyur// me tog phreng rtse lo ma 'gas// rnying cing dri ni mi zhim 'gyur// go sa la nag po tal til dang // spu rnams 'thul zhing kha tshar 'chang// gser dngul mu tig shing dang rdo// rin chen
41b4(gso rig): sogs la dri ma chags// gzi mdangs reg pa 'od nyams 'gyur// sa yi 'od ni mdog bcas byed // dug ster kha ni sngo bskams la// gnod bag gis ni phyogasu blta// rdul zhing 'dar la skrag pa dang // 'jigs shing 'gros 'khor
41b5(gso rig): glal bar 'gyur// dug ldan zas ni mes bsregs na// me lce gcig 'khyil me rtag brgal// du ba rma bya'i mgrin 'drar 'gyur// me lce mi 'bar 'bar yang mnan// sbrang mas zos na 'chi bar 'gyur// bya rog gis zos skad zhan
41b6(gso rig): 'gyur// 'di ni ne tso da ru ha// ri skegs kyis mthong ca co 'byin// ngang bas zos na rdeg 'chos la// sha shang te'un par 'gyur// sreg pa mig ni mi chags byed// khrung khrung dag ni 'dzur bar 'gyur// phu raunau khu byug bya gag dang // ngur
42a1(gso rig): pas zos na 'chi bar 'gyur// byi la skyo zhing 'dor bar 'gyur// spre'u mi gtsang 'dor bar byed// rma byas de mthong dga' bar byed// dug gi dpal ni nyams par 'gyur// de ltar zas ni dug ldan par// shes shing ci nas
42a2(gso rig): de yi ni// srog chags phra mo yan chad la// gnod mi 'gyur bar 'bad de dor// reg na tsha zhing g.ya' la na// rims 'debs 'brum 'byung tshor ba chu// sen mo spu 'byung lus skang ste// de la dug ni rnam 'jig pa'i// tsAn shug pa spu shes
42a3(gso rig): tseH/ so ma'i shun bcas bal bu'i 'dab// ru rta sle tres a ka ru'i// chus bkrus blugs shing bsku bar bya// khar chud na ni mchil bsna bas mang // lce mchu sbrid cing bem por byed// lus tsha na zhing so gtse la// ri mo tshor zhing 'gram so
42a4(gso rig): mas// de la dug kun 'joms sman dang // u shIr sogs khus 'khur bkang da bo// ma zhu'i gnas babs rdul ba dang // brgyal zhing lto spos myos mgo 'khor// ba spu ldang zhing skyug lus tsha// mig mi gsal zhing snying mi dran// yan
42a5(gso rig): lag thig las khyab par 'gyur// zhu ba'i gnas su phyin na yang // kha dog sna tshogs skyug pa dang // gcin mang rab tu 'khru bar 'gyur// rmya skom skem zhing mdog skya la// gsus pa che zhing nyams stobs zad// de gnyis slon dang khrus
42a6(gso rig): byas nas// ser gnyis bu ram gir kar ni// se du ba ro ni spa pa// ba shi ka dang tshigs brgya pa// tan+na li ya'i rtsa ba dang // bya gag sgo nga a ba l+lu// snar btang mig sman slad bya ba// dug zhi'i phyir ni sbyar bar bya// dug 'thung pa dag steng dang ni//
42b1(gso rig): de bzhin 'og ni sbyangs gyur nas// dus su zangs bzang bdar phye ma// sbrang rtsir bcas pa snying spyod sbyin// snying nad sbyangs nas gser phye ni// zhib mo zho phyed sbyin byas na// pad+ma'i 'dab mar chu bzhin du// gser gyi yan lag la mi chags// tshe yang ring
42b2(gso rig): du 'phel bar 'gyur// sbyar dug la yang cho ga 'di'o// kha zas dag kyang mi mthun zos// sbyar dug 'dra bar shes par bya// rlan can sha dang mon sran dre'u// sbrang rtsi 'o ba myu gu can// pad+ma'i rtsa ba la phug gam// bu ram dang bcas mi 'phrod yin//
42b3(gso rig): khyad par du ni 'o ma nya// nya rnams las kyang tsi li tsi// 'o ma lhan cig sbyar kun ni// mi 'phrod shing tog de bzhin no// de bzhin rgya sran/ khre dag dang // pA la ku lat+sa mi 'phrod// la phug la sogs rdo rngad ni// zos nas 'o ma spang bar bya// phag
42b4(gso rig): rgod byi dung sha mi bza'// khyim bya bri shA ta zhor min// shA rlon mkhris pa dag dang ni// la phug mA la'i tshong mar min// le bArgan rtsi tshod lug shA min// myu gu'i tshong ma pad+mar min// mA la'i sran tshong bu ram zho// mar 'o laM gu rtsi'i 'bras min//
42b5(gso rig): chu zhing 'bras bu dar bar min// tA la'i 'bras bu zhor mi 'phrod// tsha ba gnyis po bu ram dang // sbrang rtsi ka ka ma rtsir min// de ni nya btsos pa'i snod dang // dong gra btsos par g.yos pa min// ka ma ta nI snod gzhan du// btsos nas nyin mtshan
42b6(gso rig): lon mi za// nya rjod pa yi snum las ni// pi pi ling brngos spang bar bya// mar sar 'khar snod zhag bcu lon// go d+ye'i 'bras bu gror mi bza'// ba sa sregs shar mi 'phrod cing // dar bar kaM bi la btsos min// 'o thug dang ni kri sa ra// chang dang ldan
43a1(gso rig): cig mi 'phrod spang // sbrang rtsi mar sar zhag til myur// chu rnams gnyis gnyis gsum gsum mam// cha mnyam lhan cig zos pa dag/ phan tshun dag ni mthun no// mar sbrang cha ni mi mnyam yang // char pa'i chu ni
43a2(gso rig): 'thungs na gnod// sbrang rtsi pad+ma'i sa bon dang // sbrang rtsi 'bru chang kha rar min// 'o thug rjes la skyo mar min// sha mo yungs kar brdos mi 'phrod// u po ta ka til tshigs la// btsos pa 'khru bar byed pa yin// byA gag shA ni chang drangs
43a3(gso rig): dang // kul ma sha yi thug mi 'phrod// de nyid phag rgod tshil la brngos// srog ni 'phral du 'joms par byed// de bzhin sreg pa rma bya dang // la bka pany+dzi la sr-i// e raN+Da yi me la ni// e raN+Da'i mar brngos mi 'phrod// ha ri tra sha skyer ba
43a4(gso rig): yI// thur ma dag la bskyon nas ni// skyer ba'i me la bsregs gyur pa// 'phral du srog ni 'joms par byed// de nyid thal ba rdul gyis gos// sbrang rtsir bcas pa 'phrod ma yin// gang la nyes pa ma sbyangs pa// mdor na de ni mi 'phrod
43a5(gso rig): yin// nyes 'dir sbyangs par 'dod po 'am// yang na de drung mi mthun pa'i// rdzas de nyid kyis dang po ni// lus ni mngon par sbyang bar bya// rtsol can sdum bsten spyod che dang // dar la bzla cing nyams stobs ldan// goms par zos dang cung zad
43a6(gso rig): zos// mi 'phrod zos kyang gnod mi 'gyur// mi 'phrod cha yis goms byas pa 'am// cha yis cha yis yongasu spang // phan pa'ong de bzhin bsten byas te// gcig gnyis gsum gyis tshod par bya// skyon ni rim gyis 'grib pa dang //
43b1(gso rig): yon tan rim gyis 'phel 'gyur na// slar skye bar ni mi 'gyur zhing // g.yo ba med pa dag tu 'gyur// mi 'phrod pa yang spangs gyur zhing // 'phrod pa goms par gyur pa nyid// 'phral du spangs dang ma bsten las// nyes pa rnams
43b2(gso rig): ni 'byung bar 'gyur// gnod pa gnod bya'i bdag nyid can// shin tu nye bar gyur pa la// phan med gnod par byed pa ni// mkhas pas phyir zhing bya mi rigs// zas dang mal stan 'dod la spyod// ran zhing rigs par spyad pa yis// khang khyim
43b3(gso rig): 'chos pa lta bur ni// rtag tu lus ni gzung bar bya// de la za ni bshad zin zhing // de dang der ni bshad par bya// bde sdug sbom dang stobs che chung // bud myed la phod mi pho da dang // shes dang mI shes 'tsho dang 'chi// gnyid la rag ni lus pa yin//
43b4(gso rig): dus minu ha cang thal ches dang // gnyid ni kun tu bgegs pa dag/ bde dang tshe ni nyams byed de// dus mtshams gnyis pa lte bu yin// mtshan mo gnyid ni ma log rtsug/ nyin mo gnyid log snum phyir 'gyur// tsog pur 'dug ste yur pa dag/ mig rtsub
43b5(gso rig): bar kan med par 'gyur// so ka rlung 'bo mi stobs 'phrog dus// rtsub cing mtshan mo phung bas na// nyin par gnyid phan gzhan dag tu// de ni bad kan+da mkhris pa bad// sgra yang gzhon dang pyid kyi du // ra ro bud med bsten khur las// mkhris dang
43b6(gso rig): ngan 'jig pas dub// skyigs bu dbugs mi bde tshad 'khru// rgan dang byis pa nyams stobs zad// glo brdol skem dang gzer gyis gnod// zas ma zhu dang bcom dang skyo// nyin par gnyid log rigs ma gtogs// 'di dag de bzhin
44a1(gso rig): lus zungs snyoms// khang kan skyes shing lus rtas 'gyur// tshil tshwa bang kan mang dang snum// rtag za nyin par gnyid ma log/ dug gi phog dang lkog nad can// mtshan mo nam yang gnyid ma log/ dus min gnyid
44a2(gso rig): log rmongs bag dang // rims bskyed rmugs shing cham pas 'debs// mgo na skrangs shing slon sgyid sbyar// rtsa yi rgyun 'gag me drod nyams// de la bsnyung dang slon sman dang // rdul dbyung sna sman btang ba dag/ gnyid ches gyur la skyug sman rno//
44a3(gso rig): mig sman rno dang sna sman dang // bsnyung ba sel la bud med bsten// mya ngan 'jigs dang khro ba sbyar// 'di dag nyid kyis gnyid grags pa// 'jig cing bad kan rab zad byed// gnyid yar ba yis yan lag snyoms// klad pa lci zhing klang
44a4(gso rig): 'ong la// mi gsal na zhing mgo 'khor la// zas mi 'jurmya rlung skyes nad// de byas mtshan mo dus bzhin du// ci bder gnyid ni log par bya// ma goms gnyid kyis ma log na// nang par ma zos phyed gnyid log/ gnyid yar gyur na 'o ma dang /
44a5(gso rig): chang dang sha khu zho rnams btung // lus bsku dril dang khrus bya zhing // mgo bsku rna ba mig dgang bya// na chung lag ngar gyis 'khyud dang // sems bde bya ba zin pa dang // yid dang rjes mthun yul ldan pa// ci 'dod gnyid 'ong bde bar bskyed// nyal po'i
44a6(gso rig): bde la sems ma chags// tshangs par spyod pa la dga' ba// chog shes pa yis mgu ba'i gnyid// rang gi dus las 'da' mi byed// nyal po'i chos ni spang bya ba// bkan min zla mtshan ldan pa dang // yid du mi 'ong mi sdug spyod//
44b1(gso rig): mngal ni skyon gyis khyab pa dang // rab sbom skem dang btsas pa dang // sbrum ma gzhan gyi bud med dang // rigs gzhan skye gnas mi mthun dang // bla ma lha dang rgyal po'i gnas// mchod rten dur khrod gsod gnas dang // bsti sa lam gyi bzhi mdo
44b2(gso rig): chung // dus tshigs nyin mo yan lag min// snying ga mgo bor brdeg bya spang // 'grangs ches ltogs dang brtan bral dang // yan lag mi bder gnas dang skom// byis pa rgan dang shugs gzhan nyen// nad pa yis kyang 'khrig pa spang // dgun dus
44b3(gso rig): ro tsa byas grags tshe// 'dod pas 'dod pa bsten par bya// dpyid ston zhag ni gnyis gnyis nas// so ga dbyar tshe zla phyed cing // gzhan du bud med la zhugs na// mgo 'khor ngal dang bla mthu nyams// stobs dang lus gzungs dbang po nyams// dus min
44b4(gso rig): 'chi bar byed pa yin// bud med dag la legs bsdams na// dran dang yid gzhungs nad med tshe// dbang po rtas shing grag stobs rnams// lhag par 'phel zhing rgas srar 'gyur// khrus dang byug pa rlung bsil kha ra la sogs bza'// chu bsil
44b5(gso rig): 'o ma sha khu sran tshod chang dngas 'thungs// nyal po dga' byas 'dod dang bral gyur rjes la brten// de 'dras de yi lus mdangs stobs slar skye bar 'gyur// sman pa thos spyod phun tshogs ldan zhing las mkhas snying rje can// gags dang gnod med
44b6(gso rig): lus srung byed pa nye bar bzhag byas nas// rgyal po'i rang gi dge ba'i 'bras bu'i longs spyod bder spyod cing // nang med mthu dang gzi brjid grags pa yun ring 'phel por 'gyur// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// mdo'i
45a1(gso rig): nas kyi le'u 'du na// rang nga ba sh+tsa ka~M/ kun na chad na 2// na madrong spyad byung yin// rdzas ni kyi ba'am yang ba
45a2(gso rig): chang la bltos par bya ba yi// lci ba las na byed 'grangs bya// yang ba las ni rab 'grangs min// bde thag 'ju ba de tsam la// tshong bin+d+ha zhes nA~M d+hA shang ba yin// sa cho ma sbyin chus 'gyur ro// stobs dang gzi mdangs 'phel gyi
45a3(gso rig): 'gyur// rlung gi nang ni thams cad kyis// rgyu nyid du ni 'gyur ba yin// tshang las shin tu ches pa yang // nyes pa thams cad sbyar du bskyed// ma thu'i zas ni mi bzang pa// de yis rlung sogs gzir gyur pas// cig car rnam par 'khrug 'gyur
45a4(gso rig): ny-ing du mi grags 'gyur na// d+hU sgro 'gags shing bye snrubs bstu// ste drung 'og gr-I las drug cu// bstod pas gas ng+ge tsod mug byung ba// brgyam chags can la 'phral skyeng byed// de la rlung las gzer mgo 'khor// 'a sgo
45a5(gso rig): 'dar zhing rengs sogs 'gyur// mkhris pa las ni 'khru rims 'debs// khong tsha skom zhing kha sogs 'gyur// bad kan rlon zhing yan lag lci// tshigs thogs mchil ma mang bar 'gyur// khyad par du ni nyams chung zhing // me drod
45a6(gso rig): zhan dang shugs 'gag pa'i// zas ni rlung gis bkag pa dang // bad kan gyis ni rab bkag pa'i// nyes pa be snabs 'khrugs pas na// zug rngu zug po lta bur gnas// 'khru dang smon pa mi byed pas// gzer la sogs pa mi bzad pa/
45b1(gso rig): be ru snabs de yin nyes rab rtug/ be snabs mi bzad kyis sbubs bkag/ rtsib logs kun tu drang por 'gro/ shing bzhin rengs par gyur na ni// la zhu shing 'dra zhes bya ste// myur du gsod byed de spang bya// mi 'phrong lhag za ma zhu bar//
45b2(gso rig): zla byed ma zhu dug gi ni// mtshan nyid can de yi bzad pa// dug gi ming can gang yin te// dug gi tshul can myur gsod byed// gso dpyad bya bar dka' bas spang // de nas mi zhu'i ba snabs gyur// gsor rung shu dag rgya mtsho dang //
45b3(gso rig): po son cha bcug chu dron ni// 'thungs pa skyug bcug de nas ni// dugs dang mas btang reng bu dag/ dri ma rlung dag legs rgyu sbyar// yan lag 'khums par gyur pa la// shin tu dugs bya bkri bar bya// gsung nad shin tu
45b4(gso rig): 'phel ba la// rting par me btsa' gdab pA bsngags// de ni de'i nyin bsnyung bAr bzhag/ khrus btang lta bur nye bar sbyar// mo zhu mi bzang nyen 'gyur yang // gzer 'joms sman ni btung bar bya// be'u snabs ma zhu ma drod
45b5(gso rig): nyams// nad kyis sman ni 'ju mi nus// de yis nad pa 'phral du ni// thung zhing 'chi ba dag tu 'du 'gyur// kha zas zhu nas lto ba ni// rtsub srar gyur la sman dag kyang // nyes pa'i lhag ma sbyang phyir dang // pho ba'i ma ni bskyed phyir btang //
45b6(gso rig): ma zhu'i 'gyur ba zhi pa dag/ nyams smad par ni byas las gyur// de gsum nyes pa rnam gsum ni// btags na rab tu sbyar bar bya// de la chung la skung ba phan// 'bring la srung dang zhu bya ba// chen po la ni spyang pa ste// de yis dri ma rtsa nas
46a1(gso rig): 'byin// de bzhin nad ni gzhan dag la 'ang // rang nang bzhi las so bzlog pas// gso bo de dang rjes 'brel yong // rgyu las go bzlog rnam spang pa// sman pas ji lta ji lta bar// nang pas go bzlog sbyar
46a2(gso rig): pa 'am// de'i don byed pa sbyor bar bya// nyes sbyin mo drod skyes gyur ma// nyams rta snum gyis byug pa dang // btung dang 'jam rtsi sogs rigs sbyar// da kun mA zhu'i ba snrubs te// de ni mig dang khur ba sbyangs// sgregs pa zos ma thog
46a3(gso rig): 'dra 'byung // mchil ma mau ni 'anyis g.yo lci// rlung los rings bag gzer ba ring // gshing gci 'gags shing spros dz+nyA nyams// mkhris las kho cha snyam mgo 'khor// rmongs pag sgregs pa b+hU de'i cha// ma nu be snabs byung
46a4(gso rig): bya// rengs pag las ni dugs rab bya// tsha ba'i ma zhu skyug sman dag/ btang ba 'am gnas skabs gang phan bya// ma u be snabs ci ba na// rtsa sbubs thim las yun ring can// bad kan rlung ni 'dre sa mtshan mo// de dang mnyam par bsgrub par bya//
46a5(gso rig): dngas ma lus las zas ngang chung // snying na sgregs pa mnam par 'gyur// 'di la cung zad gnyid log bya// ma zhu kun gyis nyin par ni// zas ma zos par gnyid log la// bkres gyur yang las ran par bza'// ma u spyi yi mtshan ma ni//
46a6(gso rig): rnam bar 'gags sam shas cher 'byung // na zhing rlung ni mi gsal rgyu// mkhreg cing lus lci mgo bo 'khor// zas tshong lhag par gyur pa nyid// gcig du ma zhu ma zad kyi// mi 'dod 'gag byed tshig ma tshos// lci dang rtsub drang mi
46b1(gso rig): gtsang dran// khong tsha skam dang chu mang dang // bsres pa'i zas ni 'ju mi 'gyur// mya ngan khro dang bkres pa yis// nyes par rdungs shing zas mi 'ju// phan dang mi phan bsres pa dag/ zos pa mnyam za yin par 'dod//
46b2(gso rig): 'grangs rjes slar yang za 'gyur ba// lhag par za ba yin zhes bya// dus min che ba 'am chung zos pa// mi mnyam par ni za ba yin// gsum po 'dis kyang gsod pa 'am// mi zad nad kyis 'debs par byed// dus su goms shing gtsang
46b3(gso rig): la phan// snum gro yang dang ma yengs dang // ro drug ldan zhing mngar bag che// shin tu myur min ngal bar min// khrus byas bkres shing dben par gnas// kha gdong lag pa rkang pa bkrus// lha dang yi dgas brjed cing sbyin// bla ma byis
46b4(gso rig): pa mgron mo chod byas// dud 'gro rnams kyang rab brtags shing // bdag nyid legs par brtags nas ni// ma spang sgra 'am yid 'ong smra skye bo gtsang zhing gus pas stabs// yid 'ong gnyen dang lhan cig bza'// zas ni rtsa dang sgra spu sogs/
46b5(gso rig): 'dres shing khong du slar sros dang // tshong ma zas ngan mang ba dang // tsha ches lan tshwa mang ba spang // phrum dang mo dang phrum skam dang // ba tsha tsha dang l-i phug rjem/ phag rgod lug dang ba glang nya// ma he sha dang ring dang skam// mA Sha chu ldum niswa pa// pang
46b6(gso rig): rtsa 'bras 'khrur myu gur gyur// tshong ma skam dang mam 'dra dang // khuram phra mo bza' mi bya// sA lu'i 'bras dang gr-i dang nas// drug cu pa dang skam sa sha/ a ru skyu ru rgun 'brum dang // ud kha ra pa to la// zhun mar char chu'o ma dang // sbrang rtsi se'u 'bru
47a1(gso rig): rgya che bza'// mig dang stobs phyir mtshan mo mi// 'bras gsum sbrang rtsi mar sar bza'// mi nar 'jog par byed gang dang // nad sel byed pa gang yin bsten// bang rtsa bur shing tso tsa dang // mo tsa a mra'i 'bras bu
47a2(gso rig): dang / la du khur ba bu ram can// zas ni lci zhim snum pa dang // mngar zhing 'ju dka' bstan pa rnams// dang po nyid du bza' bar bya// de las bzlog pa tha mar bzal// bar du sgyur tsha lan tshwa can// lho yi cha gnyis zas kyis ste// cha gcig skom gyis
47a3(gso rig): dgang bar bya// rlung la sogs pa'i gnas su ni// cha bzhi pa ni lhag mar bzhag/ zos rjes skom ni bsil ba'i chu// nas dang bag che'i g.yos byas zos// zho chang dug 'bags sbrang rtsi la// chu bsil rjes su 'thungs na phan// mi 'ju 'gags
47a4(gso rig): la chu dron btang // tshod ma mung+ga'iri gnod pa la// zho ga chu dang ngar ba dang // rang sbyar rtsubs mo btung bar bya// skem po rgyas phyir chang btung te// sbom pos sbrang rtsi'i chu btung ngo // gcod chen nang la sha khu btung // drod chung sha zos chang btung bya// nad dang
47a5(gso rig): sman sogs sbrum bud med// zan bcad dka' thub las rnams kyis// skem nga dbyis pa rgan po la// 'o ma bdud rtsi lta bur phan// mdor na skom rjes btung ba ni// gang zhig zas dang yon tan gyi// mi mthun mi 'phrod med gyur pa// de ni rnam pa kun tu
47a6(gso rig): bsngags/ zos rjes sgom 'thungs ngoms dang khyab// stobs 'phel lus ni brtan byed la// zas sdung snyi bar 'gyur ba dang // 'drul zhing rnam par 'ju bar 'gyur// de ni nam tshong yan chad nang // dbugs lung gro brdol cham pa dang // gru len
47b1(gso rig): sgra mang la chags dang // skud 'gags pa la gnod pa yin// lus la rnag 'dzag gcin nang mig/ lkog nang rma yi nad kyis nyen// skom spang kun gyis skom 'thungs nas// mang sgra lam zhugs nyal ba sbyang // zan zos
47b2(gso rig): nis ni nyi tshan me// rta zhon rgyal dang 'degs pa spang // gshang dang gci gsal snyil dri med// nyes pa lam min par mi 'gro/ sgregs pa dag cing bru ba tsha// 'gyur thur gyi rlung tha mal rgyu// de bzhin mi yi drod bdo dbang po
47b3(gso rig): gsal zhing lus kyang rab tu yang // zas kyi tshong ran cho gar sbyar bzhin za ba de ni dus su 'dong // yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// mdo'i gnas kyi le'u brgyad pa'o// /
47b4(gso rig): de nas sman la sogs pa rnams kyi bye brag shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// sman rnams nyid kyi ro la sogs// ngo ni de la brten pas mchog/ de yang 'byung lnga'i bdag nyid can// sa la brten te skye ba yin// chu ni skye
47b5(gso rig): 'gag me dang rlung // nam mkha' rnams ni tshogs pa las// de skyes gyur dang khyad par byung // ming ni shas che las gyur yin// de bas 'byung ba 'dus pa las// 'byung bas sman ni ro gcig min// de phyir nad kyang nyes cig min//
47b6(gso rig): de la gsal ba ro zhes bya// mi gsal ro rjes mtha' mar ni// cung zad gsal ba dag tu'ang 'dong // sman gyi yon tan lci sogs dang // ro ni sa la sogs bsten pas// mtshungs par spyod pa nyer gdags pas// ro las ming
48a1(gso rig): du gtags pa yin// de la sa sman lci dang sbom// sra zhing dri yi shes rab che// lci zhing brtan dang 'dus pa dang // nye bar 'phel bar byed pa yin// chu yi gsher dang lci bsil snum// rtul zhing bskal
48a2(gso rig): mo shas che// 'jam zhing pang kan 'dra ba la// 'dul zhing tshim byed sdud par byed// me yi rtsub rno tsha zhing skam// 'phra zhing gzugs kyi yon tan che// tsha zhing 'bar la mdog bskyed cing // gsal zhing smin pa'i bdag nyid can// dung gi
48a3(gso rig): rtsub cing khyab la yang // reg pa'i yon tan shas che yin// rtsub cing yang la dri ma sel// rnam dpyod na bar byed pa yin// na mkha' phra zhing dang la yang // sgra yi yon tan shas che ste// khong stong yang bar byed pa yin//
48a4(gso rig): de ltar 'gro na don dang ni// sbyor ba sna tshogs dbang gis na// sman min ci yang yod ma yin// de la sman ni gyen du 'gro// phal cher me dang rlung shas che// thur du 'gro ba phal cher ni// sa chu'i yon tan shas che yin// de ltar sman no ro'i bye
48a5(gso rig): p+la ga/ 'di yi 'og nas ston pa yin// sman mthu la las bshad pa ni// lci snum bsil dang 'jam pa dang // yang rtsub tsha dang rno ba ste// de lta dri rnam pa brgyad du 'dod// sman mthu tsa ra kas bshad pa// gang gis bya ba gang byung ba// mthu
48a6(gso rig): min cir yang mi byed kyi// de dag thams cad mthu yis byed// des na lci li sogs pa nyid// nus pa'i khyad par ldan pa dang // yon tan ma lus snying por ni// gyur pas mthu zhes bshad pa dag/ don dang mthun par btags pa yin//
48b1(gso rig): gces pa myang du yod na yang // tha spyang gtso bo nyid kyis yin// de bas go ni bzlog pa 'i phyir// de ni ro la sogs pa la// srid du zin kyang ma bshad de// de bas lci ba la sogs yin// gzhan dag tsha dang bsil nyid gnyis// stobs yin
48b2(gso rig): zhes kyang ston par byed// sman ni sna tshogs bdag nyid can// nyi ma zla ba'i stobs can yin// 'gro 'di gsal dang mi gsal las// nam yang 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro// de la tsha ba mgo 'khor skom/ kha swA rdul tsha zhing myur 'ju byed//
48b3(gso rig): rlung dang bad kan zhi bar byed// bsil ba dag ni tshim byed cing // 'tsho dang rengs par byed pa dang // khrag dang mkhris pa rab dang byed// pho ba'i me dang 'phrad pa las// gang zhig ro gzhan byung gyur pa'i// ro rnams kyi ni mthar zhu ba/
48b4(gso rig): de ni zhu ba zhes bshad do// mngar dang lan tsha zhu rjes mngar// sgyur ba'i zhu rjes sbyar ba yin// kha dang bska dang tsha ba rnams// zhu rjes phal char kha pa yin// ro dang zhu rjes 'bras bu mnyam// de la sman ni bzang dang ngan// la la ro yis las byed
48b5(gso rig): la// gzhan dag 'ju bar byed pa yin// yon tan gzhan dang nungs pa dang // mthu yis la la byed pa yin// sman gyi ro sogs gang dang gang // stobs ldan nyid kyis gnas byed de// shin tu zil mnan de dang de// sgrub byed rgyu ni nyid
48b6(gso rig): du gnas// yon tan mi 'phrong sbyar ba ni// mang pos nyung ngu zil gyis gnon// ro dang 'ju ba'i mthu dag ni// de yi stobs kyis zil gyis gnon// ro sogs de ltar stobs ni mnyam// ma bcos pa yi stobs dang ldan// ro sogs mnyam pa'i
49a1(gso rig): las gang ni// khyad 'phags de ni mthu las skyes// dan+ti dang ni tsi tra ka/ ro sogs mtshungs kyang ngan+ti 'khru/ shing mngar rgun 'brum 'dra yang 'khru// 'o ma mar 'dra mar drod bskyed// de ltar sman la sogs
49a2(gso rig): pa yi/ phyi yi las te de yang ni// sna tshogs rkyen gyi dbye ba yis// sman dbye tha dad gyur pa yin// gro dang nas ni mngar ba dang // lci las rlung 'joms bskyed pa yin// nya dr-i 'o ma bsil ba dang // seng+ge khaM yi phag ma yin//
49a3(gso rig): yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// mdo'i gnas kyi le'u dgu pa'o// / de nas ro tha dad pa shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// mngar ba la sogs ro skye ba// sa chu me sa chu dang me//
49a4(gso rig): mkha' rlung me rlung sa dang rlung // gnyis gnyis shas cher las rim 'byung // de las ro ni mngar ba dag/ gang zhig myangs pa'i tshe na ni// kha la tshogs shing lus dang ni// tshim byed dbang po rab dang byed// grog ma la sogs dga' ba yin//
49a5(gso rig): sgyur ba kho nas chu 'dzag cing // so gtse spu ni ldang ba dang // mig dang smin ma 'dzum par byed// lan tsha khar ni mchil ma 'du// 'khur pa gre ba tsha bar byed// kha ba kha yi dri ma sbyong // lce ni 'joms par byed pa yin// tsha ba lce rtse skyo byed cing //
49a6(gso rig): cig tsag byed par 'gyur ba dang // kha mig sna las 'dzag byed cing // 'khur ba sreg par byed pa yin// bskabs lce ni ben por khyed// gre ba rtsa sbubs 'gag par byed// ro yi tshul ni de dag ste// las ni ro mngar ba dag gi/ skyes
49b1(gso rig): nas 'phrod par byed pa dang // lus zungs mthu stobs rab bskyed cing // byis pa rgan po glo brdol skem// mdog mngangs sgra dang dbang po bzang // lus rtas skad 'gags phan zhing lci// nu zho bskyed cing rma 'byor byed//
49b2(gso rig): tshe ring 'tsho byed snum pa dang // rlung dang mkhris pa dug rnams sel// ha cang dregs na tshil bcas dang // bang kan las byung nang bskyed cing // lus sbom drong bri chang nang dang // gcin nang lci ba smen sogs bskyed// sgyur ba me drod
49b3(gso rig): skyed byed snum// zhim zhing 'ju byed yi ga 'bye// dri ba'i nus bskyed reg pa bsil// tshim byed 'drul byed yang pa ste// bde kan khrag mkhris rgyas par byed// rlung 'gags rgyu bar byed pa yin// de ni shin tu bsten drags na// lus
49b4(gso rig): lhong rab rib mgo 'khor dang // g.yan pa skya rbab me dpal dang // 'or nang thor bu skom rims bskyeng // lan tsha sra dang khyim la dang // 'grags pa 'byin cing drod skyed byed// snum dang dugs kyis rdul zhing rno// yi ge 'byed cing gcod
49b5(gso rig): 'byed byed// de ni drags pas rlung khrag dang // sgra 'byi skra dkar gnyer ma dang // skom mdze dug dang me dpal rnams// bskyed cing stobs ni bri bar byed// kha ba rang nyid zhim min zhing // yi ga 'chus dang srin skom dug/ mdze dang brgyal dang
49b6(gso rig): rims rlon bro// tsha dang mkhris pa bang kan 'joms// 'drul dang tshil dang zhag dang rkang // bshang dang gci ba skems pa dang // yang zhing yid gzhungs bsil zhing rtsub// nu ma'i skad dang skad 'gags sel// de ni shin tu drags gyur na//
50a1(gso rig): lus zungs zad cing rlung nang bskyed// tsha bas lkog nang 'gags pa dang // mdze dang ma zhu 'or nad sel// rma 'jig byed cing snum pa dang // tshil dang 'drul bag skems par byed// drod bskyed 'ju byed yi
50a2(gso rig): ga 'byed// sbyong zhing zas ni 'jig par byed// 'ching ba gcod cing rtswa sbubs dag/ rnam par 'byed cing bang kan sel// de ni shin tu drags gyur pas// sgom bskyed khu ba stobs zad cing // brgyal zhing lus 'khums 'dar ba dang //
50a3(gso rig): rked pa rgyab sogs na bar byed// bska ba mkhris pa pad kan sel// lci zhing khrag nang rnam par sbyong // skem zhing rma 'tsho bsil ba dang // 'drul dang tshil ni rnam par skems// be'u snabs 'khyil zhing sri bar byed// rtsub cing pags
50a4(gso rig): mdog rab dang byed// de ni shin tu bsten drags na// bshang 'gags lto sgo snying nang dang // skom dang skem zhing skem mthu nyams// rtsa sgro 'gags shing dri ma sri// zhun mar bu ram star ka gser// mo tsa tso tsa ba ru sha/ nye'u shing
50a5(gso rig): ram nye ba na sa// rA dza da na ba la gsum// me da gnyis dang bir+Na bzhi// 'tshe byed dzi na pa ri sha pa// shing mngar ma du ka bim+bi// shra ba ni gnyis bi da ri// cu gang k+Shi ra shu ku la// sa ha 'o can kaSh+Ta ri// 'o ma bu ram shing gze ma// rgun
50a6(gso rig): ma s+thang sogs mngar ba'i sde// sbyar ba skya ru aMm+bi ka/ ba lung dang ni star bu dang // se'u 'bru rdul dang dar ba dang // tshwa dang ku shu a mra dang // am+ba ta ka b+ha bya dang // ka ra marda ka bid ta'o// tsha mchog rtsa ba ru kha ru tsha// bi da rgya mche
50b1(gso rig): bkong ma'i tshe// mtsho tshwa skam tsha ro nye dang // k+Sha ra lan tshwa'i sde tshan yin// kha ba kyi lce pa to la// tsan dan u shir ba la ka/ ci sgregs nim+ba pu tse shel// rgya spos a kar ba tsha kha/ nak+ta ma la ser po gnyis// gla sgang mur+Na ba
50b2(gso rig): sha ka/ a pa marga po son cha// mkhar lcags sle tres byi tsher ba// rtsa ba che lnga byA g+h+ri gnyis// bong pa shu dag biM sha la// tsha ba shing kun na le shi/ bi nAM ga dang tsha ba lnga// ku be ra sogs lU dang sto// mkhris pa gcin dang go bye yin//
50b3(gso rig): ska tshan a rU ba ru ra// sbrang rdzi seng lde ba shrI sha/ ka daM u dum+ba ra dang // mu tig b+hu ru any+dza tsag/ ka bit+taM gzhon kha rdzu ra// pad tsa pad+ma ut+pa la'o// 'bras rnying nas dang gr-i rnying dang // mud+YA sbrang rtsi sha ka ra// skam sa'i sha rnams ma
50b4(gso rig): gtogs pa'i// mngar ba phal cher bad kan bskyed// skyu ru sa 'bru ma gtogs pa'i// sbyar ba phal cher mkhris pa bskyed// rgyu ma tsha lce myang tsham gtogs// lan tshwa phal cher mig la gnod// sle tres pa to lwa bca' sga// sgog sgra pi
50b5(gso rig): si ling ma gtogs// kha dang tsha ba phal cher ni// ro tsa 'bri zhing rlung bskyed yin// dka' la a ru ra ma gtogs pa// phal cher bsil zhing sri bar byed// ro tsA sgyur dang lan tshwa rnams// go rim bzhin du dro nus ldan// kha dang bsgo dang
50b6(gso rig): mdor ba rnams// de bzhin du ni bsil ba nyid// kha dang tshe dang bska ba rnams// de bzhin rtsub cing dri ba sri// lan tshwa sbyar mngar snum pa dang // bshang gci thur gyi dbugs 'byin byed// lan tshwa las bska de bas kyang // mang
51a1(gso rig): tu lci ba yin// sbyar las tsha dang de bas kyang // ba dag ni yang ba yin// ro rnams kyi ni dbye ba las// sbyor ba lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang // brtag pa drug cu rtsa gsum du// rags rim ji bzhin phye ba yin
51a2(gso rig): de lnga re re pre ba las// lhur gyur pa ni ro gnyis pa// gsum pa mang bcu sbyar drug ste// lan tshwa gsum ste kha ba gcig/ bzhi pa la ni mngar po bcu// sbyar ba bzhi po lan tshwa gcig/ lnga pA la ni skyur gcig pu// mngar ba lnga
51a3(gso rig): brten pa yom/ sa na d+h+r-ig gaN+DIg+sa pU yi// ma 'drem pa drug 'gyur// lnga pa drug dang don tha dang drug/ bzhi pa gnyis rol yin// dbye gsum shu gcig nyid/ sman ni ro drub de ltar du
51a4(gso rig): cu ga cu la de rnags ro dang ri rjes ro'i dbyil/ rab dang mchog rig tu brtags pa las// rtsis las 'dres par byung bar gyur pa ni// nang pa rnyan gyi dngang los nye bar sbya pa/ yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las
51a5(gso rig): mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu pa'o// / de nas nAng la sogs pa'i tshul shes byar bya ba'i le'u bshang bar bya'o// nang drung lus gzungs dri ma rnams// rtag tu lus kyi rtsu ba yin// de rlung dbugs 'byung dbug
51a6(gso rig): rdub dang/ sbyong dmas po sbyong shugs 'byer dang // lus zungs legs par sgrub dag// dbang po rnams ni gsol ba reg/ mi gtsang bani rjepo 'dzin yim/ mkhris pa 'dra blang mthong byeng nga / kri rlom thapa yi ni ma
51b1(gso rig): yid gzhungs// blo ldan pags snying lus 'jam pas// pad kan brtan zhing snum nyid dang // tshig 'brel bzod la sogs pas so// lus zungs las gtso go rim bzhin// tshim byed 'tsho byed g.yog pa dang // snum dang
51b2(gso rig): ston dang 'gengs pa dang // mngal ni skyed byed yin par bshad// ston par byed pa bshad pa yin// 'drul dang 'byin pa gcin gyi yin// ba spu brtan pa rdul gyi yin// rlung ni 'phel bar gyur pa yis// skem dang
51b3(gso rig): mdog gnag drod bag dga'// 'dar dang lto spos bshang ba sri// stobs dang gnyid dang dbang po nyams// smra mang mgo 'khor zhum par byed// mkhris pa bshang gci pags mig ser// bkres skom lus cha gnyid
51b4(gso rig): chung byed// bad kan drod nyams mchil ma mang // khong snyom lci dang sha mdog dkar// lus drang yan lag lhod pa dang // lung pa dbugs mi bde gnyid che// dngas ma 'ang bang kan dang 'dra la// khrag 'phel me dpal khyod pa
51b5(gso rig): mtshor// mdze dang rlung khrag mkhris pa khrag/ skran dang rnyil nang mig ser dang // bskyod dka' drod nyams rmongs pag can// mig dang gcin pags dmar bar 'gyur// sha 'phel lba ba rmen bu mdud// mkhur tshos brang lho bla
51b6(gso rig): sbom zhing // mgul sogs lhag par sha yang che// tshal 'phel de 'dra de bzhin ngal// cung zad bskyod kyang dbugs rgod cing // rkub tshos nu ma gsum 'phyang 'gyur// rus 'phel rus lhag so lhag 'gyur// rkang 'phel
52a1(gso rig): lus lci mig rtsa g.yung // tshigs kyi mgo bo sbom pa dang // tshigs la thor bu gsos ka 'ibyung // khu 'phel bud med la ra ba ga du// khu ba'i rde'u dag tu'ang 'gyur// ba shwang 'phel lto spos rgyu
52a2(gso rig): 'khrug cing // lus lci lto ba na bar byed// gcin+d+ra 'phel chu sor zug cing na// lcis kyang ma lcis sgyum sems 'byung // rdul 'phel rdul che dri m+b+hi zhim// g.yan pa nyid kyang bskyed ces bya// mig rdul lo sogs dri ma rnams// mang pas
52a3(gso rig): lci la sogs par byed// rlung zad mtshan ma lus mi bde// sgra nyung rtsol ba chung par 'gyur// dran pa mi gsal bang kon 'phel// sngar bshad pa yi nad rnams 'byung // mkhris zad drong nyams grang pa dang // mdog nyams byed de bad kan zad//
52a4(gso rig): mgo 'khor ba kan gnas stongs shing // snying 'dar tshigs ni lhong par 'gyur// cung zad rtsub ngal skum pa dang // na zhing sgra cher mi bzod 'gyur// khrag zad sbyar dang bsil la dga'// rtsa lhong pags pa rtsub par 'gyur// sha zad dbang
52a5(gso rig): lams mig 'khur ba'i// rus skams lha tshigs na bar 'gyur// tshil zad gnyid che dbyi rked mngon// mtshar pa che dang lus skem 'gyur// rus zad rus zug so dang ni// sen mo sgra la sogs pa 'byung // rkang zad rkang sbubs stong pa dang // mgo
52a6(gso rig): 'khor rab ril can du 'gyur// khu ba zad pas ring nas 'byung // yang na khu ba khrag nyid 'byung // rlig pa shin tu na ba dang // pho mtshan tshig pa snyam du sems// bshang zad rlung ni rgyu ma'i nang // sgra bcas 'khyil pa lta bur byed// lto bar rgyu zhing
52b1(gso rig): gyen du 'gro// snying ga rtsibA logs mi bzad na// gcin zang gcin nyung sri ba dang // mdog 'gyur ba 'am khrag bcas nyid// rdul zad spu byi spu 'greng la// pags pa rnams ni 'gas par 'gyur/ dri ma shin tu phra ba rnams//
52b2(gso rig): zad pa rtag dka' dri ma yi// rang gnas bskam dang na ba dang // stong dang yang ba las shes bya// nang sogs rang nyid ji lta ba'i// yon tan 'di ni bzlog pa dag/ zad pa dang ni 'phel 'gyur las// 'phel 'bri sman pas
52b3(gso rig): shes par bya// dri ma thogs las 'phel ba ste// shin tu 'byung las zad shes bya// lus ni dri mas brten pas na// 'phel bas zad pa gnod pa yin// de la rlung ni rus par gnas// mkhris pa rdul dang khrag la gnas// bad kan
52b4(gso rig): lhag ma gnas nges 'di// phan tshun rten dang brten pa yin// 'phel dang zad par byed pa'i sman// gcig gi gang yin gzhan gyi 'ang de// rus pa rlung gnyis la 'di min// phal cher rtas pas 'phel bar 'gyur// bad kan rjes
52b5(gso rig): mthun de yi phyir// de las bzlog pas zad pa yin// rlung dang rjes mthun de ltar na// 'phel dang zad pa 'byung 'gyur ba'i// bsnyung dang blta bar bya ba yis// nang ni rim gyis gso bar bya// rlung ma rtogs te de skyes la// de nyid bzlog
52b6(gso rig): thabs sbyar bar bya// khyad par du ni khrag skyes na// gter ga dgu sman dag gis gso// sha cher skyes las byung ba'i nang // gtar ga me bca' thal sman sbyar// tshil skyes sdom skem gso bar bya// rus pa zad pa las byung la/
53a1(gso rig): mar dang 'o ma kha bar sbyar// de bzhin 'jam rtsi btang bas so// bshang ba 'phel la 'khru bas gso// bshang bzang las byung ba'i nad// ra lug nang grol zan dron dang // sbyar dug ma sha gnyis sogs
53a2(gso rig): sbyin// gcin 'phel gyur la gcin 'bri ba// gcin zad las byung gcin gnyis gso// rdul mi 'byung la rtsol dang bsku// rdul 'byung chang gis gso bar bya// lus kyi me drod rang gnas 'dug/ cha shashos lus zungs rnams la brten//
53a3(gso rig): de rnams 'bri zhing rab 'bar ba// lus zungs 'phel dang zad par 'gyur// lus zungs dang po'i phyi ma ni// rgyas byed zad pa'ang de bzhin no// nyes 'khrugs pas ni lus zungs nyen// gnyi gas dri ma la gnod byed// 'og na
53a4(gso rig): gnyis te mgo bor bdun// bu ga dang ni rdul 'byung ba'i// dri ma'i gnas ni dri ma ste// rang rang gnas su nang bskyed 'gyur// lus zungs khu ba'i mthar thug pa'i// nang nas gzi can mdangs mchog yin// snying la gnas kyang
53a5(gso rig): khyab pa dang // lus ni brtan par gnas pa yin// gang zhig 'jig na nges 'jig la// gang zhig gnas na gnas gyur pa// gang las dngos rnams sna tshogs pa// lus la brten pa 'byung ba yin// mdangs ni sems 'khrug
53a6(gso rig): bkres sems las// mya ngan ngal la sogs pas zad// de zad sdang zhing lus ring la// yang yang sems shing dbang po nyams// gzi nyams rtsub dang yid mi dga'// nyams chung bar ni 'byung ba yin// 'tsho byed sman dang 'o ma dang //
53b1(gso rig): sha khu la sogs de'i sman yin// zas rnams mi 'dod gang zhig slong kade la mi 'phrod 'phrod ba ni// spang dang sbyin par bya ba dag/ de dang des 'phel zad par 'gyur// nyes pa phyin ci log pa dang // mthun pas sred pa skyed
53b2(gso rig): byed de// phal cher 'phel dang zad pa dag/ mi mkhas pa yis mi shes so// ji bzhin stobs dang rang ji bzhin// 'phel na nyes pa rgyas par 'gyur// zad pas rang bzhin 'dor bar 'gyur// mnyam nu rang gi las rnams byed//
53b3(gso rig): gang zhig mnyam pas lus ni 'phel bar byed// nyes pa de nyid mi mnyam gsod par byed// de bas zad pa'ang 'phel ba lta bu ni// phan pa'i spyod pa nyid kyis bsrung bar bya// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las//
53b4(gso rig): mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas nad kyi bye brag shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// zhu ba'i gnas dang rkeng pa lci// rna ba rus pa reg dbang po// rlung gnas yin te/ de las kyang //
53b5(gso rig): zhu ba'i gnas su khyad par gnas// mkhri sa gnas lte ba pho ba rdul// chu ser dngas ma khrag dang ni// mig dang pags pa dag yin te// de las lte ba khyad par gnas// bad kan pra nga dang mgul ba mgo// glo pa rus tshigs
53b6(gso rig): ma zhu'i gnas// dngas mchil dang sna rtser gnas// brang ni khyad par dag gi gnas// rlung ni srog sogs dbye ba yis// lnga yi bdag nyid 'dir srog ni// phyir gnas brang dang gre bar rgyu// blo dang dbang po sems 'dzin byed//
54a1(gso rig): mchil 'dor spring 'byung sgregs pa 'don// dbugs rngub zas ni med par byed// gyen rgyu'i gnas ni brang yin te// sna dang lte ba lkog mar rgyu// tshig 'byin 'bad rtsol mdangs dang ni// stobs dang kha dog dran
54a2(gso rig): las byed// khyab byed snying gnas lus kun la// ma la byab cing rab tu mgyogs// 'gro dang ldeg dang 'jog pa dang // mig 'byed 'jubs pa la sogs pa// lus can bya ba phal cher ni// de la ra ga ni lus pa yin// mnyam
54a3(gso rig): gnas me drod nye bar gnas// nang grol kun tu rgyu ba yin// bye ba zas len 'ju ba dang // dngas snyigs 'byed cing 'dor bar byed// thur sel gzhang gnas 'dod mo dang // lgang ba pho mtshan brlan gnas// bya ba khu ba zla mtshan dang // bshad
54a4(gso rig): gci mngal gnas 'byin par byed// mkhris pa'i rang bzhin lnga de la// zhu dang ma zhu'i gnas par gnas// 'byung lnga'i bdag nyid can gyis ni// gang me'i yon tan shas che bas// gsher nyid skem byed 'ju la sogs// las kyi me yi
54a5(gso rig): sgrar bshad do// zas ni 'ju dang de bzhin du// dngas ma tshigs ma 'byed par byed// des gnas bzhin du mkhris pa ni// lhag ma rnams kyi grogs byed pas// stobs bskyed pa yis byed 'gyur ba// de ni 'ju byed ces bshad do// mkhris
54a6(gso rig): ba ma zhu'i gnas la brten// dngas mdog bsgyur bas dmar bsgyur yin// mkhris pa sgrub byed snying la gnas// blo dang yid gzhungs nga rgyal sogs// mngon 'dod don ni sgrub byed pas// mig la gnas te gzugs mthong byed// mthong byed
54b1(gso rig): ces bshad mdog gsal ni// pags mdog gsal byed pags par gnas// bad kan rnams lnga brang gnas pa// rang gi stobs kyi sum mdo dang // snying dang zas kyi mthu dang ni// de nyid la gnas chu las byed// khang
54b2(gso rig): kan lhag ma'i gnas gyur pa'i// rten ni gang phyir byed gyur par// de phyir rten byed ces bshad do// gang zhig ma zhu'i gnas la gnas// de ni zas sogs 'drul byed pas// myags byed ces ni bya ba yin// myong byed lcer
54b3(gso rig): gnas ro tshor byed// rtas byed mgo gnas dbang po ni// tshim par byed do 'byor byed ni// tshig gsal gnas nas 'byor par byed// de ltar nang ni phal mo che// mi 'gyur bdag nyid can khyab kyang // gnas yin par ni shes bya ste//
54b4(gso rig): lus rnams kyang ni tha dad yin// rtsub sogs dro bar ldan pas ni// rlung ni sogs par 'gyur ba yin// grang bas ldang byed rlung la sogs// yon tan drod ldan zhi byed 'gyur// rno sogs bsil ba dang ldan pas// mkhris pa
54b5(gso rig): sogs par byed 'gyur la// dro bas ldang zhing ro rtul sogs// bsil bar ldan pas zhi bar 'gyur// snum sogs grang dang ldan pa yis// bad kan sogs par byed 'gyur la// gro bas ldang 'gyur de nyid ni// rtsub
54b6(gso rig): sogs yon tan gyis zhir 'gyur// rang gnas nyid du 'phel sogs yin// skyel 'gyur rgyu las 'khrug pa dang // mi mthun pa yi yon tan 'dod// ldang ba log pa'i lam zhugs nyid// rang gi rtags ni ston pa dang // bde
55a1(gso rig): med nang ni 'byung 'gyur ba'o// rang gnas gnas pa mnyam nyid dang // nad rnams ma byung zhi ba yin// sogs dang ldang dang rab zhi ba// rlung ni so ga sogs gsum tshe// mkhris pa dbyar la sogs par te//
55a2(gso rig): bA da kan dgun smad sogs par ro// yang dang rtsub pa la sogs pa'i// sman dang lus kyang de mtshungs pas// so ga rlung ni sogs gyur gyi// dro ba'i dus kyis lnga nga mi 'gyur// chu rnams 'ju ba sgyur ba dang // sman yang de rang 'dra /
55a3(gso rig): yis// mkhris pa sogs kyi dus kyi ni// grang pa nyid kyis ldang mi 'gyur// chu dang sman ni bsil ba dang // snum pas dus ni mtshungs 'gyur yang // dgun smad bang kan sogs 'gyur gyi// bsgongs pas ldang bar mi 'gyur gyi//
55a4(gso rig): de ltar dus kyi rang bzhin 'di// zas la sogs pa'i dbang gis na// dus la bab par ma gyur kyang // 'phral du sogs pa la sogs 'gyur// nad ni ldang gyur 'phral du lus// mgo nas rkang gi bar du khyab// ldog 'gyur chu yi rgyun
55a5(gso rig): bzhin du// cung zad cung zhig dag gis zhi// nang 'khrugs sna tshogs tshul can ni// grangs med par ni gyur pas lus// thams cad nye bar gzir gyur pa// de rgyu tshul dang sgrub pa dag/ re re nas ni bstan mi nus// de bas spyi yi brjod
55a6(gso rig): pa yin// nang rnams dag ni thams cad kyi// nyes pa'i rgyu ni gcig pu nyid// dper na bya ni ldings gyur pa// nyin rangs kun tu song gyur kyang // rang gi grib ma dang mi 'bra la// 'gro kun 'di dang 'dra ba yin// yang na ji ltar ma
55b1(gso rig): lus pa'i// 'gro ba mi 'dra sna tshogs 'di// yon tan gsum dang mi 'bral lo// de bzhin rang khams ma snyoms pa'i// rgyu yang gnas skabs thams cad du// nang rigs nyes pa gsum mi 'bral// de rnams kyi ni ldang ba'i rgyu//
55b2(gso rig): dbang don mi 'tshal phrad pa dang // dus dang nyes pa'i las rnams so// de yang sman lcug log sbyor bas// dbye ba rnam pa ga/ sum du 'gyur// dbang don rang yul chung ngu'am// mi sbyor ba ni sman pa ste// shas cher sdud pa lhag skyo
55b3(gso rig): bka rab 'phra'i 'od dang 'jigs pa dang // shin tu nye dang shin tu ring // yid du mi 'ong mi sdug pa'i// gzugs la mig ni lta byed pa// log sbyor de ni mi bzang yin// de bzhin rab glags rul la sogs// dbang don ji bzhin shes
55b4(gso rig): par bya// dus kyang grang dang tsha ba dang // char dus dbye ba gsum du 'dod// de dman grang sogs chung ba dang // lhag sbyor shin tu tshe mtshan nyid// rang gi mtshan nyid phyin ci log/ log pa'i sbyor ba yin par bshad// lus ngag yid kyi
55b5(gso rig): dbye bo yis// lngas kyi rnam pa gsum du bshad// lus la sogs pa'i las dman la// 'jug pa dman pa'i min can yin// brtun ngas 'jug pa lhag sbyor ba'o// shugs bkag pa dang btsir ba dang // mi bzang lus kyi las rnams
55b6(gso rig): dang // gcus dang rdeg 'chos gom 'khyor sogs// ldang bzhin smra bar byed pa dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang 'jig sogs dang // srog gcod la sogs las rnams dang // rnam bcu de yang smad pa yin// 'di dang gzhan du byas pa rnams//
56a1(gso rig): de dag ma lus log sbyor yin// 'di dag nad kyi rgyu yin no// ldang 'gyur de ni mtha' yas te// sna ma/ sa nad ni byed par 'gyur// yan lag nang gral lha tshogs brten// yan lag khrag sogs pags pa yin//
56a2(gso rig): de ni phyi rol nad gnas te// de brten ma zhu yan lag na// lba ba'i be snabs 'brum pa sogs// gzhang 'brum sman dang 'or nang sogs// de dag phyir rol nad ces bya// nang nad tsa sbubs chen po dang // ma zhu zhu ba'i gnas la brten//
56a3(gso rig): gnas de las ni skyug tshang 'khru// dmu rdzing lud pa dbugs mi dade// nang gi cha yi gzhang 'brum sbyangs// sman dang me dpal khong 'brum// mgo bo snying dang chu sau sogs// rus pa'i tshigs nad gnang yin no// de 'brel rtsa dang chu
56a4(gso rig): ba dang / chu ba chen sogs par ma yin// de la nang lam der sa pa// gcong chen gzhogs phyed 'jing kha yo// glang nang sogs pa sa rus dang // spyi yi gzer dang gdon nang sogs// 'byin khyab zug dang snyom pa dang /
56a5(gso rig): lus tsha nad gzer bya ba dang // 'jar zhing chag bskams yan ga 'khums// bsgongs dang rtse dang skom byed dang // 'dar dang rtsub dang long stong dang // skem dang mgul dang dkris snyam dang // rengs dang ro dka' bro ba'o// mdog ni
56a6(gso rig): gnag gam dmar ba dag/ rlung gi las yin mkhris pa'i las// lus tsha mdog dmar gro smin byed// rdul dang gnags dang 'jigs ma reng // 'drul dang rgyal zhing myos pa dang // kha'i ro kha dang sbyar ba dang // mdog skya dmar rtsa ma
56b1(gso rig): yin pa'o// bad kan las ni 'khrung zhing snum// ga ya' zhing khong drang lci ba dang // tshigs dam sha rgyas rmong bag dang // sgrang zhing gnyid che zas mi 'ju// mdog dkar kha ro lan tshwa mngar// las kyi mtha' las 'dam ring ngo // de ltar
56b2(gso rig): skad bshad pa yi// mtshan nyid kyis ni nad kun khyab// de ni ma yangs lta sogs pas// yang dag par ni shes par bya// nad kyi gnas skabs dbye shes pas// nang pa skad cig re rer blta// goms pas nges par thob
56b3(gso rig): 'gyur te// las rnams grub pa gsal byed yin// rin chen la sogs bzang nan shes// bstan bcos 'ba' zhig las mi 'byung // nang ni 'di ltar rnam gsum ste// la la tshe 'di'i nyes las byung // la la ston gyi nyes las
56b4(gso rig): byung / gzhan dag de gnyis 'dres las byung // nyes 'byung nang gzhi ji bzhin par// las skyes rgyu ni med pa yin// rgyu chung pa las dkyil che'i nad// nyes dang las las byung ba yin// dang po mi mthun bza' ba yin// las skyes
56b5(gso rig): las ni zad pa ste// gnyi ga las byung nyes dang las// zad pas zad par 'gyur ba yin// nang ni rang rgyud gzhan rgyud las// gnyis 'gyur mtha' ma'ang gnyis yin te// snga skyes snga ma'i tshul du bshad// phyi skyes pa ni
56b6(gso rig): bla gnyen yin// rang gnas ji bzhin gnas pa ni// rang rgyud can te mtshan nyid gsal// gzhan dag de las go bzlog pa// dri ma 'ang de bzhin shes par gyis// de ni nad de ldang ba ni// ma yengs pas ni shes bya ste// de rnams gtso bo
57a1(gso rig): zhi byas pas// zhi 'gyur zhi bar ma gyur na// de bzhin phyi nas gso bar bya// 'on te bla gnyen stobs chen// myur gso de nad kyis gzir ba// lus la shas cher gnod byed yin// nang la rnam par mi mkhas
57a2(gso rig): zhes// ngo tsha nam yang ma byed cig/ nad kyi 'gyur pa thams cad kyi// ming gi nges bstan yod pa min// nyes pa de nyid 'khrugs nas ni// khyad par du ni ldang gyur nas// gnas gzhan dag tu song nas ni// nad ni mang por byed par
57a3(gso rig): 'gyur// de bas nad kyi rang bzhin ni// rang gnas gzhan du 'phos pa dang // rgyu yi khyad par shes byas la// sman dpyad kyis gso myur du bya// gnod bya yul dang nyams stobs dus// me drod rang bzhin na tshod dang // snying stobs
57a4(gso rig): goms dang zas rnams kyi// gnas skabs rnam pa tha dad pa// 'di dag 'phra mo yan chad brtag/ nad dang sman gyi tshal brtags pos// gang zhig gso ba la 'jug pa// de ni nam yang 'khrul mi 'gyur// nang dkyil che ba'am
57a5(gso rig): nyung ba dag/ srog rmya lus nyams che chung las// gnod par byed pas snang 'gyur bas// de la'ang ma yengs nyid du gyis// sman pa ngan pa nang rnams ni// lci ba yang par yongs rtog cing / nang nyung dag tu brtags pa yi
57a6(gso rig): gso ba log pa dag tu 'gyur// de bas chung ba 'am stobs chung ba// skyil chen nad la rab tu sbyor// sbyangs pa chung ngur sbyar ba yis// nang ni shin tu spongs pa yin// sbyor ba lhag par skyo ba dang // log par sbyor bas phyin ci log/
57b1(gso rig): dri ma 'byung bar ma zad kyi// lus kyang shin tu ma rung 'gyur// de bas rtag tu brtson pa dang // thams cad kun tu legs brtags nas// ci nas nad med brtan gyur pa// de ltar sman dpyad sbyar bar gyis// de nas gzhan yang nang
57b2(gso rig): rnams nI// 'phel zad dbye bas bshad bya ste// tha dad pa las gsum shes bya// ldan gsum de yang de dgu yin// mnyam par 'phel bar gsum nyid de// gcig rab lhag pa drug tu 'gyur// ma lus pa las bcu gsum
57b3(gso rig): yin// gnyis gcig lhag pa las drug ste// mtshungs las gcig yin rab dang ni// rab mchog rtag pa laMs drug yin// de ltar nyi shu rtsa lnga ni// 'phel ba'o zad pa 'ang de snyed yin// de dag re re 'phel snyam zad// drug ste/
57b4(gso rig): slar yang de dag ni// gcig zad gnyis gnyis 'phel ba ni// go ldog bcas pas drug tu 'gyur// dbye ba drug cu gnyis su bstan// drug cu gsum pa bde gnas rgyu// de bzhin 'di dag dngas ma khrag sogs 'dres pa
57b5(gso rig): las// nang ni zad dang mnyam dang 'phel ba'i dbye ba yis// rab dang rab mchog dag las mtha' yas nyid 'gyur bar// rang bzhin ci 'dra ma yengs yid kyi shes par gyis// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/
57b6(gso rig): mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas nang gso ba'i thabs kyi le'u bshad par bya'o// rlung nad gso ba snum dang ni// dugs dang sbyang ba 'jam pa dang // mngar sbyar lan tshwa bro ba yi// zas dang bsku
58a1(gso rig): zhing mnye ba dang // dkri snum sman chu blugs pa dang // gro chang 'bras chang bu ram chang // snum gro 'jam rtsi gang ba ni// 'jam rtsi nges pa de dag dang // skye gnas du ma'i snum dag ni// drong che 'jub
58a2(gso rig): bye g.yos sgyur// khyad par du nI sha tshon dang // til mar dang sbyor 'jam rtsi bya// mkhris pa mar sar srung ba dang // mang raM zhing bsil ba'i bkru sman dang // mngar dang kha dang bska ba yi// zas dang sman ni sbyin pa dang // dri bzang
58a3(gso rig): bsil zhing yod 'ong ba'i// dri ni nye bar brten pa dang // mgul du do shal sen mo do// nor bu brang du gdags par bya// ga bur tsan dAn u shi ri'i// byug pas skad/ re re bsku// song la rdo thal can zlo gzer// yid 'ong gru
58a4(gso rig): dang bser bsil brten// ba ga phebs mdza' bo bde ba dang // bu la gzhon skad nyams rangs smra// chung ma yid mthun las byed cing // sdug cing yon tan rnams kyis brgyan// khang pa nyis rim chu bsil blugs// skyed mos
