58a5(gso rig): tshal rdzing bzang po ni// rgya che dang ni stegs bcas pa// chus brlan bye ma bsil ba dang // spyil bu lus tshad shing khebs dang // chu 'gram pad+mar bcas par ni// bder gnas khyad par 'o ma dang // mar sar bza' dang bkru
58a6(gso rig): spyan bya// bad kan cho gar ldan par ni// smyug sman klu sman rnon po btang // zas ni rtsub chung rno zhing dro// tsha zhing kha dang bska ba bza'// chang ni yun ring lon par tung // rtse dga' dang ni gnyid mi log/ rtsol ba'i tshul ni sna tshogs dang /
58b1(gso rig): sems las rtsub pas nye ba dang // khyad par sman zhu skyug sman btang // sbrang rtsi tshil 'joms sman bsten bya// bsnyung ba bdud bdug 'khur bkang dbo// bde ba med nyid bde phyir bya// nad rnams so sor gso ba dag/
58b2(gso rig): nad las dpagaswa te bshad pa yin// ldan pa dang ni 'dus pa dag/ de ni so so'i tshul bzhin brtag/ rlung ni zung du 'jug pas na// rlung mkhris phal cher so ga'i bya// byang kan rlung la dpyid kyi bya// bang kan mkhris
58b3(gso rig): pa ston gyi bya// nang ni skye la sogs dus su gsal// ldang na gzhan don med par gso// thams cad ljang ngan tshabs che ba// nang gzhan gnod pa med par gso// nad ni sbyor bas zhi bya ba// gang gzhan ldang bar byed
58b4(gso rig): pa dag/ de ni ngag min gzhan dag ni// lnga pa bar mi 'gyur rnam ngag yin// rtsol drag tsha ba rno ba dang // gnod par 'gyur pa spyad pas kyang // khong ba yan lag rus pa dang // gnang du rlung ni 'jug par 'gyur// de bzhin de la rtsa
58b5(gso rig): sgo ni// rnam par sbyangs pas 'byung bar 'gyur// smin byas rlung ni tshar bcad pas// khong pa'i nang du 'byung bar 'gyur// der gnas nas kyang rgyu dag la// sdod cing ring du thogs pa yin// de ni dus sogs stobs thob/
58b6(gso rig): nasas gzhan la brten yang ldang bar byed// de la gnas gzhan gnas pa ni// de nyid stobs ni med nyid la// gso bar bya ba rang gi ni// stobs kyis gzha na zil gnon byed na'o// bla gnyan nad ni zhi byas na// rang gnas gnas pa
59a1(gso rig): sa /
59a2(gso rig): Sh+Ta phywa nas s+ho/ u dug / gag sa / rgyun ldan smra / rnams mi 'gyu chos mi ma /
59a3(gso rig): Ad+d+hi sa~Mn+tagag zhi pa skyes zlog pa skyem/ dz+dza stobs rgyu nyid kyis// zlus ga ma 'dzu// dzin tho bar thugs pa d+mo// da pyas sar+b+ba yin pa
59a4(gso rig): zhan nga byang 'khrugs g-i 'a rgyag pan rgyun 'dam las b+h+yo // kaud+ha ba saM ng+ya na du/ chebs rnas pa'i rgyu sha / nga chathos da nga snres 'a da / gnod pa gnod byagadzad 'gyur ra /

59a6(gso rig): su du byu nga byung byed sa sa sa
59b1(gso rig): ma zhu'i gnas las nang myur bsel// nam tshong yan chad sna sman gyis// zhu ba'i gnas yod mas btang bsal// steng ngam 'og tu 'byung bar rtsom// nad ni rang nyid byung bas na// sman gyis nang ni maM dgag ste// bka ga na de
59b2(gso rig): nyid nad bskyed 'gyur// de bas dang por nang 'byung la// bsdang de phan par bza' bar bya// 'khyil ba smin pa de dang nges// smin byas de bzhin bsal bar bya// dbyar ston tha chung dpyid la 'bring // thun mong dus su rim bzhin du//
59b3(gso rig): so ga dbyar dang dgun bsags pa'i// rlung sogs nang ni myur du bsal// so ga dbyar dang dgun gyi tshe// rab tsha char dang grang ba'i dus// de rnams dus mtshams thun mo pa ste// de tshe nang ni mi bzang bsal// tha mal bde gnas
59b4(gso rig): dbang sbyar gyi// nang la nad kyi dbyang du ni// grang tsha char gyi dus dag gi/ gnyen po ji bzhin byas nas ni// sbyor ba'i dus su bab pa na// bya ba dus la mi bsdad do// sman ni ma zos zas sngon dang // dbus dang mtha' dang kham gyi
59b5(gso rig): b.raH/ zas bar tsheg bu zas btsos dang // zas mnan mtshan mo btung ba'o// bad kan rdo 'das nad pa ni// nyams stobs ldan la ma zos btang // thur ser rlung la zas lngar btang // mnyam gnas ldang la bar du yin//
59b6(gso rig): khyab byed nang bar zas za'i mthar// gyen rgyu'i rlung la dgongs ka'i'o// srog ces bya ba'i rlung ldang la// kham gyi bar dang zas par bza'// dug dang stug lung dbugs mi bde// skom dang skye la tsheg pu'o// yi ge 'chus la sna tshogs
60a1(gso rig): zas// sman dang zas bcos sbyar bar bya// skyigs bu lus padar lag 'dar dang // zas nyung zal mnan pa btang // nam 'tshong lan chung nang la ni// chen mo'i dus su btang ba bsngags// yan lag brgyad pa
60a2(gso rig): snying po bsdus pa las// mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas gso ba'i thabs rnam pa gnyis bstan pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o// gso ba rnam pa gnyis yin phyir// gso thabs
60a3(gso rig): rnam pa gnyis su 'dod // de gcig blta bar bya ba yin// gnyis pa nyams ni smad pa'o// de dag rgyas byas srung ba zhes// rnam grangs dag tu bshad pa yin// lus shA rgyas phyi rgyas bya ste// de ni phal cher sa chu dang // cig
60a4(gso rig): shos las ni 'gyur ba yin// lus gang snum dang dgag pa dang // dugs dang khong rtsub bya ba ste// 'byung ba'i de yang gnyis yin phyir// gnyis las 'da' bar mi byed do// de la'ang spring dang zhi bya ba// rnam pa gnyis po
60a5(gso rig): bsrung ba yin// gang zhig nang ni phyir 'byin pa// sbyang yin de ni rnam lnga ste// mus btang stug sman lus nang bkru// mgo yi nad bkru gtaru gas dbyung // gang zhig nang ni mi steng dang // snyom gnas klong pa ma
60a6(gso rig): yin dang // ma snyoms snyoms par byed pa dag/ zhi bo yin te de rnams bdun// sprin dang drod bskyong bkris skom dang // rtsol bcag nyi chen bser bu bsil// rta ba dag ni rlung dang ni// rlung bcas mkhris pa zhi byed yin//
60b1(gso rig): rta bya nang dang sman dang chang // bud med mya ngan gyis nyams chung // khur dang lam dang glo brdol dang // lus rtsub nyams dma' rlung shas che// sbrum ma bu btsas byis pa rgan// so ga'i dus dang gzhan yang rta// shwa dang 'o ma ka ra dkar//
60b2(gso rig): mar sar mngar bag mas btang dang // gnyid log ngal bde bsku byug dang // khrus dang bde gnas nyams dga' rta// gcin snyi ma zhu snum rab zos// rims btab brla rengs mdze na canA/ shu ba khong 'bras mcher pa na//
60b3(gso rig): klang nAd lkog nad mig nA dA dang // sbom po dgun dang gzhan dge kyang // rtag tu sbyang bar bya ba yin// de la sbyang bya shas che sbom// stobs ldan mkhris pa bad kan rgyas// ma zhu'i nang dang rims dang skyug/ tshad par 'khru
60b4(gso rig): dang snying na can// lus lci sgregs mang gshang gci 'gags// yi ge 'chus sogs kyis na ba// 'bring tsam sbom sogs phal cher ni// dang por smin dang drod bskyed bya// nang ni 'di dag gis nyams thag/ sbom dang stabs
60b5(gso rig): sogs chung ba la// bkres dang skom pas tshar bcad // nad kyis nyam thag stobs 'bring brtan// bser bu tsha rtsol gyis smang na// nyam chung mi lta smos ci dgos// nyams smad bya ba rta mi bya// rta bya nyams smad 'jam pos bya//
60b6(gso rig): yang na yul dang stobs sogs las// rigs pas de ni nye bar spyad// rta bas stobs ni 'phel ba dang // de yis bsgrub bya'i nang zad 'gyur// bsnyung ba dbang gsal dri ma rnams// mi sr-i khong yang yi ge 'byed// bkres dang skom
61a1(gso rig): pa lhan cig 'byung // dang ga snying dang sgregs pa dag/ nad kyi rtse zhil spro ba che// snyom bag med pa dag tu 'gyur// de dag tshang la sogs pa dang // mi ldan rten par byed pa dag/ rab sdom rab tu
61a2(gso rig): skem sogs 'gyur// de yang sman bcas bshad pa yin// tshul ni shin tu rta ba dang // nyams slong de nyid las shes bya// shin tu tshe tshes 'byung gcin snyi// rims dang dmu rdzing mtshan par rdol// lus rmongs gcin sri ba
61a3(gso rig): snabs chags// medze la sogs pa mi bzang 'byung // de la tshil dang rlung pad kan// sel bar byed pa thams cad phan// dzur khre rgong ku lang+ga// nas dang sran chung mon sran dre'u// dar ba dar rnying zho ga chu// sems las bya dang
61a4(gso rig): mi nyal bya// sbrang rtsi 'bras bu gsum bcas pa 'am// sle tres bla skrad I ru ra// ster khaN+Da dang rtsa ba ni// chen po lnga dang gu gul dang // brag zhun g+hi ni sbyor ba dang // ag+ni man+t+ra'i khu bcas phan// nas tshig 'khus thal bi T+wAM ka/
61a5(gso rig): bca' sga lcags phye sbrang rtsi dang // nas dang skyu ru'i phye ma yi// sbyor bas shin tu tsho nad sel// tsha gsum 'bras gsum pu rtse shel// shi kru bi dang zong s+thi ra// shin kuni go stong kha ru tsha// la la phung dang 'u su dang // kru trugaM bkres
61a6(gso rig): dang ser po gnyis// br-i ha gnyis dang chu rtsi mo// ha pu sha dang pa ta dang // ke pu ka yi rtsa ba ste// 'di rnams phye ma mar sbrang rtsi// til mar ngag ni cha mnyams pa// nas phye'i cha ni bcu drug bskyed// sbyar ba 'thungs na nga 'jom sa
61b1(gso rig): shin tu shas che bdag nyid kun// gzhan yang de 'dra'i nad rnams dang // snying nad mig ser sha bkra dang // lus dbugs mi bde lkog nad sel// blo dang yid gzhungs sems dran byed// zas 'ju pho bA'i drod kyang bskyed//
61b2(gso rig): srung grags rab skem mgo 'khor lung // skom dang che zhing yi ge 'chus// snum drod gnyid mig rna ba nyis// khu ba gzi mdangs skad mdangs zang // chu so snying klang byin pa brla// sku do rtsib logs ni rims 'debs// tshig mang stong du
61b3(gso rig): rlung nang 'jug/ gnya' shing skyug bro rus tshigs na// bshang gci sri ba la sogs pa// sbyang ba drags pa 'byung bar 'gyur// bar du tsho bas skem gnyid mchog/ shin tu cho drag pa yi sman// rta bar byed pa thams cad
61b4(gso rig): sbyor// sems las med dang ngag 'a ba dang // nges par brta bar bya ba dang // gnyid cher log pa'os skem pa yang // phag dang 'dra bar lus rgyas 'gyur// lus ni rtas shing 'tsho byed pa// sha dang 'dra ba gang yang med// sha mi za
61b5(gso rig): ba sha za'i shas// lus ni shin tu rtas byed yin// sbom la nyams smad lci bas bya// de las bzlog pa skem la phan// nas dang gro ni gnyis kA la// de las 'os par byed pas brtag/ nad kyi dbye ba tha dad kyi// gcod 'khru la sogs
61b6(gso rig): dbye ba yis// nang ltar tha dad gyur kyang ni// gso ba gnyis las yod ma yin// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas sbyangs pa la sogs pa sman gyi sde tshan
62a1(gso rig): 'dus pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o// po son cha dang shing mngar dang // ku ba kha bo nim+ba dang // bim+b+ha ga gon bi sha la// dug mo nyung dang murba dang // de ba da li byi dang ka/ lcang ma tsi tra klu trug tres// ko sha pa ti
62a2(gso rig): ka rany+dza// pi pi ling dang rgyam tsha dang // shu dag sug smel yungs kAr te// 'di dag skyug pa'i sman gyi sde// ran+ti dang ni traM bit+ti// 'bras bu gsum dang bai sha la// shaM ki ni dang sU ha dang // seng phrom dong ga ni l-i ni// khron bu dang ni kaM
62a3(gso rig): bi l+ya/ 'o ma ba gcin 'khru bar byed// po son 'cha' dang dug mo nyung ka ru rta de ba da li dang // shing mngar shu dag rtsa ba bcu// thang shing ra sna la la phud// sha ta puSh+pa ba ta la// rgya sran nag po sbrang rtsi dang // rgyam tsha lce tsha shing nye ro//
62a4(gso rig): 'di dag mas bkru sman gyi sde// a ba ma d+ha byi tang ka/ tsha ba gsum dang skyer ba'i rtsa// su ra la dang shi ri sha/ 'bri hA shing bkru'i sa bon dang // seng ldeng ma du ka'i snying po// rgya ma tsha dngul rdo pha bong dreg/ sug smel gnyis dang go stong
62a5(gso rig): sbom tu mgo bo nad sbyong byed pa yin// thang shing rgya spos ru rta dang // rtsa ba bcu dang ba la gnyis// bi ra ta ra'i sman sder gtogs// bi da ri sogs rlung nad sel// du rba dang ni byi tsher pa// nim+ma ba sha ka'i lo ma// kha sral phre'u 'ol ma se//
62a6(gso rig): nye'u shing pa zhes bya dang // shi ta pa ki s+thi yang+ku// n+ya gro d+ha sogs shug pa sogs// s+thi ra rnam gnyis pad+ma'i zer// baM n+ya thal tres sogs ma khris sel// dong ga sogs dang arga sogs// mu ka ga sogs o son sogs// bye'u ruH/
62b1(gso rig): bA sogs gla sgab sogs// dug mo nyung sogs pad kan sel// dzA ban+ti dang ram nye ba// me da ma hA me da dang // mung+ga mA Sha parti dang // ldum bu zangs rtsib dang ni// dzI pa ka dang shing mngar te// sde 'di 'tsho byed ces bya
62b2(gso rig): yin// bi da ri dang e ran dang // phri shi khA li puR+sha rnA// de ba ha sa de ba dang // par+Ni gnyis dang kha sral dang // 'tshe byed lnga dang rtsa chung dang // thal tres dang ni ldum pa dang // han+ma pa ti zhes bya rnams// bi da ra sogs 'di snying phan//
62b3(gso rig): nyam chung rlung dang mkhris pa sel// lus skem skran tshigs yan las na// dbugs mi bde dang lud pa lu// sel bar byed pa'i sde tshan yin// thal tres dang ni bu shal rtse// tang pal dang naM ma du ka/ tsan dan dkar dang dmar ba
62b4(gso rig): dang / shing mngar pa ru sha ga rnams// tshad pa mkhris pa khrag rgyas dang // skom dang rims kyis btab pa sel// shug pa puN+Da ri ka dang // bi d+hi rid+hi tsu gang dang // sring gi sle tres 'tsho byed bcu// nu zho skyed byed rlung khris sel//
62b5(gso rig): nyam chung tshim byed rtas byed la// 'tsho byed ro tsa nyid du byed// ba ru sha dang 'bras bu gsum// rgun 'brum dang ni kat+pa la// ta ka ka'i 'bras ra dza dan// se'u 'bru ba ra da ru rnams// skom dang che dang gcin sr-i dang // rlung gi nang rnams sel
62b6(gso rig): byed yin// any+dza na dang pha li ni// spang spros pad+ma ut+pa la// skyer khaN+Da dang sug smel dang // shing mngar nA ga ge sar bcas// dug dang nang gi tsha ba dang // mkhris pa rgyas pa sel bar byed// pa to la dang pu rtse shel// tsan dan dkar po murba
63a1(gso rig): dang // sle tres sro lor bcas pa dag/ bang kan mkhris pa mdze dang rims// dug dang skyug bro yi ga 'chus// mig ser gyi ni nad rnams 'joms// sle tres dang ni shug pa dang // nim+ba'u su'i 'bras
63a2(gso rig): bu dang // tsan dan dmar po zhes bya rnams// mkhris pa dang ni bad kan dang // rims dang skyug po lus tsha dang // skom dang cher 'phel me drod bskyed// dong ka dang ni dug mo nyung // ka ka tig+na pa ta li// nu pa sle tres dur+Ya dang // lur+Ya
63a3(gso rig): dang ka tang dang // pa tha ci skrigs she r+ya ka/ ka rany+dza gnyis pa to la// lo ma bdun pa kru krug tres// su sha bi dang po son 'cha' kas ha ra tsa zhes bya dang // rgya shug gi ni 'bras bu rnams// de ni smon bro mdze nad dang // dug dang rims dang
63a4(gso rig): bad kan dang // g.yan pa dang ni gcin snyi dang // skra reng ba rnams sbyong bar byed// a sa naM dang ti sha/ sdug pa da pa dang / bar dang sing ljang dang // bat+ta dang ni shaM ba/ a tsa sid+d+hi tsAr ngan gsum// ta la a kar bla
63a5(gso rig): sa l+yA khA ra pa dza dang // d+ha ba bA ti ka p+pa tog/ tsha ga kaR+sha bang cha ka/ tha rims zhes ni bya ba ste/ a sa ra sa kyi/ dza rang bang ka dang // sr-i 'ang sgra rbab gcin sti dang // tshe ches nang ni sil bar byed/
63a6(gso rig): ka gnyis// nyer zhing tsi tri mo ra Ta// bikra a dza sr-ing gi dang // 'dri ha ti ni rnam gnyis dang / ma sogs bang kan tshal// me drong chung dang rlung nang 'khyims// klang pa na 'a
63b1(gso rig): zhing // skran dang khong 'bras 'joms pa yin// shing kun spangs ma ru sha ka/ rgyam tsha brag zhun nag tshur gnyis// gcin sri rde'us 'gags pa dang // smyan dang tshil ches bad kaMn sel// be lan+ta ra a ra ni// sgra rtog bri sha sra sru'i
63b2(gso rig): rtsan/ a ka ta dang gze ma dang // sa ha tsa ra ba na dang // ka sha brik+Sha da ni dang // 'dam bu ku sha rnam gnyis dang // ku tha dang ni kha sral dang // ba lu ka dang mo ra ta// ku ru tA dang ka daM pa// lcam pa zhes bya'i sman sde 'di// be lan+na ra la sogs
63b3(gso rig): pa Tha rlung las gyur pa'i nang 'joms shing // rde'u rde'u phye yo dang // gcin sri ba yau nang rnams sel// gsang phrom sha ba ra ro tra// pa lak+Sha dang d+hIn+ti ni// thang shing ka pa la ra sna// ka tam+ba dang chu shing dang // e laM ba lu a
63b4(gso rig): sho ka/ pa ri be la mo tsa ka/ 'di ni seng phro ma sogs shes bya// tshil ches bad klan sel ba'i sde// mngal nad 'joms shing 'khru ba gcod // mdog ngan dug nad sel byed yin// arga dang ni a larga// nA ga dan+ti byi sha l+ya//
63b5(gso rig): gag pra ra sna bri sh+tsa ka la// a ba marga ka rany+dza// ka ka nga ni ka rany+tsa// gi ti gar gnyis i gu dang // argal sogs sde tshan 'di// bad kan tshil ches dug rnams sel// srinA na da dang ni mdze nang 'joms// khyad par du ni rma la phan//
63b6(gso rig): bye'u rug rnam gnyis ku the ra// ka la ma le bi TI ka/ kha ra pa tra kat+pa la// bri sha kar+Ni ka shun+ti/ ske tshe ka bing+ga'i lo ma// ga pra mon sne'u ka mu ka/ rgang mar bi sha muSh+Ti dang // bu srin dang b+ha bo'o// bye rug pa la sogs kyi sde// bang kan tshil
64a1(gso rig): ches srin nang sel// cham pa yi ga 'chus lung pa// dbugs mAM bde 'joms rma reng sbyong // mustA dang nI sU ha dang // 'bras bu gsum dang tsi trA ka/ pA la sha dung rnga ba dang // shi sh+tsa ba zhes bya ba rnams//
64a2(gso rig): sman dang gcin nang rde'u chags// skya rbab dang ni tshol ches nad// bad kan rgyas dang khu ba yis// nad rnams sel bar byed pa yin// dug mo nyung dang murba dang // par gyi dang nI pu tse shel/ na le shaM dang po da dkar// chu sgeg
64a3(gso rig): sug spel pa ta dang // yungs ka ro zi ra u ra lu/ a za mo dang po son 'chal// shu dag zir nag po dang // shing kun dang ni bI tang+ga// pa shu gan+d+ha tsha ba lnga// rlung dang bang kan tshil ches dang // cham pa sman dang rims dang
64a4(gso rig): gzer k+Sha gzhang 'brum gyi ni nad rnams sel// shu dag bla sgang thab shing dang // dong gra bong nga a ru ra// ser po gnyis dang shing mngar dang // pri sna par+Ni dug mo nyung // shu dag yung pa la sogs sde// be'u snabs tshad mar
64a5(gso rig): 'khru smin gcod// tshil ches bad kan rgyas rlung 'phel// nu ma'i nad rnams sel bar byed// pri yi ku dang ra gan dud// lig pu mig dang btang zil dang // ldum rtsa pad+ma ge sar dang // btsong dang ya ba sha ka dang // shal+la
64a6(gso rig): si dang de'i khu ba dang // sa mang+ga dang pu na ma// tsan dan da ta ka'i me tog/ aM pa sha dang shing mngar dang // na ma ka ra tu ni shing // rgya skyegs shing dang kha ru tsha// seng phrom bil rkang dad ki// pad+ma'i ge sar ka ta ka/
64b1(gso rig): sri yaM e pa sha sde gnyis// zhu ba'i tshad par 'khru ba sel// 'byor byed mkhris pa dag la phan// rma yang 'tshob par byed pa yin// gla sgang shu dag kru drug tres// ser po gnyis dang kha ba gnyis// go bye pa ta 'bras
64b2(gso rig): bu gsum// khong nga dkar nag ru rta dang // su ga smel dang ni shu dAg rnamaso// nu zho mngal nad dri ma sel// n+ya gro d+ha dang a shr-ing+tha// u dum+ba ra seng phrom gnyis// 'dzam+bu gnyis dang ardzu na// ka pat+ti dang katA la// sla kra a mra ltung
64b3(gso rig): ma dang // bI ya la dang ba la sha nan+ti rgyu shug ka dam+ba// bI ra shing mngar ma du ka/ n+ya gro d+ha sogs sde tshan 'di// sa 'tsho 'khru gtsang chag grugs sbyor// tshul ches khrag mkhris skom dang tshe// mngal gyi nang rnams sel
64b4(gso rig): khar byed// e la gnyis dang du ru ka/ ru rta gan+d+ha pr-i yi ku// spang pos pa la bya ma ka/ s+t+ri kra tso ra tso tsha dang // shing tsha gan+da pra tra dang // rgya sbos po la the na ya// rgya mtsho'i lbu ba chu srin sem// thab shing dang ni a ka ru// gur gum shi ri ba
64b5(gso rig): sa katsAn dan gu gul rtse pog dkar// bu nr-i mra dang kun tu ru// nA ga ge slar zhe bya'o// e la sogs te rlung bAd kan// dug rnams sel zhing mdog gsal byed // g.yan pa thor bu'i nang rnams dang // sha ka bas ljags sel bar byed//
64b6(gso rig): sha ma dan+ni kra ban+ti// ku tha ra na gra mu ga/ shing+ge ni dang sang la// khron bu dang ni ga bak+She// su dag shi ra kaM pi la// sle tres dong ga ka rany+dza// ba sha an+d+ra shing kru dang // a pra shing ro tsha'i 'bras bu// dur bying la sogs sde chen 'di// skran dang
65a1(gso rig): dug dang yi ga 'chus// bang kun dang ni snying nang dang // gcin sgri ba yi nang rnams 'joms// de ltar sum cu rtsa gsum bshad// sde tshan de las ma rnyed na// de dang mtshungs pa gzhan dang sbyar//
65a2(gso rig): 'dra'i sbyor ba spang bar bya// sde chen de dag gnod dang gnod bya tshogs ltos pa// cho ga bskol dang snum dang lhag pa la sogs ldan// btung dang snang spyod las stong yang na phyi rol tu// bsku zhing byugs pas shin tu gas dka' nang
65a3(gso rig): kun 'joms// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bco lnga pa'o// / de nas snum gyi cho gar bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// snum byed sman rnams phal cher ni// lci zhing bsil ba
65a4(gso rig): khong 'khru snum// rdul dang bral la mnyen zhing brlan// de las bzlog pa rtsub byed yin// zhun mar rkang dang tshil til mar// snum rnams kyi ni mchog rab 'dod// de dag las kyang zhun mar ni// sbyor byed 'jug pas mchog yin no// de
65a5(gso rig): ga sngon bzhin mkhris pa sel// phyi ma bzhin du cig shos sil// mar bas til mar lci de bas// tshil te tshil las rka lci'o// de las gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi// zung dang gisum pa tshe zhes bya// dugs bya sbyang bya chang bud med//
65a6(gso rig): rtsol chags sems las che ba dang // rgan po byis pa stobs chung steg/ rtsub dang khrag dang khu ba zang // rlung nad kyis nyen rab rib dang // shin tu dbye dka' la sbrum bya// shin tu drong chung rab drong che// shin tu sbom dang ring ba dang // brla rengs
65b1(gso rig): tshang 'khru ma zhu dang // lkog nang dbyig dug dmu rdzing dang // brgya la skyug pa kan yI ga 'chus// skom dang chang nad kyis nyen dang // dus min bu skyes sna sman dang // mas btang bkru sman byas la min// de la blo ldan yid gzhungs
65b2(gso rig): sogs// 'dod pa rnams la zhun mar bsngags// rmen bu ba kAn srin bu dang // tshil ches rlung nang yod pa dang // lus yang 'khrang 'dod lto sra ba'i// lus can rnams la til mar phan// rlung dang nyi tshan lam bud med// khur dang rtsol
65b3(gso rig): bas lus zungs zad// rtsub nyon mongs bzod me drod so// rtsa sgo rlung 'gags lhag ma phan// tshil dang rus pa gnang rnams dang // lto na mes tshig rma byung lhung // mngal dang na ba klang nang dang // tshil yang mchog tu phan pa yin// til
65b4(gso rig): mar dbyar phan zhun mar ni// dbyar mtha'o de bzhin dpyid kyang bsngags// thun mong dus la snum rnams ni// nyin mo nyi ma gsal tshe bsngags// rims la dgun yang til mar btang // tsha ba'i dus su 'ang mar mtshan btang // mkhris
65b5(gso rig): pa rlung dang mkhris par bcas// ldan pa la yang mtshan mo nyid// mtshan mo las gzhan rlung bing kan// nyin par sbyar bas mkhris nang 'gyur// za sogs zas dang mas btang dang // sna nas btang bsku khur bkang du'o// ma go bskus sna
65b6(gso rig): mig dag pa yis// snum ni rigs par spyad par bya// ro yi dbye ba ro raM yis// drug cu rtsa bzhir rnam par brtag/ snum ni gzhan gyis zil gnon zhing // chung ngu dogs pas rim par bshad// ji skad bshad pa'i rgyu med pas// dngas
66a1(gso rig): ma btung la spyad mi dgos// snum gyis las ni myur bsgrub pas// snum de'i cho ga mchog yin no// gang zhig thun ni gnyis dang bzhi// brgyad kyis rim bzhin 'jug 'gyur ba// tshad chung 'bring
66a2(gso rig): dang che ba ste// de las chung ngu bza' ba mchog/ nad la sogs la brtags nas ni// thog mar shin tu chung du bza'// snga de'i zas ni zhu nyid na// sbrang phyir dngas ma mang du btung // zhi bya ltogs bcas zas med par// 'bring tshad tsam
66a3(gso rig): ni bsngags pa yin// blta ba sha dang sha khu sogs// de yang 'bras can nyung bcas pa// byis pa rgan po skom gyis brdungs// snum 'bras tshang dang che ba dang // bud med snum ni rtog bsten dang // drod chung bde dang dka' mi bzod//
66a4(gso rig): lho sI nad skyel chung tsha dus// nyam chung pa la bsngags pa yin// dang po bar dang zas rjes zos// lus kyi smad par stong las 'byung // nang rnams sel zhing lus kyi stobs// bskyod pa'i rim bzhin byed pa yin// de na legs par
66a5(gso rig): smin phyir dang // khar chags pa ni phyi ba'i phyir// snum dang 'thung rjes chu tshan btung // e raN pa la ta ka ra min// zhu 'am ma zhu'i dogs skyes na// slar yang chu tshan btung bar bya// des ni sgregs pa dag 'gyur zhing // de las khod
66a6(gso rig): yang yi gar 'ong // nang par 'thung ngam 'thungs pa dang // 'thungs par gyur che kha zas ran// gshor dro bad kan mi bskyed dang // shin tu snum min 'dres min za// kha lag chu dron gyis bkru zhing // bud med mi bsten mtshan mo nyal//
66b1(gso rig): shugs dgag drag shul las rnams dang // khro dang mya ngan nyin tshan grang // bser bu'i khar 'dug rta zhon 'gro// mang sgra rab mtho'i stan la 'dug/ rngas nI rab mtho rab dma' dang // nyin nyal dung rdul gnas pa spang //
66b2(gso rig): gang gi nyin mo 'thungs gyur pa// de ltar gzhan la'ang spang bar bya// rim 'di las rnams thams cad dang // nad zad pa la spyad par bya// zhi ba'i snum gyi nyer spyad ni// bkru sman btang ba lta bur bya// lto snyi zhun mar zhag gsum
66b3(gso rig): btung ka/ lto sra ba yis zhag bdun btung // yang na ji srid snum par btung // de phan chad ni goms par 'gyur// rlung ni bde gyur mau dro da 'bar// bshang pa snum zhing mi sri la// snum mi 'dod cing snyoms 'gyur ba// snum legs yin
66b4(gso rig): te rtsub go bzlog/ snum grags pa yis skye ba dang // sna dang kha rku ba las 'dzag 'gyur// tshad dang mi ldan dus min gnod// zas dang spyod lam log pa yis// snum chos byed skad gzhang 'grum dang // khong rma rengs shing sems
66b5(gso rig): myos dang // g.yan pa mdze dang rims skyug gzer// lto ltos mgo 'khor la sogs 'gyur// de la bkres skom skyug sman dug/ zas skom sman ni rtsub pa dang // dar ba chang snying tshong ma dang // 'bru rgod ci tse khre rgod dang // sbrang rtsi 'bras
66b6(gso rig): gsum pi pi ling // ba gcin gu gul a ru ra// nad dmigs sau ji bzhin du// snum las nang gyur bcos thabs yin// rtsub pa dag ni smyung byas dang // shin tu byas dang 'dra ba yin// rlon dro skam sa las byung snum// sha khu
67a1(gso rig): btung zhing dugs sbyang bya// khrus byed pa 'am sgyug sman gtong // snum byas zhag gsum gnas par bya// nyin zhag zhan pa gcig cig ni// de bskyed pa yis bad kan bskyed// sha che tshil che
67a2(gso rig): bad kan+da mang // me yi 'ju drod mi snyoms dang // snum lo goms pa'i snum byi rnams// de ni sngon du rtsub chos bya// de nas snum byas sbyangs 'gyur na// de la snum nad mi 'byung ngo // snum la goms par gyur pa sta na//
67a3(gso rig): ma mthon par nus pa yin// byis pa rgan po la sogs pa// snum spong bar ni mi nus la// skyo bar mi byed sbyor ba 'dis// 'phral du snum ni sbyar bar bya// de la mar brngos sha khu dang // mar dang brdos pa'i thug pa 'am// til che
67a4(gso rig): snum bcas bu ram chung // bcas dang dkri sa rA dang ni// 'o thug mar mang dro ba 'am// bu ram zho dang bcas pa 'am// thug pa snum ni bzhi pa la// lnga pa 'bras dang ldan par bya// bdun pa de dag 'phral snum bya// snum rnams lan tshwa
67a5(gso rig): cher btab pa// do nA bad kan bskyeng rtsub min// 'phra zhing dro la lus khyab byed// mdza dang sgra nang gcin sti la// bu ram btsas zas 'o ma sha/ trail dang ma sha chang dang zho// snum bya'i don du mi bya'o// 'bris gsum paM pi ling sru
67a6(gso rig): gu la/ a ru ra la sogs bskol bas// de dag snum la ji bzhin du// gnod pa med par sbyar bar bya// nad kyis nyams chung gyur pa la// lus drod stobs bskyeng nus pa btang // skyes bu snum la brten par byed pa rnams// nang gi drod
67b1(gso rig): 'bar khong pa dag pa dang // lus zungs 'phral rta stobs dang mdog bzang ldan// dbang brtan rgas sra lo brgya thub par bshad// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu drug
67b2(gso rig): pa'o// de nas dugs kyi cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o// dugs sro bcing dang tha mal pa// chu dugs dbye bas rnam pa bzhi// sro ba gos dang lcags dang ni// lag mthil la sogs mer sror bsro// bcing ba shu dag sdang
67b3(gso rig): ma dang // thang shi sha tha puSh+pa dang // 'bru kun dri rnams r-i sna dang // e raN+Da tsa sha dag dang // snum bag tsha dang dar ba dang // 'o mas sbrus shing tshwa cher btab// rlung las byung ba 'ba' zhig sel// bang kan 'dres la be'u rug sogs//
67b4(gso rig): mkhris pa 'dres la shug+sa saur kyis// brlan pa zhes bya yang ya bya bkri ba snum zhing nus pa dro// sku 'jam pags rul mun pas dkri// ma rnyed rlung 'joms lo ma dang // dar dang snam bu ras kyis dkri/ mtshan mo dkris pa nyin par
67b5(gso rig): dkrol// nyin par byas pa mtshan mo dkrol// tha mal pa yi khro ba dang // bong ba gyo mo rdos phye// gso ma'i lo ma 'bru rnams dang // lci ril bye ma phub ma rnams// thabs rnams du mas legs bsros pa// yul dang dus las dpags
67b6(gso rig): te sbyar// chu dugs shing bkru ba ra na// e raN+Da dang ka rany+dza// be'u rus pa dang ardza ka/ shi ri sha dang ba sha ka/ 'od ma arga ma la ti// ya ba sha ka'i lo ma krum// shu dag la sogs sman rnams dang // gsher sa chur gnas sha rnams
68a1(gso rig): dang // rtsa bcu nang dmigs ji bzhin du// so so 'am lhan cig sbyar nas ni// snum ldan chang dang tsha dang ni// 'o ma chu sogs kyis btsos la// bum pa 'am sbu gu ring po ni// bkang la nad kyis nyam thag pa'i//
68a2(gso rig): lus ni gos kyis dkris nas su// ci bde bar ni snum chu blugs// lus la rlung nang zhugs gyur pa// de nyid kyis 'dir bkang snong du// nad pa zhugs te gnas na ni// gcin sri gzhang 'brum sogs nang sel// rlung med phyi nang
68a3(gso rig): rlung bcas shing // zas 'ju'i dus su dugs dpyad bya// nang dang nad pa yul dus kyi// dbang las chung 'bring chen po bya// bad kan gyis nyen la rtsub bya// bad kan rlung las rtsub snum bya// rlung ni mau zhu'i gnas zhugs dang // bang
68a4(gso rig): kan zhu ba'i gnas bsten la// gnas kyi dbang gis rtsub dugs dang // de bzhin snum lngar 'gro dugs bya// sta zur dag dang mig dang snying // rlig pa nyung ngu 'am bya ba min// dugs kyis drang dang zug gzer bral// yan lag
68a5(gso rig): mnyen par gyur pa dang // ngal gyis mnyes la khrus byas nas// de nas snum gyi cho ga bsten// dugs grags pa yis khrag mkhris 'khrugs// skom brgyal skad 'gags yan lag 'dzum// mgo 'khor tshigs ni
68a6(gso rig): rims 'debs shing // tshig gu mar po tal til snang // lums kyi skyug bro bar 'gyur te// der ni zhi bya'i sman gyis gso// dugs dang thal sman me btsa' dang // tshang 'khru skyug bro brgyal nang giso// dugs ni phal char lce
68b1(gso rig): dra rno// de las gzhan pa zhi byed yin// gsher zhing brtan 'khru snum pa dang // rtsung cing sra ba dugs spyan yin// 'jam dang rtsub dang zhi 'jar bag/ gsher bag de ni sel byed yin// mdor na phal cher kha ba dang //
68b2(gso rig): bska dang mngar ba de sman yin// zhi zhing rtse bcil stobs thob 'gyur// ji skad bshad pa'i nad rnams zad// bcil drags pags pa sha 'khums shing // 'dar snying kha 'gram nang du 'gyur// kha mchu lag pa pags
68b3(gso rig): nag 'gyur// bcil drags pa yin nang du bshad// shin tu sbom dang rtsub pa dang // nyam chung brgyal bar gyur pa dang // dugs drags bcos dgos blo brdol dang // skem dang chang nad kyis btab dang // ra ba rib dmu rdzing shu ba
68b4(gso rig): mched// mdze nad 'or nang rlung mkhris dang // 'o ma zho dang mar sbrang rtsi// 'thungs dang bkru sman btang ba dang // lus gnad tshig dang gzhang nang yod// khro dang mya ngan 'jigs pas nyen// bkres skom mig ser skya rbab dang //
68b5(gso rig): gcin nang mkhris nad zla mtshan 'dzag/ snum dang bu skyes dugs mi bya// nang tshabs chen 'jom por bya// cham pa lung pa dbugs mi bde// skyigs bu lto spos bshang 'gags dang // skad 'gags rlung ni nad rnams dang // bad kan
68b6(gso rig): be snabs 'khyil zhing lci// lus rengs skeng pa'i rtsib logs dang // sgur dang lto nang 'gram nad dang // rlig pa spangs dang ngargan nad// rtsol dang rlung nad kyi zug dang // gcin 'gags thor bu sman bu dang // khu ba bkag dang rlung
69a1(gso rig): 'khyims la// de yi sman gyi dbye ba yis// dugs ni so so ji bzhin bya// dug sa phan me yi sro min pa// rlung nang tshil dang bang kan can// rlung med khang par rtsol ba dang // gos lci nga dang 'jigs
69a2(gso rig): dang // dkri dang stobs 'gyed dro ba dang // chang mang bkres dang nyi tshan bzhag/ nad gang nang grol gnas pa'i lus gzungs gnas// rtsar song rkang lag rus pa'i nang song pa'i// nang de dugs kyis bsrul bar rgyas nas ni// khong
69a3(gso rig): bsdus la sbyangs pa spyis dbyung bya// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// mdo gnas kyi // sngar dang bkru sma ga
69a4(gso rig): par b+h+yo'o// bang kon rang dmi 'dris yi// khad+ma kan rgyus la stug sman bting // de bzhin ma khris pa bkra sgra khyA thA r+yA d+ya ni// mkhrisayad+b+ha g+h+ra ga dang // mdzo dang gtso nAd 'dus
69a5(gso rig): ba mo mi dran lung pa can// dbugs mi bde snying 'byor 'bras mchid// nu ma'i nang dang ro stang nang // khyod par dubya// sgeg sngon mo bye tid dru khang rtag/ bkris dang rtag tu sdug bsngal / na rnam
69a6(gso rig): snying na/ glo skam smas dang nyams chung dang // rtag tu sngon dang mcher ba ni// rab rib ljo na srin bu yod// rlung khrag 'a dran par zin du 'byung // so na mas btang skang mdzer dang // gcin sr-i ri mu rdzing sbran can dang // blon na drong che gan
69b1(gso rig): 'brum can// rtug skam mgo 'khor rtsib logs sra// rtsib logs zug dang rlung can no// de dag dug 'thungs ma zhu dang // mi 'phrod zas zas ma gtogs so// rtag tu smon pa yan chad dang // pal cher ma
69b2(gso rig): dag dang // maHnu ba ni thams cad la'ang // dud pas bdug par las kun yangango // bkru sman gyis gso spyan gzhang 'brum// 'brum bu mig ser gzhogs phyed lci// rims rnying ngamu rdzing dbyig dug dang // skyug dang ma cher nang sku
69b3(gso rig): rbab dang // long nad rab rig sngon por gyur// mchi 'dzag zhu ba'i gnas na zug/ mngal dang khu ba'i gnas kyi nang // khong nad rtogs dang srin nad rma// drag nang nam 'tshong yan chad nad// gtson bsra bshang pa 'gags pa dang
69b4(gso rig): smon bya mdze gcin nad sogs yin// khrus mi bya ba rims gsar dang // drod chung khrag mkhris thur du byung // rmas dang gzhang nad tshad pa 'khru// khong du brtson lus lto sra dang // snum ches pa dang skem ches pa'o//
69b5(gso rig): nas thun mong dus su ni// cho ga bzhin du snum gyis zhe na// nya dang ma sha til sogs kyis// nang par slon bya'i pad kan bskyed// mtshan mo gnyid log zas legs zhu// snga dro'i dus su zas shes byas// zas ma zos pa 'am
69b6(gso rig): cung zad snum// thug pa zhun mar ldan pa btung // byis pa rgan po nyams stobs chung // sman stobs chung ba nad dbang las// tshang 'o bu ram shing sha khu// nang dmigs ji skad bshad pa bzhin// sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha dang ldan pa// sman tshang
70a1(gso rig): lto ba las dpags te// sman la sngags ni sngon 'das la// lkog mar phyin pa'i bar du blung // tshangs pas skye dgu'i bdag dang tha skar bu// drag po dbang po nyi zla sa me rlung // drang srong
70a2(gso rig): sman gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang // 'byung po'i tshogs kyis khyed ni srung bar shog/ drang srong rnams kyi bcud kyis len pa dang // lha rnams kyi ni bdud rtsi lta bu dang // klu mchog rnams kyi bdud rtsi lta bur ni// khyod la sman
70a3(gso rig): 'di nye bar gnas gyur cig/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ baM Sha dz+ye gu ru bai DUr+ya pra b+ha rA dzA ya// ta thA ga ta yA/ aR+YA te/ sam+b+hakraM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+haM Sha dz+nyo b+hai Sha dz+nyo ma hA bai Sho dz+yaM/ sa mud+ba te swA hA/ shar du kha bstan 'thung ngu
70a4(gso rig): gzhug/ 'thungs nas de la sems dmigs te/ yung tsam bsdang la dang khar 'khyil// mchil ma de nas smon du gzhug/ ma gnod par ni sor mos sam// yang na chub 'jam po yis// lkog ma lce'u chung ma gnang
70a5(gso rig): bya// skyug ni bri bar mi drang ngo // 'byung ba bzlog pa skon par bya// pus mo dang mnyam stan la gnas// de ni slon tshe blo gnyis dang // 'phral ba dag nas bsten par bya// de bzhin lte ba btsir ba dang // rgyab nas gyen du mnye bar bya//
70a6(gso rig): de ltar bad kan rno dro kha// mkhris pa mngar dang bsal pa smon// rung 'dres bad kan snum pa dang // sbyar dang lan tshwa dag gis slon// ji srid bad kan rgyun tshad pa'am// mkhris pa nang gi bar du skyug/ shugs ngal pi ling skyu ru ra
70b1(gso rig): yungs kar rgyam tsha chu dag gis// yang dang yang ni blon du gzhug/ de ni smon par ma gyur pa 'am// sdod pa dang bcas smon pa 'am// sman ni 'ba' zhig byung gyur na// sbyor nyes de ni mchil ma mang //
70b2(gso rig): g.yan pa thor bu rims sogs 'byung // bde skyug bad kan mkhris pa dang // rlung ni rims kyis 'byung bar 'gyur// sbyor ba legs yin sbyor drags pas// lU ba tshan can khrag 'drar snang // smon nas khong sgyu
70b3(gso rig): lus tsha dang // lkog skams mgo 'khor mig mi mthong // rlung nang mi bzad ldang 'gyur zhing // srog gi khrag 'byung 'chi bar 'gyur// sbyor ba legs pas slon na ni// yud tsam ngal gso dud pa gsum// gang yang rul
70b4(gso rig): pas bdug pa dang // de 'og snum gyis spyod pa bstan// de nas dgongs ka nang par ni// dkres tshe chu dron gyis bkrus la// sa lu rtsa snar 'bras kyis ni// thug pa la sogs rim bzhin bsten// thug pa gar po g.yos
70b5(gso rig): byas ma byas pa'i// khu ba sha khu gsum dong gnyis dang gcig/ mchog dang bar ma tha ma'i sbyangs pa sbyangs// mi yis zas kyi dus su rim bzhin spyad// dper na me chu rtsa dang lci sogs kyis// rnam par sbar na rims
70b6(gso rig): kyis mchod pa na// che zhing brtan rnams thams cad mched par nus// sbyangs pa'i nang me thug sogs kyis de bzhin// smon tshad chung dang 'bring dang chen po ni// bzhi dang drug dang lam brgyad blon par 'dod// de nyid bcu dang nyis
71a1(gso rig): lngab sum lngapa 'khru// bre gang de bzhin nyis lngapa bzhi lngab 'gyur// sgyug sman mthar mkhris bkru sman las byed dang // bad kan mthar dbyung 'khru ba mchog tu bshad// 'khru ba gnyis
71a2(gso rig): gsum bshang dang bcas mi rtogs// 'khru ba gzhal te slon la 'thungs ma rtogs// de nas blon pa de la ni// slar yang snum dang dugs bya ste// bad kan dus 'das lto shes nas// legs par bkru sman btang bar bya// mkhris
71a3(gso rig): pa mang zhing lto snyi la// 'o mas kyang ni bkru bar byed// rlung shas che zhing lto s+ya na// dur bying sogs kyis kyang bkru dka'// bkru sman mkhris la mngar dang bska// bad kan la ni kha bas bya// rlung la snum dro lan tshwa can// mi 'khru
71a4(gso rig): na ni chu tshan blud// lag pa sros pas de yi ni// lto ba legs par dugs bya'o// ma 'khrus de bzhag ldang zas zos// nyi ma gnyis par slar yang btung // lto ba rab sra snum dag ni// zhag bcu'i bar du yang btung bas// slar
71a5(gso rig): yang snum dang dugs kyis ni// lus sbyangs nas ni bkru sman gyis// sbyor ba legs par brtags pa dang // sngar gyi nyes pa dran par bya// snying dang lto na yi ga 'chus// bad kan mkhris pa slongs pa dang // ga yan pa lus tsha
71a6(gso rig): thor bu dang // cham pas 'debs shing po shar rlung 'gag/ sbyor ba nyes pa'i mtshan nyid yin// sbyor legs ji skad bshad go bzlog/ bshang bas mkhris pa bad kan rlung // rims kyis 'khru shing 'byung bas na// bang kan
71b1(gso rig): mkhris pa me chu 'khru// skya zhing rnag dang khrag bcas pa// yang na sha bkrus lta bu 'am// tshil gyi dum bu 'dra nyid dam// gzhang 'byung skom dang che ba dang // mgo 'khor mig ni phugs su bros// bkru sman grags las 'byung ba
71b2(gso rig): yin// de bzhin skyug sman grags nang 'byung // legs par 'khrus pa de la ni// dud pas bdug pa ma rtogs pa'i// cho ga skyug sman dang mtshungs pas// de nas smon dang 'dra bar bya// zas la rims kyis spyad nas ni// de
71b3(gso rig): 'og nar ma'i kha zas bsten// sman 'thungs me drod chung pa dang // ma dag nad kyis nya ba dang // zhu ba'i mtshan ma ma mthong na// de ni nyin par bsnyung byas la// snum dang dug dang sman rnams kyis// slongs pa'i nad kyis nyen ma
71b4(gso rig): gyur// sbyangs dang khrag ni 'byung ba dang // snum chog la sbyar bsnyung ba yis// me drong zhan pa nyid 'gyur te// de bas thugs sogs rim gyis spyad// bad kan mkhris pa bri zhing chung // chang 'thungs rlung dang mkhris pa che// de la
71b5(gso rig): thug pa mi blud kyi// rta ba la sogs rim pa phan// skyug sman ma zhu bar nang 'byin// bkru sman zhu nas 'byin pa yin// de yi phyir na skyug sman dag/ zhu ba la ni bsdang mi dgos// steng dang 'og tu 'byung rigs pas// gang tshe/
71b6(gso rig): phyin ci log gyur na// de tshe skug la rkang par ni// chu dron dag ni blugs par bya// lus kyi stobs ni chu drang blugs// 'khru ba la ni de la sa bzlog/ gang zhig nyams chung nang mang dang // nang smin pa yis rang nyid ni// 'khru bar byed
72a1(gso rig): cing 'khru ba yi// kha zas 'byin la der 'khrur gzhug/ sngar sbyangs pas ni nyams chung dang // nad kyi dkyil chung lus zad mi// lto ni sra sti mi shes la// sman ni 'jam zhing chung ngu blung // de ma
72a2(gso rig): 'thungs pa mchog yin gyi// gzhan du dogs pa bcas mi rung // nyams chung pa yi nad mang pos// g.yos gyur cung zad cung zad cig/ sman ni 'jam pos lan mang zhig/ de ni nyung 'gyur zhi bar bya// ma btsal de ni yun
72a3(gso rig): ring dus nyon mongs pa'am gsod par 'gyur// me drod chung dang lto sra la// thal sman rgya tsha mar bcas pas// me yi dr-id ni bskyed nas su// rlung dang bad+ma kan bsal bar bya// rtsub cing rlung mang lto sra la// rtag tu rtsol ba'i tshul
72a4(gso rig): can dang // me drong rab tu che la smad// mi 'khru bar ni zhu bar 'gyur// de la sngar ni 'jam rtsi btang // de nas snum pa'i bkru sman bya// sman ni rnon po'i ring bu yis// bshang ba cung zad dbyung bar bya// dri ma legs par 'khrus nas no//
72a5(gso rig): snum 'khru bde bar 'byung bar 'gyur// dug gis phog dang thor bu byung // mdze dang 'or nad me dpal dang // mig ser skya chub za khus nyan// ha cang snum ches sbyang mi bya// kun la bkru sman snum bag btang // snum gyis zhen pa la/
72a6(gso rig): rtsub pa// skyug sman la sogs las rnams la// slar yang bar skabs par skabs su// snum dang dugs kyi cho ga bya// snum rjes la ni stongs bskyed bya// lus las nang rnams bsal ba ni// gos kyi dri ma 'khru dang mtshungs// snum dang
72b1(gso rig): dugs dag ma byas par// gang zhig sbyang ba'i las byed pa// shing skam 'gugs par byed pa ltar// de yi lus ni ma rungs 'gyur// sbyang pa legs par bsten pas ni// blo gros gsal zhing dbang po stobs dang ldan// lus
72b2(gso rig): zungs brtan zhing khong pa'i me drod 'baro// na tshod dag kyang ring du 'jog par byed// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas mas
72b3(gso rig): btang ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o// rlung shas che ba'i nang rnams sam// rlung la mas btang bsngags pa ste// de ni gso ba thams cad kyi// mchog ste de yang rnam pa gsum// bkrus drags 'jam rtsims btang grong // de
72b4(gso rig): yi gso bya skran dang ni// lto spos dreg nad mcher pa dang // 'khru pa 'ba' zhig gzer nang dang // rims rnying bying dang cham pa dang // khru ba rlung dang dri ma 'gags// rlig rlug rde'u nang zla mtshan 'jig/ rlung gi nA dA nI mi bzang
72b5(gso rig): gso// bkrus drags maM byaM snum grags dang // blo brdol shin tu sdom pa dang // be snrubs 'khru dang smon br-i dang // sgru byas sna smin bting ba dang // dbugs maM bde lung cham gzhing 'brum// skyigs bu lto spos me drong chung//
72b6(gso rig): gzhang skran kha zas zas zin dang // lto 'gags bu chu yod pa dang // mdze can gcin nad sbrang mdog dang // sbrum ma zla bdun yan chad do// bkrus drags bya nyid 'jam rtsi bya// khyad par du ni me drong tshe// rtsub dang rlung nang gcig
73a1(gso rig): pus nyen// 'jam rtsi mi bya 'ang de nyid do// de bzhin skya rbab mig ser dang // tshil chos cham btab zas ma zos// bshang ba 'khru bar byed pa dang // lto lci lto na bad kan can// mchil ma mang
73a2(gso rig): dang shin tu sbom// lto na srin yod rlung 'khyims dang // dug dag 'thungs dang 'brum bus btab// rkang 'bam lkog ma'i sba ba can// de gnyis sbu gu ser sogs dang // shing rus 'od ma la byas pa// ba lang 'jug 'dra bug
73a3(gso rig): rdzol med// 'jam zhing drang la kha zlum pa'o// kho gcig ma lon la sor lnga// lo tshang lo bdun pa yi par// tshad ni sor drug yin par bshad// lo bdun pa yi bdun nyid de// bcu gnyis pa la sor brgyad bya// bcu drug yan
73a4(gso rig): chab sngor dgu ste// nyi shu phan chad sor bcu gnyis// lo gzhan dag la na tshod dang // stobs dang lus tshad brtags nas ni// tshad ni mngon par bskyed par bya// rtsa ba rang gi 'the bor mnyam// rtse mo mthe'u chung tshang du bya//
73a5(gso rig): lo gcig lon sor nas gzung ste// de yi phyed phyed kyis bskyed bya// gang zhig rtsa ba'i bu ga'i tshad// sor mo gsum rtse shong pa mchog/ mut+ka ma shaM sran ma btsos// rgya shug 'bras shos rim bzhin bya// rtsa ba'i bu gu'i tshad
73a6(gso rig): kyis ni// mthar ni gag pa gdags par bya// lce rtsa rang gi sor gnyis kyis// chong par gag pa gnyis pa bya// de ni skyal bu gdags par bya// ra lug ma he la sogs pa'i// lgang pa legs mnyes sra ba dang // mar btsos mu
73b1(gso rig): ga thag thug med// d+hi nga rtswa ris med srab par// smana? ni legs par blugs byas la// srad pus dam par bcing bar bya// lgang med rkyal pa'i dpung pa 'am// byin pa'i pags pa 'am ras sdug bzang // ni
73b2(gso rig): ru ha tshad dang po ni// lo gcig pa la srang gcig mchog/ ji srid srang ni bcu gnyis par// lo re srang res bskyed par bya// bcu gnyis pa nas bcwo brgyad par// de yang bdun cu'i bar tshang ni// de phan chad srang
73b3(gso rig): nyi shu nyid// bkru sman drag tshang ji lta ba// de yi bzhi cha 'jam rtsi tshad // bkru sman drag bya snum dugs bya// 'jam byos nas kyang stobs thob pa// 'jam rtsi btang par 'os shes nas// tho ga ma nyid du 'jam rtsi btang //
73b4(gso rig): dgun dpyid nyin por btang de las// gzhan du mtshan btang la la 'dod// bsku byug khrus bya sngon thang las// bzhi gsum phan zhing yang ba dang // snum dang rtsub ches ma yin bza'// khu ba la sogs zos rjes btung //
73b5(gso rig): bcags la bshang gci bsal nas ni// mal du bde bar gnas byas la// mthon sman med par mgo smad de// glo g.yon gyis ni phab nas su// rkang pa g.yas pa bskum nas ni// rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang par bya// de nas
73b6(gso rig): de la gce'u kha dang // gzhang sgo snum gyis bskus nas ni// gce'u lgang pa'i dbugs bton la// kha bcings lag pa mi 'dar bar// rgyab kyi logs su 'dug nas ni// shin tu myur dang bul yin dang // ha cang shugs
74a1(gso rig): drag ngal min par// ran par lan cig kho na btsir// rlung ni lhag mar gnas pas na// lhag ma cung zad lus par bya// btang nas lus ni gan rgyal bzhag/ rkub tsos lag pas gdabu bar bya//
74a2(gso rig): rting pas mjug tsos brdung bya zhing // rting pa bteg la lan gsum bsig/ de nas lus ni brkyang nas su// rngas dang bcas pa'i rting par ni// khu tshur gyis brdung lus kyang ni// snum gyis bskus la mnye bar bya// tshor bas nyen
74a3(gso rig): pas snum dag ni// myur du phyir 'byung mi byed do// gal te myur du phyir byung na// phan mi byed pas gzhan dag btang // me drod che zhing snum byung na// dgong ka kha zas yang pa sbyin// 'byung ba'i dus kyi dam pa ni// thun gsum yin te de
74a4(gso rig): phan chang // nyin mtshan gcig ni bsdang nas su// de yi 'og tu reng bu yin// snum dbyung phyir ni 'bad bya ba 'am// mas btang ba ni rnon po bya// shin tu rtsub pas ma byung zhing // snyoms bag la sogs nad med na// btang snyoms su ni
74a5(gso rig): bzhag par bya// de nas mtshan 'das nang par ni// bca' sga 'u su bskol chu 'am// yang na chu tshan 'ba' zhig btung // 'jam rtsi btang nas nyin gsum mam// nyin lnga lon nas slar btang ba 'am// ji srid snum ni 'ju gyur pa 'am/
74a6(gso rig): yang na rlung ni shas che dang // rtag tu rtsol byed me drod che// khong rtsub pa la nyin re btang // de ltar snum ni gsum mam bzhis// snum gyur rtsa sgo sbyang ba'i phyir// mas btang khrus kyis sbyang ba dang // snum med lus ni snum gyur btang /
74b1(gso rig): nyi ma gsum mam nyin ldan// tshes grangs bzang zhing dge ba lnga// nyin phyed cung zad yol ba'i tshe// gtor ma bkra shis cho ga byas// snum bskus dugs bya bshang gci ni// bsal zhing shin tu dkres min la// skyes bu'i nang
74b2(gso rig): dmigs sman la sogs// 'bad de shes par byas nas ni// sman pas de la mkhas pas ni// mang dang lhan cig mas btang sbyar// sman gyi slang ni nyi shu dang // po son cha brgyad lhan cig bskol// bskol ba de yi bzhi cha yi//
74b3(gso rig): sman mar rlung la rjes su sbyar// mkhris pa bde bar gnas drug cha// bad kan shas che brgyad cha gcig/ yang na kun la sman gyi ni// brgyad cha gcig gam ci nas kyang // mas btang bska slar mi 'gyur bya// bu ram dag ni srang
74b4(gso rig): gcig tsam// rigs pas sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha sogs// lhag ma de kun snod cig blugs// bum par chu bskol blangs pa yis// sro zhing gzar bus bkrugs nas ni// rkyal pa'i nang blug mjug mar ni// gtong tshe shin tu tsha grang min//
74b5(gso rig): shin tu snum min rtsub pa'ang min// shin tu rno min 'jam pa'ang min// shin tu bska min sla ba'ang min// shin tu mang nyung tsha med pa 'am// cha che sgyur ba'ang de dang 'dra// de la mkhas pa gzhan smra ba// snum dang sbrang rtsi gnyis so
74b6(gso rig): sor/ srang ni gsum gsum byas nas su// rgyam tsha dag ni zho gnyis dad // nang med la btang sman srang gnyis// khu ba'i sman ni lhag ma kun// srang bcu yongs su sbyar bar bya// sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha snum rnams dang // sman phye khu ba'i rim pa ni//
75a1(gso rig): mas btang rkyal bar bcug byas te// 'di ni sbyor ba'i cho gar bshang // gan rgyal bzhag nas btang ma thag/ rdzas kyis brten te mas btang la// yid ni gzhan du ma yengs pas// 'khru btsog
75a2(gso rig): pus btang bar bya// 'ong dus dam pa yu da tsam ste// de las gzhan du 'chi byed yin// de la bcos pa'i thabs gyur snum// thal sman pa gcin khu sbyar sbyar// myur bas snum la rno dro ba'i// mas btang gzhan dag btang bar bya//
75a3(gso rig): yang na sman gyi reng bu dang // bsdang zhing dugs la sogs pa bya// rang nyid 'ong bar gyur na ni// mas btang gnyis pa btang ba'am// lan gsum lan bzhi 'i bar du ste// ji srid legs par gyur par btang // de yi sbyor
75a4(gso rig): sogs bkru sman dang // 'dra bar shes bya sbyor legs na// chu dron 'jam pos bkrus nas ni// sha khu 'bras chan nyung zad sbyin// mas btang drag po'i las rnams kyis// dri ma bskyod pas byung gyur pa// de ni chu dron gyis bkru dang //
75a5(gso rig): kha zas tshul bzhin zos pas 'byang // gal te rlung gis nyam thag na// slar yang 'phral du 'jam rtsi btang // de ni legs dang ma legs dang // grags pas snum 'thungs 'drar shes bya// gang zhig dus ni cung zad gnas//
75a6(gso rig): bshang dang bcas par 'byung 'gyur zhing // thur du dbugs dang snum lhan cig/ 'byung 'gyur 'jam rtsi legs pa yin// bad kan la ni mas btang ba'i// 'jam rtsi gcig gam gsum btang bya// mkhris pa la ni lnga 'am
75b1(gso rig): bdun// rlung la dgu 'am bcu gcig btang // slar yang de la zung min pa// mas btang rjes la bya ba yin// pad mkhris rlung la rim bzhin zas// yu sha bo ma sha khu btang // rlung 'joms sman ni legs bskol ba// dur byid rgyam tshar
75b2(gso rig): bcas par bya// snum mngar sgyur sha khu dron sbyar// mas btang gcig ni rlung la phan// n+ya gro d+hi sogs sde tshan bskol// shug sogs ka ra kar dang bcas// mngar bsil bu mar shing khu mar// 'o ma sbrang rtsir bcas mkhris
75b3(gso rig): sel// dong kau la sogs skol ba dang // du go mo nyung sogs bcas pa gsum// rtsub dang sbrang rtsi ba gtson bcas// rno zhing dro kha bad kan sel// gsum po 'dus pa'i nad la yang // gang phyir rim bzhin sel ba yin// gsum
75b4(gso rig): po de las gzhan pa yi// mas btang gso zhes gzhan mi 'dod// gang phyir slar yang sbyin bya ba'i// nyes pa bzhi po yong ma yin// nang skyon dag par byed pa dang // zhi bar bya ba'i rim pa yis// mas btang gsum po nyid
75b5(gso rig): brtag ces// de skad gzhan dag smra ba yin// nang dang sman sogs stobs las ni// 'di dag thams cad tshad mar gzhal// bkru sman drag btang legs mtshan ma// ma mthong bar du 'phro mi bcad// dang por snum gcig tha mar lha//
75b6(gso rig): bkru sman drag po bcu gnyis te// 'jam rtsir byas pa mas btang ba'i// las ni sum cur bshad pa yin// lus ni bco lnga 'dir gcig ni// thog ma'i snum de tha mar gsum// drug dang mas btang lnga bar bcing // mas btang sbyor
76a1(gso rig): 'di brgyad yin te// nai ru ha dang snum gsum dang // thog ma tha ma gnyis ka'o// 'jam rtsi 'am bkru sman mas btang drag/ gcig pu lhag par bsten ma byA// 'jam rtsis nad d+hA
76a2(gso rig): mye drong 'joms// nI ru has rlung bskyed 'jigs yod// dI bAs pA si rjes bak+kus drug btang // khrus drag bad+ma nas 'jam ci bya// de ltar rim pas snum sbyang bya// mas bting las ni nyis gsum sel// snum gyi tshong
76a3(gso rig): ni chung ngu yis// tshad dang de ni mnyam byis pa'o// snum tshang 'jam rtsi'i tshang du bya// de ni byis rgan lam dang khur// bud med rtsol zhen pasau dub dang // rlung nad kyis gzho mo me drong chung // rgyal po phyug po la bde ba// yin pas rtag
76a4(gso rig): tu bsten par bya// nang 'joms spang ba med pa dang // stobs bskyed bshang ba bde bar 'byung // mas btang bud med ro slad kyi// mngal dang mo mtshan nad rnams la// bkrus grags gnyis gsum gyis dag par// mas btang gong
76a5(gso rig): mas btang bar bya// de yi gce'u nad pa yi// sor tshad bcu gnyis tshad du bya// zlum zhing ba lang mjug ma 'dra// rtsa ba dbugs su gag pa gdags// rtse mo yungs kar shong pa tsam// 'jam pa gser la sogs la byas// kun+da
76a6(gso rig): sri shing so ma na// me to// rtse mo ltar zlum phra// de yi rgyal bu 'jam zhing yang // tshad srang phyed dam gar rigs bya// de nas khrus byas zas zos la// 'jam rtsi btang ba'i cho ga bya// khri stegs spus mnyam 'jam pa la// drang zhing bde bar
76b1(gso rig): 'dug nas ni// pho mtshan rdeg cing drang bar bya// skyabs sbyang phyir ni thur ma ni// 'jam pa rims kyis gzhug par bya// de dag pho mtshan dang 'tsham pa// 'bras bu'i mthar thug par btang ba// mi 'angar 'jam rtsi rdo ltar bya//
76b2(gso rig): btsir de btang la snum rjes bya// 'jam rtsi'i rim po bzhin du bya// mas btang cho ga 'di yis ni// gsum mam bzhi yi bar du btang // lhag ma 'jam rtsi ji lta bar// 'di la thams cad sbyar bar bya// bud med zla
76b3(gso rig): mtshan dus su ni// mngal bye bas na chags par 'gyur// de phyir de tshe btang bar bya// rab na dus min par yang btang // mo mtshan nyams dang gzer ba dang // mngal khrag rtag tu 'byung btang ba// gce'u sor bcu rtse
76b4(gso rig): mo yis// khu ga mung+ga shong sor bzhi// mngal gyi gnas su btang bar bya// sor gnyis gcin 'bab lam du btang // gcin 'gags pa yi nAd rnams la// bu mo rnams la sor gcig btang // 'bring tshang srang
76b5(gso rig): ni gcig pa ste// bu mo rnams la srung phyed nyid// mal du glan rkyal 'dug nas ni// brla ni legs par bskums nas su// pus mo bstod de nyin zhag ni// gcig la lan gsum lan bzhi btang // de ltar
76b6(gso rig): mas btang zhag gsum la// snum gyi tsha ngo ni bskyed par bya// de nas zhag gsum mngal gso nas// slar yang zhag gsum btang bar bya// skyug sman byas la phyed bkru sman// de nas zla phyed nas bkru drags/
77a1(gso rig): bkrus drags 'phral la 'jam rtsi btang // khrus btang zhag bdun nas 'jam rtsi// dper nA le brgan la sogs bsres pa yi// gos ni chu las tshon len ltar// de bzhin bangs par
77a2(gso rig): byas lus las// mas btang ba ni nad rnams 'byin// lus kyi yan lag nang grol dag tu song nad dang // gnad dang lus stong yan lag kun khyab nAd// gang zhig yod pa de las skye ba'i rgyu// rlung ma rtogs pa gzhan
77a3(gso rig): dog yod ma yin// bshang dang bad kan mkhris sogs nad sogs pa// gang phyir 'thor zhing sdud par byed pa yin// de ni rab 'phel 'gyur la zhi ba'i phyir// 'jam rtsi ma gtogs snron gzhan gang yang med// de bas
77a4(gso rig): gso ba ma lus la mas btang // gso ba'i phyed yin zhes ni la la 'dong // de bzhin nang rnying glo bur skyeng byed la// gtar gar khrag dbyung sman nyid 'gyur ba yin// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// mdo'i
77a5(gso rig): gnas kyi le'u bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas sman s+thA nas btang ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o// nam tshong yan chad nang rnams la// lhag par sna nas btang ba pan// sA ni klang pa'i sgo yin te//
77a6(gso rig): des na de nas nang ngo 'joms// bkru sman klang pa'i nang rnams la// blong bgi lkog nad mchi ma 'dzag/ sman dang thor bu srin rmen bu// mdze snyom cham pas btab la btang // blta brdung las byung gzer dang // klang pa byed na skad
77b1(gso rig): 'gags dang // sna dang kha bsnams tshig mi thon// mig dbye dka' dpung bskyod dka' btang // zhi ba mig sngon sdong pags nad// skra yi skyon mig dmyur la btang // dang po rang sbyor ji lta'i snum// sman gyi lde gu sogs bskol
77b2(gso rig): dang / shing mngar rgyam tsha chang rnying sogs// ci rigs par ni bskol ba btang // blta ba 'u su'i khu ba dang // sha khu khrag dang chu'ang sbyar// zhi ba snga ma 'o ma dang // chu dang bcas par sbyar bar bya// tshun can dang nI tsheng bran te//
77b3(gso rig): 'di yi snum tshang rnam pa gnyis// lde gu la sogs btsir ba yis// rno de spyi bo'i bkru sman yin// phyed ma bud pa'i bkru sman te// sbu gu sor drug kha gnyis pa// nang na sman dang bcas pa dag/ kha yi dbugs kyis bus te btang //
77b4(gso rig): des ni ma go na mang po yang // phye ma yin pas 'byin par byed// 'dzub mo'i tshogs ni gnyis pa'i bar// bsnyugs pa'i phyir phyung gyur pa las// thigs pa bcu 'am brgyad dam drug/ ji srid 'dzags par gyur pa dag/ sna nas
77b5(gso rig): gtong tshad che 'bring chung // rim pa de nyid kyis shes bya// lde gu la sogs thigs pa ni// gnyis kyis phri ste btang bar bya// chu dang tshong dang sbyar dug mar// 'thungs pa 'am 'thung bar 'dod pa dag/ kha zas zas dang mgo bkrus
77b6(gso rig): dang / 'khru bar 'dod dang gtar ga byas// cham sar shug 'ong gis gzer dang // bu btsas lud pa dbugs mi bde// sbyang byas mas btang cho ga byas// de bzhin dus min yul dmus la// sna sman btang bar mi bya ste// tshabs chen nad
78a1(gso rig): sogs ma gtogs so// de nas sna nas sman btang ba/ bad kan nga bar mkhris nyin byed// rlung can phyi 'bred mtshan mo btang // nad med pa la ston ka dang // dpyid kyi tshe na snga dro btang // dgun
78a2(gso rig): ni byang dus so ka'i tshe// phyed 'breng dbyar ni nyi dron bcas// klad pa rlung nad kyis thebs dang // skyigs bu btab dang mgo 'dar dang // gnye'u rengs skad ni 'gags pa la// nyin re nang par dgongs ka btang // gzhan la nyin rer
78a3(gso rig): bar bcad la// nyi ma bdun du de spyad bya// rtag tu bya ba'i las byas nas// dang po mgo snum bsku dugs bya// rlung med mal du gnas nas ni// nam tshong yan chad dugs kyang bya// de nas gan rkyal lus drang rkyang // rkang pa lag
78a4(gso rig): pa legs brkyang la// rkang pa cung zad bstod nas su// mgo bo yid tsam dmad par bya// sna khung gcig ni rab bkag la// rim gyis yongs su blugs bya ba// sman ni chu dron gyis sros la// sbu gu 'am ras bal gyis rlugs
78a5(gso rig): bya Sha blugs nas rkang mthil phrag pa dang // lag pa rna ba la sogs mnye// rim gyis blu gos la glo gnyis su// mchil ma dor la de nas ni// sman ni zad par 'gyur gyi bar// lan gnyis lan gsum snar btang spyad// gal te brgyal
78a6(gso rig): gyur bsil ba'i chus// mgo ma gtogs par gtong bar bya// bkru sman 'og tu snum dag ni// nang sogs tshul las dpags de btang // sna sman btang mthar gni rkyal du// grangs brgyar de las bsdang par bya// dud pa rngubs
78b1(gso rig): la chu dron 'jam// gre ba mtshul ba dag phyir bya// snum btang legs rgyur dbugs bder rgyu// gnyid log sang bde dbang po gsal// nyes pas mig 'gyur mog btsum skam// sna dang kha skams klang stong snyam// snum
78b2(gso rig): drags g.ya' dang lci ba nyid// mchil mang cham 'debs yi ga 'tshus// legs bkrus mig gsal yang ba dang // kha dang skad ni dag par 'gyur// bkrus nyen nad ni 'phel bar 'gyur// bkrus drags khong ni rmya bar 'gyur//
78b3(gso rig): tshang phran glo rdol rid pa dang // byis pa rgan po skyid par gnas// dus min char 'bab par yang btang // de ni cham pa drag btab dang // chang 'thungs rna ba 'on pa dang // kla nga rgyas srin bu zhugs pa dang // nad bsdus phyir ni ma
78b4(gso rig): phyung la// tshang phra ba ni btang mi bya// nyin mtshan zos zos rlon nyid nyal// mtha' dang bud med la ma ngal du ba// mgo bskus 'khur ba skang dbo ba'i rjes// bshang gci mig sman btang rjes dang // so shing gi rjes dgod pa yi//
78b5(gso rig): rjes la thigs pa gnyis pa btong // lnga yis dang po'i bu ga dag/ gsum gyis rim bzhin ngal ba sel// lnga pos mig ni gsal bar byed// so brtan rlung nang zhi bar 'gyur// sna sman lo bdun ma lon dang // brgyad cu 'das
78b6(gso rig): la btang mi bya// bco brgyad ma lon dung mi 'dug/ 'khur bkang lnga ma lon la min// lo bcu ma lon sbyang mi bya// bdun cu 'das la'ang mi bya'o// skyes nas rgas pa'i bar du ni// tshad chung mas btang lta bur bsngags// de ni rtag
79a1(gso rig): tu brten gyur na// tshang che ba ltar yon tan bskyed// 'di la bsdams pa gang yang med// gnod las tshad chen ltar 'jigs med// sna sman don du til mar nyid// rtag tu bsten pa
79a2(gso rig): bsngags pa yin// mgo ni bad kan gnas yin phyir// snum gzhan bde gnas la mi bsngags// myur byed ring zhig byed pa dang // yon tan che dang chung byed pa'i// khyad par chad chen tshang chung la// gal te med par gyur
79a3(gso rig): na ni// gang zhig spang byas gnod byas pa'i// tshang chen dag ni su zhig ston// snum dngas btung ba rtag bshing du// spyil bu rlung dang tshad par gnas// 'jam rtse tshod chen mas btang tshang // de dang 'dra bar rnam par bstan// ji la
79a4(gso rig): sgron shring dzi paM ti// glo sgang shing tsha bu shel tse// go pi tsan ngan skyer pa'i rtsa// shing mngar gla ba a ka ru// nye'u shing bil+la put+ta ri// ut+pal murba pa rni gnyis// 'bri ha ti gnyis bi tang+ga// gan+d+ha pa tra suk+Shel dang // ha re nu ga/
79a5(gso rig): pad+ma yi// ge sar dang ni ba la ste// sman ni 'di rnams cha ma nyams la// char pa'i chus ni bskol bar bya// til mar las ni sman gyi khu// bcu gyur lhag bca' de la ni// til mar chu dang bskol bya ba// lan bcu nyid ni bskol
79a6(gso rig): nas ni// tshos pa yi ni bcu cha la// de mnyam ra yi 'o ma blugs// snar btang til mar yon tan che// thigs phran zhes bya 'di bsten bya// sna nas btang ba'i sman bsten pas// phrag pa mgrin pa dpung mgo ni// mkhregs
79b1(gso rig): shing mtho la pags mdog gsal// dbang bstan sgra dkar med par 'gyur// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po las// mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu pa'o// // de nas sman gyi dung pa
79b2(gso rig): btang ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o// nam tshod yan chad bang rlung las// byung ba'i nang rnams mi skye dang // skyes pa rnams ni bsal ba'i phyir// mkhas pa rtag tu ngud pa rngug// de ni 'jam dang bar mi rno// rlung
79b3(gso rig): dang bang rlung bad kan la// btang ngo mkhros khrag gis nyen dang // bkrus dang dmu rdzing za khu dang // rab rig spos dang stod rlung nang // lko ga nad mas btang byas pa dang // nya dang chang dang 'o ma zho// sbrang rtsi mAr dang dug 'thungs
79b4(gso rig): sogs// mgo nad sgyu rbab nad can ni// mtshan nyid ma log la mi btang // gal te dud pa cher rngubs na// khrag dang mkhris 'phel 'on dang long // skom dang brgyal dang rmongs par byed// de ni bsil ba'i cho ga phan//
79b5(gso rig): bkres snying glal dang po shang gcigasal// bud med bsten dang gtar ga btag/ rgod dang so shing bcas pa yi// mthar ni dud pa 'jam po btang // dus 'di dag dang mtshan zas zos// sna sman rjes la bar ma rdub/
79b6(gso rig): gnyid log sna sman mig sman khrus// smon pa'i rjes la rnon pos bkru// mas btang gce'u 'drar byas pa'i// dung gce'u sbubs gsum drang por bya// rtsa ba 'theb shong rtse mo ni// rgya shug shong de'i cheng du bya// de yi tshang ni rngub
80a1(gso rig): byed pa'i// sor ni nyi shu sum cu gnyis// bzhi bcu sgo dang bar ma dang // 'jam po la ni rim bzhin bya// drang por 'dug cing de las sems// kha gdangs nas ni lan gsum rngug/ sna
80a2(gso rig): khung re re bkag nas ni// snar ni dung pa rngub par bya// mgo dang snar gtogs nang skyob pa// dang por snga nas rngub par bya// bskyod pa'i don du kha nas rngub// gre bar gtogs pa de las bzlog/ du ga kha nyid nab blon gyi//
80a3(gso rig): snar blon mig la gnod par byed// du brngub dang 'byin pa yis// lan ni gsum gsum rngub par bya// 'jam po nyin gcig lon gcig btang // bar ma lan gnyis sbyor ba ni// lan gsum lan bzhi btang bar bya// der
80a4(gso rig): sman gu gul a ka ru// gla skang rdo dreg s+the le ya// sbrang spos u shi ra ba la ka/ shing che gon+tir shing mngar dang // bil rkang e la ba lu ka/ pog dkar shri be ta ka/ bla bo spra tshil bya ma ka/ pog nag gur gum ma shau dang /
80a5(gso rig): kun+da tu ru dang nas dang til// snum bcas 'bras bu snying po dang // tshil dang rkang dang zhag dang myur// zhi ba pog gnag rgya skyegs dang // rgun 'brum pad+ma ut+pa la// n+ya gro d+ha dang a shwad+bA// u duM ba ra p+la ka sha dang // sa
80a6(gso rig): phrom shun pa kha ra dang // shing mngar klu shing shug pa rtsong // dri las rgya spos ru rta bskol// rnon po dze ti sA ti dang // skyer po dang ni rtse ba bcu// lding ros pa bla rgya skyegs dang // gi ri kar ker 'bras bu gsum// dri yi sman
80b1(gso rig): la ros rno ba'i// mgo ba'i bkru sman sde tshan no// de dag zhag gcig chu sbangs la// dud pa'i sman rnams btags nas ni// thur ma sor ni bcu gnyis la// lan lnga'i bar du byug par bya// bdar bu mthe bo tsam sbom la//
80b2(gso rig): nas kyi dbyibs dang 'dra bar bya// grib mas skam zhing khong stong med// snum gyis ji bzhin bskus byas la// rngub phyir me yis bsregs nas ni// dud pa'i gce'u dang sbyar bar bya// kham phor kha sbyar bu gar ni// gce'u
80b3(gso rig): sor bcu 'am sor brgyad pa// bcug pa kha nas dud pa ni// lung pa can gyis rngub par bya// dud pa rngubs la lud pa dbugs mi bde// skad 'gags gnag dang dri mi zhim gdong skya// skra skyon rna mog 'dzag g.ya' rmong
80b4(gso rig): bag dang // sgoms dang skyigs bu cham pa'i nad mi 'byung // yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas sman gyi khu bas 'khur ba sgang
80b5(gso rig): pa la sogs pa'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o// 'khur bkang rnam pa bzhi yin te// snum dang zhi byed spyong rma 'tsho ba// de las gsum ni rlung la sogs// gsum btang tha ma rma la phan// 'dir snum mngar sgyur lan
80b6(gso rig): tsha dang // tsha ni snum ni bskol ba yin// zhi byed kha bska mngar sman bskol// sbyong pa kha dang tsha dang sgyur// rma 'tsho bi byed pa kha ba dang // bska ba'i sman ni bskol bar bya// de la snum dang 'o ma dang // sbrang rtsi chu dang tshwa dang
81a1(gso rig): chang / kha gcin 'bru yi khu ba rnams// sman ni ji lta ji ltar dang // lde gur bcas pa bskol ba ni// ji tsam bzod pa rnam par sbyang // so rtse so ni 'gul ba dang // rlung las gyur
81a2(gso rig): pa'i kha nang la// dro 'jam tsam mam bsil ba yi// til chus 'khur ba bkang ba phan// rtag tu 'khur ba bkang ste bzhag/ til mar dag gam sha khu bsngags// kha drong che tshwa tshos pa dang // 'phral du rma ni byung ba
81a3(gso rig): dang // dug dang thal sman mes tshig la// zhun mar dag dang 'o mas dgang // sbrang rtsis khur bkang byas pas ni// kha yi dri ma sbyong byed cing // kha yi rma ni 'tshob byed yin// kha tsha skom dang rab zhi byed// ro mi tshor
81a4(gso rig): dang dri che ba// kha mnam 'bras rtsa bas bkang bas sel// de nyid cung zad tsha bcas bsil// kha skom sel ba'i dam pa yin// thol sman rnon 'khus 'khur bkang ba// bad kAn sogs pa myur du sil// chu tshan dro
81a5(gso rig): 'jam 'khur bkang bas// kha ni yang zhing bde bar byed// rlung med nyi tshan bcas par ni// phrag pa 'dzing pa dugs bya mnye// khur ba bkang nas gdong pa ni// cung zad bteg ste ji srid na// bad kan gyis ni kha gang ba
81a6(gso rig): 'am/ sna mig 'dzag pa'i bar du bzhag/ kha bkang mi sngo bzhag 'khur bkang // gzhan du khar rngubs par 'gyur ro// khar rngub pa yis khyad par gso pa ni// gnye'u rings mgo mig rna dang kha nad dang // mchil
81b1(gso rig): ma dre nad snying ga sra ba dang // snying 'phar snyom dang cham pa yi ga 'chus// 'khur bkang bshad pa'i sman rnams kyis// lde gu sman khu phye ma ste// kha mur bya ba rnam gsum yin// de ni bad kan nang la btang // gdong bskus
81b2(gso rig): gsum ste na sel dang // dug sel kha dog bzang byed pa'o// de dro bad kan rlung lnga bsngags// lhag ma la ni rab bsil ba// de ni tshad spangs sor bzhi cha// sum cha phyed de rnam pa gsum// ma bskams par du de bzhag no//
81b3(gso rig): bskams ni pags pa la gnod 'gyur// de nas sbyangs nas bkru bar bya// de yi rjes la bsku byug bya// nyin par nyid log mang smra khro// mtshan nyi tshan mya ngan spang // de ni cham pa sna sman btang // ma zhu 'gram 'thams yi
81b4(gso rig): gra 'chus// mtshan nyid ma log la mi blta// de ni legs par sbyar ba yis// dus min sgra dkar r-i khams dang // gnyer ma rab rib mig sngo sel// rgyu shug snying po ba sha ka'i rtsa// sring phrom yungs kAr dkar po rnams//
81b5(gso rig): se he'i rtsa ba til nag dang // skyer pa'i shun pa rme bu rnams// 'dza gau rtswa tsan dan u shi ra/ shiR+sha sha ta puSh+pa 'bras// ku mud ut+pal ka la ha ra// duR+Sha shing mngar tsan dan rnams// ka li ya ka u sho ra ti la// spangs spos
81b6(gso rig): rgya spos shug pa rnams// nga lis kun+da stag tsher ba// shing mngar rgya spos a ru ra// da ltar tshigs btsad phyed kyis bshad// rku ba dgun sdong sogs drug sbyar// gdong bsku ba la goms pa rnams// mthong ba bstan par 'gyur
82a1(gso rig): ba dang // gdong ni yongs su mA rnying la// 'jam zhing pad+ma 'dra bar 'gyur// bsgyu dang thugs dang ras bal dang // pags pas g.yogs dang rnam pa bzhi// de ni spyi ba'i tikA mA r+ya d+ha/
82a2(gso rig): phyi bzhin du ni yon tan che// de la bsku brtsub pa dang // g.ya' dang dri ma can la sbyar// thugs pa glog pa gleng gzer dang // tshe dang ma smin gnag la btang // ras bal snum can sgra 'byi dang // gza' zhugs mig ni rengs
82a3(gso rig): lo btang // pags bcings mgo bo tshor ba med// kha yo gnyid ni yar ba dang // kha dong sna skum rab rib dang // mi bzad mgo nad dag la sbyar// de yi cho ga khre'u ni// pus mnyam 'jam pa la 'dug ste// lus bkrus bsku zhing
82a4(gso rig): dugos byas la// dgongs ka ba 'am ma he yi// pags pa mgo bo dang mnyam la// rgyar ni sor ni bcu gnyis pa// rna ba'i mthar thug par bcing pa// 'phral ba gos kyis dkris pa ni// gos sam lan pus bcing byas la//
82a5(gso rig): ma sha'i lde gus bsku bar bya// de nas nad dmigs ci 'dra la// snum bskol ba ni drod 'jam tsam// de ni spyi blo man chad nas// skra drung sor gcig nub tsam blugs// kha dang sna mtshul phyin par bzhag/ de ni rlung sogs nAd rnams
82a6(gso rig): las stong phrag bcu dang brgya drug bzhag/ nad med pa la stong phrag gcig/ mar sar phrag pa la sogs mnye// de ltar zhag bdun blugs par bya// rna ba gang par blugs te bzhag/ rno ba'i rtsa ba mnye bar bya// nad rtse zhil gyi bar
82b1(gso rig): bya zhing // rna ba se gol brgya par bzhag/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga ni// lag rtses bskor ba'i bar dad ni// mig 'byed 'dzums ni mnyam pa yi// yun ni grangs kyi tshad du bshad// spyi bor til mar sbyar ba bskus
82b2(gso rig): nas ni// sku dkar dmar ser sgra 'byi gza' zhugs dang // mgo ba'i rlung nad sel zhing dbang po gsal// skad gdangasau 'gram pa mgo yi stobs skyed byed// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// mdo'i
82b3(gso rig): gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas sman gyi thigs pa mig tu blug pa dang // sman gyis mig bsku ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o// mig nad dag ni thams cad la// dang
82b4(gso rig): pobopor sman thigs blug pas ni// zug na g.ya' drung mchi ma 'dzag/ mig tsha mig dmar rnams la phan// rlung la dron po bad dro 'jam// khrag ma khris lA ni de bsil bsngags// rlung med gnas su 'dug nas ni// lag pa
82b5(gso rig): g.yon pa mig phye la// nya phyis nang sbyar ras bal ni// snyad pa'i thigs pa blugs bya ba// sor gnyis tsam spangs las mig gra// thig pa bcu 'am bcu gnyis blug/ de nas gos 'jam dag gis phyi// rlung dang bad kan can
82b6(gso rig): dag la/ gos 'jam gzhon ni chu dron la// spangs pas dug ni 'jam po bya// mig sman drug pas rab tsha snos// na zhing mig dmar rtul bar 'gyur// shin tu drang pas zug pa dang // 'dzum mi shes dang na par 'gyur// grags
83a1(gso rig): pas mig mchu dmar dang drung // sbubs cing mig ni 'byed dkar 'gyur// shin tu chung pas nad skyel bskyed// ma pho bas ni thu bar byed// bsku legs gnad rtsa sna sul dang // kha yi sbubs su sman
83a2(gso rig): sa khya ba// spyi bor gtogs pa'i nad kyis ni// dri ma cis ni 'byin par byed// de nas lus sbyangs mig sman bsku// mig tsam la ni gnas gyur pa// cung zad skangs dang shin tu g.ya'// rdzu ma chags pas smin shes shing //
83a3(gso rig): zad drud dmar mchi mas dzag/ mig rngu stug la btang bar bya// bad kan dang ni khrag ma khros dang // mchog tu rlung gis gzir la bsku// mig sman phyi dang rma gso dang // gsal bar mthong ste rnam pa gsum// de la phyi ba'i
83a4(gso rig): mig sman ni// bska dang skyur dang tsha dang kha/ rma gso sman ni kha~M pa ste// gsal sman mngar dang gsil ba yin// thur ma sor bcu dbus 'phra la// rtse mo sri zhing kha 'bus 'dra// phyi ba'i thur ma zangs kyis bsngags// rma gso
83a5(gso rig): lcags nag byas sor tsa ma// bzang po gsal bar byed pa ni// gser dwang dngul las byas pa bsngags// bdar bu khu ba phye ma ste// mig sman rnam gsum nyid du brtags// de ni mig nado lci 'bring dang // yang pa la ni rim bzhin sbyar//
83a6(gso rig): mtshan mo nyal dang nyi ma'i gung // zos 'thungs nyi ma tsho ba yis// mig gi nad ni 'phel ba dang // skye la ni skye dang 'khrugs par 'gyur// de bas de zhi phyir na dgongs// nyi ma sprin bral dus su bsku// gzhan dag smra ba nyin par ni// mig
83b1(gso rig): sman rnon po btang mi bya// bkrus pas nyams chung gyur pa'i mig/ nyi ma bltas na gnod par 'gyur// mtshan mo gnyid ni log pa dang // zla dus yin pas ltas 'gyur te// mig ni me yi rang bzhin pas// bsil bas gnod
83b2(gso rig): med bstan par 'gyur// mig nA da ba da kan shas che ba'am// phyi zhing gsal bar bya ba la// rab tshe min pa'i nyin par yang // mig sman rnon po blugs par 'dod// lcags ni rdo las 'byung ba yin// rno ba de nyid las byung yang //
83b3(gso rig): de nyid kyis ni gnod byed nus// mig gi rang bzhin de dang 'dra// dgun tshe mtshan mo mig sman ni// rnon po phan pa ma yin te// 'dzag mi 'gyur pas mig rengs dang // g.ya' dang mig gsal la sogs bskyed// mig sman mi
83b4(gso rig): btang 'jigs dang smon// khrus btang zan zos shugs kyis nyen// khros dang rims btab mig phyir phyung // glang nad mya dran gnyid ma ldog/ nyi ma ma mthong mgo bkrus dang // chang 'thungs dud pa rngubye pa dang // kha zas ma zhu nyi
83b5(gso rig): tshan gdungs// nyin nya la skom pa la mi gtang // mig sman rab rno 'jam dang nyung // mang sla bska dang rtsub po dang // shin tu bsil dang tsha ba yi// mig sman bsku bar mi bya'o// des nas mig ni ma phye bar// dal gyis nang du khyab par bya//
83b6(gso rig): mig sman bskus nas mig mchu ni// cung zad bskyod la mig sman ni// rnon po myur du khyab par 'gyur// dbye dang mtshungs par mi bya'o// mig mchu gnyis ni bsdam par bya// bkru ba dag ni mi bya ba'o// gang tshe mig sman gyis bskus
84a1(gso rig): pa'i// sman gyi rtsom pa zhi 'gyur na// nad kyi dmigs dang mthun pa yi// chu yis de tshe bkru bar bya// de nas gos 'jam bcas pa yi// mthe bong dang ni 'dzub mo yis// mig ni ci ran
84a2(gso rig): phye ste phyi// g.yon pas g.yas pa phyi bar bya// gzhan du mig sman blug pa yi// mig mchu khyab pas nad bskyeng 'gyur// sman gyi goya' ba 'am rtul gyur na// rnon po'i dud pa rngub par bya// mig sman rnon pos tsha gyur na//
84a3(gso rig): slor 'tshos mig sman bsil byed gzhug/ yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu gsum pa'o// // de nas mig blta ba'i cho ga dang // mig sman gyi phur ma
84a4(gso rig): bsregs shing btsos pa'i khu ba mig tu blugs pa'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o// mig 'dzums mi shes rengs bag dang // skam dang rtsub dang snad pa dang // rlung mkhris nad gyur zhum bag dang // rdzi mi byi zhing g.yogs
84a5(gso rig): par mthong // dbye dka' rtswa ni brtse ba dang // mig gi rtswa 'gyur mi mthong dang // dmar zhing mchi 'dzag klang phyed na// rlung nad kun 'gro ling tog can// mig nad rtse zhil mchi ma 'dzad// na zhing dmar la rdul ma chags/
84a6(gso rig): thun mong dus su nong bar ram// dgongs kaM gan rgyal nyal nas ni// lus dang mgo sbyang rlung med pa'i// gnas su blta ba'i sman btang ngo // nas sam ma sha'i rjen zan gyis// mig sbubs mtha' bskor mnyam pa ni// dpangs su
84b1(gso rig): sor gnyis bstan byas la// nad dmigs ji bzhin sman bskol la// zhun mar chu tshan la bsros te// mig nI btsums par blug par bya// mtshan mo mi mthong rlung rab rib// dbye dka' sogs la tshil zhun blugs// rdzi ma'i rtse nu
84b2(gso rig): par bkang la// de nas bskyod cing dbye ba ni// de ni dal gyis byed du gzhug/ tshad dag bgrang bya do la ni/ mig mchu mig 'gram dkar nag nad// grangs brgya sum brgya lnga brgya dang // brgya phrag bdun dang brgyad rim bzhin//
84b3(gso rig): dkrugs dang rlung la grangs stong ste// mkhris pa nad med la drug brgya// bad kan la ni lnga brgya bzhag/ de nas mig 'gram 'dzag sgo bya// sman mar snod du gzags byas la// dud pa rngubs nas na mkha' dang // gzugs
84b4(gso rig): 'char ba nI bal+lA mi bya// de ltar rlung la nyin re byA// mAkhris pa nyin res par du bcad// bad kan bder gnas gnyis par bcad // tshim par gyur gyi bar du btang // tshim pas gsal bar mthong nus shing // bde zhing mig
84b5(gso rig): yang dri ma med// mtshim pa lngas go bzlog yin// tshim grags bang kan nAd bskyed 'gyur// de ni lus kyi snum 'thung ltar// mi gsal mthong ba nyams chung 'gyur// de bas lta ba'i rjes la ni// mthong ba'i stobs ni
84b6(gso rig): skyed byed pa// sngar bshad pa yi mig nad la// phur ma btsos pa sbyar bar bya// de ni rlung las snum can te// bad kan bcas te phyi ba phan// mthong nyams rlung dang mkhris bcas dang // khrag mkhris bde gnas la gsal byed// khung
85a1(gso rig): nas mthus tshol sman can gyi// tshol dang rkang dang zhag sha rlom// 'am dag dang btags pa dang // 'tsho byed dag dang sbyar bar snum// ro dgas bya yi mtshar ba sha/ mu tog lcags zangs rgyu mchu
85a2(gso rig): dung // rgya mtsho'i lbu ba lig bu mig/ ba bla zho ga chu sbyar phyi// ri dgas bya yi mcher rkang // lto tshil rgyu ma snying dang sha/ mngar bag mar bcas nu zhos sbyar// btags pa gsal bar byed pa yin// shwe dang sman gyi lde gu ni//
85a3(gso rig): gong bu srang gcig so sor byas// e ra Na n+ya gro pad+ma yi// 'o ma snum pos rim bzhin du// dkris la 'jim pas byugs la ni// da bya dgon pa'i lci bo'i me// 'bar bar yongs su bsreg par bya// chos nus de yi khu ba
85a4(gso rig): btsir/ mig tu blta ba'i smon ltar blugs// phyi dang snum dang gsil ba las// brgya phrag gcig gnyis gsum par bzhag/ dang por dro 'jam phyi gsil blug/ de gnyis rjes la dud pas rdob// de ni sbyor ba blta dang
85a5(gso rig): mtshungs// blta dang phur btsos thigs pa blug/ sna smin mi bya la mi btang // ji srid dus ni sman gtong ba// de yi nyis 'gyur phrod pa bzang // me togA dzA ti mal+li kas// mig bcings mtshan mo gnas par bya// sna sman
85a6(gso rig): mig sman blta ba la sogs pas// mig mthu bsod phyir kun tu 'bad par bya// mthong ba nyams na 'gro ba sna tshogs pa'ang // mun pa'i rang bzhin tshul cig nyid du 'gyur// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa
85b1(gso rig): las// mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas cha dpyad kyi cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o// zug rngu rnam pa sna tshogs dang // lus ni sna tshogs gnod byed pa// 'byin pa'i
85b2(gso rig): thabs su gang 'gyur ba yi// dpyad yin de bzhin gzhung 'brum dang // mtshan par rdol sogs lnga pa dang // bcug bu thal smon me btab pa'i// yan lag lhag ma bsrung phyir dang // mas bting la sogs dpyad
85b3(gso rig): ma rtogs// bum pa ku ba ra dang ni// 'dzam bu'i chu la sogs dpyad yin// gang phyir che dpyang cho ga bzhin// sna tshogs tshul du gdung bya ba// blo yis rnam dpyad bya ba ni// ragaso rims tsam zhig bstan pa yin// song
85b4(gso rig): ge kang ka dom bya rog/ ri dgas bya sogs khwa 'dra ba'i// mchu can cha dpyad byas nas ni// de yI ming yang gdags par bya// phal cher lcogs kyi rgyu las ni// sr-id du sor ni bco brgyad pa// skam pa 'brel pa'i mtsham su
85b5(gso rig): niHsran chung lta bu'i gzer btab po// rtsa ba lcags kyu ltar gug pa'i// cha dpyad bde legs yin zhes bya// rtse mo g.yung drung lta bu'o// de nI brtan par rus zug pa'i// zug rngu 'byin la sbyar bar bya// gzer btab rtse mo gyes
85b6(gso rig): pa dag/ skam pa yin te sor bcu drug/ der ni pags pa rtsa rgyus shar// zhen pa'i zug rngu 'byin la sbyar// skam pa sor drug zug rngu phra// rdzi ma ma rungs 'byin la sbyar// so 'phro drang zhing rtsa ba ni// gdu bus brgyan pa mu
86a1(gso rig): tsu ti// des rma gting du zug pa dang // mig mdzer gting du lus la sbyar// nya mgo 'dra ba sor bcu gnyis// cha dpyad gnyis pa gcig pa pya// nya mgo lta bu zhes bshad de// rna khu
86a2(gso rig): zug rngu 'byin la sbyar// cha dpyad sbu gu can khong stong // rtsa ma gcig gam mang po bya// des ni pu ga'i zug rngu dang // nad yod blta dang dbyung ba dang // bya ba sla bar bya phyir dang // dgong bar bya ba'i don du bya// de yi zheng dang sbom srid
86a3(gso rig): chad// bu ga'i tshad las dpag par bya// srid du sor bcu sbom sor lnga// bre ba'i zug rngu rtog byed yin// rtse mo lnga pa bu ga can// rtse ma bzhi la spyi 'dung bya// tsha dpyod thur ma gnyis pa ni// bu ga gsum pa de yi tshad// cha
86a4(gso rig): dpyad bya ba rang dbyibs dang // sboms da chu yi tshad mnyam pa'i// sbu gu de 'dra gzhan dag kyang // cha dpyad shes pa byed du gzhug/ rtse mo pad+ma'i snying po 'dra// srid du ser ni bcu gnyis pa// bzhi che khong stong byas sbu gu//
86a5(gso rig): zug rdzu 'byin pa yin par bshad// gzhang 'brum cha spyad pa yi ni// nu sor 'dra ba sor bzhi pa// skyes pa'i sor lngas 'khyud pa ste// bud med sor drug gis 'khyud bya// nad blta ba la bu ga gnyis// las la bu ga gicig
86a6(gso rig): pa byaH dbus kyi bu ga sor gsum pa// mthe bong shong pa tsam du byas// de steng rtse mo zlum po ni// dpangos su sor ni phyed pa bya// khar dkrol de 'dra bu ga med// cha spyad gzhong 'brum btsir la sbyar// mtshan mar rdol la rnam kun tu//
86b1(gso rig): bu ga yan chad bsal bar bya// sna yi shu ba'i 'brum pa las// bu ga gcig pa sor gnyis bya// zheng du 'dzub mo'i tshad tsam la// mtshan mar rdol gyi dpyad 'drar bya// sor mo bsrung phyir ba so 'am// shing gi shubs ni
86b2(gso rig): sngor bzhi bya/ kha yi nu 'dra bu ga gnyis// de yi khA ni dbye bar bya// mo mtshan rma brtag dbus su ni// khong stong sor ni bcu drug pa// phyogs bzhir gdu bus bcing bar bya// rtse mo pad+mo kha zlum 'dra// thur ma bzhi ni mnan pa
86b3(gso rig): yiT rtsa ba bsdams nA kha dbye bya// cha dpyad 'jam rtsi sbubs 'dra la// rtsa ba mtheb shong rtse sran shong // rtse mo 'gag pa med pa la// rtsa bar pa gas 'jam rgyal bu bcing // rna yi phug ni 'chas pa dang // sman bkru ba la
86b4(gso rig): sbyar bar bya// 'id ma'i sbu gu 'am sgro rtsa ni// 'dra ba kha gnyis dmu rdzing dpyad// dud pas mas btang la sogs spyad// rang rang gi ni skabs su smras// rngabs ra kha zheng sor gsum pa// spangs su sor brgyad pa 'am bcu//
