86b5(gso rig): rtse mo'i bu gau yungs kar shong // legs bkag nu sor dbyibs 'dra bya// bsku ba srid du sor bcu gnyis// khyud bskor sor ni bco brgyad pa// kha zlum sor ni gsum mam bzhi// nang par bad kan khrag 'dren byed// de bzhin bum pa
86b6(gso rig): de 'dra ba// glan pas skran yang 'ju bar byed// thur ma zhes bya'i cha byad ni// las dang dbyibs ni sna tshogs pa// ci rigs pa yi tshad ldan bya// dI la mtshol las la gnyis// srin pu rta sma pa ta'i dbyibs// bu ga'i nang gi zug
87a1(gso rig): rdzu 'byin// kha ni sran chung phyed 'dra gnyis// sor brgyad pa dang dgu pa'i tshad// thur ma drug ste de la gnyis// sor ni bcu gnyis bcu drug pa// thal sman btang ba sbrul kha 'dra// gnyis po
87a2(gso rig): sor bcu gnyis bcu pa// bskul dpyad kha ni mnga' spong 'dra// 'byin pa'i cha dpyad lcags kyu'i dbyibs// phur pa rtsam gug pa ni// mngal gyi phur pa zhes bya ste// srid du sor brgyad byas pa des// bud med mngal du
87a3(gso rig): bu shi dbyung // rde'u 'byin cha dpyod sbrul mgo yi// gdengs ka 'dra la rtse gug pa'o// mda' stong 'dra la sor bzhi pa// so dbyung pa la sbyar bar bya// rtse mo ras bal gyis dkris pa'i// phyi gsal thur ma drug bya'o// gzhang
87a4(gso rig): gi nye rang nod la gnyis// sor bcu pi dang bcu gnyis pa// sna yi sor drug bdun pa gnyis// rna ba'i sor brgyad dgu pa gnyis// rna bo bsal-i la a shad+tha'i// rtse 'am blugs par kho 'dra bya// thur ma 'dzam bu'i
87a5(gso rig): thor to 'dra// thal sman me btsa' so sor gsum// 'phra s+t+r-i rim bzhin sbyar bAr bya// rgyu ma'i las la thu mA ni// ba R+sha ba 'dra zhing dbus zlum l+ya// rtsa bya zla ba phyed 'dra bya// rgya shug tshig gu bkas 'dra ba// sna yi thor to
87a6(gso rig): 'brum sregs byed// sor brgyad pa la rtse mo lcong // gsum pa thal sman sman rimo la// mthe'u chung gung mo srin lag gi/ sen mo lta bu'i so byas pa'o// pho mtshan sbyong dang mig sman sogs// cha dpyad rang rang le 'ur bshad//
87b1(gso rig): nye ba'i cha pyad khab long dang // thag pa ras dang tho ba dang // 'bring bu rgyud ma lho rta lnga// yal ga son mo kha sau dang // dus dang smon dang lag rkang pa// 'jigs dang dga' ba de'i bya ba'o// bye brag thabs ni shos pa'o// mkhas
87b2(gso rig): bas blo yis dpyad par bya// cha dpyad gdung srub dag dang dgun srang dag bya dang // thal sman gdab dang mtshon dbyung bcir dang btsir ba dang // gzhi ba dang smad dang bstod dang bskyod dang bcag pa dang // bzlog dang
87b3(gso rig): drang por bya ba cha dopyid la sa rnams yin// legs par zug cig 'byin par byed pa dang // gzung bya blangs nas 'byin par byed phyir dang // yan lag kun la gnod pa med po nas// cha dpyad kun gyi mchog ni
87b4(gso rig): kAng+gA'i mchu// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas gtar dpyad kyi cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o// mgar ba mkhas pas cho ga
87b5(gso rig): bzhin/ brdungs pa'i gtAr dpyad nyi shu drug/ spyi ni chod par nus pa dag/ phul cher sor ni drug par bya// gzugs legs so ni legs pa dang // bzung bar bde ba nyid du bya// ya yo med cing bar legs pa'i// shin tu
87b6(gso rig): rno ba'i lcags la byas// rtse mo shin tu legs brdungs pa// ut+pal sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba'i// rang smin rjes mthun gzugs can ni// rtag tu nye bar bzhag par bya// rtse mo re re dag la yang // rang tshod sor phyed gnyis dang
88a1(gso rig): bzhin phal cher gnyis dang gsum du bya// de nas khyad par dag la sbyar// de las dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i rtse// mdzub sen nang gi dbyibs 'drar bya// de ni rnyil skyes lkog ma yi//
88a2(gso rig): sha lhag la sogs gzhar dpyad sbyar// 'phel btsags spu gri'i dbyibs lta bu// gcod dang dral dang 'byin la sbyar// rtse drang skrangs nad mtho ba dang // zab pa las sbyar de las gzhan// lhag pa ring zhing rtse gug pa/
88a3(gso rig): so thung na tshul ji bzhin sbyar// ut+pa la dang sor phyed kyis// dral dang de bzhin dpyad par bya// sbrul kha rtse so ro phyed rna ba// sna yi thor bu dpyad la sbyar// rma tshol 'jom po blta sla ba'i// mgo bo 'dras zhal brtag/
88a4(gso rig): par bya// de las gzhan po khab rtse 'dra// rtse spug can ni dbugs dang sbyar// lcang ma'i lo 'dra 'bigs pa la// shau ri'i chu 'dra mda' bu gi/ kha 'dra rtse gsum khrag gzags la// 'dzag rtse a ta'i mchu 'dra ba/
88a5(gso rig): 'bras bu sor gnyis khrag 'byin la// de 'dra'i so ni nang du blta// kha cig 'bras zla ba kham pa 'dra// sor ni phyed dang gnyis yod bya// rtse mo 'bras dang 'dra ba la// sor ni phyed dang gnyis yod gang // de ni rtsa
88a6(gso rig): lto'i nad la sbyar// sta re spangs 'dra ba lang so// 'dra ba'i btsag bras rgyar ni sor phyed pa// de yi yu ba gyon bstan pa// rus pa'i steng gnas rtsa la gdab// zangs ma'i thur ma rtse gnyis pa// rtse mo me tog
88b1(gso rig): khwa 'bus 'dra// de yis mthong nyams mig sbyin dbugs// rgyu 'dra'i btsag pu bya ba ni// sor gdub 'dra las kha byung ba// btsag bras rgyur ni sor phyed pa// rigs pas 'phel btsug lta bu 'am//
88b2(gso rig): dkyil 'khor lta bu'i rtse 'dra bya// de ni 'dzub myo'i ra t+no la// gladags su rung po'i rgyu 'dra bya// srang bus bstod la gro ba'i nang // nad rnams ba cad dang grol la sbyar// gre ba'i sha lhag thor tshugs 'dzin//
88b3(gso rig): lcags kyu rtse mo legs gug bya// rus pa gcod pa'i srog le ni// srid du sor bcu zhong sor gnyis// so rnams 'phra zhing rab tu rno// yu ba chang bzungs legs par bya// rma yi chu rgyus sgra bcad pa'i// chan pa
88b4(gso rig): chan pa 'dra bar bya// so yo sngo dr-id kha gnyis pa'i// senu mo'i 'dreg bcad sor dgu la// zug rngu 'phra 'byung bcad pa dang // bral dang dbug dang phyi bar bya// zur bzhi pA la sor gcig pa// dbyibs ni kun
88b5(gso rig): tu gcig 'dra ba// sro phyi ba yi btsigs dpyad+ma ste// so yi dreg pa phyi bar bya// khab ni mgo zlum mi zabs tshe// mkhrang pa gsum bya de lngas ni// sha che ba yi phyogs su ni// zur gsum srid du sor gsum pas//
88b6(gso rig): sha chung pa dang rus tshigs na// rma yod pa la srid sor gnyis// zhu dang ma zhu'i gnas gnang rma'i// khab rtse 'bras dbyibs gzhu ltar dgu// srid du sor ni phyed dang gsum// khab ni bdun dang brgyad kun yang / zlum po
89a1(gso rig): sor ni legs sbam pa// khri gcig la gtsugs par 'dra ba// btsan sngo gdong nad thig le gnag/ skra 'byi ba la btsag par bya// kha brgyad zlum pa sor phyed pa//
89a2(gso rig): gcig tu sbams la gzar bu 'dra// lag pa gnyis kyis btsugs nas ni// de yis sna yi khrag dbyung ngo // rna shal dbugs pa'i skung bu ni// yu ti ka yi kha 'bus 'dra// skung bu sor ni phyed par bya// de
89a3(gso rig): yi tshad dbugs de yan chad// zur bzhi par byas de yi ni// skrangs smin ma smin dogs la dbugs// rna drung sha ni stug po dbug/ snying du khA ni sbom po la// sum cha sbu gu yod byas pa// sor gsum
89a4(gso rig): pa yis rna ba dbug/ pad+ma'i thal sman ma btsa' dang // 'ching bu rdo dum sen mo sogs// lcags min gter dpyad phra mo ste// de yang de bzhin sbyar bar bya// cha dpyad 'khrul 'khor sogs pas kyang //
89a5(gso rig): mkho ba nad kyi dbyibs dang sbyar// 'dren dang 'byin dang 'dral dang 'drub// dmigs chol phyi bsal zhal zhal gdab// btsag dpyad gsheg dbug rtsub po dang // bzung sreg de yi bye ba yin// bcad dang dral dang phyi/
89a6(gso rig): ba'i phyir// dpyad kyi btsag 'bras rtsa ba'i bar// mdzub mo gung mo mtheb mo yis// ma yengs pa dang legs par bzung // gtar gau gdab phyir rtse mo'i drung // mdzub mo dang ni mthe bosau bzung // 'bras 'dra ba yi yu ba ni// /
89b1(gso rig): chang bar bcug ste rtse mo gdab// dbyung don yu ba nas bzung bya// gzhan dag bya ba gang bder bya// lta dpyad sna tshogs dag gi snod // gso ras bal snam min dri 'am// pags 'jam du ku la
89b2(gso rig): lus byas// rab tu stug pazhing sor dgu/ srid du sor ni bcu gnyis pa// bal gyis bar bcad dpyang bcug la// logs par bzhig ste grub pa dang // thur mas kha ni rgyu bar bya// srin bu pad+ma bder gnas pa/
89b3(gso rig): khrag dbyung phyir ni sbyang bar bya// chu nang nywa dang sbal sogs dang // mi ro'i dri ma rnag las byung // dmar dang dkar dang shin tu gnag/ mi sruni sbom dang 'byil pa dang // 'ja'i tshon dang 'dra r-i stong bkra// spu yod
89b4(gso rig): de rnams dug can yin// spong bya des ni khrag bzhi bas na// g.ya' nag 'dzag rims mgro 'khor bskyed// de la dugs khrag mkhri gso bya// chu mdog rnam par gsol ba dang // dug med nya lcibs med las byung //
89b5(gso rig): rtswa snar ro stong sngo bkra zlum// rgya byaM tu ngur mrig 'dra lus phra// lto nI cung zad ser ba bzang // de yang legs par ma skyugs dang // rtag tu 'thung du bcug pa dag/ chu nang zhugs te nub pa ni// khrag gis myos pa
89b6(gso rig): yin pas sbyang // de nas cig shos sbyar pa btags// chu sbyar ba yi nang du gzhug/ gany+tsi 'am dar ba'i nang du ga zhug/ slar yang chur ni dbugs phyung nas// mar ram sa zhag nu zho 'am// khrag gi thigs pa
90a1(gso rig): bskus 'thung gzhug/ 'thungs tshe ro bstod mthong gyur na// ras sam srab mos g.yog par bya// khrag ni bzang ngan 'dres pa las/ pad+ma dang por nad khrag ni// 'thungs te

90a4(gso rig): na rengs myos 'gyur// bum pa chu dang sa blug pa// gzhan dang gzhan du bzhag par bya// kha chu rul ba ga sbrang phyir bya// gzhan du dug dang bcas par 'gyur// ma dag pa 'am khrag mang byung // skyer pa bu ram

90b1(gso rig): kan la sbyar bya// bad kan las gyur nad khrag ni// bska bas rngubs ru bzhi pa mi bya// rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur khrag/ rngabs rus bzhibs te dpung bar bya// lus kyi gong du srad bu 'am// ras kyis dam du
90b2(gso rig): bcingaso nas ni// chu ba tshigs rus gnad rnams ni// dor de zhal zhal gdab par bya// gyen du dbyung ba'i thabs kyis ni// thur du bab pa gdab par bya// zas dang nye dang 'phred mo gdab // btab pa'i gnas
90b3(gso rig): su'ang gdab mi bya// zhal zhal bya ba phyogs gcig 'dus// rtsa mdung srin bus khrag dbyung zhing // bem bem por gyur ra sogs gdab// nad khrag lus khyab gtar ge gdab// khrag nad 'dus pa zhal

91b1(gso rig): 'gram sna drung rtsa la gdab// rna ba'i nad la rna ba'i rtsa// sna yi nad la sna rtser ro// cham pa sna dang dpral rtsa gdag/ kha nad rnams la lce dang ni// mchu dang rkan gyi rtsa gdab bo// nam tshong yan chad rtsa

92a1(gso rig): byung kun bsags stobs dang ldan// bkra shis byas shing kha zas ni// snam zos khu ba 'thungs pa dang // me dang nyi tshan gyis gdungs bya// bus mnyam mtho ba'i stan la 'dug/

95b1(gso rig): bsra sngags byas la// gnas gzhan phyin ci 'phags 'gyur na// ci rigs par ni dbyung bar bya// rma yi sgo nas dbyung dka' ba// gzhan dag la yang de bzhin sbyar// rus par zug pa rkyang par ni//

95b5(gso rig): bas brdungs pa yis// mtho zhing snang bar gyur na dbyung // lam ma yin par 'byung ba gang // de nyid kyis ni dmar phyung bya// mde'u zur bcum ste dbyung ba 'am// dong bu'i kha yis dbyung bar bya// rna ba med cing rma
95b6(gso rig): kha ra bye// drang 'dug khab long bstan pas dbyung // zhu ba'i gnas so zug rngu ni// bkru sman nyid kyis dbyung bar bya// rlung gnod dug dang nu zho dang // khrag dang chus gnod bzhibs pas bsal// gre ba'i nang
96a1(gso rig): zhugs zug rngu la// skad pa gre bar gzhug bya ste// pad+ma'i rtsa bar skud pas gdags// pang rtsa zug rngu lhan cig drang // lcags bsregs mig chur bcug pa yis// lcags thur
96a2(gso rig): brtan por byas nas ni// rgya skyegs can nam rgya skyegs mang // rgya skyags kyis brkos zug rngu bsrung // skra shang 'dzings pa 'thungs pa dang // gsher bas tsher ma zug pa gdon// 'phral du srang bu thogs pa yis//
96a3(gso rig): smon par bya'o dris cig shos// kha snar drang bar ma nus na// gzhon du thur du med par bya'o// zas kyis mnangs pa'i zug rngu ni// chu btungs phrag par rdeg pas gzhug/ mig gi rma yi zug rngu phra// dur ram
96a4(gso rig): bil lam chu yis bsal// mig ni chus yang kha bu ba ste// sprug pa'am brkyang la bcir smon pa 'am// thal khung bskos te mi yi ni// ske ba'i bar du nub tu gzhugs/ rna ba chus gang lag pa yis// mnyes la
96a5(gso rig): til mar rgyun blug la// rna ba thur du bstan nas ni// gdab pa 'i ma yang na rngub par bya// rna ba'i nang du 'bu zhugs ni// rna ba tshwa chus bkang pa 'am// tshwa chu dro 'jam nyid kyis dgang // shi nA 'bu ro dbyung thabs bya//
96a6(gso rig): rgya skyegs can dang gser dngul sogs// 'byung khungs las byung yun ring gnas// mtshon ni phal cher lus kyi ni// drod kyis 'ju bar byed pa yin// sa dang 'od ma shing ra rus// so dang skra dang rdo ba'ang 'ju//
96b1(gso rig): rA dang 'od tshal lcags ta la// shing du tshal zug rngu rong bos kyang // phal cher de dag tshol 'gyur la// khrag dang sha yos tshos par byed// zug rngu sha yos ting du zug/ phyogs de tsha ba'ang med gyur na// de nas de ni snang
96b2(gso rig): bya'i phyir// gnye dug sna sbyang dang sha dbri blta// sman rnon bcing dang zas sgom sbyin// mtshon gyis btab cing btsags pa yis// smin par byas nas rmya dbral dang // btsal dang bye bas zug rngu dbyung // zug rngu gnas
96b3(gso rig): dang tshe byad kyi// tshul ni mang po legs brtags te// blo ldan thabs ni de dang de// shes par byas la zug rngu dbyung // yan lag brgyad po'i snying po bsdus pa las//
96b4(gso rig): mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu brgyud pa'o// / de nas gtar ga gdab pa'i khas kyi cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o// rma ni phalnga cher dang por ni// sbyangs dang smin las 'byung bar 'gyur// de bas de nyid
96b5(gso rig): gso bya ste// de bsil byug blugs khrag dbyung dang // legs par sbyangs pa la sogs pas// smin par gyur khas 'bad de bsrung // thor bu ma smin skrangs drod chung // mdog 'dra sra zhing brten par gnas// smin tshe mdog
96b6(gso rig): ni 'gyur ba dang // dmar zhi nga rkyal bu'i dbyibs ltar 'dug/ gas pa lta bu'i nad bcas dang // yan lag snyom zhing glal bcas dang // lus grugs 'khrugs tsha yi ga 'chus// rims 'debs skom dang gnyid med dang /
97a1(gso rig): mar 'khyags bzhag na 'ju ba dang // rma gtar reg na mi bzod do// smin 'gyur na ba'i shugs chung zhing // rnyid cing skya la gnyer ma 'du// mtha' ma 'dzum zhing dbus su mtho//
97a2(gso rig): ga ya' dang skrangs pA la sogs chung // rkyal pa yi nI chu lta bur// reg na rnag nI phan tshun rgyu// rlung min mi na mkhris min che// med de bad kan medo min skrangs// khrag med dmar bar mi 'gyur te// de bAs
97a3(gso rig): nad khrag dang bcas smin// smin pa thol drags khong stong dang // nad kyis zos pas pags pa srab// gnyer ma 'dzum zhing mdog gnag la// ba spu rnams ni 'byi bar 'gyur// bad kan shes che'i
97a4(gso rig): spangs pa ni// sbyin pa gting ring khrag gis gang // de bas smin brtags gsal ma yin// skrang pa gang du bsil 'gyur zhing // pags mdog mi 'gyur ni tshe bas chung // rdo ltar ra ga na sra ba ni// mkhas
97a5(gso rig): pas the tshom med par de// khrag gis smin pa zhes bshad bya// snying stobs nyam chung byis pa dang // thor bu smin pa che bas che ba 'am// gnad dang rus tshigs la sogs par// 'byung ba ma gtogs gzhan
97a6(gso rig): dag 'dral// ma smin brtol na rtsa rgyus las// gnod cing khrag ni mang du 'byung // nang tshabs rab 'phel rma gyis pa 'am// rma 'byung thor bu 'byung bar 'gyur// rnag ni nang nas gnas gyur pa// 'phel bas
97b1(gso rig): rtsa rgyus sha dang ni// khrag rnams myur du sreg byed de// rtsa bskams la ni me dang mtshungs// gang zhig ma smin brtol ba dang // gang zhig smin kyang btang snyoms 'jog/ khyad par mi shes de dag ni// sme sha can
97b2(gso rig): 'drar shes par bya// ma brtol ba yi dang por ni// kha zas phan pa sbyin par bya// tshor ba mi bzang bzod 'gyur bas// chang 'thung pa li chang blung bya// zas zos pa yis mi brgyal zhing // nang du mtshon btab
97b3(gso rig): tshor mi 'gyur// rum bu bu shi rde'u chags dang // kha nad dmu rdzing can ma gtogs// de nas yo byad kun bsogs te// nad pa shar du kha bstan lo// sman pa sngon phyogs bsdams nas ni// gnad sogs ma
97b4(gso rig): gtogs btsags bus gdab// sha zhugs rjes mthun shin tu rno// btsag bu rnag phyir bar du btang // de ni cig car gdab par bya// smin pa chen po yod kyang ni// rma zheng sor gnyis dral bya 'am// sor gnyis
97b5(gso rig): pa yis zabs sor gsum// mdzub mo chu ba pu dag gis// gnas phyogs ji bzhin brtag pa 'am// rma tshol gyis ni legs btsal zhing // kun tu legs par brtag par bya// gang nas gong du 'gro 'gyur
97b6(gso rig): ba'am gang du mthong ba shes byas la// de dang der ni rma gtong de// legs phye phug ni mod par bya// mchu dang zheng du ci nas kyang // nad ni gnas par mi 'gyur bya// sman pa dpa' brtan las la myur// mtshon
98a1(gso rig): rno mi rdul mi 'dar ba// kun tu rmongs par ma gyur pa// btsag bu 'debs pa'i las la bsngags// gyen du bcang rtsa dpral smin rtsa// rnyil dang skye rtsa lto sgo dang // mchan khung dang nI mig sbubs
98a2(gso rig): mchu// mkhur tshos brla drung chu so rtsa'o// gzhan dag gyen du bcad na ni// rtsa dang chu ba'ang ma rungs 'gyur// btsag bus btab nas nad pa ni// tshig snyan chu ni bsil po yis// dbugs phyung nas ni de 'og rma//
98a3(gso rig): sor mos kun nas btsir ba dang // bska ba'i chu Is legs bkru zhing // sman chur bcug pa'i gos kyis phyi// gu gul dbungs kar a ru ra// shing kun ka ra rgyum tsha dang // shu dge nim+pa'i lo ma ni// mar dang
98a4(gso rig): sbyar bas gdug par bya// til gyi lde gu mar sbrang rtsi// rang gi sman ni ji lta ba si// byugs shing de nas rma tshangs gzhug/ de nyid kyis ni de g.yogs la// mar dang phyo sbrus bsku ba dang // de 'og bkog tse stug po ni//
98a5(gso rig): gzhag ste shin tu maM yongs pas// gos kyis legs par bcing bya ste// blo dang g.yas dang g.yon dag gam// steng dang 'og tu ma song bya// rma tshas bkog tshe dkr-i sa mar bcas// phra zhing sra la gcing ba la/
98a6(gso rig): spos kyis bdugs te 'jam la gnyen// kham khum med cing rma la phan// bcings nas de gnod pa bzlog phyir bsrung bar bya// de rnams la ni gtor ma sbyin// lak+Sha gu a ti gu ha// spang spos pra ma tsa ri ni//
98b1(gso rig): tshatra a ti tsha tA dang // durba shu dag yungs kar dang // rtag tu de yi spyi bor btags// de nas snum gyi cho gar bshad// nyin re'i kun spyod bshad par bstun// nyin par gnyid lag rma g.ya' zhing // kha dmar nang
98b2(gso rig): sbyangs rnag 'khyims 'gyur// bud med dran nam ma rnyog pa'am// mthong bas khu ba byung gyur na// ma phrad na'ang 'khrig pa laso// byung ba'i skyon ni thob par 'gyur// kha zas dag ni gang goms las// nas dang
98b3(gso rig): gr-i dang drug cu po// sran chung mud+hA tu ba ri// nr-i shaM nA ga dzI ban+ti// la phug gzhon nu brta kA/ rgya sne'u tan+du li ya ka/ ka ra bye wa karko ta// ka du ka pa la pa to la// rgyam tshas 'bru skyu ru ra// chu bskol ba ni bgrangs pa dang //
98b4(gso rig): 'bras rnying chang dang snum nyung zad// zos rjes chu tshan btung ba dang // skam sa'i sha ni zos gyur na// rma ni myur du 'tsho bar 'gyur// dus su ran par bza' ba dang // phan pa zos na bde 'ju 'gyur// ma zhu ba yi rlung
98b5(gso rig): la sogs// ldang zhing nang ni stobs can 'gyur// de las sbyangs dang rnag pa dang // tshwa dang sbas par 'gyur pa yin// 'bru gser til dang ma shra dang // chang dang brlan can las byung sha/ 'o mo bu ram shing las
98b6(gso rig): gyuras sbyar dang len mtsha ba dang // gzhan gang 'khru ba gcod byed dang // tshe dang bsil dang lci ba spang // 'bru ser la sogs sde tshan 'di// rma dang ldan pa'i nad kun bskyed// chang ni rno ba cha rtsub 'gyur// mal myur du gnas par
99a1(gso rig): byed du la su shi ras g.yang cing // 'di ni bskyed par mi bya ga khrag shu pa mi gzugs phrug mi bya// baspyod pa'i tshe na bag bya'o// mdzas nga bram ze rgan sogs kyis// gtam nI
99a2(gso rig): yid la dga' ba mnyan// nad yas thor pa'i re bcas pas// rma ni myur du 'tsho ba bar 'gyur// nyin gsum lon tshe rma yi las// slar yang bkrus sogs las rnams ni// snga ma bzhin bya de bzhin du// nyin zhag gnyis
99a3(gso rig): par mi bya'o// tshabs cher na zhing mi 'byar la// rma ni yun ring zhig na 'tsho ba// rma tshangs sam ni lde gus slan// snum ches rtsub ches dam pa dang // lhong grags bzhag nyes mi bya ste// snum ches rma ni red par 'gyur//
99a4(gso rig): rtsub che sau sha 'chad shin tu na// gas shIng khrag ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dam dang lhod grags bzhag nyes pas// rma yi kha ni 'drud par 'gyur// rma ni rnag bcas skrangs shing mtho// rgyu bcas rna phug bcas pa 'di//
99a5(gso rig): rma tshas 'jam po nang gnas pas// rma yi skyon ni dag par byed// skyengs pa ha cang ma smin brtol// smin zhing gnags par 'gyur ba spyad// phan pa'i sman dang zas dang dkri/ shin tu da mar mi gnod pas gso//
99a6(gso rig): snad pa'i rma ni gsar du byung // ral zhing kha byi 'phral du bcom// sprin bu chen po bkas pa dang // rna bi shal bu ga chad pa 'ang btsem// mgo dang mi phugs sna dang mchu// mkhur chos rna ba dpung ba swa// mgul
99b1(gso rig): pa phrag pa rlig pa dbyi// pho mtshan gzhang dang lto ba sogs// phugs ring pa yi gnas rnams dang // sha che mi 'gul ma yin dang // chu so mchan khung la sogs dang // sha chung mgul pa'i rma dag dang //
99b2(gso rig): dbugs dbyung zug rngu yod pa dang // thal sman dug mes tshig mI btsem// btsem pu rus dum khrag skam dang // rtsa dang spu rnams bsal nas ni// sha chad dum bu 'phyang ba dang // rang gi gnas su brlan
99b3(gso rig): pa yang // rus tshigs bcug cing khrag gzigs la// skud pa shIng shun rgyus pas btsem// bsrubs ni nye ba 'am ring mi bya// blang bya che ba 'am chung mi bya// de nas sgro srid byos nas mthar// rma ni sbrang rtsi mar sbyar
99b4(gso rig): dang tA skyer pa zar ma'i dud pa dang // 'bras bu gsum dang sa la kI/ seng phrom mngar ba snum bcas pas// bskus bcing la sogs sngon bzhin bya// rma kha khrag ni med 'gyur grang // de ni cung zad blung bya ste// rma
99b5(gso rig): 'byor byed pa khrag yin pas// phyung ste legs par grub par bya// de la bcings pa yul rje la sogs// brtags na nges par sbyar bar bya// bal gos pags pa dar gsum dro// zar ma'i ras ni bsol baM yin//
99b6(gso rig): gro grang ran pa shing bal rdal// ras ba laM rgyus pa shing shun yin// zangs lcags zha nye ro nye yis// bang kan tshil ches rmal glan// chag thur shi byas pags pa dang // shing shun dmig rtsa la sogs pas bcing /
100a1(gso rig): dbyibs ni rang min rjes mthun yin// bcing ba bco lnga rnam bya ste// shubs dang bkra shis lhod par bcing // mthar chags bcing dang zlum por bcing // mda' lcags
100a2(gso rig): khri dang dam bcing dang // sge'u bla re o ga shal dang // 'ur mthil zung glan zlum pa dang // yan lag lnga pa zhes bya sbyar// de las gang zhig gang legs sbyor// de ni de ru legs pa ra sbyar// baR+Ya dang mjug ces mtshan
100a3(gso rig): khung dang // chu so spyi bor dam du bcing // lag ngag gdong dang rna ba dang // rgya ba dang rtsib log mgul pa lto// pho mtshon rlig pa ran par bcing // mig dang tshigasu lhod par bcing // lhod cing rma ni bad kan dang // rlung shas
100a4(gso rig): che la ran par bcing // ran zhing gnas su dam du bcing // dam btsang shin tu dam du bcing // dgun dang de bzhin dpyid kyi che// zhag ni gsum gsum dag nas dgrol// khrag mkhris shes che'i rma dag ni// dam btsong
100a5(gso rig): gnas su ran par bcing // ran bcing gnas su lhod par bcing // lhod cing gnas su bcing mi bya// de gnyis so ga ston gyi tshe// snga dro phyi dro dgrol bar bya// ma bcings sha sbrang sbrang bu dang // lhags pa bser bu sogs
100a6(gso rig): pas gnod// rma red gyur zhing der snum dang // sman ni yun ring gnas mi 'gyur// sbyang pa 'am 'tsho bar dka' ba dang // 'tsho bas kyang mdog ni mi sdug 'gyur// bcings na chag cing phye mar gyur// 'phres sam 'bur 'gyur/
100b1(gso rig): dral gyur tam// rtswa dang rgyus pa chad gyur kyang // rma ni bde bar myur du 'tsho// ljang dang nyal ba la sogs pa'i// spyod lam kun la gnod pa med// rma kha skyes mtho mi mnyam dang // sra zhing rab na 'tsho ba
100b2(gso rig): dka'/ 'jam zhing mnyam la na ba med// rma ni myur du dag cing 'tshog/ rman+ti yun riH sha chung dang // rtsu bar 'byor par ma gyur na// nad gzhi dus tshigs ji bzhin du// sman dang lo mas dgab par bya// ma rnyings
100b3(gso rig): gzhon zhing bu gA med// kun las legs par khebs pa dang // phyis shing mi rtsub lo ma ni// 'o ma can shing rtag pa dang // ardzu na dang ka taM pa'i// lo mA yis ni g.yog par bya// mdze dang me yis tshig pa dang //
100b4(gso rig): 'bus zos gcin nad sbrang rtsi 'dra// byi ba sbrul gyi dug dang ni// thal sman rno dang dug gis phog/ rma ni bcing par mi bya zhing // sha 'drul gzhang khar mi bzang rnags// 'drul zhing tsha dang na bcas par// skrangs
100b5(gso rig): skyabs me dpal mi bcing ngo // rma gang legs par mA bsrungs par// sbrang ma srin bu 'jug byed de// de yis zos pos na ba dang // sbyangs dang rnag khrag 'dzag par byed// dar ni bkru dang ngag par ni// be'u rug la
100b6(gso rig): sogs sde tshan sbyar// sap+ta brna ka rany+dza// arga dang ni ni pa dang // ra dza dang ni shing tsha rnams// bau gcin dang ni btags pa yi// lde gu de la bsku ba dang // thal sman chu ni blug pa phan// yang na sha rlon gyis g.yogs la//
101a1(gso rig): de ni myur du dbyung bar bya// 'di ni nang na skyon bcas pas// myur du 'tsho ba par mi bya ste// de ni gnod pa'ang chung ngus kyang // slar zhing 'grams par 'gyur ba yin// 'tshob par gyur
101a2(gso rig): kyang ma zhu dang // drag shul bud med bsten sogs spang // zla ba drug gom bdun gyi bar// cho ga 'bad par bsrung bar bya// gnas skabs de dang der ni byang gyur tshe// nad gzhi la sogs stobs kyi rjes 'brangs te//
101a3(gso rig): phyi ma nas bshang rgya cher legs brtags la// thabs ni de dang de yis 'bad de gso// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// /
101a4(gso rig): de nas thal sman rnon po dang me btsa' gdab pa'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o// btsags dpyad btsags dpyad rjes 'dru ba// mang po kun las thal sman mchog/ dka' ba rnams su'ang bcad pa'am// dbug
101a5(gso rig): pa la sogs byed par 'gyur// btsags bus gdab par dka' ba la'ang // de yis sgrub par rung ba dang // shin tu gso dka'i nad rnams la// gang zhig tu 'ang rung ba yin// de ni gzhang 'brum me drod nyams//
101a6(gso rig): rde'u 'gags sbyar dug skran sogs btung // rme ba sha bkra sna 'thor dang // phyi rol gzhang 'brum tshor med mdze// thor bu 'brum phran mtshan mar rdol// rma log sogs la byug par bya// khrag mkhris rlung can
101b1(gso rig): nad stobs chung // rims dang tshad 'khru snying klad nad// sgyu rba yi grwa 'chus pa dang // rab rib can dang slon khrus btang // lus kun khyab pa'i 'or nad dang // 'jigs dang sbrum ma zla mtshan can// pho mtshan mo mtshan
101b2(gso rig): sbyangs pa dang // byis pa rgan po zas ma zhu// rtsa bo che dong rus tshigs gnad// rus pa gzhon nu chu ba rtsa// lto bsrubs mgul po lte ba dang // sha srab phyogs dang rlig pa dang // pho mtshan bu ga sen mo phrag/
101b3(gso rig): mig mchu mA gtogs mig nad rnams// tsha grang cha rA dang yul dmus tsha// gnyi ga yang bting bAr mi bya'o// mu ga ka nag sha myaM ka/ chu shing pa ri bau tra ka/ a sha kar+Na 'dzam+bu'i shing // ba la sha dang a
101b4(gso rig): po ta// in+d+ra br-ik+Sha arga dang // nak+Sha mA la muk+ti ka/ sr-i shing a pa marga dAng // ka ka dza ka ts+yai traH// ag+ni man+tha tIl+lA ka/ rlon shing rtsa ba la sogs bcas// dum bur yongs su btubs pi dang // ko sha ta kA rnam bzhi dang /
101b5(gso rig): nas kyi sog ma gre ma rnams// rlung med gnas su bsags nas de// rdo leb steng du so so bzhag/ mr-iSh+Ta ke yi phung po dang // rdo thal rdo gang bcug par bya// de nas til gyi sdong bus sreg/ tshog nas me ni shi ba dang //
101b6(gso rig): rdo thal thal ba logs shig dbye// thal ba gzhan dag bre gang ste// muk+ka'i thal lhag blangs nas ni// so sor phye ste chu dang gcin// srang stong dag dang bsres nas bzhu// tshags ni bzang pos de btsags pa// ji srid
102a1(gso rig): 'byar bag dmar zhing dang // rno bar gyur pa'i bar du ni// thal ba'i dngas ma de blangs la// lcags snod bzang por bskol zhing bcug/ de nas 'tshod par byed pa der// rdo thal
102a2(gso rig): bsregs rdo'i dum bu dang // nya phyis kI ra pa ka dang // dung gi lte ba lcags snod gzhug/ me tog can du lan mang bya// thal sman che ni phul gang dang // me bsad de nyid dang btags la// lde gu der ni gzhug
102a3(gso rig): par bya// khyim bya rma bya bya rgod dang // kaM ki phug ron rtug pa dang // bya dang rkang bzhi'i lakhris pa dang // ba bla ldeng ros lon tshwa rnams// zhi ba btags bcug bya de nas ni// gzar bus de yang kun tu dkug/ gang tshe
102a4(gso rig): lbu ba ra bcas par kho lo// chu bul sdom bsgra lde gu 'dra// de tshe phabA la grangs pa dang // lcags snod bcug ste nang nas gzhug/ 'di ni thal sman 'bring po yin// 'dzum po ma btags par bcug la// bsur
102a5(gso rig): la slar ni gdon par bya// rnon por snga mA bzhin bcug la// lang+ga ling+ga dan+di dang // shu dag bong nga tsi trA ka/ sardzi ka dang khron bu dang // shing kun ka riny+dza'i lo ma// ta la'i lo ma kha ru tsha'i// phye bcug zhag bdun de
102a6(gso rig): bzhag bya// rnon po de ni rlung bad kan// tshol skyes thor bu sogs la btang // 'di nyid nang tshabs 'bring la 'bring // 'jam po khrag mkhris gzhang 'brum la'o// mthu bskyed phyir ni 'o ma chu// thal sman chu ni slar
102b1(gso rig): yang gzhug/ shin tu rno min 'jam dang mnyen// 'byar bag sna rno dkar ba dang // rtse can bde bar 'jil ba dang // mi 'dzag byugs na nad mi che// thal sman yon tan bcu dang ldan// btsag pu me btsa'i
102b2(gso rig): las kyang byed// dkrugs pas bzhib pa lta bu dang // lus ni btsir ba lta bu dang // nad kyi rjes 'gro snyegs pas na// rtsa ba nas ni 'byin par byed// rtsa ba nas ni 'byin par byon par byed// las byas nad dang
102b3(gso rig): bral nas kyang // rang nyid nye bar zhi bar 'gyur// thal sman gyis ni gso ba'i nang // mtshon rtsad blud pa 'am tar gA byas// thal sman thur ma gros kyis ni// dkris pa bgos te glan nas su// grangs brgya'i bar
102b4(gso rig): du bsdad nas phyi// de lha gzhang 'brum bskus gos kyis// g.yogs te lag pas dgab par bya// mig mchu'i nod la mig mchu bzlog/ migA 'bras nA ga po ras bal gyis// bkab ste legs par byug par
102b5(gso rig): bya// thal sman pad lo tsam srab bsku// sna yi bu ga'i thor bu ni// nyi ma la bltas 'dug pa la// sna rtse legs par bteg nas ni// grangs ni lnga bcu'i bar du bzhag/ rna ba'i thor bu laM de bzhin// thal sman
102b6(gso rig): bskus pa'i 'og tu ni// phyis la legs nyes rtogs bya ste// legs tshig mar dang sbrang rtsi bsku// 'o ma rang skyar zho ga chus// dpal bsad de nas mer bcas pa'i// mngar dang bsil bas byug par bya// bza'
103a1(gso rig): btung bad kan bskyed pa dang // bskul ba'i phyir ni sbyin par bya// gal te rtsa ba brtan gyur pas// thal sman gyis bsags mi 'dul na// 'u su sbyar rnyigs shing mngar dang // til gyi lde gus
103a2(gso rig): de tshe bsku// til gyi lde gu shing mngar bcas// mar gyis bskus na rma 'tsho ba byed// smin pa 'dzam bu ltar kun gan ga/ legs chos de las go bzlog pa// dmar zhing ni la g.ya' sogs byed// bsregs nyes
103a3(gso rig): yin te de slar bsregs// bsregs drags khrag ni 'dzag pa dang // brgyal zhing tsha dang rims sogs 'gyur// gzhang khar bsregs drags khyad par du// 'gags pa 'am shas cher 'byung bar 'gyur// khu
103a4(gso rig): pa zad par 'gyur ba'am// gzhang kha 'byung bas 'chi bar 'gyur// snar drags sna yi mtshul bar ni// nyams pa 'am yang na yo ba'am// yul ni 'dzin mi nus par 'gyur// rna ba sogs pa'ang de dang 'dra//
103a5(gso rig): 'di ni mchog tu sbyar ba blug/ shing mngar mar dang til btags byugs// rlung dang mkhris pa sel ba dang // bsil ba'i spyod pa thams cad phan// sbyar ba'i reg pa bsil bas na// thal sman de dang 'dres
103a6(gso rig): gyur na// de yis myur du mngar gyur pas// sbyar bas tsha ba shin tu 'jil// me btsa' thal sman las mchog ste// de bsregs po yis slar mi 'byung // sman dang thal sman mtshon dpyad kyis// ma grub pa yang grub
103b1(gso rig): byed yin// pags pa sha dang rtsa rgyus dang // tshigs dang rus sogs de la gdab// rme ba mdzer nad klad nad dang // mgo bo'i gzhogs phyed na sogs la// pags bsregs ras bal ba lang so// me shel mda' skyug
103b2(gso rig): stsogs me gdab// gzhang 'brum smen bu mtshan par brdol// bu ga rma long la sogs la// sha bsregs pra tshil mar bsregs dang // pu ram 'dzam+b+ha'i chu yis bsregs// pags pa 'byar dang khrag mchod//
103b3(gso rig): thig le gnag sogs pags nad na// de dag nyid kyi rtsa sreg go/ bsreg min thal sman bkag pa dang // nang na mtshon lus rma chen 'byung // khrag zag pa dang lto ral pa'o// legs bsres mar dang sbrang rtsi
103b4(gso rig): bsku// snum dang bsil bas byug par bya// legs pa'i mtshan ma khrag mi 'byung // sgra gcan chu bur phre'u 'byung // tA la'i 'bras smin thi ba 'dra// na ba chung zhing 'tshob par sla// bag med pas bsregs thams
103b5(gso rig): cad dang // bsregs nyes bsregs ni dregs pa dang // ma tshos mtshan nyid dang bcas bzhi// ma tshos pags mdog mi sdug tsha// chu bur 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bsregs nyes chu bur che rab tsha// bsregs drags
103b6(gso rig): pas ni sha 'phyang dang // pags pa 'khum zhing rab tu tsha// dud pa 'khyims pa lta bu dang // rtsa sogs 'khums shing skom dang brgyal// rma yi gting za ba 'chi bar 'gyur// ma chis pas ni me bsrad cing // tsha ba'i
104a1(gso rig): sman ni btang bar bya// khrag bska shin tu na bar 'gyur// zags par gyur na nad tshabs chung // bsregs nyes bsil dang dro ba'i sman// dang por btang na de 'og bsil// bsregs legs
104a2(gso rig): na ni bcu hang dang // p+lak+Sha tsan dan btsag yug snam// sle tres brtags pa mar bcas bsku// de 'og mkhris me dpal ltar spyad// bsregs drags mkhris pa me dpal gyi// cho ga thams cad myur du spyang // snum
104a3(gso rig): gyis shin tu bsregs dregs pas// der ni rtsub pa'i cho ga 'ang bya// snying po gsang ba lta bu ni// gnas 'dir rdzogs par byas pa yin// 'dir don phra ba mdor bshad kyi// rgya cher kun tu bstan pa yin// yan lag
104a4(gso rig): brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// mdo'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu tham pa'o// // yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// mdo'i gnas te gnas dang po rdzogs so// /
104a5(gso rig): de nas lus kyi rum du zhugs pa'i gnas dang po bshad par bya'o// de yang drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pas 'di skad bshed do// khu khrag skyon med par sems can// rang la nyon mongs kyis bskul
104a6(gso rig): nas// tshogs pa mngal du 'chags 'gyur te// gtsub shing lasau ni me byung mtshungs// sa bon bdag nyid 'byung ba che// 'phra mo sems kyi rjes 'gro dang // ma yi kha zas dngas ma las// rim gyis mngal du rnam par
104b1(gso rig): 'phel// ji ltar nyi ma'i gzer gyi me// me shel dang ni phrad gyur pa'i// shing la 'gro bar mi snang ste// sems can mngal gnas de dang 'dra// rgyu yi rjes su 'gro bas na// 'bras bu de dang skal mnyam nyid// sems can skye
104b2(gso rig): gnas sna tshogs 'dzin// zangs ma la sogs bzhus dang mtshungs// de bas khu ba mang ba las// phal cher skyes nas skye 'gyur la// zla mtshan med pas bud med de// de gnyis mnyam las ma ning 'gyur// khu
104b3(gso rig): khrag rlung gis mang du phye// ji lta ba las mtshe mar 'gyur// skye gnas mi mthun gzugs mi sdug/ gnod pa'i dri mos skye bar 'gyur// bud med zla ba re ri khrag/ dngas ma las byung zhag gsum 'dzag/ lo
104b4(gso rig): ni bcu gnyis yan chang nas// lnga bcu'i bar 'dzag de nas zang // bud med lo ni bcu drug lon// skyes pa nyi shu lon dang 'dus// mngale gnas lam dang khu ba khrag/ rlung dang sems ni ngag gyur pa'i// bu ni stobs
104b5(gso rig): dang ldan pa skye// de las lo ni ma tshang ba'i// nad can tshe thung skal ngan pa'i// bu chags pa 'am chags mi 'gyur// rlung sogs rul dang mdud pa can// dri ma skyon dang ldan bshad pa'i// khu khrag sa bon byed mi nusaM//
104b6(gso rig): rang gi mtshan mas skyon byung bshad// khrag gi rul zhing bad kan dang // rlung gis mdud pa can 'drar 'gyur// khrag dang mkhris pa rnag 'dra la// rlung dang mkhris pa zad par 'gyur// 'di dag gso dka' nyes
105a1(gso rig): gsum ldan/ kha shang gci 'dra ba gsor mi rung // rlung la sogs pa gnod 'gyur ba// rang gi spyan gyis gso bar bya// rus pa 'am d+yang ka'i me tog/ seng ldeng se'u 'bru ardzu na/
105a2(gso rig): mar dang bskol ba blud pa 'am// a sa na sogs bskol bas blung // khu khrag mdud 'dra ba la sha'i// thal be sru sru'i rtsa ba phin// rnag 'dra pa ru sha ka dang // n+ya gro d+ha sogs bskol ba blu de// khu ba zad la ro rtsa'i
105a3(gso rig): dpyad// kha shang 'dra spyan khrus shing gun dang // bu shel tsi tra ka bskol blud// zla mtshan mdud 'dra ba tha dang // tsha gsum dug mo nyung bskol blung // zla mtshan rul dang rnag 'dra la// tsan dan blung bya phyis bshad pa'i//
105a4(gso rig): gsang ba'i gan sor bshad kun dang // 'jam btsir byas pa gang yin bya// khu ba dkar zhing lci ba dang // mar dang bska dang mang ba dang // mir dang sbrang rtsi til mar 'dra// mngal du legs tshogs zla mtshan yang //
105a5(gso rig): rgyu skyegs khu ba ri bong khrag/ 'dra zhing bkrus na dag 'gyur bzang // khu khrag skyon me da nad med cing // phan tshun du ni chags pa dang // ro tsa'i snum gyis rtas pa dang // sbyang pa byas shing 'jam rtsi btang // mchog tu skyes pa
105a6(gso rig): 'o mau mar// mngar ba'i sman gyis rta bar bya// bud med til mar sha ngag no// mkhris pa bskyed pa nye bar spyad// bud med nyam chung bzhin ras dang // nu ma rked pa mgul po dang // mig dang dku g.yo skyes pa 'dod// zla mtshan
105b1(gso rig): ldan par shes par bya// dper na nyi ma nub pa na// pad+ma'i kha ni zum par 'gyur// de bzhin zla mtshan dus 'das pa'i// mngal ni khu ba len mi 'gyur// zla ba gcig tu bsngags pa'i khrag/ rtsa chen gnyis las
105b2(gso rig): dus su ni// cung zad gnag cing dri bral ba// rlung gis mngal gyi ska ru 'byin// de nas zla mtshan mthong nyid nas// zhag gsum bar du sems dge bsam// rgyan dang khrus ni spang pa dang // ku sha'i stan la nyal bar bya//
105b3(gso rig): nas thug 'o mas btsos nyung zad// blud cing lto sbyang nyams dmar bya// lo ma 'am rdza sgrogs lag par ni// bza' zhing 'khrig pa spang par bya// de nas zhag ni bzhi pa la// khrus byas gos 'phreng dkar zhing gtsang // pha dang
105b4(gso rig): 'dra ba'i bu 'dod cing // mdun du khyo ni blta bar bya// zla mtshan zhag ni bcu gnyis dus// de las dang po'i zhag gsum dang // bcu gcig po spyad ches gzungs la// bur 'gyur gzhan du bu myor 'gyur// de nas bu phyir slob
105b5(gso rig): dpon gyis// cho ga cho ga bzhin byas la// dmangs rigs phyag 'tshal la sogs las// sngags kyi bya ba med par bya// de ltar 'dod spyod don ldan zhing // yid la 'dod pa'i bu skye 'gyur// khri 'dod gzi' bran dben par ni//
105b6(gso rig): 'dod spyad zhes bya dam pa smra// gzhan du rig bzangs los kyang ni// bu ngan rigs sregs mi 'drar 'gyur// ji lta ba yi bu 'dod pa// de yi tshul du de yis sbyang // yul de 'i skye bo spyod pa dang // de yi yo byad la bsam bya//
106a1(gso rig): las mthar skyes pas zhun mar dang // 'o ma 'bras chan bcas pa bza'// skar ma khan lung gis mAl khrir ni// skyes pa dang po rkang g.yas kyis// 'dzeg bya bud med g.yon gyis
106a2(gso rig): 'dzeg/ de yi g.yas logs dang du nyal// til mar mon sran dre'u bza'// de ni sngags kyi tshig brjod bya// a d+hi ri si/ A yuHrA si/ sarba tA/ pra tiSh+Tha si/ d+ha tA d+ha tu/ bu d+ha ba tra/ ba d+ha du/ br-i h+na brtsa swa b+hA ba zhes
106a3(gso rig): bya ba'o// tshangs pa phur bu khyab 'jug dang // nyi zla tha skar bu gnyis dang // legs ldan mdza' bo chu lha rnams// bdag la dpa' ba'i bu stsol cig/ de nas phan tshun spro bskyed de// dga' dang btsas pas gnas
106a4(gso rig): par bya// bud med der sems gan rkyal gnas// yan lag legs par gnas 'dug bya// de ltar nyes par rang gnas 'dug/ sa bon legs par 'dzin par 'gyuraro// 'phrul du mngal chags mtshan ma ni//
106a5(gso rig): mngal du mtshan ma 'dzin pa dang // 'dod ngoms ci dang g.yo ba dang // khrag dang khu ba rjes 'dres dang // snying 'phar ba dang snyom pa dang // skom dang rmya dang pa spu ldang // zla ba dang po mi gsal zhag/ bdun nas nur nur
106a6(gso rig): bo ru 'gyur// 'di ni mngal gyi bu bskyed pa// gsal bar ma gyur gong du bya// skyes bu byed pa 'di stobs ldan// las kyang zil gyis gnon par nus// skor ma rgyal skyes bu yi gzugs// gser ram pa rmyi lam lcags
106b1(gso rig): las byas// me tog gyur bsregs 'o mar bcug/ de ni snyim gung blud par bya// yang na go ra dan+d+ha dang // a pa ma ga dzi ba ka/ zangs rtsi ba dang sher+ya ga/ gcig gam gnyis sam gsum zhig gam// thams cad tshul
106b2(gso rig): btags pa ni// skar ma rgyal la bab tshe blung // khri ha tI ni dkar po'i rtsa// 'o mar btabA pa rang nyid kyis// bu 'dod sna khung g.yas par blug/ bu mo 'dong na g.yon par blug/ lag+na rma'i nA rtsa 'o mer sbyar// bu bskyed gnas pa
106b3(gso rig): rab ster byed// de bzhin n+ya gro'i myu gu brgyad// sbyar bai sna'am kha nas btung // 'tsho byed kyis ni sman sde rnams// phyi dang nang nas nye bar sbyar// mngal 'dzin yid 'ong phan pa yi// khyo dang 'khor gyi bsnyen bkur bya// mar
106b4(gso rig): sar zhun mar 'o ma rnams// rtag tu de la blud por bya// nyal po drags dang rtsol drags dang // khur dang gos ni lci ba dang // nyin nyal nub mo gnyid ma log/ stan sra ga bur 'dug pa dang // mya ngan khro dang 'jigs dang
106b5(gso rig): b+h+yo/ shugs dang sred pa dgag pa dang // rmyang ba lam 'gro rno dang tsha// lci dang bshang 'gags zan za dang // gos dmar gyon dang gAyang sa dang // khron lta shaM za chang 'thung dang // gan rgyal nyal dang bud med dang // mi
106b6(gso rig): 'dod gang yin de kun spang // de bzhin ga tar ga gdab slon khrus// mas btang zla brgyad par mi bya// 'di dag gis ni mngal 'jig pa 'am// dag bskams pa'ang 'tsho bar 'gyur// rlung ni skyed par byed pas mangs/
107a1(gso rig): sgur po 'on long mi thung 'gyur// mkhris pa can gyis spyi cher ser// khang kan sha bkra s+yA rbab 'gyur// nang gzhan 'jam zhing bde ba dang // rnon po ma yin sman gyis
107a2(gso rig): gas+ho// nur nur po las zla gnyis pAr// gor gor mer mer nar nar po// de la po mo ma ning rim// de nas gsal 'gyur mtshan ma ni// ring cing dgu ni lci ba dang // brgyal skyugs yi 'chus pa dang // grul dang
107a3(gso rig): mchil mang snyom bAg dang // spu yi phreng ba gsal ba dang // skyur la dga' zhing nu ma rgyas// nu zhor bcas zhing rtse mo gnag/ rkang pa skrang zhing kha zas na// sred pa sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur// 'di yi snying ni
107a4(gso rig): ma las skyes// ma yi snying yang de dang ni// 'brel pas de phyir sbrum mA ni// sred pa dgag par mi bya'o// de la snod par gyur pa'ang // phan dang bsres te cung zad sbyin// sred pa bkag na mngal gyi bu// me sdug
107a5(gso rig): paba'am 'jog par 'gyur// zla ba gsum par de yi lus// mgo bo dpyi gnyis dpung pa gnyis// yan lag lnga ni gsal ngong 'gyur// yan lag 'phra mo rnams kyang 'byung // mgo bo sogs dang cha mnyam
107a6(gso rig): du kha de dang sdug bsngal shes pa 'byung // mngal gnas lte ba ma yi ni// snying gi rtsa dang 'brel pa'i phyir// de yis de ni 'phel 'gyur te// zhing gi yur ba dag dang mtshungs// bzhi par yan lag gsal dong
107b1(gso rig): 'gyur// lnga par sems ni gsal bar 'gyur// drug par chub rtsa dang spu// sen mo pags pa mdog stobs 'gyur// bdun pa dngos po thams cad kyis// yan lag kun ni rdzogs par 'gyur// mngal gnas
107b2(gso rig): nab kyis nyin gzir na// de tshe snying dang 'brel pa'i phyir// g.ya' dang tsha bar byed pa dang // pags gas rma bran 'byung bar 'gyur// der ni mar sar rgya shug chu// mngar bya'i sman sde bskol ba phan// lan tshwa nyung
107b3(gso rig): zhing snum bag can// yang zhing mngar ba'i kha zas bza'// tsan ngan pu shel tsi'i lde gus// brang dang nu ma lto la bsku// 'bras bu gsum pa 'am e Ne ya// shaM bkra ri bong khrag sbyar bsku// ka ra bi ra'i lo ma dang //
107b4(gso rig): tI la mar bskol bas bstu s+yA te mnye// pa to la dang nim pa bcod// be'u rug gis kyang bslu bar bya// sbyirarU paM shing medAr chu yis ni// bkru dang bsku ba bsten par bya// zla ba brgyad par ma dang bu// thangs re rim
107b5(gso rig): gyis gzi mngangs 'pho// de yis de gnyis zhum dgrar 'gyur// byis mngangs ma la mi gnas pas// de tshe btsas na mi 'tsho la// bud med the tshom bcas skabs 'gyur// 'dir ni 'o ma can blud cing // mngar ba'i
107b6(gso rig): sman dang bskol ba yis// mar gyi 'jam rtsi btang bya zhing // phyi sa snying pa dag bya'i phyir// la phug skam dang rgya shug sgyur// bska ba dag dang bskol ba bsngags// she ta puSh+pa'i lde gu ni// rgya mi tsha til mar 'jam rtsi
108a1(gso rig): btang // de tshe zhag gcig 'das pa na'ang // dus su btsas yin de phan chad// rlung gis dkur ni bkag gyur na// lo yi bar du gnod pa bskyed// zla dgu lon na snum bcas
108a2(gso rig): pa'i// 'bras chan sha khu blud pa bsngags// snum mang nas thug sbyin pa 'am// sngar bshad pa yi 'jam rtsi btang // de nyid la bcug ras bal ni// mtshan la rtag tu gzhug par bya// rlung 'joms lo ma
108a3(gso rig): bskol ba'i chu// bgrangs pas nyin re bkrus pi phan// zla dgu phan chad lus la ni// snum med par ni mi bzhag go// nu zho g.yas pa sngar phyung zhing // g.yas logs nas ni brten po dang // 'dri tshig skyes
108a4(gso rig): pa'i ming can smra// dga' zhing rmi lam skyes pa mthong // dku nI g.yas pa mtho ba dang // mngal yang kun nas zlum pa dag/ bu skye gzhan du bu mor 'gyur// gang yang skyes pa prang 'dod dang // glu gar rol mo la
108a5(gso rig): dga' dang // dri dang phreng chags bu mo skye// de 'dres pas ni ma ning 'gyur// sku yis dbus ni mtho ba yin// mtshe mi logs gnyis mtho bas ni// lte ba dma' bar 'dug pa yin// dag pa'i dang po nas brtsams
108a6(gso rig): te// sa phyogs shis shing yo byad ni// phun tshogs ldan pas dge bo'i zhag/ de ni bcas khyim zhugs par bya'o// der ni bud med btsas myong pas// bskor te btsa' ba'i dus par bsdang // deng dam sa pa ni bu
108b1(gso rig): btsa' rtags// skom zhing dku dang mig ltong dung// s+yAd du lci zhing yi ga 'chus// mchil ma mang zhing gcin mang 'gyur// brla dang rked pa lto dang rgyu ga// snying dang chu so bAn+d+ha rtsan// mtshan mdzen zhing zug pa dang //
108b2(gso rig): 'gul zhing 'dzag par 'gyur ba yin// rang dbang med gyur rjes su ni// de 'og mngal gyi chu 'dzag 'gyur// de nas ma ngal nang nas byung rtsom// bkra shis bsrungs pa'i cho ga byas// lag par 'bras bu skyes mi
108b3(gso rig): bzhag les bskus chu ni dron por blug/ mar dang bcas pa'i thug pa blung // de 'og sa la mal bcas 'dug/ brla gnyis bkug ste gan rkyal gnas// yan lag yang nas yong du bsku// lte ba man chad monye bya/
108b4(gso rig): zhing // glal dang 'tshig pa byed du gzhug/ de ltas mngal gnas thur du 'byung // de rtags snying ga la 'phos nas// mngal gnas lto bar zhugs nas ni// chu so'i steng na gnas par 'gyur// de nas dbang med nang
108b5(gso rig): ldan de// myur du khri la bzhog par bya// daM 'og mngal nas legs btsir nas// de yi mtshan ni dbye bar bya// dang por dal gyis pa cir bya zhing // btsa' khar drag tu btsir bar bya// de nas bu skye'i sgra dang ni// chu dang
108b6(gso rig): rlung gis dga' ba bskyed// btsas pa'i nad kyis gzir ba yi// srog bral 'dra ba slar gso bya// mngal du thogs na sbrul nag po'i// pags pas mo mtshan bdug par bya// byar sna'i me tog rtsa ba 'am// lcam
109a1(gso rig): pa 'am yang nA bi sha la// rkang pa 'am lag par gdags par bya// shA ma dbyung ba'i phyir yang ni// de dag nyid bya de nas brdeg/ dpung pa gnyis nas bzung ste smug/ rting pas
109a2(gso rig): mjug rdo rdeg pa dang // rkub tsos ngam du btsir bar bya// skra yis lkog ma rkan reg bya// stu ha'i lo ma spyi bor blug/ ltag pa ku ba lang+ga li// sbrul lpags ru rta yungs kAr rnams// re re 'am gnyis sam ma lus pa//
109a3(gso rig): mo mtshan drug pa 'am bdug par bya// ru rta 'am bal bu'i lde gu ni// chang dngas dang naM blud par bya// ku lang+gi 'am bal ba za// chang rnying dag la btab ste blung // shu ti yungs kar zi ra dang // shri kru tik+Sha ku krug
109a4(gso rig): tres/ shing kuT ru rta po sen cha// 'o ma ba gcin yungs mar dang // bskol ba bshang ba'i sgo 'am ni// mo mtshan nas ni 'jam rtsi btang // shu ti shu thag ru rta dang // yungs kar pi pi ling lde gu// snum
109a5(gso rig): dang lal tshwar bcas pa yi// mas btang sha ma myur du 'byin// der thog rgyu ni rlung yin te/ de bcom sha ma myur du 'byung // yang nA lag bkrus sor mo bregs// mkhas pa yis ni drangs te
109a6(gso rig): dbyung / sha ma byung na mo mtshan dang // ya na lag til mar gyis byugs mnya// mngal nad gzer ni chu so mgo/ lto ba gzer la thal sman ni// rnon po zhib tu btags pa dag/ mar ram chu tshan sbyar ba
109b1(gso rig): blung// 'u su bskol chu bu ram dang // tsha gsum dri bzang gsum btab blung // de nas byis pa'i nyer sprod ky-i// byis pa ma ma sbyong du gzhug/ bu bcas bkras yod til mar rAm// myur las chang chan blung bya ba//
109b2(gso rig): cha ba lnga phye ran btab sbyin// de 'og bu ram chu dron nam// rlung 'joms sman bskol chu blung de// des ni rlung nang ldang mi 'gyur// khrag ngan dag kyang dag par byed// rim 'di zhag ni gnyis ga sum bya//
109b3(gso rig): snum mi 'phrong la cho ga 'di// snum med par ni bsten par bya// 'thungs nas lto ba til mer dang // ma ra bskus nas ni gos kyis dkri// zhu nas khrus byas thug pa ni// sngar bshang sman dang bskol ba blung // zhag gsuM
109b4(gso rig): phan chad bi da ri// la sogs smani sde'i khu bar bskol// nas thug phan zhing snum mang pa 'am// goms pa'i dbang las 'o thug blung // zhag bdun phan chad de la ni// rims kyis btab pa'i cho ga phan// zhag ni
109b5(gso rig): bcu gnyis ma lon par// sha ni sbyin par mi bya'o// mngal du 'phel dang btses pa'i nang // gsher dang khrag 'dzag btsir ba yis// nad de gso dka' yin pa'i phyir// btsas tshe 'bad de rim gro bya// de ltar zla ba phyed
109b6(gso rig): dang gnyis// kha zas gdam sogs dang bral nas// btsas pa'i ming dang bral ba 'am// zla mtshan byung bar gyur par du'o// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// lus kyi gnas kyi le'u ste dang po'o//
110a1(gso rig): de nas lus kyi rum du zhugs pa'i nad kyi bye brag bshad par bya'o// sbrum mas spang bar bya ba dag/ bsten pa 'am nud kyi dbang las ni// zla mtshan byung ba 'am gzer zhing na// phyi nang snam dang
110a2(gso rig): bsil thabs bya// u shir pad+ma tsan dan dang // 'o ma can shing shug pa yi// lde gu mar ni bsku ba da nga // ras ngal spangs pa bshang sgo dang // mo mtshan gnyis su them bur gzhug/ lan brgyar bkrus pa'i mar
110a3(gso rig): gyis ni// bsku ba 'am bud med de yi lu// u shir la sogs chu nang gzhug/ kha ra sbrang rtsi ku mu da// pad+ma ut+pal ge sar ni// 'o ma'i mar sbyar kA she ru// shring+ga ta ka sbyin par bya// gan+ta pri yaM ku tang ni// chu skyes rnams
110a4(gso rig): kyi rtsa ba dang // u duM ba ra gzhon nu dang // ldan pa'i 'o ma skom du blung // sa lu rtsa ba ka ko la// bA la gnyis dang shing mngar dang // bu ram shing dang bskol ba yi// 'o ma sa lu rtsa sna can// sdong rtsi khaM rar bcas pa 'am// skam sa'i
110a5(gso rig): sha khu ldan par bza'// bkru sman ma gtogs khrug mkhris kyi// gso dpyod bshad pa thams cad bya// zla gsum ma mtshang bar du ni// khrag bsgrags phyir ni 'bad par bya// be'u snabs ldan pa 'am dgag bya ba// der ni
110a6(gso rig): bsil phan rtsub pa dang // snyung ba gla sgang u shi ra// sle tre sa 'u su a ra la// bi tshe ra dang ni bar pa ta// tsan dan pa la bo nga dkar// bskol ba'i chu ni blung par bya// rtsa 'bru las g.yo zis sbyin dang // mung+ga la sogs khus be'u
110b1(gso rig): snabs ni// bsal lnga snum sogs sngon bzhin btang // mngal ni rnam par 'jig 'gyur na// mngal nang dag pa bya phyir dang // nad kyis gzir ba mi dran phyir// chang rno ci nus btung bar bya// de nas rtsa ba lnga po ni// chung ngu'i thug pa
110b2(gso rig): rtsub ste rlung // chang mi 'i thung la thug pa ni// tsha ba lnga dang bskol ba dang // bil+la la sogs lnga dang bsgrol// ti lo dang rtsa 'bru can sbyin bya// zla ba dang mnyam nyin zhag rim// mngal 'jig pa lA thug stsogs sbyin// yang zhing
110b3(gso rig): snum du lan tshwa med// drong bsgreng ldan la phan pa yin// nang dang lus zungs ldan ljin ni// skeskam phyir cho ga 'di bya'o// de phan chad zas snum 'jam rtsi// stobs drod bskyeng 'tsho byed sbyin// snying por ldan pas cher skyes
110b4(gso rig): li// mo mtshan nas ni khrag 'dzag pas// mngal du skye bar ma nus la// lto na 'gul dang bcas par gnas// de ni so ni gnas shes bya// de sa ni lto brgyas mi 'gyur// mya ngan sbyang dang rtsub sogs sog saM// yang na
110b5(gso rig): mngal na khrag 'dzag pas// mngal du skye bar ma nu s+t+rai la// rlung khrug skems shing bskams gyur pa'i// mang la de klu yi lto zhes bya// 'dir ni lto brgyas gyur kyang // 'grib cing yun ring lon na 'phar// de gnyis rta
110b6(gso rig): dang rlung 'joms spyan// mngar ba dag dang bskol ba yi// mar ring 'o mchim sbyin/ zhing // skyes ma thag pa'i shashi sbyin bya// de nyid kyi ni tshim bya'i phyir// khyogs dang gzhon par bskyon te bskul// sngon po zhes bya mi mgul
111a1(gso rig): la/ khra dang ba lang nya sha dang // sgra sgrogs bya dang rma bya yis// sha khu mar ni meng pa dang / mon snyun dre'u dag dang ni// la phug dang ni khu ba blung// bil+la gzhon nu mA Sha ti la// phye dang 'o ma
111a2(gso rig): sbyar ba blung // tshil bcas sha dang sbrang chang sbyin// rked pa bsku ba bstan par bya// de ni rtag tu dga' ba bskyed// de 'dras mngal ni 'phel bar 'gyur// rgyas pa gzhan du lo tshang nas// dka' bas btsas pa 'am skye
111a3(gso rig): mi 'gyur// sbrum ma rtug pa 'gags gyur na// snum mam mthun pa'i 'jam rtsi yis// myur ba kho na goso bar bya// gzhan du sbrum ma pu btsas 'chi// mngal du nad rab bsags pas sam// mi mthun pa'am
111a4(gso rig): gnod gzhan gyis// nang du shi na lto drang zhing // rengs dang sngo dang nad tshabs che// mngal mi mgul dang mgo 'khor skom// dbugs 'byin dka' zhing dub pa dang ka dga' ba med cing mig gyur dang // dbang med
111a5(gso rig): nang ni mang po 'byung // de la chu dron blugs pa dang // bu ram sbrang ma lan tshwar bcas// btags pas mo mtshan bsku ba dang / shal+la li dang zar mo yi// khu ba mar dang lde gur byas// nang du yang ding yang du gzhug/
111a6(gso rig): sngags dang sha ma 'byin sbyor bya// gal te bu shi ma byung ni// de nas sman pa rgyal po la// zhus la de 'bang myer du dbyung // shal+la li yi thang chu mar// bcas pas lag pa mo mtshan bsku// lag pas dbyung/
111b1(gso rig): nus de nyid kyis// lus ni legs par mi gnas na// bcus shing bsgyur dang bzlog pa dang // btsir dang 'deg gzhan la sogs kyis// lugs dang mthun par drangs nas ni// mngal gyi sgor ni drang por dang /
111b2(gso rig): gang zhig rkang lag mgo bo ni// yon por mngal du gnas gyur dang // rkang pa gcig ni mtshan du byung // gnyis pa bshang sgor tshung yon po// de ni 'gags pa zhes bya ste// tshon gyis bcad par 'os pa yin/
111b3(gso rig): las der dkyil 'khor sor gdub can// btsag pu gnyis ni bsdigs pa yin// 'phel btsag rtse mo rno bas na// mngal du btang bar mi bya'o// dang por mgo bo'i thod pa ni// phye ma rnam par dbyung bar bya// de nas
111b4(gso rig): mchan khung brang kos ko/ rkan gyi phyogs ni gang rung bar// gtad de mngal gyi lcags kyu nI// brtan po dag dang mkhas pas bya// mgo bo ma phye migo sbubs dang // mkhur tshos nas kyang drang bya zhing // phrag pa thogs nas
111b5(gso rig): dpung par bcad// lto ba rlung gis spos gyur pa// nang grol bkral tam rgyu ma ni// phyi rol tu ni bton te dbyung // rkang par thogs na de bzhin du// de yi rus tshogs dbye bar bya// rlung gi dbang gi yan lag gang // mngal du
111b6(gso rig): thogs pa de dang de// dum bur gtubs la legs phyung ste// 'bad de bud med bsrung bar bya// rlung ni rnam par 'khrugs gyur pa// mngal gyi gnas skabs sna tshogs byed// de phyir de ni mkhas pa yis// gnas skabs
112a1(gso rig): dag ni bltas te sbyang // ma dang lhan cig 'chi 'gyur bas// gson po mngal du spyang mi bya// 'chi bar gyur pa dag la ni// yud tsam btang snyoms bzhag mi bya// mo mtshan 'gags dang
112a2(gso rig): nyams pa dang // gzer nad dbugs kyi nyams thag dang // sgregs pa mnam dang lus grangs pa'i// mngal du bu shaM bud mong spang // de nas sha ma ma thon na// sman pas mngon bzhin dbyung bar bya// de ltar zug rngu phyung nas ni//
112a3(gso rig): chu dron gyis ni bkru bar bya// lus la snum gyis byug pa dang // mtshan du ras bal snum can gzhug/ des ni mo mtshan 'jam 'gyur zhing // de yis gzir bzhi bar 'gyur// la la phud dang bo da dkar// ra sna shing kun sug
112a4(gso rig): spel dang // tsha ba lnga yi phyi ma snum// sbyar ba 'am lde gu chu bskol blung // de bzhi na nAng rnams 'dzag pa dang // tshor ba zhi phyir zhug gsum ni// bu tse shel dang bong nga dkar// ba sha kha yi shun pa dang // shing kun te dzo pa
112a5(gso rig): ti rnams// btags pa'i phye ma 'am bskol ba blung // de nas zhag bdun ber du ni// snum nyid nye bar btung bar bya// dgongs ka tshong ni rnying pa dang // de bzhin legs sbyar chang btung bya// shiR+Ya ka ku bar bskol spangs// ras bal
112a6(gso rig): so mtshan nang du gzhug/ brla gnyen gzhan dag ging byung ba// de la rang gi gso ba ga so// rlung 'joms sman ni 'o mar bskol// zhag bcu'i bar du bza' ba phan// zhig bcu'i bar du sha khu btung // de phan chad ni yang zhing
112b1(gso rig): btung // nyung ngu bza' zhing snum bsku dugs// bA la'i til mar la sogs bsten// zla ba bzhi lon phan chad de// de ni rim gyis ci bder sbyang // bA la'i rtsa ba'i khu ba ni// chu drug 'o ma de mnyam dang // nas dang rgya shug ku
112b2(gso rig): lang+ga/ rtsa ba bcu ba'i cha gcig dang // bskol ba'i cha ni char byas pa'i// til mar chan bcu bzhi dang // me tha gnyis dang thang shing rtsod// ram nye ba gnyis tsan ngan dang // thal tres ru rta tsi pa ka/ rgyas spos rgyam tshe zangs
112b3(gso rig): rtsi ba/ gla sgang rdo d+heg shu dgra dang // pu na rna ba a ka ru// au sho gan+d+ha nyor shing dang // k+Shi ra ku shu shing mngar dang // ba la ra sa shu ti dang // ba ra ni gnyis dang sug smel dang // shing tsha gan+da pa tra rnams// zhib tu btags
112b4(gso rig): pa'i lde gu dang // til mar me chung la bskol ba// rlung nang thams tsang sel ba'i mchog/ bu btsas byis pa rus pa gnang // gnad dang skem la bsngags pa yin// rims spyan gdon dang smyo byed dang // gcin nad rgyu
112b5(gso rig): ma skyes pa sel// thang la 'bar gyis sngar gyis ni// nab rnams sel ba'i mchog tu bshad// ma ni shi tshe chu sor ni// mngal nas gal te kun 'phar na// de yi skye ba'i dus yin pas// dral te byis pa myur du dbyung
112b6(gso rig): shing mngar ka ko la sa bon dang // pa la s+ya dang thang shing bzhi// til nag sru sru'i rtsa ba dang // btsong dang nye'u shing zhes bya bzhi// pr-ik+Sha dang ni pa ya s+ya// ut+pal thol tres pri yaM ku// bi tsher tha tr-i sa ra sna dang // pad+ma
113a1(gso rig): dza ri shing mAngar dang // bri hA tI gnyis tat+pal dang // 'o shing myu gu shun pa dmar// pris+t+ra par+Na pA la dang // shi trug gze ma sle tre sa dang // shai ta ta ga dgun pang rtsa// shing mngar kha ra ka
113a2(gso rig): she ruH/ tshogs bcad phyed kyis rdzogs pa yi// bdun po 'di dag 'o mar sbyar// zla ba bdun la rim bzhin du// mngal 'dzag pa la btang bar bya// ka pit+ta dang bil+la dang // br-i ha tI dang bu ram dang // kAN+Da kA ri pa to la'i//
113a3(gso rig): rtsa ba bskol bar byas pa dang // de bzhin 'o ma sha rnams ni// zla ba brgyad pa'i tshe na btang // dgu pa thal tres e raN+Da// pa ya s+ya dang shing mngar dang // zla ba bcu pa ra pa ya t+sa// 'o ma dang ni bskol ba blung // ling na shIng
113a4(gso rig): mngar dong gra dang // thang shing 'o mar sbyar ba sbyin// bud med mngal du rlung gis khrag bsgongs te// gnas pa de ni mngal chags cha 'dra bas// bu chags yin zhes mi mikhas pa dag smra// sman kha rno dros khrag nI
113a5(gso rig): 'ba' zhig zugs// blun po mngal gnas 'byung pos zos zhes zer// mdangs 'phrog yin phyir de lus mngon sum du// 'phrog par mi snang ba 'am 'byung po ni// gzhung 'dor ma ni gtad snyoms 'jog mi
113a6(gso rig): bde/ \u0f7f/ lus kyi gnas las le'u gnyis pa'o// / de nas lus kyi yan lag gi bye brag bstan pa bshad par bya'o// / mdor na yan lag rnam drug ste// mgo dang khog pa
113b1(gso rig): dpung pa gnyis// brla gnyis yin te de nyid lag/ mig snying lag pa rkang pa sogs// sgra dang reg bya gzugs ro dri// go rim bzhin du na mkha' rlung // me chus yi yon tan yin// yon tan re reswa phyi ma bskyed// de la
113b2(gso rig): mkha' la lus bu ga/ rna ba sgra dang khong stong nyid// rlung las reg pa pags dbugs 'byin// me l-is mig dang gzugs 'ju nyid// chu las lce dang r-i dang gsher// sa las sna dri rus pa yin// 'diraM ni ma las
113b3(gso rig): skyes 'jam khrag/ sha dang rkang dang gzhang kha sogs// pa skyes brtan dang khu chu dang // rtsa bo che sogs skra rus yin// sems las sems byung dbang po rnams// skyes gnas sna tshogs rnams kyang 'byung // goms pa
113b4(gso rig): las byung nang med tshe// le lo med stobs gza'i mdangs yino// dngas ma las byung lus skye dang // gnas dang 'phel dang mi brkam nyid// snying stobs can gtsang yod par lta// chos dkar la dga' blo gros ldan
113b5(gso rig): rdul can mang du smra ba dang // nga rgyal tshul 'chos khro phrag dog/ mun pa 'jigs dang mi shes dang // gnyid dang le lo skye ba'o// de ltar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin lus// de la khrag skyes pags rim bdun// 'o ma las ni
113b6(gso rig): spris ma bzhin// smin pa'i tshe ni 'byung bar 'gyur// lus zungs gnas ni nang gsher gyi// rang gi drod gyis sman pa na// bde kan rgyas pa sha mas g.yogs// char bshang shing gi snying po 'dra// bdun po de dag gnas
114a1(gso rig): bdun ste// dang po khrag yin gzhan rim bzhin// bad kan ma zhu mkhris zhu ba// rlung dang gcin gyi gnas su bshad// bud med mngal gnas brgyad pa ste// mkhris pa zhu ba'i gnas par gnas//
114a2(gso rig): 'di la nang grol yan lag gnas// snying glo mchin mkhris mcher mkhal ma// pho bya drod pa rgyu ma dang // gnye' ma long ga lgang pa'o// srog gi gnas ni rnam bcu ste// mgau dang lce yi rtsa ba dang // lkog ma khrag+sa
114a3(gso rig): dang snying lte ba// chu so khu chu dngas dang gzhang // lus la rtswa dra chub ste// re re bcu drug yod par bshad// pir 'dra drug dang srubs 'dra bdun// pho mtshan lce dang mgo la brten// de dag btsag bu gdab mi rung // sha yi
114a4(gso rig): thag pa rnam pa bzhi// rus pa'i tshogs 'dus bcu bzhi yi// mtshams ni dgu phrag gnyis yod pa// so dang sen mor bcas pa yi// rus pa sum brgya drug cu yin// thang la 'bar rus sum brgyar 'dod// tshogs ni nyis
114a5(gso rig): brgya rtsa bcur 'dod// rgyun shes bu ni tshigs kyi grangs// nyis stong dag ni yod par 'dod// rgyus pa dgu brgya skyes pa la// sha ni s+phar tshad lnga brgya yod// bud med kyi ni nu ma dang // mo mtshan la gnas nyi shu lhag/ rtsa
114a6(gso rig): chen rtsa ba snying la gnas// de dag kun gyis lus kun khyab// dngas ma'i bdag nyid ma dngas su 'gyur// de ni 'byal ba kun dang 'brel// rtsa ba sdom zhing rtse rab phra// lo ma'i rtsa ltar gyes pa yin// gyes pa de las
114b1(gso rig): rtsa bran ni// bdun brgya dag tu gyur pa yin// de la yanA la ga re re zhing // brgya brgya der ni gnas pa yin// de las dbug par mi d+yA d+ya// rtsa yi dra ba 'dzin ces bya// nang na gnas pa'i gsum po yin// rked par bcu drug
114b2(gso rig): phrag gnyis te// de las brla yi rtsa gnyis dang // rkang pa'i gnas rnams gnyis gnyis te// de brgyad btsag bus gdab mi bya// rtsib logs gnyis la rtsa bcu drug/ de las gyen 'gro zhes bya slang // rgyab tu rtsa ni nyi shu bzhi/
114b3(gso rig): sbrel tshigs kyi ni ngos gnyis na// de las gnyis gnyis gyen 'gro ba/ mtshon gyis gdab par mi bya'o// rgya bzhin lto ba gnas rtsa dang // pho mtshan steng na gnas pa dang // spu yi 'phreng ba ngos gnyis rtsa// gnyis gnyis
114b4(gso rig): mtshon gyis mi gdab po// brang la gnas pa bzhi bcu las// bcu bzhi dbug par mi bya ste// nu mdzod de yi rtsa ba dang // snying ga dag ni so sor gnyis// gnod bral gnad ni gnyis po dang // mi gsal zhes bya gnyis kyi
114b5(gso rig): gnyis// mgrin pa lhag pa 'dra ba las// sngon po mching ba lhag po dang // 'gal ba dang ni ma mo brgyad// bcu drug yongs su spang bar bya// 'gram pa bcu drug de la gnas// mtshams ni 'brel bar byed pa spong // lce yang
114b6(gso rig): 'gram pa dang 'dra'o// 'og gi ro tshor byed gnyis dang // tshig 'byin byed pa gnyis po spang // sna yi rtsa ni nyi shu bzhi// de la dri tshor byed gnyis dang // rkan du 'gro ba'i rtsa gnyis spang // mig gnyis kyi ni lnga bcu drug/
115a1(gso rig): 'byed dang 'dzum pa'i las byed pa// gnyis gnyis dang ni mig 'gram gnyis// drug po de dag spang bar bya// mig dang snar gnas dpral ba lnga// brten pa'i rtsa ni drug cu las/
115a2(gso rig): bzhag pa gcig dang gtsug gi gnyis// sku mtshams gnas pa'i rtswa bzhi ste// bdun po de dag mtshon gdab spang // rna bar bcu drug de las 'dir// sgra thos byed pa'i rtsa gnyis spang // de nyid las ni mur 'gram gyi//
115a3(gso rig): mtshams su 'gro ba gnyis po spang // spyi bor bcu gnyis de las ni// gyen 'gro sgra mtshams bdag po las// sau re re spang bar bya// de ltar yan lag re re'i rtse// dbye ba dbug min shes phyir bshad// de la lus
115a4(gso rig): la dbug mi rung // ma lus dgu bcu rtsa brgyad yod// dog dang rtsa mdung shin tu phra// yo dang tshogs la gnas mi dbug/ rtsa ni bdun brgya de rnams las// bzhi chur khrag ni so sor rgyu// rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan khrag
115a5(gso rig): nad med khrag ni de ltar nas// do ni lus la phan 'dogs te// gzhan du gnod pa skyed par 'gyur// de la gnag dang dmar dngape phra// skad cig re re gang zhing stongs// mgul pa rlu nga ni khrag rtsa yin// reg na tsha zhing myur
115a6(gso rig): du rgyuH/ mdog sngo ser bar 'dug pa ni// mkhris pa khrog rtsa'i mtshan nyid yi no// dkar snum brtan grang bad kan rtsa// 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid 'dron ma yin// mi mngon mnyam gnas snum pa dang // mdog
115b1(gso rig): dmar khrag rtsa nang med yin// rtsa bo che ni nyi shu bzhi// lte ba la ni brten pa yin// de rnams kyis bskor lte ba yin// 'khor lo'i lte ba rtsibs bskor mtshungs// des ni steng 'og thad ka ru// lus 'di rjes su 'dzin pa yin// bu ga sna
115b2(gso rig): dang rna ba gnyis// mig gnyis rkub chos pho mtshan gyi'o// bud mod nu ma gnyis khrag sgro// gsum gyis lhag par gyur pa yin// nang gi srog gi gnas gyur pa'i// bu ga bcu gsum yod par bshad/ srog dang lus
115b3(gso rig): zungs dri ma chu// zas rgya mi mthun bsten pa yis// de las gnod pos nang skyed la// skyon med dag pas bde bar byed// rang gi lus zungs mdog mnyam shing // zlum dang sdom dang phra ba yin// bu ga'i dbyibs ni ring po ste//
115b4(gso rig): lo ma'i rtswa 'phros lta bu yin// zas dang spyod lam ngag gis gang // nad kyi mthu dang mnyam gyur dang // gong yang lus zungs ma mnyam ste// bu ga'i rgyun la gnod byed yin// mang du 'byung ba 'o ma bAgags pa
115b5(gso rig): 'am// rtsa ni mdud pa chags pa 'am// lam gzhan dag tu 'gro ba ni// bu ga'i rgyun 'khrugs mtshan nyid yin// pad ma'i rtsa ba phra mo las// ring du rgyu ba byed pa ltar// rang gi dngos ma nyer 'phel de'i// lus kyi sgo ni bu ga
115b6(gso rig): yin// bu ga rnams ni brdol 'gyur na// 'dar myos lto spos skyug dang rims// dpal dang gzer dang bshang gci 'gags// yang na 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur// de bas sman pas bu ga brtol// re thag bcad te gso bar bya
116a1(gso rig): 'phrul du rmA byung cho ga yis// 'byud de zug rngung byung bar bya// zas 'ju byed pa mkhris pa ni// 'ju byed yin zhes sbyar bshad do// nad dang lus byungs d+ha ma ye// dang yin zhes na
116a2(gso rig): rgyun shes zer// de ni zas kyi gnas yin zhing // 'dzin pas 'dzin byed ces bshad do// dro nyid thang la 'bar gzhung gis// mkhris pas 'dzin po'i cha ru bshad// tshe dang nad med brtson gzi mdangs// lus zungs ma
116a3(gso rig): drod stobs 'phel byed// zhu ba'i gnas kyi sgor zhugs pa// zas kyi lam gyi sgo gtan yin// de ni stobs ldan zos pa rnams// zhu nas thur du 'dren par byed// stobs zhan phyir ni kha zas ni// ma smin nyid du 'byung
116a4(gso rig): par byed// 'dzin byed stobs ni me drod de// de yang 'dzin byed stobs can yin// de bas me drod nyams gyur na// 'dzin byed nang ni skyed par byed// zas gang lus kyi lus zungs mdangs// stobs dang kha dog sogs
116a5(gso rig): rgyas byed// de rgyu kha zas me drod ni// mi 'ju dngas ma sogs mi 'gyur// zas ni dus su zos 'gyur ba// lto bar srog ni rlung gis drongs// kom gyis gong po rnam par phye// snum gyis mnyen par byas pa yin// mi
116a6(gso rig): mnyam gnas kyis bus nas ni// ma zhu'i gnas na gnas smin byed// phyi yi snod gnas 'bras chu ltar// lto ba'i me yis 'ju bar byed// dang po ro drug zas kyang ni// mngar ba nyid du gyur nas su// lbu ba can 'gyur bar
116b1(gso rig): kan+da 'gyur// zhu ba'i gnas na pho ba na// rnam par 'tshe bas sgyur nyid gyur// mkhris 'gyur 'phos pa'i rjes la ni// me drod kyis skams zhu ba dang // kha zhing gong bur gyur rlung skyed// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // nam mkha' bcas
116b2(gso rig): pa'i drong lnga po// rang rang yon tan zas lnga pa'o// sa sogs kyis smin de 'og tu// de dag rang rang ji bzhin rgyas// smin 'byung yon tan tha dad yin// sa ru gtogs pas si nyid dang // lhag mas lus gtogs lhag
116b3(gso rig): ma rgyas// zas de zhu ba'i tshigs ma dang // dngas ma zhes bya gnyis su 'gyur// de la zas kyi tshigs ma bla// gcin 'gyur bslab pa bshad par 'gyur// dngas ma las khrag de las sha/ sha las tshol te de las
116b4(gso rig): rus// rus rkang de las khu ba yin// khu ba las ni mngal gnas 'gyur// lus zungs tshigs ma rim bzhin du// pad ma khris bu ga'i dri ma dang // rdul dang ba spu sen mo dang // mig pags bshang snam mdangs yin no// de
116b5(gso rig): ltar lus zungs smin pa las// dngas ma tshigs ma gnyis su 'gyur// lus zungs snum ni gcig la gcig/ phan tshun nye bar brten pa yin// zas 'ju dngos ma sogs rim gyis// khu chur 'gyur ba de la ni// nyin zhag
116b6(gso rig): cig 'dod gzhan dag ni// zhag drug kha cig zla gcig 'dod// lus zungs kyi ni zas kyi rgyun// 'khor lo lta bur yongasu 'khor// ro tsa la sogs mthu yis ni// 'phral du khu ba la sogs skyed// phal cher sman
117a1(gso rig): gzhan nyin zhag ni// gcig gis las rnams byed pa yin// khyab byed gyis dngas lus zangs rnams// 'thor bar byed ba'i las kyis ni// cig car rgyun mi 'chang kun tu/
117a2(gso rig): lus la rtag tu rnam par 'thor// gtor tshe bu ga'i skyon gyis ni// dngas ma gang du chags gyur te// der ni gnod po skyeng byed pa// mkha' la sprin chags char 'bob mtshungs// nad kyi ma snyoms gyur pa las//
117a3(gso rig): phyogs gcig 'dus nA ldang bar 'gyur// de ltar 'o byung ba lus zungs me'i// las ni yongasu bshad pa yin// so dang chu dang me dang rlung // dngos ma lus zungs rang rang gi/ smin byed kun la zas 'ju'i me// de ni lhag
117a4(gso rig): po yin par 'dod// de ni rtse ba de 'phel 'phel// zad gyur zad pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur// de bas rigs pas cho ga bzhin// zas skom rigs shing phan pa yis// de 'byed pas bsrung gnas gyur na// tshe dang stobs ni
117a5(gso rig): gnas par 'gyur// many+dzumA gnas rang gnas 'dug na gnas// mnyam las gzhan 'gro da mi snyoms// mkhris pa shas che rno bar 'gyur// bad kan kyis gnod me drod chung // me drod mnyam dang mi mnyam rno//
117a6(gso rig): chung dang de lta ro rnam bzhi yin// gang zhig zas ni legs zos pa// legs par 'ju nyid mnyam pa yin// legs par ma zos myur 'ju 'am// legs zos ring zhig 'ju mi mnyam// zas ni legs par ma zos
117b1(gso rig): kyang // myur 'dzume drong rdo po yin/ khas ni legs par thos gyur gyu // ring nas 'ju zhing kha bskums dang // sgo dang rgyu ma 'khrug pa dang // lci ba me drod chung ngu yin// mdzod nyams na 'chi 'gyur cing // snron mad na ni yun
117b2(gso rig): 'tshal/ ma snyoms nang ni skye 'gyur bas// de phyir me drod gtso bo yin// lus stobs lhan cig skyes pa dang // dus skyes rigs pa las gyur gsum// de la lus sems las byung ba// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i stobs
117b3(gso rig): nachod dus tshogs las byung bya// dus skyes yin te rig pa las// byung ba spyod lam zas kyis bskyed// de bzhin skyed sbyoro las byung ba// yul phyogs shing ri chu nyung ba// skam sa nad nyung steng byed yin// rlan can de lngas bzlog
117b4(gso rig): pA yin// cham+b+hanyam thun mong yin+d+ra pa bshad// rkang dang tshil dang zhag rnying gcin// mkhris pa 'od kan phyi sa khrig/ dngas mtsho na mas lus gnas yin// snyim pa re res bskyed par byA/ dngos dang klung rgyas khu chu ni// re re 'ang rang
117b5(gso rig): gi khyor gang yin// bud med nu zho snyam do dang // zla mtshan sgrim pa bzhi yod do// lus zungs mnyam gnas tshod 'di yin// de las 'phel dang zang shes bya// khu chu khrag dang sbrum ma'i zas// spyod lam mngal gnas dus tshogs
117b6(gso rig): laso// gang zhig nyes pa lhag 'gyur des// rang bzhin rnam pa bdun du bshad// khyab rang myur bar byed phyir dang // stobs ldan pa dang gzhan ldang byed// rang dbang can dang nad mang phyir nad rnams phal cher rlung stobs
118a1(gso rig): can// de nyid kyis ni rlung gis bstod pa'i mi rnams ni// nad kyi bdag nyid rdul can skra gshor pags pa gas// grang lcags mi bzod brtan bran blo gros sbyong mdza' sred// blta dang 'gro ba
118a2(gso rig): g.yo zhing ska ba shin tu mang // bad kan nor nyung tshe thung gnyid srab dang // gtsom chung tshigs thogs g.yo zhing skad 'dzer dang // chad lha mang du za zhing sgeg dang bcas// glu dang rgod dang rngon las 'thab la dga'// mAngar
118a3(gso rig): sbyar kha dang tsha ba'i ro goms sred// lus skye ma dbyibs ring 'gro tshe sgra dang bcas// mi brtun dbang po mi thul dam pa min// bud med mi chags bu mang skyed mi 'gyur// dwe yau mig ni rtsub cing rdul gyis gang // zlum zhing mi
118a4(gso rig): mdzes 'chi ba lta bu dang // phyi na 'ang gnyid log lta bur snang ba yin// de ni shing dang ri 'dzeg mkhar 'phur rmi// skal ngan sar sna che zhing khengs pa dang // rku zhing byin snying rtsa rnying bcas pa dang // khyi dang wa dang rnga mo byA
118a5(gso rig): rgod khra// bye ba'i mtshan nyid ldan pa'i rlung can yin// mkhris pa me 'dra me las byung ba'i phyir// mkhris pa rgyus pa snyom dang byAk+Sh+ma saM sh+yAs cha// mdog sprer lus mchod lag gdong yang dam// sgra snor sgra nyung dpa' zhing
118a6(gso rig): rgyal mo// phreng ba byug pa rkyen la lhag par dga'// spyod bzang gtsang sgra chen po mnyes go shin po// 'byor ldan tu mo bde rje gros stobs dang ldan/ 'jig sa nyan dgra yang skyabs 'ongs skyob par byed/ yid gsu
118b1(gso rig): tshigs 'tshams sha ni rab tu lhong// bud med mi dga' khu bya dang ni 'dod pa chung // gnyer ma'i tshogs dang skra dkar mig sgro nad gyur la// zas nI mngar dang kha dang skra bsil za bar dga'// thun pa mi bzang rdul zhing drA dA /
118b2(gso rig): bshang gci bza' gtung khro dang phrag dog mang // rmi lam dong kha pa la shrA'i me tog/ glog 'gyu phyogs tshig skar mnga' nyi ma mthong // 'di yi lus phra mig ser g.yo ba dang // rdzi ma srab cing nyung ba grang la dga'// khro dang
118b3(gso rig): chang dang nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis// mig ni myur bAr dmar bar 'gyur ba yin// tshe ni ran cing stobaso ni 'bying ba dang // mkhas shing sdug bsngal dgu las sran chung 'gyur// stag dang dred dang ste'u byi la dang // gnod sbyin rang
118b4(gso rig): bzhin ldan pa mkhris can yin// bang kan bsil bas bad kan can bsil cing // rus tshigs mi mngon snum zhing shA rus 'bre la// bkres skom nyon mongs sdug bsngal phan pa bzod// blo ldan snying stobs tshe zhing dam
118b5(gso rig): bcas brtan// pri yaM ku dang duR+Ya 'dam bu'i mdog/ tshon dang 'gi wang pad+ma gser mdog can// lag dar ring zhing brang ni yangs la rgyus// dpral ba'i dbyes che sgra ni 'thug cing gnag/ lus 'jam snyoms shing yan lag
118b6(gso rig): mdzes pa dang // mdangs che khu bi cung bu tsha g.yog 'khor mang // chos ldan tshig rtsub nam yang smra mi byed// dgra la zhe sdang 'dam ring kho na 'dzin byed// glang po'i mchog ni dregs bcas lta bur 'gro// rgya mtsho 'brug dang rdza rnga
119a1(gso rig): seng ge yi// sgra ldan dran dang brtson 'grus dul bar ldan// byis pa'i tshe na 'ang du drang banam shas chung // zas nI kha bsku chu dang dro zhing drug/ nyung ngu zos kyang de ni stobs dang ldan// mig gi mtha'
119a2(gso rig): dmar snum zhing dkyus ring yangs// dkar gnag rab gsal rdzi ma snyoms dang ldan// sgra dang khra dang bza' btu spyod pa nyung // che ri de nor mang ring blta tshig 'jam sgra// dad cing blo zab lha che brjod dang ldan// rang bzhin bzang
119a3(gso rig): zhing gi nyid che las mtha' ring // byas bzo drang mkhas skal bzang ngo mtshar ldan// bla ma lA gus mdza' bshes dog la brtan// rmi lam pad+ma bya yi 'phreng bar bcas// chu'i gnas dang sprin kyang mthong pa'o// tshangs pa
119a4(gso rig): drag po dbang po chu lha dang // nam mkha' lding dang dad pa glang po mchog/ de bzhin seng+ge dang ni khyu mchog dang / khad kan can ni rang bzhin 'drar shes bya// rang bzhin gnyis dang kun las byung // gnyis gnyis kun gyi yon
119a5(gso rig): tan bskyed// gtsang sbra yod par sna tshogs kyi// yon tan gyis ni de ldan bshad// na tshong bcu drug par byis pa// de las lus zungs dbang po gzi// 'phel 'gyur bdun cu'i bar bar me// zad pa phan chad rgan po yin//
119a6(gso rig): rang rang khru ni phyed dang bzhi// lus ni tshe ring bde ba'i snod// spu med gnag dang shin tu sbom// ring po nyid ni mi mthun bcas// smad pa brgyad dang rang nyid ldan// gang yin de ni de snod yin// skra ni rab snum 'jam pa dang // phra zhing rtsa
119b1(gso rig): ba ma 'dres brtan// dpral ba mtho zhing mur 'gram 'byur// zla ba kham pa 'dra ba bzang // rna ba rgyab phyogs rgya che mdzes// rna shal che zhing sha yis rgyas// mig ni dkar nag 'byes pa dang // rdzi ma 'thug cing snyoms pa bzang //
119b2(gso rig): sna yi rtse mo dbugs cher 'byung // sha rgyus drang zhing snyoms pa bzang // mchu ni dmyur zhing ma 'phyangs pa// 'gram pa yangs shing mi 'bur bzang // khwa che so yi thags dam la// snum zhing dkar la 'jam zhing snyoms//
119b3(gso rig): lce ni dmar zhing yangs la sreb// kos kau che zhing sha yis rgyas// mgrin pa zlum zhing sh+ya rgyas zlum// pags pa mtho zhing shwa yis rgyas// lte ba zlum zhing g.yas su 'khyil// rkang lag legs sems 'jam la dmar//
119b4(gso rig): snum zhing kun dmar sha rgyas pa// sor mo ring zlum bu ga maud// rgyab zheng tshe zhing skal tshogs nub// tshigs 'tshams mi mngon dam pa dang // tshig gsang mtho' zhing brtan pa dang // mdog snum kha dog brtan par gnas/
119b5(gso rig): rang bzhin gyis 'byung snying stobs brtan// phongs pa'i tshe yang zhum pa med// mngal gnas brtsams ste nad med pa// gong nas gong du zhing bzang ba// shes dang ye shes rgya cher ni// 'phel zhing rim gyis dge bar
119b6(gso rig): 'gyur// de ltar yon tan kun ldan pa'i// lus ni ston brgya'i bar dag du// tshe dang dbang phyug 'dod pa yi// dngos po thams cad rab du gnas// pags pa khrag sogs snying stobs par/ brgyad po'i phyi ma bzhin du mchog/
120a1(gso rig): stobs dang tshad dang shes pa'i phyir// lus can rnams kyi snying por bshad// snying po kun dang ldan pa ni// mchog tu bkur bar bya bar 'gyur// rtsom pa kun la'ang re bcas dang //
120a2(gso rig): bzod ldan blo bzang brtan par 'gyur// dregs dang zhum pa med par ni// bdi dang sdug bsngal bsten gyur pa// snying stobs can yin rdul can khengs// mun pa can ni de lta min// sbyin dang tshul khrims snying brtse bden/
120a3(gso rig): tshangs par spyod dang byas pa bzo// byams ldan bcud kyis len rten pa// tshe dang bsod nams 'phel ba'i sde'o// lus kyi gnas lus le'u gsum pa'o// / de nas lus kyi gnad kyi bye
120a4(gso rig): brag bstan pa bshad par bya'o// gnod ni brgya las bdun lhag pa// de las bcu gcig brla dang ni// de bzhin lag ngor gnyis so sor// lto ba la gsum brang la dgu// rgyab la bcu bzhi nam tshong ni// yan chad sum tsu
120a5(gso rig): bdun yod// rkang pa'i mthilo na gung mo yi// thad ka na nau mthil 'phrog pa// gnang yod ces ni rnam bshad de// de phug nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur// mthib sor dbus na rgya tshigs te// de phug bskyod pa'i nad kyis 'chi//
120a6(gso rig): de gong sor gnyis par shes bya// rkang pa 'khor zhing 'dar bar byed// long mo'i tshogs 'og pir mgo ste// de bcad skang dang nang skyed byed// byin pa rkang pa gnyis kyi bar// long mo gnang rengs be mos por byed// byin pa'i
120b1(gso rig): nAn+d+hany+ra zhes pa// lhag pad+ma ba yis 'chi bar d+hi / byin pa ban+d+ha mtshams busgyu myo ste// de phug gaskyon yang 'breng byor 'gyur// pus glong sor gsum pUr gnyan gong// de phrag byuR+Ya rnyings sbyang bar byed//
120b2(gso rig): baR+Ya'i nang bAR+YA dbang zhes bya ba// de phyug khrag zad bAR+Ya snyoms 'gyur// baR+Sha rtswa rI mig dmar zhes bya ba// khrag zung bAs ni gzhogs phyed 'joms// brla rtsor rlig pa'i bar gyi gnad// ljon shing zhes bya ma nid byed//
120b3(gso rig): de dag brla yi dpung de bzhin// mkhrig ma 'dir ni lo mor mtshungs// gru mo byin 'dra de gnyis phrog/ zha bo ljon shing 'dra ba ni// mtshan khung nang na mtshan khung 'dzin// de phug zhu bo nyid du 'gyur// long ka'i gnad
120b4(gso rig): ni gzhang zhes bya// de phug gzhang rlung gis 'phral gsod// lgang pa gzhu ltar yo ba yi// chu so'i gnad ni shwa khrag nyung // dbus na kha cig thur du las// rked pa'i dbus gnas srog 'phral 'a joms// rde'u 'byin rma
120b5(gso rig): bug gnas ma gtogs// der yang ngos gnyis de phug 'dra// gcin 'dzeg gnas dang gcig de phug/ rma ni 'tsho ba shin tu dka'// lus kyi zhwa dang ma zhu'i gnas// dbus na lte ba rtse kun gyi// rten yin de'ang 'phral
120b6(gso rig): gsod byed// ma zhu ba yi gnas sgor gyur// 'dod chags sogs gnas snying zhes bya// brang dang nu ma lto dbus gnas// nu mjing nu ma'i rtsa zhes bya// steng 'og sor gnyis nu ma'i gnang // de phug bad kan khrag gis ni/
121a1(gso rig): rim bzhin lto 'gyings 'jig par byed// rangs bral brang gi ngos gnyi na// rtsa sbubs gnyis por rlung rgyu ba// de phug khong pa khrag gis gang // lung pa dbugs mi bde bsdu 'chi// rgyab kyi skal tshigs
121a2(gso rig): brang gi bar// de gnyis kyi ni ngos gnyis na// phrag pa gnyis kyi logs na ni// mi gsal zhes bya'i gnang gnyis yod// de gnyis phug pas khong pa ni// khrag khengs brnag ste 'chi bar byed// sgal tshigs kyi ni ngos gnyis na//
121a3(gso rig): rked pa cha gnyis la gnas dang // rkub tsos ltag gnas skal tshigs rten// rked pa can dang gzhon nur bshad// de snang khrag zad skya rba ba dang // gzugs nyams pas ni 'chi bar 'gyur// rgyab kyi sgal tshigs ngos gnyis kyi// rkeng
121a4(gso rig): pa'i mtshams ni gang yin pa// ro smad kyi ni rgyab phyogs na// khung bu zhes bya'i gnad gnyis yod// de snang bskyod pa nyams pa dang // ro smad tshor ba med par 'gyur// gang zhig rtsib logs gnyis dang 'brel// sta zur rtse mo
121a5(gso rig): gnyis steng gi/ gnas ni g.yogs par gyur po dag/ ro rmad gzhon nu'i rus par gnas// de snad ro smad skrangs par byed// nyam chung 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur// rtsib legs gnyis kyi nang dang 'brel// rked pa'i ngos gnyis dbus
