121a6(gso rig): na gnas// thad ka nang ni gyen gnas pa// rtsib logs mtshams su de phug na// khong pa khrag gis gang ba dang // lus dang bral ba nyid du 'gyur// nu ma gnyis kyi thad kyi cha// rgyab kyi sgal tshigs la brten pa//
121b1(gso rig): chen zhes byung de phug nA// khrag zad nas ni 'chi bar byed// dpung mgo gnyis dang 'brel ba dang // sbrul tshogs kyi ni ngos gnyis na// phrag pa gnyis kyi sogs pa ste// de snad skams shing tshor bral 'gyur// mgrin pa
121b2(gso rig): gnyis kyi ngos gnyis kyi// dpung mgo dang ni mgrin po'i bar// phrag par phrag pa la brten gnang // de phug lag pa bya ba nyams// srol gang gi ni ngos gnyis na// 'gram pa la ni brtan pa'i rtsa// bzhi ste de la sngon po gnyis//
121b3(gso rig): gnyis po mjing pa'i ka nang du bshad// de phug skad 'gags mi sdug 'gyur// lce yis ro ni tshor ba med// lkog ma'i sbubs kyi ngos gnyis na// lcer dang snar ni 'gro ba'i rtsa// so sor bzhi bzhi yod ma mo// de bcad 'phral du
121b4(gso rig): sreg 'joms so// mgo bo N+Di mtshams lhag pa ste// de phug mgo bo ldem por 'gyur// rna ba gnyis 'og lho pa na// rna rtsa zhes bya 'on par 'gyur// sna ye bu ga gnyis dang ni// rna ba'i lam 'gro mgrin nad gnas// sbrul mgo
121b5(gso rig): zhe sa bya de bcad na// dri mi tshor bar byed par 'gyur// mig gnyis kyi ni phyi rol mtshams// smin ma skyes pa yi mtha' 'og/ mig zung smin steng dpa' bar gnas// 'khyil pa phug pas long bar 'gyur// rnam tshan
121b6(gso rig): dpral ba'i nang na ni// mur 'gram ces bya 'phral 'chi byed// mur 'gram gnyis te skra mtshams na// 'dog pa zhes bya gzhag pa 'ang // smin mtshams par gnas gsum char la'ang // zug rngu dag ni me phyung zhing // sman
122a1(gso rig): nas rang nyid byung nas 'tsho// phyung na 'phral du 'chi bar 'gyur// lce mig sna dang rna ba yi// bu ga'i bzhi ni 'dus pa dag/ rkan dang sgo ru kha bzhin ste// bu ga'i gnang ni de rnams kyi// gnang
122a2(gso rig): ni sum mdo ris zhes bya// de bcang srog ni 'phral du 'dor// thod pa'i ni mtshams lnga pa'o// thang ka gyen 'gro mtshams kyi mtha'// de snang pas ni mgo 'khor dang // spro zhing dran pa nyams ste 'chi// spyi bo'i steng du
122a3(gso rig): gtsug 'khyil pa'i// rtse dang ldan sbrul 'dus pa na// spu 'khyil bdag po zhes bya ba'i// gnad kyis srog ni 'jig par byed// gang du man ni na shin tu 'gul// rab na de gnad yin zhes bya// shi rgyus rus pa rtsa chen dang /
122a4(gso rig): rtsa dang tshigs ni 'dus pa ru a kha ni da ces bya ste des nA der// srog ni lhag par gnas pa yin// mang du rnam par bstan mod kyi// gnang ni rnam pa drug tu brtag/ srog gi gnas su thun mong pas// gnang ni
122a5(gso rig): gcig tu'ang gnas pa yin// sha gtogs bcu ste byin lag ny+dza// mthil 'phrog nu rtsa nu mjing ngo // rus pa'i gnang brgyad mur 'gram dang // rkyed pa can dang gzhon nu dang // ro slad dang ni sogs pa'o// rgyus pa'i
122a6(gso rig): gnang ni nyi shu gsum// gnyen gong zhes bya bar dang no// pir mgo mig zur rgya tshigs dang // phrag pa gzhag dang chu so'o// rtsa chen gnang ni rnam dgu ste// gzhang dang rengs bral rje rtsa dang // sum mdo'i ris zhes bshad pa'o//
122b1(gso rig): rtsal gnas gnad sum cu bdun// rtsa chen gnyis dang ma mo sngo// 'gram pa mtshan khung 'dzin sbrul mgo// ljon shing snying dang lte ba dang // rtsib logs mtshams dang nu ma'i 'og/ mig gsal gzhag dang brla dbang dang //
122b2(gso rig): dmar po zhes bya bzhi po'o// tshigs la nyi shu 'khyil ba dag/ khrig ma gnyis dang khung bu dang // mtshams mtha' gru mo long mo dang // lhag pa pus mo bdag po'o// gzhan ngag gzha sha'i gnad ces zar// mtshan
122b3(gso rig): khung gnyis dang ljon shing ni// rgyus pa la rten rna rtsi dang // sum mdo'i ris dang rengs bral dang // mig 'gram rtsa ni gnang yin gyis// rtsa chen gnas par de ma bshad/ sha yi gnang bcang khrag rgyun 'dzag/ sha bkrus
122b4(gso rig): 'drar gyur sla ba dang // skya zhing dbang po nyams pa dang // myur du 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur// dus gnas gnang gcad rkang bcas na// sla dang bar bar chang cing 'dzag/ rgyas pa'i gnad bcang na zhing 'khrug/ brkyang bskum mi
122b5(gso rig): shes gnod par 'gyur// 'gro dang rten gnas nus pa chung // dbang po nyams pa 'om 'chi bar 'gyur// rtswa chen gnad bcang lbu ba dang // sgra bcus 'byung zhing dran nyi mas 'gyur// rtsa'i gnad bcar khrag sku zhing // rgyun myi
122b6(gso rig): 'chad par mang du 'byung // de zad mgo 'khor dbugs mi bde// skom rmong skyigs bus 'debs pa sa 'chi// lus ni gra ma lta bus khyab// 'tsho bas kyang sgur po 'am theng por 'gyur// tshogs gnang stobs de nga spyod
123a1(gso rig): pa nyams// lus skam tshigs ni sbyangs par 'gyur// lte ba mur 'gram bdag po gzhang // snying dang chu so sum mdo'i ris// ma mo brgyad de bcu dgu po// 'phral du srog ni gsod par byed// de rnams
123a2(gso rig): 'phral du mi 'chi'ang // zhag bdun gyis ni nges par 'chi// rengs bral mthil 'phrog rtsib logs mtshams// rked pa can gzhin mtshams kyi mtha'// nu rtsa dbang po chu yi gnang // rgya tshigs mi gsal rtsa chen gyi/
123a3(gso rig): ro smad nu 'jing sum cu gsum// zla ba 'am zla phyed gson nas ni// dus gzhan du ni 'chi bar byed// bdeg dang bzhag pa zhes bya gsum// der ni zug rngu phyung gyur na// rlung gis sha dang tshol dang rkang // klad rgyas rnams
123a4(gso rig): ni snyoms par byed// mtshon byung lung pa dbugs mi bde// 'byung zhing srog ni 'joms par 'gyur// sbrul mgo mig zur rna rtsi dang // sngon po 'gram gnas lhag pa'i gnad// phrag pa 'am phrag sogs 'khyil pa dang
123a5(gso rig): ljon shing bla dbang khung bu dang // mig dmar pus mo'i gnang deng cas// mtshan 'dzin par 'dra gre mo'i gnang // de ltar gnad ni bzhi bcu bzhi// rkang lag 'ja' byed gyur pa 'am// gal te tshabs cher snang 'gyur na//
123a6(gso rig): des ni srog kyang 'joms par byed// pir mgo 'dra dang long mo dang // mkhrig mi'i gnang brgyad nang tshabs tshe// de las ljon shing mtshan khung 'dzin// brla dang pir 'ogro lta bu ste// bcu gnyis so cig tshad yin no// mkhrig
123b1(gso rig): ma dang ni long mo dang // nu ma'i rtsa ba sor gnyis tshang // pus mo gru mo sor gsum tshad// gzhang dang chu so lte bu snying // sdong po mtshams mthu' ma mo dang // pir 'dra sum mdo'i ris 'gram pa// gnang ni nyi shu rtsa dgu'i tshad//
123b2(gso rig): rang gi lag mthil tshad yin no// lhag ma gnad ni lnga bcu drug/ ser phyed kyi ni chang du 'dod// gzhan dag gnang do til 'bru ste// 'bras tsam gyi ni tshad du'ang 'dod// rtsa bzhi bshad pa gang yin pa// lus kun rtas pa byed pa
123b3(gso rig): kang de ni gnang la gnas pa yin// des na dwe phug khrag drag byung // lus zungs rnams ni zad pa'i phyir// rlung las nad ni mi bzad 'debs// rlung gis mkhris pa rgyas par byed// mkhris pa rgyus par gyur pas no// skom
123b4(gso rig): mgo 'khor kha skams myos// lus rdul tshigs 'bye lus lhod dang // de ni gshin rje'i dbang du 'gro/ gnang chong na ni myur ba ru// tshigs ni phyogs su bcad bas na// rtswa ni 'khums par byed pa yin// de la srog chags
123b5(gso rig): rnams kyi srog/ khrag gnas na ni gnas pa yin// de bso gnang min log phog na// nges par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// 'ga' zhig sman pa'i yon tan dang // phyogs gcig du ni phog pa yas// 'tsho kyang dbang po ma tshang 'gyur/
123b6(gso rig): de bas 'bad de gnang du ni// thal sman me btsa' la sogs spang // gnang du phog pa chu ngus kyang // phal cher shin tu gnod pa yin// de bzhin gnad la brten pa'i gnad// rab tu 'bad pas gso bar bya// lus kyi gnas las
124a1(gso rig): le'u bzhi pa'o// / de nas lus kyi lus 'gyur ba'i bye brag shes par bya ba le'u bshad par bya'o// / ji ltar 'bras bu'i me tog dang // me yi du ba char dang
124a2(gso rig): sprim/ phyis byung mtshan ma yin pa ltar// de bzhin 'chi ltas las nges 'chi// 'chi ltas mid na mi 'chil// 'chi ltas snang na 'tsho mi 'gyur// 'chi ltas 'chi ltas mi shes pa// mi mkhas 'chi ltas med mi shes// la la
124a3(gso rig): rten dang brten pa po'i// khyad par gyis de gnyis su 'dod// nad kyi tshul ni mang po las// 'chi ltas tshul du 'byung 'gyur la// nad zhi na ni zhi 'gyur la// brtan par gnas na 'chi bar 'gyur// gzugs dang dbang po skad dang mdog
124a4(gso rig): gzugs brnyan bya ba la sogs dang // dngos po dag ni gzhan la yang // tha mal pa las rgyu med par// gzhan du gyur gang mdor Ta ni// 'chi ltas yin par de shes bya// skra dang ba sgyu ma bskus par// snum gyis bskus ltar
124a5(gso rig): gang snang dang // gang zhig mig ni rab yo dang // mi 'gyur phyir byung khung pur zhugs// ye dang dgrang dang 'dzums pa dang // btsum zhing smin ma smad pa dang // 'khrul dngo mthong ba nyams pa deng // sre me'i mig ltar de lta baM dang
124a6(gso rig): thi ba 'dra dang mgal mi 'dra// mchi ma 'dzag cing rdzi ma 'khrugs// sna ni shin tu gdangs pa dang // zhom dang 'bum phran gyis khyab dang // skrangs dngags dang rnying pa dang // gang gi ma mchu 'phyang ba dang // ya mchu gyen la brdzes pa
124b1(gso rig): dang gnyi ga 'dzam+bu smin 'drar snang // so gnag gseg mar bcas pa dang // dmar zhing so zho nag nog can// glo bur du ni 'byung ba dang // lce ni yo dang rtag tu 'byin// skrangs dang bskams dang lce dang gnag/ gos dang rtsub dang tshor ba med
124b2(gso rig): mdzad pas mgo ni mi theg dang // rang gi lhag pa khur ltar lci// 'gram pa kha na gnas pa yi// kha zas ldang par mi nus pa// gang zhig rgyu med par yan lag/ shin tu lci dang shin tu yang / dug dang gnad pa med par ni// bu ga
124b3(gso rig): rnams las khrag 'byung dang // gang zhig po mtshan nub pa dang // rlig pa rab tu 'phyang ba 'am// de las go bzlog gyur pa rnams// thams cad 'a tshe bdag dbang gyur yin// gang gi rtsa ris sngon med pa// zla ba tshes pa lta buni// dpral
124b4(gso rig): 'am chu sngo'i steng na snang // de ni zla drug las mi 'tsho// lus can gang gi lus la chu// pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bur ni// rgyal che chu ni mi chags pa// da ni zla ba drug na 'tshotshe// spyi bor du ba 'am snum bcas snang // de ni zla ba gcig na 'chi// spyi
124b5(gso rig): go'am smin mtshams gsar du ni// mtshams bye ba 'am rtsub 'khyil snang // nang meng zhag ni drug gis 'chi// nad pa zhag gsum na 'chi 'gyur// lce gnag kha ni mnam pa dang / mig g.yas phugasu bros pa 'am/ bya ni
124b6(gso rig): mgo la babs pa dag/ gang yin de ni yongs su spang // gang zhig khrus byas byugs pa dang // lus kun gsher bar gnas bzhin du// snying khe shin tu myur bar bskams// de ni zla phyed las mi 'tsho// glo bur du ni lus kyi mdog
125a1(gso rig): cig car tha mal pa las nyams// de bzhin nang ni sogs pa dang rtsub dang snum 'gyur 'chi ba yin// gang gis sor mo drangs pa dang // sgra mi 'byung ba de mi 'chi// de bzhin lung pa spring
125a2(gso rig): sogs la// gang zhig sngon med sgra byung ba 'am// dbugs 'byin thung ba 'am ring ba 'am// dri gnam pa 'am dri zhim 'gyir// lus ni khrus byas ma byas rung // mi ma yin pa dro 'byung ba 'am// gos rma dri mar byung ba na'ang /
125a3(gso rig): de ni lo gcig nas 'chi 'gyur// gang zhig shig dang sbrang ma sogs// dri zhim pas ni 'du ba 'am// dri nga bas ni spong 'gyur na// de ni lo gtsog la sau mi 'tsho// gang zhig rtag tu lus tshal// grang ba nyid du snang ba dang // bsil
125a4(gso rig): bshin tu tsha bar snang // rgyu med par ni rdul dang rengs// gang zhig grang ba'i chu bur 'byung // lus grang ba las tsha ba skyes// grang gdungs than pa la mi dga'// de ni gshin rje'i dbang gyur yin// gang zhig snying ga dro gyur la// lto
125a5(gso rig): bshin tu grang gyur zhing // gshang ba 'khru zhing skom dang che// da ni ro dang 'dra ba yin// bshang dang gci ba mchil snabs sam// khu chu nang nub gyur ba 'am// mchil ma kha dog sna tshogs pa// gang yin de la gcig nas
125a6(gso rig): 'chi/ sa ni na mkhar mthong ba dang // na mkha' sar ni mthong gyur dang // gzugs med gzugs can lta bu dang // gzugs can gzugs mid ltar gnas mthong // de bzhin 'od can 'od med mthong // dkar po gnag dang
125b1(gso rig): yod pa dang // mig nad med par zla ba ni// gzugs mang ra ri med mthong dang // gnyid ma log par dri za srin// yi dgas gzhan yang de 'dra ba'i// gzugs mi sdug pa mthong 'gyur ba// gang yin de ni 'chi bar 'gyur//
125b2(gso rig): skye bdun dang ni nyer gnas pa'i// skar ma sgrib med ma mthong dang // dgu tshigs gung tsug ma mthong ba// da ni lo gcig mi 'tsha'o// 'brug sgra chu bo'i sgra dang ni// gling bu pi wA rnga yi sgra// sku gzhan med kyang thos pa 'am
125b3(gso rig): yod pa thos par ma gyur dang // rna ba'i bu ge bkab pa na// DUr 'ur b+h+yo yi sgra mi thAs/ de bzhin dri dang ro dang rig/ gang zhig log par shes pa dang // yang na yod yi mi tsher dang // me mer shi ba'i dri mi tshar// cho ga bzhin
125b4(gso rig): byas nang med skyes// cho ga log pas bde gnas dang // gang gi lus ni rdul g.yogs 'dra// lus la snad pa mi tsher dang // dka' thub drag dang cho ga ni// sngon 'gro'i rnal 'byor med pa ru// dbang po las 'das shes pa
125b5(gso rig): skyes// de rnams 'chi bar shes par bya// skad 'gags dman zhing mi gsal dang // gang zhig skad ni 'dzer gyur dang // sgra 'dod pa na 'phral du ni// brjid 'gyur de ni mi 'tsho'o// skad gsung shin tu nyam chung gyur
125b6(gso rig): mdog dang stobs ni nyams pa dang // rgyu med par ni nang 'phel bar// snang ba dag kyang 'chi bar bshad// skad gsang nyams par gyur pa dang // bdag nyid 'chi bar smra ba dang // de 'dra'i sgra ni thos pa dge/ ring du
126a1(gso rig): yongasu spang bar bya// lus dbyibs dang ni chad dang ni// mdog gam gzi mdangs gang dag gis// gzugs brnyan 'gyur ba rmi lam du// mthong na'ang de ni 'chi bar 'gyur// nyi ma mye
126a2(gso rig): long chu sogs la// gang zhig dbyibs dang chang dang ni// lus kyi rnam pa smang gyur pa// gzugs brnyan zhes ni de la bshad// mdog dang gzi mdangs la brten gang klu/ lus rtogs gzugs brnyan lta bu yin// gang gi
126a3(gso rig): gzugs brnyan bcad pa dang // gyos dang lhag dang 'khrug pa dang // mgo med mgo gnyis yon po dang // mi sdug gzhan du gyur pa dang // mtshan nyid las byung ma yin no// de ni tshe zad yin zhes bya// gang gi mig gi rgyal
126a4(gso rig): mor ni// gzugs brnyan snang bar ma gyur dang // na mkha'i la sogs lnga po yi// gzugs brnyan rnam pa sna tshogs lnga// na mkha'i dang zhing sngo ba dang // snum bcas mdog dang bcas pa yin// rlung las rdul can dmar dang gnag/
126a5(gso rig): thal mdog rtsub cing mdog nyams yi ni// me yi dmar zhing dang bar snang // mdangs ldan blta nA sdug pa yin// chu skyes bai DUr+yA 'drar snang // dag tsang rab sna mi bde ba yin// sa yi stan snum dag pa dang // 'thug cing dkAr dang sngo
126a6(gso rig): bsangs ya na// rlu ni nang 'chi sdu ga bsngal bskyed// gzhan dag bde ba bskyed pa yin// me yi thams cad mdog can te// de ni rnam pa bdun du bshad // dmar dang ser dang dkar nag po// ljang dang skya dang nig po'o// de rnams la
126b1(gso rig): ni gang gsal gyur// snum dang dri ma med de dge/ dri ma can dang rtsub pa dang // zhum pa sdug bsngal bskyed pa yin// mdangs kyis mdog ni zil gyis gnon// 'od ni kha dog gsal byed yin// mdangs kyis nye bar snang

126b4(gso rig): 'byin zhing sa la 'gre/ gang zhig dbugs ring phyung nas ni// thung ngu rngubs te shugs 'byin dang // thung ngu dbugs byin bsnum pa dang // shin tu 'dar bar byed pa yang // gang zhig lag ngar bskums nas ni// mgo bo lag

127a1(gso rig): mdog nag po ser po dang // dmar po'i gzugs brnyan snang ba dang // sman pa sman dang kha zas dang // bla ma mdza' ba shes la gang brtan// 'di dag thams cad gshin rje yi// dbang gyur yin
127a2(gso rig): par shes par bya// gang zhig drong chung sems g.yengs dang // rtag tu madrangs ngan yid mi bde// gang zhig gtor ma bya rnyog// byin yang za bar mi byed dang // gang zhig rgyu med yid gzhungs dang // mdzes shing lus rgyas
127a3(gso rig): dpal thob pa 'am// de las nyams par gyur pa dag/ de ni gshin rje'i khyim du 'jug/ tha mal bar ram nang pa yi// gang zhig yon tan skyon rang bzhin// snga las gzhan du 'gyur bar snang / de ni zla drug las mi 'tsho//

127b2(gso rig): 'khor dbugs mi bde// rid cing skrangs dang me drod nyams// tshig mi gsal zhing thogs pa dang // mig dmar snying ni gzer ba dang // snga dro lung pa skam po 'byung // phyi dro de las gzhan du 'gyur// bang kan lung par bcas pa

129a1(gso rig): la k+Shan snang // mdzi ni yan lag 'brub pa dang // mig dmar skad ni 'gags pa dang // drod nyams srin zla rnams kyis gtses// skom dang chang pas 'khru ldan 'chi// rlung nang pags pas

129a4(gso rig): gcong // sgren can gcin nag ldan pA yi// sha zad nad tshabs chung yang spang // shwa dang stobs ni shin tu zad // nad 'phel yi ga 'tshes pa dag/ nad pa gang la snang 'gyur te// zla ba phyed dang gnyis na 'chi// rlung nad rtul

130a1(gso rig): bar rdol ni gshang gci rlung // 'byung zhing srin pus gtses pa dang // pus mo phan tshun mdzer ba dang // rkang pa btegs nas btung 'gyur dang // yang dang yang du kha bsgyur ba'i// nad pa de ni 'tsho

130a4(gso rig): bur byung ba de mi 'tsho// gyen du dbugs rtseg drod yal zhing // brla dbrag gnyis su gzer gyis nyen// dpal dang rnam par bral gyur pa// blo dang ldan pas yongs su spang // gang gi nang ni 'phel 'gyur dang // rang bzhini yongs su

130a6(gso rig): ba dang // cho ga bzhin du byin gyur yang // sman gyi bya ba ma grub gang // de la gso ba'i thabs med do// gang gi sman ni sbyor ba'i tshe// rgyu med par ni phyin ci log/ mdog dang ro sogs yongs gyur na// nad med yin yang de mi 'tshe
130b1(gso rig): gang gi gnas su shing bcas me// rlung med kyang ni shi gyur dang // nad pa gang gi khyim du ni// snod ni shin tu mang po dag/ chag gam ltung bar gyur pa dag/ de yi srog ni rnyed pa dka'// mi gang nyams chung gyur pa yang // glo bur
130b2(gso rig): gsos par snang gyur pa// de yi srog kyang ma nges pa// yin par rgyun shes bus bshad do// // nye du mdza' bo rnams kyis ni// dris kyang nyan par mi bya ba// sman pas smra bar mi bya zhing //
130b3(gso rig): de yi gso ba'ang khas mi blang // gshin rje'i pho nya sha za sogs// gzhan gyis nye bar bsten pa gang // sman gyi stobs ni 'joms pas na// de phyir de yis yongs su spang // tshe yi rig byed 'bras bu kun// tshe shes
130b4(gso rig): ba la gnas pa yin// de bas 'chi ltas gnas pa kun// sman pas 'bad de shes par bya// tshe dang stobs rnams gnyi ga zad// de gnyid zad par ma gyur yang // ya nga ba ni ma spangs pas// srog chags rnams ni 'chi bar
130b5(gso rig): bshad// / yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ lus kyi gnas las le'u lnga pa'o// / de nas lus kyi gnas kyi pho nya la sogs pa bshad par bya'o// ya mtshan can dang dge sbyong dang /
130b6(gso rig): rigs mthun las ni 'grub par bshad// de las go bzlog pho nya ni// las ni 'grub mo rtags su bshad// dman dang 'jigs rings dngangs pa dang // rtsub dang bkra mi shis sgra dang // mtshon cha dbyug thogs mgo reg dang //
131a1(gso rig): a n+ti s+thu dAn+d+ha na// baSh+Ta m+ba shes pa'i ming dru sdun// smug las bud med d+hu ma nAn// ma bo rang pa mi sdug drung // phreng babyug pa dmar thos brgyan// ti la mar 'das bsdus gos nang dang /
131a2(gso rig): mdog ngan rgan can gos gcig gon// bong bu rnga mo ma he zhon// shing dang bong ba nyid pa dang // ring nas 'bod pa'i pho nya 'ongs// sman pas yongs su spang bar bya// bkra mi shis pa sems dang sgra// gtsir bu gcod dang 'jigs
131a3(gso rig): pa dang // mtshun gtor me la sreg pa dang // 'chi ba rnams la ster ba dang // sar nyal skra bshig skud pa dang // ngu dang ma bsdams gnas skabs su// sman pa gnas tshe pho nya 'ongs// mi ni 'chi bar ston pa yin// nang dang
131a4(gso rig): mtshan nyid mtshungs pa yi// yul lam dus su sman pa gnas// bang chen 'bod du 'ongs mthong ni// nad pa daM ni gso mi bya// lte ba kha dang sna reg dang // skra dang spu dang sen mo so// mtshan rgyab nu ma mgrin pa dang // lto dang srin
131a5(gso rig): lag dag dang ni// ras bral phub+h+r-i ma zha nye rtse// rngus gtun brdungs dang phyag ma rdo// zhi bA ma gos kyi mtha' ma dang // thal ba sel ba khu tshar sog/ thag pa gtun dang zhags pa srang // gzhan yang thog gis chag pa thogs//
131a6(gso rig): pho nya de 'dra sngon du mthong // 'chi ba dag tu ston pa yin// de bzhin mtshon phyed nyi ma'i gung // thun mtshams dang ni dus tshogs dang // tshes drug tshes bzhi tshes dgu dang // sgra gcan mjug rings 'char dus sogs// bra nye
131b1(gso rig): sbyin drug skyug chu stod// grwa dang khrums stod sbubs dang ni// gung du po nya nad pa yi// mA tshan nyid la ni brten pa'i tshig/ mi dge sgra dang mi shis mthong // de ni sbran pa 'gro ma bya// dbang po ma tshang ma ro 'am// mi rus kyis ni
131b2(gso rig): brgyan pa 'am// tshad dang tshig dang nyams tshig dang // de yi tshig tu smra ba 'am// rnyo ni chu dang drag pa 'am// dri nI shas cher rul bya dang // reg kyang rgyu cher m-i bzang dang // gong yang de 'dra gzhan dag ni// de kun mdun du
131b3(gso rig): smra ba 'am// yang na de skad smra ba'i tshe// pho nya 'ongs par mthong na ni// nad pa de ni gso mi bya// kyi hud kyi hud cho nges 'debs// 'o 'dod dmod mo 'grel spying sgra// gos dang gdugs dang lham 'jigs dang // sdug bsngal
131b4(gso rig): ba dag mthong ba dang // shi chen rgyal mtshan gang ba'i snod// chu nang nub par mthong ba dang // bsang sogs yid du mi 'ong smra// thal ba phyag dar gyis gtor dang // byi la sram dang sbrul dang ni// spre'us lam ni bcad pa
131b5(gso rig): dang // 'bar ba'i phyogs su ri dgus bya// gdugs pa dgri ni sgrog pa dang // 'bru nag bu ram dar ba dang // lan tshwa rang rnying pa gas pa dang // yungs kAr zhag dang 'bru mar dang // rtswa dang 'dam bu bud shing dang // mA ning mi
131b6(gso rig): srun sme sha can// rgya dag dang ni snying rnams dang // slon dang bshang ba gtong pa dang // rnag dang mtshan ma ngan pa mthong // snying po med dang 'khrig pa spyod// ras bal sogs dang dgra bo mthong // mal stan dang ni khyogs la
132a1(gso rig): sogs// kha sgrub tu ni gnas par mthong // nad pa dag dang gzhan dgu dang // snod sogs ngan mthong mi shes so// skyes pa'i ming car byA g.yon nas// blad med ming can g.yas 'dug
132a2(gso rig): bzang // byA dang ri dgas g.yas 'dug bzang // dang wa nI de ltar min// ri dgas rnams ni zung mi shes// tsa shaM byA rgod khany+dza ri// ne'u le ra dang rma bya rnams// mthong ba rtag tu shes pa yin// 'ug pa byi la
132a3(gso rig): sbrul mthong ba// rnam pa kun tu shis ma yin// go da dang ni ri bong sbrul// dze he ka ni ming thos dge/ mthong dang sgra sgrogs de ltar min// dring dang spre'u de las bzlog/ dpral ba'i phyogasu 'ja' tshon mthong // mi shis rgyu ba
132a4(gso rig): tu mthong na shis// me yis gang ba'i snod dag ni// chag dang khong stong gnas pa dang // nang pa 'chi 'gyurakhyim du ni// sman pa 'jug par byed pa'i tshe// zho sogs bkra shis 'og nas bshad// gang ba'i snod

132b6(gso rig): rmi lam shi ba'i mi rnams dang // lhan cig chang 'thung khyim drangs gang // mi de rims kyi gzugs can gyi// 'chi bdag gis ni myur 'khyer 'gyur// lus dang gos dang phreng ba dmar// bud med rgod pa drangs mi gang //
133a1(gso rig): de ni khrag mkhris dag gis 'chi// ma he rta phag bong bu dang // rnga mo zhon te lho phyogs 'gro// de ni gcod / chen nad kyis 'chi// lcug ma tsher can 'od ma 'am// ta la snying ga skyes pa
133a2(gso rig): rmirta gang yin de ni skran gyis 'chi// gAng zhig ma ni mi 'baR+Ya la// sbyin srog byed cing mar gyis bskus// gtsor bur 'dug dang pad+ma ni// snying gar byung ni mdze yis 'a che// gang zhig rme sha can lhan cig/ snum mongs

133a4(gso rig): dang khAM dag dang // wa 'am mi ro la zhon rmis// de ni 'chi bdag khar song yin// snum khur sha khu li zos rmis// sod nas de 'dra slon gyur pa// gang yin de ni 'tsho mi 'gyur// nyi zla gzas zin sa mig na// nyi ma zla ba lhung
133a5(gso rig): pa yi// rmi lam mthong na long bar 'gyur// spyi bor 'od ma'i lcug sogs skyes// de bzhin bya rog tshang 'a cha' dang // mgo bo chad par rmis pa dang // khA dang bya rgod tshogs kyis bskor// de bzhin yi dgas sha za mo/ byang

133b1(gso rig): du 'khyer// glu gar dang ni rol mo byed// gos dang phreng ba dmar po 'chang // lus 'phel na tshong rgyas pa dang / bag ma len zhing kha spu 'dreg/ zas bcos snum za chang 'thung dang // stug dang 'khru ba rmi ba dang // lcags dang

133b3(gso rig): dang skar ma dang // so mig lha yi gzugs rnams ni// lhung ba'am 'jig pa rmis pa 'am// ri bo ral bar gyur pa dang // nag tshal dmar ba'i nang dang ni// sdig can khyim du 'jug pa dang // ro bsregs sa dang mun par zhugs/

134a1(gso rig): brtags pa dang // 'byung bar gyur dang nang las 'byung // rmi lam rnam pa bdun du ba shwad// de las dang po'i lnga po dang // rang gi rang bzhin nyin mo ban+d+he // shin tu ring thung 'bras bu med// cha 'dres pa

134b1(gso rig): mngon par bstod pa dang // du dang lhung las ldang ba dang // dgra bo 'pham par byas pa dag/ gang rmis tshe ring nang med dang // nor mang po ni rnyed par 'gyur// de bzhin nung pa'i g.yog 'khor ni// bkra shis cho ga

135b2(gso rig): gnod 'gyur sna tshogs pa// brten pas ldang bar 'gyur bar bshang // gsum po'i sbyor ba rnam pa gsum// gnod 'gyur lngar ni bshod pa yin// kha dang tsha dang bska cung zad // tsu pA dang bcung med sra ba dang // bkag dang

136b6(gso rig): zug/ brang du btsugs pa lta bur gzer// phrag pa brdungs snyam dpung pa ni// bcom snyam sems shing sgrog rus na// 'gram pas kha zas ldang mi nus// glal 'byung rna ba swa dang bcas// mur 'gram zug cing ma y-i pe
137a1(gso rig): lce yI sa ra ni mi tshor ba 'am// yang na kha bska bro bar 'gyur// dri ma rnams ni srid pa dang // pags mig kha dang sen mo dang // bshang sgo rtswa rting dmar ba dang // mtshal ma yi ga 'chus sring rung /
137a2(gso rig): zas mi 'ju zhing rdul mi 'byung // gnyid yar mchu dang gre ba skam// skom dang che zhing lung pa bskams// lung pa lu zhing skyugs pa bskams// sems zhum lus kyi ba spu ljang // pags pA so dag rtse ba dang // rka laM
137a3(gso rig): 'ang shing sbrid pa thogs// mgo 'khor tshig ni brla ba dang // dring bag la dga' bya skang byung // rlung gi rim su shes par bya// lus kun cig nar khyab pa dang // glal zhing khaM d+hi raM kha ba dang // bsil 'dang kha sbyar tha~Mr
137a4(gso rig): 'byung // mgo 'khor brgyal myos snying mi dga'// bshang sla mkhris pa rlon pa dang // mchil mo khrag bac+doMswa sgeg pa skyug/ thor bu dam po 'byung ba dang // pags pa la sogs ser rtsa sngo// rdul 'byung dbugs ni
137a5(gso rig): mnom pa dang // skom dang rab tshe mkhris pa'i rims// lhag par yi ge 'chus shing rmongs// bu ga 'gug cing rims shu sas ngal// ma par dmar ba bro// dang kha lcog cing dbugs mi bde// tshim pa/ ba swI
137a6(gso rig): sdug pa 'byung ka/ lung pa lus rengs pa gas sogs skye// yan lag thor bu gra ba mo 'byung // snyom zhing lus 'dar pang kan rims// dus su mas cad ni// 'byung zhi po 'phel po nyid gyur pa// nad gzhor ba
137b1(gso rig): pa'i mi mthun bsten// bsgyur bas bde bar byed pa yin// rang rang mtshan ma 'dres pa ni// ldan pa'i rims yin gzhan yang ni// mgo na brgya la smon lus tsha rmongs pag 'gyur// gre ba kha bskums mi dga' rus tshigs na//
137b2(gso rig): gnyid med mgo 'khor spu ldang skom dang che// kha glal tshig ma rlung mkhris 'dres pa'i rims// tsha med yi ga 'chus shing glang tshigs na// cham pa lung pa dbugs mi bde bshang sri// khong bsil rlongs bag rab
137b3(gso rig): rib mgo 'khor mya// bad kan+di rlung 'dres rims kyi mtshan ma yin// pus rdul rengs dang tsha bsil sor mi gnas// skom dang lung pa bud kan mkhris bag 'byung // rmongs bag sgro dang kha bro kha dri chags// bad
137b4(gso rig): kan mkhris pa 'dris pa'i rims kyi rtags// kun nas 'byung ba rtags kun ldan// 'dir yang thang re tsha ba ldang // de bzhin drang dang nyin mo ni// gnyid che mtshan mo gnyid chung ba'am// / rtag par gnyid 'ong ba'am
137b5(gso rig): yar// rdul cher 'byung ba 'ang rdul mi 'byung // glu dang gar dang rgod sogs pa// spyod pa ngan pa la 'jug cing // mig dmar mchi ma 'dzag dang bcas// zhum zhing mchi ma 'khrugs par snang // byin snying rtsig lobs
137b6(gso rig): na ba dang // mgo po rus tshigs ni mgo 'khor// rno ba sgra dang nang dang bcas// mgul pa gra ma sa gang snyam sems// lha rtsub kun nas bsregs ltar snang // lus lci tshigs ni 'bye snyam sems// mchil mar
138a1(gso rig): khrag mkhris pad+ma kun 'byung // mgo bo yo zhing skom dang che// zor bu 'brum phran mtha' 'khor ba// dmar zhing gnag pa 'byung bar 'gyur// snying nu ba shang gtso sri ba'am// yang nAnyung ba
138a2(gso rig): 'amarA ba ma par byung // kha nad snum zhing nyams stobs chung // bcom chung 'gyur zhing smra ba dang // nang smin dka' zhing rmugs pa dang // rgyun du gre bya 'dze ra ba ni// 'dus pa'i rims te mngon rmugs byed// de ni mdangs
138a3(gso rig): 'phrog ces kyang bshad// nad kyi sA bkag cing me drod nyams// mtshan ma thams cad rdzogs 'gyur ba// gsor mi rung ste de las gzhan// gso dka' 'am dbang po ma tshang 'gyur// gzhan yang 'dus pa las byung
138a4(gso rig): gA/ gang du mkhris pa logs shig gnas// pags pa 'am nang grol tsha ba dag/ 'debs pa 'am tshe bsnga phyir 'byung // de bzhin bad kan rlung grang ba// de gnyis tshwa lnga gso dka' yin// drang lnga de ni mkhris pa
138a5(gso rig): yis khad kan gsher ba bskams pa dang // grang ba zhi byas kha sgyur brgya la// myos dang skom dad che bar 'gyu ro// tshwa be sA na de rjes la// rmugs rlon mchil ma khon snom 'gyur// glo bur drag shul las byung dang //
138a6(gso rig): mngon zin byed byas dmong 'byung bzhi// de la smang dpyad mos kyi gas sogaso// ngal ba drag shul las byung yin// de ni phal chere rlung nad kyis// khrag ni gnod cing 'khrugs byas pas// na bcas ma dog
138b1(gso rig): nyams skrangs dang bcas// zug gzer bcas pa'i rims bsgred 'gyur// gdon zhugs sman gyi dri dang dug/ khros 'jigs mya ngan 'dod las byung // mngon par zin las byung rims yin// 'dir rton rgyu med
138b2(gso rig): rgod cing du// sman gyi dri skyes brgyal bya dang // snying pa kladadA nang sbyangs par 'gyur// dug las brgyal dang tshang pas 'khru// mdog gnag lus tshe snying nAd 'gyur// khros las lus 'dar klang nangad 'gyur// mya ngan
138b3(gso rig): 'jigs las gla bar 'gyur// 'dod las mgo 'khor yid 'chus tshwa// ngo tsha gnyid blo brtan nyams 'gyur// ga don la sogs pa'i 'dus pa'i rims// 'jigs sogs gsum gyi rlung gi rims// khro las
138b4(gso rig): mkhris pa ldang bar 'gyur// dmong pa byang byas las byung gang // 'dus pa'i rims ni mi bzang pa// de ni shin tu bzong dkar bshang // de la byad byas sngags kyis ni// sbyin sreg byas pa bzhin du tshi// thog mar sems
138b5(gso rig): 'bab de 'og lus// de nas thor bu mgo 'khor sgom// che bcus rgyal bas zinu 'gyur ba'i// rims ni nyin ri bzhin du 'phel// de ltar rims ni brgyad du bshad// de dag mdor na rnams gnyis te// lus dang sems kyi
138b6(gso rig): rims dang ni// grang dang tshab phyi nang gnas// rang bzhin dang ni gyur pa dang // gsor rung gsor mi rung ba dang // smin dang ma smin zhes bya'o// lus rims thog mar lus tsha byed// sems kyi dang paM snying tsha 'gyur// rlung dang bar
139a1(gso rig): kan cig car ni// 'byung tshe grung ba'i rims su 'gyur// mkhris pa dang ldan cha ba ste// 'dres las 'dres pa'o nung gnas pa// rims nad dkyil ni bskyed 'gyur nas// nang na tshwa zhing bshang
139a2(gso rig): gAci sri// phyi rol rims ni tsha ba dang // phyi rol gnas pa gso bar sla// dbyar dang ston dang dpyir dus su// rlung sogs rims 'byung rang bzhin rims// gzhan du gyur pa de gso dka'// phal cher rlung ni rang bzhin rims//
139a3(gso rig): yin yang gso bar dka' ba yin// dbyer dus rlung nang ldang 'gyur na// mkhris pa bad kan ljon rims 'gyur// ston grwa mkhris pa nad slong ste// bang kan dwe yi grogs byed 'gyur// der ni bsnyung ba byas gyur yang /
139a4(gso rig): gnod par 'gyur ba ma yin no// bAng kon dpyid ljang de yang ni// de rjes rlung dang mkhris pa 'byung // nyams stobs che zhing nang stobs chung // ban+de gnyan med rims gso bar smra// rnams kun 'gyur ba shes bya bar// gso
139a5(gso rig): mi rung ba sngar bshad do// rims kyis nad tsha bas che zhing tsha// khong rmya ma yin gcin mang dang // bshang gci kha zas mi 'jul// bkres chung ma smin rims mtshan nyid// rims shugs stobs che skom dang che// bla zhing mgo
139a6(gso rig): 'khor dbugs mi bde// bshang gci bder 'byung nad bskyod pa// smin par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma yin// ma smin go bzlog mtshan nyid dang // zhag bdun bsnyung byas la smin bshad// rims ni nad kyi dus dang ni// stobs chung che
139b1(gso rig): las rnams lngar bshad// phal cher 'dus par gyur pa yi// rimasu mang du 'gyur bar bshad// rgyun dang rtag pa nyin gcig pa// nyin gsum pa dang nyin bzhi pa'o// lus zungs bshang gci rgyu ba yi// du ga nad kyis khyab byas
139b2(gso rig): ba'i// lus kun tsha bar gyur nas ni// gnod byas sogs dang mnyam par 'phel// stobs che lus lci rkang lag rangs// khyad par du ni dngas mar gnas// gnyen pos bcos dka' bzod par dka2// rgyun gyi rimasu 'gyur ba yon//
139b3(gso rig): de yi drod kyi dri mA dang // lus zungs myur du zlad par byed// de 'og rnam kun lus gzungs sogs// dag pa 'am ma dag rims kyis ni// rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan zhag/ bdun nam bcu 'am bcu gnyis gnas// phal che
139b4(gso rig): mtshams las mI 'da' bar// 'tsho ba'am 'chi ba dag tu byed// de skad me bzhin 'jug gis bshad// ljang sngon gyis ni bshad pa'i gzhung // bdun pa nyis lngab gyur pa yin// de bzhin dgu dang bcu gcig lnga pa// 'di ni nang
139b5(gso rig): gzhi gsum gyi tshigs// 'tsho dang 'chi bar byed pa yin// rims dus ngag dang ma dag las// yun ring dus su 'ang gnas pa yin// nad rtse zhil ba nyam chung dang // kha zas mi 'phrod sogs bsten pas// nad dkyil chung
139b6(gso rig): yang gnod byas sogs// brten te stobs che nyid gyur las// gnyen por bcas shing 'phel 'brir gnas// mi bzad pa ni nyid du 'gyur// de rnams kyi ni nad kyi stobs// rang gi dus su ri mas stobs skye// slar yang
140a1(gso rig): de dag bcos thabs kyis// stobs che chung las ldog par byed// nad zang rims ni phar gyur pa// bcud la sogs pa nyid la thim// thim pas lus ring sha mdog ngan// rmongs bag la sogs
140a2(gso rig): de yis bskyed// nye zhing kha ni bye ba'i phyir// dngas ma rgyu ba'i rtsa sgo las// las kun myur du khyab pa ni// nad kyis skye bar byed pa yin// des na rgyun du rtag rims 'byung // de las bzlog pa tshul mi 'dra// mi snyoms rtsol ba
140a3(gso rig): mi mnyam lnga// bya ba'i dus mi mnyam yun ring // phal cher nad ni khrag la brten// rtag pa'i rims ni byed par 'gyur// de yang nyin mtshan la ni gnyis ldang // nyin gcig nyin rI lan re ldang // de ni sha yi rtsa la brten//

140a6(gso rig): bzlog pa'o// nyin gsum pas ni nyin gnyis na// nyin gcig na bar mi byed do// nang rnams kyi ni stobs che chung // zas dang spyod pa las byung zhing // de bzhin rims rnams 'byung ba ni// yid dang las las skye bar 'gyur//
140b1(gso rig): nAnd kyis lus zungs dkrugs gyur pa// nang sos nye che zhu bar 'gyur// de tshe nad pa dbugs drag rdul// 'khun zhing slon byed 'dre ba dang // lus 'dar tshig mang tsha ba dang // lus drang bzhin mdog nyams pa dang // dran stor
140b2(gso rig): rims kyis shugs kyis gzir// khros pa'i tshul gyis lta bI dang / bshang ba nA de dang sbyar bcas pa// sla ba shu gas drag 'byung ba yin// lus ni yang zhing rmya dang rmongs bag tsha ba med// kha na thor bu 'byung dang dbang
140b3(gso rig): po rtas shing bde// yid ni sor gnas rdul spring bder 'byung yi ge 'byed// mgo bo g.ya'i pa rims nad 'byang ba'i mtshan ma yin// / yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// nang gzhi'i gnas kyi

140b5(gso rig): drags dang // mkhris pa can gyis mkhris nad ni// gsher dang khrag rgyas nang du 'gyur// de ni phan tshun 'dres gyur pas// lus ku na khyab par byed par 'gyur// ma khr-is pa khrag las gyur pa dang // 'dres dang gnod
140b6(gso rig): bya las dang gcig/ mdog dang dri ni rjes mthun pas// khrag gi ming du bstan pa yin// de ni khrag gnas mchin pa dang // mtshar pa laso ni 'byung bar 'gyur// mgo bo lci zhing yi ge 'chu so// bsil 'dod skrag pa dung can
141a1(gso rig): sbyar// skyug cing skyug mdog gcog par snang // lung pa dbugs mi bde mgo 'khor// khyod snyoms khrag dmar nya dri bro// kha dri mi zhim skrang 'gags la// mig la sogs pa'i kha dog
141a2(gso rig): ni// dmar dang ljang dang ser por snang/ rmi lam du yang kha dogi de// 'dir ni mthong bar 'gyur ba yin// bstong du sna mig rna bA kha// smad du bshang sgo pho mo'i mtshan// ba spu'i bu ga kun las kyang // khrag
141a3(gso rig): rab rgyas pa 'byung bar 'gyur// stod kyi bang kan yin gso sla// de ni bkru sman btang pas gso// sman meng yod cing mkhris pa yi// spyan gyi mchog ni bkru sman yin+da// zla la yod pa'i bdi kan yang // der ni de yis sbyangs
141a4(gso rig): byas 'gyur// de la smin mengar dang bska// bad kan dag lnga phan pa la// gang ldog ngang gis bang kan sr-il// khA dang bska ba smos ci dgos// thur du 'byung ba'i rlung yin phyir// da ni skyug sman btang bas gso// mkhris pa'i
141a5(gso rig): sman+da ni nyung ba yin// sgrag sman mkhris pa'i sman mchog yin// rtswa la yod pa'i rlung nad kyang // de ni de yis zhi mi 'gyur// de la ro ni mngar bska ba// 'ba' zhig phan par 'gyur ba yin// bad kan rlung ni 'dres pa'i nad/
141a6(gso rig): gnyi gar 'byung ba ga so dka' ste// bzlog pa'i thabs ni meng phyir dang // smaran yang yod pa ma yin no// 'di las bzlog par bya ba'i thabs// sbyangs pa'am yod pa ma yin te// sbyangs pas bzlog par bya ba dag/ sman
141b1(gso rig): pas khrag mkhris gso ba yin// de bzhin nye bar zhi ba yang // 'di la yong ye yod ma yin// 'dres par gyur pa'i nang la ni// thams cad sel bya'i zhi bya phan// de la nad dang rjes mthun pa'o// gtar ga btab ste brtag

141b6(gso rig): kha ru 'byung zhing rgyu ba ni// lung pa snod chag 'dra sgra 'byung // nang gzhi dbye bas nad kyang ni// tha dang shugs dang bcas pa yin// nad gang sgra ni ma snyom pa'i// de las lung ba 'byung ba yin// rlung nad skyes pa rlung 'khrugs pa// brang
142a1(gso rig): dang gre ba kha bskams shing // snying brang rtsib logs klad pa gzer// rmong bag khong 'khrugs skad 'gags shing // lung pa skams po 'byung byed cing // na ba'i shugs drag sgra cher
142a2(gso rig): 'byung // lus kun brtse byas bad kan skam// mthon par dka' zhing nyung ngu 'byung // mkhris pas mig dang bad kan sar// kha nang khA zhing rims mgo 'khor// khrag mi khris smon zhing skom dang che// skad 'gags dud 'dra

142b2(gso rig): lo// glo gcong gis ni gnas byed cing // khung ba lu zhing byad kan 'byung // rnag khrag mnam zhing ser ba dang // drul zhing rtsa sngo dmar ba dang // rtsib logs bton pa ltar sems shing // snying ni ltung ba snyam du byed//

142b5(gso rig): rung // gnyis 'dres kun kyang rgan po ni// na tshod zad btab 'tsho po tsam// lud pa yal bar bor ba las// dbugs mi bde dang zad byed smon// skad 'gag sa la sogs nad 'byung 'gyur// de phyir de ni myur du gso// /

143a5(gso rig): mi dran// cham pa mi bzang yi ga 'argyus// mi bzang shugs ni sgying byed cing // dbugs mi bde ba de shugs kyis// srog la gnod 'gyur lung pa'i mthar// skad cig bde ba byed pa yin// nya la tsho shin tu mi brid la//
143a6(gso rig): 'dug na cung zad bde bar 'gyur// mig gdangs dpral ba'i phyogs nas ni// rdul 'dzag shin tu na bas nyen// kha bskams dbugs ni skyed mar 'byung // dro ba 'dod cing 'dar dong bcas// tshar 'dab grang dang ser bus
143b1(gso rig): pheMg/ bad kan bskyed pas rnam par 'phel// mun can de ni 'tsho bya 'am// nyams ldan gsar du btab gso smra// rims dang brgyal las byung grang ba'i// sman gyis zhi de rab mun can// dbugs 'chang dbugs 'byin
143b2(gso rig): rgyun chad cing // nAd gcong nad kyis gzer bar byeng // rdul bcas brgyal dang spos dang byanas// lgang pa tsha zhing gcin 'gag byed// mig mi sdug cing thur du blta// mig gcig dmar zhing dran pa stor// kha

143b4(gso rig): dUdA ro 'dra// shes dang rnams shes rab nyams shing // mig 'khrug bzhin ni 'gyur ba dang // ro stong zhum par 'gyur ba dang // ba shang gAci 'gags shing skad gsang nyams// mgul bsgrims yang dang
143b5(gso rig): mI dran// rna bA mur 'grama? klad rab na// gyen 'byung dbugs ni ring du 'byin// slar ni thur du rngub mi nus// bdaM kAn gyis kha rtsa sgo 'gag/ rlung ni 'khrugs pas gzir gyur pa// gyen du blta zhing 'khrul byed pas// mi
143b6(gso rig): ni kun tu lte byed la// gnod rnams 'chad par byed bzhin du// skad 'gogs smre sngags 'don par byed// 'di dag ma tshang gsor rung la// tshang na nges par srogs 'i phrog byed// dbugs mi bdi rgyu sngon chu dang /
144a1(gso rig): grangs dang rang bzhin rten cig yin// skyigs bu zas 'byung phran tshegs dang // zung dang chen por 'byung ba dang // zab pa dag dang rnam pa lnga// de la rlung gis rigs zos dang // rtsub
144a2(gso rig): sra dang ma goms pa'i// zas dang skom gyis btsir gyur pa'i// rlung gi skyigs bu nung med pa// sgra mi drag cing spring 'byung ste// gang zhig goms pa'i zas skom gyis// zhi 'gyur skyigs bu bzang 'byung yin//
144a3(gso rig): drag shul gyis rlung cung zad bskyod// skyigs bu phra mo 'byung bar 'gyur// nam tshong rtsa ba nas 'byung byed// de ni shugs dal 'jam pa yin// rtsol ba drag pos 'phel 'gyuraro la// zas zos tsam gyis dal bar
144a4(gso rig): 'gyur// zung 'jug tshigs ni ring ba la// gang zhig zas las 'byung gyur pa// 'ju bar nye bar tshe na 'debs// zas zhu zin nas 'phel 'gyur ba'o// mgo dang mgul pa 'dar byed cing // sgo zhing shin tu snyoms dang
144a5(gso rig): bskyed// gla dang smon dang tshad par 'khru// mig gdangs glal ni 'byung bar 'gyur// skyigs bu zung 'byung shugs drag la// zhu dang bcas pa re re shes bya// skyigs bu chen po 'byung ba'i tshul// smin ma mur 'gram gnyis
144a6(gso rig): rengs shing // mig nas mchi 'dzag har por blta// lus rengs tshig ni thogs byed cing // dran dang 'du shes 'khrul par byed// mig pa'i sbubs ni 'gogs byed cing // gnad kyi tshogs ni spyod par byed// rgyab dgu
144b1(gso rig): lus ni khong skem byed// rtsa ba chen zhing sgra che la// nad tshabs che zhing stobs cher 'gyur// zhu ba'i gnas sam lte 'og nas// sgyu ma 'dra bar gang zhig 'byung // de 'dra'i tshul ni bstung mar 'byung // glal dang
144b2(gso rig): rkang lag bya stangs byed// brag ca zab 'byung zab mo yin// de rnams las ni dang po yi// gnyis po gso bar bya ba yin// tha ma'i gnyis dang zung 'byung ba// mtshan nyid kun rdzogs shugs drag spang // 'di dag
144b3(gso rig): thams cad yun rim bsags// rgan po bud med kyis dub dang // nad kyis nyam chung zas bcad pa// glo brdol nad can srung par bya// nung kun+da gyis 'chi byed mod kyi// skyigs bu dbugs mi bde ba ltar// nad
144b4(gso rig): gzhan myur du gsod mi byed// 'di dag 'chi tshe nges 'byung 'gyur// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// nang gzhi gnas kyi le'u bzhi pa'o// // de nas glo gcong chen po zang byed
144b5(gso rig): kyi le'u bshad par bya'o// nad ni du ma rjes 'brang zhing // nud mang sngon du 'gro 'gyur la// rgyal po za byed skems byed dang // nad kyi rgyal po zhes kyang bshAng // rgyu skar rnams dang bram ze yi// rgyal po'i gcong du
144b6(gso rig): sngon gyur zhing // gang yang nad kyi rgyal por 'gyur// de phyir gnod pa'i rgyal por bshad// lus dang sman ni zad byed cing // zad las byung bas zad byed yin// mdangs sogs skems pas skem byed yin//
145a1(gso rig): de rnams las de gsal bas rgyu la// drug shul brten dang shugs bkag dang // khu chu dngas ma snum zad dang // zas skom cho ga dang bral bsten// bzhi po 'di dag de yi rgyu// de yis
145a2(gso rig): rlung rlung mkhris pa dang // bad kan bslangs nas thams cad du// lus kyi tshogs kun la zhugs te// de yis rtse snre la gnod cing // bu ga'i skye ni bkag pa'o// yang na shin tu khaM b+h+yAM 'gyur// stong snang tha kar gnas
145a3(gso rig): nas ni// rang gi nangad ni ji bzhin bskyed// de 'byung 'gyur ba'i sngon tshul ni// cham 'debs spyod pa shin tu ma nga// mchil me kha nang ra mngar bre// lus dang me drod nyam chung byed // gzho snod sa skem la sogs ni/
145a4(gso rig): gtsang yang mi gtsang nyid du mdza // la cher zos skom la sogs dang // sbrang me rtsa dang skye sogs 'bab// spyong 'bar smon bri yig 'chus// kha zas zlos kyang mas stobs pad-i// pir blta zhing
145a5(gso rig): ga sna // mig ni shin tu dkar por snang // lag parang gi ni 'jal bar 'dod// lus la 'jigs su rung bar mthong // bud med chang dang shA la dga'// slong dang glang pa 'gems par skyed// rgyu dang ser mo shin tu
145a6(gso rig): 'a rmi lam dun phye ma leg/ drang ba sdig sbrul gcan can sbal// bya rnams kyis na gcas par mthong // swA 'i mi thal sogs kyi la ni 'dzeg pa dang // yul dang slo ni sdom pa dang /
145b1(gso rig): bskams par rmi lam mthong // skar mnga' ri bo ltung ba dang // ljon shing rnams ni 'bar ba rmi// stong du gnas na cham pas 'debs// lud pa lu zhing dbugs mi bde// phrag pa spyi bo na ba dang // skad 'grags yi ga 'chus par
145b2(gso rig): 'gyur/ smad gnas bshang skra rtug skam byed// nad grol nad nas smon par byed// thang kar gnas pas rtsi ba logs zug/ tshogs la gnas na rim su 'gyur// de ltar nod tshul bcu gcig ni// gcod chen ldan las
145b3(gso rig): 'byung bar 'gyur// de rnams kyi ni bla gnyen dag/ skad 'gags brang du na pa dang // kha glal lus grugs mchil snabs mang // drong nyams kha mnam yin shes bya// de la rlung 'gyur glad pa dang // rtsib logs zug sha
145b4(gso rig): yan lag na// skad 'gags mgul pa subs par 'gyur// mkhris rgyus rke lag phrag pa tsha// tshad 'khru khrag tu smon pa dang // kha mAn ma rim sa 'debs myos par 'gyur// bad kan las gyur yi ga 'chus/
145b5(gso rig): smon lung lus dang yan lag lci// mchil snabs mang zhing cham pas 'debs// dbugs maM bde skad 'gags drod nyams// nad kyis me drod nyam chung bas// 'byar bcas bang kun rgyas gyur nas// rtsa sbubs sgo ni
145b6(gso rig): 'gags pa dang // lus zungs drod ni chung 'gyur bas// dngas ma rang gi gnas su ni// ma zhu bla gnyen de dang de// bskyed cing sha sogs mi 'gyur la// khrag ni gyen du 'byung bar byed// khong po nyid du zas 'ju bas/
146a1(gso rig): dngas mar 'gyur bar mi byed phyir// phal cher dri ma nyid 'gyur gyi// lus zungs 'phel bar mi byud do// dngas ma khrag tu mi 'gyur la// shar 'gyur ba lta spros ci dgos// zla byed
146a2(gso rig): can ni bshang 'phel ba// 'ba' zhig gis ni gnas par byed// mtshan ma chung yang nyam chung zhing // nad kyi sman gyi stobs mi bzod// srad bA de las gzhan pa no// thams cad ldan yang gso bar bya// rlung ni sna ras
146a3(gso rig): 'dus pa dang // za byed tshil las gyur pa drug/ skad 'gags kyi ni bye ba yin// de la rlung g.yo nyim chung rtsu ba// gro ba gra mas g+hang snyam byed// de la snum dro 'om phan// mkhris pa las gyur rkun lkog che// sgrim
146a4(gso rig): zhing sme bar mi nus 'gyur// bang kon mgul pa byugs snyam byed// skad kyi gas pa dma'i ngar ngar 'dzer// thigs bcas 'gyur ro thams cad kyi// ma'i tshan ma thams cad ldan pa yin// za byed las ni drung
146a5(gso rig): snyam byed// du bas bdugs ltar shin tu na// tshol 'gyur bad kan bdag nyid can// tshogs mi brda sprod mi nus 'gyur// 'dir ni 'dus dang tha ma spang // yi ga 'chus pa'i nad rnams ni// lce snying gnas pa so
146a6(gso rig): so dang // 'dus pa dang ni yid kyi ni// gdung ba las gyur lnga pa yin// kha ni bska dang kha mngar gro// rlung sogs gsum dang rims bzhin sbyar// kun las gyur pa ro bro med// mya ngan khro sogs nad ji bzhin// smon blo
146b1(gso rig): nang gzhi rnam re kun+da// mi sdug yul las 'byung lnga pa// 'di dag stong du rgyu ba'i rlung // 'khrugs pas nad ni thams cad phul// de rnams grongs dang kha cha bro// mchil ma yi ga 'chus sngon 'byung // rlung 'gyur lte ba
146b2(gso rig): rgyab tu zug/ rtsib logs ni zhing zas smon nas// cung zad 'byung zhing chad pa dang // ro bska lbu ba tsan du skyug/ sgregs po'i sgra bcas mdog gnag la// sla zhing 'byung dka' sgra dang bces// lud pa kha bskams
146b3(gso rig): klong snying na// skad 'gags pa dang khong snyom bcas// mkhris 'gyur thal chu 'dra ba la// dud kha ljang sde ni mdog ser skyug/ khrag bcas ro sgyur tsha zhing dro// skom dang brgyal tsha gdung bcas yin// bad kan las
146b4(gso rig): snum kha bsil// nal nal por 'dug 'dra ba'i ris// ro mang lan tsha bri tshabs cha// chags shing be spu rtse bar skye // gdong skrangs kha ning mngar bar bro// snyom zhing snying na lung pa can// gsum char las
146b5(gso rig): byung rtogs kun ldan// 'chi ltas las bshad gang de yang // rul dang mi gtsang btsog pa dang // skyug bro mthong dang thos sogs kyis// yid gdungs snying la phog 'gyur smon// mi sdug yul las byung ba yin//
146b6(gso rig): yid mi bde skom srin be'u snabs// rlung sogs nyid la gnas par brtag/ gzer dang 'phar dang snying na ba// bye brag tu ni srin bu'i nang // srin pu snying nad mtshan ma las// de ni shes par bya ba yin// snying nad nad
147a1(gso rig): ni re re 'dus// smin bu las gyur rnam lngar bshad// rlung gis shin tu zug cing na// gas dang bshags pa snyam du sems// bcom snyam sems shing skam la rengs//
147a2(gso rig): snying gis stong snyam zag par byed// rgyu med zhum zhing mi dga' la// 'jigs shing dgra ni mi bzod la// 'phar zhing 'dre lnga bcus snyam byed// rmongs bag dbugs thung gnyid chung 'gyur// mkhris 'gyur
147a3(gso rig): skom dang mgo 'khor brgyal// tsha rdul snying ga sbyar lus snyom// mkhris pa sbyar ba smon par byed// dud pa khar 'ong ser rims 'debs// bad kan las gyur snying ga rengs// khaMng nA rdo bcug lta bur lci// drod
147a4(gso rig): nyams mchil mang lud pa lu// gnyid che snyoms rims yi gA 'chus// nyes gsum mtshan nyid thams cad ldan// srin pus mig ni gnag pa dang // mun par zhugs snyam byed snying 'phar// lus bskams
147a5(gso rig): g.ya' zhing bad kan 'jog/ 'di ni rtag tu sog le yis// snying la 'drud pa lta bur sems// mi bzang nad des skyer gsod pas// de ni rings par gso bar bya// skom dang rlung mi khris
147a6(gso rig): bang kan dang // 'dus pa dngas ma zad pa dang // nad 'dres pa las drug tu 'gyur// de ltar gyur pa thams cad lo// rlung mkhris gnyis ni rgyu yin te// de 'khrugs lus zungs bsil ba ni// bskams nis ldang
147b1(gso rig): bAr 'gyur ba yin// lus kun 'dar zhing mgo 'khor tsha// skom dang khong cha rmongs par byed// lce drung mgul pa glo ba dang // skam dang skom 'thung rgyu ba'i rtsa// bskams pas skom dudu skye bar 'gyur// de rnams kyi ni
147b2(gso rig): spyi'i mtshan nyid// kha bskams skom gyis mi ngoms dang / zas la mi dga' skad 'gogs dang // gr-i pa lce mchu rtsub mor 'gyur// lce 'byin byed cing khong snyoms la// gla zhing soms ni myos pa dang // de
147b3(gso rig): bzhin skom gdungs nang du 'gyur// lus bskams rmya zhing 'on pa dang // rmongs bag mgo 'khor snying nang ste// 'di lta bu yi nang rnams ni// skom pas gdungs las skye bar 'gyur// rlung 'gyur khong rmyanyam chung la//
147b4(gso rig): mur 'gram zug cing klang pa 'khor// sku lces dri dang ro mi tshor// 'on zhing gnyid med nyams stobs zang // chu grang 'thungs nA skom 'phel 'gyur// mkhris pA kha nong ro kha brgyal// dmar por mthong zhing rtag par
147b5(gso rig): ni// kha skam khong tsha dbugs mnam pa'o// bad kAn ldan pas skom rgyu'i rtsa// bkug pasA rlung ni 'khrugs gyur nas// de tshe de yIs bad kun ni// 'odam bzhin de yis skom par byed// mgul pa gra mas gang snyam
147b6(gso rig): sems// gnyid che kha nang mngar ba bro// lto ba mgo bo tshor ba chung // rmong sa bag slon gyur yi ga 'chus// lus snyom kha zas mi 'ju ba'o// kun las gyur pa rtags kun ldan// bi snabs las gyur kha zas ni// ming
148a1(gso rig): dka' rlung mkhris las gyur yin// tsha bas ngal bas 'phral du na// chu grang bsten gyur skom dad che// khong par cha ba bsdus pa yis// gang skom de ni mkhris skyes yin// gang yang chang drags
148a2(gso rig): me drod no// snum zos skyes pa'ang mi khris 'byung yin// snum zhing skyur dang lan tsha'i bag/ zos pas bad kan las skyes 'gyur// za byed las ni skom dad 'gyur// dngas ma zad dang mtshan nyid 'dra// khong bskams
148a3(gso rig): gcin nud rims nAd sogs// yun rings nad ni rims skom nang // gang zhig skom dang mi bzang skyes// de ni 'dres las 'byung bar bshad// / yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las//
148a4(gso rig): nad gzhi'i gnas kyi lce'u lha'o// / de nas chung nad kyi nang gzhi bshad par bya// ni dang drod me rtsu bA pheM sbyar// nyal po 'dod myur byed dang yang // g+has l-I dang dang byu byed bir bshad/
148a5(gso rig): mdangs ni 'dri las go bzlog yin// dug kyang rno sogs yin mod kyi// sems la gnod par byed pa yi// nus pasa'i chi bar byed pas na// duge ni ldog par mthu bo che'o// cheng ni rno sogs yon tan gyis
148a6(gso rig): mdangs kyi yon tan brtul la sogs// bcu po bcu yis 'khrugs byas nas// sems ni sbyor bar byed pa yin// ra ro dang po gnyis pa yis// bag med pa yi gnas la gnas// rnam rtog ngan bcom rmos
148b1(gso rig): pa rnams// bde ba yin snyam sems par 'gyur// 'bring dang chen po bar gyi tshe// rdul dang mun pa'i rang bzhin can// glang chen lcags kyu med pa ltar// rmongs pas mi bya ci yang med// 'di ni kha na ma tho'i gnas// 'di
148b2(gso rig): ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'i gzhi// 'di gcig ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i lam// mang po ston par byed pa yin// ra ro gsum pa'i tsho na ni// sems med par ni ro ltar nyal// nyes pa'i byadag nyid shi ba las// shin tu ma
148b3(gso rig): rung gnas skabs 'thob// chos dang chos min bde dang sdug/ don dang don min phan dang gnod// gang la chags pas myi shes pa// de ltar mkhas pas ji ltar bsten// chang las myos 'jigs mya ngan dang // khro dang srog
148b4(gso rig): dang bral ba gnas// smyo byed myos dang brgyal bar byas// brjed byed dang bcas kun song nad// gang du dran pa nyams cig yod// der ni mi dge thams cad 'byung // mi 'phrod zas ni zos pos kyang // nang dam yang na 'chi bar
148b5(gso rig): 'gyur// chang ni sde tshan gsum blo brtan// ngo tsha sogs kyang 'jig par byed// nyams stobs ldan dang zas zos dang // zas charwa za dang snum pag za// snying stobs lang tsho ldan pa yang // rtag tu chang 'thung de'i rigs
148b6(gso rig): skyes// tshil dang bed kan shas che la// rlung dang mkhris pa'i shas chung dang // me drod che zhing bstan pa rnams// shas cher ra ror mi 'gyuraro// de las bzlog pa tshang dang can// khros dang chang rtsub sbyar shas che// ma zhur bcas dang
149a1(gso rig): ma 'thungs pa// gang yin shas cher ra ror 'gyur// rlung mkhris bad kun kun las 'byung // chang nang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro// kun kyang kun las skyes mod kyi// shas che ba las ming du
149a2(gso rig): btags// de rnams kyi ni spyi mtshan nyid// rmongs dang snying ni na ba dang // 'khru zhing rtag tu skom dad che// tsha grang rims 'debs ye ga 'chus// mgo bo rtsib rus na dang 'dar// gnad 'jig lhag pa na ba dang // brla rengs rab ri
149a3(gso rig): khyer ba dang // lung pa dbugs mi bde gnyid med// rdul cher 'byung zhing bshang ba 'gags// skrangs shing sems ni 'khrul pa dang // gla zhing smon par byed pa dang // mgo 'khor rmi lam ngan pa mthong ba'o// rlung gyur khyad
149a4(gso rig): par gnyid mi 'ong // dbugs mi bde zhing klad na 'dar// rmi lam du ni 'phyan zhing 'phur// gshin po rnams dang gtan sgra mi// mkhris las lus tsha skad 'gags dang // rmongs bag tshe 'khru skom mgo 'khru ri// lus
149a5(gso rig): mdog ljang dang ser ba dang // mig dang mkhur tshes dmar bar 'gyur// bad kan gyis slon snying na dang // gnyid che grang 'dar yan lag lci// kun skyes mtshan nyid kun dang ldan// chang spangs pa las 'phral du ni// mang du 'thung
149a6(gso rig): ngam ma goms 'thung // de las 'joms dang lus skam nad// rlung las sdug bsngal ldan pa 'byung // nyams chung ba las mchog tu 'byung // 'joms pas bad kan mchil ma mang // lkog ma bskams shing gnyid rab che//
149b1(gso rig): sgra drag mi bzod blong bag 'gyur// lus bskams yan lag mgo rab na// snying dang mgul nang rmongs pag dang // lud pa skom dang slon rims 'debs// gang zhig chang rnams spangs pas ni// dbang po thul zhing brtags
149b2(gso rig): to byed// nam yang de la lus sems kyi// skyon rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rdul dang mun pa mi 'phrod zas// mchog tu bsten nas nad gsum 'byung // dngas ma khrag dang sems rgyu ba'i// rtsa sbubs bkag pa las
149b3(gso rig): byung ba// myos dang brgyal dang kun song nas// phyi ma bzhin du stobs rab tshe// 'dir myos nad sna re re kun// khrag chang dug rnams las kyang 'byung // rlung las gtam las chags pa dang // ming smra nyung slu spyod pa
149b4(gso rig): 'khrul// lus ni rtsub gnag dmar ba yi// myos pa rlung las skyes pa yin// mkhris pau las khri dmar ba dang // ser por snang zhing rtsod la dga'o// bdi kan tshig nyung 'brel sgra skya// sems las tsho zhing le lo che//
149b5(gso rig): 'dus pa mtshan nyid kun dang ldan// khrag las mig dang yan lag rengs// mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid ldan par 'gyur// chang gis yan lag skad spyod 'gyur// dug gis 'drar zhing gnyid rab che// de ni kun las
149b6(gso rig): myos tshabs che// khrag sogs pa yis rlung sogs pa'i// mtshan nyid lhag par shes par bya// brgyal ba rlung gi bdag nyid can// na mkha' dmar sngo gnag par ni// mthong zhing mun par zhugs snyam sems// myur
150a1(gso rig): du sangs par byed pa dang // snying na 'dar zhing mgo 'khor la// skam zhing bzhin mdog dmar nag 'gyur// mkhris pas dmar ba 'am ser por ni// na mkha' mthong zhing mun
150a2(gso rig): 'thibs byed// sangs nas rdul dang bcas pa dang // che skom gdungs pas nyen pa dang // 'khru zhing kha dog ser dang dmar// mig dmar ser bar snang bar 'gyur// bad kan gyis ni sprin lta bur// na mkha' mthong
150a3(gso rig): zhing mun 'thibs byed// ring nas sangs par 'gyur ba dang // snying na bcas par mchil ma mang // pags pa rlon pas g.yogs pa bzhin// yan lag lci zhing tshor ba chung // nyes pa gsum gyis mtshan kun ldan//
150a4(gso rig): brjed byed gnyis pa lta bu ste// myur du 'gyel zhing brgyal 'gyur te// 'jigs rung spyod pa med pa yin// lus can myos dang brgya lnga ba'i nad// la shugs yod par gyur kyang ni// rang nyid zhi bar 'gyur ba yin//
150a5(gso rig): kun zhugs sman med pa rA mau zhi// nad ni shin tu stobs che le// 'dus pa las gyur kun zhugs pa// srog gi nas la brten po yis// lus dang ngag gis spyod pa'i phrog/ de yIs skyes bu ro dang ni// shing dang
150a6(gso rig): rtsig por 'dra bar byed// rings par gso bar ma byas na// myur du 'chi bar byed pa yin// mtsho zab chu srin mang po can// chu 'jing 'jug ngogs med par ni// kun zhugs pa yis nu byed pa// mi ni myur du gnod
150b1(gso rig): par bya// rigs pas brten dang bral ba'i chang 'thungs pas// myos drags khro dang bral ba'i rang bzhin can// rang gi dgra bos yongs su 'khrud gyur zhing // rigs dang mi rigs mnyam par byed par 'gyur// stobs
150b2(gso rig): dang dus dang yul dang goms bya dang // rang bzhin grogs dang na tshod nang rnams pa// legs brtags de dang rjes mthun gang zhig 'thung // de ni dung rtsi 'thung dang mtshungs pa yin//
150b3(gso rig): yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u drug pa'o// // de nas gzhang 'brum gyi nang gzhi bshad par bya'o// dgra lhur srog chags rnams kyi tshe//
150b4(gso rig): gzhang 'brum 'byung bas gsod byed pas// de phyir bshad pa'i lam 'gegs pa// gzhang 'brum zhes ni bshad pa yin// nad kyis pags tshigs sha rnams ni// gnod byed dbyibs ni sna tshogs pa'i// sha
150b5(gso rig): yi myu gu gzhang sogs su// skyes te gzhang 'brum yin par bshad// lhan cig skyes dang phyis 'byung dang // skam dang khrag tu 'dzag pa yi// dbye bas mdor na rnam gnyis yin// gzhang ni rgyu ma sbom por brten//
150b6(gso rig): sor ni phyed dang lnga yod der// gnyer gsum se ra ni phyed dang gnyis// rim pa de yi nang ma ni// phyir 'phul bar ma sel ba yin// de yi phyi rol 'dzums pa yin// de yi phyi rol sor cig kha// na sa ni phye dang gnyis
151a1(gso rig): kyid chad// de phan chad ni spu skye 'gyur// de la lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu// gnyer ma'i sa bon gnod 'gyur nyid// gzhang 'brum sa bon gnod pa yang // pha mas mi bzod zos pa dang /
151a2(gso rig): sngon las de gnyis dang 'dus pa// 'khrugs pa las gyur do dag ni// gsor mi rung ba nyid du bshad// rigs 'byung nang kun de dang 'dra// lhan cig skyes pa khyad par du// rtsub cing lta ba dka' ba dang // nang du kha
151a3(gso rig): bltas dkar ba dang // bla gnyen mi bzod cen gso dka'// cig shos drug ste nAd tha dang // 'dris dang 'dus pa khrag las byung // rlung dang bad kan gnyis las skam// khrag dang mkhris pa las rlan can// nang rnams
151a4(gso rig): ljang rgya lhur bAshad pa// 'khrugs pas de yIs khong pa yi// me drod nyams shing bshad pa 'phel// gzhan yang nyal po rab drags dang // gzhon pas khong dkrugs stan dag ni// ma snyoms sra dang tsog pur 'dug
151a5(gso rig): rtsi'i gce'u sa dang ni// rdo dang gos kyis drud pa dang // shin tu grang ba'i chus bkrus dang // rtag tu 'khru bar byed pa dang // bshang dang gci dang phyen gyi shugs// bkag dang nan gyis btsir ba dang // rims dang
151a6(gso rig): skran dang tshang bar 'khru// 'or nang sbyi che ba be snabs kyis// skem byas gnod par 'gyur ba yi// spyod pa bsten las gnod par 'gyur// bud med zla grangs ma tshang 'phyil// zla ba rdzogs pas gzir las byung // de 'dra
151b1(gso rig): ba dang gzhan yang rlung // thur sder 'khrugs byas dri ma ni// gzhang gi gnyer mar de bzhag pas// da ni mi mngon gyur par gnas// gzhang 'brum 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin// de yi sngon tshul me drod nyams// brla ni
151b2(gso rig): rengs shing na pa dang // byin pa'i ny+dzan mgo 'khor zhing // yan lag na zhing mig gnyis sbyang // bshang ba 'khru ba 'am yang na sI// rlung chen nang na 'khyil pa dang // phal cher lte ba'i 'og na rgyu// nad bcas bcud pa
151b3(gso rig): lta bur sems// rkang par 'byung zhing sgra gcan 'byung // rgyu ma klul klul zer zhing spo// skem zhing sgregs pa ming du 'byung // gtson mong bshang nyung yi ga 'chus// sgregs pa dud 'drar sbyar ba 'byung // mgo dang
151b4(gso rig): brang dang rgyab tu gzer// snyom zhing kha dog nyams pA dang // blong bag dbang po nyam chung la// khro zhing bsnyen bkur dkri'e ba dang // ma zhu skem nad sgyu rbab dang // dmu rdzing rnams la so mi skye// gzhung 'brum skyes par
151b5(gso rig): gyur pa la// 'di dag nyid ni 'phel bar 'gyur// de yis 'og gi lam dkug pas// thur du sel ba'i rlung lag ste// lus dang dbang po ku na gnas pa'i// rlung gzhan thams cad 'khrugs par byed// de bzhin bshad
151b6(gso rig): gci mkhris pa dang // bad kan lus zungs brten bcas pa// 'khrug cing me drod nyams par byed// de nas gzhang 'brum nad can la// phal cher thams cad nyer 'byung ba// skem zhing mchog tu bskyod mi nus// stobs
152a1(gso rig): zang khong rmya bzhin mdangs nyams// lung lhod snying po med 'gyur zhing // 'bus zos pa yi shing 'dra la// bla gnyan ma lus dag gis 'debs// ji skad bshad pa'i nad gzer zhing //
152a2(gso rig): lud pa sgom dang skad 'gags dang // kho ro mi tshor cham 'debs s+ho// sgyid sbyar rkang lag na zhing smon// sbrid pa sbyangs dang rims nad dang // khu ba zad cing rab rib skon// rde'u chags nad kyis gzir ba dang // skad 'gags
152a3(gso rig): kum la sems khong chud// mchil ma mang 'dor yi ga 'chus// rus tshigs kun dang snying lta ba// gzhong dang sde rtsa gzer dang bcas// gzhang nad 'bru ni ma smin btsos// khu ba lta bu'i sbyin bgA 'dzag/ rtug skam gci
152a4(gso rig): pA 'am sla bar 'khru// smin dang ma smin bar bar 'khru// sgyu zhing ser dang sngon po yi// khrag ni sbyin pag 'khru bar 'gyur// gzhang 'brum rlung shas che las gyur// skem zhing tseg tseg tsha ba dang // rnyed cing dmar nag rengs pa dang //

152a6(gso rig): phrag ba rtsib log/ sa brla// chu so dag tu ldeg par na// sbrid pa sgeg pa bshang ba sri// snying 'phar yi ga 'chus par bskyed// lung dbugs mi bde me drod nyams// rna ba sgra bcas mgo 'khor byed// des nyes rtug
152b1(gso rig): skam nyung ngu ni// sgra bcas bsgra sla 'dren ma dang // na zhing dbu ba 'byar bag can// rtug sgram tshul gyis 'byung bar 'gyur// pags pa sems mo bshang gci dang // mig dang gdong ni gnag par 'gyur// skran dang mcher
152b2(gso rig): bu dmu rdzing dang // rtun 'dra de nyid las byung 'gyur// mkhris shos che las rtse mo ni/ sngo zhing dmar ser dkar bar snang // 'phra zhing dI mnam khrag sla 'dzag/ srab cing 'jam la lhod pa yin// mtshor pa'i dum bu
152b3(gso rig): ne tso lho// srin+ni pu pid+ma'i mchu 'drar snang // cha zhing gnags la rims dang rdul// skom dang yi ga 'chus rmongs bsgred // ba shang dro smra zhing sbo la tshe// ser zhing dmar bar 'khru bar 'gyur// nas rul nang 'dra pags
152b4(gso rig): pa dang // sin sog+na swa sto ser ltung bar 'gyur// bad kan shas+t+ra che rtsa ba sbom// mthug cing nad kyi shugs dral dkar// sbyang zhing rgyas la snum pa dang // 'greng zhing snum la lci zhing brten// 'byar bag tshor ba chung zhing
152b5(gso rig): 'jam/ g.ya' zhing reg na dga' bar byed// ka ri ra ba na sa yi// rus pa pA yi nu sor 'dra// chu sor zug cing sbom gzhang na// lto ba lgang pa bcad snyam sems// lud pa dbugs mi bde snying na// mchil ma cham
152b6(gso rig): 'debs yi ga 'chus// gcin sri mgo bo tshor ba med// grang ba'i rims ni skyed par byed// khu chu 'dzag cing me drod nyams// slon zhing ma zhu'i nad kun bskyed// bshang ba tshil 'dra bad kan mang // 'khru dang bcas par
153a1(gso rig): 'byung bar 'gyur// 'dzag par mi byed rdol mi byed// pags pa la sogs snum zhing dkar// 'dres las mtshan nyid 'dren ma yin// 'dus pa mtshan nyid kun dang ldan// khrag shas che
153a2(gso rig): las gzhung 'brum ni// mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid 'dra ba la// n+ya gro da yi myu gu 'dra// byA ru 'ol ma se ma dog 'dra// shin tu tsha bro na pa dang // bshang bshugs kyis rab btsau ra las// 'phral du khrag ni 'byung ba
153a3(gso rig): dang / de nyid shin tu 'dzag par 'gyur// sbal pa 'dra zhing khrag zad las// byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyan gyur// mdog stobs spro ba nyams pa dang // mdangs 'phrog dbang po zhan par 'gyur// mut+ka ko dra ba'i
153a4(gso rig): pye ma/ tsu na ka ri re sogs pa// rtsu pa dang bashrang ba sri bas rlung // rang gnas 'khrugs pa stobs ldan pas// thur du rgyu ba'i bu ga nau// bkag ste slad du rab bskams nas// bshang ba gci ba 'phyen rnams ni//
153a5(gso rig): 'gags pas nang ni mi bzad ba skyed// de yis khyong pa rgyab rno ba logs// snying gaR+Sha nad ni shin tu bskyed// lho spos gisus pa na ba dang // sgying cu rgyu ma bcad snyam sems// chu sor shin tu zug pa dang // 'khur
