158b1(gso rig): nyid kyis 'byung // de rnams kyi ni spyi'i mtshan nyid// gcin ni rnyog can mang du 'byung // gnod dang gnod bya khyad med kyang // de 'dus khyad par nyid dang ni// gcin gyis mdog sogs dbye ba yis// gcin snyi'i dbye ba
158b2(gso rig): brtag par bya// dang zhing ma nga la dkor zhing bsil// dri nga med cing chu 'dra la// gcin snyi chu yi za khu yin// cung zang snyog can spyi bag can// bu ram shing khu lta bur ma ngar// za khu buM ram shing khu yin// zhag lon
158b3(gso rig): na ni bska bar 'gyur// za khu gAr po zhes bya'o// steng nas dngas ma 'og nas bska// chang 'dra chang gi za khu yin// ba pu ljang zhing 'bras rtags 'dra// dkar zhing mang 'byung 'bras phyi 'dra// khu chu 'dra ba 'am khu bA
158b4(gso rig): 'dres// khu ba 'dra ba'i za khu yin// gcin ni bye ba rtsigs dri me can// bye ma'i za khu zhes bya'o// gcin snyi mang du 'byung zhing bsil// mngar pa de bsil za khu yin// ngal gyis nyung zong nyung zang 'byung // pags kyis
158b5(gso rig): 'byung ba'i za khu yin// kha chu 'dra ba'i nal nal po// 'byil bag kha chu'i za khu yin// dri rau kha dog reg bya ni// nas tshig 'khrus 'dra nas tshig can// za khu sngon po kha dog sngo// za khu nag po gnag tsha 'dra// gcin
158b6(gso rig): sti tsha zhing mdog ser ba// de ni skyer pa 'dra ba yin// mnam zhing btsod kyi khu ba 'dra// bcod kyi za khu ces bya'o// dri nga tsha zhing lan tshwar bcas// khrag 'dra khrag gi za khu yin// zhag gi za khu zhag dang 'dres// zhag nyid
159a1(gso rig): gcin du 'byung ba yin// rkang 'dres pa'am rkang nyid ni// yang dang yang 'byung rkang za khu// glang chen myos ltar rgyun tu ni// gcin shugs dal bar 'byung 'gyur la// chu
159a2(gso rig): se ra bcas shing rnyog bcas 'byung // glang chen za khu zhes bya'o// sbrang rtsi'i za khu sbrang rtsi 'dra// de ni rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur// lus zungs zad po sa rlung 'khrugs pa 'am// nad kyis rtse sbubs bkag ste
159a3(gso rig): 'byung // nad kyis bkag pa'i mtshan ma dag/ de ni rgyu med par 'byung zhing // skad cig zad stongs gang 'gyur ba// gso bar dka' ba nyid du 'gyur// thams cad kyi dus sum ma bcos na// sbrang rtsi 'dra ba'i
159a4(gso rig): za khur 'gyur// gang zhig thams cad mngar gyur pas// phal cher sbrang rtsi'i za khu yin// sbrang rtsi'i za khu zhes bya kun// mngar ba las ni bshad pa yin// zas mi 'ju zhing yi ga 'chus// skyon lung gnyid che
159a5(gso rig): cham pas 'debs// bad kan las byung za khu la// bla gnyen de dag 'byung bar 'gyur// pho mtshan lgang par zug pa dang // rlig 'bras bye zhing rims kyis bdebs// tshe sgyur sgom dang brgyal dang 'khru// mkhris
159a6(gso rig): pa las gyur bla gnyen yin// rlung las skyes pa'i rlung 'phar zhing // lus 'dar snying na zas la brkam// gzer zhing gnyid med skem pa dang // lung pa dbugs mi bde ba 'byung // kham por rus sbal
159b1(gso rig): 'dra ba can// dgu'o me dpal phra mo dang // sran chung 'dra dang yungs kar 'dra// bu bcas 'byung dang bi da li// khong 'bras zhes bya'i 'bras 'brum bcu// gcin nad ma bcos pa las 'byung // tshigs dang gnang
159b2(gso rig): dang shu che ba'i// srog gi gnas su 'byung bar 'gyur// mtha' ma mtho zhing dbus dam+b+ha 'a ba// gnag cing rnag dang nang bcas la// dbyibs dang tshad ni kham por 'dra// thor bu kham po ra zhes bya'o// nang du
159b3(gso rig): cing na byed la// nye 'khor dag tu che re mched le// 'jam zhing rus sbrul rgyab 'dra ba'i// 'bras nad rus sbal can zhes bya// sra zhing rtsa yi dra ba can// snum zhing 'dzag la khyon che ba// na zhing mang zlog pu ga ni//
159b4(gso rig): phra mor ldan pa dra ba tsan+da// nang du zug cing na la mnags// rgyab bam lto ba dag tu ni// thor bu chen po kha dAg gnag/ dgu bor 'dug pas dgu bor ba ri sh+lang// skyes ma thag tu pags pa tsha// shin tu na byed
159b5(gso rig): mI dpal te// dmar zhing gnag la gas pa dang // tsha zhing rmugs byed me dpal 'dra// sran chung 'dra ba'i tshad dang dbyibs// mnyam pas sran+ma chung can yin no// tshad dang dbyibs ni yungs kar 'dra// myur du
159b6(gso rig): smin zhing nad tshabs che// yungs kar 'dra ba'i 'brum phran gyis// yongasu bskor bas shur bu can// bu bcas che zhing mang ba la// rab phra'i 'brum bus khyab 'gyur pa'o// ldum bu bi da ri ltar ldum// sra
160a1(gso rig): ba bi da ri zhes bya// khong 'bras gzhan du bshad pa yin// de la dang po'i 'bras nang gsum// bu bcas dang ni bi da rI// tshol chen las byung ma nags dka' yin// gzhan dag
160a2(gso rig): mkhris pa shAs che zhing // tshil chu lus byung mon gas+t+ya nus 'gyur// de rnams nang shas ji ltar che'i// grwa cin skye ba yI d+ya bang las 'byung // 'di drug zla khu med par ni// gnod 'gyur tshil las 'byung 'gyur
160a3(gso rig): ji srid dngos por mi snang ba// dI snying shes par mi 'gyur ro// khwa dog ltung ba 'am dam ra ba'i gcin// nr-i khu'i sngon tshul med pa yi// gcin 'byung gang de zla khu min// de ni khyug mkhris yin zhes bya//
160a4(gso rig): lus rdul yan lag man myi zhing lhong pa dang // stan dang mal dang gnyid kyi bdi la chags// snying mig rna ba kha lce byugs snyam byed// lus sgom sgra dang sen mo ring ba dang // bsil bag la dga' gri bo nyan
160a5(gso rig): byaskams shing // lha nang ro sad+hAr rkang mthil la ga~M mthil nA// gang du bcas par grog mang 'du 'gyur ba// gau nr-i zad khro'i tshogs ni phyis 'byung tshul// khu spyad rtsi mdag 'bru 'khyil ba dang //
160a6(gso rig): rtse re 'dra ba lang gnyis su rtog/ lus brtas pad kan can gyi bai khu 'am// nyes pa zad pas rlung gi bdag can yin// sngon tshul bcas po'i pad mo khris zag khu dang // gang yang rims kyis rlung nang
160b1(gso rig): khur 'gyur// mkhris pa las gyur gang yin gso ba dka'// gal te tshi la nang shas chung 'gyur gso sla// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las+ya// nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu pa'o//
160b2(gso rig): de nas khong 'bras dang rgyu rlug sa dang spyan gyi nang gzhi bshad par bya'o// kha zas khong bu rab tshwa dang // rtsub dang skam dang tshe 'gyur zos// nya la ba'i spyod pa mi bde ba// khrag nang skye 'gyur de dang des//
160b3(gso rig): pags pa sha tshil rus pa dang // khrag dang chub chub che// phyi dang rlung du sbyangs 'gyur ba// rtsa ba che zhing nang tshabs che// zlum pa 'am 'jod par gnas pa glang // khong 'bras de ni rnam pa drug/ nang dmigs
160b4(gso rig): sna re 'dus pa dang // khrag dang rmus pa las byung bya'o// 'dor phyi'i yan lcag dwe deng dwer// rab na mdud pa 'dra la mtho// nang gi shin tu mi zad cing // rting rib sgra ltar sra ba yin// brag mkhar lta bu mtho bya
160b5(gso rig): ding // mU dang mtshon wArar+ya myur ga slod byed// lte ba chu so mchir mchin+d+ra pa// glo dang snying lto brla rtsa dang // mkhal ma gnyis sam gzhang du'ang 'byung // de las rlung gyur nung chabs drug/ dmar nag rnying zhig lon
160b6(gso rig): nas ni// 'byung zhing smin pa dbyibaso mi snyoms// ran zhing mgo 'khor spo ba dang // g.yo zhing 'pho la sgra dang bcas// mkhris 'gyur zangs ltar dmar rtsa gnig/ skom dang tsha rim rmongs bge bskyed// ldang zhing
161a1(gso rig): sbyin pa myur ba yin// bad kan las sku g.ya' dang bcas// smon zhing bsil la sra ba dang // glal zhing lci la yi ga 'chus// 'byung zhing smin pa yun ring thogs// 'dus pa
161a2(gso rig): las gyur 'dren ma yin// 'dir ni phyi nang gnyis mtshan nyid// don gyi dbang las shes par bya// 'brum bu nag pos khebs shing gnag/ rab tshan zhing rims kyis 'de bas// mkhris pa'i rtags ldan phyi
161a3(gso rig): ma nang / khrag 'gyur bud med nyid la 'byung // mtshon la sogs pas rmas pa yis// rma'i byung mi 'phrod bsten pa las// rma kha che ba rlung gis phul// khrag bcas mkhris pa 'byung bar byed// khong 'bras
161a4(gso rig): bla gnyen nang mang zhing // khrag mkhris mchi na nyid can dag byed// bla gnyan de yi dbye ba yang // ge nas kyi dbye ba las bshad do// lto bar byung na skyigs bu ste// chu sor gcin 'gags rnag tu 'gyur// mtshar pa
161a5(gso rig): dbugs mi bde mtshan par// dbugs 'byung 'gag skom mgo 'khor 'gyur// glo ba byung na lkog nad 'gyur// snying 'byung yan lag kun gzir snyam// rab rmongs mun sos snyam du byed// snying 'phar na bar
161a6(gso rig): pa yin// lto ba rtsib logs phrag pa'i bar// na zhing lto spos 'byung bar 'gyur// chu so 'o doms par byung baiR+Ya na// mkhal mar byung na rkeng pa rgyab// rtsing log su ni na bar 'gyur// gzhang du rlung ni thur 'byung 'ag
161b1(gso rig): zhu dang ma zhu phyed zhu nyid// de dag 'or nang lta bur bshad// lte ba yan chad snying gar 'dzag/ lte ba man chad gzhang du 'dzag/ lte bar gnas pa gnyis gar 'dzag/ khong 'bras kyi ni nang dmigs rnams// 'dzag
161b2(gso rig): las rma ltar shes par bya// de las 'dus pA las gyur dang // snying dang lte ba chu sor nang // phye 'am nang du bye ba 'am// smin te kha nas 'dzag pa ni// nyam chung bla gnyen ldan pa spang // de bzhin bud med bu btsas
161b3(gso rig): pa 'am// snum mya 'am nu yod pa dang // nu zho med pa'i nu ma yi// rtsa sgo kha cher phyin gyur nAs// phyi yi khong 'bras mtshan nyid can+da// skrangs shing sra ba 'byung bar 'gyur// bu mo rnams kyi nu rtsa'i sgo// pra bas 'byung
161b4(gso rig): bAr mi 'gyur ro// rlung ni rgyu lam 'grags pas 'khrugs// sbyangs dang gzer ni bskyed cing rgyu// chu so rlig par phyin pa dang // rlig paR+Sha rgyu ba'i rtse dag ni// btsi re nas rlig pa pags pa dag/ 'phel zhing
161b5(gso rig): rlig rlugs nyid du byed// nad khrag gcin tshi la rgyu ma las// rlig rlugs de ni rnam bdun 'gyur// rgyu ma gcin skyes pa'ang rlung // rgyu ma'i dbye ba 'ba' zhig gzhan// rlung 'gyur rgyalnga pa gang 'dra zhing // reg na
161b6(gso rig): rtsub cing rgyu med na// mkhris 'gyur u dum+ba ro yi// 'bras bu smin 'dra tsha dro 'drul// bad kan las bsil lci zhing snum// gi ya 'a zhing sra la nang tshabs chung // khrag gyur ge nag cing 'brum bus khyab/
162a1(gso rig): mkhris pa'i rlig rlugs mtshan nyid ldan// tshil 'gyur rlig rlugs pang kAn+da 'dra// 'jam zhing tA la'i 'brus byur mtshungs// gcin mnags pa la brten pa'i rnams// gcan
162a2(gso rig): las 'byung bar de 'gyur te// rgyal ba chung yis gang ba ltar// g.yo 'gyur na dang baHsa shing 'jam// gcin 'gags pa dang rlig pa yi// 'og tu sbyangs par byed par 'gyur// rlung 'khrugs phywa yis zas
162a3(gso rig): dang ni// rgyu grang la sa n+ti rtul pa dang / shugs bkag byatsir dang khu dang la ma// yan+d+ra lag log par brkus pa dang // rlung 'khrugs pa ni gzhan gyis kyang // glang tsho rgyu ma phra mo'i che// rlung gos log par phul
162a4(gso rig): gis lags nas b+hai du ba spyod// rgya tshogs su phyin pa dang // de che mdzud pa sgyur gas 'gyur/ na gyi pu ra skye slong // sgro zhing na la sa pa rlung gyis byed// rab tu ga
162a5(gso rig): zhing nang ni sgra dang ban+d+has// gang bar byed cing bcug kyang skur 'byung ste// stu rlugs 'di ni gso dkur ste// rlung gi rlig rlugs 'dra ba yin// rtsub cing gtsug la dmar pa rgyus// b+h+rUM ma rba bos khebs pa yin/
162a6(gso rig): sman brgyad ni rdo rjes sor da // 'dres dang 'dus pa las gyur dang // zla ma tshon gyi ni nyes pa yis// brgyad pi bud med rnams la 'byung // rims dang smon dang tshad la bru sogs// skyug sman sogs dngal
162b1(gso rig): rnams kyis// skem gyur rlung skyes zas za dang // bkres te chu grang 'thungs gyur pa 'am// skom 'thungs rjes la gang zhig ni// rgyal dang mchod pa la sogs pa// brten pas lus ni dkrugs byas dang // slon mi bro
162b2(gso rig): yang skyugs pa dbye// ru hU~M l-i sogs pa 'byung ba yi// shugs bkag pa 'am btsir ba dang // snum dang dugs ni ma bsten par// sbyang ba'i las ni byed pa 'am// sbyangs bzhin myur du tsha byo dang // bad+ma kan bskyed
162b3(gso rig): pa'i zas skom spyod// rlung rgyus pa yi nang rnams ni// so so 'am 'dres pa'am 'khrugs gyur pa'am// kun nas khrag dang bcas gyur pas// sbubs ca nA la ni brten gyur nas// / steng 'og lam ni bkag
162b4(gso rig): nas su gzer sngon 'tsho zhi nga reg tu rung // shin tu mtho zhing mdud pa'i gzugs// spyan ni bskyed par 'gyur ba yin// snyim pas bad kan mkhris shang ba'i// rgyun srang 'gags par 'gyur ba
162b5(gso rig): yis// rlung ni khang par gnas bcas la// rtsub pas sra bar gyur pa yin// rang gnas lding 'gyur ro rang dbang can// gzhan gnas la brten gzhan dbang can// gong por gyur pa sa gzugs med kyang // gzugs
162b6(gso rig): can ltar gnas sman zhes bya// chu so lte ba snying ga dang // rtsib logs la ni gnas pa yin// rlung las mchi pa klang par gzer// rims 'debs mcher na rgyu ma 'khrug/ bshang sri khab kyis btsags
163a1(gso rig): snyamA na// dbugs 'byin yang dang yang mi phyin// lus rengs kha ni bskams pa dang // skem zhing me drod mi snyoms la// pags sogs gnag cing rtsub pa dang // rlung sbran g.yo ba'i yin
163a2(gso rig): pa'i phyin// dbyibs ni rtag par mi mngon zhing // go nas 'phel 'bri dong na ba dang // grog mas khyab pa lta bur ni// skran ni 'gul zhing zug pa yin// mkhris las tsha zhing sgregs sbyar brgya lnga// 'khru zhing
163a3(gso rig): lus rdul sgoms rims 'debs// pags pa la sogs ser por snang // spyan ni reg par mi bzod dang // che zhing 'phar la dro ba drung // rang gi gan sA nI sreg snyam byed// bad kan slong bag yi ga 'tshus//
163a4(gso rig): me drod nyams shing grang rims 'debs// cham pa khong skyom dang ga lci// lud pa lu zhing pags sogs dkar// spyan phugs ring zhing sru ba dang // lci zhing rang gnas brtan nang chung // phal cher rang gnas 'dug
163a5(gso rig): byA dang // rAng gi dus su nang skyed byed// gnyis las byung ba'i spyan gsum po// mtshan nyid 'dren mar ldan pa yin// kun skyes mi bzad na zhing tshwa// myur min sra mtho de gso dka'// khrag gi skran+da ni gang yin pa// de
163a6(gso rig): na bung med nyid las byung // rtse mochen dus sam bugs zices// yang na mngal gyi nang can gyi// bud med rlung bskyed brten gyur pas// rlung ni 'i khrugs par gyur pa las// zla ro 'byung bar byed pa yi// rna mtshan
163b1(gso rig): mdul du bkug pa ni// de ni mngal chags 'drar snang zhing // mtshan ma gsal bar ston byed de// sgying 'phar nu 'dzug yid mi bde// skems pa la sogs tshul du spyang // de ni rims kyis rlung 'dres 'ang // mkhris pa
163b2(gso rig): nad ni rgyu yis na// rlung dang mkhris pa las byung ba'i// skran+da ni khrag de skyed byed yin// na zhing sra la tsha zhing 'khri// skom dang rims sogs brla gnyan 'byung // nAd kyi khrag lA brten pas na// mngal gnas ngag tu
163b3(gso rig): lhag par gzer// mIng la na su drI d+ha 'dzag pa dang // nA zhing 'phyar lnga zug par byed// mngal chags 'dra yang yan lag med// 'on kyang spyan ni 'gul gzer ldan// de nyid dar nI gong por gnas// lan 'ga'
163b4(gso rig): 'gyur bar byed pa yin// 'di ni ltor 'phel mi byed kyi// sman ni 'phel bar byed pa yin// rang gi nang gzhi la brten pas// des der skran nad thams cad bskyed// yun ring nas ni smin 'gyur ba 'am// yang na
163b5(gso rig): mAmu smyon khyod 'bras kyang // nad khra ga~M la nI brten pa'i phyir// shin tu myur bar sbyin par byed// de phyir myur du rgyu 'gyur bas// khong 'bras zhes ni de la bshad// nang gnas sbyin ni chu so dang // lto bI mchin pa skyed nA shing //
163b6(gso rig): me dring mdog nyams nyams stobs 'bri/ shugs ni 'gags par 'gyur ba yin// phyi rol de la sa bzlog pa ste// khong pa'i yan lag na tshabs chung // phyogs de mdog ni nyams pa dang // phyi rol tu ni mtho zhi
164a1(gso rig): 'phags// lto sgo lhag par mi bzang na// rgyu mu sgra bcas mi bzang na// lto spos lto ba na pa dang // rlung gi nad kyis steng 'og bkag/ nga ni nyen gyi zhes byar bshad// sra zhing gtun 'dra mdud
164a2(gso rig): pa can// gtun 'dra gyen du mtho bar gnas// ha~Mn gyi mtshan ldan gtun bu ni// 'phreng gnas de dang tshul 'dra yin// zhu ba'i gnas nas gzhang po mtshan// rlung ni mi bzang na zhing rgyo// thur du zug pa yin par bshad
164a3(gso rig): de las bzlog pa byin zug pa'o// sgregs pa mang zhing ba shang ba 'grogs pa dang // 'drangs za mo nus rgya ma sgra dang bcas// sgo zhing nyen langs khwa zas 'dzu mi nus// s+thAn niny+tsi ra 'byung mtshan ma yin par bshad//
164a4(gso rig): yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa ltas/ nang gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas dmu rdzing gi nang gzhi shing bar bya'o// nad kun me drod nyams las ste// lhag
164a5(gso rig): par dmu rdzing nod skye zhing // ma zhu dri ma can gyi zas// dri ma sogs la skye bar 'gyur// nad kyis chu ni rgyu ba'i rtswa// steng dang 'og tu bkag nas ni// srog dang thur ser la gnod de// blags pa'i sha yi bar gnas nas//
164a6(gso rig): lto ba bkang ste dmu rdzing bskyed// de yang rnams pa brgyad 'gyur te// nad gzhi tha dad 'dus mtshon pa// dri ma 'gags dang rgyu rtol ba// des gzir rten dang mchu bskams shing // rkang pa lag pa gsum pa spang //
164b1(gso rig): spyod pa kha zas nyams stobs 'bri// skems zhing gsus pa cher skyes la// mI ni yi dgas gzugs can 'gyur// de ni 'byung 'gyur mtshan ma dag/ bkres pa med cing zas kun ni// ring nas tsha zhing sgyur
164b2(gso rig): bcas 'ju// 'ju dang mi 'ju mi shes la// 'drangs par za yang mi nus shing // stobs ni rtag tu zad par 'gyur// cung zeng bskyed kyang dbugs mi bde// bshang ba 'phel zhing 'gag par byed// rkang
164b3(gso rig): pa gnyis su cung zad sbyang // chu sor na zhing zas yang ba// cung zad zos kyang gsus pa rgyas// rtsa rgyas lto ba'i gnyer ma 'jig/ dmu rdzing nad ni thams cad la// snyom zhing nyams chung 'gyur ba dang // dri ma sra
164b4(gso rig): zhing me drong chung // tsha zhing skyengs la gsus pa spro// mjug tu chu ni 'byung bar 'gyur// thams cad chu med par du smug/ skrangs me da khur ltar lci ba yin// rtsa 'dra'i skar khung ris kyis khebs// rtag tu sgra ni
164b5(gso rig): 'ur 'ur zer// rlung gis lte ba rgyu mar zug/ shugs skyes na no 'jig par 'gyur// snying ga lte ba rked pa dang // gzhing dang chu sor na bar byed// rlung nI sgra dang bcas par rgyu// bshang ba 'gag cing gci ba nyung //
164b6(gso rig): me drod chu min skam pa min// khar ni ro bro med pa yin// de la rlung gi dmu rdzing ni// rkang lag rlig pa lto ba sgang // lto ba rtsib logs rked rgyab ni// tshogs rnams dbye ba snyam du sems// lud pa bskams shing
165a1(gso rig): yan lag snyoms// ro smad lci zhing bshang gci 'gag/ pags pa la sogs gnag la smug/ glo bur tu ni 'phel zhing 'bri// gsus pa zug cing na ba dang // rtsa bran nag pos khyab
165a2(gso rig): cing rgyas// brdabs na rkyal pa dbugs kyis ni// gang ba lta bu'i sgra dang ni// 'dir rlung nad dang sgrar bcas par// thams cad du ni rgyu bar byed ma mkhris pa'i dmu rdzing rims 'debs brgyal// lus tshwa skom dang kha
165a3(gso rig): ro kho/ mgo 'khor tshad 'khru pags pa sogs// ser zhing gsus pa'i mdog rtse sngo// rtsa n+ya dmar ser dag gis khyab// rdul dang chi bar bcas pas bsreg/ dang 'byung reg na 'jam po dang // myur du sbyin zhing nywar
165a4(gso rig): gdung 'gyur// pad kan da mu rdzing lha tshogs na// tshor ba med cing sbyangs la lci// gnyid che smon zhing yi ga 'chus// lhod pa dbugs mI bde pags stsogs// skya zhing lto ba mkhrang la snum// rtsa yi ri mos khyab cing che//
165a5(gso rig): ring nas 'phel zhing sra pa dang // reg na grang zhing gsus pa lha// nang gsum 'khrugs pa de dang de// bud med kyis byin dri ma rdul// dpying drug drug sogs kyis gnod 'gyur// khrag btsas dri ma bstsags pa ni//
165a6(gso rig): lhor song gnod pa skyed byed te// kha skam mgo 'khor brgyal bcas pa'i// rtags gsum ldan pa'i dmu rdzing bskyod// myur du smin zhing mi bzad na// de ni grang dang rlung dang char// phrad pas shin tu gnod par 'gyur//
165b1(gso rig): mang du zos pas bskyod pa dang // bzhon pa dag tu 'gro ba dang // las lam nyal po drags pas dubya// skyugs sman drags dang nad kyis skem// g.yon logs dag tu gnas pa'i mcher pa ni// gnas las 'phos te
165b2(gso rig): 'phel ba dang // yang ni dngas ma sogs pas khrug/ rgyus byas de ni 'phel bar 'gyur// di ni gtun bu bzhin ra ba sra// de nas rus sbrul rgyu ba 'dra bar// rims kyis 'phel bar gyur nas ni// lto bar dmu
165b3(gso rig): rdzing chags par byed// khung pa dbugs mi bde skom dang // kha yis rlo ni mi tshe re zhing // sba zhing ngan lA rims kyis 'debs// sha mdog skyo zhing mi snyug la// brgyal zhing smon pa re byed pa dung // tsha zhing
165b4(gso rig): myos dang ldan par 'gyur// rtswa mdog dmar ba 'am mi sdug pa 'am// sto zhing ser la ri mor bcas// de la rims kyis nad rnams ni// bshang 'gegs pa dang lto spros dang // rmongs bag skom tsha rims kyis
165b5(gso rig): 'debs// lus lci sra zhing yi ga 'chus// mcher pa lha bur mchin g.yas logs// gnas 'phos dmu rdzing bskyed ces bya// bya sgro spu dang bcas pa'i zas// zos pas bshang lam gnas 'gags te/
165b6(gso rig): gzhing 'brum dang ni rtug skam dang // rgyu mar chags pa'i zas kyis kyang // thur du sel ba'i rlung 'khrugs te// bshong ba bang mkhris bkag nas ni// lto bar dmu rdzing chags par byed// des ni cha skom rims spring
166a1(gso rig): 'byung / lu ba dbugs mi bde bla na// blang snying lte ba gzhung kha na// dri mya 'gags smon yi ge 'chus// lto bar rlung ni 'khyams par byed// brtan zhing rtsa ni sngo la srug/ rtsa ris snang
166a2(gso rig): dpapa mi snang 'gyur// phal cher lci ba'i 'og tu ni// pa lang mjug 'dra 'byung bar 'gyur// rus sogs zug rngur cas pa'i zas// zlos sa mi shin tu drag zos pa// rgya ma rdo ya lam ges 'gyur nas/
166a3(gso rig): pu ma de nas ma zhu bu ra// phyir 'dzag bshang lam las byung zhing // bshang bcas nyung shes nyung shas ni// rdul lta bur narnam pa ni/ sbyin pag dmyar sir 'byung bar 'gyur// lhag ma yis ni lto ba 'gengs
166a4(gso rig): dmuM rdzing mi bzad skye bar 'gyur// de ni lte ba man chad rgyas// chus gang lta bur myur du 'gyur// nad kyi tshul ni shas cher ldan// dbugs maM bdo skom mgo 'khor khyabo// rgyu rdol dmu rdzing zhes bshad de// gzhan dag rgyu ma
166a5(gso rig): 'jig ces zer// snom 'thungs la sogs byas nas ni// 'brel du chu grang 'thungs pa 'am// me drong bri ba 'am ha cang ni// skem pas chu 'thungs drags pa laso// rlung dang bad+ma kan 'khrugs chur 'dres// chu yi lame ni
166a6(gso rig): bkag gyur pas// de nyid gnas der 'phel bar 'gyur// de 'og demu rdzing gyur pa yin// de nas rdzing di las ni// skom dang rkub tu chu 'dzag bcas// dbugs mi bde lung yi ga 'chus// sna tshogs mdog ldan
166b1(gso rig): rtswa yis khyab// rgyal pa chus gang rnyeg pa 'dra// bskyod na sku dag lus 'drar la// dA mu rdzi chen po che zhing snum// bstan zhing de ni lte d+hA zlum+b+ha// thams cad yul bar bor nas ni// nAd ni rang gnas las 'phos te//
166b2(gso rig): sbyin+da bAs spro zhing thogs 'gyur ba// tshigs dang rtswalas kyang 'jug/ phyi yi rtswa sgo nAs rdul 'byung // 'ug gis na tha kAr khyi'o zhing gnas// chu de nyid ni 'phel 'gyur zhing // spyi bag gyur na de tshe ni//
166b3(gso rig): baM lci zhing sri la zlum// brtabs na sgra ni mi 'byung zhing // mdog 'jam rtsa ris mi snang la/ lto ba dang ni rgyab tu 'gro// de rjes chu yi dmu rdzing skye// lto ba 'phel zhing de las lhag/ rtsa nub gyur pa'i dmu chu nI// dmu rdzi
166b4(gso rig): bshad pa'i mtshan nyid ldan// rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan mcher// 'dus pa'i chu yi dmu rdzing rnams// phyi ma bzhin du gso ba dka'// gzhon dag phal cher zla phyed gsod// thams cad chur gyur 'chi ltas le'u//
166b5(gso rig): las bshang brla gnyen ldan pa'ang gsod// skyes nas dmu rdzing gyur pa dag/ phal cher gso bar dka' bar bshad// stobs ldan chur ni ma gyur zhing // gsar du 'byung ba 'bad pas gso// yan lag brgyad
166b6(gso rig): pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// nang gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas skye tsa baM dang 'or nad dang me dbal gyi nang gzhi bshed par bya'o// ji skad bshad pa'i nad 'khrugs pa//
167a1(gso rig): mkhris pa lhag par ldang 'gyur la// de la rlung ni stobs che bas// snying la gnas pa'i mkhris pa nI// gtor che rtswa chen bcu'i nang bkram// lus kun la ni khyab gyur pas// bad kan
167a2(gso rig): pags pa sha khrag la// gnod byas bar du gnas nas ni// shwa dang pags pa de dag las// pags mdog tha dad dkar ba dang // ser zhing ljang sngon byed par 'gyur// de las skye ba'i shes che bas// de phyir skya rbab nang
167a3(gso rig): ces bshang // nad de lus ni lci ba~M dang // lus zungs rnams ni lhod pa dang // mdangs kyi yon tan zad byed cing // de las khrag dang tshil chung ste// snying po med cing dbang po lhong // yan lag brdungs pA snyam byed
167a4(gso rig): cings snying ni zags pa snyam du sems ka mig phugs skrang zhing nyams la ni// mchil mang skad gsong dma' ba dang // zas mi 'dod cing grang mi bzod// spu 'byi me drod nyams pa dang // ro smad bying zhing rims
167a5(gso rig): kyis 'debs// dbugs mi bde zhing rna sgra 'bod// mgo 'khor lo bar byed pa yin// de ni nang gzhi tha dad 'dus// sa zhag zos las rnams lngar 'gyur// 'di yi sngon tshul snying 'phar zhing // pags pa rtsub par gyur
167a6(gso rig): ba dang // yi ga 'chus shing gcir mdog ser// rdul med khong pa'i mi drod chung // lus myangs par byed pa yin// de la rlung gyur lus na bug/ rtsa seMn mig dang be shing btso rnams// mdog gnag rtsu bi la 'dir ba
167b1(gso rig): dang // skrang sgo kha yis ro mi tshor// rtug skum rtsib logs klud pa na// mkhris pa las rtsa sen mo sogs// ljang sngon rims 'debs mun 'thibs byed// sgom dang rdul brgyal bsil ba 'dod// lus mnam kha nang
167b2(gso rig): kha ba dang // 'khru zhing sgregs pa sbyar lA tsha// bang kan rtsa sogs dkar pa dang // klong zhing kha nung lan tsha bro// ba spu ljang zhing skad 'gags la// lung pa lu zhing smon par byed// 'dus 'gyur mtshan ma 'dres mnags
167b3(gso rig): 'as zhag dka' bas rlung bskyed la// tsha bro mkhris pa dngar bad kan// dngos ma la sogs gnod 'gyur zhing // rtsub pas zas zos rtsub gyur nas// zhu bas rtsa spobs 'gags byas te// sde ma bzhin du skye
167b4(gso rig): rbab bskyed// de nas lte ba rkang pa dang // khe dang pho mtshan skrangs par byed// bshad pa lha dang bcas pa 'khru// bad kan khrag dang bcas par 'byung // gang zhig sgyu rbab nid kyis btab// de yis mkhris bskyed zos
167b5(gso rig): zos pas// khong pa yan lag gnas mkhris gnas// bshang khrag po sregs te mig saur bskyed// des ni mig dang pags pa gdong // bshang gci sen mo kha dog sde ra// lus tsha skom dang zas mi 'ju// sbrul
167b6(gso rig): 'dra dbang po nyam chung 'gyur// de ni mkhris pa'i shas chen// skya rbab nad med par de 'byung // yal bar bor na cher skrangs te// gso dka' mig ser 'or thabs yin// ha lings ni ljang nag ser// rlung mkhris mgo
168a1(gso rig): 'khor sgom dang cha// bud med la dga' rims chung 'debs// khong rgyu mo drod nyams stobs 'bri// hA li sa ka khrag ngan gyur// chu sar can zhes bya ba yin// de rnams kyi ni bla gnyan sngar// 'or nang ga
168a2(gso rig): bo yin par bshad// de phyir de nyid bshad par bya'o// rlung 'khrugs gyur pas bad+ma kAn dang // khrag dang mkhris pa phyi rol rtsar// 'phros byas de yang rgyun srang 'gogs// pags pa sha la gnas 'gyur te// 'or nang
168a3(gso rig): mthong zhing mkhrang bar byed// de bas thams cad 'dus gyur bshad// rgyu rnams kyi ni bye brag las// gzugs dpyo dgu yi bdag nyid can// nang gzhi tho dang gAny+dzi swa dang kun// snang dang dug gis phog lngas 'byung //
168a4(gso rig): yang nA rang dang glo bur gnyis// yan lag kun skrangs phyogs gcig gnyis// khyab dang mtho dang mdud pa yi// dbyibs kyi dbye bas gsum du 'dod // 'or nad kyi ni spyi yi rgyu// nang lis skyes pa khyad par nyid// na las
168a5(gso rig): smang sogs kyis nyams chung // myur du lhag par zas las 'byung // de nas gzhan yong lci ba dang // skyur dang snum bsil lan tshwa dang // thal sman rnon po che ba dang // mya ngan tshuganyid drags dang yar// so zos sha lI sha skam
168a6(gso rig): dang \u0f7fma zhu ngal dang bud med dragis// rkang mthil lam du 'gro ba 'am// bzhon pas drag tu bskyod 'gyur yin// lud pa dbugs mi bde ched 'khru// gzhang 'brum lto ba'i nang dang ni// mngal nas khrag zags rims kyis
168b1(gso rig): btag/ gsung dang chu ser slon nyes dang // snum ma dang ni me dpal gyi// nang dang skya rbab dag gis btab// gzhang yang log par gsos gyur pa'i// nad de brang du gnas na ni// stod skrangs chu sor gnas slad skrangs//
168b2(gso rig): dbug na gnas pa rab tu skyeng // yan lag kun khyab thams cad sbyang // nying lag la brten de skrangs byed// de yi sngon tshul rtswa rnams tshe// yan lag snyems par byed pa yin// rlung las sbyangs pa 'pho zhing rtsub//
168b3(gso rig): rtsa sbubs spug cing gnag pa dang // pags 'khumos 'dar ba rtse rog na// na zhing zug la bems bem sau po// myur bar ldang zhing myur du zhi// sbyangs pa mnan na dma'o bar 'gyur// snum dang dri bas nyes na zhi// mtshan
168b4(gso rig): ma chung zhing nyin mo che// pags pa yungs kar lde gu yis// bskus ltar tsha ba tsag tsag byed// mkhris pa rtsa ser dmare la gnag/ s+phu nI dmar ser gyur pa dang // myur du ldeng dang zhi mi 'gyur// dang por dbus su
168b5(gso rig): byung dang srab// skom bcas tsha zhing rims 'debs rdul// mnam zhing 'drul la skom mgo 'khor// bsil pag 'dod cing thur du 'khru// dri mnam re ga ne mi bzod 'dzam// bang kan gAya' spu pags pa dkar//
168b6(gso rig): mkhrang zhing bsil la lci ba dang // snum zhing 'jam la brtan zhing 'thas// gnyid che slon zhing me drod nyams// mnan na mi 'byin ldang dka' zhing // zhi dga' mtshan mo skrangs tshabs che// 'od ma btsigs pu sogs
169a1(gso rig): ral yang // blag mi 'byung bar sbyin bag 'dzag/ dro dang reg pa la mngon dga'// gnyis 'byung gsum po rang ngu bzhin// rgyu dang mtshan ma 'dren ma yin// 'dus pa kun gyi bdag nyid can/
169a2(gso rig): mtshon la sogs pas snang gyur zhing // ba cang dam bskal lam rmas la sogs// khu ba me dang rgya mtsho'i rlung // bas rtsi ka bi'i kha chu yi// khu ba gra ma sogs reg pas// sbyangs pa mchod par 'gyur pa
169a3(gso rig): yin/ shin tu tsha zhing dmar bar snang // phal cher mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid can// dug skyes srog tshogs dug can ni// lus la song dang gcin gyis phog/ srog chags dug med pa yi yang // so dang mche ba
169a4(gso rig): sen mos zug/ gcin rtug khu bas skyes pa dang // dri ma can gyis gos kyis reg/ dug shing rlung la reg pa dang // dbyig dug phye mas reg las byung // mnyan zhing g.yo la 'phyang ba dang // myur gsong tsha
169a5(gso rig): zhazhing na bar byed// 'or nang gi sar 'byung bIR+Ya gnyan meng // gso sla so dka' sngar bshad zin// me dI bal nad dang snad pa'i bar// gnod pa 'or nad mtshungs pa yin// de ni phyi nang gnyi ga ste// gsum na gnas
169a6(gso rig): pa yin par bshad// phyi ma bzhin du gso bar dka'// de la nad ni ji bzhin du// 'khrugs pa'i rgyu yis ldang gyur li// khyad par du ni tsha ba yis// lus la myur du mched por byed// de yang nad gnas nang du mched//
169b1(gso rig): phyi rol phyir mched gnyi gar gnas// gnyi gar mched par byed pa yin// de la nang na gnas pa ni// gnang rnams tsha gdung myos par byed// bu ga rnams la gnod pa dang // skom dang rab che gcin nang sogs// mi snyoms
169b2(gso rig): par ni 'byung ba dang // me drod stobs nyams las shes bya// phyi rol de las bzlog pa yin// de la rlung gyur me dpal nau// rlung gi rims dang nang thabs 'dra// skrang zhing mgul ba zug pa dang // yan lag snyom
169b3(gso rig): zhing bA s+phu rtsa// mkhris 'gyur myur du mched cing 'gro// mkhris rims rtags ldan shin tu dmar// bad kan las g.ya' re gI na 'jam// bad kan las byung rims 'drar na// me dpal sogs kun yal par bor//

169b6(gso rig): gnag pa 'am// sngo ba 'am dmar bas khyab byed la// me bsregs lta bur chu bur 'byung // myur du mched cing khyab par byed// gnod kyi rjes 'jug me dpal ni// de nas stobs rab skyes pa'i rlung // yan lag na zhing

170a2(gso rig): 'gre zhing sdug bsngal myong ba dang // lus sems dal las byung ba yi// gnyid kyi rmongs pa ga sad dkrol ba// de ni me 'dra'i me dngal yin// bad kan gyis ni bkag pa'i rlung // bad kan de brdol mang du phye// khrag 'phel

171a2(gso rig): lus kun ma rungs 'gyur// lus thungs li zhugs nang du khyab// thams cad 'drul bar byed par 'gyur// rul bcas rul zhing mnags pa dang // srin pu phra mo mi bzod bskyed// spu pags chu ba rtsa chen

172b2(gso rig): gzhi shas che bya// nad dbye shes las bshad pa yi// mtshan ma las kyis brtan pa yi// nad kun rgyas pa las byung dang // gang yang 'chi ltas las bshad dang // rus rkang khu chu la gnas pas// tshil la
172b3(gso rig): gnas pa 'tsho ba tsam// mkhris 'dres sha khrag gnas gso dka'// rlung dang pad kan las gyur dang // pags gnas nad gcig gyur gso sla// de la pags par gnas pa'i mdze// zug cing rtsub la mdog
172b4(gso rig): me sdu ga/ khrag gnas rdul 'byung gnyid tshe skrangs// sha la gnas pa rkang pa dang // lag par 'brum bu 'byung ba dang // tshogs gnas lhag par tshogs 'drul skem// rkang pa 'ja' 'gyur tshal gnas pa//
172b5(gso rig): yan lag zhigs par byed par 'gyur// rus pa rkang gnas sna sbom zhing // mig dmar skad ni 'gag pa dang // rma la 'bu zhugs khu bar gnas// bu dang chung mar btsas la byung // khrag sogs la ni rims
172b6(gso rig): bzhin du// mtshan ma thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// gzi gu mdzi dang gcin las 'byung // de ni sha bkra chu dang ni// yongs su 'dzag pa zhes byar bshad// nad gzhi gsum la brten par 'byung // rlung las
173a1(gso rig): rtsub cing smug pa yin// mkhris 'gyur pad+ma'i 'dab ltar dmar// tsha zhing bA spu 'byi bar byed// bad kan las skya stug cing lci// g.ya' bcas rims bzhin khrag dang ni// sha dang tshil la brten
173a2(gso rig): par bshad// 'di dag mdog ni gnyi ga yin// de ni phyi me bzhin gso dka'// spa dkar ma yin srab pa dang // phan tshun ma 'dres giser du 'byung // mes ma bsregs pa gso bar sla// de las gzhan pa gso
173a3(gso rig): dka' yin// 'doms dang lag mthil tshur 'byung ba// gsar du 'byung yang gso par dka'// nad rnams phal cher zas dang ni// mal gcig rig sogs la brten pas// thams cad mgo ste mig nad dang // mdze
173a4(gso rig): nad lhag par 'go ba yin// sha bkra gzi gu'i nad pashad nas// da ni srin bu'i nad bshad par bya ste// phyi dang nang gi dbye ba yis// srin bu rnam pa gnyis su bshad// phyi yi dri ma bad kan khrag/ bshang skyes
173a5(gso rig): dbye bas rnam bzhi yin// ming las rnam pa nyi shur 'gyur// de las phyi yi khrag las byung // tshod dbyibs mdog nau til 'bru 'dra// skra dang gos la brten pa yin// phra zhing rkang pa mang la ming // shig dang sro ma
173a6(gso rig): zhes bya'o// gnyi gas thor bu 'brum bu dang // g.yan pa dag ni bskyed por 'gyur// nang gi mdze dang rgyu gcig ste// de las bad kan las mang skye// zas mngar bu ram 'o ma dang // tshwa dang 'bras sar chan la dga'//
173b1(gso rig): mi gtsang byung ba bshang mang nas// lo ma 'dab ma la sogs rkang // bad ka nA ma zhu'i gnas su byung // skyes nas kun tu 'gro ba yin// la la 'bred pa 'dra ba yin// lA la srin bu khrol ma 'dra// kha cig myur gu 'bus
173b2(gso rig): pa 'drat+ta phra zhing ring la chung ba dang // dkar zhing dmar bar snang ba yin// de yi mi nga ni rnam bdun te// rgyu ma zad dang lto nang 'khyil// snying za ya mtshan chen po dang // mi mngon rgyu dang 'dzag ma 'dra// dri zhi ma zhes bya de
173b3(gso rig): rnams ni// snying 'phar kha chu 'dzag pa dang // zas mi 'ju zhing yi ga 'chus// brgyal zhing mi dran rims 'debs slon// snyom zhing sbrid pa cham pas 'debs/ khrag rgyu ba yi rtsa nang nas// khrag las byung ba'i
173b4(gso rig): srin bu phrag/ zlum zhing rkang med zangs ltar dmar// phra zhing lA lar ltar mi snang // skra rtsa za zhing spu 'bye byed// sU gling u du ba raM 'dra// zhags pa bcas dang thong gra ste// drug po de dag mdze las gcig/
173b5(gso rig): zhu ba'i gnas su mi gtsang skyes// 'phol nas thur du rgyu bar byed// de ni phal tshor rgyu nang na// gang che mo zhu'i gnas su zhugs// de tshe sgeg pa dbugs 'byung ba// phyi sa lta bur mnam par 'gyur// zlum
173b6(gso rig): zhing lus phra sbom po dang // smug dang ser dang dkar dang ginag/ srin bu de ming rnam l-I ste// kham gyi zas dang dal gyis 'gro// myang par byed dang brkam po dang // lus la gnod byed ces bya'o// des 'khru
174a1(gso rig): gzer dang rtug skam byed// skem zhing mdog ni skye ba dang // ba spu 'greng zhing mye drod nyams// lci g.ya' gzhang ni phyir 'byung byed// yan lag brgyud pa'i snying po bsdus pA las// nang gzhi'i
174a2(gso rig): gnas las le'u bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas rlung nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o// rlung ni phan dang gnod byed la// 'di ni sna tshogs rgyu gcig pu// khyad par du ni lus kyi ni// nad dang nad med
174a3(gso rig): rgyu gcig pu// de ni kun byed kun bdag nyid// sna tshogs gzugs can skye dgu'i bdag/ 'byin byed 'dzin byed khyab 'jug gtso// sdung byed 'chi bung gi gshin rjer 'gyur// de bas de ldang mi 'gyur bA ra// rtag
174a4(gso rig): tu 'bad pa nyid du gyis// de yi tha mA la gzhan gyur las// nad kyi bye brag shes par bshadu// bsgos dang rgyas blo de ming gnas// rgyu bo'i lam nI re re lnga// nang tshul she sa par bshad pa yin// 'dir ni nad ni
174a5(gso rig): rnam gyur pa// de yi dbye ba nad gzhi dang // mtshan nyid bcas pa nyid du bshad// grangs med kyang ni brgyad cu yi// grangs su lnga ni bshad pa yin// lus zung sna zad byed bsten dra gas pas// rlung ni 'khrugs
174a6(gso rig): bar byed 'gyur te// spu gu spyod par rgyu gyur pa// de nyi shin tu 'gengs par byed// nad gzhan gyis ni gang po dere// khebs pas mthu can nyid du 'gyur// de la zhu ba'i gnas su zhugs// gzer dang rgyu ma sgra bcas
174b1(gso rig): sgo/ bshang 'gags rde'u nad gzhang 'bum skye// rgyab dang rkeng pa mjug tor na// ro smad kyi ni phyogs de ru// mi bzad gnod pa de de bskyed// ma zhu'i gnas zhugs skom dang slon// lung pa dbugs mi bde gsung

174b4(gso rig): dbyug pas phog snyam byed// rus gnas bAR+Ya dang rus tshogs na// mi bzad gzer zhing nyams stobs zad// rkang gnas rus pa khong stong zhing // gnyid med rtag tu nu ba yin// khu bar gnas pa myur 'byung

179b3(gso rig): 'dres thur du 'byung bar 'gag/ rang gi gnas su yongs su gcod// snum zlos myur du 'ju ber 'gyur// zas zos lto ni spros pa dang // zas kyis bshashing ba phul nas ni// na zhing skam po rnyog can 'byung // rlung ni
