186b1(gso rig): sogs rim bzhin blung // rim gyis dri ma klong g.yos tshe// de la rtag tu dgag mi bya// nad ni khong par gnas rnyed nas// smin kyang gnod pa bskyed par 'gyur// shin tu tshabs cher byung gyur na// smin nas bcad par bya/
186b2(gso rig): ba yin// ma smin bkag pa'i nyes pa ni// nad bcos thA ba su bshad pa yin// gang zhig rmongs pas ma smin na// rims la sman gtong nad 'byin pa// de ni sbrul nag gnyid log la// lag po'i rtse mor reg dang mtshungs/
186b3(gso rig): rims zad pa la smon spyan dang // bkru sman phan pa ma yin te// de la 'o ma dgA gi ni// mAs btang bsdu ni nang bsal bya'o// 'o mau la goms bad kan thAd// lus tsha skom dang gnyis yod la// rlung dang mkhris pas nyen pa
186b4(gso rig): ni/ tshad par 'khru yang 'o ma phan// de lus spyad pas gdungs pa dag/ mes tshig pa yi nags la ni// char chu 'bab pas bskyed pa ltar// rims ni myur du sel bar byed// de bas 'o ma sbyar te bskol// dro ba'am
186b5(gso rig): bsgrangs pa bzhis ma thag/ dus kyi dbye ba shes te sbyin// de las gzhan du rimA sA tsan+da gaspyod// 'o ma bca' sgra 'bru g+hor bcas// rgun 'brum khar mar ldan pa rA// bskol te bsgyangs paro sbrang rtsi bta gA/ skom dang lus
186b6(gso rig): tsha rims 'joms byed// de bzhin pa lo rgun shing mngar// tsan dan thal tres pi pi ling // 'o ma'i bzhi 'gyur chu bskol ba 'am// pi pi ling dang bskol ba ni// rim gyis btab pas 'thungs nas ni// glad gzer
187a1(gso rig): lud pa dbugs mi bde// rtsib logs gzer rims snying las thar// rtsa ba lnga bskol de dang 'dra// e raN+Da rtsa bskol ba'am// bil+la gzhon nu bskol ba'am// bzhos ma thag gi 'o ma 'thungs// rlung gi
187a2(gso rig): rims kyis phyis 'gags// khrag bcas sbyin bag tshad 'khru dang // skom dang gzer bcas 'khru las thar// bca' sga ba la bya d+hi dang // gze ma bu ram 'o mAr bcos// bskol 'thungs snyun bshang gtson dang phyen//
187a3(gso rig): 'gags dang rims dang lung pa 'joms// bri shi sa dang bil+la dang // ba sha bu ra dang bskol ba yis// rim kyis skran nad sel po yin// shing sha pa yi snying po dang // 'o ma dag tu bskol bA ni// rims ni myur du 'joms
187a4(gso rig): byed yin// nad smin zhu ba'i gnas song la// mas btang drag pos me stobs bskyed// rims bral sems dga' yi ge 'byed// myur du skyed par byed pa yin// bkru sman mkhris pa'ang ba mkhris 'dres// mkhris po'i gnas
187a5(gso rig): zhugs pa spe la// 'jam rtsis nud ni gsum char dag/ zhu ba'i gnas la brten pa sel// 'o mas pad+ya kan mkhris byA dag/ mjug ti rgyu ba dang rked pa na// me drod tshi la rtug 'gugs laM// 'jam+ba rnaMms btung sbyar bar bya/
187a6(gso rig): nim+ba pa to la'i lo ma// pu rtse shel dang dong ka dang // ti ra bai la po son cha// gze sa pu shel ba la ka/ 'o ma chur ni bskol ba dag/ 'o ma lkog ma lus pa la// gla sgang shing mngar po son cha// pi pi ling dang dug mo nyung // ma ro
187b1(gso rig): dang sbrang rtsir bsres pa yi// 'jam rtsi btang na rims 'joms so// parni bzhi dang shing mngar dang // po son tshwa dung pu shel ci// dong ka rnams ni bskol ba ru// shing mngar pA tA puSh+pa dang // pri yaM ku dang po son cha//
187b2(gso rig): gla sgreng lde gur byas pa la// bu ram mA ra dang sbrang rtsir bcas// 'jam rtsi rims ni sel byed yin// 'dzi ban+ti dang po son 'cha'// ma ba shing mngar pi paM ling // shu dag ri d+hi ra sne dang // ba la dang ni bilka dang //
187b3(gso rig): shu taM dang ni nyer shing dang // mar dang til mar 'o ma dang // chu dang btags te lhan cig bskol// snum ni nA daM dang rjes mthun pa'i// 'dzum rtsis rims la btang bar bya// gang yang cho ga grub pa las// rims
187b4(gso rig): sel bar ni bshad pa yi// 'jam rtsi dag kyang btang bar bya// snA yi bkru sman rims rnying la// ba ti dA na yi gri 'byed byed cing // mgo ni lci zhing bdu kAn che// sel zhing dbang po gsal byid la// snum gyi sna
187b5(gso rig): sman mgo stong snyam// lus tsha mkhris pa sel byed yin// dung rngub mkhur bI king mkhur baM sgo// nad dmigs ji bzhin sbyor bar bya// cham pa khaMs ro mi tshor dang // mgo nud lkog nad sel byed yin// yi gi 'chus la
187b6(gso rig): khi lung gi/ ge sar mar dang rgyam tsha dang // yang ni rgun 'brum skyu ru ra// kha ra'i lde gu ma khur bar bcang // rims rnying pagos pa la brtan la// reg na ji ltar bde 'gyur ba'i// sman bsil dro bo la sbyar ba'i// bsku byug chus
188a1(gso rig): byugs la stsogs bya// mig sman dung ba'i sbyor ba'ang bya// glo bur byung la de de bzhin// tshal lan stong bkrus pa yi// mar gyis bsku ba spyad par bya// mdo gnas bshad sman gyi sde// mngar dang
188a2(gso rig): skyur dang bska ba dang // duR+Ya la sogs rlung mkhris 'joms// skyug smon la sog sa sde tshan bshad// nus pa bsil zhing reg na grang // bskol dang lde gur byas pa dang // til mar 'o mar byes bskol
188a3(gso rig): btu bskus na 'phral du tsha rims sel// mgo dang lus kyang de nyid ni// cung zad rtsing bar btags pas bsku// de bskol chu ni blug pa dang // lus bying la yang sbyor bar bya// skyur rtsabs chu dang 'o ma tsha// mar
188a4(gso rig): la stsogs pa 'ang de bzhin sbyar// bI lnga'i rkang pa lung am+b+ha dang // si'u 'bru srung prom bI da ri// rgyu shug lo ma laMs byung ba'ang // l+r-ing thang gi swa nI dbu ba yis// lus bskus cha ni rmongs bag dang // smon dang skom
188a5(gso rig): dang zhi bar byed// glang zhig nang gi so'i thabasu bshad// mkhris pa sbrul bu'i rim pa ste// bsten pa re byas na myur du ni// tsha dang bcas pa'i rims sel 'gyur// nus pa dro zhing reg na dro// rgyu spos gur kum
188a6(gso rig): a ka ru// ru rta rdo dreg sto na ya// sa ra la dang thang shing dang // chu srin sen mer sna dang // gu gul shu dog bci' ba dang // sug smel gnyis dang cha rong dang // tsIn sib dang bye rug pa// shing ku spang sbas bya ma ka
188b1(gso rig): yungs kar rtsa ba bcu pA dang // g+he tres e raN+Da gnyis dang // pu tu ra dang ro hi sha/ ta ma la yi lo mu dang // d+hA tI kA dang sa la k+Shi/ bu su a za mo ta dang // shut+ti ma sha ku lat+ta// tsaM tra ka dang prA kI r+ya// na gu la ni rnam
188b2(gso rig): dag/ gzhan yang de 'dra'i bsil ba'i sman// bskol dang lde gur byos nas ni// chang dung skyur rtsabs la sogs sbya rA// til mar bsko la bya grangs rims sbyar// de dro 'jam gyis bsku ba dang // zhib tu btags pa klag
188b3(gso rig): bya// cung zad dro bas blug pa dang // lus bcing bar yang bya ba yin// tsha dang bA gcin zho kha chu// 'bra' zhig gis kyang de bzhin bya// dong ka la sogs sde yis kyang // btung dang bsku dang byug par bya// bdug yi a kA
188b4(gso rig): las byung // 'og nas bshad pa'i rims la sbyar// dugs ni mes byas mes ma byas// dugs kyi sman dang kha zas bsten// khang sbrums sa phug tu nyal zhing // la ba dre'u gA re'u snam po go/ du baM lang pa'i
188b5(gso rig): mngag mas gang // zhugs ling dang ni brten pa dong // chang ni tsha ba gsum bcas dang // dAr ba rgyu sran+ta ku lan+ta// 'bru dang ko ta pa dag kyang // 'dar ba'i rims can de la sbyin// grang ba'i rims nang nAn de la/ chung ma na
188b6(gso rig): ma rgyas pa dang // rgyan gyis brgyan te bzhag pa dang // lang chos rgyags shing chang gis myos// bud med kyis de 'khyud par bya// grang dang phral bar shes nas ni// de nas de slar bsal bar bya// nad cig 'a gyur
189a1(gso rig): 'grib pa 'am ldang bar gyur pa 'am// mnyam gnas nad ni bad kan gyi// gnas kyi rims pas bsal ba rA bya// 'dus pa'i rims kyi mtha' mar ni// gang gi rna ba'i rtsa ba ru// mi bzang skrangs
189a2(gso rig): pa byung gyur na// 'ga' zhig thar par 'gyur ba yin// de ni gtar ga dbyung ba dang // zhun mar blud pas myur bsal te// bang mkhris sel ba'i sman bsku dang // sna sman mkhur ba bkang bas gso// gang gI rims
189a3(gso rig): nI baM silA drod dang // snum rtsub sogs kyi sa zhi mi 'gyur// yan lag zhin pa de rim bzhin// li ga dAr las khrag myur du dbyung // cho ga 'di ni bzang pa yi// rims la'ang nad dmigs ji bzhin bya// rlung sogs
189a4(gso rig): rims kyis cha phye la// hrI sa bshang gang yin dag kyang b+ha// pa to la dang pu tsi shel// glu skrang shing mAngar A ru ra// gnyis sam gsum mam lnga bskol ba// mi bzad rims ni 'joms byed yin// 'bras bu
189a5(gso rig): bu gsum dang a ru ra// sle tres pI pi ling so sor// cho ga de dang sbyar ba 'am// go bya bu ram bcas pa sbyin// rims kyis thebs pa'i nyi ni zhag la// nyams smad pa 'am nyams rta bya// nang pa ro til mar sgog sbyar
189a6(gso rig): bcas/ bza' 'am yang ne mar rnying ngam// de bzhin zho dang 'o me sbyin// zhun ma ro srang drug pa dang ni// dge ba chen po 'am pa'i lnga 'am// tik+ta 'am dug dang bskol te sbyin// 'bras bu gsum dang rgya shug dang /
189b1(gso rig): ag+ni man+t+ra bskol ba ru// zho dang bskol ba'i mar dag tu// sreng phrom shun pags lde gu btab// mi bzung rims ni 'joms pa'i mchog/ 'bru chang dang ni chang rnying no// rma bya gong mo sreg khyim bya// rAnAn+dan sha ni dr-id
189b2(gso rig): bskyed pa// zas bcas dag ni ci 'dod par// bsten la de bzhin gnyid log pa 'am// yung nA slar ni skyug tu gzhug/ yAng na zhun mar tshad chen po// blung de slar yang sbyar du gzhugs/ oM dza gon+da ni lo ni// dur bying dang
189b3(gso rig): niblo ci shel// rims kyis 'debs tshe snum+bu dang dugs// legs par bya skye blud par bya// ldong ros rgya mtsho chu bi pi ling // til mir dang sbyar mig sman gzhug/ shing ku nA steg tshol cha mnyam byas// rgyu mtshar bcas
189b4(gso rig): pa'i sna sman bya// de bzhin mar rnying seng+ge Di'i tshol// rgya ma tsha ngag dang sbyor te btang // pau la ga sa nai pa'i lo// shu dag ru rta a ru ra// yungs kar nas bcas mar sbyar ba'i// bdug pa 'am byi lo'i rtug pas bdug/ gu
189b5(gso rig): gul shu dag byA ma ka/ sar+Na ra saM ni pa dang // arga dang ni a ru r+yA// b+h+r-ing shing bcas pa'i spros sbyar ba// 'di ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i// bdug pa yin te rims kun sel// spos bdug sna sman btang bya ba// sems
189b6(gso rig): kyis bskur bar gang bshang dang // 'phags pa la brten sman gyis ni// rims nang thams cad sol bar byed// mchog tu phal che ro mi bzang rims// de ni glo bur 'od rjes 'brel// mi bzang rims zhir ma gyur na// 8nga
190a1(gso rig): gi gtar ga ji bzhin gdab// dngas ma la gAnas thams cad la// skyug sman btang dang sbyang bu bya// khrag la gnas pa sman chu blugs// bsku dang byug dang gtar ga bya// shar gnas bkru sman rnon po bya/
190a2(gso rig): tshil gnas tshil ni dbyi bar bya// rus par gnas pa rlung zhi ba'i// bsku dang dug sa dang minye ba bya// ri moM sa dor rlung nang zhi bya dang // khyad pa ri du ni 'dzu me mi bye// ma 'dres rlung drang me dal dang // 'brum bus gnod
190a3(gso rig): 'gyur rims la ni// zhun mar blud tsang tsan+da blugs// sman chu blugs shing sha khu sbyin// rang gi dpyid ni ji skad bshad// gtar ga lA sogs dag gis gso// gdoni byung 'byung po'i rig par bshad// ga tor ma sngags la
190a4(gso rig): sogs pas gso// smen dri las byung mkhris pa ni// zhi bye du ga skyes dug gis gauso// 'dod don ji ltar yid 'thung dang // nang ni ji ltar zhi 'gyur ba// phan dang mi phan la mkhas pus// khros sogs las byed rims
190a5(gso rig): bsal bya// khros byung 'dod pas zhi bar 'gyur// mya ngan 'jigs 'byung de gnyis kyis// 'dod dang mya ngan byung cig shos// dmod pa mngon sgyid sngags las byung // 'phags pa'i don la brten pas zhi// rim sa de thog
190a6(gso rig): ma ma 'dris lo// de 'og dri mas khyab par byed// de bas nang dang rjes mthun par// de la kha zas la sogs sbyar// rlung sogs rgyal ma brten par// rims ni rjes 'brel gnas mi byed// rims kyi dus dran byung de la//
190b1(gso rig): yid 'phrog yul gyis brjed par bya// snying rjes brlan zhing sems dag la// rims kun 'joms par byed pa yin// nyams stobs rdzogs par 'gyur gyi bar// rtsol dang khrus dang nyal po dang // zas lci ma goms
190b2(gso rig): tsha byed dang // gang gzhan rims skyod byed pa spang // rims brel gyur kyang 'phral du ni// zas kun brten par mi bya ste// rims ni myur du ldog byed nas// nyam chung ma ni myur gi song byed// gang phyir myur du gsod
190b3(gso rig): 'gyur pas// de phyir de ni khyad par du// gnas skabs de dang de dag tu// sman dpyad de dang de dag bya// sman dang noro bu sngags dang ba ces pA dang // dam pa bla ma brem ze de kon mcho go mchod// yid ni dga' bar byed
190b4(gso rig): pa'i yul bsten pos// khya bo 'jug gis byas ma rungs rims kyang 'joms// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u dang po'o// // de nas khrag mkhris gso bo'i
190b5(gso rig): le'u bshad par bya'o// khrog mkhris bde ba'i dus su 'byung // stobs ldan stong byung shugs dal la// nyes gcig las byung gsar du btab// brla gnyen med pa gso bar bya// khrag gang nad gzhi gnyis las skye//
190b6(gso rig): zhi zhing zhi zhing slar ldang dang // lam nas lam gzhan 'gro ba gang // thur du 'byung ba gso bo tsam// shas cher 'byung zhing me dro de nyams// nyes gsum las gnyis las byung yang // nad gzhi dang ni gnas dang ni// nod kyi
191a1(gso rig): grogs dang stobs dag dang // yul dang dus kyi gnas skabs sogs// shes bya dang por sbyang ba 'am rta// de bzhin sbyar dang zhi bya bas// khrag dang mkhris pa gso bar bya// rta ba las byung stobs
191a2(gso rig): ldan pa// nad gzhi mang po las byung ba// gyen 'byung bkru sman btung bas gso// thur 'byung stug sman gyis gso bar bya// sbyang ba rta byaM la bltos bya// stong du 'byung ba kha ba dang // bska bo'i sman khu sbyang ba dang /
191a3(gso rig): yan lag drug sman bca' sga med// 'thungs na zhi bar 'gyur ba yin// thur du 'byung ba'i khrag mkhris la// sman khu mang bas rta bar bya// stong 'byung dang po sgo mar blung // slang 'byung dang por thug par blud//
191a4(gso rig): stobs ldan zo nusi ma dag khrag/ byung yang mI dgA ga de na de bskyed// de ni gzhan du me lta bur// myurA gsod byed pas bcad par bya// dur bying pri yaM chu bskol dang // lde gu kha rar bcas pa dag/ cho ga bzhin du
191a5(gso rig): lA nitAzhi gnyis tsam ni ldang par bya// dur bying pri yaM 'bras bu gsum// kha ra sbrang rtsi pi pi ling // sbrus pa 'dus byung stong du byung // khrag rims 'or nad sel byed yin// de bzhin dur bying kha rar mnyam// pi pi
191a6(gso rig): ling ni bzhi char bcas// skyug sman phyir ni po son cha// kha ra sbrang rtsir bcas skyo ma 'am// kha ra sbrang rtsi po son cha// chu re bcas pa'am shing mngar chu// 'o ma bu ram shing khu blung // sbyang ba'i rjes la cho ga ni// thug ska
191b1(gso rig): la sogs ji bzhin du// blud cing stobs ni bsrung bar bya// skyo ma rims skabs bshad rgun sogs// yang na mkhris 'joms 'bras bur sbyar// sbrang rtsi 'gro gro rgun 'bru dang / pa ru sha ka ka ra'i chu// snying
191b2(gso rig): bo lnga yi skyo ma ni// 'bras yos phye ni mar bcas sbyin// me drod chung zhing skyur la dga'o// sa 'bru stA ru ra sbyar ba// pad+ma ut+pal ge sar ding // kr-i sna paR+Shi pri yai ku/ pu shel tsi dang seng phrom dkur//
191b3(gso rig): bca'o sga dang nI tsAn ma ra// byi tshe ra dA ta ka me tog/ ba la ka dang bil+la 'i rkang // tshig bshad phyed ba shang thug pa blud// rtsa mkhris gla sbrang pu shel ci// sran chung kris+t+ra par+Ni sbyar// mung+ga gan+da bi da ri// he re
191b4(gso rig): nu ki ba la mar// tshigs rkang gcig gis bshad pa blud// nus pa bsil ba de rnams ni// skam sa'i srog chags shA dag dang // chur ni so sor bskol ba yi// khu bar nas thug sbyor ba bsgrengs// kha ra sbrang rtsir
191b5(gso rig): sbyar ba blud// de bzhin du ni sha khu dang // cung zad sbyar dang spyir min pa// mar brngos khar bcas pa sbyin// zas kyis tshul ni shes pa ru// yang dang bsil bar gang bshad pa'i// gra mo gung bu can 'bru dang // tshad ma
191b6(gso rig): khrag la bsngags pa yin// sngar bshad pa yi chu dag gam// rtsa ba chung ngu lnga bskol te// bsgrangs pa 'am sbrang rtsi'i chu'am ni// 'bras bu mnyes pa'i chu blad bya// bshang 'gags rgya sne re bong sha/ rlung shas che la
192a1(gso rig): sreg pa'i sha/ u dum+ba ra'i khu ba ni// bsgrol ba blud na bsngags pa yin// de bzhin p+lak+Sha rma bya'i sha/ n+ya gro nga dang khyim byA'i sha/ khrag mkhris kyi ni nad gzhi ni// gang ci yang rung ba de srang bya// ba shA ka
192a2(gso rig): khu pri yaM ku// sa nag dang ni skyer khaH// song phrom dang ni sbrang rtsir sbyar// 'thungs na khrag dang mkhris pa l-I dzoms// yang na ba shA ka yi ni// khu byA kha ra sbrang rtsi dang // patsa sA par 'thungs pa de bzhin te// ba sha kra ni
192a3(gso rig): 'ba' zhig dang // bskol bas khrag ni myur bsal te// de ni 'di yau sman mchog yin// pa to la dang ma la tI// nim+ba shug pa tsAn gnyis// seng phrom ba shaM dan du ni// nyer shing dang ni thal tres dang // ram nye ba gnyis
192a4(gso rig): shing mngar rnams// bskol ba gsum po kha ra dang // sbrang rtsir bcas pa khrag mkhris 'joms// rgya skyegs shing shun bskol ba nI// legs bsgrangs kha ra btab pu phan// yang na sbrad rtsi mar bcas pa'am// lci ba
192a5(gso rig): r+N+Na sbyangs btsir khu 'thung // khrag na dA mdud pa can 'drar 'gyur// phug ron rtug pa sbrang rtsi phan// khrag ni sha saM cher byung gyur na// skam sa'i srog chags khrag dang nI// sbrang rtsir bcas pa'am ra yi ni// mchin pa mkhris bcis
192a6(gso rig): rlon pa bza'// tsAn gla sgang bu shel ci// 'bras yos mung+ga paM pi ling // na saM ni ba la'i chur spangs pa// khu ba khrag mkhros sel byed yin// n+dan pad+ma pu shel tsaM// khu bar bong ba bsregs bcu pa// rab bsgrengs kha na sbrang
192b1(gso rig): rtsir byas// khrag ni shas cher 'byung ba sel// bu ram shing ni chu mang spangs// rdza bum gsar par de bzhag nas// mtshan mo phyi rol dben par bzhag/ nang par chu ni btsags nas su// sbrang rtsi btab nas pad+ma ni//
192b2(gso rig): kha bye'i phreng brgyan chu de 'dra// gA yang mkhris pa'i rims skabs bshad// sman khu de yang blud par bya// sman khu sna tshogs 'di yis ni// me drod skyes pas bad kan zad// gal te khrag mkhris me zhi na// de la
192b3(gso rig): rlu shas cher phan pa'i// ra yi 'o ma bskol ba blud// de bzhin pa yi 'o ma ni// lnga 'gyur chu ba sgrol bsdus pa blud// rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu dang // sbrang rtsi kha ra bskol ba'ang rung // rgun 'bru bca' sga dzI pa ka/ ba la
192b4(gso rig): gze ma zangs rtsi ba// re re 'o ma bskol ba'am// rI ma kha ra mar bskal phyan// glu ze mo nye'u shing bskol ba 'am// de bzhin 'dab bzhi 'o mar bsgrol// khrag ni nang bcas myur sil te// mchog tu mtshan nas
192b5(gso rig): 'byung la phan// rku bA las byung la khyad par du// mo tsa ra sa blung na phan// n+ya gro d+hA yi myu gu 'am// 'dab ma gzhon pa'am bca' sga dang // u shI ra dang ut+pal pan// khrag gi tshad 'khru gzhang 'brum gyi//
192b6(gso rig): gso ba dag kyang 'dir sbyar bya// sman khu 'o ma 'thungs nas ni// bza' ba 'am 'o ma nyid da dang bza'// sman khu'i sbyor ba 'di dag ni// bskol ba'i mar ni blud par bya// ba sha ka rtsa rtser bcas brdungs// chu ni brgyad 'gyur
193a1(gso rig): nang du ni// bskol te brgyad chu lus gyur pa// de nas mar ni btso bar bya// de yi me tog nang bcug bsgrengs// sbrang rtsir bcas pa khrag mkhris dang // mkhris skran rims dang dbugs mi bde// lung
193a2(gso rig): pa snying nad mig ser dang // rab rib mgo 'khor me dpal dang // skad 'grags pa ni 'joms par byed// pa lak+Sha yi myu gu'i khu// de bcug mar ni bskal ba dag/ sbrang rtsir bcas pa khrag nad spel// khyi lce ba
193a3(gso rig): yang de bzhin no// khrag ni sbyin pag bAd kan bcas// mdud par chags ni mgul par byung // ut+pal sdong bur bsregs thal ba// zhun mar sbrang rtsir bcas pa lhag/ pad+ma ut+pal ge sar dang // pri yi ku dang ma
193a4(gso rig): duka re re'i sbyor ba de bzhin bye// khrag ni bshang ba'i lam las ni// 'byung bar byed las khyad par du// 'jam+me rtsi btang ba bsngags pa yin// sna nas nad can khrag byung na// sna sman btang zhing byug par bya// stur
193a5(gso rig): bshang sman khu'i sbyor ba dang // 'o ma bu ram shing khu blugs// 'o ma sogs chu kha rar bcas// yang na chu ni 'ba' zhig phan// sa 'bru'i me tog khu ba 'am// a mra'i rus pa du Ni phan// bsil sman sde chen gtogs
193a6(gso rig): pa dag/ bsku dang byug la sogs las sbyar// mkhris pa'i rims sel bshad pa gang // phyi nang las btang sman de dang // glo brdol bar ni gang phan pa// de yang khrag dang mkhris par phan//
193b1(gso rig): yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u gnyis pa'o// // de nas lung pa gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// lung pa ma 'dres rlung las byung // dang por snum gyis gso
193b2(gso rig): bya zhing // sha khu thug pa yu shA sogs// rlung 'joms sman bskol snum pa dang // dung rngub lde gu bsku dang dugs// chu blugs lus bcing dag gis gso// bshang rlung 'i gags la 'jam rtsis gso// mkhris
193b3(gso rig): bcas zhun ma re 'o ma ni// zas kyis sngon bta bang kan bcasi// snum bcis bkru sman btang ba se gauso// sle traM sa kaN+Da kI ri gnyis// re re srad sum cu'i khu ba ra// mur srang sum cu rtsa gnyis bskol// rlung gi lung
193b4(gso rig): sel me drong bskyed// k+Sha ra ras+yA shu dge dang // shreng kun pa ta shing mngar dang // 'u sr-i zho gnyis mar pre grang // che bA lnga dang bcas pa dang // rtsa ba becu po'i khu bar bskol// 'thungs rjes thug pa blung gyur na// lung
193b5(gso rig): pa dbugs mi bde bcus snying // rtsibs logs pho ba skran+da nad sel// ra sna nye'u shing rtsa ba bcu// srang ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya// rgya sran rgya shug nas ngag ni// ra sha srang ni lnga bcu dang // chu srang lnga brgya bcu gnyis
193b6(gso rig): bskol/ de dang mar ni bye bzhi bskol// 'o ma mar mnyam dzI ban+ti// la sogs srang char byas te brtag/ rlung gi nad la blud pa dang // snar btang 'jam rtsis mas btang sbyar// lung pa rnam lnga mgo 'dir dang // mo
194a1(gso rig): mtshan chu sor nab dang // lung kun lus ni phyogs gcig rang // mchin bcas stong kyi rlung nAd sal// dI dA ri sogs sde mtshan bskul// lde gu mar bskol lung pa 'joms// shing mdur a sho
194a2(gso rig): kA'i sa bon// bI tang ka dang skyes khaN+Da/ shug pa kha ru tshi mar bskol// yang na de phye mar dang sbyar// lde gu byin la ra yi ni// 'o ma blung na lud pa sel// daMng kra ra sna bi tAng ka/ shing kun rgyam tsha pi pi ling // bar
194a3(gso rig): gyi gsha' ra de'i phye ma 'am// mar dang rano tsam blud gyur na// rlung gyur bang kan bcas lud pa// dbugs mau bde dang skyigs bu dang // me drong chung ba sel bar byed// byi tsher bA dang bca' sga dang // zu ra rgun 'buM
194a4(gso rig): kha ra ka ra// kaR+sha ta yi sring gi ni// til mar dang ni lde gu ra sbyar// rlung las gyur pa'i lung pa sel// byi tsher gla sgreng pi pi ling // bar gyi zur ba kaR+sha ti// bu ram snying dang trilA mAr dang // lde gur byas pa
194a5(gso rig): ldag pAr bya// bca' sgra pi pi ling de bzhin// kaR+sha te sr-id de bzhin no// chu dron dag dang pi pi ling // lce myang tshe dang bcas pa 'ang blud// bca' sga ka rA zho kha chu 'am// pI pi ling pye zhor be tA bai blung // rgya
194a6(gso rig): shug tshig gu chang ma zho// zho ga chu dang sbyar ba blud// yang na pi pi ling lde gu/ mar brdos rgyam tshar btsos pa'ang phan// lung pa cham bcas dud pa ni// snum bcas cho gas rngub po dang // skyigs bu dbug
194b1(gso rig): mr-i bde dud rtug// 'o ma sha khu bcas pa bza'// grang chu sman can srog chags sha/ sa lu nas gro drug cu pa 'am// a sha at+tA kup+tA yau// yu sha dag dang zos na phan// la la phung dang paM bi ling //
194b2(gso rig): bil rkang dong kra tsi tra ka/ ra sna TI ra pa la sha/ pri na par+Ni zur pa dAng // ma nu bskol ba snum sbyar dang // lan tshwar bcas thug rlung 'gyur blung // rting pa lto snying rtsib logs na// dbugs mi bdi dang skyigs bu
194b3(gso rig): snrel// rtsa ba bcu pa'i khu bar ni// tsha ba lnga dang bu ram ban+da swa// til dang bcas pa'i thug pa blud// yang na'o thug rgyam tshar bcas// nya dang khyim bya phag rgod sha/ mar dang rgyam tshar bcas pa phan// tshad ma rgya
194b4(gso rig): sne'u pa yas+thA'i// ni shan+na ga lung pA 'joms// kaN+Da kA ri'i lo 'bras dang // la phug gzhon nu skam po 'dra phanra// til mar sogs snum 'o ma dang // bu ram bu rama? shing khu'i zas// zho ga chu zho rang sbyar chang //
194b5(gso rig): 'bras bu sbyar chu blud pa phin// mkhris pa'i khud pa bad kan bcas// zhun mar gyis ni stug sman phan// de bzhin po son cha thang dpal// ma du ka ni bskol chus sam// shing mngar paM son cha'i lde gu// bi da bu ram
194b6(gso rig): shing khur sbyar// mkhris lung bad kan shas chung la// dur byed mngar ba'i sman sbyar btang // bang kan shas che kha ba'i sman// skyug sman phyir ni btang bar bya// nad sbyangs nas ni thug pa sogs// bsil dang mang
195a1(gso rig): dang snum pa spyad// bad kana? shas cher kha ba dang // rtsub pa dang sbyar grang thug blung // mkhris gyur kha ra skyu ru ra// rgun 'bru ut+pal tsAn+da dkar// sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin// bad kan bcas la na
195a2(gso rig): le shaM/ gla sgang dang ni bcas pa sbyin// rlung nad le ni mar bcas phan// rgun 'o bruM lnga bcu'i pi pi ling // sum cu kha ra srang gcig sbyar// sbrang rtsi 'i ba yi lci ba 'am// be'u gzhon lci khur lde gur sbyar// shing tsha sug
195a3(gso rig): smel tsha ba gsum// rgun 'bru bi pi ling rtsa ba// ma nu 'bras yos gle sgang dang // zur ba ka ra ra sa dang // skyu ru ra dang ba ru ra// kha r-i sbrang rtsi zhun mar sbyar// lde gu snying nang lung pA si la// mngar ba'i sman dang srog chag
195a4(gso rig): ni// skam sa'i sha dang nas dang ni// khre dang khre rgod mung+ga sogs// yu sha dang ni tshad ma dang // kha pa tshang ldan sbyar lde gu// kha ba dang nI sbrang rtsir bcas// bad kAn shas che'i nad la phan// bad kani shas chungangs
195a5(gso rig): su dang // drug cu pa'i chan sha khu phan// btung bar kha ra 'am rgun chu 'am// bu rama? shing khu 'o me blung // mkhris pa'i lud par ram nye ba// br-i ha ti'i gnyis mang gnyis// ba sha ka dang l-i dong gra// sha khu dang ni 'o ma
195a6(gso rig): 'am// thug pa 'am yu kar sbyar te blud// rgun 'bru dang ni pi pau ling // rtsa yi rtsa ba lngar bshid dang // chur bskol ba yi khu ba dang // de dang 'o ma bskol te bsgrangs// sbrang rtsi kha rar bcas pa blud// yang na de
195b1(gso rig): yis thug pa bskol// legs bskol sbrang rtsir bcas pa sbyin// zur ba dang ni ba la ka/ kha ra bca' sga bri ha tI// btags pa 'i khu ba rAs kyis btsags// mar dang bsgres te blud par bya// kha ra dang ni dzi ba ka/ mud+YA mA
195b2(gso rig): Sha par+Ni dang // byi tshe ra ba ni lde gur byas// mAr dang 'o ma brgyad 'gyur bskol// de btung bza' dang lhag pa dang // sbyar bas mkhris pa'i lung pa sel// 'di dag phye ma'i lde gu ru 'am// bskol ba'i khu ba blud par bya//
195b3(gso rig): bad kan lu can gyis dang paur// thang shing bsregs nas gzegs pa'i snum// ba sha ka dang nas tshig khus// thal ba'i phye ma btab pa btang // snum can bkru sman gyi steng dang // 'og dang spyi bor ci rigs par//
195b4(gso rig): nyams stobs ldan bkru sman rno btang // thug pa sogs kyang 'di la blud// nasi dang mung+ga rgya sran zas// rtsub dr-i na laM sham gyis tsha// ka sa marda bArda ka/ byA kri ya bak+Shi ra dang // pi pi lcing dang btsas pa sbyin// skam
195b5(gso rig): sa khung gnas she khu snum+b+hi// til dang yungs kar bil+la'i snum// sbyar ba'i thug pA s+t+rin+da par bya// skom na rtse ba bcu bskol chu// chu tshan chung mA sbrang rtsi blung // dong ga ma nu'i rtsa ba dang // pa two la yi rtsa bar ba tsas// nubA
195b6(gso rig): gcig chung spangs sbra'i rtsi btag/ zas dus gsum mam nang bair blung / pi pi ling dang da rtsa bi// bca' sga dang nai ba ru ra~M// rmi bya khyim bya'i mjug sgra ni// gnag tshor byas dang nas tshig thal// bi sha gla sgang po pi
196a1(gso rig): ling // dur bying sbrang rtsir sbyar ba ste// tshigs bcad phyed kyis rdzogs lde gu/ gsum pa dang kAn lung pa sel// sbrang rtsin le sham sbyar lcug/ a ka ru sbrang rtsi nyid kyis// kaN+Da ka ri parta ka/ bring+ga ra
196a2(gso rig): dzi'i khu ba dang // ka sa marda rto spangs btsi ra// khu ba bye drug nag po'i khu// sbrang rtsi so sor sbyar ba lhag/ thang shing zur ba rA sna dang // byi tshe ra karka ta sring gi/ gla sgang bca'i sga pi pi ling // kha ra a ru skyu ru ra// 'bras
196a3(gso rig): yos kha ra dwakar po dang // skyu ru ra yi lpags pa rnams// sbrang rtsi til mar sbyar lde gu// gau sum po rlung 'dres bad kan se l-i// se'u 'bru srang gnyis bu ram ni// srang brgyad tsha ba gsum srang res// skad snyan
196a4(gso rig): drod bskyed yi gA 'byed// lu pa dbugs mi bde tsham sa la// bu rA ma ya bak+Sha ra deng // na li sham di da pi pi ling // saM 'bru rim gyis srang gnyis dang // zho r-I srada? phyed tshad du sbyar// lung pa dbugs mi bde ba
196a5(gso rig): sal/ rims kyis skabasA bA shadu a ru ra// sogs dang karka ta sring gi/ bsnyil ba'i khu ba blud par bya// yang na dur bying la la phud// gla sgang ma nu pi sha la// pi pi l-ing bcas po gcin nam// chur bskol ba
196a6(gso rig): gcin lud pa sel// pi li ling ni til mar brngos// lde gu zhi gnyis kha rar bcas// rgya sran po skol po'i khu bar sbyar// lung na bang kan lung pa 'joms// rtsa ba bcu khu bre bzhi dang // mar bre gang dang ma nu dang //
196b1(gso rig): zur ba bil ba bye'u rug pa// shing kun cha gsum zho gnyis bskol// blud pa'i rjes la thug pa btung // de kun badra kan rlung nang 'joms// ni rkunI lo bskol ba'i khu// mar bskol lung pa 'joms byed yin//
196b2(gso rig): bi T+wAM ka yi khu ba'i nang // tsha ba gsum bcug mAR+Sha bskol phan// ba spu ba gnyis byi rug pa// kA sa mar dang sle tres dang // pa to la dang bri hai tI// pa nidrA dza gI khu ba ni// 'o mA mar dang bcas pa lo// tshwa ba
196b3(gso rig): gsum dang legs bskol 'thungs// ltud pa'i rims drag zad byed dang // gzhang 'brum nad kyi 'jigs pa med// kAN+Da kA ri'i rtsa ba dang // 'bras bu lo mA r-i bcas pa yi// khu ba bre bzhi'i tshad la ni// mar
196b4(gso rig): bre gang ba la gang dang // che bA ga sumU dang bi TI ka/ shu dag dang ni se'u 'bya dang // kha rU tsha dang nAs tshig thal// pi pI ling gi rtsa ba dang // skyu ru rA dang mra nu dang // bi shi ba dang bri ha tI// a ru ra dang ya ba ni// kru trug
196b5(gso rig): tres dang rgun 'bru dang // dbyi mong bi tshwa ra buR+YA b+hU// stur bu kar+b+bA ta shr-i gi/ ta ma la gau ga pra'i rtsa// ra s+yA gze ma'i lde gu dang // bskol ba'i mar desaM lung kun dang // skyigs bu dbugs mi bde la'ang phran//
196b6(gso rig): kaN+Da kA ri'i sman mor 'di// bong kan nang ni sel byed yin// bya gr-i srang brgya brdungs chu srang // nyis stong bzhi bcu brgya de nang bskol// btsags par tsha ba gsum ra swA// sle tres kru trug phye ma dang // kaR+Sha ta sr-i ga pra'i
197a1(gso rig): rtsa// gla sgang pi pi ling rtswa ba// byi tsher ba rnams srang phyed phyed// zhun mar srang ni bcu drug dang // khA ra dwakaR+Sha po srang bzhi bcu// slar yang de ni bskol byu ba// gzar bu la chags bsgrangs nas
197a2(gso rig): ni/ pi pi ling dang mig rkang dang // sbrang rtsi rnying po dag las ni// srang ni brgyad brgyad gzhug par bya// lde gu 'dis ni snying nad spyan// gzhang 'brum lung dbugs mau pad+me sel// bede kan zhi bdud pa rngub//
197a3(gso rig): shas cher sbyar ba'i dud pas rngub// ldong ros pa bla shing mngar dang // spang spos glo sgang i gu pa'i// shun+de lpags du pa lung 'joms pa'i// tshogs dud pa brngubs nas ni// mchil mang mthar ni bu ram
197a4(gso rig): brnyas// 'o mau 'thungs pa'i dud rngub des// rlung dang bad kan shas che ba'i// lung pa rnying pa 'am myur du sel// pad ken lung pa mun zhugs snyam// gale te mkhris pa rjes 'bral la// dar ni gnas skabs ji
197a5(gso rig): bzhon du// mkhris pa'i lung gso'i sbyor ba byi// rlung ni bad kan 'brel pa la// bad kAn bsal ba'i bye ba bya// mkhris pa dang 'dris rlung bad kan// lung pAr mkhris pa bsal bAr bya// rlung dang bad kan bdag/
197a6(gso rig): nyid skam// gsher las snum dang rtsub chos bya// lung pa bang kan las gyur pa// mkhris par bcas pa khaM bas gso// gle nang 'gram sa la 'phral du ni// rgya skyegs sbrang rtsi'i 'o ma blung // zhu nas sa yu'i
197b1(gso rig): 'bras chan ni// 'o ma khu rar bcas pa bza'// rtsib logs chu son bcas te// mkhris drod shas chung chang sbyar btung // bshang 'khru gla sbrang po da dkar// pa ta dug mo nyung bcas btung // rgya skyegs zhun mar pa
197b2(gso rig): tshol dang // 'tsho byed sde tshwan ka ra dkar// smyig rkang kha ra mnyam 'o mAr// bskol ba me drod tsha la blud// bu r-I mya shing dang pad+ma'i tshigs// pad+ma ge sar tsAn dkar// 'o mar bskol ba sbrang rtsir bca ste// glo
197b3(gso rig): 'grams 'byor par bye phyir blud// nas rjen phyi ni 'o ma ru// btsos te mar dang sbyar ba 'am// kha ri sbrang rtsi 'o ma'i phye// skyo ma rims tshad ldan la blung // lud pa can la sman mngar dang // bskol ba'i zhun mar
197b4(gso rig): blud par bya// yang+ga na pu ram chu bskol bsgrangs// sbrang rtsi na le sham btAb blud// yang nA skyu ru ra'i phye ma// 'o mar bsgrol ba mar btAb blu // yang nA bcud kyi len cho gsa?// pi bi ling yang sbyin par
197b5(gso rig): byAHlung can rus tshigasA gzer ba la// rgyan 'bru shing mA ngar mA du ka/ smyig rkang bA la pi pi ling // zhun marA sbrang rtsir bcas pa sbyin// dri sna gA suma? nI zho rau dang // phyi pi lIng srang phyed khA ra// rgu ni 'brum
197b6(gso rig): 'bra go ma du ka/ srang re zhib tu btags nas ni// sbrang rtsis ril shur sbyar ba yis// ro tsa byed cing khrig mkhris dang // lung pa dau bugs mi bde slon bro// brgyal myos skyigs bu mgo 'khor dang // blo
198a1(gso rig): brdol skad ni 'gags pa dang // mchin pa lus skem rlung 'khyil dang // mchil mar khrag 'byung rtsi ba logs na// snying nang skom dang rims kyang 'joms// baR+sha bu dang kha ra dkar// sA lu
198a2(gso rig): rtsa snar btags pa'i phye// rgun chu'o ma mar du bskol// mchil ma khrag rirI tu 'byung la blud// shing mngar dang ni ma du ka/ tan+du li ya 'or btsos phan// khrag ni gang tshe drag tu 'byung // de bcos pa yi sman
198a3(gso rig): bsten bya// rlung 'khyil ba la raM tshol ni// chang brdos rgyam tshar bcas pa sbyin// skem zhing nyams chung blo 'grams dang // gnyid chung me drod che ba la// 'o ma bskol ba'i spris mar chags// kha ra sbyang rtsi
198a4(gso rig): mAr bcas sbyin// ka ra dkar dang nas dang gro// 'tsho byed zangs rtsi sbrang rtsir bcas// yang na 'o mar bskal te blung // glo 'grams nyams chung ring la sbyin// shA za'i sha yi khu ba ni// mar dang brdos pa'i pi pi
198a5(gso rig): ling // sbrang rtsir bcas pa de la blud// sha dang khrag ni 'phel byed yin// u dum+ba ra n+ya gro d+ha// a shad+tha dang p+la lak+Sha dang // sA la'i shing dang pri yi ku// tra la'i rtse mo 'dzam bu'i shun// pi ya l-i dang shug par
198a6(gso rig): bcas// a shwa kar nar bcas pa ni// 'o mar bskol ba las byung ba'i// mar dang 'bras chan bza' ba ni// blo 'grams khu ba nyams stobs dang // dbang po'i nus bzang la sbyin// rlung mkhris kyis nyen yan lag
198b1(gso rig): zhigs// na la mar nges bskus pa bsngags// rlung nad kyis ni nyen pa la// rlung 'joms sman bskol til mar bsku// 'tsho byed sde tshan zhun mar ni// snying dang rtsib logs na la blung // yang na rlung nad 'joms pa dang // khrag
198b2(gso rig): mkhris sel ba gang yi ni bya// shing mngar nA ga ba la gnyis// 'o ma dang mnyams mar bskol bar// pa ya sa dang pi pi ling // smyig rkang lde gu bskol ba ni// glo 'grams pa yi nang la phan// 'tsho byed sde tshan bca'
198b3(gso rig): sga dang // nye'u shing pA dang rAm nye ba// ba s+phu ba gnyis bA la dang // ga bra'i rtsa ba kha sral khre'u// ri di zur pa ka ma la// staM ga nga ka pa ya s+ya// rtsa be lnga ni chung ngu dang // rgun 'bruM star ga'i 'bras bu sogs// mngar zhing snum
198b4(gso rig): la stobs bskyed pa'i// zho ni gnyis gnyis btags ldi gu// de dang zhun mar bre gang bskol// 'o ma sha ra skyu ru ra// bi da ri dang bu ram shing // khu ba ra sha'i khu bar bcas// bskol te bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi nI// bre phyed khwa
198b5(gso rig): ra srang lha bcu// na le shama? dung su sbrel dang // shing tsha gan+d+ha pa tra dang // nA ga ge sar srang phyed phyed// phye mi ra btags te bcug nas nI// 'ju stobs rjes mthun tshad du blung // 'di ni bdud rtsi'i sman mar te// mi rnams kyi ni
198b6(gso rig): bdud rtsi yin// bdud rtsi 'di ni zos nas su// 'o ma sha khu ldan zos na// khu chu nyams dang glo 'gram sau dang // nyams stobs zad pa'i gso ba yin// bud med la gA lus skem dang // mdog skad nyams la btang bar bya//
199a1(gso rig): lung pa dang ni skyigs bu rims// dbugs mi bde dang lus tsha dang // skom dang khrag mkhris sol byed cing // bu bskyed byed cing glo dang brgya la// mngal nad gcin nad 'joms byed yin// gze ma btsod dang
199a2(gso rig): pu shel tsi// bA la tad+gal pu ti kaM/ pr-istA par+Ni durba'i tsA// thal tre su sti ra pa lak+Sha// de rnams srang re bskol ba yi// 'o ma sman khu'i bzhi 'gyur la// kha sral phre'u dzI ban+ti// me da gnyis dang zongs rtsi ba// dzI ba ka dang nyar
199a3(gso rig): shing pa// ri ngi rgun 'bru sha ka ra// sra ba dang ni pad+ma'i rtsa// mar ni bre gang bskol ba yis// rlung mkhris snying 'dzag gzer nad sel// gcin sri ba dang gcin skra dang // gzhang 'brum lung pa lus skom dang // zad byed
199a4(gso rig): rims ni sel byed cing // gzhu 'dren bud med chang dang lam// khur du ba stobs dang sha zad ba skyed// shing mngar srang brgyad rgun 'bru ni// bre gang bskol bar mar btsos la// pi pi ling srang brgyad lde gu// bre gang bskol
199a5(gso rig): bAr bsgrangs nasau ni// kha ra sbrang rtsi re re zhing // srang brgyad dang ni bsres pa la// nad phye mnyam sbyor zos pa yis// de ni gro 'gromasi zad byed dang // khrag gi skran la phan pa yin// skyu ru dang bi da ri// bu ram shing khu 'tsho
199a6(gso rig): byed cing // sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba mar// ba dang ra yi 'o ma las// bre ni re re btso bar bya// bskol btsags kha ra sbrang rtsi ni// bre re der ni gzhug par bya// de ni zang byed brjed bya da dang // khrag dang mkhris pa lung
199b1(gso rig): pab dang // lus skem pa ni sel byed cing // rgas sra tshe ni ring ba dang // shA dang khu chu stobs skyeng byed// mkhris pa shas che mar lhag bya// rlung shas che bas btung bar bya// bldag pas mkhris pa zhi byed kyi// nyung
199b2(gso rig): pas rlung ni 'joms mi nus// 'thungs na rlung ni gnon byed cing // me drod nang du sdud byar byed// skem zhing lus kyi sha zad pas// sman mir bshad pa 'di dag nyid// smig rkeng 'bras yos pi pi l-ing // phye ma
199b3(gso rig): lde gur byas la sbyin// zhun mar bu rim sbrang rtsi'i cha// bcug ste byin la 'o ma blu // ro tsa brtson dang lus rgyas stobs// 'di yi myur du bskyed par 'gyur// bum sha shun pags sa bon bsal// srang brgya rlungs
199b4(gso rig): per bAc+doMs nas ni// zhun mar bre gang nAd gzhug dkrug/ sbrang rtsi'i mdog 'drar gyur pa dang // hwags ni srang brgya paM pi ling // bca'i sgra zi ra srong gnyis dang // dr-i sna gsum dang 'u su dang // na le sham ni re ri zhing //
199b5(gso rig): srang nI phyed phyed tshang bcug bya// phab ste bsgrangs par gyur pa dang // sbrang rtsi mar gyi phyed bcug la// gzar bur dkrugs te bzhag gyur pa// lung pa skyigs bu yi ga 'chu sa// dbugs mi bde dang khrag mkhris
199b6(gso rig): dang / glo 'groms za byed 'joms par byed// glo 'grams pa ni 'byor byed cing // blo dong dran pa stobs rab bskyed// kun sman ta yi btsud kyis lan// ying du 'ong ba dam pa 'di// tha skar bu gnyis kyis bshad
200a1(gso rig): yin// na ga b+hA lA'i rtsu ba ni// zho gcig sogs kyis bskyed srang gcig/ 'o mar bcas pa zla gcig btung // 'o ma bcad cing zas mi bza'// sbyor 'di tshe ni 'phel byed cing // stobs bskyed kha
200a2(gso rig): dog bzang byed mchog/ man+ta ka par ni shing mngar// bca' sgra'i sbyor ba'ang 'di yin no// nA ga pa la srang brgya ni// chu srang lnga bcu rtsa bcu gnyis// nang du bskol te bzhi cha lus// sman khro de dang cha mnyam pa'o// 'o ma
200a3(gso rig): mar drang bskol bar bya// bA la a ti bA la dang // shing myangar punau rna ba dang // stag tsher ba dang tang pa la dang // pi la ya dang kha sral phri'u// a shA ga n+da khi ra dkar// nyer shing med rnam gnyis dang // gze ma ram nye
200a4(gso rig): pA gnyis dang // pya yaus+yA dung zi ra gnyis// pad+ma'i rtsa ba sdong bu dang // bra go sri ga tA ka dang // kA she ru ka srang phyed phyed// nA ga pa la'i sman mar 'di// khrag mkhris glo brdol zad byed drung // skom dang mgo 'khyer
200a5(gso rig): sel byed cing // stobs ni skyed par byed pa'i mchog/ mdog sdug mdangs bzung tshe 'phel zhing // skra dkar gnyer ma 'jig par byed// zla ba drug gi bar brten na// rgan po'ang gzhon nu nyid du 'gyur// cho ga 'dis
200a6(gso rig): ni drod bskyed cing // me drod bro ba bskyod 'ju byed// gcong chen bshad pa 'ang glo brdol bsngags// 'khru nang gcod par byed pa phan// rtse ba bcu pa kha sral phre'u// shang+ga puSh+pa zur baM dang // ba le ha ti pi pi ling //
200b1(gso rig): a pa marga kru krug tres// ga pra pi pi ling rtsa ga// ma nu srang ni gnyis gnyis dang // nas srang drug cu rtsa bzhi dag/ a ru ra nau srang brgya dag/ chu srang drug brgya bzhi bcus bskol// nas tshos pa dang sman khu de// btsag
200b2(gso rig): la a ru ra brgya de re// bA ram srang brgya bcug la bsgo lnga// mar dang tIl mar pi pi ling // phye ma srang ni brgyad pa dang // bskol tre bsgrangs nas sbrang rtsi rA gzhug/ rtag tu a ru ra gnyis bcas// lde gu bcud
200b3(gso rig): len 'di zlos na// 'di ni sgra dkaR+Sha gnyer ma med// tshe ring mdog stobs 'phel bar byed// lung lta zla byed dbugs mi bde// skyegs bur bcas pa'i mi bzed rims// gcin snyi pra yi nang dang ni// gzhang 'bruM
200b4(gso rig): s+thAn+da dang snying nang dang // tshim pa yi ge 'chus pa sel// bcud kyi len mchog dpal yan can// 'di ni drang srong ri Shis bshod// rtsa bya bcu pa ba la dang // murba ser po rnam gnyis dang // pI pi ling+ga nI rnam
200b5(gso rig): gr-iny+dzis dang // pa tha a sha gan+ta dang // a pyA marga kha sral phro'o// sle tAM sa dan+ti bo da dkar// bi l+la gzhon nu dur byid da // / tsaM tra kartswa lo mar bcas// pa yam+b+ha dang dug mI nyung // srang spos bi dza ka'i sning po/
200b6(gso rig): me tog bcas dang rkang mar nga nga // go bye bi T+wAM ka ta dang // nye'u shing pu ti ka rany+dza// dong ga so ma ra dza dang // sa ha tsau ra shing kru dang // naM pa'i shun lpags bu ram shing // phra mo'i khu ba srang re dang // a ru ra stong tshig
201a1(gso rig): brgya dang // nas srang lci brgya lnga bcu drug/ chu ni brgyud 'gyur nang du bskol// nas tshos pa dang phog nas ni// btsags nAs u ru ra ban+d+ha sA dwer// bu ram rnying pa srung brgya gzhug/ til mar zhun mar skyu ru'i
201a2(gso rig): khuH khre re bcug nas ngo rjes yang // mi chung lnga ni bau tsos nas su// gzar bus chags nas thab las dpag// bsgrangs nas sbrang rtsi bre do dang // phyi pi lding ni phul gang gzhug/ dr-i sna gsum ni phyer btags pa/
201a3(gso rig): srang gsum bcug nas de 'og tu// rdza snang rnying bcug 'bru nang du// bcug ste zla ba gcig bzhag bya// de nas snga me bzhin du bza'// gnas 'jog gis bshad bcud linA ni// sbyin pas yon tan lhag par mye/ nang
201a4(gso rig): myed kyis bza' dgag pa med// dus kun tu yang bsngags pa yin// rgyu mtsha bci'i sku srang re dang // khA ru tshwa nI skang gnyis dang // da tig sneSh+Ta 'bru ar+dz+dza ka/ de dag sbyang ni bzhi ban+ti dang // na le sham gcig go sbyong
201a5(gso rig): gnyis/ 'u su'i 'bras bu srung bzhi dang // tshong 'di la s+yai ni phye mar byas// zas dang skyom lA patab stAM sbyin// dwe ni yi ga 'byed pA dang // me dr-ing ba skyed cing nyams stobs bskyed// rdzib logs na dang dbugs myi bA /
201a6(gso rig): lung pa lu ba'i nang sel byed// 'u su zho gnyis go stong dang // la l-i phud las zho bzhi bzhi// se'u 'bruM dang ni de trig dang // de yi nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur bya// kha ru tshe ni srang gcig dang // bca' sga zho gnyis bil+la'i rkeng //
201b1(gso rig): srang lnga dang ni sbyar ba la// kha ra snang ni bcu drug gzhug/ ro drug pa 'di bza' ba dang // btung ba snga ma bzhin du sbyin// gcod chen la bshad cho ga gang // gnas skabs ji bzhin glo brdol phan// glo brdol nang ni byang
201b2(gso rig): gyur nas// bad kan skyes nas mgo bo brang // na ba'i lud pa can gang yin// de la dud pa 'di rngub bya// mye da gnyis dong ba la gnyis// shing mngar gso ma'i shun lpags ni// lde gur byas la reng bur ni// byas te dud pa/
201b3(gso rig): rngub par bya// de rjes 'tsho byed sman mar btung // ldong ros dang ni ba la sha/ a thA gan+d+ha tsu wau dang // d+yong grwa las kyang de bzhin bya// de rjes kha ra bu ram dang // bu ram shing khu btu ba r-i blung // ldong ros dang nI n+ya gro d+hA'i/
201b4(gso rig): myu gu rlon pa cha mnyam btags// zhun mar dang sbyar dud pa rngub// de 'og sreg pa'i shu khu btung // glo brdol las byung lud pA la// thog mar stobs dang me drod bskyed// nad grazhi mang l-i snume bcas pa'i// bkri sman/
201b5(gso rig): 'jam po btang bar bya// dong ga dang ni dur+ya bying gnyis// rgun 'bri chu dang sbyar ba dang // sneng phyo bskol ba'i khu bA dang / bi da ra yi khu bA ra sbyar// zhun mar la btsos tso rigas+ya sbyin// lus zad pa la sbyar bar bya// mkhris
201b6(gso rig): pa bad kan lus zungs rnams// zang po'i zang byed lud pa can// maR+ShI dang karka ta sring gi/ 'a ma pa la gnyis bskol blud// bi da ri 'o ma ka tam+ba// ta la'i 'bras bu bskol ba yi// mar dang 'o mau gcin nad ni//
202a1(gso rig): mdog 'gyur sgribad+ma d+ha la b+hUng // 'o mtshan+da rgyu ba dang sgra sgo dang // brlang blug ma g+hA to sgyu sa shrId m+b+ha// myur gyi nyid khu yang ba'am// la mar bsres pa'i 'dusaN+Di ga g+ha// smyas sdug rgyag
202a2(gso rig): shA dang ni// be'u sogs dang ni khung na gnas// de bzhin mthu rtsal gyis zas tshol/ za'i sha yang rims bzhin sbyin+ti// dro bus pad kan 'jig byed la// rtsa sbubs rnams ni dag byed ci dru// dwangs mi legs bA rgya
202a3(gso rig): byed pas// lus ni rgyas par byed par 'gyur// dbyi mod par gyi 'bras bu gsum// rtsa ba bcu dang tsi tra kA/ rgya sran pi pi ling rtsa ba// pa ta n+ya shug+ho nas tshur ba skol// li dong gr-i dang pi rne ra be// zur pa ma nu pri
202a4(gso rig): ling// karka ta yi sring gi btags// mnyam pa'i zhun mar dgra dang bskol// bskol pa 'dir ni shA r+ya gnyis// lAn tsha lU ni bAtAgs te gzhug/ de las rin pAR+ShA 'thungs nas ni// zad byed lud pas nyen po selA/
202a5(gso rig): ka sa mar dang a ru rA// g+ha sgrud pa ta ka pA la// ding gru pi pi ling ting pa la// pu tse shel tshad zho gnyis gnyis// me r+yA nI br-i gAng 'o ma dang // rgun chu bre bzhi'i n+yA dI du bskol// zad pyod rims drang mchin pa'i nad//
202a6(gso rig): lung pa kun sel dge ba yo na// kaN+Da kA ri ba sha ka/ sle tres rtsa ba 'bras bu dang // myu gu lo mar btsas pa rnams// bskol ba'i khu ba mar du be tsi so// lud pa'i rims kyis btabo pa dang // yi ga 'chus pa'i
202b1(gso rig): nad rnams stsol// se 'bru'i khya ba nyis 'gyur ram// tshwa gsum ldan par bskol ba'ang phan// yA bak+Sha ra mar dang sbyar// zas zos pa yi 'og tu blung // pI pi ling dang bu ram bskol// ra yi 'o mA mar bcus
202b2(gso rig): phyan// 'di ni me drod sbyar phyir te// zang byed lung can gyis mer btung // nad kyis 'gags pa'i ming pa br-ing // rtswa sbubs rnams nu dag par byed// na sa ni bre gang btsos pa ru// rnam par rgyal ba nyi shu btsos// /
202b3(gso rig): tshos nas de byung mnyes nas der// bu ramo rnying pa srang drug dang // piM pi lIng ni srang gnyis dang // ldong rlos zho ni skyur khan dang // zho gcig tshod ni bcug nas ni// slar yang bskol ba'i lde gu de// lung pA dbugs
202b4(gso rig): mi bde sel byed// reg 'jam sgro rtsa bsregs nas ni// mar dang sbrang rtsi kha rar sbyar// yang na rma bya'i rkang pa bsregs// mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba yi// lde gu zo si na lung pa dang // dbugaseM mi bde ba sel
202b5(gso rig): bar byed// e r-iN+Da'i lo thal bA ni// til mar tshwa gsum bu ram btsas// lde gu 'am be'u rug A roN+Da'i// lo ma'i thal pa de bzhin bya// tsha ba gsum gyi phye mA ni// bu ram rnying pa mararA sbyar phan/ shug pA tsha

203a1(gso rig): mA ra dang sbrang rtsi kha rar bcas// a ru ra dang bca'u sgra ni// bu ram dang ni bcas pa yi// rnyil bu khar ni bzhag gyur nu// lud pa dbugs mi bde kun sel// yang na ba ru ra 'ba' zhig/ lung
203a2(gso rig): pa sel bar byed pa yin// seng phrom a mra kha ra dang // bcas pa'i lde gu mar dang brdos// thug pa zan dron nang du gdab// slon bro skom dang lung pa dang // ma zhu tshod 'khru sel bar byed// kaN+Da ri khu bar

203a4(gso rig): pa'i shra khu ni// zad byed lud pa can la sbyin// g+ho brdol gyis dung rngub la gang // btung bar bcas pa bstan pa yang // zad byed lud par de btang bya// gang yang gcodang chen skabaskye bshad// stobs bskyed me
203a5(gso rig): drod bskyed pa dang // rtsa rgyun stong bar byed pa'i smyan// rnam grangs zud byed lung can la// stobs bskyed thams cad bsngags pa yin// gang+ga phyir 'dus pa lhas byung ba'i// zad byed lud pa mi bzad pos/
203a6(gso rig): de phyir nong stobs rje bozhin du// 'dus pa'i nang la phan pas gso// yin lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// gso ba'i gnas kyi lo'u gsum pa'o// / de nas skyigs bu dang
203b1(gso rig): dbugs mi bde ba gso ba'i le'u bshang par bya'o// gang phyir skyigs bu dbugs ma bde// rgyu mtshungs sogs pas de yi phyir// gso ba 'dra gcig ste des nyes la// thog mar dugs kyis nyer dpyad
203b2(gso rig): bya// snum dang lan tshwa til mur byug/ de yis bad kan bu gar 'gags// shin tu zhen pa zhu nas ni// khyod paR+Ya gnas pau legs par 'byin// bu ga'i rgyun srang mnyen gyur cing // rlung ni lugs dang

204a1(gso rig): 'khyil zhing 'phel ba ltar// de bzhin rlung ni 'khyil gyur pa'i// de lam legs par stu dra bar bya// sbyang ba byas kyang ma dag pa'i// zhen pa'i dri ma du bas bsal// yung ba'i
204a2(gso rig): lo ma e raN+Da'i// rtsa ba rgya skyegs ldong ros dang // thang shing ba la spring spo so btse sA// btags te rung bu nyid du bya// de ni ma ro bsgos du daM pa rngub// yang na mar sbrus nas bsreg rngubs// spra tshi la sra tsi pog/

204b2(gso rig): ngag gi so+o gu so// ku lad+b+ha dang rtsa ba btsu// bskol ba'i skams sa'i shaM khu phun// shing kru brta ka dang ni// ka s+yai mar dwang ba sha ka/ la phug lo mo'i khu ba dang // nim+bA'i myu gu las byung dang // kha lung tsi bri ha tI ku pan//

205a1(gso rig): tsha ba gsum// sbyar bu kha lung sbyar ba sbyin// skyigs bu dbugs mi bde skom dang // rtsa ba bcu bskol khu ba 'am// yang na thang shing bskol khu ba// chang gi dngas ma blud par bya// pi pi ling dang

206a5(gso rig): gnyis dang // dzI bin+d+ha dang brIl+lI'i rlung // shru dag thal bu'i lho mI rnams// de dag zho ni gnyis gnyis bskol// shIng kun zho phyed mar bre glang // bskol ba di nI 'thungs gyur na// ting lag la ni zhon pa'i
206a6(gso rig): rlung / gzhang 'brum dang ni pho ba'i nad// skyigs bu snying nad rtsib logs zug/ myur du sel bar byed pa yin// zhun mar tshe phyed bcas pa yi// ya bak+ShaM ra rgyam tshe sbyin// thang la 'bar gyi 'am dug gi mar//
206b1(gso rig): ko can hA bu sha'i mad+ma byung // chu glung glo bur thug pa dang // sngangs dang sngags drung 'jigs pa dang // dga' dang phyag dog dbugs bsdams dang // gnod pa'i 'bu yis sos btab dang // gang yang bad kan
206b2(gso rig): rlung 'joms sman// dro zhi dA rlung nI bad+hi r+g+ha bat+te ni// gang yang pAl+la che rI rlung gi nang+ga// lhag par 'joms pU r+ya bying pas sbyang // thams cad la nI brda byas pas+ya// tsha bas chung gso bar sla ba yin// lhag par
206b3(gso rig): nyams smad pa yis rnaM// zhi ba'i thu bas su 'gyur ma yin// de bas zhi ba rti ba'i thabs// dang po de lo sprad par bya// lung ba dbugs mi bde gcod smon// skyigs bu'i smanA ni phan tshun 'dre// yan lag
206b4(gso rig): brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bzhi pa'o// / de nus gcod chen po gso ba'i thabs kyi le'u bshad par bya'o// stobs ldan nung ni mang gyur la// snam chos
206b5(gso rig): dugs byas sbyang ba ni// snum med ma yin nyams skrod min// steng 'og gi nI sbyang bar bya// Do mya po son char bcas pa 'am// sha khu mang rA dang ldan pa yis// zhun marA btab pa'i nas thug ni// skyug smin bskol
206b6(gso rig): bas slon du gzhug/ sha mi dur byid dong gar bcas// kha ra sbrang rtsi mar dang ni// bcas pa'i 'o ma 'am skyo ma 'am// chun 'bru taM pa la bi da ri// yang na sha khur ldan pa yis// bkru sman 'jam po btang bar bya// lto
207a1(gso rig): sbyangs pa la d+hU ba dang // drong bskyed cho ga spyad par bya// zas skom yi gar 'ong ba dang // rlung 'joms byed cing yang ba sbyin// sa lu drug cu pa dang gro// nas dang mung+ga lo gcig lon// rA yA
207a2(gso rig): ma mar dang sh+tsa/ sha zo'i sha ni za byed 'joms// byo rog 'ug pa sbyang ki gzig/ ba lang rta dang ne le sbrul// bya rgod rnga mau bong bu khra'i// sha ni rgyu yis byin na pan// shes na de las spyod pas na// skon zhing
207a3(gso rig): mdangs dang stobs mi 'gyur// bad+mo mkhris ri dgas la sogs shau/ rlung la mthu rdul gzan rgol sha/ chog glur sbyar zhing phan pa dang // shi bu sogos la'ang sbyar bar bya// yungs mar dug+ha dang bsngos pa
207a4(gso rig): 'am// yang naM ci rigs mar dang rno// khu bar ldan zhing mnyen la snum/ spong la sogs dang legs g.yos sbyin// de bzhin la phug rgyu sran las// g.yos pa'i yu shor sbyar bar bya// bi pi ling bcas
207a5(gso rig): nas dang bcas// rgyu sran bcas shing dong grwar bye cas// sde'u 'bru spyi rur dang bcas// 2 sha'i khu ba snum can blung // des ni cham pa la sogs pa// gnod pa drug ni sel bar 'gyur// mkhris pa sogs las
207a6(gso rig): khyad par du// chang rnying rtsa sbubs skyong byed pa// ngoms pa nyid du blud par bya// rgun chang chang rnying chang dibs blud// rtsa ba chung ngu lngar bskol ba 'am// ta ma la ke chur bskol ba 'am// pa ran bzhi dang bskol ba
207b1(gso rig): 'am// lu su bca' skar bskol ba blud// de l+ya kha zas gtsang ba dag/ 'bad pas btsos pas rjes mthun yin// rtsa ba bcu dang 'o ma 'am// sha khu'i nang du btsos par bya// ba la btab pa'i mur sbyar
207b2(gso rig): ba lAm/ sha za'i sha khur btsas pA sbyin// 'o ma bcu 'gyur dwagu dang ni// mar bskol sbrang rtsir bcas pa'ang phan// dzI ban+ti de shing mngaR+Sha dang // rgun 'bruM dug mo nyung 'bras bu// ma nu zuR+Sha pU pI pi ling //
207b3(gso rig): bya gri gze ma ba la dang // ta ma la ki ut+pal sngo// khyi lci ba dang byi tsher gA/ lde gur byas dang mar bskol ba// gcong chen sel ba'i dam pa yin// byA go rguni 'brum ma du ka/ pa ru sha dang pi pi ling // mar
207b4(gso rig): dang bskol bas skad 'gagras dang // lung pa dbugs mI bde rims 'joms// rtsa bcu 'o mar bskol ba las// byung ba'i myur saR+Sha gang yin de// pi pi ling dang sbrang rtsir bcas// skad 'gugs sel ba'i
207b5(gso rig): dam pa yin// mgo byang rtsib lcogs gzer 'joms shing // lung bya dbugs mi bde rims sel// rtsa ba lnga pa lngar bskol bya'i// 'o ma las byung mar gang yin// rtsa ba l+yA pu wA yi ni// khu ba 'o ma'i
207b6(gso rig): bzhi 'gyur la// bskol ba yi ni mar 'di yis// zad byed kyi ni stobs bdun 'joms// ya bak+Sha ra tsha ba lnga// sreng drug dang ni btsos pa'i mar// bre gang 'o ma cha mnyam byas// de yis bu ga ngag byed cing //
208a1(gso rig): snyun dang dmu rdzing mcher pa dang // pho nung skya rbab cham pa dang // lung pa dbugs mi bde drod nyams// skrangs dang stod kyi rlung nang 'joms// ra sna pA la gze ma dang // stir byAR+sha bu yi chur/
208a2(gso rig): dz+r-IM ban+ti dang pi pi lcing // 'o bcus gcong chen 'joms pa'i mchog/ a shwA gan+d+ha 'o mar bskol// las byung mar 'o kha rar bcas// s+thi yi d+h+r-ig ni srang brgya dag/ chu blo sum cu gnyis nang bskol// de yi brgyud
208a3(gso rig): tshwa lus pa ru// 'tsho byad bcu ni srang re gzhug/ zhun mar bre gang bcas bskol ba kaM/ sha yi smin mar 'di blud pa 'am// shA khu dang sbyor ci rigs sbyin// rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur nang // lung pa dbugs
208a4(gso rig): mi bad+ma skad 'gagaso// skom snying rtsib logs zug pa 'joms// sug spel ti mu sa 'bras gsum// sa nag che ba gsum tsi tA// sa ro nim+ma seng lde d+l-i dang // se le'i 'bras bu las byung dang // go bye dang ni bi TI kA/
208a5(gso rig): srang nI brgyad brgyad tshad du byas// chu ni bcu drug 'gyur byas pas bcu drug tshar gnas bar du bskol// slar yang de dang mar bri gang // bskol ba 'dir ni cu gang nI// srang drug khA ra sgreng gsum bcug/ sbrang rtsi
208a6(gso rig): srang ni drug cu gzhug/ dri sna gsum ni srang re gzhug/ gzar bus dkrugs te lde gur byas// snga dro zos la 'o ma btung // bcud len gdams pa med pa yin// yid gzhungs mig rno tshe ring la// drod bskyed
208b1(gso rig): spyan dang gcong chen nang // sgyu rbab dang ni mtshan mar brdol// myur du 'joms par byed pa yin// gang yang zhun mar bu ram bcas// glo brdol la bshad zad byed sbyar// shing tshwa sug smel pI pi ling // cu gang kha ra
208b2(gso rig): rims gnyis 'gyur// phye mar byas bza' 'am sbrang rtsi dang // mar dang sbyar ti lde gur zos// skang 'gags lud pa dbugs mi bde// zad byed rtsib logs bad kan 'joms// 'di yi skad 'gags la khyad par
208b3(gso rig): sna sman dud pa rngub sogasau bya// dau 'ang rlung las gyur pa la// ka sa mAr dang brta ka/ br-i ga ra dzu'i khu ba mar// bskol ba 'am arda ga la bskol// dro 'am zos rjes la blud na// lud pa lu dang skang 'gags sol//
208b4(gso rig): rgya shug lo ma'i lde gu ni// maur brngos rgyam tshwarar+ya bcas pa 'am// shing mngar dang nI pi pi linga?// pi T+wAM ka dang rgyun 'bru dang // ha na s+ya bAr+Ni rtsu ba rnams// til mar bskol ba stAr blugs bya// 'bras chan mar+Ya dang bu
208b5(gso rig): ram btsas// zos la de rjes chu tshan btung // 'o thug+sa snum can blud pa dang // snum gyi dugs kyi cho ga skyed// ma khri sU pA lisA gyur 'o ma'i shring // lde gu bskol ba'i zhun ma r+ya ni// sbrang rtsir bcas te de rjes ni// 'o mi
208b6(gso rig): bskol te bsgrangs pa blud// shing mngar ma du ka yi thug/ zhun mar bcas pa blud pa 'am// ba la dri bzang bi da ri// shing mngar k+Sha ti bi da ri// rgyam tshar bcas pa bskol ba'i ma ra// skad 'gags sna sman
209a1(gso rig): bla med yin// pra puN+Da rI kA shing mngar// pi pi ling dang 'bri ha ti// ba la 'o ma ma ra bskol te// skad 'gags pa yi sna sman mchog/ mngar ba'i sde tshan phye ma ni// sbrang rtsi mAr sbyar lde gu sbyin//
209a2(gso rig): bang kan las gyur tsha ba dang // zas rtsub baM gcin blud par bya// kat+sa lu dung skyu ru ra// tsha gsum til mar sbrang rtsir sbyar// ya bak+Sha ra tsha ba gsum// ku krug tres dang dbyi mo dang // a ru ra dang sbrang rtsir sbyor// nes thug
209a3(gso rig): til mar zhun mar dang // byi pi ling dang skyu rur sbyar// btsa'o sgra dang ni pi bi lcong // bza' ba 'am skyug sman rnon po bsten+da// shA khi ra dang sbrang rtsir ba sresi// mngar ba'i sman dang lhan cig bskol// 'o mo 'thungs pas
209a4(gso rig): skad gsang ni// chen po slu bas 'gregs na do sel// yi ge 'chus la sna tshogs zas// phan po'i sman+da dang skyur ba sbyin// phyi dang nang ni sbyang ba dang // sems dga' yid dang mthun sman sbyin// dus gnyis su ni so
209a5(gso rig): shIng dgra/ bca' zhing kha ni sbyang bya zhing // bskabs kha ni bkru bA dang // rje su mthun pa'i dud pa rngub// da lis kyi ni ril bu dang // kha ra ga pu r-i bcas pa sbyin// 'bras bu zla ba'i zer lhur dkar// bza' ba yi ga 'byed
209a6(gso rig): pa'i mchog/ de las rlung 'gyur yau ga 'chus// ha re nu dang pi pi ling // bi T+wAM ga dang ra sna dang // rgyam tsha dang ni dong gra dang // sug smel ga bra'i rtsa ba dang // nas tshigs 'khus pa'i thal ba ni// shing kun bcaso pa
209b1(gso rig): mar ram ni// chang gi dwangs mar sbyar te btung // shu dag chus ni skyon du gzhugs/ mkhris gyur bu ram chus smon gzhug/ kha ra dang ni zhun mar ram// rgya mcha sbrang rdzir bcas pa sbyin// bad kan ni mA'i chus smon gzhug/
209b2(gso rig): lA la phung dang dong ka'i chu// sbrang rtsi 'am ched rnying ni stur gai/ bu mir spring rtsi'i chang bcas b+h+ring // ha re n+ya sogs phye ma ni// sngar be shang chu tshun sbyar ba thung // sug sbrel dang ni shing tshe dang // nA ga puSh+TA na le shama?/
209b3(gso rig): ling dang bca' sga rnams// rims bzhin chu res bsgreng phye ma// kha ra dag dang mnyam sbyar bas// mchil mang yi ga 'chus pa dang // snying dang rtsib logs na lud pa// dbugs mi bde dang mgul nad 'joms//
209b4(gso rig): la la phung dang da trig dang // sbyar bu bca' sgra se'u 'bru dang // rgya shug zho ni gnyis gnyis byas// kha ra srang bzhi'u su dang // go stong shing tsha kha ru tsha// zho re pi pi lcing 'bru brgya// na le sham nI nyi brgya dgra/ phyer
209b5(gso rig): bAtag sU yi ga 'byed pa'i mtshog/ yid 'ong phyi sa 'gags pA drung // lung pa snying gau rtsi bA logs na// mtshor pa gzhang 'brum phro nad sil// bal bu'i lo ma na lai sham// drong kra dang nI pi pau ling // g+ho
209b6(gso rig): rim bzhin du cha resau bskyed// shing tsha sug smel dang po'i phyed// pi pi ling gi brgyad 'gyur gyi// kha rar sbyar ba'i phye ma de// drong bsgying yi ga 'byed pa dang // lung pa lu dang dbugs mi bde// yi ga 'chus dang slon bro/
210a1(gso rig): dang // mcher ba snying nang rtsib logs zug/ sgyu rbab tshad 'khru rims nad 'joms// rlung 'khyil ba ni byede rgyu byed// sug+na sbrel shing tsha pU shel tse// zho ni gnyis gnyis byas pa dang // nA gA
210a2(gso rig): ge sar srang phye dang // gan+d+ha pa tra srang phyed gzhug/ phye btags b+ho ram rnying pa ni// srang ni ny+tsi shu lA ni bskol// sbrus te zho ga ny+tsaus tshad ril bu// byas pa'i yon de dang mnyam// Arga sle tr-i sA rak+Sha chu ru//
210a3(gso rig): nas dang nub gocig spangs nas// / chu dang zan ni sbrus nas su// byin te nyams stobs ldan slo n+ya gzhug/ de bzhin skam sa'i srog chags sha/ bsregs paM tshwa dang khar sbyar sbyin// zas ni skam zhing rab
210a4(gso rig): yang dang // tsA na ka sogs kha blung // bad kun gyi rib mchil ma mang // rlung gis mchil ma skyod par byed// de ni bad+ma kan mchil mar bshad// snum dang dro bas de bsal byaM// rims 'di cham pa dag dang
210a5(gso rig): ni// smon pa'i nang la bar bya// mchog tu tshwa ma pUr bskya ba dang // snum dang dwags kyi cho ga bsten// mgo dang lkog ma rtsi logasu// 'bras khur stim bcas dugs bya zhing // lAn tshwa sbyar dang khyA dang tsha//
210a6(gso rig): sha khu snum dang bcas sbyin// mgo bo snying gi rtsib logs gzer// ning gzhi ji bzhin gso ba dbyed// chu dang rlan can gnas pa'i sha/ legs sbyar dkri ba'i dugs byo zhing // de ni snum bzhi'i sbyor ba bsngag
210b1(gso rig): nad gzhi'i 'dres par gyur pa la// rgya spos shing mngar shi ta dang // tsAn mar gyi lde gus byug/ ba la rA sna til mAR+Sha dang // shing mngar ut+pal mar de bzhin// byA s+phu ba dang shing tru dang // bA la rA ma nye bi da ri//
210b2(gso rig): sna sman dud pa rngub pa dang // zas zos 'og tu snum bsten cing // til mer gyis ni bsku ba dang // de bzhin 'jam rtsi'i las rab bsngags// yang na rngabs rA la sogs pas// nad dmigs ji bzhin nad khrag
210b3(gso rig): dbyung // shug pi tsAn pu shel tse// mar btsasi lde gu bsku ba 'am// duR+Ya shing mang re btsod dang ni// nA ga ge sar mar sbyar bsku// n+ya gro d+ha sogs bskol til mar// ldan brgya bskus pa'i mar gyis ni// bsku ba
210b4(gso rig): 'am 'od ma shing mngar chus// byugs mar gyur pa'ang bsdigs pa yin// phal cher me drod nyams pa'i phyir// ma zhu bre stobs bcas 'khru na// de la pho ba'i tshad 'khru ba'i// skabasu bshad pa'i sman bsten pa ni//
210b5(gso rig): zad byed ldan pa'i bshang ba ni// rnam pa kun tu bsrang bya ste// de yi lus zungs kun zad pas// de stobasaso bshang ba'i stobs kyis gnas// rigs pas sha rnams kho na sbyin// sgrom du rgun chad blud par bya//
210b6(gso rig): shugs ni bkag par gyur pa yis// gcong chen gyi so ni glags mi thod// chang dang chang dngas rgun chang dang // chang rnying bu ram sbrang chang dang // ci rigs par ni blud pa dang / sha ni sbyin po nyid du bya// bu go'i rgyun
211a1(gso rig): 'gags dag phyir dang // stobs dang mdangs ni rgyas byu'i phyi // snum dang 'o ma chus gang ba'i// snod du lus ni bcing bar bya// phyung nas bsres pas sbrum gyis ni// bsku zhing lag pas bde
211a2(gso rig): dUr mAny+tsa// bde bar 'dug par gyur po la// ngal gyis lde gu dril bar bya// dzi bon+ti ti dang durba dang // be tse da dang A shwa gan+d+ha dang // e pa ma dgo' bo s+phu be// a g+ni na ti'i shing mngar dang // ba la yungs kar
211a3(gso rig): bi da ri// ru rta 'bras dang zar me dang // mon sran dre'u til dang phya bA so// thams cad gcig tu btags nas ni// nasA kyi phye ni sum 'gyur dang // zho dang sbrang rtsi lhan cig sbyar// 'di dag gis ni dril phyis

211b1(gso rig): par bya'o// smon nad phal cher ma zhu ba'i// gnas 'khrugs las byung de yi phyir// rlung ma gtogs la dang por ni// sbyang byas skyug sman btang ba phan// stobs ldan rgyun du slon gyur cing // nad mang gyur la btang
211b2(gso rig): bar blo// de 'og rim+ba gyis bkru sman ni// yId 'ong chang rgun chu sogs sam// 'o mas btang gyur de mod las// gyen 'byung nad ni thur du 'byung // zhi ba'i sman ni rtsub po ste// nyams chung ba'ang de nyid bya//
