211b4(gso rig): tshogs dang // 'bras bu khrus dang mnye ba dang // dri zhim 'bras bu me tog skyes// zla sa dngape skom la spyod pa dang // zos ma thag tu 'phral du ni// chu grang gis ni gdong bkru bya// rlung las gyur pa'i smin pa'i nad//
211b5(gso rig): rgyam tsha mar bcas dro bA 'am// tsha gsum ldan tshwa gsum sbyar bas// lud po dang ni snying 'dzag dang // btsas pa sel bar byed pa yon// se 'bru'i khu ba bca' sga dang // 'u su zho dang mer bskol ba 'am// chu dang 'o ma
211b6(gso rig): cha mnyam pa// khron gyi zas tshol sha khu ni// 'bras sgyur rgyamatsha mar shas che// kha zas snum po bca' sga dang // zho dang so'u 'brur sbyar ba 'am// rgyam tshar bcas pa dro 'jam phan// 'dir ni bkru sman lan tshwa dang
212a1(gso rig): snum dang dro bar bcas pa phan// mkhris pa las gyur bkru skrun phyir// rgyun chu bu ram shing kun dang // dur bying sbyar ba'i bkru sman btang // zhun mar seng phrom sbyar ba btang // 'phel te pad+ma kan
212a2(gso rig): khyab pa yi// mkhris pa mngar dang kha ba yis// gyen du drangs la dag gyur nas// 'bras yis khaM ra bcas pa las// sgyu ma 'am nas thug blud par bya// sa lU drug cu pa yi tshon// skum sa'i sha khu mud+b+ha'i khu//
212a3(gso rig): sa phrag bsregs te chu nang gsur// shin tu bsgrangs pa'i chu blud pa 'am// mud+ba 'u su pu shel tse// pi pi ling dung nub gaucig spangs// yang ni rgun tshu buM ram shaung // sle tres chu mang 'o ma blud// 'dzam bu a
212a4(gso rig): mra'i lo ma dang // u shi ra n+ya gro d+hA'i myu gu/ bskol te bsgrangs bi sbrang rtsi ni// bAta bA sne thung na smon pa dang // ram+ba sa dang tshad 'khru brgyal ba dang // skem dang che ba mi bzang se la// skyu ru ra'i khu tsAn+d+ra bcas/
212a5(gso rig): mud+YA bA la'i chu blud phanra// rgya shug tshig gu kha rA dang // 'bras yos pra tshol pi pi ling // dngul rdo 'amya sbrang rtsi 'am a ru ra// rgun 'bru mama? rgya shug dang sbyar phan// bda? ka nA las gyur nim+b+ha dang //
212a6(gso rig): po pi ling dang po son cha// yungs kar chu dron gyis slon bya// nyams chung ba la sbyang ba bya// dong ga le sogs khu ba bskol// bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsir bcas pa blud// nas kyi skyo ma smon 'joms pa'i// sman ma
212b1(gso rig): dang ni sbyar ba blung // bad kan 'joms zas yi gar 'ong // btung ba zin thig pu srin// ldong ros dang ni pi pi ling // na lde sham nI skyur rtsi che// ka bi da tra yi khu ba dang // sbrang rtsir bcas pa smon nang sel// ka pit+ta dang
212b2(gso rig): tshwatshab gsum// byi tshe ra sbrang rtsir sbyar ba sbyin// mthun pa'i spyod pa byas pa yos// mi sdug yul mthong las byung sel// sr-i na bu las byung sprin bu yi// snyun du bshad pa rnams kyi gso// lhag ma nad dmigs
212b3(gso rig): ji bzhin du// de zhi 'gyur ba'i nad kyi ga so// smon pa'i skabasu rlung gi nad rnams ni// lus zungs zad pa nges po rA lhung 'gyur te// de bas 'dir ni skyug sman sbyor dregs pa'i// skabs bshang bcung dang rta ba'i tshe
212b4(gso rig): ga bya// bu ram zhun mar sha khu dge ba che// tsha ba gsum dang 'chi byed sman mar dang // 'o thug dang ni phan pa'i lde gu yis// rgyun du smyon pa zhi ba nyid du bya// snying nad rlung 'gyur til mar ni// skyur rtsabs
212b5(gso rig): dngar bi zho kha chu// ldan pa tsha can dro 'jam blud// do nr-i lto spos skyon kyang 'joms// til mar lan tshwar bcas dang skyer ba gcin// bskol ba'ang de dang mtshungs// biny+dza ra sI rgyu shug nas// thang ro shing dang ni ba
212b6(gso rig): spu ba// rgya sran rtse ba lnga pa rnams// bskol ba'i chu dang til mar ni// bskol ba de ni snar btang dang // btung dang 'jam rtsi ra btang bar bya// bca' sga rgyam tsha bye'u rug pa// sla tres shing kun ma nu dang // a ru ra dang mar
213a1(gso rig): bskol ba// snying nad rtsib logs gzer skran 'joms// kha ru tshwa ni srang gnyis dang // a ru ra ni lnga bcu dang // zhun mar bre gang bskol rtsib logs// sgying nad skran dbugus mi bde sel// se
213a2(gso rig): 'bru bca' sga kha ru tsha// shing kun star bu phye mar sbyar// rlung ned gzhan dbang can snying nad// dbugs mi bde ba sel mchog yin// ma nu zur ba bca' sgra dang // skyur rtsi che N+ya a ru rI// lde gu ya bkrA ra dang //
213a3(gso rig): mdor skyur lan tshwa ldan pa 'thungs// bcad snyom sems pa'i gzer 'joms byed// rgyam tshal la phung sha ra// shu drag go snyod bcu' sgra dang // thang shing skyur rtsi chen po dang // zur ba mye nu pa lak+Sha// bskol khu
213a4(gso rig): 'jam 'thungs yon tan mtshungs// tshwa lnga zur bA a ru ra// bu ramA ma nu sbyor rtsi tshe// chang btags lde gu ma re til mar// brngos te rgyam tshar ldan 'a thungs na// snying nad rtsi ba logs mo mtshan zug/
213a5(gso rig): sman dang dmu rdzing nad rnams sel// 'di la snum gyis dugs phan zhing // smr-i na mar gyi ni sbyar ba phan// skol la rtsu ba chung ngu lnga 'am// bca' sgra da ni bskol ba'i chu 'am// chang gi dngas ma zho kha chu// 'bras
213a6(gso rig): khyu'i rang sbyar blud par bya// bya rmyang rengs gzer ma zhur bcas// snying la rlung gis gnod 'gyur la// bya ba 'di bya snying 'jig cing // 'phar dang gcin snyi bcas pa la// sreg pa khrung khrung rma bya dang // tso ga khyim
213b1(gso rig): bya snum ma phan// snying nad bcas la ba lA'i mar// yang na spyi de bya'i mar blud // shing mngar lan+da brgya bcas pa 'am// de bzhin snum chen mchog tu phan// ra sna 'tsho b+hed dzI baM ti// ba lA bya kri ba spu ba// ga bra'i rtswa
213b2(gso rig): ba sti ra dang // shu dag tsha ba gsum dang ni// snum chen zhes bya bskol bar bya// zho ni bzhi cha de bzhin sbyar// ji snyed pa las sbyar ba bsten// tshim byed rtas byed stobs bskyed cing // rlung gi snying nang 'joms pa yin//
213b3(gso rig): snying na drod che 'bar ba dang // rlung las gyur pa'i snying nad la// 'o ma zho dang bu ram mar// chu dang rlan can shwa dag phan// 'di ma gtogs pa'i snying gi nad// bzhi po dag la spring bar bya// rlung can rengs dang /
213b4(gso rig): be snabs can// tshoR+Sha med lhag+h+r-i ma rnams la 'ang steng // bAd kan 'dres gyur de la ni// rtsub drod bshung pa'i byA ba byA// mkhris gyur rgun chu bu ram chu// kha ra sbrang rtsi ba ru sha/ ldan pa'i bkru sman yid 'ong
213b5(gso rig): bas// sbyangs la mkhris sel rim pa bya// glo brdol rims kyis mkhris slebs bA shang/ kyai phyi nang gi ni spyang po bya// pu tse sholA deng shi d+ha mengar btags// kha ra ra bcas pa'i chu blug ba// rA snA kha ra rgun 'dru
213b6(gso rig): dang / 'tsho byed ut+pal zangs rtsi ba// bo la bre go ra mnye ba// me da gnyis dang ma he'i mar// 'o mor bcas po bskol ba nau// mkhris gyur snying nad sel byed yin// shing mngar pra put+ti ri pad+mo'i rtsa ba kai shai ru
214a1(gso rig): bca' ska ba lar bcas de dang // 'o mar bcas dang bca' sgra bskol// bsnyungs byar sbrang rtsi btab pa dang // mngar ba'i sde tshan bsdus pa'ang bsngags// til mar shing mngar bcas bskol zhing //
214a2(gso rig): nga rtsi btab pa'i 'jam rtsi 'ang phan// bad kan las gyur dugs byas la// nim+mA shu dag chu yis slon// chu sran khu ba rgyam tsha'i chu// chang rno blud cing nas zan sbyin// shu dag shing kun lan tshwa gnyis// dong gra sug/
214a3(gso rig): smel la la pud// nas tshig 'khus thal pi pi ling // phyi maM dro 'ojam chu blug pa 'am// 'bras bu'i chu 'om rAng sbyar ram// rgya sran pa gtson chang rnying blud// mau nu bca' sga a ru ra// zur bA ra snA pi pi ling / shu dag
214a4(gso rig): bskol te blud pa 'am// de bzhin bca' sgra a ru ra// bo nga dkar po yung bu dang // kat+tA la yi bskol ba 'am// ro hi ta ka a shwang+ga// seng lteng u dum+bA ra dang // ardzu na dang pa lak+Sha/ n+ya gro d+ha bskol che ba gsum// dur byung
214a5(gso rig): phye mar bA tsa se lde gu// zlos te chu tshan rjes 'thungs na// byAd kan snying nad sel byed yin// bad kan skran skabs bshad mar dang // k+ShA ra sna tshogaso blud par bya// yang na brag zhun bcud len dang // tshangs pa'i bcud len
214a6(gso rig): skyu ru ra'i// lde gu 'am r-i Shis bshad pa 'am// bdud rtsi'i mar ni 'di sbyar bya// gang zhig zan zos gser gyis 'debs// zas zhu gyur nas zhi gyur pa// de la ru rta bi T+wAM ka/ lan tshwa gnyis dang seng phro ma dang // thang shing bong
214b1(gso rig): dang/ ra bor bams// phye ma chu bskol blo sbyar blud// gang zhig zhu nas cher gzer ba// de la snum gyi bkru spyan ni// 'bras bu dang ni de bzhin du// rtsa ba'i bkru sman sbyin par bya// phal cher rlung ni lam 'gags ga/
214b2(gso rig): ma zhu'i gnas su 'khrugs par gyur// dA l-i sbyang dang sbyin pa dang // s+yAng bsdu bde bar rgyu bar bya// 'bu 'joms pa yi sman kun gyis// 'bru yau snying nad gso bar bya// skom dang la rlung mkhris pa 'joms// cho ga
214b3(gso rig): phal cher bsngags pa yin// kun la phyi na bsil ba dang // de bzhin zhi dang sbyang ba ra bya// char chu glang mo sbrang rtsir bcas// sa'i chu'i yon de ldan bsngags// khong ba rdza sgyogs bye ma 'am// gshAg ma
214b4(gso rig): bsregs bcug drungs mar byas// bskol taM kha rar bcas pa 'am// duR+YA la sogs rtsa ba lnga// bskol te kha rA btab pa 'am// 'bras yaus phyer sbyar skyo ma 'ang bsngagaso// nas rjen cha ga tshe sbrang rtsi dang // kha
214b5(gso rig): ra btab pa grang mo 'ang phan// de bzhin nas thugs lu dang // k+Sho tra pa ni rnying pa dang // 'o ma bsil zhing nus bskyil ba'i// sman dang bskol ba'i kho zasu ni// nad pa chu grang gis bkrus nas// kha ra sbrang rtsi sbyin pa
214b6(gso rig): bsngags// skam sa'i sha dang lan tshwa sgyur// medade cing mar dang brdos pa 'am// de bzhin mung+ga sogs khu ba// 'tsho byed sde tshan khu bar bcas// sna sman 'o ma mar bsil sman// bskol ba 'am bu ram shing khu bon//
215a1(gso rig): skom sel mkhur ba bkang ba ni// mdo gnas las bshad byas pa'ang phan// cha rims bshad pa'i lde gu stsogs// rtsol ba chung zhing sems dga' dang // chu bo mtshan chen po sngags// dran
215a2(gso rig): pa dang ni mthong ba pan// skom dang rlung las gyur pa la// zho ni bu ram bcas po bsngags// sha khus nyams rtas bi da ro// sogs te bskol nAs bskyangs pa phan// mkhrisa? 'gyur u dum+bA ra smin// khu bar+ya
215a3(gso rig): kha ra btab pa phan// yang na de bskol bsgrangs pa 'am// sha ri ba sogs sde tshan chu// sde tshan di 'dra bskol khu ba// bsgrangs pa kha ra sbrang rtsir bcas// mngar+ya ba'i sman gyi sde tshon drang / 'i ma tsan shing bskol
215a4(gso rig): de bzhin// bI dza b+hA ra rgun 'bru dang // lcang mr-i n+ya gro d+ha'i lo ma// ku sha 'jag ma'i rtsa ba dang // shing mngar chu ni bskol ba'ang phan// rims l-i pan sman rgun 'bru sogs// snying pI lba yi chu blud pan// bad kana? las
215a5(gso rig): byung rim pa ni// chu mi tshig bskol bos smon du gzhug/ bil+yA 'u su tsha bya lnga// 'jag ma kru krug tres bskol blud// yang na skyer pa chur bskol la/ khi ra sbrang rtsi btab pa blud// mung+ga'i khu ba pa ti la// nim+bA'i lo ma
215a6(gso rig): tshi gsum bcas// nas zan 'khur bkang rnon po dang // sna sman lde gu rnon po 'ang brten// nyes kun ma zhu de 'joms pas// de bzhin slar gyi bya ba'ang bsngags// go bye shi dag che ba gsum// 'bras bu sgyur
215b1(gso rig): 'ang chu tshan nam// zho kha chu dang btung ba bsngags// zas kyi nyes 'byung dus shes pas// thug sla 'am skyo ma bsil ba blud// ngal bas skom la sha khu 'am// skyo ma kha rar bcas pa blung // tshabs skom
215b2(gso rig): kha ror bcas// nas dang rgya shug phye skyo blud// lus kun til gyi l-i gu dang // rang skyur bcas pas bsku bar bya// chu ba sil khrus lus skom gyur chang // tshur bsres pa 'am bur chu blud// lan cha skyur
215b3(gso rig): pang bcas khrus bya// snum bcus me dr-id rab rno la// rang bzhin bsil ba'i chu blu nga bya// snum ma zhu le chu tshon blung // zhu las bskol la thug pa blud// zas snum zos pas skom dad 'gyur// khi ba dang
215b4(gso rig): mnyam bu ra mi chu// bu rem sogs zas zos la skom// chu dron blud la de smon byi// gcong chen las byung gcong laM phan// thams cad nang gi rta ba pa ni// skom zhing nyams chu nga khyeng rtsub la// sha khu 'am
215b5(gso rig): ra yi 'o ma blud// stong rgyu'i rA la 'o ma dang // zang byed lung pa'i sman bskol blung // nang rkyen las gyur 'u su nI// 'bras bskol kha ra sbrang rtsir bcas// nad dmigs las nI bltas nas ni// btung ba'i bya ba kun
215b6(gso rig): kyang bsngags// skom zhing sngar gyi nad kyi gzir// chu dang phrad par ma gyur ni// 'chi ba 'am yun ring ba yi nang // rnyed par 'gyur bas de yi phyir// goms pa'i zas skom smin gyis ni// de yi skom dang myur
216a1(gso rig): bsal bya// de bsal nad ni gzhan dag kyang // gso ba nyid du nus pa yin// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u drug pa'o//
216a2(gso rig): de nas chung nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// nyes pa grong zhig shas che re mthong // de ni dang por gso bAr+ya bya// yid na cha nga nad nung+ga gzhi mtshungs// bang kan glan sa kyi rim pus+yA g+ha so// mkhris
216a3(gso rig): pa rlung gi mthar thug par// chang nad phal tshor 'byung ba yin// dman dang log pa drag 'thungs las// nang ni gang zhig skyes gyur pa// de nyid cha mnyam 'thungs pa yis// chang nyid kyis ni zhi bar 'gyur//
216a4(gso rig): chung dang dug ni mtshungs pa las// dug ni rno sogs yon gyi// nus pa shin tu che bas na// dug gzhan la ni bltos pa yin// rno che lhag par 'thungs pa dang // tsha zhing sgyur ba dag gis ni// chung gis zas kyis
216a5(gso rig): ro bsrul zhing // 'dzu nyer ba tshwa bro gang yin// myos dang skom rmongs nang du tsha// rims dang mAg 'khor skyed par byed// chang gis slongs pa'i nad kyis ni// rlung rgyu'i bu ga ba kag gyur pas// mgo dang rus pa tshogs
216a6(gso rig): rnams su// mi bzad pa ni skyed par byed// sbyor ba rjes mthun gyur pa yi// chang nyid kyis ni de sel 'gyur// chang nad ma zhu zhu gyur na// zas 'dod lus ni ying bar 'gyur// ba tsha ro ni sgyur dang phrad// mngar ba nyid
216b1(gso rig): du myur du 'gro// nang ni 'ju bar byed nus pas// sgyur ba kun las chad mchog yin// sngar bshad rno dang dro sogs dang // de bzhin drod bskyed sogs yon// de nyid goms pa'i dbang gis ni// 'di yi lus zungs mnyam
216b2(gso rig): byed mchog/ zhag bdun nam zhig zhag brgyad po ra// chang nad sman gyi sbyor ba bya// dus 'di tsam gyis lam log par// gnas pa'i chang nang zhi bar 'gyur// sman ni byas gyur nas chung nad// de phan chad ni rjes 'brel ba'i//
216b3(gso rig): nod gang yin pa de la sman// nad dmigs ji bzhin skyed par byi// de la rlung shos che ba la// skyur rtsi chen po drA trig dang // rgya shug se 'bru go spyod dang // la li phud dang haM pu sha/ zi ra tsha gsum len tshwa gsum// sge'u
216b4(gso rig): gsher phye chang sbyar ba blung // sr-ig sha ldum rdang bcos pa dang // snum dang ldan pa'i zas s+thi nA no// snAm+ba zhing dro skyur lan tshwar bcas// sha tshon khu ba blud pA'o// a ma? a ta mra tA ka gtubs// gaM yos+t+r-i sbyar ba yi
216b5(gso rig): drug pa 'om// gro dang mA Shi las byas pa// rnying zhing yi gar 'ong ba dang // skaM gsher byas pa'i khu ba ni// cha dang risha sogs nang bcug pa 'am// chung ni dri zhim bsil ba dang // legs langs dngas shing tshir
216b6(gso rig): bcang pan// se'u 'bru'im rtsa ba chung lnga bskol// bca' ska'u su bskol ba 'am// zho kha chu 'am che chu 'am// rang sbyar dngas ma blung par bya// lus baspu dril dang bkru ba dang // gos ni dro zhing mthug pa dang // a ka ru yi
217a1(gso rig): dud pas bdug/ gur kum a ka ru yis byug/ chung ma nu ma ro slad mdzes// lang tsho ldan cing yan lag dro// dga' bas 'khyud par byed pa dang // bsnyen bskur byas par gyur pa 'ang phan// mkhris
217a2(gso rig): pa shas che chu mang ba'i// sbrang rtsi kha ra dang ldan pa'i// se'u 'bru byu go'i khu ba dang // b+hu byA rgun 'bru ba ru sha'i// khu bsgrangs phye dang kha rar bcas// btung ba 'ang de 'drar blud par bya// yang na mngar ba'i sde tshan bskol// khu
217a3(gso rig): ba chang bsres sbrang rtsi btab// sa lu drug cu pa chan dang // r-i bong gong sr-ig bac+doM kyi shAM/ tsa nA mung+ga skyu ru ra// s+ye'u 'bru pa to la ga yes sbyin// bad kan mkhris 'i dris los gyur pa// tsha dang skom dang ldan pa ni//
217a4(gso rig): chang ngam chu grang bu ram shing // khu bo 'am rgun chu ma blud la// slon gzhug 'dres pa'i nad kyi ni// skyo ma la sogs rims pas phan// de yi me drod 'bar gyur pas// zas deng nyes lhag smin par byed// lud pa
217a5(gso rig): mchi la ma khrag bcas 'byung // rtsib logs nu mar gzir ba dang // tsha dang bcas pa'i skom dang dang // snying dang brang ni na ba la// sle tres ga dur bskol ba 'am// yang na pa to la bskol khu// bci' skar bcas pa
217a6(gso rig): blung bya zhing // gong mo sreg gi sha sbyin bya// mkhris pa rlung ni rgyas gyur pas// shin tu shas cher skom gyur na// rlung ni bde bar rgyu byed pa// rgun chu bsgrangs pa blud pa bya// zhu nas ra sha khu ba ni// mngar dang skyur ba'i sman
217b1(gso rig): sbyar sbyin// skom na chu mang bsres pa yi// chang blud ra ror mi 'gyur bsrung // gla sgang se'u 'bru 'bras yos chu 'am// yang na 'dab ma bzhi bskol ba 'am// ut+pal ba t+ya la sngogs sam// rang bzhin gyis nI
217b2(gso rig): bsil ba blud// chang mang 'thungs pas chu yi khams// 'bri zhing ma shas rgyas par 'gyur// gr-i ba rkan mchu skam 'gyur zhing // lce ni 'byin cing gcod byed la// mtshan mo rlung gis bsil byas pa'i// chu ni yog
217b3(gso rig): tshad blud pa rA bya// rgya shug se'u 'bru da tr-i gA dang // tsug tA la chu ba'i khu ba// skyur bA lnga yis khar bskus na// 'phral du skom dang sel bar byed// chang 'thungs drod ni khrag ma khris dang // 'dros pas pagos pa khyab
217b4(gso rig): gyur pas// mi bza tsha bo skyeng byed de// der ni rab bsil cho ga bya// ma zhu khu bi sa tshim byas la// ro hi nI las gtar ga gdab// slon dang spring ba dag gis kyang // bad ken shas cher skyug sman btang // sbyang ba bca'o
217b5(gso rig): sge sti ra dang // kaN+Da kA ri ba laM ka/ gang yang rung ba'i chu blug bsalo// ma zhu med cing bkre sau dus su// sbrang rtsi mang po blud par bya// sha kha ra dang sbrang rtsi dang // chang rnying dag gam rgun cha dA ngami// rtsub po 'i skyo mAr
217b6(gso rig): sbyar ba ni// dong gro l-i la phud bcas blud// nas dang gr-i zan nyung shas la// rgya sran yu sha nyung zad bcas// chu tshan kho dang tsha bar bcas// mar ni nyung zad bcas pa sbyin// la phug skam po ra sha'i khu// rkam pa'i srog
218a1(gso rig): chags sha khu ni// sbyar bu da trig pa to la// tsha ba gsum dang se'u 'brur sbar// bca' sga na le sham mang btabya// rjen rngad gtubs pa dang ldan zhing // skyur rtsi chen po'i khu bas sbyar// brdos shing khu ba med pa
218a2(gso rig): dang / ka ra mar dang ka ri ra// la sogs yi ga 'byed pa dang // lan tshwa brgyad po legs pr-i dang gtubs shing be reg ltar btsos pa// me drod tshod las shA sbyin zhing // sbrang chang nad med gyur pA blud// kha ra dang ni kha ru tsha/
218a3(gso rig): sto dang trig star bu dang // shing tsha sug smel nr-i le sham// cha phyed yan lag brgyad par bsha// phal cher bad kan chang nad sel// bu ga'i rgyan sbyong drod skyed byed// rtsub dang dro bse mnye zhing dril// khras dang kha
218a4(gso rig): zas spyang byas dang // 'dod bcas bud med lhan cig gnas// mtshan nyid ma log rigs pas bsten// phal cher bad kan las byung ba'i// chang nang myur du zhi bar byed// nad gzhi so so'i shas che las// las rnams
218a5(gso rig): gang dag bstan pa 'di// dwe ni 'dus pa las gyur pa// lhag ma bcu la'ang sbyar bar bya// shing tshi nA ga puSh+pa dang // pi pi ling deng na le shaH// go skyong bI ru sha kA dang // 'u su sug smel mA du ka/ thang shinga? kha ra
218a6(gso rig): dkar dang bcas// ka pat+ti yi khu ba btag/ ga pur dri yis bsgos gyur pa// btung ba shin tu yid 'ong bar// chang nad kun la blud gyur na// yi ga 'byed cing me drod bskyed// chang gis yid ni ma dkrugs shing // lus
218b1(gso rig): la gnod pa mi byed par// chung rlud mi bskyod de y-i b+h+yAM // sems dgaR+Sha g+hAr+yA bas chog b+ha// chung nAd+hA la n+d+ha sbyang ba dang // zhi ba'i las naM b+h+yas b+hU dAkyA // g+hA l+yA d+h+we mA wAM bAdrA kAn+ta b+hU // nyams rlung ba yang ny+dzad b+had+ha mA/
218b2(gso rig): rlung dang mkhris pa shas che zhing // chang nad kyis zud 'o ma blud// so ke'i tsha bas gdungs pa yi// shing las char ba bAbu dang mtshungs// chang gis zad par byas pa'i mdangs// 'o mas myur du rtas byed de//
218b3(gso rig): mi dngas dang yon kun mtshungs la// chang las go ni bzlog pa yin// 'o mA sa nang ni bcom gyur cing // stobs bskyed nas ni 'o ma yi// cho ga chang yeng bzlog bya ste// rim gyis nyung zad nyung zad spyad// tsau nas
218b4(gso rig): 'joms dang skems gyur pa'i// bla gnyan 'byung bar mi 'gyur bya// de gnyis las ni 'o ma mer// 'jam rtsi btang bas rta ba bsngags// pasku dang dril phyis khrus dang ni// bza' btung rlung ni sel ba pan//
218b5(gso rig): rigs par chang 'thungs chang gIs ni// nad ni 'byung bar 'gyur mo yin// de lnga rlung nad la phan chang // phal cher zan chang bu rAm chang // mkhris pa tshun chang chu dang btsas// pad+ma kan chang rnying steng+ga rgun chad// bad kan
218b6(gso rig): can gyis dang por btung // mkhris pa can gyis zos rjes btung // rlung can gyis ni bar du btung // nad gzhi mnyam pas tsa dgar btung // myos dang brgyal la phel cher ni// rlung dang ma khri saM ba sel las
219a1(gso rig): bsngags// thams cad la yang khyad byar du// mkhris pa shas rna shes par bya// bsdu byug bsil dang nor bu dang // chus gtor rlung ya ba kyus g.yang byed// khar tshun 'brum bla rang
219a2(gso rig): shing / 'bru go thang pal khu ba dang // mngar ba'i sde bskol 'o ma khu// yu sha se'u 'brur bcas pa blung // sA lu rtse ner drug cu pa// nas dang 'tsho byed sman ma dang // dge ba chen po daMk+Sha che// srang drugA 'i ma tsi trar
219a3(gso rig): byas/ pi pi ling dang brag zhun ni// bcud kyi len gyi cho ga sbyin// yang na 'bras bu gsum mar dang // sbrang rtsi kha rar bcas pa sbyin// shugs drag la la kha dang sna// bkag par gyur pa phan pa yin// yang na bud
219a4(gso rig): ming nu zho ni// blud pa 'am sne nas btang bar byA// pad+ma'i rtsi sdong pI pi ling // a ru ra 'am gla sgang ngam// byi tshe rA sbyang rtsi sbyar ba sbyin// rmya shug tshig gu na le sham// nI ga ge sAR+Ya pu shel rtse// chu grang dad+ya ni s+yAr b+h+ra
219a5(gso rig): blung / skyu ru ra yi khu ba 'am// a ru ra mar bskol ba 'ang pa ne// ji skad bshad pa'i bya ba dag/ nad gzhi shas ni ji bzhin sbyar// las nI rnam lta bya ba dang // gtar gas khrag ni dbyung ba dang / s+t+rI nga stobs che zhing
219a6(gso rig): shis ra ba ldan// yul la chags pa med pa phan// myos pa shin tu 'phel 'gyur da // brgyal bar gyur pa dag la ni// kun tu zhugs pa'i sprin rnaM mo dang // dug las byung ba drug sman btang // kun tu zhugs la rab rnam
219b1(gso rig): d+hA smya du na sas sa/ u // sa smra gas // ga sna gas da/ rgyu shA blan pad+ma// rdzu du snang klaSh+TAn d+hA
219b2(gso rig): sbrel phre'u bdar ba bya// 'du shes rnyed cing ldan gyur nas// sgog skya'i khu ba blung bar bya// tsha ba gsum ni lan tshar bcas// bi dza prA ring ge sar sbyin// bu ga'i rgyun srang dag bya'i phyir// zas yang tsha
219b3(gso rig): sbyin tu brjod pa dran phyir ngo mtshar dang // yid 'ang lte dang thos pa dang // glu dang rol mo ston pa yi// sgra brnyan rtsol ba byed du gzhug/ smon sman bkru smon btang dung rngu ba// khrag ni dbyung bar bya ba dag/ rgyun mi 'chad
219b4(gso rig): por spyad par bya// sems stor ba yi rgyu las ni// slar ldang 'brel ba'i 'dzegs pa yis// de ni legs par bsrung bar bya// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bdun pa
219b5(gso rig): rdzogs so// // de nas ge zhang 'brum gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// thun mong dus su srin med par// gzhong 'brum can rab nyams chung min// lto sbyangs kha zas yang la nyung // rjes su mthun pa
219b6(gso rig): zos pa la// gtsang byas bde legs 'gyur ba byas// bshang dang gci bsal gnod pa med// khri 'am spang leb mi gzhan gyi// phang par legs bstan gnas nas ni// gan rgyal 'dug cing ro stod smad// drang 'dug
220a1(gso rig): nyi mar rkub bstan la// rked pa'i phyogs ni bstod par bya// de nas bla dang gnya' bar ni// bcing ba'i gos kyis bsdams nas su// bzung ste drang por 'dug pa la// nang g.yog gis ni bzung nas su//
220a2(gso rig): rku ba ni zhun mar dag gi bsku// de nus mar gyis bskus pa yi// cha dpyang drang por de gzhug bya// rkub nas phyogs par rim gyis gzhug/ de nas 'byung 'gyur mthong ba dang // cha dpyang chud par shes gyur nas/
220a3(gso rig): gzhang 'brum thur ma gos gsher bas// sman pas legs par btsir nas ni// ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga yis// rlan can thal sman bsreg cig shos// thal sman rnon po'i me yos bsreg/ stobs ldan mche ba
220a4(gso rig): bcad de bsreg/ de nas cha dpyad phyung nas ni// nad pa'i rkub dang ro smad bsku// snum gyi nang du bcing bar bya// de ltar zhag ni bdun bdun zhing // re re nye bar bcos par bya// de nas rlung med khang bar ni// bzhag la spyod
220a5(gso rig): pa bstan par bya// gzhang 'bru mdo la dang por g.yas// de nas g.yon gsol de 'og rgyab// gzhang 'brum mang po bsreg legs na// rlung ni bde bar rgyu byed cing // kha zas 'dod cing me drod skye// bder gnas
220a6(gso rig): stobs dang kha dog skye// chu so gzer gyis btab pa la// ba swa ba dang ru rta dang // gan+d+ha mu kha a ka ru// sha da puSh+pa thang shing rnams// zhib tu btags la lde gu yis// lte ba man chad bsku ba ro bya// bshang
220b1(gso rig): dang gci 'gags gyur pa la// a laM pyA sa ba ra na// ba s+phu gze ma e raN+Da// a tha gAn+d+ha mu rA rnams// bsnol ba dro 'jam byes pA yis// blugs dang bcing ba'i sbyor ba bya// yang na 'o ma snum bcas pa// rlung
220b2(gso rig): sel sman bskol ti la mar sbyar// zla sa nr-i bshang ba spa byed cing // snum lha rlung 'jom sa drod skyed stan// de nas bsreg pa mi bya zhing // bad kin+da rlung skyes phyir byung po// 'gogs shing g.ya'i lan zhing sgra
220b3(gso rig): bzhang 'bum bsgru ba byas nas ni// bil+la'i rtsa ba tsi tra ka/ thal sman ru rti bskol ba yi// til mar blug pa 'am sbrul byi la// rnga mo phag rgod zhag gis byugaso// rdo rjes rlan dugs kyis dugs bya// yang na gsher
220b4(gso rig): drugs spyad par bya// yang na zan+da ni til mar dang // zhun mar snum can gyis dugs bya// rA swA hA g+he shwa dag da // shrI klu'i lo ma'i gong pos byA// arga'i rtsa ba shal+ma li'o// lo ma mi sgra sbrul lkugs dang
220b5(gso rig): byi li pogs po mar sbyar ba'i// dung bdugs gzhung 'brum rig lA phan// a shwa gan+d+ha bri ha tI'i// bye'u rug pI pi lcing mar sbyar// ku ba kha bo'i sa bon dang // yal gA 'jam por rang sbyar sman// lde gu grib mar
220b6(gso rig): bskams pa yi// reng bu chub bcug gzhang 'brum 'jig/ ku ba kha bo'i yal ga rtsa// thal sman bcas pa'i lde gu ni// 'ol ma se dang su ra na// bu sha yi ni sa bon las// reng bur byas pa de dang 'dra// su dag shi ra yung
221a1(gso rig): lde gu khyim bya'i rtug pa pi pi ling // yung dang 'ol ma se dag ni// ba gcin btags pa de dang 'dra// nu ha'i 'o mar btags shu dag/ ta ma la rus prI yaM ku// rnam rgyal kar+k+ka sring gi/ ru rta spangs ma
221a2(gso rig): go byed dang // shi kru la phug sa bon dang // nim+ba ka ra bi ra'i lo// pI pi ling gi rtsa ba dang // bil rtsa shing kun bcas pa 'am// ru rta shri sha'i sa bon dang // rgyam tsha bu ri pi pi ling // arga sU ha'i lo ma dang // 'bras bu
221a3(gso rig): gsum gyis lde gus bsku// arga 'o me sU ha'i sdong // ku ba kha bo'i 'dab ma dang // ka rany+dza dang ra thug gcin// lde gu gzhang 'brum sel mchog yin// 'jam rtsi sman ni pi pi ling // la sogs lde gu 'ang bsngags pa
221a4(gso rig): yin// sman 'di nyid kyis til mar ni// bsgri ba'i don du bskol bar bya// dud pas bdug dang lde gu ni// bskus pas gzhang 'brum dag gi khrag/ sogs pa 'dzag par byed 'gyur te// de nas bde ba nyid du 'gyur// skrangs
221a5(gso rig): shing 'dzag par ma gyur dang // sra ba las ni khrag 'byung ste// pad+ma btsags bu khab kyi ni// pir gyis yang dang yang khrang byung // bsil drod snum dang rtsub pa yis// nang ni zhi bar ma gyur na// de phyir sman pas nang khrag
221a6(gso rig): nyid pa dbyung ba la ni 'bad par bya// 'o ma tsi trasaHphye// btab pa las byung dar ba gang blud cing de nyid kyi zas ni// byin na gzhang 'brum sel bar 'gyur// ka bi da ra'i rtsa ba'i phye// dar ba ser par btab pa blud// zhu nas phan
221b1(gso rig): pa'i zas sbyin na// gzhung 'brum nad las thar bar 'gyur// gzhang sbyangs gzer bcas me drong 'bri// snyun nAd la ni phan pa'i sman// shing kun la sogs blud pa 'am// bu ram a ru ra sbyar ba// byin la de rjes dar ba
221b2(gso rig): blung // yang na a ru bi tang+ka// dug mo nyung shun rtsi tra ka/ dar ba dang sbyar blud pa 'am// dug mo nyung dang pi pi ling // tsi tra ka dang su ra na// char bskyed pa chu dron blud// yang na tsha gsum lAn tsha gsum// shing kun sngar
221b3(gso rig): bu bcas chu blud// bil+la ka pad+mer bcas pa 'am// bca' sgra kha ru tshor bcas pa 'am// go bye la la phud bcas pa'i// skyo ma de la phud par bya// yang na shing kun spang ma'i 'bras// tsi tra ka dang dar bar sbyar// bi
221b4(gso rig): lu'i 'bras bu drir bar bcas// zla ba gcig gi bar du sbyin// zas kyi sngon nyid re re zhing // ci 'dod par ni blud par bya// shin tu me drod chung ba la// dar ba kho na blud par bya// nyams stobs dus dang nad shes pa'i
221b5(gso rig): sman pa yis ni dar ba dag/ zhag bdun nam ni zhag bcu 'am// zla ba zla gcig bar du blud// yang na phyi dri 'bras yos kyis// phyed dang dar ba'i lde gu sbyin// dar ba zhu nas dar ba yi// thug pa rgyam tshar bcas pa blud
221b6(gso rig): do rjes dar bar g.yos pa'i zas// snum can byin la ngar ba blud// yu sha 'am sha khu dor ba can// sa lu'i 'bras chan ran par bza'// rtsub dang mer phyed phyung ba dang // gang la mar ni ma byung ba// dar ba nad dang mi
222a1(gso rig): drod kyi// stobs las de ni rnam gsum sbyar// dar bas legs bcom gyur pa yi// gzhung 'brum slar ni 'byung mi 'gyur// de thugs gyur na rtsa yi ni// tshogs kyang skye bar mi 'gyur ro// rtsa sbubs
222a2(gso rig): dar bas dag byas pa// lus zungs drangs mer gyur pa gang // des ni nyams dga' mdog dang stobs// mchog tu rgyas par byed par 'gyur// rlung dang bad kan dag gi nAd// rgya phrag dor ba rnying pas 'joms/
222a3(gso rig): gzhang 'brum gzhig par 'dod pa yis// kaN+Da kA ri'i lde gus bskus// snod du dar ba sar pa nau// snum gcig bzhag ste skud par bya// 'u su zi re go snyod dang // pi pi ling gnyis ha pu sha/ shu ti pi pi ling rtsa ba/

222a5(gso rig): mdog bzang yi ga 'byed// rlung dang bid kan sel byed cing // gzhang skrangs ni bas nyams thag pa// 'joms shi stobs ni 'phel bye de yin// kru krug tres kyi rtsa ba'i shun// btags pa'i lde gus bum paM
222a6(gso rig): bsku// der ni zho 'am ngarau ba gzhag/ smin pa'i gzhang 'brum sel byed blud// ga bra'i rtsa ba a ru ra// sle tes tsha ba lnga dag la'ang // cho ga 'di nyid sbyar bar bya// pa ta ha ti la pa li// shu ti tsha ba lnga g.yer ma// zi ra'u su
222b1(gso rig): bilba'i rkang // phye mar btags te sbyar bar bya// 'bras bu sbyar ba mar til mar// yu sha sha khu thugs sogs bya// sman 'di nyid dang chu dang mar// bskol bas 'ang drong skyed byed pa yin// rims 'di bshang ba slu ba yin//
222b2(gso rig): rtug pa 'gagos pa bshad bya ste// snum sogs zan dang ldan pa yi// chung dang lan tshwa btab pa blung // yang na dar ba bu ram chang // chang skyur chang dngos lan tshwar sbyar// zas mngan mar dang til mar gyis// brngos pa'i kA/

223a1(gso rig): par byed par 'gyur// se 'bru'i khu ba zi ra dang // bca' sga pu ramA la la phud// pa ta dang sbyar da ra ba ni// rlung gi rtug 'gags sel byed yin// rgun chang yang na bu ram chang // bca' s+tha k+Sha

226b1(gso rig): dum+ba ra n+ya gro d+ha// aHshad+tha yi myu gu srang // gnyis gnyis chu bre gsum dang ni// 'o ma bre gang nang du bskol// 'o ma lus nas tshigs ma btsags// khu ba de ni mon char// btsong dang tsan ut+pal pad+ma'i ge sar dang // dug
226b2(gso rig): mo nyung gi sa bon de// 'di rnam sa btags pa'i lde gu bsres// 'di ni sbyin byug 'dzum rtsi drags// mar dang sbrang rtsi kha rar bcas// mkhregs dang gzhang ni 'byung ba dang // khrag 'dzeg rims ni 'joms par byed/
226b3(gso rig): shing mngar pra puN+Da ri kA/ de bzhin mo nA dza ra la sogs// nyis 'gyur gyis ni 'o ma bskol// snum gyi 'jam rtsi btang bar bya// shing mngar ut+pal seng phrom btsong // bil+la tsAn ba li ka/ dbyi mong gla sgang pong nga dkar// pa te
226b4(gso rig): yA bak+Sha ra'i mchog/ skyer pa shing tsha tsi tra ka/ dong ka spang spos thang shing dang // tsang+gi ri yi khu bi mar// bskol bas de ni nyes gsum 'joms// gzhang 'brum tshang 'khru po bya'i nad// skya tso ba na dang yi gA 'chus// gcin
226b5(gso rig): sri gzhing ni nyams pa dang // chu so spo dang mkhrig pa dang // be snabs 'khru dang gzhang 'brum gzer// de blud sman gyi dam pa yin// rims kyis mngar zhing skur ba dang // grong dro la sogs rtag tu ni// me drong stobs las
226b6(gso rig): bltos te btang // gzhang 'brum nad las rgyal bar byed// rtug skam gyis nyan til mar ni// grang ba'i rims la phan pa bsku// rman dugs snum can gyis dugs bya// de nas ring bu gzhug bya ste// shaM ma dur byid ngan+da dang // ni li
227a1(gso rig): ni 'bras pi bi ling // bo son cha lan tshwa nyis 'gyur// phyer btags bu ram pa gcin sbyar// mar bskus reng bu mthe bong tsam// bcug na rdug skam bde 'byung byed// paM pi ling dang po son cha/
227a2(gso rig): khyim gyi dud pa yungs kar bcas// 'di dag nyid kyi phye ma ni// rkub nas gce'u bud par bya// de don med na rab rno snum// mas btang bas ni btsir te btang // des de'i gzhang rtsa drang por byed// gshang gci phyen ni bde
227a3(gso rig): bor 'byung // slar yang 'gags na rlung 'joms pa'o// bkru smin snum can btang bya zhing // 'jam rtsi dag ni btang bar bya// rtsub pas rlung ni rtug skam 'gyur// lan tshwa gsum dang tsha ba gsum// 'bras bu gsum dang dan+ti
227a4(gso rig): dang // bsre zhing 'bras bu tsaM tra ka/ phye mi mar dang sbrang rtsi sbrus// rdza skyigs kha sbyar 'jim par byug/ du ba nang 'khyims bsreg par bya// thal bA dge ba can zhes bya// mar dang lhan cig blud par bya 'am// 'bras chan
227a5(gso rig): snum dang sbyar dang zos// rtug skam 'grags dang gzhang 'i brum sbyin// skya rbab glai skad bde gcin sr-i// snying nad 'or nad pho ba'i nad// go tsan rI mchin pa gzer dang ste// lud pa dbugs maM bde ba 'joms// gzhang
227a6(gso rig): 'brum la ni gang zhig bshad// de bzhin rtug skam dag la'ang sbyar// ka rany+dza shun sra ni nyis brgya bcu// bre bcu drug bskol bzhi cha lus pa der// bu ram srang ni brgyad cu che ba gsum// srang brgyad zhib tu btags pa'i/
227b1(gso rig): phye ma gzhug/ 'di dag zla gcig bzhag ste langs gyur nas// tsha byas mchog tu d+mod bskyed zas 'ju ba'i// nus bskyed rlung bder rgyu byas gzhang 'brum dang // mcher nad spyan dang dam+ba rdzing sel bar byed// bu ti ka rany+dza ni
227b2(gso rig): srang brgyad dang // tsi tra kaN+De ka ri sradA nyaMs brgya// chu bre bzhi bcu brgyad bskol bzhi cha lus// btsags te bsgrengs por bu ram sra brgyad bzhug/ dri sna gsum dang cho gsum sau 'bru dang // pau pi ling rtsa ba sr-i
227b3(gso rig): sru'i rtsa bya// gu gul ma nu 'u su dbyi mo d+ha dang // sbo ma'i 'bras bu sge gsher star bu ni// srang re zhig tu btags pa'i phye ma bskol// bsgrangs nas sbrang rtsi srung ni nyi shu gzhug/ sge ga sher skyur rtsi chen po rgun
227b4(gso rig): 'brum rlon// bu ram shing gi khu bo btsir bas byas// mar gyi snod bcung zla gcig bzhag ste langs// rgyur gyur 'di ni gzhang 'brum sogs le ste// me drod skyed par byed pa'i mchog yi na la// skya rbab dbyig
227b5(gso rig): dug dmu rdzing skran mcher ba// l-I spos rde'u chags gcin sri 'joms par byed// bi lu'i khu ba ras btsags bri bcu drug/ mar gyi snod kyi nAng du bcug nas ni// dau da ki dang rgun 'brum pra go dang // skyu ru r-i yau 'bras
227b6(gso rig): bu srang gnyis gnyis// pa ta bong ba dkar po byo tsher ba// star bu tsha ba gsumau dang shing tsha dang // sug smel 'u su spr-i ka ka ko la// li shi pi pi ling rtsa bo TI ka/ kru trug tres srang re re bu ram ni// srang brgyad rlung med gan su
228a1(gso rig): zla phyed bzhag/ des ni gzhung 'brum+b+ha sgra bcas zhi byed cing // me yi stobasna ni myur du skyed par byed// yang na rtsa ba bcu pa dur byid dang // pa ta kA rku gnyis dang bong nga dak+ta ra// kAt+sa la rnams
228a2(gso rig): re re srang bcu bcu// snga mau bzhin du bsregs pa'i thal ba ni// chu bre bcu drug nang du bskol nas ni// ba~M zhi cha lus pa r-i bu ram srang brgyad dang // tshaM ba~M gsum dang dbyi modza a ru ra// srang lnga tsi tra ka ni srang
228a3(gso rig): gnyis dang // ya bak+Sha ra srang gnyis bcug ste bskol// gzar bur chags pa'i bu rAm lde gu yis// skran dang mcher rung gzhang 'brum mdze nad dang // gcin dang me drod nyams pa 'joms par byed// tsaM
228a4(gso rig): tA ka yI rtse ba srang lha becu// chu srang drug bskol ba yi brgyud cha lus// de ru ni pu ram rIng pA srad brgyad gzhugra/ slar ska bar gyur pa de nang du// tsha ba gsum dang shu ti a ru ra// ru rta gla sgang shing tsha bi
228a5(gso rig): TAng+kaH/ tsau tra ka da suge smel phye ro btags bsres// des ni gzhang 'brum mdze dang skran dang ni// mchar pa dmu rdzing nade naM 'jams byed cing // rtag tu bsten na ma drod skye bar byed// tsha ba gsum til 'bras bu gsuM
228a6(gso rig): bi TAng+ka dang go bye tsaM tra ka/ bu ramoM ril bu byas te gzhang 'brum dang // pags pa'i nad ni sel bar byed pa yin// so ra na yi rtsa ba khu sbyar bcug/ 'dzem pas bskus te tshi ga bzhin bsregs pas// lan tsha til mar
228b1(gso rig): sa pa zos gyur na// gzhang 'bram sel bar byed pa daM pa yin// na le sham dang pi pi ling dong kra kru krug tres ni cha re bskyed pa dang // tsi tra'i bzhi 'gyur su ra na dang spar// bu ram ril bus gzhang 'bram//
228b2(gso rig): gcod par byed// sau ra na yi bcu drug cha btags shing // tsi tra ka ni dwe yi cha byed bya// bca' sgra chu gnyis na l+ya sham cha gcig/ bA ram+bA rilA bu bcas pas gzhang 'bru mo s+ye la// a ru ra dang dong kra pi pi l-I /
228b3(gso rig): ka rany+dza dang bau tra bi T+wAM kA/ ku ra mnyem phye rgod ma'i kha lta bur// zas ci mang du zlosau kyang 'ju bar byed// dug mo nyung lam ga lI pI pi ling // tsi tr-i ka dang a ba marga yi// sa bon rtsa mkhris rgyam tshe rnams// ril bu
228b4(gso rig): bcas pa gzhing 'bruM sel bar byed// gal te gzhang 'brum gzhig par 'dod na ni// rgya ma tshA tsau tra kA dang dug mo nyungs// tsau ri bil+la nim+ba bcas pa dag/ btags pa'i phye ma dar bar bcas pa btung // gzhung 'dra
228b5(gso rig): skam la ba la te ka ste// gsher la dug mo nyung shun sman mchog yin// kun la dus kun tu ni ngar rnying mchog/ stobs skyed byed cing nang rnams 'joms pa yin// rtug pa 'gags pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir//
228b6(gso rig): rlung sel me drod skyed par byed pa la// bza' dang btung ba gang yin de bsten bya// de las go bzlog pa ni spang bar bya// gzhang 'brum tshad 'khru pho ba'i nad rnams ni// phal cher phan tshun rgyur gyur yin pa so na// me drong tshur
229a1(gso rig): nA skye ba'i tshe na min// de bas de la mchog tu me drod bsrung // yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u brgyud pa'o// / de nas 'khru ba gso parda
229a2(gso rig): le'u bshad par bya'o// la b+hA ba phul cher ma zhu ba'i// gnas brten me drod nyams pa las// 'byung ba de bzhin rlung 'gyur dang // dang po sbyang ba byas pa pono// gzer dbo bang kun gyis nyams thug/ 'khru ba can+da ni
229a3(gso rig): smon du gzhug/ nad ni gang zhig sogs pa dag/ ma smin zas dang 'dres gyur na// 'khru ba dag ni 'byung 'gyur te// shin tu slongs te 'a byung 'gyur dang // rang nyid 'khru byed de la ni// btang snyoms bzhag pa de
229a4(gso rig): nyid pan// mi zhu 'khru la dang por ni// gcod pa'i sman ni btang mi bya// gal te 'gags byed lto sngos lci// gzer dang tshor ba chung 'gyur la// a ru ra btang nad 'khyil go// 'byin pas srog ni ster byed yin//
229a5(gso rig): nad tshabs 'bring la khyad par du// pu tAM kha ta po pi ling // bca' skra sh+ma dag A ru ra// 'u s+yo legs par bskol ba blung // yang na bol be'u su dang // klu sgad dong ga ba lo ka/ pa tha shro b+hag kha ru Na// dod+yA ka bai tang ar+yA ra/
229a6(gso rig): bca' skra gla sbrang bong de dkar// bai lnga shing kun drug mo nyung // nang gzhi chung ba'i tshad 'khru la// smyung ba byas pa bsngags pa yin// yang na shu dge bang dkar// gla skrad par pa ta bskol ba 'am// ba li ka dang dong gra ni/
229b1(gso rig): bskol bA'i chu dag blud par bya// bsres shing nyams chung zas dus su// kha zas yang ba rigs pas sbyin// des de'i kha zas yi gar 'ong // me drod lus stobs skyed par byed// drar ba 'am rlung sgyur
229b2(gso rig): dag gam ni// nas thug dag gau skyo ma 'am// chang ngam rgun chang dag gis ni// btung ba gang 'os nyer spyad bya// kha zas byin pa'i 'og tu nI// bil+la gzhon nu zur ba dkar// 'u su shing kun da trI ga se'u// zi ra spa
229b3(gso rig): 'bras pa la sha/ la la phud dang kha ru tsha// rgyam tsha rtsa bo chung ngu lnga// tsha ba lnga dang pa tha ste// smin gcod drod ni skyed par byed// bad kan mkhris pa'i shasa? tshi lA// sa la brni ba la dang // bil+la pr-i snA bar+t+ti dang // se 'bru
229b4(gso rig): bskol ba'i thug pa phAn// pi pi ling rtsa a ru ra// thug pas rlung ni bde rgyu byed// nAd gzhi mAng la 'gags pa dang // me drong che bar gang zhig 'khru// pi pi ling dang 'bras bu gsum+b+ha// bau D+hau ka bskol bak+ku sman
229b5(gso rig): btang // sbyang byas nas ni thug pa dag/ rlung 'joms me drod bskyed pa blud// gang zhig ma zhu smin gyur dang // me drod skyes nas 'khru gyur zhing // 'byar bag lU can nad bcas pa// sri zhing yaMng dang yang du ni// yang
229b6(gso rig): yang 'khru zhing bshang chung ba 'am// bshang bas ma 'dres mkhrig btsos la// zho dang 'o ma mar til mar// bca' sge bu ram bcas pa blung // yang na rgya shu ge 'bras bu sbangs// bu ram til mar ldan pa sbyin//
230a1(gso rig): bshad ba sri la phan tshod ma// snum mang de bzhin sha khu dang // zho dang se 'bru gA yos pA dang // sa lu'i 'bras chan ma sha tI la// mud+ba legs par g.yos pa'i zas// de ni bkres par
230a2(gso rig): gyur tshe sbyin// zur bya'i rtsa byA ka pi ta// pa ha sa sti kA'i tsha ma// shu sha la la pUd dang ni// karka ru dang sring gi ni// yang na tsho rA byi ta yang rung // u po ta ka dzI baM ti// bA gu rtse dang t+ya sne'u dang // lcam pa 'am
230a3(gso rig): ying na oM raN+Da// lo ni ka yi khu ba dang // rus sbal bye'u lo ba ka/ rma bya sreg pa khyim bya yaM/ sha khu dang yang sbyin par bya// bil+li ba gla skad ba ru rA// bca' sgra de da ka'i me togA/ dar pa bskol ba nas thug gaM//
230a4(gso rig): zho dang sbyar bar 'khru ba sel// kaM pit+tA dang ka tsu ra// gau bra'i rtsa ba yu two dang // n+ya gr-i d+ha dong rdo dreg dang // saM 'bru gaM so ma ros bal dang // shal+la li yi lo ma phan// bilnga gzhon nu'i lde gu dang // til btags lde gu
230a5(gso rig): yang de dang mnyam// zho yi s+thi sgyur snum btsas dang // sbyar dug mkhreg pa 'joms par byed// bu su zi ra ni le sham// dA trig zur pa kha ru tsha// se'u 'bru pa ta da da ki/ 'bras gsum tsha lA ka pi tA// nas
230a6(gso rig): tshig 'khus thal la la phud/ a mri 'dzam+bu'i 'bras bu'i rkang // bilnga drug 'gyur lde gur btags// zho dang bu ram mung+ga'i khu// til mar mar dang g.yos pa dag/ gzhan gyis mi thub sbyar dug 'di// drod bskyed
230b1(gso rig): smin byed 'khru ba gcod// yi ga 'byed cing mkhreg pa sel// rgyu shug bil+la gzhon nu dang // lde gu 'bras dang nas dang ni// mUd+ga ma sha ti la rnams dang // 'bru yi yu shar rnam par brtag/ bshad pa zad cing kha bskam
230b2(gso rig): la2/ zho dang se 'bru'i khu ba dang // myur dang til mar lhan cig brngos// 'braHsa chen de dang sbyar ba ni// bshad zed kha nau bskams la sbyin// yang na zho spris snumaM gnyis brngos// bu ram bca' sga bcas pa sbyin//
230b3(gso rig): yang na chang ni snum gnyis brngos// tshod ma'i dong du sbyin pa 'am// 'bras bu skyur po snum gnyis brkos// sgog pa la byas yu sha 'am// snum gnyis dang brdos phye zan ni// tsha ba gsum gyi phye btab sbyin// de bzhin
230b4(gso rig): ma sha legs bac+doMs pA// mar gyi snying blo blugs pa 'am// ra thug lug thug dag gi sha/ btsos te btsags po'i khu bA dang // se'u 'bru'i khu ba'i chu dang nau// 'u su dong krA snum bcas bo sgrol// saM lu rtsa snar
230b5(gso rig): bcas pa ni// za zhing de nyid 'thungs pa yi si// rtug pa zad pa las byung ba'i// nung las myur du thar par 'gyur// bA rA ma ti la mar bIlpA gzhon// pi pi ling dang bca' sgra yi// lde gus rlung gis gnod gyur pa'i/
230b6(gso rig): gzer thabs mkhreg dang bcas pa sel// seng phrom shun lpags dai nga ka'i// me tog rgya shug 'dab ma rnams// zho spris sbrang rtsi ka pi ta'i// khu bar sbyar ba blung na pan// rlung gis rtug 'ag gas shes cher ni//
231a1(gso rig): na zhing mkhregs par byed pa dang // khe sbubs khrag bcas sgrom gdungs la// 'o mtshim par blud na phan// til mar mar gyi stong du ni// bzhos ma thag pa'i 'o ma blud// yang na a rA Na'i rtsa ba
231a2(gso rig): 'am// bilnga gzhon nu bskol ba thud// gla sgong nyi shu 'o ma yi// sum 'gyur gyi ni chu bsgril ba// 'khru ba gzer btsis sel bar byed// pi pi ling ngam na laM sham// zhib tu btags po'i byA dang byin// do ni yun
231a3(gso rig): rings gnas pa yi// mkhreg pa sel bar byed par 'gyur// ma zhu me de cing gzer gyis nyen// smyung ba la sogs pas nyams smod// khong rtsub me drod brtags nas ni// mar ni thal sman rno btsos sbyin// yang na rtsa
231a4(gso rig): ba chu bsgrol chu// zho dang chang gi dngas mar poskol// lce myong tsha dang tshe ba lnga// til mar 'phral du nad 'joms byed// bca' sga srang drug pi pi ling // mu la kru trug tres rgyam tsha// sring gnyis til-i mar bre gung
231a5(gso rig): drung // zhwa dang bskol ba'i til mAr+ya ni// 'khru ba'i nAd ni sol byed yin// she dang 'o ma mar phyogs gcig/ btung dang 'jam rtsi bsku ba ru// til mar 'ba' zhig phyogs gcig sbyar// shad mkhregs gzer
231a6(gso rig): ni 'joms byed yin// de ni rlung sa la mchog yin la// rlung 'khrugs ma gtogs gzer mi 'byung // khams gzhan 'joms pas 'bar gyur pa// rlung ni rong gnas brten khyab ste// mo drong chung la til
231b1(gso rig): mar ni// sbyar bas bde bar byed pa'i mchog/ til mar bcas pa rlung gnas su// mkhregs pa gnas par mi 'gyur ro// dri ma zad cing nud gzhan rang gi ni// gnas las 'phos pas rlung ni stobs che ba//
231b2(gso rig): khong pa gzer zhing mkhrog par byed pa la// phyi nang til mar mis btang su zhig 'tsho// gzhang no 'byung bar gyur pa la// 'o mAr bskol ba'i mar rgya shug/ skyur po'i tsang+gi ri'i khu ba// zho dang dong krar btag+sa
231b3(gso rig): pa blung // sbyar ba de nyid bcug pa dang // 'u su na le shaM zi ra// kha ru tsha dang tshwa ba lnga// se'u 'bru dag dang sbyar ba ni// zhib tu btags pa'i lde gu phan// rtswa ba bcu paM bsgril ba yaM// zu ba shu ti ru rta 'am// shu dag ci
231b4(gso rig): tra kaM sbyi tshor ba'i snum gyi 'jam rtsi btang bar bya// mkhreg dang gzhang ni 'byung ba dang // glo cin sri rked pa nu ba la// mngar dang sbyar bar bskol ba yAM// mar ram til mar 'jam rtsi btang // gau zhung 'brum gzhug
231b5(gso rig): pa dgo' ba la// bi sku zhing dugs ni 'dzum byas gzhug/ dbus su phug pa'i pags pa ni// 'ur thil 'ching ba dag kyang bya// rtsa ba lnga yi chen po yi// khu ba dang ni 'o mar bskol// bya ba rgyu ma bton pas kyang // rlung
231b6(gso rig): 'joms lde gu lta bu bya// til mar bskol gzhang 'byung ba la// btung dang bsku bas de gso bya// mkhris pa ma zhu rno dang dr-i// spangs la sngon bzhin sbyang ba bya// skom byas yan lag drug pa'i chu// rtsa mkhris thal tres
232a1(gso rig): bcas pa byung // bkres nA kha zas thug pa stsogs// b+hi hA hrI sogs nye'u shing // ba la rnams gnyis paN+Di gnyis// ba sgrol ba d+mod skyed byed pa phyin// blud kyang rjes su 'brel gyur nA/
232a2(gso rig): dugu mo nyung shun 'bras bya dang // bong nga dkar po bcas btogs phye// sbrang rtsi bsres pa 'bras chu byung // pa ti dug mo nyung shun 'bras// skyer ba pi pyi l-i rtsa 'am// bong nga bil+le drug mo nyung // glu sbyang ba li ka
232a3(gso rig): bskol ba 'am// yang na ba~M nga dkar mur ba// skyer pa dngul rdo dug mo nyung // bong nga bca' sga dug mau ny+tsa dA// glu sbrang kat+tAl sbrang rtsir btsa sa// dug mo nyung gI sa bon ni// sbrang gcog bskol ba'i khu ba blud
232a4(gso rig): gang zhig shA khu bcas sbyar za// mkhris bcos lto ba'i nad sil 'gyur// de bzhin gla sgang bskol ba'i khu// sbrang rtsir sbyar ba blud pas pan// shal+la lI yi 'dab ma'i rtsa// bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa
232a5(gso rig): m+buk+Sha rtsa mkhris glu skad du gau mo ny+tsa // spyir khaN+Da dang bAcas pa 'am// yang na sbyir pa ba lo kaM/ bil+le'i rkang dang byi tshor ba// ti la dang si phro ma many+dza ra// btsong dang pad+ma ung+ga la// drong kra da du ka'i me tog/ s+ye'u
232a6(gso rig): 'bru'i shun pi ut+palaM bcas// tshogs bcad phyed kyis bshad sbyor ba/ sbra'i cir bcas pa 'bras chur blung // skyer ba seng phrom drug mo nyung // suMg spel bskol ba sngon 'khru sel// seng phrom dang ni oM paH/
232b1(gso rig): pri yaM ku sogs sde tshan dang // bskol ba so sngo brud de bzhin// puN+ye shel dang shing mngar dang // se'u 'bru'i myu gu s+thi yaM ku// zho dang 'u su'i 'bras bur bcas// thug pa lde gu sbyar thug bya// de bzhin bil+la
232b2(gso rig): ka bi tha// a mra 'dem bu'i rkang las sbyar// smin pa'i khu bar ra'i Sh+yo ma// mchog tu phyin te des kyang ni// stob sa ldan nang gzhi che bya'i phyir// ma zhi na ni bkru sman btang // rims kyis bshang ba khrag dag
232b3(gso rig): tu// gang zhig 'khru bar gyur pa la'ang // pa la shwa yi 'bras bu yi// khu bA dang sbyar 'o ma blu // de nas 'o mi d+ho 'jam tsA ma// nyams stobs ji bzhin blud par bya// de ni dri ma bsal bas na// lto yi nad ni zhi bar
232b4(gso rig): 'gyur/ khyi lce ba yau sbyang ba yang // pa la sha ltar sbyor bu byA// thug sogs rim po byas kyang ni// g+hAl+la te gzer nI ma zhi na// nyes bas lA de la me drod sti bas// las dpags 'jam rtsi myur du br-it+tAng // shwa ta
232b5(gso rig): bud+d+haHsh-ing dang // la~M drAng ni shing mngar dag/ maur ba tI lo mar ba'i rgyur bcas// bskol po 'jam rtsi'i spyan myur yin// des na cha 'khru ma zhi n+te// sbyin dag 'jam rtswa mchog tu pam/ shab+h+rUMl-i yo lo ma rton/
232b6(gso rig): sha rlon pas dkris nas ni// sa nag lde gu bskus nas su// lci ba skam po'i me nang sreg/ 'jim pa lus pa de bkog ste// gong po de las srang gcig tsam// 'o ma bre gang nang du mnye// btsags pa dang mar rgya spos dang /
233a1(gso rig): shing mngar lde gu sbrang rtsi mar// til mar ldan pasna 'jam rtsi bya// khrus byas 'o ma 'bras chun sbyin// yang na skam sa'i sha khu sbyin// mkhris pa'i tsha 'khru rims dang 'or nad smyan// rlung nad
233a2(gso rig): khrag dang pho ba'i nad sel zhing // 'di ni bkru sman mas btang drag po yi// sbyor byas drag tu 'byung ba'ang myur zhi byed// dug mo nyung ni bu ram phran// lhor bskol dug mo nyung sogs sde// aM brta sogs sgreng rtsir
233a3(gso rig): bcas// lde gus 'khru ba thams cad sel// smin zhing nad med me drod che// khrag dang bcas pA ra ri de nAs 'khru// sna tshogs mdog tu 'khru 'gyur ba// sman 'thum btsos pa sbyar bar bya// ket+sa la yI shun lde gu/ bil+la'i
233a4(gso rig): snrums dkris nas ni// 'jim pas byA sgras de mi nang bsreg// khu ba tsir las bsgyangs pa ni// sbrang rtsi 'am khar bcas pa ru// 'khru bcin mo nI rigs blung // de bzhin 'o ma can shing shun// de yi myu gu las kyang
233a5(gso rig): waM shing mun pa med dang bcas// 5/ ba'i rmas pas sa pa ni// sbrang rtsi bac+doMs pa cha 'khA hU~M// stobs can dag tu 'byung ba'ang sa la// mkhyes pa'i 'a ba rnyan gyis ni// mkhris pa stod kyi dag sbyi byas//
233a6(gso rig): mkhris pa 'khrugs gyur nas// khrug gi tshad 'khru skom dang rims// 'debs shing gzhang kha mo bzang 'drul// pad+ma ut+pa la sa mang ga/ many+dza ra sa bskol ba yau// ra yaM 'o ma de la phan// thal tres shing mngar
233b1(gso rig): seng phrom 'am+b+ha// n+ya gro d+ha sogs myu gu dang // sbrang rtsi kha ra bcas pa ni// btung ba 'am gzhang khar blugs pa phan// de bzhin sha khyA sogs sbyar med// mar bcas bsgrangs pa zas skom phan// tat+pal 'bras bu'i khu ba ni
233b2(gso rig): cung zad skyur zhing ka rar bcas// ra yi 'o ma chu phyed dang // ut+pal dong kra ba li ka/ pris+dza par+Ni khu bar bcas// thug pa khrag gau tshad 'a sel// zas kyi sngon du mer sar ni// sbrang rtsi kha rar sbyar bA bldag/ wag
233b3(gso rig): 'khru tshags che la ra 'am// ri dgas khrag gi mar brdos sbyin// 'o ma dang bza' 'o ma btung // 'o ma srub mar zhag gsum byaste nA// yang na gong ma sreg gi ni// she khu dang zas nAd med 'gyur// nyi shing btags pa 'o ma
233b4(gso rig): dang // lhan cig blud cing 'o mar bza'// yang na de dang bskol ba yi// mar gyis tshad 'khru myur du sel// rgya skyugs btsi'i skye paM paM l-ing // skyer pa'i shUn pa pu tse shel// dug mo nyung dang bcas bskol mar// thug smra
233b5(gso rig): thug bi dang sbyar bas// nad gzhi gru sum las byung ba yi// mi bzad 'khru ba 'ang myur du sel// sa nag dung dang shing mang dang // sbrang rtsir khrag 'bras chur blud// khAg nI 'khru bi sAl bAr byed// pr-i yaM ku dang
233b6(gso rig): 'di phan// til nag btigs pa'i lde gu dang / sha khar ni cha lnga ni/ ma mar sbyar ba blad// 'phral du khrag tu 'khru ba sa la// kha ra spring rtsi n+dan po ces// 'bras kyi chu dang thung na ni// khong tshe skom dang gtson nang
234a1(gso rig): ngang // khrag tu 'khru las thar bar 'gyur// gzhang kha tsha zhing 'dul ba la// bsil ba'i sman gyis blugs shing bsku// gang tshe yang dang yang du 'khru// khrag nyung gzer dang bcas par 'khru//
234a2(gso rig): rlung gis gags ni byas gyur pas// skra byas 'byung ba mi 'byung byed// de tshe de la sbyin bag ni// 'jam rtsi sngar bshad bting bar bya// kwadz+ra da ra shing shA ba// la sogs 'o ma cham chom brdungs// nas dang bskol ba'i
234a3(gso rig): khu ba dang // mar dang 'o ma bcas par bskol// sbyin bag 'jam rtsi btang nas ni// bai stabs 'khru dang gzhing 'byung dang // mkhrego pa'i nad rnams sel byed cing // skem po stobs ni skyed par byed// stag tsher ba dang
234a4(gso rig): bskol ba yi// mar gyi 'jam rtsi btang bar bya// dang por bshad pa khrag 'dres 'byung // yang na phyis ni 'khru gyur pa// de la nyem shing bskol ba'i mar// lde gu'i don du sbyar bar bya// kha ra cha phyed dang sbyar la// sbrang rtsi bzhi
234a5(gso rig): cha bcug pa yi// mar sar phan pa'i zas zos na// nad med myur du sel bar 'gyur// u du ba ra n+ya gro d+ha// i shad+d+ha yi myur gu ni// brdungs te zhag gcig chu nang spangs// mnyes te btsags par mar bskol la// khA ra
234a6(gso rig): de yi phye btab cing // sbrang rtsi bzhi cha btab ste thung // gang zhig khrig ni thur ngu 'am// gyen du 'byung bor byed la sbyin// bad kan 'khru ba rlung bshad pa'i// ma zhu smin bya mchog tu bya// rjes su 'brel pa de la ni// bil+la gzhon
234b1(gso rig): nu glu sgang dang // a ru ra dang bca' sga bskol// sbyin cing me drod bskyed pa blung // shu dag dong gra bi TI ka/ pu di ka dang thang shing ngam// pi pi ling gnyis kru trug tres// pi pi ling gi rtsa ba 'am// pa tra tsi t+ta dug mo nyung // shu
234b2(gso rig): dag po pi ling rtsa ba// bu tse shel dang a rU ra// bskol ba 'am yang na btags pa sbyin// bad kan chad par 'khru sman blung // khA ru tsha dang tsha ba gA suma?// shu dag shing kun bodra ba dkar// a ru ra yi chu tshan bcas/
234b3(gso rig): bAd kan 'khru bAs nyen la blung // ka pat+ti yi rkang dang ni// tsha gsum sbrang rtsi sha khar 'o ma// kat+tA la dang sbrang rtsir bcos// lto yi nang ni sel byed yin// piM pI ling dang sbrang rtsir bcas// tsi trA ka dang dar bar bcas//
234b4(gso rig): babil+la gzhon nu byin na yang // 'khru ba'i nad ni sel bar byed// pa taM gla sgang mon dza ra// bil+la dong kra da da ka 'am// bu ram dra rar bcas pa yi sau// 'khru ba shin tu gso dka'ang sel// pi pi ling rtsa la la phud // dr-i
234b5(gso rig): bzang bzhi dang dong gra dang // na le shim dang kru trug tres// 'u su zi ra ba li kA/ kha ru tsha rnams cha mnyams dang // da tr-ig dang ni da da ki/ bil+la dang ni pi pi ling // se'u 'bru dang ni la la pud// sum 'gyur ka ra drug 'gyur
234b6(gso rig): dang // ka pat+ti ni brgyad 'gyur byas// phye mas tshad 'khru pho ba'i nang // zad byed sman dang lkog ma'i nad// lung pa dbugs mi bde drod nyams// gzhang 'brum cham pa yi ga 'chus sel// mig rkang dang ni dri sna bzhi// zho ni gnyis
235a1(gso rig): gnyis la la phung // lu su zi ra zho bzhi bawI// pi pI ling rtsa tsha ba gsum// smang ni re rI se'u 'bru dang // kha ra srang brgyad cig sbyar 'di// phye ma se'u 'bru brgyad pa yin// ston gong ma dag dang
235a2(gso rig): 'dra// kha zas rlung gis 'khru bar bshad// sbyar thug la sogs ci rigs sbyin// na le shram dang bi nAM ka/ kA pi ta dang dang grar bcas// tsang gi ri dang rgya shug sgyur// sbyar dug bad kan 'khru ba sil// bad kun zad
235a3(gso rig): la sngar bshad pa'i// rgya skegs la sogaso srang drug pa// nas thug dang ni bsres pa yi// mar ni rnying pa sbyin par bya// rlung dang bad kan gyis bkag pa// bad ka na shas cher 'khru ba 'am// gzer zhing mkhrel/
235a4(gso rig): bar byed pa la// sbyin bgro 'jam rtsi bsngags pa yin// shu dag bilpa pi pi ling // ru rta shu ti rgyam tshar bcas// bil+lo'i mar ram til mar ni// shu dag sogs dang bskol ba btang // bad kan rlung gis shwas cher
235a5(gso rig): gzir// cung zad dro ba'i 'jam rtsi btang // bad kan zud cing yun ring du// 'khru zhing nyams chung gyur pa na// rlung ni nges par stobs che bas// rang gi gnas na brten te skye// de stobs che bas 'phral gsod byed//
235a6(gso rig): de phyir de ni myur du gso// rlung gi rjes la mkhris pa ste// mkhris pa'i rjes la bad kan ni// gso ba 'am gsum las dang por ni// gang zhig shas cher gyur pa gos// 'jigs dang mya ngan dag las kyang // myur
235b1(gso rig): du 'khrugs pas de phyir der// rlung bstsal ba yi gso ba dang // dbugs dbyung ba dang dga' bar bya// gang zhig gcin med phyi sa dang // phyen ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang // me drod che zhing lto ba yang // de yi khong nad zhe
235b2(gso rig): ba yini// yan+ya lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// gasngo ba'i gnas las le'u dgu pa'o// // de nas pho ba'i nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// pho ba la ni brten pa'i nang // ma
235b3(gso rig): zhu ba ltar gso byar byA// 'khru bar bshad pa'i cho ga yis// de yi ma zhu smin par bya// thas kyi dus su nAs thug sogs// tsha ba lnga sogs ldan pa dang // tsha bro yang pa'i kha zas dang // gzhan yang drong skyed sbyor ba sbyin//
235b4(gso rig): ma zhur thug pa bong de dkar/ bca' sgra skyur dang bcas pa sbyin// btung bar 'khru ba las bshad pa'i// chu dang dar ba chang sogs blud// pho ba'i nad la dar ba ni// drod bskyed 'khru gcod yang bas na// phan to zhu rjes
235b5(gso rig): mngar ba'i phyir// mkhris pa skyed par mi byed do// bska zhing dri la spyod byed dang // rtsub phyir bad kun la yang phanra// mngar sgyur khyabs rlung la phan// bsrubs ma thag tu tshi mi bskyed// sbyar ba bzhi po bre gang dang // tsha ba
235b6(gso rig): gsum ni srong gsum dang // rgyo che srang bzhi kha ra ni// srang brgyad phye mor byas pa de// tshod ma sran tshod btung ba sogs// bai tung ngo drug sogs la yang gdab// ma zhu lung pa dbugs mi bde// yi ga 'chus dang skran
236a1(gso rig): mchin pa// pho ba'i snying nang skya rbab 'joms// dong gra gla sgang bod du dkar// bskol ba ma zhu sel byed blud// de yi lde gu chu tshan nam// bca' sga 'am a ru ra bcas blung // shu dag la sogs
236a2(gso rig): rgyam tshar bcas// yang na chang dang sbyar ba blung // bshang ba ma smin 'khru bcas la// se'u 'bru'i chu dang bcas ba yi// bilba dong kr-i tsi tra ka/ khe ru tshaM ni btags pa sbyin// bad kan rlung gyur be snabs can// khongadA pA
236a3(gso rig): gzer la dug mo nyung // shin tu bong ngo kha ru che// shu dag a ru ra chu dron// skyug pa'i rjes la gzer zhing sgong // a ru ra dang kha ru tsha// zi ran le sham bcas phye// chu dron dang nI bcas par blud // dong gra pa ta pi bI
236a4(gso rig): ling / thul tres 'bri hA ti gnyis dang // dug mo nyung dang tsi tra ka/ tsha ba rnam ldi thal sman gnyis// phyer btags chang zho de'i dngas ma// chu dron rang skyur dag las blud// des ni me drod 'phel byed cing // khong pa'i
236a5(gso rig): rlung ni sel mchog yin// lan tshwa wA dang thal s+yAn+ta gAnyis// tsha ba lnga dang nu lA shrAm// la la phung dang shing kun las// skyur rtsi chen po 'am se 'bru 'am// rgya shug khu bus ril bur byas// smin dang drod skyed byed
236a6(gso rig): mchog yin// bal bu'i lo ma dbyi mo dang // pi pi ling ni srang re dang // pi pi ling dang de rtsa srang // gnyis gnyis bca' sga srang gsum dang // dri sna bzhi dang puM shal tse// zho ni gnyis gnyis phyir zhi bo btag/
236b1(gso rig): pubu raM suM 'gyur dag gis ni// ril bu byas pa rtag tu bza'// de rjes yu sha sha khu chang // chang rnying 'o ma zho kha chu// thug pa blud na rlung dang ni// bad kan las gyur slon bro dang // pho ba'i rtsib logs snying gA na//
236b2(gso rig): rims dang 'or nad skyu rba ba dang // skran dang chang nang gzhang 'brum dang // cham pa mchil ma dbugs mi bde// lung pa rnams ni 'joms par byed// bshang ba 'gags la de nyid ni// bca' sgra g+ho ru a ru
236b3(gso rig): ra// bcug ste de la sbyin par bya// mkhris gyur smon bro la sogs la// kha ra bzhi 'gyur bcas par ni// bskol ba las ni ril bu bya// yang na bu ra ma kha ras bya// me dang phrad par gyur pa las// de ni mchog
236b4(gso rig): tu yangs par 'gyur// dre bsau 'di ni ma zhu smin// rlung las gyur pa'i pho nad la// drod bskyed sman dang btsasna pa dang // mar ni nyung zung nyung zad blung // me rbod chung zhing skyes gyur nas// bu shang gA tsi rlung ni
236b5(gso rig): 'gags gyur na// zhag ni gnyis gsum snum btang dugs// baisku byas mas btung drag po bye// de nas e raN+Da'i mar re// seng phrom+b+ha gyi ni mar+ya dang ni// thal sman dag gis rlung zhi nas// g.yos pa'i nad la bkru
236b6(gso rig): sman btang // sbyangs nas khong pa rtsub 'gyur te// bshang ba 'gag so la 'jam rtsi ni// drong bskyed sbyar zhing rlung 'joms pa'i// sman btsos til mar de la btang // de ltar bkru sman drag bkru sman// 'jam
237a1(gso rig): rtsi cho ga bzhin byas nas// kha zas yang ba dang ldan pa'i// zhun mar slar yang bsten par bya// rtsa ba lnga dang tsha ba gsum// a ru ra dang lce myang cha// ra sna pi pi ling rtsa ba// thal sman rnam gnyis gci
237a2(gso rig): ra dang // bi TAng+ka dang zur ba myar// tsha drong skyur rtsi chen po yi// khu ba dang ni sge'u gshai ra dang // la phug skam po rgyo shug sbyar// se 'bru tsug tri ka'i khu ba// dor ba zho dang cheng dngas dang // rtsa ba mo dngos ma rtsa ba mo dang //
237a3(gso rig): skyur btsags dang ni dA bskol ba// me dr-i da bskyed pa'i dam pa yin// gzar dang skran dang dmu rdzing dang // lud pa dbugs mi bde ba dang // rlung dang bad kan 'joms par byed// yang na sgyur rtsi chen po yi// khu ba bskol
237a4(gso rig): ba'i mar blud bya// 'di yis til mar bskol ba yis// bsku byug byas na rlung sol to// rlung dang pad kan 'dres mA zhu 'am// pad kAn rlung rigs che ba 'am// sman ni 'dri dag nyid kyi phye// chu dron sbyar ba blud par bya//
237a5(gso rig): mkhris pa sa mo drod nyams gyur pa// bkru sman dag gam slon smin btang // ying dang yang du 'khru gtsang dang // tsha mi bskyed pas drod bsgying bya// phye ma snum dang kha ba yi// me drod nye bor bskyed por bya// ba to la dang

237b1(gso rig): la la phung // sa nag+na bong nga tsha ba gasnu ma// shing tsha sug+na sgyel thang shing dang // gan+d+ha pa tra phye ma ni// sbrang rtsi'i lde gur byas bza' ba 'am// chung ngam chu dang sbyar 'thungs na// snying nad s+yA rba bA pho ba'i nang // sbran
237b2(gso rig): gzer rims dang yi gA 'chus// mig ser 'dus pa'i nid dang ni// kha ba'i nad rnamaso 'joms par byed// rtsa mau khris gla sgang pu tse shel// tsha ba gA sum dang dug mo nyung // tsi tra ka ni cha gnyis dang // dug
237b3(gso rig): mo nyung gi shun pags ni// bcu drug cha sbyar zhib tu btags// de ni bu ram chu grang blung// pho ba'i nad dang sbran sol zhing // mig ser skya rbab rims kyi nad// yi ga 'chus dang 'khru ba 'joms// dong kra bong nga gla sgang
237b4(gso rig): dang // pa ta bil+la skyer khan dang // dug mo nyung gi sa bon dang // tik+ta da da ka'i mi trog/ phyi mar btags pa sbrang rtsir sbyar// 'bras grus chu dang blung na ni// mkhris pa las gyur po ba'i nad// mkhreg 'khrug gzhing
237b5(gso rig): 'brum gra zhang kha nau// khrag tu 'khru ba dAg la 'ang phran// tsAn+na shugrA pa pU shel tse// pau ta mur ba glA bya dang / shu dgra thA la ces dbyi mo dang // lo mu bdun+na pA ba sha ka/ ba ti la dang n+ya gro d+ha// u dum+bA rA a shAd+tha// p+lag

238b2(gso rig): na// des ni bad kr-in rlung nad ni// kun dang dug dang dbyig dug 'joms// rtsa mkhris dang nr-i pu tse she lA// ba tol nIm+p+ra paR+Ya ta// bsdigs la ma he'i gcin dang ni// 'thungs na mai drod skye byed yin// shu dag
238b3(gso rig): ru rta ser po gnyisna// tsi tra ka dang pu tse shail// gla sgo nga ra yaM gcin dang ni// bskol ba me drod skye byed yin// su ta'i sdong bu srang bzhi dang // lan tsha gsum las srang rai dang // parta ka nau phul gang dang //

238b6(gso rig): 'phel byed yin// bad kan can gyi pho ba'i nad// rlung bcas de la mar dang bskol// thang la bar dang srang drug pa// de bzhin go bye'i sman mar blung // kha ru tsha dang tsha nag dang // bul tog dang ni swartsi ka/ nas
239a1(gso rig): tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang // kaN+Da ka ri'i sap+tA la// tsi tra ka ni gcig tu bsregs// lan bdun par du bsags pa yi// thal khu bre ngo mar bre bzhi// bskol la me drong bskyed phyir
239a2(gso rig): blu nga/ 'dus pa las ni lnga po dang // 'di dag nyams stobs ji bzhin bya// bad kan mchil myang drod chung la// kha rtsub me drod bskyed par sbyar// bang kan las byung skem pa la// snum dang rtsub pa res kyis

239a6(gso rig): ba sro ba yis// bska ba 'byin par byed pa dag/ de lo lan tshwa bcas pa'i mar// zas ni sba bar byed pa sbyin// nub pas ma drong chung la ma // yang nai ti la mor drid sbed thung // sbom mong 'thungs pas drod nyams
239b1(gso rig): 2/ thal spun bye mtshung rnyong sbyar// rtug 'gags pa la mas btang ba'o// drag po dang ni 'jam rtsi bya// nad chabs che ba s+ya me drod nyams// sbyang byas zas kyi cho ga spyad// nang byung me drong chung ba la// zhun
239b2(gso rig): mAr 'ba' zhig skyed byed pa// lam dang sbyang bas nyams chung la// nas thug mAr dang sbyar ba 'am// zas bcas blud na stobs bskyed cing // dr-ing bskyed rta bar byed po yIn// yun ring nyal po sbyad pa dang //

239b4(gso rig): stobs ni mchog tu skyed par byed// snumra dang mnan chang chang rnying dang // sman khu phye ma 'i phrod pa zos// lus la legs por sbyar ba yis// stobs dang me drod 'phel bar byed // dper na me ni shing sra

239b6(gso rig): zos pa// zas drags gyur pas 'bar mi byed// gang tshe bad kan zad mkhris pa// rang gi gnas su rlung zhugs na// me drod 'phel zhing rab rgyas 'gyur// de tshe me ni rlung bcas pas// zas smin byas nas
240a1(gso rig): lus zungs kyang // zad cing mngangs 'thor byed pas gsod // zas zlos nas ni bde 'gyur la// zhu nas mun zhugs snyam sems 'gyur// skom dang tsha brgya la dbugs mi bde// la sngogs
240a2(gso rig): me drod drugs las 'byung // zas snum+ba la rtul ba dang // glang dang 'ju dka' me drod 'bri// 'bar ba'i me le chu blugs ltar// me drod shas che de zhi bya// de ni kha zas ma zhu la'ang // yang dang yang du zas sbyin bya/
240a3(gso rig): bung shing med pa'i skabs rnyeng lta ri// ji nas 'dir gnod myi 'gyur bya// kri sa ra dang 'o thug snum// snu mu khur blo rim g.yos pa dang // rlan can chu yi srog chags ni// tsho byA yi nI shA sbyin no// mchog tu nyon
240a4(gso rig): 'dzum po dang // mi 'gul tshul gnas pa sbyin// lug sha chen po dag kyang ni// zos na me drod dregs pa sel// 'o ma sbrang rtsi bcas pa 'am// mar dang sbyar bas skom che blung // gro yi phye nI 'o ma dang // mar ni mang
240a5(gso rig): bopor bcas pa byung // rnon tsan+d+ra srog chagasa~M sha khru dang // til mar ma gtog spu snum can thung // sha ma dur byid dang bskol ba'i// 'o ma'i bkru sgren blung par bya// mkhros pa sel po'i kha zas dang // 'o thug
240a6(gso rig): lan mang sbyin par bya// gang zhig lci zhing tshil bskyed dang // bad kan bskyed pa'i khe zas rnams// thams cad mo drong drag la phan// zos nas nyin por nyal por byed// zas ni me drod kyis 'ju byed// zas
240b1(gso rig): med nas ni nad zad byed// lus zungs zad par byed par 'gyur// lus zungs zad nas 'chi bar 'gyur// zas 'di dag ni rang bzhin gyisnga ma mthun// 'di ni sbyor dang g.yos kyis mi bya phrod pa// de la sogs

246b1(gso rig): shas che la rtsa ba lnga// bskol bas rma ni bkru ba dang // thang shing sogs te shing mngar dang // til mar rgyam tshas rma bsku bya// bkru sman dang ni ldan pa yi// dur byid kyis ni rnam sbyang zhing // bi da ra yi sde bskol ba'i// dur
246b2(gso rig): byid nyid kyis rma 'byor bya// mkhyis gyur 'o ma can chus bkru// sle tres shing mngar til gyis bsku// btsod dang shug paM bu shIl rtse// pa ye sa dang ser po gnyis// 'bras bu gsum dang shing mngar dang // 'o mar bcas

248a1(gso rig): bskol 'jam rtsi btang // rlung 'joms drugs dang bsku mnyebya// sprin nas dral la rmA ltar gso// rgyu rlugs khrag mkhris las gyur la// smin nas ma sprin ji bzhin du// rmA dang sbyangs pa'i gso
