292a4(gso rig): lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas skyug sman dang bkru sman gyi nyes pa grub par bya ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o// smyug sman l-I ni snyi ba
292a5(gso rig): 'am nya ltogs pa 'am bad kan shas chung ba 'am// shin tu rno ba 'am grang pa'ang chung // mu zhu ba 'am nyams chu dA le'o// blud na nang 'byung raM ba nyams// de tshe thur byung nad slong 'gyur// de l-i slar yang snum 'tshas
292a6(gso rig): byaHsngar gyi skyon dran skyug sman btang // bkru sman ma zhu bad kan dang // ldan pa'am shin tu rno ches la// dro ba 'am shin tu shas ches pa// yi gar mi 'ong mangs pa yis// gyen du brgal bar gyur pa dag/ sder bshad
292b1(gso rig): nges pa de la ni// grub pa'i sbyor ba de bzhin bya// de yang snod du ma chags na// gsum po de la blung mi bya// gzhan du goms pa'ang zhim pa yi// sman ni gnod pa med pa btang // snum 'chos dugs ni ma byas la//
292b2(gso rig): sman ni snyi zhing rtsub pa yis// nang slongs byed par ma nus pas// mgro 'khor sbrang dang skyigs bu dang // mun par mthong dang skom dang che// byin snying na zhing lus ga ya' dang // bla dIng kha dog mi sdug pA'o// nAng ni
292b3(gso rig): skyed par byed pa yin// snum chos dugs byas sman nyung zhing // me drod che bas zhu gyur po 'am// grang bas rengs pa 'am ma zhu bas// nang slongs nas ni ma phyin pas// nang ni de dag nyid bskyed cing // de nyid sbyor
292b4(gso rig): nyes thams cad yin// dI la til mar rgyu mau tshwa bsku// bshag ma rdo yis dugs bya zhing // mas bAtAng drag byas skam sa'i shu/ kha zas byin la 'jam rtsi ni// po son cha dang pi pi ling // thong shing til mar bskol
292b5(gso rig): ba btang // rlung 'joms rlung gi snum 'chos bya// slar yang bkru sman ts+tshin po sau sbyang // nang gzhi che zhing khong rtsub la// me drong chung dang sman chung bA// rtug skam bcas pas slongs pa dang // nad kyis lam ni
292b6(gso rig): 'gags par 'gyur// mi bzang sgo de nga lte ba dang // rgyab dang rtsib log mgo bo na// phyi sa gcin 'gags dbugs mi bde// mi bzad pa ni skyed par byed// bsku dang dugs dang rengs bu sogs// mas btang
293a1(gso rig): drag po 'jam rtsi bya// rtug skam gso ba'i gso dpyad lwa ba// thams cad spro ba dag la phan// rtsa ba lnga pa nas tshig 'khrus// shu dag pu ti ka rany+dza// rgyu mtsha nas thug legs sbyar bas//
293a2(gso rig): gzer nad rtug skam lto spros 'joms// thal spyan se 'bru pi pi lding // shing kun bca' sgre star bu dang // rgya mcha bcas pa'i chang ngam ni// ma ra ra ma chu dron bcas paM b+hung // mkhregs cing yongasu 'jig pa
293a3(gso rig): dang // na zhing bcad snyam sems pa spel// sman 'thungs gyur pa'i shugs bkag na// rlung la sogs phyi'i nad rnams ni// 'khrugs te snying gi phyogaso song nas// snying nas mi bzang skyed par byed// skyigs
293a4(gso rig): bu lung pA rtsi ba logs na// rmya zhing mig 'dzu kha chu 'a dza ga/ dran paM nyams shing lce 'cha' la// so ni kr-ig krig+sa 'cha' bar byed// de la sman+do pas ma rmongs pas// mkhris pas nyin la maungar+yA br-i dang //
293a5(gso rig): bad kan gyis nyen kha ba yi// skyugs smon dag ni myur du btang // de nas de la smin byed pa'i// nad kyi lhag ma smin par bya/ yi me drod lus kyi stobs// rim gyis mngon par 'phel bar byed// shas cher skyon
293a6(gso rig): gyur rlung gis ni// nang gi snying ni gzer gyur pa// de la snum gyur lan tshwa sbyin// mkhris pa bad kan de las gzhan/ sman ni 'thungs par gyur nas shugs// bkag par gyur pa'ang bad kar gyis// 'gegs
293b1(gso rig): pa 'am shin tu sbyangs gyur pa'i// lus la rlung ni 'jug 'gyur bas// rengs dang 'dar dang zug pa dang // lus snyom dkris snyam sems shing zug/ de la rlung ni 'joms pa yis// snum chos dugs sogs thang
293b2(gso rig): bsngags// sman thun che la rno ba ni// bkre sa nyen lto snyi la blung na// bang kan mkhris pa bshang ba ni// bsal nus lus zungs 'dzag par byed// de la sbyor drags mngar ba yi// sman gyi lhag ma slon du gzhug/
293b3(gso rig): skyug sman drags la bkru sman btang // 'khrus drags skyug sman 'jam po btang // de la chu grang blugs pa dang // ro smad bcing pas bcad par bya// tang zi lo tsan pu shre tse// ra khrag kha ra'i mu dang ni// 'bras yos phye/
293b4(gso rig): ma'i skyo ma ni// sbyor drags sel ba'i dam pa yin// slo nA sman sbyor ba drags pa la// chu grang dag ni blugs par bya// rgu ni 'brum la sogs khu ba maur// sbrang rtsi kha rI'i skyo ma blung // sgrags pa bcas par shin tu skyog/
293b5(gso rig): mur bau 'u su smra sgang dang // stad zil ma du ka phye ma// sbrang rtsir btsosnga pa'i lde gu sbyin// smon mthar l+yA ni 'khums pa la// snum dung skyur dang lan tshwa dang // ldan pa'i ma khur ba bkang bya dang // yId 'ong lug sha sha khu
293b6(gso rig): phan// de yi mdun du mi gzhan ni// 'bras bu sbyor ba za ru gzhug/ lce phyir byung le ti l-i dang ni// rgun 'brum lde gu bskus nas gzhug/ tshig bkug rlung gi nang la ni// mar dang sha dang g.yos pa yi// nas thugs sla ba

294a6(gso rig): nyan du gzhug// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u gsum pa'o//
294b1(gso rig): ba lnga pa rnam gnyis srang re'i tshad// po son cha brgyad ra sha srang lnga bcu chu nang bskol te bzhi cha lus gyur pa// btsags pal la phung dang po son cha// bIlpa ru rta sha da puSh+pa dang // shu dag gla sgad pi bi ling rnams kyi// lde gu
294b2(gso rig): bu ram sbrang rtsi mar dang ni// til mar rgyam cha dag dang ldan gyur pa// dro 'jam cho ga bzhin du btang gyur pa// mas btang mchog ste nang kun 'joms pa yin// nad med la phan tshwa ring nyam rtas byed// 'jam rtsi gang du lde gu ma
294b3(gso rig): smos pa// der ni kun la 'di nyid gzhug par bya// rtsa ba bcu pa'i khu ba sgyur dang ni// ra sha bcas pa sne mra btags pa dang // snum chen gsum ldan mas btang mchog yin te// rlung gi nang kun 'joms par rab tu bshad//
294b4(gso rig): pa lA pa tol rtsa ba chung ngu lha// kyi lte ba dang oM raN+Da dang nas// bskol ba 'i khu ba br-i gang ra shwa'i khu// de'i phyed bcug lA bskol te pre gang lus// pri yaM ku dang gla sgang pi pi lding // lde gur bcas shing til mar zhun mar dang //
294b5(gso rig): sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha dang ni ldan gyur pa'i// 'jam rtsi btang na me drog 'phel ba dang // nyams stobs bskyed cing sha ni rgyas pa dang // mi ga gi gsal stobs 'phral du bskyed par byed// a ran da'i rtsa srung gsum pa la sha/ skad gsum
294b6(gso rig): rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu dang // ra swa pa la sle tres pa spu ba// a sha gan da dong ka thang shing rnams// po son cha brgyad chu bre brgyad du bskol// brgyad cha lus par gyur pa de nong du// shu thag shu ti swa ma'i 'bras bu dang // pri yang ku dang
295a1(gso rig): shing mngar phyi pi ling // dug mo nyungs kyi sa bon glu sgang dang // skyer pa'i khan daru bcas pa zhib btags pa// zho gnyis tshad kyi rgya mtshur bcas pa dang // sbrang rtsi til mar ba gcin dang
295a2(gso rig): sbyar ba'i// mas btang sgyug byed me drod bskyed pa dang // rkang pa byin pa baR+YA dang mjug to dang // lto ba snying dang phyo mtshan nu ba dang // lus lci rlung dang bshong gci bAgag dang skran// sde chags rgyu lugs gzhang 'brum
295a3(gso rig): pho ba'i nang // bad kan rlung nang de dang de dag 'joms// shing mdor seng phro ma tsAn a ru ra// tsAn ut+pal ba yi 'o mAr bskol// 'tsho byed kha ra mar dang bcas pa lI// 'jam rtsi mkhris pa'i nang rnams sel bar byed//
295a4(gso rig): d+ha sU bA sha kra btsos byi tsher ba// ba bru rtsa ba chung lnga rtsa ba'i lnga// sbrul tres tsan shug pa rnams gnyis dang // shing mngar seng phrom srang ni phyong phyed dang // chu dang bskol ba'i khu ba de dang ni// 'o ma bre bzhi bskol te chung ngu'i bAr//
295a5(gso rig): dzI bin+ti dang me da rnam gnyis dang // nyer shing ram nye ba gnyis bi da rI// ka she ru dang kha ra dkar po dang // dzi ba ka dung pad+ma ge sar dang // stago tshor ut+pal dang pad+ma kar// seng phrom kha sral phre'u shing mngar dang // nA ga ge
295a6(gso rig): ser muny+dza ta ka dang // tsAn rnam gnyis btags pa mar dang ni// sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha dang ni ldan byas pa// bsgrangs pa'i ni ru ha ni btang bar bya// slar phyung skam sa'i sha khu 'am 'o ma dang // 'bras chan byin la lus la chu blugs bya//
295b1(gso rig): lus tsha tshad 'khru mngal nang khrag mkhris dang // snying nad skya rbab mi bzang rims dang ni// skran bcas gcin 'gags mig ser la sogs/ pa// mkhris pa las gyur nad ni thams cad 'joms// ko sha ta ki dong kA thang
295b2(gso rig): shing dang // mur ba gze ma arka dugA mo nyung // pA ta rgya sran 'bri ha ti chu bskol// khu ba srang nI nyi shu lus pa dang // der ni yungs kar sug spel po son tshwa// ru rta zhi nI gnyis gnyis tshad dang ni// sbrang rtsi po son cha yi mar
295b3(gso rig): dang ni// thal sman yungs marA sranga? ni gnyis gnyis bcas// mas btang me drod chung dang yi ga 'chus// bang kan las gyur nad ni kun la phan// de nas ni ru ha 'di ni// snum 'jam sgyid de ba dang ni// las kyis lus
295b4(gso rig): snyom gyur pa'i sman// srang ni gnyis gnyis so sor bshang // 'o ma las ni slang bzhir bya// srang rtsi til mar mar khyor re// gzar bus bkrugs pa mas btang bas// rlung 'joms stobs dang kha dog bskyed// trail
295b5(gso rig): mar chang dang sbrang rtsi mar// khyor ni re re'i tshang du byas// byil pa la sogs rtsa ba ni// khyor gnyis rgya sran khu ba ni// khyor ngo bcas pa rlung nad sel// pa to la dang nim+ba dang // lo ma bdun pa pu ti ka/ ra sna'i khu ba srang gnyis gnyis//
295b6(gso rig): mar srang gnyis dang yungs kar gyi// lde gu bcas pa kha ba lnga// bang kan mang dang srin nad dang // mdze dang za khu'i nad rnams 'joms// til mar b+ha bzhin zho kha chu// skyur rtsabs khyor ni re re dag/ yungs kar btags pa'i lde
296a1(gso rig): gur sbyar// rtug 'gags lto sgros sel byed yin// pa yas sa dang bu ram shing // sa la paN+Di bi nga ri// ra sna khyor re pi pI ling // lde gu sbrang rtsi mar sbyar ba'i// mas bats+tshang khu ba 'phel bAr byed// de nas
296a2(gso rig): grub pa'i 'jam rtsi ni// nyes pa med cing 'bras bu che// stobasau paskyed lus 'phel bdi bar byed// kun tu sbyar bya bshad par bya// sbrang rtsi til mar che mnyam pa// rgyam tsha zho gnyis shu ti bzhi// e raN+Da yi rtsi ba bskol//
296a3(gso rig): mas btang sbrang rtsi til lngar dang // bcud kyis len te gcin sti dang // gzhang 'brum srin bu skran nang dang // rgyu ma rlugs pa'i nad rnams sol// 'di ni shing mngar phye mar bcas// mig lnga phan zhing khrag mkhri sa sel// glu
296a4(gso rig): skusbrang lde gu sbrang rtsi dang // tIl mar sha khu mar bcas pa// 'tsho bar byed pa zhes bya ste// gzhang gI nad dang brla nod dang // chu so dang ni rlig pA dang // pho mtshan zug pa'i nad rnams sel// sbrang rtsi mar dang zhag dad+ha ni// til mar khyir ni
296a5(gso rig): re re'i tsheng// rgyu ma tshwa zho gcig swa ma yi// 'bras bu srang phyed bcas pA dag/ de yang 'tsho ba yin par bshad// e raN+Da rtsa bskol ba yi// khu ba shu dag bi pi ling // po son cha yi phye mar bcas// sbrang rtsi til mar rgyam tshar
296a6(gso rig): bcas// 'di ni shing rta can zhes bya// de bskol shu dag shu ti dang // shing kun rgyam tsha thang shing dang // ra sna sbrang rtsir sbyar ba yi// 'jam rtsi nang sel zhes bya dge/ rtsa ba lnga yi khu ba dang // pi pi ling dang rgyam tsha dang // shing mngar sdang
296b1(gso rig): rtsir bcas pa yi// til mar grub pa'i 'jam rtsir bshad// rtsa ba bcu pa 'bras bu gsum// po son cha ni bilbar bskol// ba gcin dang ni de btags shing // pa ta gla sgang dug mo nyung // lan tshwa po son cha til mar// thal sman
296b2(gso rig): lan tshwar+ya bcas pa ni// rigs pa'i 'jam rdzi bad kan nad// sgyu rba bu gsung pa'i nad rnams dang // khu ba rlung ni bag gas pa dang // rlung 'khrugs pa la bsngags pa yin// gla skrad pa ta e rat+na// sle tres pa la baM spu ba//
296b3(gso rig): ra sna bcod dang dong ka dang // pu shel tse dang kyi lce ba// ba ru ra dang pu tse shel// rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu rnams// srang re po son tshwa rtog brgyad// de ni chu bre bzhi nang bskol// bzhi cha lus pa btsags nAs ni// 'o ma bre do dang bsrel la/

296b5(gso rig): nas ni// sha dang mi drod lus kyi stobs// khu ba 'phel bar byed pa yin// dreg nang rmongs bag gcin sti dang // gzhang 'brum sbran dang bshang gci 'grogs// mi bzang rims dang me dpal dang // rgyu rlugs lto sngo 'khrug cing
296b6(gso rig): 'khru// chu so rked pa brla dku na// gnye'u rings rna ba 'go bo'i nang // zla mtshan nad dang skyo byed dang // 'or nang lung pa rde'u chags dpag cin 'khyil ba yi nang rnams 'joms// dbang po nyams shing zhum pa dang // mig la phan
297a1(gso rig): zhing bu skyed byed// 'tsho byed rgyal po bcud len yin// ri dgas pho mo mgo chung ba// rtsa ba bcu pa bskol ba'i chu// sgyu ma'i 'bras bu shu ti dang // gla sgang lde gu snum chen bcas// mas btang rlung ni
297a2(gso rig): sel ba'i mchog/ shin tu ro tsir byed pa yin// rma bya'i gshog pa mkhris pa dang // rgyu ma rkang pa mchu rtug pa// bor ba'i sha ni 'ba' zhig dang // rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu ni// srang re dang ni ldan gyur pa// chu dang 'o mar bskol nas ni//
297a3(gso rig): 'o ma lus par sbrang rtsi mar// bac+doMs dang de bzhin po da ri// shIng mngar shu ti pi pi l-ing // po son ma y-i lde gur bsres// rgyamatsha cung zad btab pa yi// 'jam rtsi stobs 'phel ro rtsi'i mchog/ gong ma bsregs la
297a4(gso rig): sogs pa la'ang // cho ga 'di ni sor bya// khron gyis gzas tshol thaMd dang // mthu rtsal mchu yis gzas tshol ba// chu la gnas pa'ang de bzhin te// nya la 'o ma spang bar bya// sram dang ne'u le byi la dang // reg 'jam
297a5(gso rig): byi ba rnams kyi sha/ re re skyang bcu rtsa ba lnga// 'o ma'i nang du bskol nas ni// 'o ma der ni po son cha// pi pi ling dang lan tshwa gnyis// kha ra til mar sbrang rtsi mar// 'jam rtsi btang ni bcud len yin// rtsol bas dkrugs glo
297a6(gso rig): 'grams pa dang // dbang po nyams dang gzi mdangs stobs// khu chu bshang gci 'gags pa dang // dreg nad kyis 'theng nang rnams dang // rta dang glang po shing rtas g.yengs// rkang lag chag grugs gyur pa la// slar ni bde
297b1(gso rig): bar 'tsho byed cing // ro rtswa byed pa'i mchog yin no// kha sral bu ram shing phran las// g.yos su byas pa'i 'o thug blung// snum zhing bsdum pa mi dgos pa'i// grub pa'i sman ni sbyar bar bya// nang 'joms bsrung dang bcas
297b2(gso rig): pa yi// snum gyi 'jam rtsi bshad bya ste// rtsa bA bcu pa bA la dang // ra s+dza a shwa gan+d+ha dang // ba s+phu bau dang e raN dang // sle tr-i s+ya grA pra'i rtswa ba dang // ba sha kA dang bu ti ka/ sa ha ra tsi nyer shing pA// ka ka na se srang ra dang // nas dang
297b3(gso rig): ma sha za rari ma dang // rgya shug rgya sron khyor re'i tshad// chu bre drug cu rtsa bzhi bskol// de las bre ni bcu drug lus// 'tsho byed sde ni srang re bcug/ til mar bre ni bzhi dang bskol// 'di ni 'jam rtsir btang gyur na// rlung
297b4(gso rig): nang zang sel bar byed// de bzhin skamr-i s+ya'i srog chags zhag/ 'tsho byed sde dang bcas par bskol// shu ti nas dang bilta sbyar// til mar bskol bas rlung nang sel// rgyam cha mdog dmar gyur gyi bar// mer bsregs mar
297b5(gso rig): gsur nang rlung 'joms// dzI ban+ti dang byo son cha// me dra rnam gnyis sra ba ni// shing mngar bA la shu ti dang // zangs rtsi ba dang pi pi lcing // ka ka na si nye r+ya shid+b+ha ba// kha sral shrI ra kA ka rI// zuR+sha ba karka tu sring gi/ shu dag bat+sag+na
297b6(gso rig): pa'i lde gu de nga // til mar mar dang 'o ma ni// bzhi 'gyur gyi ni nang du bskol// 'jam rtsi nyams rtas rlung mkhris 'joms// stobs dang khu ba mo drod 'phel// khrag dang khu ba'i nang sel byed// bu skyed par yang byed pa yin//
298a1(gso rig): rgyu ma tsha ru rta po sngon chu// shu ti lcang ma shu dag dang // bA la ka dang shing dang ra dang // ga bra'i rtsa ba kang+ku la// thab shing dong kra ma nu dang // me da dbyi mong tsi tra ka/ zur ba bong nga bi TAng+ga// sha ma dur byid
298a2(gso rig): ha re nu// s+thi ra bilpa ni li ni/ tIng mu sa dang pI pi ling // dan+na ra sna cha mnyam pa// e rat+na yi mar ram ni// tIl mar bskol ba'i 'jam rtsi yis// khad kan+da nad 'joms N+ya rlugs dang // rtug skam spyan dang gzhang 'brum dang //
298a3(gso rig): mcher ba'i nad dang gcin snyi dang // rlung 'khyil pa dang lto spos ding // rdo chags nad ni myur du sel// yang na bilba la sogs pa'i// rtsa ba lnga dang til mar bskol// yang na bdi kan sel sman sbyar// til mar dang btang bad kan
298a4(gso rig): 'joms// yang na po son tshwa brgyad 'gyur// sgyur bskol 'jam rtsi bad kan sal// 'jam rtsi 'jam pa rmongs 'gyur la// rnon pos nye bar sbyang bar bya// rno bas gnod pa snum pa dang // mngar zhing bsil ba 'jam pa btang //
298a5(gso rig): rnon po ba gcin bi lu dang // tsa~M tra ka dang len tshA dang // thal sman dang nI yungs kar rnams// dus la bab par btang bar bya// 'o ma mar sogs 'jam po yin// nad stobs dus dang nad gzhi rang bzhin da ka/ rnam par phye ste 'jam
298a6(gso rig): rtsi btang bar bya// rang rang gi ni sman gyi sde tshan gyis// rang rang gi ni nad rnams bsal bar bya// tsha bas nyam thag laM ba sil ba// bsil bas nyen la dro 'jam sbyar// dang 'tsham pa'i sman ldan par// 'jam rtsi btags
298b1(gso rig): te btang bar bya// sbyang bar bya ba'i nad rnams la// rtas byed 'jam rtsi mi btang zhing // mi gang mdze gcin nad kyis nyen// tshil rgyas nad la btang mi bya// nyams chung glo 'grams pa dang brgyal ba dang // lus sgem ring dang
298b2(gso rig): sbyangs pa'i lus can dang / gang yang dri mAs tshe ni bzung 'gyur la// sbyong bar byed pa'i mas btang btang mi bya// yan lag brgyud pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// /
298b3(gso rig): do nas sman mas btang ba'i cho gas nang phyin te sos par bya ba'i le'u boshad par bya'o// snum 'chos dugs nI ma byas dang // lho lci ba la sman grang snum// tsha nyung sman chad tshungs pa 'am// sman ni bska ba btang 'gyur
298b4(gso rig): na/ dwe yI nad ni smyo ngas gyur dang // stobs chung ba yi nad mo phyin// sbyor ba nyes pa spyir 'gyur zhing klu phyen dang phyi sa gcin sri dang // lci ba chu so nI zhing tsha// dang kar chags shing gzhang sbyangs dang // ga yan pa'i thor bu
298b5(gso rig): mdog mi sdug/ mAM dga' mo drod chung bar 'gyur// tshad 'khru'i nyes pa bar ma la// sngor bshad sman gyi khu ba gnyis// de las gcig ni dro ba yi// btung ba blugs par bsngags pa yin// po son cha yi reng bu dugs//
298b6(gso rig): dus shes pa yis bkru sman btang // bil+la'i rtsa ba dur byid dang // thang shing nas dang rgya shugs pa// rgya sran chang dang ba gcin bcas// mas gta 'gags pa sel bar byed// nad gzhi shas che lus rtsub dang //
299a1(gso rig): lho sra nus pa chung btang na// mas btang nad gzhi slongs nas ni// nga gri lam ni 'gags par byed// rlung ni lam log zhugs pa des// lto spos nang rnams gzir b.rarla byed// gzhang dang lto ba tshab
299a2(gso rig): da / rlig pa chu so na byed tsi dA// snying gaR+Sha 'grags pas gzer ba dA ra// phan tshun du ni 'gro bi ra byed// de la lus bsku dugs byas pa'i// lus la rang bu gzhug par bya// bil+la ba sogs saM pi lu dang // yungs kAr ba
299a3(gso rig): gcin bcas mas btang // nr-i tra thang shing tal mar ni// bskol ba'i 'jam rtsi btang bar bya// shugs ni bkag pa re gyur pa 'am// btsir dregs par ni byas pa 'am// lan tsha snum shas chung la tshe// smyan chung ba yis mas
299a4(gso rig): btang ba// 'jam rtsis rlung gi gyen du 'phrul// kha dang sna nas 'byung bar 'gyur// de yis brgyal dang snying nad dang // skyom dang tsha ba la sogs 'byung // brgyal ba'i nad ni mthong 'gyur na// de yi rdo la chu grang gtor// ngal sos bar du
299a5(gso rig): sma lA b+ha pa dang // dbugs rngub 'byung ba byed du gzhug/ kha srub bzhag spyi rgyab rtsib logs// lto ba lag pa dron pos many+dza// sgra nAs btags te sprug pa dang // sbrul dang mche ba can 'jigs bstan// mtshon dang thog bab rgyal
299a6(gso rig): po'i mis// skrag bcas ma btang thur du 'thung // lag pa gos kyis mgul bar bsdam// ci nas 'chi bar mi 'gyur bya// srog dang gyen du rlung bkag pas// thur sel shing tu bde 'gyur ba// grub pa yin na
299b1(gso rig): mas btang ba// myur du 'dren par byed pa yin// ru rta gla gor zho sha yi// lde gu sgyur rtsabs sbyar te blud// d+yo dang rno dang 'khru ba yis// mas btang lugs bzhin 'byung bar byed// dur byid a ru ra bA gcin// sbyar blung lugs
299b2(gso rig): bzhin 'byung bar byed// zhu ba'i gnas 'dug dugs byas la// rtsa ba bcu pa rmya shug nas// rmya sran po gcin bskol ba yi// mas btang drang por sbyar bar bya// sle rjes smyug ma'i lo ma dang // pu ti ka rany+dza'i shun pa// lo ma zu ra ba thang
299b3(gso rig): shing dang // pu ti ka ni ba gcin bskol// til mar bu ram rgyam tshar bcas// bkru sman lde gur bcas pa btang // mas btang brang na gnas pa la// bil+la l-i sogs lha bskol btang // mgor gnas snar blugs dud pa rngubs//
299b4(gso rig): yungs kar lde gus mgo bo bsku// mas btang drod ches rno sgyur drags// bska ches dugs ni drags pa dang // nad gzhi chung zhing lto snyi la// yang dang yang du btang ba yis// sbyor ba drags pa nyid 'gyur bas// lto ba'i nad ni skyed par
299b5(gso rig): byed// de la bkru sman sbyar drags dang // gso ba mtshungs po nyid du bya// mas btang thal sman sbyar rno dro// lan tshwa can nam mkhris can la// gzhang tsha 'brud cing gnod pa dang // yongs su 'dzag par byed par 'gyur// khrag ni bcos
299b6(gso rig): pa lta bur 'byung // mi khris pa 'ang mdog mang 'byung bar byed// lan mang shugs drag 'byung ba dang // yang dang yang du brgyal bar 'gyur// de la khrag mkhris 'khru ba sel// gso bar rab tu bsngags pa yin// tsha ba sogs la dur
300a1(gso rig): byid kyi/ lde gu rgyun chur sbyar ba blud// de yis bshad rlung mkhris pa ni// bsal nas tsha ba la sogs 'joms// dag gyur nas thug grang mo ni/ kha ra dang ni bcas par blung // 'khru ba drags par gyur pa yis//
300a2(gso rig): bshad pa zad la kha zas ni// me she'i khu ba zan dron sbyin// zho dang chang ni blung par bya// de ltar grub pa'i mas btang nyes// bshad nas snum gyi mas btang ba shud// rlung can gleng zhing chung ba dang // mkhris pa rabu tsha bad kan 'jam//
300a3(gso rig): 'dras ches pa la lci ba dang // bshang ba sogs la stobs chung btang // de ni snum rlung 'dra gyur zhing // zil gyis mnan pas 'byung mi 'gyur// rengs dang brlan spos pa dang // rims dang gzer dang yan lag na// rtsib logs na dang 'dar
300a4(gso rig): ba ni// snum rlung 'dres las 'byung zhes bya// de snum len tsha dri dang skyur// ra sna bi t+yA dza~M yi mar// rang sbyar chang dang rgya shug dang // rgya sman nas dang bskol ba 'am// rtsa ba lnga pa ba gcin bcas// mas btang drag pos legs bsal
300a5(gso rig): bya// de dag nyid kyis til mar dang // rgongs kar zin zos 'jam rtsi btang // skom dang lus tsha rmongs bag dmar// mdog nyams rims 'debs mun par mthong // mkhris pa dang 'dres yin zhes bya// khyu mngar mas btang byas
300a6(gso rig): sbyang // lus snyom sgying zhan rim drag 'debs// cham pa lus lci yi ga 'chus// brgyal byas na bas bad kan dang // 'jam rtsi'i snum ni 'dras zhes bya// de la bska dang kha dang tsha// chang dang ba gcin la bskol bya// po son cha dang til
300b1(gso rig): mar dang // sbyar bcas mas btang ba yis bsal// skyon dang rgyal dang yi ga 'chus// snyom gzer gnyid cha yan lag na// ma zhu'i mtshan mar lus tshar bcas// de ni 'drangs ches 'dres zhes bya// de la tsha dang lan tshar phye//
300b2(gso rig): bskol ba'i smin byed sman dang ni// bkru sman 'jam po btang ba dang // ma zhu la phan thaMd phan// gcin rtug phyen ni 'asags pas nyan// lus lci spos snying ga na// snum dang bshang 'dres yin zhes bya// de la snum dugs reng bu bcas// dur
300b3(gso rig): bying 'ilta sogs bskol ba// mas btang drags dang 'jam rtsi btang // rtartug pa 'gags pa sel bas kyang // cho ga bzhin du legs par bsal// ltogs pa 'am gizhang ni skrangs pa 'am// thug pa legs par 'thungs pa yis// rgyab tu
300b4(gso rig): snum ni btang 'gyur na// sdod pa med par shugs kyi rgyu// de nas ro sdod mgrin pa dang // stod kyi bu ga dag tu 'byung // de la duMr bying rgya shug nas// rgya sran pa gcin bskol ba dang // de dang bskol ba'i til mar ni/ mas btang 'jam rtsor bcas
300b5(gso rig): pa btang // lkog mar byung ba dgag pa dang // lkog mar bsdams shing skyug sman btang // smon bro sel ba'i gso bas bya// bzlog pa dag ni de la bya// snas chos ma gyur mi btang ste// des ni gzhang kha chags 'gyur zhing // de la nad bcas rmongs
300b6(gso rig): bag dang // g.ya' dang spang pa skyed par byed// de la mas btang rnon po dang // arka'i lor bskol til mar btang // dbugs ma phyung bar btsongs pa 'am// ma lus par ni btang ba yis// rlung zhugs nas ni 'khrug byed cing ka/ gzer dang
301a1(gso rig): na bskyed par byed// de la gzhang kha bsgra dugs bya// rlung 'joms pa yi kha zas btung // myur du bcug cing phyung ba 'am// glo bur du ni bteg pa yis// rked pa gzhang dang baR+Sha byin pa// chu so rengs shring na bar 'gyur//
301a2(gso rig): de la rlung 'joms kha zlos dang // dugs bsku 'jam rtsir bcas pa phan// btsir ba'i tshe nA bar du grol// rlung gis gzhung la gnod gyur nas// brang dang mgo bo gzer zhing na// brla yi nang ni skyed par byed// de la bilba la sogs
301a3(gso rig): dang // po son cha dang dur byed sogs// ba gcin dang ni sbyar ba btang // btsir drags pa yis khong par ni// mi 'dug lkog mar 'byung bar 'gyur// de la mas btang bkru sman dang // mgul pa bsdams sogs las rnams bya//
301a4(gso rig): bAh+ma sman sogs pas dag byas nas// lus dang nyams stobs ma drod chung // sgo nga gzhon nu 'am til mar ni// snod ni gang ba ji bzhin du// gnod par gyur pa thad+ma las// snyan pas 'bud bsrung bar bya// kha zas mngar dang yod 'ong
301a5(gso rig): sbyinaHde 'og skyuR+Sha dang lan tshar bcas// de nas mngar dang khe ba sbyin// de 'gro bsku dang tsha ba ston// rlo ni snum dang rtsub pa ltar// phan tshun gnyen por gyur pa yin// rim pa nye bar sbyar ba yis// rim pa don rnal du dbab// kun zos nyams
301a6(gso rig): sa brten pa ni// rnal mer sbyar pa yin zhes bya// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying pa bsdus pa las// cho ga grib pa'i gnas kyi le'u sa rdzi pa'o// de nas sran gyi mig bshad par bya'o// sa phyogs skam zhing mamanyam ni//
301b1(gso rig): gzhi mnyam gtsang zhing sa gzhi bzang // dur khrod shing chen ltar gnas dang // gA yang sa grog ma can ma gtogs// 'jam zhing chu ni g.yas nA 'bab// 'jag ma du Na dang ldan pa// thong lcags kyi ni ma smad pa// ljon shing grib mas ma
301b2(gso rig): phog pa// kha dog bcud la sogs pa ldan// sman skyes pa ni bsngags pa yin// 'bus ma zos shing mes ma tshig/ 'byung ba sogs kyis gnod ma gyur// nyam gribe chu la sogs ma nyen// ji bzhin dus su bsten gyur pa// rtsa
301b3(gso rig): bache zhing gting du zug/ byung gi phyogasu basbyin pa byazang // de nas dge ba la spyod cing // dad ldan gtsang sbra sbyang ba byas// sman ni legs par gnas bya ba tu// 'o mar bcas pa dusu sbyar// bu ram mar dang sbrang rtsi dang / pi pi ling
301b4(gso rig): dang bi D+hAng+ga// 'bru rnams maM gto gAs+yA 'o ma med// lho gcig 'das par mya gyur sbyar// gcin deng lci ba sbyin med yin// 'o ma ba ni yar ma yi// na tshod stobs ldan lus zungs dang // ra mjug rmig pa la sogs bzang // lan n+ya
301b5(gso rig): ma gtogs ro l-I po// sman khu yi ni s+ya gnas yin// sman khA lde gu bskol dang gr-ings// phan+da dang zhis nau byA ba ste// skran ni rnam pa lnga ru brtag/ snga ma bzhin du mthu stobs cha// 'phral du btus tI brdungs nAs ni// tshags las
301b6(gso rig): te gtsags pa gang // de ni khu ba zhes bo shadado// lde gu gsher gyis sbrus btags pa'o// de bskol ba ni bskol ba yin// bsgrangs pa me chen mo bzhag pa yi ni// phan rta 'phral du sbyar btsags pa// de dag gi ni tshad brtag pa// nad so
302a1(gso rig): stobs las sgyur byar bya// de yang drang stong gis bshad pa// chud kyi nges pa yod min+na te// nad dang rgyud nyams dang ni// dus dang yul ni rnams brtag so// de ltar sman ni btang bur bya// sman gyi khu ba srang bzhi no// 'bring
302a2(gso rig): tshad tsam du bshad pa yin// lde gu zho gnyis dag dang bsres// de ni chu srang gnyis kyi tshad// bskol ba'i sman ni srang gcig bya// bre phyeng chu bskol bzhi cha lus// bslangs pa skyang gcig srad drug ni// de las gzhan pas srang bzhi yin/
302a3(gso rig): sman mar bskol tshad ma smos par// lde gu snum dang gsher rdzas ni// bzhi 'gyur du ni bskyed sbyar// sho na kA yis bshad pa ni// snum bskol chu ni 'ba' zhig dang // khu ba bskol ba'i rim bzhin du// lde gu'i cha ni bzhi dang drug/ brgyud na
302a4(gso rig): rims bzhin sbyar bar bya// lde gu so mer mi sbyar dang // snum ni mer bcug sgra med dang // gang che kha dog sogs phun tshogs// de tshe der ni myur du dbab// mar ni khu ba dngas ma dang // til mar lbu ba byung ba dang ka lde gu nal nal por 'gyur
302a5(gso rig): zhing // mun 'byung zhing gyos mi 'gyur// chos po'i nad ni rnam gsum ste// 'dzem chos 'byar bag 'byor la rtsub// 'jam chos tshogs ma lde gu 'dra// 'byar bag sbrang rtsi lta bu yin// cung zad tshig cing mdog gnag par snang 'gyur de ni
302a6(gso rig): tha ma yin// de las 'das par don mi byed// ma tshos me rbod nyams par byed// 'jam tshos sngar btang rtsab pas bsku// btung dang 'jame rtsi 'byar bag bya// sha na kaR+sha lag mthil dang // sngar gang phul bre ar+ha ta// gro na ba he rim
302b1(gso rig): bzhan du// bzho 'gyur yon par shos par bya// rlon pa nyis 'gyur sbyang bya zhing // gsher ba phul gang sogs de bzhin// btags te spras nas gsher ba yis// snum bskol ba la chu gzhug bya// gang du chad ni ma bya shwad g+ha// der
302b2(gso rig): na cha mnyam sbyar bar bya// sha nA gnyis la ba nau ka/ de gnyis kaR+Yo go l-i dang // ba ru ra dang drang khu med// a sha bi tsu su pa naka/ lag mthil kham tshad byi la'i sder// til du kA dang lag pau'i tshad// sgra gzhan don ni gcig pa
302b3(gso rig): yin/ shuk+ti brgyad paM pi tsu yin// srang gcig bilba pra kuny+dza// s+phar ga a mra bzhi po yin// gcig gi ming gi rnam grangs yin// srang gnyis khyor gang de gnyis la// sbyim gang de gnyis ma ni ka/ a tA kr-i dang snod gnas// gro na kum+ba
302b4(gso rig): buM rmenA yin// tu la srang ni brgyu yin te// de nyi shu la khur du bshad// grangs can 'bigs byed ri yis ni/ sa gzhi phal cher khyab pa yin// de las dang por bsil zhing phan// 'bigs byed sman ni mo'i rang bzhin// yan lag brgyad
302b5(gso rig): pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u drug pa'o// / yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// cho ga grub pa'i gnas te gnas lnga pa lus gso ba'i yan lag rdzog so//
302b6(gso rig): de nas byis pa gso ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o// de'ang rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa drang srong chen po rnams kyis 'di ltar bshad de// byis pa btsas ma thag khru ba// bsal te rgya tsha mar bskus sbyang // de 'og btsas
303a1(gso rig): pas sdug bsngal la// ba la'i til mar blugs par bya// de yi rna ba'i drug du ni// rdo gnyis brdungs pa bcad par bya// de nas de yi rU ba ni// g.yas par sngags 'di brjod par bya// yan lag yan la gA lA
303a2(gso rig): byung khyod// snying las mngon par skyes pa yin// bdag nyid bu zhes bya ba khyod// lo brgyar yang dge 'tsho gyur cig/ lo brgya thub cing ston brgya 'tsho// tshe ring po ni thob gyur cig/ rgyu skar phyogs dang mtshan mo dang // nyin
303a3(gso rig): mos khyod ni srung bar shog/ bde bar gyur na lte ba ni// sor bzhi'o 'og tu srad bus bcing // de yi 'og tu bcang nas ni// lte ba la ni bstod de bzhug/ de 'og lte ba ru NA yi// ti la mAr gyis ni bsku bar bya// 'o mya can
303a4(gso rig): shing bskol chu 'am// d+hI zhim bcud ldan chu dgA ni// gser ram dngul ni bsregs pa yis// bsgos pa'i dro bajam chu yis bkru// de nas 'dzub mo g.yas pa ni// bkris pas rkan ni btags nas kyang // mgo bo ras
303a5(gso rig): ngal snam nan g.yog/ blo dang tshe dang stobs bskyed phyir// shu dag bru ma bai sha li// shad+tha puk+ka'i lde gu ni// mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa dag/ sngags btabyA hA re nu tsam+ba sbyin// gser dung shu dug mu men dang // ma nu a ru ra'i phye
303a6(gso rig): ma/ gser dang skyu ru ra'i phye ma// sbrang rtsi mar bcas lde gu sbyin// de nas mngal chu rgyam tsha ni// mar dang bcas pa skyug tu gzhug/ skye dgu'i bdag po'i cho ga yin// btsas pa'i cho ga byed du gzhug/ snying la gnas pa'i rtsa
303b1(gso rig): rnams ni// btsas nas kha ni bye ba'i phyir// nyi ma gsum mam bzhi pa la// bud med kyi ni nu zho 'byung // de bas nyin zhag dang po la// dus gsum du ni sbrang rtsi mar// byi tsher ba dang sbyar ba la// sngags kyis btab ste sbyin pa byin//
303b2(gso rig): gnyis pa dang ni gsum pa lA// lak+Shi ma dang bskol mar blud bya// de nas dang po'i nu zho ni// bkag pa de la mar sa ra ni// zho gnyis tsam gyi chang sbyin zhing // nu zh-i dus gnyis blud par bya// ma nyid kyi ni nu zho blung // de ni lus ni
303b3(gso rig): 'phel byed yin// de med ma ma shin tu byims// ston med pa khrig pa spangs pa dang // rigs dang rang bzhin de dang mnyam// nad med na tshod dar la ba ba// sgyu ma shis shing skam tshigs meng // gnyis kyi 'o me thud par bya//
303b4(gso rig): de gnyis zus dang spyod laM ni// phan+da pas 'bade gso bar bya// mya ngan khro dang smyung ba dang // lus dub nu zho nyams pa'i rgyu// bu ram chung ma gtogs chang dang // rlan can sha khu 'o ma dang // 'o ma can sman mya ngan sogs// go bzlog nu
303b5(gso rig): zho'i rgyu yin no// mi mthun zas ni zos pa dang // ltogs dang sems nr-i nya mas pa dang // lus zungs gnod byas sbrum ma yi// 'o ma byis pa'i nad snang byed// nu zho med na ra 'am pa'i// 'o ma 'bri ha ta sogs rtsa 'am//
303b6(gso rig): sti ra gnyis bskol kha rang bcas// ston de ldan blud par bya// drug pa'i mtshan mo khyad par du/ \u0f7f/ bsrung dang gtor ma'i bya ba bya// de yi gnyen gyis mel che bya// shin tu dga' ba nyid kyang bya// zhag bcu rdzogs par gyur pa dang /
304a1(gso rig): rang rig 'tsham pa'i cho ga ni// byed du bzhug cing btsas ma blang // lus la ldong ros pap+pa dang // gi hang tsAn a kar btags// rgyu skar lha 'am nye dus la// gras pa'i yi ge mnyam pa yi// ming ni byis pa la btags bya//
304a2(gso rig): de nas rang bzhin dbye las bshad// gzugs kyo tshe ni yongasu btag/ mkhas pas byis pa'i mel stan ni// byang ngam sha re du mgo bstan la// sngas dang gos ni gtsang zhing bkrus// bajam zhing gnyer ma med pa yi// gos la gdon ni
304a3(gso rig): 'joms byed pa'o// sman gyi bdug pas bdug par bya// bya rog bsad pa snum gsum dang // bcas pa'i bdug pas bdug pa sngags// bas ru la sogs gson po yi// rang btags nor bu bzang po spu// bra mi 'tsho byed in+ti sogs//
304a4(gso rig): sman ni bzang po gdags par bya// mchog tu rtag par shu dag ni// lag gnyis mgul dang spyi bor gdags// des ni tshe dang yid gzhungs dran// bde bskyed byed gdon las bsrung // zla ba bdun nam brgyad pa na// nad med nyin zhag shrIs
304a5(gso rig): pa la// ma ma'i pang du spro bsrings la// dgun gyi dus su rna ba dbug/ khye'u'i dang po g.yas pa dbug/ bu mo'i g.yon pa dbug par bya// sman pas khab ni g.yas pas bzung // g.yon pas rna shal bzung nas ni// rna ba'i khyon gyi
304a6(gso rig): dbus las ni// mkhur chos kyi ni phyogs dag tu// pags pa dag ni phug nas su// nyi ma'i 'od zer snang ba dang // mi 'gyur brtan por bzung nas ni// rgya skyegs kyi ni khu bas bsku// dbus su rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i// bu
304b1(gso rig): ga drung po cig char dbug/ de nas rtsa ni gnas pa'i phyir// steng 'og ngos gnyis btang mi bya// nag po gnad sgra dmar po ste// rtsa de phug na dmar zhing na// skrang zhing tshal sra ba dang // gnye'u ring gzhan dbang can nad bskyed// de rnams nang
304b2(gso rig): gzhi ji bzhin du// gso ba dag ni bskur te bya// gnad du phug+sa na khrag med cing // na dang rma sogs 'byung myi 'gyur// khabaM rjes skud pa snum can ni// rje su gzhug pa nyid du bya// til mar rlon par bsku bA dang // rgya cher der ni bskyed
