304b5(gso rig): kha ra 'bras yos sgyu ma sbyin// gnod pa skyed par mi byed pa'i// spyan gyi de ni nad bsal bya// shin tu drag nang ma gtogs gzhan// rno sman bkru sman kun tu spang // tshul min skrags par mi bya ste// sdug ni gdon ni 'jug par 'gyur/
304b6(gso rig): gos kyi rlung dang gzhon reg dang // 'gom po la ni de bsrung bya// pra mi yungs kar shu dgo dang // rgya ma tsha ru rta sha ri ba// pi pi ling bcas bskol ba yi// sman mar dran dang yid gzhung bskyed// tshe 'phel gdon ni mi bzad 'joms/
305a1(gso rig): 'byung po smyo byed zlog par byed// so ma ra tsa shu dag dang // sbal pa nye shing sle tres dang // sham ka puSh+pa b+h+ra mi dang // grA ma so ma srung re ni// lde gu brgyud cha mar bre gang / 'o ma bzhi 'gyur nang du ni/
305a2(gso rig): bskol ba de blud dpal yon dang // tshe blo yid gzhungs dran pa bskyed// ra yi 'o ma a ru ra// tsha ba gsum dang pa ta dang // shi tru shu dag lce myang tsha// bskol ba'i sman mar dbyangs can de// tshig dang blo gros dran pa dang // ngag
305a3(gso rig): gsal me dro skyed par byed// shu dag sle tres a ru ra// nyer shing pa dang shing+gi ni// a pa margar bskol ba yi// sman mar yonra snga mar mtshungs// shu dag dkar po ru rta gser// arka'i puSh+pa gser dang bcas// lcags
305a4(gso rig): skyug dang ni dung dong gserau// ka rany+dzi drang shu dag gser// rkang pa re rer bshud pa bzhin// sbrang rtsi mar drung bcas ldo gu/ lo gcig byin nA lus dang blo// kha dog nyams stobs skyed par byed// shu dag shing madrar lce myang tsha//
305a5(gso rig): dodang gra shu ti a ru ra// ru rta zur ba pi pyi linga?// mar bcas lnga gu ngag dag byed// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// gnas phyi ma'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas byis pa'i nad gso ba'i le'u bshad
305a6(gso rig): par bya'o// 'o ma zas dang gnyi gas 'tsho// byis rnam pa gsum du bshad/ de dag gnod med las bder 'gyur// gnod pa las ni nang rnams 'byung // gang zhig chu dang gcin du 'dres// nyes pa yod pa ma yin te// 'o ma de ni
305b1(gso rig): skyon med yin// rlung gis gnod 'gyur chu steng 'phyo// skra zhing rtsub la lbu ba can// de yis bshang gci sri bar byed// mkhris las gnod 'gyur dro sbyar tsha// ri mo ser sna des tsha bskyed// bad kan gyis sku lan tshwar bcas/
305b2(gso rig): sbyin 'bag can li rgyu nang 'byin// ldan pa'i mtshan ma 'dren mi ste// 'dris pa'i mtshan ma gsum dang ldan// rang gi mtshan ma ci 'dra las// de'i thungs pa la nang stong 'gyur// byis pa rtag tu mi bzang bar// du ba la ni
305b3(gso rig): nad shes bya// de ni phyogs gong shas cher 'dzin// gung du reg par mi bzod par// de nA nad yod shes par bya// mgo nad mig 'phyed las shaM sa bya// snying nad lce mo chu sos gnon dang // dbugs dang khu tshur sngams shes
305b4(gso rig): byaHkhong nod bshang gAn+ti sri dang smon// nu me sos 'debs rgyu ma 'khrog/ lto stos rgyab ni dbugs dgye dang // lho 'gugs pas kyang shis par bya// chu so mtshan nad bshang gci srika skrag cing phyogs lta las shas bya// dwe nAs mra
305b5(gso rig): mAM nang gzhi dang // skyon ni ji bzhin gso bar bya// de la nu zho rlung canA la// rtsa ba chu bskol zhag gsum blud// yang na rU rtag tsi tra ka/ pa ta shu dag pu tse shel// ga bra'i rtsa ba la la phud// thang shing dang ni sa rA la// bri shr-I ka ni pi pi
305b6(gso rig): ling // na li sham ni bskol ba blung // de nas rlung nad 'joms pa yi// sman mar gang yang rung ba blung // de rjes chang gi dngas ma blung // snum 'gyur bkru sman 'jam pa btang // de 'og 'jam rtsi'i las bya zhing // dugasa~M sogs
306a1(gso rig): \u0f7f/ rlung nad 'joms par byA// bilka ra stA ti mu sa// thang shing sa ra la bcas phye// mAr dang sbyar ba'i lde gu 'am// de bskol kha ra dkAR+Sha bta ba sbyin// mkhris pas gnod la sle rjes dang // nye shing nim+ba pa two la// tsAn
306a2(gso rig): sha ri ba bskol ba// mi ma dang ni byis pa blod// yang na gla sbrang 'bras bu gsum// rtswa mkhris pu tse shel da bya// thel tri sa la sogs shug pa sogs// pa two la sogs sde bskol blud// sman ni 'di bskol mar dang nI// mkhris
306a3(gso rig): ba sel ba'i klu spyan dang // bsil sman gyis bsku byug sogs bya// bad kan can gyi bdag nyid la// shing mngar rgyu ma tshwa bcas pa 'am// rgyu ma tsha shing mngar pi pri ling // mar sbyar byis pa la rmud bya// de nas po son cha'i me tog/
306a4(gso rig): gtugs pa sbrang rtsir bcas pa yi// lde gus nu mi byis pa'i mchu// bslus pa byis pa de smon gzhug/ ma ma rnon pos skyon du gzhug/ dri nas thug sogs rim par spyad// glu sgang lnga sogs bskol ba blud// de bzhin go
306a5(gso rig): snying rgya spos dang // thang shing dug mo nyung bskol blud// yang na gla sgang br-ing nga dra karA// shu dag tsha ba lnga bsgrol blung // nu zho nyes gsum dri ma can// dri mnam 'khru zhing chu dang 'dra// mkhreg cing sla na rgyun bar chad// lbu ba
306a6(gso rig): can du 'khru bar 'gyur// bshang ba kha dog sna tshogs 'byung // na zhing gcin ser dkar zhing bsko// rims nad skam dang yi ge 'chus// bsgeg pa skam po 'byung zhing glal// lus na yan lag sgying ba dang // 'khun zhing
306b1(gso rig): 'dar la mgo 'khor dang // na mig kha ni shu ba sogs// nad ni gzhan dag de las 'byung ka'o ma'i bye snabs zhes bsha // gnod pa'i nad ni mi bzud yin// de la ma ma byis pa la// slon snyan btang bas myur du gasngo//
306b2(gso rig): thug sogs ris par bshad pa ni// shu dag la sogs sde tshan nam// skyer pa sogs pa 'ang bong nga dkar// pa ta dang ni pi pi ling // gla sgang pu tse shel bskol blud// pau tha bca' sga pu tse shel// sle tres rtsa mkhris sha
306b3(gso rig): ri ba// thab shing gla sbrang murba dang // dug mau nyung bcas bskol ba blud// nu zho'i nyes pa sel ba'i mchog/ rjes 'brel nad la dzI bzhin du// dus shes pa yis gso bar bya// so byung ba dag nad rnams ni// thad kyi yang rgyu
306b4(gso rig): yin no// mchog tu rims dang 'khru ba dang // lud pa smon dang mgo nad dang // pad mig 'dzag pa'i nad dang ni// shu ba rnams ni skyed par byed// byis pa'i sgal tshigs bya ba dang // rma bya'i gtsug ni byung ba dang // byis pa'i so
306b5(gso rig): ni skye ba na// mi na ba ni cung zad med// de lA nad ni ji bzhin dang // nad stobs ji bzhin 'jigs ji bzhin// yul dang dusne stsogs rnam phye ste// sman gyi sbyor byas gso bar bya// gnod dang gnod bya de nyid dang // rims sogs
306b6(gso rig): nad kyang de nyid 'byung // de bas sman ni de nyid// gzhon sha can dang lus chung phyir// zas kun bsten par mi byed pas// 'di yi tshad ni chung ngu sbyin// mar da 'o ma la sten pas// byis pa rtag par khong snum yin// de bas
307a1(gso rig): 'phral du skyug sman ni// 'jam po blo dang ldan pa blung// 'o ma 'o ma zas bsten la// nu zho ngoms par byas pa smon// zas za ba la mar bcas pa'i// thug pa sla ba blud par bya// bkru
307a2(gso rig): sman gyis gsoms btang da dA// tshad chung tshad phran drag go s+yA bya// bkru sman la stsogs ji skad bA shwad// ma ma nyid la btang ba ru bya// mur bau rgya shug tshwa ba gsum// 'bras bu gsum dang 'dzam bu'i shun// tha~Mng shing
307a3(gso rig): pa ta yungs kar bcas// sbrang rtsi bcas pa'i lde gu sbyin// nu zho'o nyes pa sil mchog yin// pi pi ling ngam skyu ru ra// da da ka yi me tog gi/ phye ma sbrang rtsir bcas pa yi// lde gus rnyil ni byug par bya// 'u ra bya sreg pa'i
307a4(gso rig): sha skam kyi// phye ma sbrang rtsi sbrus pa yi// byis pa'i sau yi myu gu ni// myur du skyed par byed par yin// shu dag 'a br-i ha ti gnyis dang // pa ta gla sgang pu tsa shel// bong nga mngar ba'i sman sde dgA/ bskol ba'i mar g+hi so bskyed
307a5(gso rig): grub/ skyer pa thang shing sa ri la// 'bri hA ti gnyis nyer shing pa// kri na parni shr-i ya se// sbrang rtsi myar sbyar lde gu ni// pho ba'i me drod bskyed pa'i mchog/ rlung ni bde bar rgyu bar byed// 'khru ba'i rims dang dbugs mi bde//
307a6(gso rig): mig sor skya rbab lud pa 'joms// byis pa'i nad ni tha daM la// phan zhing mdog dang nyams stobs bskyed// btsod dang seng phrom do nga ki/ ku tan+na Ta parni gnyis// ha se che chung gnyis dang ni// mud+ga bil+la gzhon nu rnams// ras
307b1(gso rig): bral sa bon bcas pa dag/ chu bskol ba dang mar dang ni// thal sman zho gra chur bskol bas// so skyes las byung sna tshogs nadad// 'di yis myur du 'joms byed// 'od srungs rgan pos bshad pa yin// byis pa'i so
307b2(gso rig): skyes nang la ni// sngags kyis mngon par btab mi bya// so skyes pa yi nad gang yin// gso bso rang nyid nyer zhir 'gyur// nyin par gnyid drag chu klung dang // nu zho ba da kun n+dan bsten pas// byis pa'i dngos ma rgyu ba
307b3(gso rig): yau/ rtsa rgyun bad kan gyis bkag pa'i// yi ga 'chus dang chom pA dang // rims dang lud pa 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas byis pa lus bskams shing // gdong snum mig ni dkar bar 'gyuraro// rgyamatsha che gsu mi sha
307b4(gso rig): ram ga// bai ta ko ri ka tau pa// mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar bskams dang // yi ga 'chus pa sogs la btang // pu tse shel dang oM sho ka/ tsha ba lnga bcas phye ma phan// da daM ki dang skyu ru ra// rgya shug phye ma mar bcas phan//
307b5(gso rig): sa lA par+Ni shu dag dang // 'bri ha ti gnyiswa raM ny+dzi gau/ pI pI ling dang rgya spos dang // ljang ma ut+pal ba s+phu ba// ga pra'i rtsa ba b+h+ra sbrang rnams// srang re yi ni chod byas pa// mar ni br-i gang bcas bskol ba// rtsa rgyun sbyong ba'i dam
307b6(gso rig): ba yin// a sho gan+d+ha bye'u rug pa// 'bri ha ti dang pi pi ling // bskol ba'ang yon de dang 'dra// shing mingar seng phrom bi pi ling ke/ shug pa tsan ut+pa la// bal bu'i lo ma sha ri pa// bskol ba'i mar gyis skom pa yi//
308a1(gso rig): nud ni 'joms par byed pa yin// shIng gi ma du lung+ga dang // ga bra'i rtsa ba pI pi ling // thab shing A sho gan+d+ha dang // ram nye ba gnyis ra snA dang // zungs rtsi ba dang dzaM bA ka/ ma sha mUt+sA pAR+Shi dang //
308a2(gso rig): bi tang+ga ni lde gur byas// ri bong mgo bskol khu ba dang // bskol ba'i mar ni blud gyur na// lus skem rgyas par byed pa'i mtsho ga/ shu dag sle tre sa kA ya the// rgyu spos tsha ro ra thug gcin// chang bskol til mar
308a3(gso rig): bskus pa phen// rgyo skyegs khu ba cha mnyam dang // til mar bre gang zho kha chu// bzhi 'gyur a sho gan+d+ha dang // skyer pa thob shing ru rta dang // ha rau nu ka bA li ka/ tsAn murba pu tse shel// ra sA nyer shing shIng mAngar mnyam/
308a4(gso rig): bskol ba'i til mor rgya skyegs sogs// zhes bya bskus na phan par 'gyur// stobs bskyed rims dang zad byed dang // smyo byed rjed byed dbugs mi byed// rlung gi nAd rnams sel bar byed// gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po
308a5(gso rig): 'jams// sbrum ma la yong bsgrags pa yin// bang da kar ka tA sr-ing gau/ ba~M pa~M ling+ga dang sbrid+hA rtsir sbyar// TI gu byis pa la byin po// bong dadakar po gtsi grI p+tA ya~M// lde gus lud pa rloms smyo zo// baid+ma gnyin rkyen
308a6(gso rig): nad sel byed// nu zho 'thungs zhing smon pa la// de la zhun mar sbrang rtsi dang // kaN+Da kA ri bri ha tI// 'bras bu'i khu bo che ba lnga// sbyor ba'i lde gu sbyin par bya// pi pi ling dang len tshwa lnga// ba ri ba ra bi ta ka/ de bzhin lde gu sbyar
308b1(gso rig): ba sbyin// de bzhin tsha ba gsum reg 'jam// sha ri dang/ rma byA sram// ji snyed pags pa spu sregs pa// gnA ga tsha sbrang rtsi mar sbyar phan// seng ldeng bal bu ardzu na// ru r+t+ta pan+ta na'i khu ba// 'o ma mar
308b2(gso rig): dang bcas bskol bas// slon bro nye bar sel bar byed// gang zhig sa dang bcas skyes dang // gang gi dang po ya so skyes// bkru mi shis pa de la ni// zhi ba bya zhing bram ze la// ston bcas pa sbyin par bya// de bzhin skye
308b3(gso rig): mched mchod par bya// bad+ma kun 'khrugs pas rkan gyi shar// rkan gyi 'dzer pa zhes bya ste// de nas rkan gyi phyogs kyi ni// phyi bo dmya' ba 'byung bar 'gyur// rkan lhung nu zho 'dras pa dang // bsko bas 'thung zhing bshong ba
308b4(gso rig): sla/ skom dang kha g.ya' mig na zhing // gnya' ba 'degs dka' smon par 'gyur// de la rkan bteg nas tshig khus// thal ba sbrang rtsi sbyar ba ba sku// yAng na bca' sga pi pi ling // ba lang lci khu rgyu ma tsha yi// dong gra skyer ba
308b5(gso rig): shing tsha yi// lde gu n+ya gro d+ha'i lo mar// gtums la ba lang lci bas byug/ de rjes me mar mur du bsreg/ khu bas rkan dang kha bsku zhing // mig tu yang ni blud par bya// ru rta shu dag a ru ra// sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i lde gu ni/
308b6(gso rig): nu zhor bcas pa byis par blud// rkan gyi 'dzer pa las thar 'gyur// dri mas gos sam rdul ba las// gzhang khar bad kani khrag las 'byung // rma ni nang rmar g.ya' ba dang // brla gnyen mang po 'byung bar 'gyur// la
309a1(gso rig): khas ma me'i nyes pa bshad// gzhan dag lus srul pos byas zer// rgyab kyi thor bu gzhang 'debs zer// la las der ming med ces bshad// de la ma ma byad mkhris dag/ sel ba'i sman
309a2(gso rig): sa nu zho sbyar// tsan skar chu bsil ba dang // ldan pa'i skom ni nang nas blang // de dang skyer pa'i khaN+Da ni// sbrang rtsir bcas pas rma bsku bya// rgya shug 'bras bu gsum p+la ku// shun pa bskol ba'i chu blugs bya// nug tshur
309a3(gso rig): 'gi'u wang spangs ma dang // dngul rdo ba la ldong ros ni// skyur dang btags pas bsku bya zhing // yang na shing mngar skyer khaN dang // dung ni zhi be tuM btag saM ba 'am// dung gi lte ba shai ri pa'am// a sa na yi shun pa nau// phyi ma btegs
309a4(gso rig): pa gdab par bya// dmar zhing g.ya' ba'i shas che la// sbyin bu pad+mas khrag dbyung bya// gzhung bsdebs nad la mkhris pa yi// rma la phan pa thams cad bsngags// ba tha gla skang ser po gnyis// ga bra'i rtsa ba bi TAng+ka// pun rna
309a5(gso rig): pa bil+lur bcas// bri shi ka li tsha ba gsum// mar bcas bskol ba tshad tsam ljags// zas zos nad las thar bar 'gyur// nad ni gang gi sman gang yin// de yis nu ma bskus nas nI// yud tsan 'dug la de rjes bkru// blud na
309a6(gso rig): nad ni de de sa la/ yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// gnas phyi ma'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas byis pa'i gdon gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// sngon ni skye mched bsrung ba'i phyir// gdon ni skyes
309b1(gso rig): pa'i gzugs can lnga// bud med kyi ni gzugs can bdun// lha chen po yi sprul pa yin// skem byed sa ga lug thug gdong // khyi gdon yi dgas zhes bya dang kabya gdon srul mo grang ba yi// srul mo long ma lus srul mo//
309b2(gso rig): de bzhin bzhin gyi rgyan can ma// nam grub ma gru skem ma'o// de rnams kyis ni bzung ba'i tshul rtag tu ngu dang rims kyis 'debs// spyi tshul sbram dang glal ba dang // smin ma 'degs shing rmya ba dang // lbu ba smon zhing gyen du
309b3(gso rig): bal+yA/ ma mchu sos 'debs gnyid yar dang // ngu zhing 'khun la nu zho la// mi dga' skad ni 'gyur ba dang // glo bur du ni sen mo yis// rang gi ma ma'i yan lag 'brad// de la skem byed kyis ni zin pa'i rtags// mig gcig
309b4(gso rig): mchi ma zag pa dang // yang dang yang du myugo bo rdegA/ phyogs cig nyams shing lus rengs la// rdul bcas skye ba rengs pa dang // so cha nu zho la mi dga'// sngangs shing ngu la skad gsad nyams// kha yo kha chu skyug pa
309b5(gso rig): dang // mi zad par ni gyen du blta// tshal khrag dri b+h+r-i yid mi dga'// bshang ba khu tshur lA bcangs shing // mkhur chos mig dang sprin ma gcig/ g.yo zhing mig ni gnyi ga dmar// des ni yan lag nyes nyams
309b6(gso rig): pa 'am// 'chi ba kho nar byed par 'gyur// skyem byed rjed byed mtshan ma ni// dran pa nyams shing yang dang yang // sgra 'bal skye ba 'gugs pa dang // rnam par 'dud cing glal bzhin du// bshang dang gci bas 'byin par
310a1(gso rig): byed// lbu bar skyug cing gyen du blta// rkang lag smin mas gar yang byed// nu ma rang lce so yis 'debs// kun tu g.yo zhing gnyid yar rims// khrag ni rnag gi dri bro ba'o// lug thug gdong gi
310a2(gso rig): rtags kyi nad// spo zhing rkang pa lag pa dag/ 'dar zhing lbu ba skyug pa dang // skom dang che 'khru chang pa sdems// skad gsang dma' zhing mdog mi sdug/ 'khun zhing slon par byed pa dang // lud pa skyigs bus 'debs gnyid
310a3(gso rig): ra/ so yis mchu gnon yan lag sdud// rengs shing lug thug dri bro la// gyen du lta zhing rgod pa dang // bar du 'gugs shing rims kyis 'debs// brgyal zhing mig gcig skrang pa yin// khyi yi gdon gyi rtag gyur pa//
310a4(gso rig): 'dar zhing ba spu ldang ba dang // rdul zhing mig ni 'dzam pa dang // rgyab tu 'gug cing lce dang saM// mchu dang rkan sgra 'byin zhing skyug/ bshang ba'i dri 'byung khyi skad 'byin// yi dwags kyi ni gdon gyi rtags// ba spu ldang zhing yang yang
310a5(gso rig): dngang DAglo bur la du rims kyis 'debs// 'khru zhing skon byed lung pa luka/ glal skom mi ro'i dri dang ldan// lus ni spyod cing g.yo ba dang // skyem zhing rengs lo mdog mi sdug/ khu tshul sngams shing mchi ma 'dzag/ bya gdon
310a6(gso rig): lus lhod 'khru bar byed// lce rkan lkog mar rma 'byung zhong // thor bur na zhing tshal gnag/ tshigs dag tu ni yang yang 'a byung // mtshan mo skye la nyin mo 'bri// kha 'am bshang sgo mnags pa dang // 'jigs shing bya yi
310b1(gso rig): dri dang ldan// rims kyis 'debs par byed pa yin// srul mo'i smon zhing 'dar ba dang // lus snyom mtshan mo gnyid yar dang // skyigs bu lto spros 'khru ba dang // skom zhing gcin ni sgri ba dang // lus lhod pa spu gshor
310b2(gso rig): bA dang // kha ltar dri ni mnam pa yin// grang ba'i srul mo 'dar ba dang // ngu zhing zur gyis blta ba dang // skom zhing 'khru la rgyu ma 'khrug/ zhag ltar dri ni mnam pa dang // yan lag log gcig grang ba dang // cig shos dro ba
310b3(gso rig): nyid yin no// srul mo long ma'i slon ma dang // rims dang lud pa gnyid chung dang // bshang ba sla zhing mdog mi sdug/ dri nga bskus pas myur du bskams// mthong ba nyams shing mig nu g.ya'// mig sgang glo bar gyur
310b4(gso rig): bA dang // skyigs bu mi rgod nu zho 'drang// mdog mi sdug cing dang ro rtsub// mdog nyams nya yi dI dang ldan// yang ni dr-i ni sbyar bcas yin// bzhin rgyan can gyi rkang pa dang // lag pa rdo ni mdzes pa dang // rtsa ni nag por snang ba
310b5(gso rig): yis lto ba khyab cing rims kyis 'debs// yi ga 'i chus shing yan lag na// ba gcin lta bu'i dri 'byed 'gyur// nam gru gnag cing sngo ba dang // mig dang rna ba snang byed 'grub// mig 'gul skyigs bu lud pa lu// kha ni/
310b6(gso rig): yo zhing dmar ba dang // lug thug dri ldan rims 'debs skye ma// bshang ba sngo zhing sla ba yin// nam gru skem po'i lus kun ni// rims kyis 'debs par 'gyur ba dang // skra 'byi zas la mi dga' dang // skad gsang zhum zhing
311a1(gso rig): mdog mi sdug/ bshang ba kha dog sna tshogs dang // lto bar rtsa yi mdud pa chags// ngu zhing bya rgod dri ldan la// yun ring na bar byed pa yin// lto ba rmen bu zlum po 'byung // bshang ba kha dog sna tshogs 'byung //
311a2(gso rig): lce yi dbus ni dma' ba dang // rkan ni gunag 'gyu de spang bya// kha zlas mang du zos kyang ni// byis pa gang zhig lus skem byed// sgom pas nyen zhing mig nyams pa// de ni nam gru skem mos gsod// 'tshe ba la dga' mchid par
311a3(gso rig): 'drod// gdon rnams 'dzin pa'i rgyu yin// de la 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid can// byin tshe sna nas 'dzag pa dang // lce nyams mig ni gting du 'bros// 'degs byed mig ni 'chi mar bcas// nyams chung tshig ni dman pa dang // dri nga ba
311a4(gso rig): yI 'byung bar 'gyur// skem zhing rAng gI bshwang dang gci// lag pas nyed cing sgos mi byed// lag pas btags ste 'bad pa yis// bdug dang de bzhin gzhan la brdeg/ mtshon dang shing sogs kyis brdeg cing // 'bar
311a5(gso rig): ba'i me la 'jug par byed// chu nang spring zhing khron par ltung / gzhan yang de 'drar byed par 'gyur// skom dang che zhing tsha bas rnag/ smon par byed par 'gyur pa dang // bu ga kun nas khrag 'dzag cing // mchi ltas byung ba de spang
311a6(gso rig): bya/ sa dga' ba 'dod pas gzir 'gyur ba// dben par bud med 'dod smra dga'// dri dang me tog phreng rgyan dga'// mgu zhing zhi ba gso ba dka'// lce ni kha la nyug pa dang // mchu rkan gre ba bskams pa dang // dogs pas blta
311b1(gso rig): zhing ngu ba dang // sems khong chud cing zhum pa dang // zas 'dod ltogs par gyur kyang ni// byin na za bar mi 'dod la// gtor ma 'dod pas zin pa ste// de ni gso sla yin par bshad// srog 'dod pa la grub pa yi//
311b2(gso rig): sngags bzlas sbyin sreg byas pas gzhom// cig shos la ni ci 'dod par// dga' dang gtor mo sogs sbyin pas// de nas gsor rung gdon la ni// byis pa khang pa dben par bzhag/ zhag gsum chag chag phyag dar
311b3(gso rig): byas// rtag tu mau ni bzhag pa yi// bu ti'i me tog bsil ma dang // 'dab ma sa bon yungs kAr gtor// gdon 'joms til mar sbar ba yi// mar mes gdon ni 'joms par byed// nAd g.yog nyul po chang dang
311b4(gso rig): sha/ yongasu spangs par gyur pa yi// mAr nI rnying pas bskus nas ni// ba la nim+ba star ga ni// drong gra thang shing ko tra ka/ 'dzam bu dang ni shra ma la// kA tri na dang lcam pa dang // a pa marga ma ta li// mu tu shri tru zhes bya dang //
311b5(gso rig): ka kA dza ka shwa ta tsha// bil rkang 'o ma can gyi shing // ka dam+ma btsas ka rany+dza// chu ni dro 'dzam dag gis bkru// stug dang gzig dang saung+ga gI s+thu l+ya// dom gyi lpags pau mAr dang bcas// bdug pas khrus byas 'og du 'dug/
311b6(gso rig): pu ti yungs kar sha raM ka/ shu dag go bye la la phung // ru rta mar bcas gdug pas ni// gdon kun las ni thar byed yin// yungs kar nim+ba'i lo ma dang kashu dag ka ra bi ra'i rtsa// dro ba mar sbyar bdugs pas ni// gdon ni thaMd sel
312a1(gso rig): khar byed// ba lang ra dang rus pa spu// lpags pa byi la'i rtug pa dang // nap+pa'i lo ma s+phu tse shel// mar dang 'bri ha ti gnyis dang // ras bal sa bon po son cha// nas dang ra spu thang shing dang // yungs kar rma
312a2(gso rig): bya'i sgro dang po ga/ skra dang phub ma pha bA ma dang // rdza mer ra thug gcin dang spangs// zhi ba btags pa yi bdug pas ni// 'byung po'i gdon ni thaMd dang // mi bzad rims nad 'joms par byed// byi tsher a mra'i tshig gu dang //
312a3(gso rig): rgyo spos mngar sde na le shaM/ pris+t+ra par+Ni g+ha sgang rnams// lde gu byas pa ma rA dang ni// 'o mA rtsa ba bcu bskol khur// ban+das bskol de ni gdon 'joms mchog/ rasnA aM shu ma ti gnyis// baM la rtsa ba chen po lnga// gla sgang btag
312a4(gso rig): taM mar dang bskol// tsha ba gsum dang tsI tra ka/ thal tres pa tro bi nAM ka/ shing mngar shing kun pa ya s+ya// thang shing pI pi ling rtsa ba// dug mo nyung dang bcas pa yi// lde gu mar dang bskol ba ni// rtag tu byis pa la phan
312a5(gso rig): zhing / nad dang gnod pa thaMd 'joms// me drod stobs dang khwa dog bskyed// sha ri pa dang mu ra dang // brA hi shu dwag shaM gi ni// nyung dkar a shwa gan+d+ha dang // khye'u rug par bcas mar dang bskol// de ni btung dang bsku ba yis// gdon
312a6(gso rig): rnams thams cad 'joms par byedaka/ mar gang 'byung po'i rig pa ruH/ 'og nas bshad pa dag dang ni// de bzhin gtor ma sbyin sreg dang // khrus ni sngags rgyud shes par bya// pu ti ka rany+dza'i shun pa// bar bai ra yi rtsa ba dang // sku
312b1(gso rig): b+ha kha bo bi shwa la// k+Shu tra ka dang bikra dang // ka bi ta bsgrol des mtshan mo// byis pa bkrus nA shis pa yin// gdon dang byul yang brla gnyan nad// rjes 'brel ba thams cad la// byis pa'i nad gsol bshad byA yI// spyan
312b2(gso rig): gyis ji bzhin gso bar bya// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// gnas phyi ma'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// byis pa gso ba'i yan
312b3(gso rig): lag rdzogaso// // de nas 'byung po'i gdon gyi nad dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o// shes dang rnam shes tshig dang ni// spyod dang snying stobs rang bzhin dag/ gang gi rang bzhin 'gyur ba snang // de la 'byung po'i gdon
312b4(gso rig): yod bshad// 'byung po'i gzugs dang rang bzhin dang // sgra dang 'gro sogs spyod pa dang // gang zhig 'dre bar byed pa rnams// de la de ni zhugs par bshad// de ni lha dang lha min sogs// dbye bas rnam pa bco brgyad bshad//
312b5(gso rig): de 'dzin rgyu ni 'phral gtam ni// ston chad shes rab 'chal pa yis// blo yau sa nye sa pa byas gyur nas// de yis chags pa sogs bskyed nas// brtul zhugs spyod dang chos lugs nyams// mchod 'os rnams ni brnyas
312b6(gso rig): pa dang // ga zhung lugs nyams pa de dag ni// sdig dang bdag ni gsod byed ni// gdon ni glags skabs tshol byed pas// lha la sogs po'ang rjes gnod byed// glags ni sdig la sogs pa dang // mi dge'i las ni smin pa
313a1(gso rig): dang / gcig bu khang stong gnas pa 'am// dur khrod sogs par mtshan mo gnas// gcer pur rgyu byam bla mya spyod// 'khrig pa tshul min spyod pa dang // gtsang sbra med par lha mchod dang // mi gtsang
313a2(gso rig): gzhan dang 'a dris pa dang // sbyin sreg sngags gtor mchod sbyin rnams// phyin ci log tu byed pa dang // mdor na nyin ri sogs spyod par// spyod pa bsten pa lA sau 'das pa'o// lha yi gdon gyi yur ngo yi// tshes gcig
313a3(gso rig): bcu gsum dug la 'dzin// lho min gdon ni yur ngo yi// bcu gsum mAr ngo bcu gnyis la// dri za'i gdon ni bcu bzhi dang // bcu gnyis dag la 'du 'dzin bAr byed// klu gdon tshes lnga la 'dzin byed// gnod sbyin gdon ni
313a4(gso rig): yar ngo yaM// tshes bdun bcu gcig drug la 'dzin// tshangs pa'i srin po'i yar ngo yi// tshes brgyad bco lnga dag la 'dzin// smin po sha za sogs mar ngo'i// tshes gcig tshes dgu bcu gcig la// mtshun lha gnAm stong tshes
313a5(gso rig): bcu dang // brgyad dang dgu pa dag la 'dzin// rgan po la sogs gzhan dag ni// phal cher dus de'i thun mtshams pa'o// lha yi gdon gyis dbang byas pa// gdod ni pad+ma kha bye 'dra// lta stangs zhi zhing khro ba med// tshig nyid rdul
313a6(gso rig): dang bshang gtso nyung // kha zas la ni 'dod pa med// lha dang bram ze byung ba dga'// gtsang zhing saM s+thi ta'i skad sba// yun ring nas ni mig 'dzums shing // lus dri zhim zhing mchog ster byed// gos phreng dkar po chu bo dang // ri maH
313b1(gso rig): kha ba mtho la dga'// gnyis med tshugs pa med pa yin// lha mig gdon gyis zin pa ni// yon por blta zhing rang bzhin dran// lha dang bla ma bram ze dang // 'jigs med khengs shing dpa' ba dang // khro zhing rtsol ba che ba dang //
313b2(gso rig): da ni drug po khyab 'jug dang // skye med brgya byin yin zhes bshad// shA dang chang la dga' zhes byaklu dri za'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags// rang spyod la dga' lus dri zhing // snying dga' glu dang gar yang byed// khrus dang
313b3(gso rig): skyed mos tshal la dga'// goso phreng byug pa dmar la skyed// sgeg dang rtsed mo la dga' 'o// klu yi gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags// mig dmar khro zhing mi 'gyur lta// yon por 'gro zhing blta ba dang kanyin mtshan dbugs
313b4(gso rig): rgod lce las ni// khru chu 'dzag cing kha 'gram ldag/ bu raM 'o ma khrus la dga'// kha sbub tu ni nyal bar byed// gdugs mthong na ni 'jigs pa yin// gnod sbyin gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags// mig dmar dgrad cing skrag
313b5(gso rig): lA 'gul// lus nI dri zhim gzi mdangs ljang // gtam dang glu dang khrus nas ni// phreng ba byug pa la dga' zhing / nya yi sha sred dga' bya dang // dga' mgu stobs che nad med la// lcag rtse bstod cing su zhig la// ci zhig
313b6(gso rig): sbyin zhes smra bar byed// gsang chog slu zhing dman pa dang // bram ze la ni brnyas pa byed// khro ba chung zhing mgyogs 'gro ba'o// tshangs pa srin pos zin pa'i rtags// rgod cing gar la dga' ba dang // spyod pa
314a1(gso rig): gtum zhing glags skabs tshol// gshe zhing myur du 'gro ba dang // sman pa bram ze lha la sdang // rang la shing dang mtshon sogs brdeg/ kye zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrog cing // bstan bcos rig byed 'don pa yin//
314a2(gso rig): srin po'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags// khro gnyer bcas shing khro bar blta// rtabs bag tu ni byed pa dang // brdeg cing rab tu rgyug pa dang // ngu zhing gdong ni 'jigs rung ston// zas ma zos dang stobs dang ldan// gnyid med
314a3(gso rig): mtshan mo rgyu bA dang // ngo tsha gtsang sbra med cing dpa'// gdug cing tshog rtsub smra ba dang // khro zhing phreng ba dmar po dang // bud med sha chang khrang la dga'// sha 'am khrag ni mthong ba na// mchu ni bldag par byed pa dang // zas za'i
314a4(gso rig): chen rgod pa yin// sha za'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags// sems ni bde bar mi gnas shing ka/ yongasu rgyug par byed pa dang // mi gtsang la dga' glu gar drang // rgod dang chang dang sha rlon dga'// smyos na gdong ni zhum pa dang //
314a5(gso rig): rgyu med par ni du ba dang // bdag nyid sran mos 'brud pa dang // khong rtsu lus nyams skang gsang dma'// sdug bsngal ba ni brda sprod cing // 'brel dang mi 'brel tshig mang sgra// dran pa nyams shing gnas stong dgra'// mi rtan gcer
314a6(gso rig): bri dri ma can// sring par 'khyam zhing gos gyon zho // rtsa yi phreng ba rgyun tu thogs// shing 'jog rta la zhon par byed// de bzhin phyag dar phung por 'jog/ mang du za bar byed pa yin// yi dgas gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags// spyod tshul
314b1(gso rig): dri ni yi dgras 'dra// sngar zhing zas la mi dga' dang // rtsa gcod byed pa zhes kyang bya// grul bum gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags// tshig mad+ma smra zhing kha gdong gnag/ dral gyis 'gro bar byed pa dang // rlig pa skrangs shing 'phyang
314b2(gso rig): ba yin// mi na byung stems zin pa'i rtags// shing rdo bong ba sog s+t+r-i thogs shing // tshal pa gyon te 'gro ba dang // gcer bur rgyug cing 'jigs brag tu// lha la rtsa yis brgyan du byed// dur khrod gnas ni stong pa dang // srang bar
314b3(gso rig): shing gcig badzin pa dang // til zas chang dang shA la ni// rtag tu mig ni chags pa dang // tshig rtsub de ni sgra ba yin// g.yongs byed kyis ni zin pa'i rtags// chu 'dod zas ni mi slong dang // sngangs shing mig ni dmar ba dang // tshig
314b4(gso rig): rtsub smra bar shes par bya// ro langs gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags// d+hi dang phreng ba la dga' zhing // tshig bden sgra la yongasu 'dar// gnyid che bar ni shes par bya// yi dgas tshun lha'i gdon gyi rtags// mig mi gsal zhing
314b5(gso rig): bzhin ras zhum// rkan ni sbrum par byed pa dang // mig dang rdzi ma bskyod pa dang // gnyid che mAM drod chung ba dang // g.yon phyogs nas ni gos g+hon+ya zhing // shu dang bu ra ma til la dga'// tshA ga 'khrul ba ni yin zhes bya// bla ma
314b6(gso rig): drang srong rgan dang grub// dmod pa'i sems kyis rjes mthun pa// spyod lam kha zas rang bzhin las// ci 'dra gdon ni de yin bshad// zho nu'i tshogs kyi rjes 'bring zhing // gcer bu sgra ni gyen du brdzes// yid mi bde zhing dus
315a1(gso rig): tshigs ni// yun ring gyur pa'i gdon de spang // yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bzhi pa'o// // de nas gdon nad thams cad gso ba bshad par bya'o//
315a2(gso rig): 'byung po 'tshe ba mi 'dod dang // bzlas dang sbyin sreg gtor ma dang // brtul zhugs tshul khrims mnyam 'jog dang // sbyin shes btse la sogs pas bsal// shIng kun pa bla tsha ba gsum// gla rtsi sgog skya arka'i
315a3(gso rig): rtsa/ spang spos a tsa lo ma dang // zla ba 'bam po ku ku ti// shu dag gan+d+ha pri yaM ku// sarba gan+d+ha til dang ni// ka ka an+d+ha raM nye bo// snA ha kra ka ta srim gri/ sle tre sa ma hA na ba li// yungs kar dang ni lig bu mig/ gdon 'joms/
315a4(gso rig): sman ni gzhan drag dang // bong bu rta dang khyi lug dang // rnga mo go dra dreng da nga ni// sre mo re 'dza byaM la gung // ba lang seng go stag ding ni// rgya mtsho yi nI sr-ig chags kyi// pags pa mkhris pa sen mo so// sde tshan 'di dang
315a5(gso rig): mar rnying dang // til mar dang ni bskol ba dag/ btung dang snar ni brug pa dang ka/ bsku ba'i don du sbyar bya zhing // 'di dag phye mas bdug par bya// 'di yi ril bu byas nas ni// mig sman sna sman bya ba dang // 'di yi lde gus
315a6(gso rig): byug pa dang // bskol ba'i khu ba blug par bya/ sbyor ba 'di yis smyo byed dang // rjod byed bcas po'i gdon zhi byed// yungs kar ha ti pi pi ling // pi pi ling rtsa tsha ba gsum// skyu ru ra dang go da dang // sre mo byi la rtsa sha yi//
315b1(gso rig): mkhris pa dang btags sna sman dang // bsku byug blugA sogs byas gdon 'joms// nyung kaR+Sha shu dag shing kun dang // prI yaM ku dang ser po gnyis// ki ri kar+Ni dkar nag gnyis// 'bras bu gsum dang shel ta dang // nim pa'i lo
315b2(gso rig): ma rany+dza// shrI sha gnyis dang sa bon dang // tha ba shing dang ni che ba gsum// mar dang ba gcin de bzhin 'gyur// bskol ba don grub ces bya ste// btung dang snar blugs las sbyar na// gdon ni thaMd myur 'joms byed// mchog
315b3(gso rig): tu lha min gdon sel byed// rjed byed dug dang bkra mi shis// skyo byed rjed byed rims rnams 'joms// sman de nyid ni ra thug gi/ gcin dang sbyar te blud pa dang // snur blugs smon sman byug pa dang // khrus dang dril ba lo sbyar ba
315b4(gso rig): sngar bshad yau/ de 'dra zhing // rgyal po'i sgor yang don 'grub byed// yungs kAr shu dag tsha ba gsum// a shwa gan+d+ha ser po gnyis// shing kun kun dong rtsa ba dang // ka rany+dza yi sa bon dang // shri shA yai ni me togra dang // ka pi ta
315b5(gso rig): yi 'bras bu dang // rgyu ma tshwa ru rta rgya spos dang // kyi rI kAr+No dkar po dang // so nu ka yi rtsa bar bcas// ra gcin dag dang legs bsgos shing // bA lang mkhris pa bu ra maM dang // ril bu byas pa'i sbyor ba de// mig bskus snar
315b6(gso rig): blug bsku byas na// smyo byed rma ni rid pa dang // mtshan mo mi mthong mun 'thib byed// bgegs dang lus chur nub pa brgyal// dug bskus mda' yis phog pa dang // gdug pa sbrul gyis zin pa sel// ras bal sa bo rma bya'i
316a1(gso rig): me tog smanA ma br-i ha ti// shing tsha stang spos po sngon cha// byi la'i rtug pa phub ma dang // shu dag mi sku sbrul lpags dang // glang po'i so dang glang gi ra// shing kun+da dang ni na le sham// cha nyams bdug par byas pa
316a2(gso rig): yi/ skem byed skyo byed sha za'i rigs// srin po lha yi gdon 'joms mchog/ gan+d+ha pa tra cha ba gsum// gur gum po pi ling rtsa ba// kan ta ka ri skyer pa dang // phang shing dang ni yungs kar gnyis// bA li kra dang dug mo nyung
316a3(gso rig): tsAn dkar po rgyu mau tsha dang // 'bras bu gsum dang pu shel tse// shu thag spangs ma pu tsi shel// tsan dkar po bai la dang // shing mngar sug smel ldong ros dang // shug pa rgya spos shri pa sa// ma du ka yi snying po dang // bai nga gnyis po
316a4(gso rig): pri yi ku/ dbyi mo ru rta skyer khaN+Dang // cha mnyam zhibs btags lde gu dang // mar rnying gcin kun cha mnyam bskol// gdon khus 'debs zhes bya bar brjod// de brung gdon 'joms mchog yin// rgya skyes shing mngar kany+dza/ rgya skyug
316a5(gso rig): da da pra tau la// shu dgA sh+lo kun pa t+yo la// yungs kar kaN+Da ka ri dang // saiR+Sha po gnyis dang pu tsi shel// rgya shu ga kan+taM pr-i yaM ku// tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu ga sum// thang shing sle dzas bI nAng+ga// kau sh+yA tA ki ka kaN+Da// shai dru nim
316a6(gso rig): dug mo nyung // shri sha'i me tog sa bon dang // gla sgang ru rta dan+da dang // gi ri karni tsaM tra kaM/ bil+la cha mnyam lde gur byas// mar rnying can gyi sde tshan btsa so// bskol te yun ring bzhag pa de// khus 'debs chen po zhes bshad do// rim pa
316b1(gso rig): kun gyi sbyar na ni// gdon rnams kun dang smyo byed dang // mdze dang rims ni myur du 'joms// gdon ni nyi ma glang gang la// 'dzin pa'i nyi ma de dang der// mchog tu sbyin sgeg gtor ma sogs// skrun pas rab tu 'ab bya// khrus dang
316b2(gso rig): gos dpo sha dang tshal// chang dang mar drang bu ram sogs// gang zhing gung l-i srid gyur pa// dA tshaM da ni de la sbyin// rin chen dwi dang phreng ba dang // sa bon mar dang sbrang rtsi dang // zas kun kun la sbyin bya ste// 'di ni spyi yi cho ga'o// lha
316b3(gso rig): dang bla ma drang srong rgan// grub la lha yi gan su sbyin// de yang lha yi gdon la ni// byang gri phyogasu gtor mo sbyin// lha min gdon la ci 'dod par// mtshamasA kyi gnas nub tu sbyin// dri za'i gdon la~M ba lang ngam// gos dang rgyan
316b4(gso rig): bcas gtwor m+b+ha sbyin// mA tshun l+yA klA yi gAdon 'bab chu// kU la shar lho mtsham smai sbyin// gnod sbyin rang gr-I gnas saM nI// chu gnyis 'dus pa'i gnas sbyin// srin po'i lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am// tshang tshing 'jig su rung bar sbyin
316b5(gso rig): srin porI yi phyogasu sbyin// tshongs pa srin po'i shar du sbyin// shA zla la ni khang ste dr-i d+ha/ n+yA phyogs smra ni gnas te sbyin// b+h+r-ing ba gtsang zhing dkar po da // dr-i dang 'o thug 'bras chan dang // zho dang gdugs ni dkar bri dang //
316b6(gso rig): rnams kyi ni gtor mar 'dod// shing kun yungs kar shu dog dang // tsha ba gsum ni srang phye phye// mar bri gang dang ba yau gcin// bzhi 'gyur dang ni lhan cig bskol// de btung snar blugs bkrus pa yis// lha yi gdon las
317a1(gso rig): thar bar byed// shu dag shing kun sgog sgra rnams// ra gcin sbyar ba snar blug dang // mig bskus lha yi gdon las thar// lha min gtor ma 'bras bu ni// mang po dag dang pu shel tse// klu yi gdon la dzA tI dang //
317a2(gso rig): 'bras yos bu ram snum khur dang // 'bras chan pu ram bcas pa dang // zas mchog po ma sbrang rtsi dang // sa nag nA ga ge sar dang // shu dag pad+ma pu shel tse// uta pal pad+ma dmar po yi// 'dab mar bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin//
317a3(gso rig): seng phrom lo ma dkar po dang // rgya spos nA ga ge sar dang // yungs kar chu grang la btab pa'i// snar blugs mig tu bskus pa'ang phan// ge nod sbyin gdon la 'o ma zho// mar dang 'bras chan bsres pa dang // gu gul pad+ma thang shing dang //
317a4(gso rig): pu sha lA ts+tshe dang gos dang gser// da byi ga ni gtor ma sbyin par bya// mar dang rlo ma bA gcin ni// cha minyam bskol da btung ba dang // snar blu gau lus la bskus na phan// a ru ra dang ser po gnyis// sgrog ste shu dag nA lwa sham/
317a5(gso rig): nom pa'i lo mar gcin btags// lde gus sna sman mi gau sman bya// tshangs pa srin po'i gtor ma ni// nas bre bzhi ni btsos pa yi// chu bre bcu drug til btags be sres// gdugs dang gos dang byug pa sbyin// seng lding srang ni nyi shu dang //
317a6(gso rig): tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum// shing kun shrI dag shu ti dang // yungs dkar nim pa'i lo mar bcas// sgog skya srang ni phyed phyed dang // zhun mar phul ni bdun dag dang // ba gcin sum cu bskol ba de// btung dang sngar thugs bskus
317b1(gso rig): na phan// srin po'i gdon la til phye dang // me tog dkar po 'bras chan 'dres// sha btsos rjen pa niSh+Ta pa// khrag dang bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin// na ga ta ma la shri sha ni// shun pags me tog 'bras bu dang / de bzhin pra ta la
317b2(gso rig): nag po// bil+la'i rtsa ba tsha ba gsum// shing kun yungs kAr dugu mo nyung // sgeg skya skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu// ra gcin dang ni sbyar ba'i sman// snar thug mig tu blugs na'ang phan// 'di dag nyid dang mar gyi ni// bzhi 'gyur ba gcin bskol
317b3(gso rig): ba nI/ btung dang snar blugs bskus pa yis// srin po'i gdon ni zlog par byed// sha za la ni pu ram chang // til tshig sau til gyi phye ma zho// la phug lan tshwa phye zan mar// 'byung po'i 'bras chan gtor ma sbyin/ ser po rnam
317b4(gso rig): gnyis rgya che btsod// shu tau dong gra pi yaM ku// shang kun sgog skya tsha ba gsum// 'bras bu gsum dang pa ta li// shu drug gI ri karni ka ra// shwa ri sha yi me tog ma rau// bA gcin bzhi cha bcas par bskol// btung dang bsku ba byas na
317b5(gso rig): phan/ yang na de nyid rang gcin btags// mig bskus swAR+Sha ni blu gsu na phan// lha dang drang srong mtshun lha dang // dri za'i gdon la sna sman sogs// rnon po btang bar mi bya zhing // 'di la zhun mar btung la so gAs// smena? ni 'jam
317b6(gso rig): po spyad par bya// sha za ma gtogs thaMd la// ma mthun sbyin par mi bya ste// mthu stobs che ba de khros nas// nad pa sman pa bcas gi sod byed// 'phags pa spyan ra sau gzigs dbang phyug/ mgon po phyag ni bcu gnyis pa// nang
318a1(gso rig): kun gso bar mdzad pa yi// sngags bzlas nas ni nud kun sel// de bzhin sgro byed brjed byed dang // gzhan yang sems 'khrul byed pa 'joms// rig sngags rgyal mo rma bya che// gtsang byas de la rtag tu skrag/
318a2(gso rig): 'byung po bdag po lha chen dang // de yi 'khor gyi tshogs mchod cing // de yi sngags grub bzlas ni yang // gau don ni thams cad sel bar byed// ga yang 'og nas bshad pa yi// le'u gnyis las smos pa dang // gang 'di bshad
318a3(gso rig): pa de dag kun// phan tshun sbyor ba byas na phan// // yan lag brgyud pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u lnga pa'o// // de nas smyo byed gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// smyo byed nad gzhi re re
318a4(gso rig): dang // 'dus sogs dug los gyur pa drug/ smyo byed ces bya lus dang ni// sems kyi nad la log pa ru// zhugs pas myos par gyur pa yin// bza' btung gnod pa dog dang ni// snying dang ma goms dri mar btsos// mang nyung ma
318a5(gso rig): snyoms bsten pa dang // yid zhum snying stobs chung bA dang // nad kyi shugs ni dkrugs pa dang // rid cing spyod pa ma snyoms dang // mchod 'os mchod par mi byed dang // sems las kyis ni sems nyams dang // dug dang nye ba'i
318a6(gso rig): dug las gyur// 'di yis snying stobs zhan pa yi// snying gi nad la gnod byas te// blo ni dri ma can byas te/ yid rgyu ba yi li bkag nas// smyo byed dang ni skyed par byed// de yi blo dang rnam shes dang // dran pa 'khrul zhing lus kyi ni//
318b1(gso rig): bde dang sdug bsngal las nyams te// shing rta khu lo bsgyur ba ni// med pa lta bur rtsom pa ni// kun kyang bsam pa med par spyod// de la rlung gyur lus sgeg cing // rgyu med ngu zhing tshig rtsub sgra// rgod dang 'dzum dang gar byed dang //
318b2(gso rig): glu len rol mo byed pa dang // lus bskyod pheg ni rdob pa dang // gling bu pI wAng la sogs kyi// sgra yi la dA mo yang yang zlos// rgyun du khaM nas lbu ba 'dzag/ phan tshun rgyug cing mang du smra// rgyan min pas ni rgyan du pyod//
318b3(gso rig): bzhon pa min pos 'gro ba rtsom// kha zas la ni gdu bar byed// de snyed na ni mi 'dod byed// mig zlum mig ni dmar ba dang // kha zas zhu nas nung ljang 'gyur// mkhris las smyo zhing khro ba dang // khu tshur bong ba brdeg cing rgyug/
318b4(gso rig): grib ma chu ni glang mo 'dod// gcer bur 'dug cing lus mdog ser// med par me nI 'bar ba dang // skar ma mar me mthong ba'o// bad kan slon zhing yi ga 'chus// kha zas rtsol dang smra ba nyung // bud med 'dod cing dben la dga'/
318b5(gso rig): kha chu snabs ni 'dzag pa dang // 'jigs rung gtsang sbra la mi dga'// gnyid che gdong ni skrang pa dang // nub mo shas cher skyo ba dang // zos ma thag tu ldang ba yin// 'dus pa'i rgyu dang mtshan ma ni// kun ldan de yi bdag nyid can//
318b6(gso rig): smyo byed mi bzadang par shes bya// de ni sman pas yongasu spang // nor dang chung ma la sogs bral// mnag bska ba las sems gdungs pas// spyi zhing zhum la yang yang brgyal// kyi hud kyi hud smre sngags 'don// glo bur du ni
319a1(gso rig): ngu zhing brgyal// de yi ston mang du sems// mya ngan gyis gdungs sems khong chud// gnyid yar rnam par 'khyams pa yin// dug gis gdong ni sngo ba dang // gzi nyams dbang po stobs chung ba// shugs kyi
319a2(gso rig): bar du'ang 'khrul bar byed// mig dmar de ni spang bar bya// de nas rlung 'gyur spro byed la// dang po snum gyi btung ba blung // lam 'gags rgyu la dang por ni// snum bcas sbyang ba 'jam po bya// bad kan mkhris gyur dang po ni//
319a3(gso rig): snum dang dugs bya skyug sman dang // bkru sman mas btang byas pa dang // mgo bo'i bkru sman dag kyang bya// de ltar lus ni dag byas nas// yid ni dran pa rnyid par 'gyur// de ltar na yang rjes 'brang na// sna sman mig sman rnon
319a4(gso rig): po btang // sems deng dbugs 'byung skrag pa dang // 'jigs dang brdeg dang sdig mA dang // lus dris byug dang bsku ba dang // dud rngub sman mar blud pa dgra/ sbyar te dwe ni dgra' 'gyur nA// yid ni tha mal pa la sbyar/
319a5(gso rig): shing kun dang ni rtsabs ru tsha// tsha ba gsum ni srang gnyis gnyis// mar bri bzhi ni gcin bcas// bskol bas smye byed 'byung po dang // rjed byed gdon ni sel mchog yin// b+hU m+ba'i bskol khu bre do dang // mar bri
319a6(gso rig): gang dang che ba gsum// sha ma dur byid bimra dang // shang+ga puSh+pa dong ka dang // sap+ta la dang bi TIng+ga// zho ni gnyis gnyis lde gu bskol// b+h+rUM m+ba'i sman mar zhes bshad de// mar ni srang res bskyed de btang // cha tshad srang bzhi'i ma
319b1(gso rig): zos na/ spyi byed rjod byed mdze yo nad// sol zhing mo ga shAm bu sbyang byed// skad spyan tshig gsal dran pa dang // yid gzhungs dpal ni skyed par byed// 'bras bu gsum dang bIn+d+hang+ga// pa dza e la thang shing dang sa la 'a lu k+Sha da /
319b2(gso rig): thal rje sa rnam gnyis ser po gnyis// s+thi ra rnam gnyis pr-i yong ku/ rgya spos ru rtA bri ha ti// nA gA ge sAr dong gA bcod// se 'bru bal bu'i lho ma dang // dzA ti kha 'bus bi TAd+he// dan+ta shu dag uta pa la// tsAn dkar po zho gnyis
319b3(gso rig): gnyis bzhun mar bre gang bcas bskol ba// dge ba'i sman mar zhes bshad 'dis// 'byung po'i gdon dang spro byed dang // rjed byed lung pa sdig can 'joms// skya rbab gi yan pa skem dang dug/ rmongs bag gcin snyi dbyig
319b4(gso rig): dug rims// khu ba med pa 'am bu med pa 'am// dran pa gdon gyis brlams pa dang // yid gzhungs med cing tshigs khrus dang // dran nyams me drod chung la phan// stobs bskyed bkra shis tshe ring zhing // mdangs bskyod skal
319b5(gso rig): ldan lus rgyas byed// bu skyed byed pa'i mchog yin no// 'di la thal tres rnam gnyis sogs// nyi shu rtsa gcig chu nang bskol// de yI khu ba mar dang ba// lan cig skye bo bzhi 'gyur dang // me da rnam gnyis ram nye ba// bur tsho brdo da
319b6(gso rig): kha sra la phre'u// bu ram shing dang par+Ni gnyis// bskol ba yi ni sman mar 'di// dge ba chen po zhes bya ste// rtas byed 'dus pa'i nad 'joms shing // snga ma bos kyang yon lhag/ spang spos bu ta ka shi dang // chu rtsa shu dag kha
320a1(gso rig): skal phreSh+Ta/ kyi lte ba dang ra ma nye ba// tsa ro dza ya pu tse she la// sle tres tsa t+yA pa ra ha// a tI tsa tA ya ta la// ma ha bu ru sha dan dang // nA gu li gnyis skyu ru ra/ brish+tsi ka la ka dam+ba// sa la par+Ni bcas bskol
320a2(gso rig): mAraHsha za chen po'i mar zhes bya// des ni nyin bzhi pa'i rims dang // smyo byed rjed byed gdon 'joms shid// blo dang yid gzhungs dran pa bskyed// byis pa rnams kyi lus 'phel byed// bdud rtsi dang nI 'dra ba yin// b+h+ram+b+hi in+d+ra
320a3(gso rig): bi TAng+ka// shing kun spang spos murba dang // ra sna sgog sgra bo nga dkar// shu dog bye'u ru go bi sha la// nA gA dan+ti byi tsher ba// dzo ti s+tha ti tsha ba gsum// a ru ra dang sa nag rnams// glang po'i gcin btags ril bur byas// grib
320a4(gso rig): bskams snar blugs mig bsku zhing // lus bskus spos bdugs skyo byed sel// yungs karA dang ni sbyar ba yis// sna sman rnam pa sna tshogs phan// yungs mar gyis ni lus bsku dang // yungasA kar phye ma snar blang bya// mdo
320a5(gso rig): gnas bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin dud rnon shing kun btsos pa phan// wa dang ra 'jam 'ug pa dang // byi ba ra thu ga dzA ti ka'i// gcon dang rtug pa spu dang ni// pags pa mkhris pa sen mo dang // spos bdug mig sman lus bsku da // byug
320a6(gso rig): dang blug pa bcad par bya// bad kan rlung 'gyur la phan char// khyi dang ba lang nya sha ni// rul pa'i gdug pas bdug par bya// mkhris gyur la ni tik+ta'o mar// 'chi byed snum ni gnyis kyi mar// bza' dang btung ba bsil ba dang /
320b1(gso rig): mngar ba dang ni yang ba bsngags// ji skad bshad pa'i gtor ma gdab// yang na sha tshon gyis 'drangs bya// de 'og rlung med gnas bsnyal nas// sems myos pa las thar bar 'gyur// khrom pa'i chu ni nyung bar gzhug/ ltogs
320b2(gso rig): pa nyid du byas te skam// de la chos dang nor ldan pa'i// gtam snyan mdza' bos sems dka' bya// yong na sdug pa dang bral ba 'am// rmad du byung bas bstan pa 'am// bcings la yungs mar gyis bskus te// nyin mtshan la ni
320b3(gso rig): gan rkyal bzhag/ kha sral phre'u 'am lcags tsha'am// til mar chu tshan gyis reg bya// yang na lcag kyis bzhus nas ni// bcings te g.yeng sar sbyar bar bya// yang na rdo dang mtshon med pa'i// mun khang mi ni med par gzhug/
320b4(gso rig): mche ba ston pa'i sbrul dang ni// glang dang seng ge glang po ches// de ni skrag tu gzhug pa 'am// yang na rgyal po'i skyes bu yis// dam du bcings te ro phyir phyung nas// rgyal po'i bka' yis bsdigs pa dang // 'di bsad bya
320b5(gso rig): zhes skrag tu gzhug/ lus kyi sdug bsngal 'jig pa bas// srog ni 'jigs pa rab 'jigs pas// de phyir kun tu 'khrul ba'i yid// nye bar zhi ba nyid du 'gyur// grub pa'i sbyor ba 'di dag ni// nad dmigs dus sogs bltos
320b6(gso rig): te bya/ sdug dang nor dang bral ba las// gang gi yid la gnod 'gyur ba// de la de 'dra gnod 'gyur ba'i// spro sring dbugs dbyung ba yis gso// 'dod dang mya ngan 'jigs pa dang // khro dang 'jims pa cheng las gyur// gnyis
321a1(gso rig): dag gis ni gcig la gcig/ de dag gnyis kyis zhi bar bya// bshad pa'i mtshan ma las lhag pa// gdon dang rjes 'brel yin zhes bya// gal te smyo byed gdon las gyur// gdon gsor bshad pa'i sman sbyar bya
321a2(gso rig): til btags phye ma nas dang zan// snum zhing mngar ba'i kha zas dang // 'bras ni khrag tu sbrus pa dang // sha ni bcas pa rjen pa dang // 'bru chang sbyar chang mnan pa'i chang // a ti muk+ta'i me tog dang // dzA ti sa ha ra dza yi/ mo to go bcom
321a3(gso rig): pa'i gtor ma ni// lam gyi bzhi mdo bye lang lhas// chu bo 'dus pa dag tu sbyin// gang zhig sha dang chang spangs shing // phan la brtson zhing gtsang sbra che// snying stobs can la lhan cig skyes// glo bur spro byed 'byung mi 'gyur// dbang
321a4(gso rig): po'i don ni gsal ba dang // de bzhin blo dang yid gsal ba// lus zungs tho malwa bar gnas pa// smyo byed dang bral mtshan ma yin// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u drug pa'o//
321a5(gso rig): de nas rjed byed gso ba bshad par bya'o// rjed byed dran pa nyams pa ste// de ni snying stobs blo 'khrul dang // saM sems las mya ngan 'jig sogs kyi// gnod gyur sems las byung ba yin// lus sems rtogs pa'i nad kyis ni
321a6(gso rig): smyo byed bzhin du 'khrugs gyur pas// snying stobs nyams shing snying dang ni// 'du shes rgyu ba'i rtsa sbubs khyab// mun pa zhugs shing snying sems rmongs// 'jig su rung ba'i bya ba byed// so 'cha' lbu bskyug pa dang // lag pa rkang
321b1(gso rig): g.yob pa dang // gzugs med par yang mthong ba dang // 'khru zhing sa la 'gyel ba dang // smin ma mig g.yo nad shugs dang // bral nas sad par gyur pa dang // de ni dus gzhan dag tu yang // de bzhin du ni spyod pa yin// rlung la sogs
321b2(gso rig): dang 'dus pa yika dbye bas rjed byed rnam pa bzhi// de ni skye bar 'gyur ba'i tshul// snying 'dar khong stong mgo 'khor la// mun par mthong zhing sems khong chung // smin ma mi sdug mi 'gyur dang // sgra mi thos shing rdul 'byung la// kha chu
321b3(gso rig): snabAs ni 'dzag pa dang // mi 'ju yi ga 'chus shi brgyal// lto spos nyams stobs zad pa dang // gnyid med skom zhing yan lag na// rmi lam glu len gar byed dang // til mar chang ni 'thungs pa dang // de gnyis gcin du 'byung
321b4(gso rig): bi rmi// de la rlung 'gyur brla 'gul zhing // yang dang yang du 'gyel ba dang // yang dang yang du dran pa stor// 'du shes rnyed nas mi gsal du// mi ge 'bur yong yang dbugs 'byin zhing // lbu bar skyug cing 'drar ba dang // so
321b5(gso rig): 'cha' mgo ni brdeb pa dang // rlung gi gre ba rgyas par byed// yan lag kun tu brdeb pa dang // sor mo mi snyoms 'gugs pa dang // mig dang pags pa sen mo ni// gnag cing rtsub mor snang ba dang // gzugs ni mi brtan rtsub pa dang //
321b6(gso rig): mi sdug bzhin ras ngan pa yin// mkhris pa las gyur rjed byed ni// dran pa yang yang nyams pa dang // mig gdong pags pa lbu ba ser// sa la brdeg par byed pa dang // 'jigs rung 'bar zhing khro ba yi// gzugs mthong skom dang
322a1(gso rig): che ba yin// bad+ma kun las gyur ring nas 'dzin// yun ring nyid nas sad par byed// gA yo 'gul nyung zhing kha chu mang // kha mig pags pa sen mo dkar// gzugs rnams dkar por mthong ba yin// mtshan nyid
322a2(gso rig): kun dang ldan pa spangs// de nas blo seMs dran pa dang // snying ga'i sbubs ni sad byed pa'i// smon sman la sogs las rnaMs ni// rnon pa yin ni sbyang bar bya// rlung 'gyur 'jam rtsi mang du bya// mkhris gyur phal cher bkru sman btang // pad
322a3(gso rig): kan phan cher skyug sman ni// btang bas rjed byed gso bar bya// rnam kun tu leDa dag cing // leg par spro ni bsrings pa la// rjed byed las ni thar byo'i phyir// zhi bar bya ba'i sbyor ba nyon// ba lci'i khu ba 'o ma dang // zho dang gcin dang mar bskol ba/ rjed
322a4(gso rig): byed rims dang sgro byed dang // mig ser sel bar byed pa blung // rtsa ba bcu dang 'bras bu ga suM// dug mo nyung shun ser po gnyis// a pa marga lo me bdun// ni li ni dang pu tso shel// dong ka puSh+ka ra mu la dang // phal gul rtsa ba byi tsher srung // gnyis gnyis chu
322a5(gso rig): bre bcu drug nang // bskol bA la ni bzhi cha lus// ga bra'i rtsa ba du ba ri// pa ta ngan+da dur byid dang // tsha ba gsum dang ro hi sha/ murba rtsa mkhris bu di kha// ha ti pi pi ling dang ni// ma du yan te thal tres gnyis// lcang ma dang ni tsi tra ka/ zho ni gnyis
322a6(gso rig): gnyis mar bre gang // de bzhin snga ma'i gshir rdzas bskol// 'di ni ba yi rnam lnga che// rjed byed rims dang dmu rdzing dang // mtshan mar rdol ba sel mchog yin// 'or nang gzhang 'bru mig ser dang // skra rbab sman dang lung pa dang // gdon rnam 'jos
322b1(gso rig): byar byed pa yin// b+h+r-i m+b+hi shu dag ru rta dang // shAng+ga puSh+Ta mar rnying bcas// bskol ba'i mar ni yid zhungs byed// sgro byed bkra mi shis pa dang // rjed byed sdig pa 'joms par byed// 'tsho byed sde tshan srad re dang // til mar zhun mar pre re bsres
322b2(gso rig): 'o ma bri ni bcu drug bsgril// 'thungs na rjed byed las thar byed// 'o ma bu re shing khu da // bye bzhi dang ni ting pal gyi// khu ba brgyad 'gyur dag dang ni// 'tsho byed sde tshan zho gnyis gnyis// zhun mar breg bcas bskol blung // des ni rlung
322b3(gso rig): las gyur pa'i// rjed byed myur du sel bar byed// de bzhin 'jug ma bi da ro// ku sha bu ra shing 'o ma// bskol ba 'thungs pa 'ang de dang 'dra// ku spyan nA yi khu ba mar// bco brgyad 'gyur dang shIng mngar gyi// lde gu bcas pa bskol bas ni// rjed bying sa
322b4(gso rig): babar byed pa dang // blo dang tshog bsal skad snyad byed// ba ni ser skya'i mkhris pa yi// sna sman btang yang mchog tu phan// khyi dang wa dang byi la dang // seng gi sogs kyi mkhris pa bsngags// go ta sre mo glang po che// ba lang dreng dang pr-i sha ta'i// mkhris pa ti la mar bskol ba dag
322b5(gso rig): lus bsku snar ni blud na'ang phan// 'bras bu gsuM dang tsha ba gsum// nas tshig 'khus thal ko nyon tshe// pha nid dza ka sra rtsi pog/ a pa marga ka rany+dza'i// sa bon til mar ra gcin dang // bcas pa bskol ba snar brug pa laM// phye ma sna nas bus pa 'ang phan// sr-i ma 'ug pa spre'u dang
322b6(gso rig): byargod khyi rti bye rog sbrul// mchu dang sgo dang rtug pa yi/ dung bas 'di la bdug par bya// til mar sgog skya bcas pa 'i// 'o mnye'u shing bsten na'ang phan// b+hi m+me 'i ru rta'i khu ba 'am/ shu dag sbrang rtsir ldan pa'ang phan/ nad bzhi mnye du 'khrug pa las// lus dang sems la
323a1(gso rig): brten 'gyur nad// skyes par gyur pa gang yin de// rjed byed gnad ni chen por gnas// de bas gso bka' 'di la ni// bcud kyi len gyi gso bar bya// des nyen me dang chu la sogs// yang ba las rtag tu srungs// thar pa na ni yid 'khrul pas// khyed
323a2(gso rig): kyis 'di ltar byaso zhes// mi brjod yul ni yid 'ong bas// mnyam pa'i sems ni brtan par bya// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi la'i gnas kyi le'u bdun pa'o// // yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// gdon gso ba'i yan lag
323a3(gso rig): rdzog so// // de nas mig mchu'i nad dmigs shes par bya ba bshad par bya'o// nad gzhi nad kun las bshad pa'i// gnod par nad ni 'khrugs pa dang // mchog tu mig la gnod pa dang // phal cher mkhris pa skyes pa yis// rtselnga gyen du brgyud nas ni// mig gi yan
323a4(gso rig): lag mig ma mu gra/ dkar nag mthong byed rgyal mo 'am/ mig kun las gnas nad skyed byed// de la rlung ni mig mchu yi// rtsa la zhugs par gyur pa dag/ nyal nas ljang tshe mig mchu ni// har bag nad dang bcas par byed// mig ni rdul gyi gang snyam sems// btsum par dka'
323a5(gso rig): zhing mchim 'jo// mnyes na bde ba nyam su byed// de ni 'jam dga' yin zhes bshad/ rlung gis mig mchu bskyod nas ni/ yang dang yang du 'byed cing 'jug// do ni 'dzum pa zhes bshad// grwa mtshams lhod cing tshor ba med/ rtag tu 'jim shing miganyams pa/ gang yin de ni chung
323a6(gso rig): gnod yim mkhris pas mig mchu'i mam mar ni// 'brum bu ku mu da ya~M ni/ sa bon 'dri slar gang gyur pa/ 'brul phran su mu da zhes bya/ tshe zhing 'dul la nang dang bcas// dam zhing rig na mi bzod la/ gakris pa mig mtshur skyes pa de/ ma bril pa skyes pa yin shes pa shang /
323b1(gso rig): mkhris rdzi ma'i nang gnas shing // g.ya' zhing che bar byed pa dang // de rjes rdzi ma 'byi ba de// rdzi ma 'byi ba zhes bshad// bad kan las gyur mig mchu'i nad// 'brum phran dkar po yung kar 'dra// mjug snang g.ya' na mig rdul khebs// sbyin 'ag can 'dzeg po dag kyang // har bag
323b2(gso rig): 'drul lo rdums khebs// bad kun gyis bslang mig mchu'i dang // bad kan las gyur rmen bu dkar// ga zhing sprin ma med g.yar swa// hU~M shug tsam yam de las ni// cung zad chub ba chags pa yon// breg las 'brum phra dmar ba dang // dmatshungs 'brum phran gyi khyab pa/ 6
323b3(gso rig): pa zhes bya de bskyed dmar// reg mi bzod pa mig mchu slongs// mig ma chu'i nang du ga lhag ni// sra zhing snum la tsha zhing na// mdog ser de ni khrag 'dzag cing // bcad cing 'phel byed mig 'brum yin// mig mchu'i mtha' ma dbusu ni// g.ya' zhing che la na bcas brtan ung+ga tsam gyi
323b4(gso rig): khrag 'brum dme// 'brum phran mig nad ces bya'o// nad kyis min mnu'i phyi rol spangs/ nang du bug phri mos khyab// 'jig bcas nang du mu yod de// pad+ma'i rtsa 'dra pang rtsa yin// nad gzhi gsum dang khrag 'khrugs pas// mig mchu nad ni ldang ba dang // rgyu med par ni bskyed
323b5(gso rig): 'gyur ba// de ni mig mchu la khrugs zhes bya// nad kyi mig mchu dri ma khrag/ skyongs rnags nad bcas mika mchu s+ho// g.ya' zhing skrangs la dmar ba dang // mig mamu 'byar pa 'byar zhes bya// mig mchu'i nang ni sra zhing rtsub// 'brum phran bye ma 'dra zhes bya// gnag cing 'das
323b6(gso rig): 'dra 'dam bu'o// mdog 'dra sha ni mang pos rgyas// na shas che ba zhes bya'o// byis pa so skyes tshe na 'byung // des ni byis pa'i mig skrangs zhing // mig dmar lta bar mi nus la// mig ma mu gzer zhing sbyin bag 'dzag/ rna ba sna dang mig nyid byed// gang in de ni sgra ngan
324a1(gso rig): yin/ rdzi 'gags rdzi ma 'dus shing zhum// mig mchu yang de 'drar gyur pa// nud cing nang du kha bltas la// spu gzhan yang ni tsher ma ltar// rtse mo rnon po skye 'gyur zhing // nges bdar mig ni sbyangs pa dang // tsha zhing rlung la sogs mi bzod// bton na
324a2(gso rig): cung zad bde bar byed// mig phug sgra mtshams phyi rol tu// thor bu skrang zhing mthob dang // dmar zhing mchi ma rnag khrig 'dzag/ yang yang rgyas pa rlon pa yin// nang gzhi gsum dang khrag las ni// mig mchu'i nang na sha'i dum bu// rmen bu sral nad med pa// phyi ro
324a3(gso rig): mI mnyam g.yo mdzer pa// de ltar nyi shu rtsa bzhi po// mig mchu la geras nad yi no// de la dang po sman gyis gso// de 'o gnyis dang 'brum bu spang // rdzi ma 'phags pa gsor rung tsam// lhag ma mtshon gyis gso bar bya// de dag las kyang rdzi ma 'byi// btsag par bya la
