324a6(gso rig): ra'i zhal gang ba// ngo steng rgya mtsha gdas par bya// shing mngar dang ni skyu ru pa/ kha to la bskol chu thugs bya// rlung med gnas la g.yo mkhas kyis// sbyang byas gan rgyal nyal po la/ mig mchu bzlog ste dro 'jam chu// bsros pi'i gos kyi gdulas byas la// gos kyis
324b1(gso rig): leDa par dkris nas ni// g.yon pa'i 'theb 'dzub kyis bzung zhing // 'gul zhing 'gyur ba med par ni// de nas mig mAchu kun tu ni// dkyil 'khor lta bu'i mtshon gyis ni// 'phyed du gdab cing mtshan ma byas// de nyid kyis sam lo rtsub 'am// shes pa li yi lo ma 'i
324b2(gso rig): yang na brgya mtsho'i lbu ba blung // khrag ni ras bal ye 'us phyi// khrag bcad leDa par drud shes nas// rang rang sman ni sbrang rtsi dang // bcas pa de la bsku bar bya// de 'og chu dron gyis bkrus la// mar gyis blug par bya ba dang // rna ba'i steng dang 'og bar// nas kyi zan
324b3(gso rig): dang sbrang rtsi dang // mar dang bcas pas dkri bar bya// zhag ni gnyis pa la bkrol te// ji lta bar ni sman blug shing // bzhi par sna sman la soT bya// zhag ni lnga po dag la dgrol// mnye zhing sen mo k+tar dmar la// sbangs g.yo'i drud sogs nad med pa// mig mchu gzhar ler
324b4(gso rig): zhes bya// de las bzlog pa slar bzhar ba// bzhar dra Da pa ni na ba dang // rdzi ma 'byi zhing mig mchu 'gyur// de la snum dang dugs la so Da// rlung la phan pa'i sbyor ba snga Da// mar sar gyis ni bsku bya zhing // seng phro ma dkar po mor sar gyis// lai Da par bsku ba byas nas ni// a ra
324b5(gso rig): yi rtsa ba yi// lde gus bskus te phur mo btso// chos pa bkrus te bskam nas ni// btaTA pa thum po byas nas ni// ra 'am bud med 'o mar ni// mnyes pa mig tu blug par bya// de nyid sa l+r-i thug po cha'o// lde gu bskus te de ltar byas// zho dang zhi khaM chu sbyangs pa/ mig
324b6(gso rig): ni bzhar dra Da 'gyur la blu ga/ yang na zho kha chu nyi tshe// blugs shing skam sa'i sha khu sbyin// 'brum phron sra zhing mtho ba ni// 'bras kyi rtse mos brtol bar bya// de rjes btsi ra te cho ga ni// lhag ma snga ma bzhin du bya// zhal zho la gdab dang 'dra ba la// rim 'di'i mig mchu'i nad
325a1(gso rig): kun sbyar// khrag mkhris las gyur mngar ba yi// sde tshan dang bskol mar gyi gso// snum gyur nas ni gtar ga gdab// dur bying bkru sman btang ba mchog bzhar zhing khrag ni phyung nas kyang // shing mngar bskol ba'i chus bkru zhing // tsan dAn dkar po'i 'o ma bskol//
325a2(gso rig): mig mchu la ni blugaso pa phan// rdzi ma 'byi la khyab kyis ni// ba spu'i bu ga btsags pa 'am// srin bu pad+mos khrag dbyu // yang na 'o ma 'o ma~M bu ri shing // khu bas slon bya mngar bsil sman// bskol ba'i mar ni btang bar bya// nag tshur dkar po'i phye ma ni// bye'u rug pa'i khu bar
325a3(gso rig): bsres// zangs kyi snod du bcug pa ste// rdzi ma 'byi ba'i mig sman mchog/ mrig mchu'i sha drung bca' sga dang // rgyamatsha'i phye ma gdab par bya// chu dron gyis bkrus seng ldong dang // na le shaM dkar tu pa raM// chu bskol ba laM ser po gnyis// shing mngar dang ni 'bras bu gsum/ khu ba sbrang
325a4(gso rig): rtse re bcas pa blag/ bad kan las gyur zhasal byaM// nag tshur rgya ma tsha pi pi ling // ldong ros stang zil zhib pat+sa Da la// sbrang rtsi bcas pa bsku bar bya// skyug sman mig sman sna sman ni// bad kani sel ba thaMd panA// cha DA pa la 'ang 'di dag bya// ma zhi mi btsa'i gdub
325a5(gso rig): par bya// sgra ngan pa ni seng ldeng dang / nim+bi'i lo ma 'bras bu gsum// mar dang sbyar ba'i pi pi ling // shIng mngar rgyam tsha bskol ba ni// ma me b+hu da de slon du gzhug/ rgunI 'brum dang ni a ru ra// pi pi ling bskol bkru sman sbyir// sor po rnam gnyis pi byi ling
325a6(gso rig): gra sgang lde gus nu ma bsku// yungs kar mar bcas dud pas bdug/ sbyang bar byas nas pa to la// gra sgang dang ni rgun 'brum dang // sle tres 'bras bu gsuM bskol blud// byis pa'i mig mechu blud pa'o// srin bu pad+mas khrag dbyung bya// a sman+ta ka sU ru ra// dzam+bu'i lo ma
325b1(gso rig): bskol ba blug/ byis pa'o ma mar bsten pas// phal cher bad kan+da nad byung bas// de bas dang po skyug sman nyid// nad kun la ni bsngags pa yin// lce myang tsha dang pi pi lIng // a pa marga'i// 'o ma shu dag sbrang rtsir bcas// po son cha ni shing mngar bcas// 'o ma kha zlas 'o/
325b2(gso rig): ma dang zas la brten pa'i byis pa la// rim bzhin blud pa nad kun ni// spring ba bya phyir slon sman bti // mchog tu sgra ngan nad la pha ni// sab+ta la yi khu ba mar// bskol ba gnyis ka sbyong byed sbyin// seng phrol shing mngar ser po gnyis// nim+ba'i lo ma pu tse shal// zangs kyi khu
325b3(gso rig): bar bcas reng bu// sgra ngan kyo ni nad la phan// yang na l+yA DA kyi phye ma sregs// 'o mau sbrang rtsi mar bcas phan// sug smel sgog skyu ka tA ka// pa nid+tha ka na le sham// dung bcas chu dang bdar ba dang // katA bcas ril bu yang phan// rdzi ma'i 'gaDa nad sel ba la// sbyang ba byas pa
325b4(gso rig): gyur pa yin// smin mo'i 'og cha gnyis dang // rdzi ma'i 'og cha gnyis dang // rdzi ma'i cha gcig bar bar ni// nas kyi tshad tsam nus kyi dbyibs// 'phreng du dpral la ras rlon pas// de yi khrig ni bsal nas nI/ khrig ni chad par gyur pa dang // bar mtsham+ba mung+ga tsam bzhag la// khob n-i
325b5(gso rig): yon pos 'tshom pa bya// dpral bar ras gyis bcings nas ni// de bzhin skud pas 'tshem par bya// shin tu dmA dang lhod par min// des ni li Da pa ra 'tsham par bya// de nA sbrang rtsi mar gyis byug 'di la bcing bar mi bya'o// nA na n+ya gro d+ha so Da pa'i// khu ba 'o mar bcas pa
325b6(gso rig): blug/ zhag lnga pa lo sgrud pa ni// bsal te yug rnam phye ma ni// rma la legs par gdab par bya// sna sman mig sman rnon po btang // zhag bcu'i mthar yang ma sos na/ mig mchur brten gnyer bzlog ste bsreg/ rdzi ma'i lhag mtshar bzung gis// phyung la de
326a1(gso rig): yi gnas dag ni// me yi mdog 'dra'i khabartses bsres// phyi rol rlon pa bsregs pa dang / thor bu bcad par gyur pa la// me 'am thal sman rnon pos bsreg/ yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus
326a2(gso rig): pa las// phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u dgu pa'o// // de nas mig zur dang mig gi 'bras bu dkar nag gi nad kyi dmigs brtag pa bshad par bya'o// rlung 'khrugs pas ni chu rgyu ba'i// rtsar song nas ni chu 'dra ba'i// mchi ma
326a3(gso rig): mig mchu maug phugs kyi// mtshams ni mchi ma 'dzag par 'gyur// des ni nad med rtsa dmar la// skrangs 'gyur de ni chu 'dzag yin// bad kan las gyur gcen bag mang // dkar po bad kan 'dzag pa yin// bad kan gyis skrangs
326a4(gso rig): rtse mo rno// lan tshwa'i chu bur 'dra ba 'byung // rtsa ba che zhing g.yo la snum// mdog dkar 'dzam zhing smin bge can// cha zhing smin dka' g.ya' dang bcas// gzer med bcing ba lta bu yin// khrag la mchi ma khrag 'dzag dmar// shas che
326a5(gso rig): dro ba khrag 'dzag yin// mig mchu gra mtshams dkar po ru// 'brum phran za zhing gzer dang bcas// dmar zhing mud+l-i 'dra la gas// khrag 'dzag de ni tshigs can yin// rnag 'dzag d+hi ma khrag dang bcas// mig phug kyi ni gra mtsham
326a6(gso rig): na/ yang dang yang du rnag 'dzag cing // sha pags 'drul bas mchi mar bcas// rnag sla 'dzag pa rla 'phra zhing // skrang zhing g.yos pa che ba dang // mig phugs mtshams sbyangs rnag 'dzag cing // nad bcas rnag gi chu ser 'dzag/ mig
326b1(gso rig): phugs kyi ni mutshams nang nu// sbyangs zug tsha bcas chu ser can// mig zur ram ni mig phugasu// g.ya' zhing rdzi ma'i bu ga nas// rnag 'dzag srin dang rmen bu 'byung // na bcas srin gyi rmen bu can// bcings pa lnga bu srin rmen bu// rnag gi chu ser tshogs
326b2(gso rig): can dang/ mtshon gyis gso bya lhag ma lnga// 'dzag pa chu ser bcas pa spang // mkhris pa dkar po'i thig le ni// rnag pa'am sngo ba 'am ser po bskyed// gur kum me long dri mas gos// ltar snang na dang tsha ba med// 'khru zhing skom dang rims dang bcas// /
326b3(gso rig): nad bzhi nya phyis can zhes bya'o// bad kan las dkar sha lhag dkar// ring nas 'phel ba mig 'dzer dkar// nad med pa la spangs pa dang // mdog dkar lhun cha 'jam pa dang // lci snum chu yi thig pa 'dra// bad kan mdud pa zhes byar bshad// thig le 'bras
326b4(gso rig): phya ltar dkar ba// mtho bo 'bras phye 'dra zhes bshad// dkar po'i ri mo dmar pos khyab// tshwa zhing na dang bcas pa dang // skrang zhing mchi mas gos pa mang // khrag gyur rtsa yi nges par bshad// rtse'i nyes yal bar bor nas ni// dmar ris de nyid
326b5(gso rig): 'phel bar 'gyur// khrag bcas rtswa ni rtse bar byed// de yis mig gis blta mi nus// rtswa yi dra bas g.yogs shing stu ga/ mthe brtsa yaM dra ba yin// khrag gi mig mdzer 'jam zhing mnyam// pad+ma 'dra ba sha lhag yin// nad mang ri bo khrag ltar
326b6(gso rig): dmar thig le ling tog dmar po yin// 'dzom zhing nad med myur du 'phel// dkar po khyab byed dmar nag gi/ khyab pa'i mdzer pa zhes bya'o// dri ma khrag bcas rtsa'i mdzer pa// rtsa rgyus dang 'dra rtsa mdzer yin// khrag skam gong po ltar gnag cing //
327a1(gso rig): sha ni che zhing rgyas pa gang // de ni sha lhag mdzer pa yin// tsha zhing reg na rtsub pa dang // rtsas g.yogs mig 'bras rnag dang nye// 'brum phran yungs kar lta bus rtsa// nya phyis rtswa rtswa rtsa'i nyes pa// 'bras phye mdud pa'i ling tog dmar/
327a2(gso rig): dradrug po sman gyis gso bar bya// lhag ma bdun po mtshon gyis gso// de yang sar pa sman gyis giso// mdzer pa bshad pa lnga po gang // rgyus pa dang ni brtsegs g.yogs pa// nag por phyin zhing pags gas 'dra// mthon pi bcad par bya ba yin
327a3(gso rig): mthong byed steng du phyin pa spang // nag po 'am mthong byed la mkhris pas// pags pa brtol te ling tog ni// zug dmar mchi mar bcas pa bskyed// de yis mig 'bras dkyil 'khor rnag/ 'dzam bu smin pa 'drar snang zhing // dma' bo rma yi li
327a4(gso rig): teg s+ho// de ni gso dka' rim gnyis dag/ brtol po gso ba tsam yi no// der ni zug pa la sogs mang // nag po khab kyis phug snyag byed// rim pa gsum ni brtol ba dang // rma yis khyab par gsor mi rung // bad kan las gyur dung ltar dkar/
327a5(gso rig): shas tshar mig na gso swa dkar// dmar zhing mchi ma sbyin bag 'dzag/ 'brum phran dmar zhing shin tu na// ra yi ril ma 'dra zhing 'bur// khrag skyes ra ril 'dra ba spang // cad khrag bcas pas rtsa'i ling tog/ de yis mig 'bras nag po khebs// na zhing
327a6(gso rig): tshal dmar ba yi// rtsa yis kun tu rgyas 'gyur la// rgyu med mchi ma grang dro dang // bska la 'dzag pa de spang bya// nang gzhi khrag las mthong bcas rnag/ 'bras bu dkar po sgyur byed de// sprin dkar gyis ni g.yogs 'dra zhing // niSh+pa pa ni bkas pa 'dra
327b1(gso rig): shin tu mi bzud na zhing dmar// tsha zhing sbyangs pas gzir ba dag/ smin pas nyen pa'i ling tog ste// mi bzang na ba spang bar bya// gang gis mtshan ma nyams pa 'am// nang sngo ba 'am dmar bcas pas// shin tu 'bur ba 'am gtong ring ba 'am// mtsho
327b2(gso rig): mar bcas shing rtsa rmas khyab// rnying pa 'am mtho dman can dag gam// dbus 'chad ling teg spang bar bya// nag po'i nad ni gsor rung dang // mi rung dbye bas rnam lnga yin// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu pa'o//
327b3(gso rig): de nas mig zur dang mig gis 'bras bu dkar po dang nag po'i nang gso ba bshad par bya'o// mig nad bcings pa sman pa yis// dugs byas rtse mo 'bras 'dras dbug/ rtse mo dkyil 'khor 'du bas bzhir// de 'og rgya mtsha pi pi ling // sbrang rtsi sbyar
327b4(gso rig): bas bsku bar bya// de nas snga ma bzhin du bcing // pa to la'i lo skyu ru ra// bskol ba'i smon khu thigs pas blug/ tshigs can lcags kyu'i cho byad kyis// phyi yi mtshams kyi cha gsum bzung // 'phen btsags kyis ni phyed bcad bya// gzhan du mtsho ma rgyu la
327b5(gso rig): gnod/ sbrang rtsi rgyam tshas bskus nas ni// mig mdzer lta bur gso bar bya// chu ser rnag 'jog gtAr ga gAdab// de nas de ni bcing bar bya// mi mnags cho gar bshad pa yi// las kun cho ga ji bzhin bya// rgyam tsha sgo gsher nog tshur dang // lcags dang
327b6(gso rig): zangs ni zho ba btags pa'i// phye ma'i mig sman btang ba 'am// sbrang rtsi'i bcas pa'i khu ba blug/ srin bu'i rmen bu lci ba yis// dugs byas brtol te phyi bar bya// nag tshur rgyan cha 'bras bu gsum// sbrang rtsi sbyar bas bsku bar bya// nya phyis mkhris
328a1(gso rig): mchi 'dzag ltar gso// bad kan 'dus pa 'bras phye gnyis// gtar ga ma gtogs bad kan gyi// mchi ma 'dzag pa bzhin du gso// tsha ba gsum dang kat+pa la// ba lung khu ba'i mig sman btang // rgyam tshadzA
328a2(gso rig): tri kha 'bus pa// thang shing bca' sga btags pa'i phye// chang gi dngas mas ril bur byas// mig sman skrangs dang g.ya' ba sel// rtsa mnyes rtsa rtse ling tog dmar// rtsa dra khrag 'dzag lta bur gso// rtswa ya nyes la khyad par du// mar dang sbrang rtsi'i
328a3(gso rig): mig sman bsku// rtsa brtse ba dang sbrang rtsi dang // skyer po khaN+Da zhib par bsku// ling tog dmar po zhi kha chu// sbrang rtsi kha ra'i thigs pa blugs// shel dang gur gum shing mngar dung // sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i mig sman btang // yang na sbrang rtsi dung sbyar ba 'i//
328a4(gso rig): kha ra rgya mtsho'i lbu pa phran// mdzes pa bshad po rnam lnga las// dud pa lta bu'i rnyog can dang // gang yang dmar zhing zho 'dra ba// de sman ling tog bzhin du bya// cig shos gan rgyal bzhag drugs byas// khA lung dang ni rgyam che drug/ skyer ba'i
328a5(gso rig): mig sman bskus nas ni// mig btsums nas ni mnye bar bya// de ltar mog nAM 'khrugs bcas pas// sha lhag skyes pa bskyed nas ni// mgo bo mi 'gyur dom du bzung // mig mnu mchog tu mi 'grol bya// mig zur du ni blta bzhin du// mig
328a6(gso rig): phugs mtshames nas mdzer pa mthe// gang du gnyer ma 'dus gyur pa// der ni lcags kyus dam bzung ba'am// haM cang mi tshe mu tsi tra 'am// khab bam skud pas blangs nas ni// kun nas dkyil 'khor 'dra bas dral// de nas bton te dral nas kyang //
328b1(gso rig): mig phugs mtshamasu bsnyen nas ni// cha bzhi lus par bcad bya ste// mig phugs rtsa dang mchi ma ni// 'dzag pa'i rtsa la mi gnod bsrung // mig phugs zur bcang mchi ma 'dzag/ mig gi rtsa sbubs rma can 'gyur// mig 'gram mdzer pa me
328b2(gso rig): skyes la// mig phugs zur du bltas te bya// legs par btsod de tsha ba gsum// rgya ma tshwa sbrang rtsir bcas pa bsku// zhun mar dron po blug pa dang // sbrang rtsi mar sbyar bskus te bcing // de nas zhag gsum la sogs nas// bkrol nas
328b3(gso rig): ka rany+dza'i sa bon// 'o ma bskol ba de bzhin blug/ ser po rnam gnyis po to la// shing mngar dang ni rgya skyegs shing // ka ra Na yi me tog ni// kha 'bus sbrang rtsir bcas pa blog/ zhag bdun nas ni de dgrol bya// legs par bcad na nad med 'gyur//
328b4(gso rig): bcad drags mchong las nad 'gyur// sman khu drugs dang mig sman sogs// phyi ba dang ni rtas pas gso// kha ra ldong ras i li ya// rgyam tsha bca' sga zho re dang // skyur pa khaN+Da srang phyed dang // sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i mig sman gyis// bad kan las
328b5(gso rig): gyur rab rib dang // chu ser gyis gang ling tig dang // mig mdzer bcing bcad pa'i lhag ma sel// 'bras bu gsum ni gang rung ba'i// shun pa chus btags lde gur bcas// kham phor sbyor ba'i nang du bsreg/ de nas tshig nas phye mar btags//
328b6(gso rig): sman ni lhag ma'i khu ba yis// so so legs par bgos nas ni// gnag tsha der bskams slar yang btags// rgyam tsha nyis 'gyur bcas pa yi// mig sman gsum po de dag ni// phye ba'i mchog tu mu khyud 'chang // rtsa yi dris g.yogs rtsa
329a1(gso rig): gang zhig/ sa pas phye ba'i spyan dag gis// ma zhi 'brum phun da la ni// mig mdzes cho ga bzhin du gas// ling tog nang gzhi'i dbang las ni// snum rtsub 'bras bu gsum sbyin zhing // tik+Sh+Na chen po'i sman mar
329a2(gso rig): sbyin/ gtAr ga bkra sman khu ba yi// thigs pa blugs pa la sogs bya// snang ba'i long tog ngur bying chu// lan gsum bskol ba'i mar blung bya// de 'og gtar ga 'am pad+ma yi// mig las khrag ni dbyung bar bya// ut+pal rgun 'brum ram
329a3(gso rig): nyo ba// shing mngar bi da ri bskol ba// kha ra ra yi 'o ma 'am// chu bskol thigs pa blugs par bya// mig dmar mchi ma nang zhi nas// de rjes phyo ba'i mig sman phan// dzA ti kha 'bus rgya skyegs dang // yug snam tsa na ril bur byas// khrag dang
329a4(gso rig): mkhris pa dang byed cing // snang ba las gyur ling tog sel// phag dang rnga mo glang po che// ba lang ra rta bong bu'i so// rgya mtsho'i lbu ba me tog dang // na la sham ni bzhi char sbyar// so yi rol bu snang pa yi// ling dog gis khyab sol bar byed// dA mI
329a5(gso rig): lo ma pa lang so// rgya mtsho'i lbu ba bong bu'i rus// zangs ma drung gcin ril bur byas// ling dog thams cad sel bar byed// rin chen so dang ra dang ni// khams dang sug spel tsha ba gsum// sgeg s+yA ka ran+ta'i sa bon// rma la phan pa'i smon rnams
329a6(gso rig): nirma bcas rma mad gting zug dang // pags gnas ling tog 'joms sman yon// sna sman snum blung sha khu ni// blud pas dma' ba bstod par bya// nad med ling tog dma' ba ni// phur ma bcos dang rtas pas bstod// ling tog dkar ba
329b1(gso rig): skyer ba dang // shing mngar thal tres seng phrom chu// brug pa'am seng phrom gtums pa ni// chu dron la spungs thigs pa blug/ shing mngar 'bri hA ti'i rtsu ba// rgyam tsha dong gru zangs ma ni// skyu ru'i 'bras bu chu dang btags// lde gu zangs ma'i snod
329b2(gso rig): lo bskus// nas mar skyu ru ra'i 'o ma// dud pas de 'og mang du bdugs// de las ril bur byas bye bA ni// dA ni chu dang sbrang rtsir btags// mthon kA chen po zhes bya ste// ling tog dkar po sel mchog yin// ling tog brtan zhing mthug pa la// khrig
329b3(gso rig): ni lan med dbyung bar bya// mgo dang lus kyi bkru sman dang / phrir me btsos pa'ang lan mang btang // pi pi ling drang na l-i sham// rgyam tsha shing sha'i 'bras bu 'amo// 'bras bu gsum bskol rgyam tsha bcas// blung pas gnas las bskyod par bya// dung
329b4(gso rig): dang rgya shug ka ta ka/ rgu nr-i 'brum shing mngar sbrang rtsi dang // mu ra so yi dri ma ni// shri sha yi ni me tog bcas// tshigs bcad phyed kyis bshad pa 'di// mig sman sbyor ba btang bar bya// sU ru ra ba ni dza khu// lam kU li yi thal ba ni// nub go cig
329b5(gso rig): spangs te bskams sa'i phyi// ling tog bskyod pa'i mig sman yin// mung+ga sbun pa med btags pa// dung dang sbrang rtsir bcas pA'ang phan// sbrang rtsi ma du k+Sha'i snying po// bA ru ra'i rlung sbrang rtsir bcas// bA ljang rta bong rnga mo'i so// dung dang rgya mtsho'i
329b6(gso rig): lbu ba dang // ardzu na'i na chus ril bur byas// bskyod pa'i ling tog 'jig par byed// bstod pa 'am zug rngur bcas pa yi// ling tog spu la sogs po phyi// rtsa yi ling tog mthong gnod med// snad pa'i ling tog lta bur gso// shing mngar
330a1(gso rig): stug nor ram nye ba// hrI hA trI dang a kA R+Sha// sbyar ba'i mig spyan ri'i 'o ma// btags pa'i lde gu nas dang mar// bcas pa'i drung pas bdug par bya// skyu ru na yi lo ma dang // ril bur byas pa'i mig spyan mchog ma spros ram/
330a2(gso rig): ri ma 'dra// mdzer pa lta bur mtshon gyis gso// ra'i ri la gsor ni mi ring dang // ling tig de 'dra de bzhin gzhan// nad ma zhin snum blung cing // gta reg gang ba ba la sogs bya// smad byas de ni bsal byos shing // dkun zhing mtho ba gse bar bya/
330a3(gso rig): rgya skar gro bye lung thung dang // ta la smyig ma ka ri ra// bsres pa'i thal chu btsags pa dang // rnga mo'i rus pa'i phye ma bsre// mig sman ling tog gso dka' dang // mdog mi sdug pa 'joms par byed// gso sla la yang 'di nyid ni// bstan pas sel bar
330a4(gso rig): nus pa yin// ra yi rol ma ngos gnyis nas// khab kyis phug ste chu gzigs nas// mthe bos mnyam du btsir nas ni// rma yi nang ni sha phye dang // tshil ni rlon pas bkang nas ni// dkri zhing dkri zhing dgang bar bya// zhag bdun nas ni rma 'byor nas// mig
330a5(gso rig): 'bras nag po mnyam brtan la// mig sman snum can btang bya zhing // mAr dang 'o ma'i sna sman blug/ de lta ni yang rgyas 'gyur na// dbug dang bcad sogs bye ba dag/ bcad drags pa yis mig nang du// zhugs par mi 'gyur ci rigs bya// ling
330a6(gso rig): tog la ni rtag par rang gi sman// bskol ba'i mar blung sna sman bsten pa dang // ci nis mthong ba nyams par mi 'gyur bar// mig sman rnon po rtag tu bston par bya// yan lag brkyang ba'i snying po bsdus pa las// phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u ste bcu
330b1(gso rig): gcig pa'o// // de nas mthong bar byed pa'i mig nad kyi nad dmigs shes par bya ba bshang bar bya'o// nad ni rtswa yi nang zhugs pa// rim pa dang po gnas nas ni// gzugs ni mi gsal mthong 'gyur cing // rgyu med par yang
330b2(gso rig): gsal bar mthong // rim pa gnyis par phyin pa na// med pa dag kyang mthong 'gyur zhing // yod cing nye ba bsgribs nos mthong // ring na phra ba mthong mi 'gyur// nye dang ring bar gnas pa'i gzugs// phyin ci log tu shes par 'gyur// nad kyis zlum
330b3(gso rig): po'i dbyibs 'dra bar// zlum po nyid du mthong bar 'gyur// mthong byed dbugs gnas gcig gnyis mthong // mang du gnas na du ma mthong // mthong byed nang du zhugs pa ni// che chu go ni bzlog par mthong // 'og tu gnas pas nyi mi mthong // steng du gnA
330b4(gso rig): pabapas ring ba min// ngos la gnas pas g.yas g.yon min// nad ni rab rib ces byar bshad// nad ni rim pa gsum par brten// sngon po nyid du 'gyur ba yin// de yis steng mthong 'og mi mthong // gos srab kyis g.yogs ltar mthong zhing // kha
330b5(gso rig): dog ji bzhin 'gyur ba dang // rim gyis mthong ba nyams par 'gyur// de ltar na yong yal bar dor// rim pa bzhi par phyin nas ni// mthong byed mi chen mo nyams byed cing // mig gi rgyal mo khebs par byed// de la rlung 'gyur rab rib ni// long long por
330b6(gso rig): ni mthong ba dang // g.yo zhing rnyog can rtsa dmar snang // tshad dga' gsal bar mthong ba dang // dra ba sgra shed sbrang bu dang // 'od mthong de ni yal bar bor// sngon por gyur la mig dmar la// bzhin la sna ni med par mthong // zla ba med sogs du mar
331a1(gso rig): mthong / yon po 'ang drang por mthong bar 'gyur// sngon po 'phel na mthong byed ni// rdul gyis khebs pa lta bur mthong // gsal zhing dmar ba 'am rgya che ba 'am// phra ba 'am mthong ba nyams par 'gyur// de ni mthong pa nyams pa yin/
331a2(gso rig): rlung gis mig gi rtsa 'khums 'gyur// mthong byed gting du zhugs pa dag/ 'di ni gting ring zhes byar bshad// mkhris 'gyur rab rib glog dang ni// srin bu me khyer me skon 'od // rma bya sreg pa'i sgo dang 'dra// phal cher dngos por mthong bar 'gyur/ mthong byed mig
331a3(gso rig): ni kha n+da g.ya' 'dra// de lta bu ni mthong ba dang // nyi zla khyim dang me dang ni// smin rgyu 'ja' mtshon mo thong bar 'gyur// bang ba ltar ste mthong ba meng // 'bras bu snom pa mthong nyams yin// mkhros pas mig ni rlung zhes bshang// chung mthong ngo dung ngu yin//
331a4(gso rig): ser zhing dngos po ser por mthong // mkhris pas rig par gyur zhes bya// bing kon rab rib phal tshar ni// snu ma~M dkar ba mthong ba dang // dus dang zla ba kaiT+Ta ba dang // kun+da'i me tog lnga bus khyab// sngon po 'od ming nyi zla dang sa sbyor mas khyab pa lta bur mthong //
331a5(gso rig): mig 'dras dkar por snang bar 'gyur// bang kan mthong nyams ngas sngon khyab// snum zhing mthong ba nyams 'gyur la// mu yi thig pa pad+ma yi// 'dab ma'i sdong na gnas lter g.yo// dro na zhum par 'gyur ba dang // grang bas yongasu khyab par byed// zla ba me tog
331a6(gso rig): kun+da dung // shel ltar snang zhing dkar ba yin// khrag gis rab rib dmar ba dang // spen par gyur pa mthong ba yin// sngon po dmar ba gnag par ni// mig gis de ltar mthong ba yin// mtshan ma nyams pa'ang de 'drar mthong // 'od med mthong ba nyams pa
331b1(gso rig): yin/ ldan pa'am ni 'dus pa yi// rab rib la sogs mtshan ma ni// 'dren ma yin par shes par bya// blo bur du nI rab rib dag/ gsal dang mi gsal 'khrugs par byed// lhag ma dag gi mthong byed ni// dmar zhing sna tshogs dag tu snang // gang
331b2(gso rig): gis mthong byed nad kyis khyab// sre mo'i mig 'bras snang bar 'gyur// de ni nyin mthong mtshan mo mi nau// ne'u le long ba zhes de bshad// nyi ma nub par gyur pa na// 'od mi snang tshe ring 'gyur zhing // mthong byed nyams par byed pa ni// nad kyis long ba
331b3(gso rig): gnyis pa yon// nyi ma'i zer gyis phog pa na// mthong ba'i lam nas dri ma ni// zhu zhing med par gyur nas ni// nyin mo gsal bar mthong bar byed// tsha bas gdungs te mong la ni// chu grang nang du zhugs gyur na// nad gzhi gsum dang khrag 'khrugs
331b4(gso rig): te/ d+mod ni gyen 'gro de nas mig/ tsha zhing na kar dri ma can// nyin mo long long por mthong zhing // mtshan mo long bar gyur pa dag/ de ni dro bas tshig ces bya// shas cher skye zos nad dang ni// khrag dang bcas pas mig khyab gyur// 'dul zhing g.yo la dri ma can
331b5(gso rig): de ni sbyar gyis tshig ces bya// mya ngan rims dang 'go nad kyis// rlung sogs gdungs par gyur pa la// rlung sogs 'khrugs shing dud 'thul mthong // de ni dung pa can zhes bya// snying stobs chung bas glo bur du// ngo mtshar can gyi gzugs mthong ba

332a1(gso rig): byung ba'i// mtshan ma nyams pa zhes byar bshad// 'di las bad kan ma gtogs mtshan// nyams dang thung ngu gting zhen yang // mig sngon drug dang ne'u lce'i// long ba 'tsho tsam lhag ma ni// bcu gnyis po ni gso bar bya//
332a2(gso rig): lhur mig nad nyi shu ni// rtsa bdun dag tu bstan pa yin// yan+da lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas rab rib gso ba bshad par bya'o// rab rab sngon po nyid 'gyur zhing // ston
332a3(gso rig): bo ma bcos long bar 'gyur// de bas mig nang la rab rib// mi bzang myur du gso bar bya// 'tsho byed srang brgya chu ba ni// bcu drug nang bskol bzhi cha lus// khu ba 'o ma bre do dang // mar mi bre gang lhan tsog pa tse// stag tsher ba dang ram nye ba// seng phreM
332a4(gso rig): rgyam tsha pi pi ling // shu tr-i shing mngar rgun 'brum dang // thang shing khA ra 'bras bu gsum// zho ni gnyis gnyis btab bskol tI// mtshan 'thungs rab rab sel mchog yin// rgun 'brum bcod dang tsan dan dkar// ram nye ba gnyis dzi ba ka/ kha

332a6(gso rig): bu gsum dang ba sha ka khyi tsher ba dang kyi lce bo// pan+de ta ni srang re yin// skyu ru ra ni bre gang dang // chu bre bcu drug nang du bskol// bre bzhi lus par gla sgang dang // rtsa mkhris shing mngar dug me nyung // ba lu ka dang tsan dan dang // pi pi ling srang phyed phyed

332b3(gso rig): rab rib thams cad 'joms// shing mngar ram mnye ba gnyis dang // kaN+Da kA ri pi paM ling // a ru Da dang ut+pa la// kha ra rgun 'brum srang rer bcas// ra yi 'o ma mar bre re// 'bras bu gsum dang ba sha ka/ bring+ga ra dza'i khu bar bskol//

333a1(gso rig): zos pa 'am nang par nI// rgun 'bum kha ra sbrang rtsi dang // a ru ru ni so sor bza'// rtag tu rab rib can gyis bsten// leg bu mig cha drug cu bzhi// zangs dang dngul dang gser gyi cha// re re gcig tu sbyar ba ni/
333a2(gso rig): skoslong bu kha sbyar nang du gzhug/ 'dres par gyur gyi bar du bung // de nas nga yi ro drag gi/ tshogs kyi khu ba lan bdun dang // so sor de la blug par bya// mu tig dung dang bai DUr+ya// tsha ba gsum dang de nas bsre// phye ma'i mig sman de btang na// rab rib thod
333a3(gso rig): sel byed yon// rgun 'brum pad+ma'i rtsa ba yi// khu ba 'o ma chang dang zhag/ char po de bzhin lig pu mig/ bskol zhing bsku ba byas nas ni// phye ma de ni dung dang gzhug/ mthing ba gsal byed mig sman yin// mig nad thams cad la bsngags zhes/
333a4(gso rig): lus 'phags rgyal pos bshad pa yin// spangs ma srang gnyis rgya shug gi/ sol bar bsregs la ra yi ni// 'o ma mar dang sbrang rtsi yi// nang du lan ni bdun bdun bcug/ da pya dang ni na la sham// lig pu mig dang pu tse shal// spang spos rgyam
333a5(gso rig): cha a ru ra// seng phro ma ldong ros pi pi ling // sug smel rgya mtsho'i lbu ba dang // stang zil zhi ni gnyis gnyis dang // shing mngar srang gcig bcas pa na// skong bu kha sbar nang bsregs btags// mig sngon mtshan mo long par bcas// dmar

333b1(gso rig): dang pi paM ling // sdang zil shing mngar dung dang bcas// tha star zla ba'i tshe na ni// phye ma mig gnyis la bskus la// mig mdzer rab rib dmar ris dang // g.ya' dang mig sngon sogs zhi byed// na la sham dang rgyam cha ni// ma ra pi pi ling dang ni// rgya

334a1(gso rig): mig 'bras ni// brdol yang mig ni srung bar byed// sbrul nag shing ba' ro dang ni// sdig pa shrI ba'i ro bzhi ni// 'o ma'i bum par zhag nyi shu// rtsa gcig bcug ste bsrul la srub// de las mar sngar gang byung bas//

334b2(gso rig): ma bzhi 'gyur 'bras bu gsum// lde gu bsgrol ba blud par bya// de 'og 'bras bu gsumu dang ni// rtsa ba lnga'i khu 'o ma dang // e raN+Da yi til mar bcas// bkru sman nye bar btang bar bya// dzI ba ma ti yi ya la gar bcas// srang brgyang chu bre bcu

335a1(gso rig): ltar byas kyang ma zh-inA/ de 'og rtus pani cho ga spyad// shu ti ru rta spang spos dang // shing mngar ram nye ba gnyis dang // stag tsher ba dang sa ra la// Ti pi ling dang thang shing ni// mar gyi brgyad 'gyur 'o ma

336a2(gso rig): g+his gang ba dang // lig bu mig dang bcas pa ni// 'bab chu'i nang du zla gcig glum// zhag ni nyi shu'i bAr du bzhag/ de nas phyung ste bskams nas ni// lug ru yi ni me tog dang // shing mngar bcas pa'i phye mar bcas//

336b1(gso rig): rgya mtsho'i lbu ba ra'i 'o ma// ril bu byas pa'i mig sman gyis// mtshan mo long ba'i mig nad sel// mcher ba'i nang du bi pi ling // bcug ste ma chos par bcos la// de bskams sbrang rtsi btags pa ni// mtshan mo mthong mig

336b4(gso rig): bo mo mar// bskal ba yis ni mig sman nam/ bal bu'i lo mA yug snam bskol// phye ma btab pa'i mig sman phan// me da seng phrom a na ma ta/ skyer ba bcod dang shing mngar ni// mar gyi brgyad 'gyur 'o ma bskol// til
336b5(gso rig): mar bskol ba'i sna sman dA/ 'o ma mar sar gyis rta bya// des ma zhi na gtar ga gdab// sems la nad dang mya ngan 'jigs// zas rtsub tsog tsog por 'dug dang // skyug sman bkru sman sna sman dang // sman thigs blug sogs nyes pa
336b6(gso rig): dang // kha zas phyed zhu smon pa dang // bkres skom la sogs mnag pa dang // mig nad ma bcos yun rings la// rab rib nad ldan blta bar bya// de la nad go zhi sogs brtags te/ rang gi sman ni ji bzhin sbyar// nyi ma
337a1(gso rig): gzas zin me 'od glog la sogs// bltas pas mig ni nyams par gyur pa dag/ de la bsil sman sogs kyi rta bya zhing // de bzhin gser padar mar gyis mig smin btang // me yis ji srid 'tsho
337a2(gso rig): yi bar du ni// rtag tu mig bsrung ba la 'bad par bya// nyin dang mtshan mo 'dra bar gyur pa yi// mi la nor yod gyur kyang don med yin// 'bras bu gsum bsten gtAr ga sbyang bya dang // sems dga' mig sman sna sman bcas
337a3(gso rig): bsten na// byA sho za zhing rkang pa'i rim gro dang // zhun mar btung bas rtag tu mig bsrung bya// kha zas mi 'phrod za ba rtag tu spang // rab 'phra 'tsher dang g.yo ba mi blta zhes// skyes bu'i mig ni mchog tu bsrung ba'i thabs// drang
337a4(gso rig): srong chen po mu khyud 'dzin gyis bshad// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas mthong ba nyams pa gso ba bshad par bya'o// pad kan las gyur dkris
337a5(gso rig): g.yogs pa// sbal lcong la sogs bla gnya ni// drug po med par gyur pa dang // legs min mthong ba med pa dbye// de min ma gyur mi snyoms la// zho kha chu 'dra srub pa ni// thur ma yis ni drangs gyur klong // slar yang gyen du 'byung bar
337a6(gso rig): 'gyur// nad ni mi zad skyed byed cing // mthang byed slar yang 'gebs par byed// de ni bzas bcas bla gnyen btsos// bad kan can gyis myur du bskyed// bad kan gyis ni mthong nyams pa// bad kan dkar bas dkar ba yin// de ni nang
337b1(gso rig): gzhan zil gyis gnon// kun tu sngo ba nang du 'gyur// de la rlung 'gyur mig g.yo zhing // rba klong g.yo zhing dmar skyar 'dug/ gseg ma arga'i lo ma ni// thigs phran khyab 'dra mthug pa yin// gra ma lta bu'i mig 'bras ni//
337b2(gso rig): 'bras kyi gra ma 'bras khyab yin// gra ma bcad pa gra ma tshig/ bcad pa lta bur snang ba yin// rma sgro rma bya'i mjug sgro 'dra// khar ba'i mdog tu snang ba yin// gdugs 'dra kha dog sna tshogs pa// spris g.yogs gdugs
337b3(gso rig): zhes bya'o// btar ka mi bya cham pa dang // lud pa can ni dbye mi bya// ma zhu sngar ma skyug pa dang // rna mig mgo gzer can mi dbye// de nas thun mong dusu ni// sbyang byas zas zos pa la ni// sa phyogs gsel bar snga dro na// swa
337b4(gso rig): mnyam khyi la 'dug/ nad pa 'dug cing bsdam byas la// kho yi dbugs kyis gdugs bya zhing // mthe bos mig ni mnyes byas nas// nad ni g.yos par mthong ba dang // mi 'gul bar ni mgo nas bzung // rang gi sna la lha
337b5(gso rig): nag po'i sor phyed ma gtogs shing // mig 'bras bzhi cha bor ba ru// 'dzub mo gung mo mtheb mo yis// mig thur dam du bzung nas ni// rang grub bu ga nas 'phreng du// gzugs shing gyen mnye drang por byas// mig giyor la
337b6(gso rig): g.yas pas dbugs// legs par phug na sgra 'byung 'gyur// nad med chu ni nyung zhig 'byung // de rjes nad pa spro srings la// mig tu nu zho blugs par bya// de nas thur ma'i rtse mo yis// gnod pa med par dal gyis ni// mig gi
338a1(gso rig): bu dbyi byas la// sna nas dal bus dbul bar bya// mig na gnas pa'i bad kan ni// sna nas rngug pas bsal bar bya// nad ni 'bul ba 'am myur ba yi// mig gi phyi rol na 'dugs bya// de sa gzugs ni
338a2(gso rig): 'gyur nas// thur ma rim gyis dbyung bar bya// mar la spangs pa'i ras bal bzhug/ mig dkris nas ni de 'og tu// phye la logs shig cig shos dbapa// gnyis ka phye la gan rgyal bzhag/ rlung med ma yo du po dang // rkang bsku yan
338a3(gso rig): ba'i zas bsten bya// sbrid pa lud pa skyigs bu dang // mchil ma 'dor dang chu 'thung dang // thur du gtong ba khrus byed dang // so shing 'cha' bar byed pa dag/ zhag bdun bar du spang bya zhing // snum 'thungs chog bzhin du bsdams// rba/
338a4(gso rig): dron gyis ni nyer spyod bya// ci nus sbyang byas nA 'gyur na// mar khu dro 'jam blugs par bya// nas tshan sla ba 'am thug pa skra// cha gsum skyu ru ra mar sbyin// zhag gsum nas ni de grol la// rlung 'joms pa yi snyan gyis ni// khu ba
338a5(gso rig): mig tu blugs par bya// zhag bdun nas ni mig de ni// rnam pa kun tu bkrol bar bya// ji srid mig gsal brtan 'gyur ba// bsdams pa 'bod de gnas par bya// gzugs ni phra dang 'tsher ba dag/ mod la blta ba mi bya'o// 'jug
338a6(gso rig): nyes mi mthun zos pa las// skrangs dang na dang dmar la sogs// mig na gdung ba 'byung bar 'gyur// nad tshul ji bzhin de gso bya// nad dang dmar ba zhi bya'i phyir// durba nas dang yu ga snam dang // thal tres ma ra dang ldan pa yi// lde
338b1(gso rig): gus gdong ni bsku bar bya// de bzhin til dang yungs kar dang // ba lung khu bas smras pa'ang phan// thal tres lo ma pa ya s+ya// bcod dang shing mngar ra yi ni// 'o mas sbyar ba'i lde'u ni// dro 'jam bde bar byed mchog yin// seng phrom rgyam
338b2(gso rig): tshe rgun 'brum dang // shing mngar ra yi 'o mar bskol// thigs pa mig tu blugs nas ni// na dang dmar ba 'joms par byed// shing mngar ru rta ut+pa la// rgun 'brum rgya skyegs kha rar bcas// rlung 'joms sman bskol 'o ma ni// mar gyi
338b3(gso rig): bzhi 'gyur bskol ba dang // shugs pa la sogs lde gu btab// las kun la ni bsngags pa yin// des a zhin snum 'chos dang // dugs bya gtAr gaM gdab par bya// brdung ba'i gso ba dag kyang bya// dbug grub mig smin 'jam
338b4(gso rig): po bsku// tu ba ra'i rtsa na le sham// bab la skyer ba khaN+Da bsku// mig phye bu ram ri lu ni// cher ba'i chu dang bdar ba dang // dzA ti da ba shri sha dang // ka ta sring gi me tog/ mu tig 'bras bu bai DUr+ya// ra yi 'o mar btags pa ni// zangs ma'i
338b5(gso rig): snod la sla bar bsku// zhag bdun nas bkog slar yang ni// 'o ma dang btags lde gur byas// ril bu grib ma la bskams pa// mig bskus phye ma mthong ba ni// gsal zhing stobs ni skyed par byed// byu ru ldong ros lig bu mig/ rgya mtsho'i
338b6(gso rig): lbu ba na le sham// sna nas btang ba'i sman sbyar na// bshad pa'i yon tan mtshungs par bstan// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas mig nad thams cad
339a1(gso rig): kyi dmigs brtag pa bshad par bya'o// rlung gis mig nad mchi ma 'dzag/ sna rgyas cung zad skrangs pa dang // mu 'gram dpral mig smin ma kha// na zhing zug la 'phar ba dang // rdu ma skam zhing mchi ma grang //
339a2(gso rig): swa nyung na ba ldang dub can// 'byed dang 'dzum pa dka' ba dang // srin bu 'gro ba snyam du sems// mig nI bus pa lta bur snang // zug rngu 'phra mo khyab snyam byed// snum dang dro bas nyer zhir 'gyur// mchi ma 'dzag pa zhes bya'o// de ma bcos nA
339a3(gso rig): gdung bar 'gyur// rna ba sgra 'byung mgo 'khor dang // dpral ba mig dang smin ma sogs// rtsub shing gis ni rtsub snyem byed// de yang bag med yal bar khor// gdung bas bcom gyur nad de yis// sna tshogs tshul ni 'byung 'gyur zhing //
339a4(gso rig): mig mthong nyams byed rma 'byung 'gyur// mu 'gram kha dang 'jing bA las// rlung ni gzhan du 'jug 'gyur zhing // mi bzod na la gnag pa dang // dmar zhing sbyangs la mIg mi sdug/ snum zhing kun nas mchi ma 'dzag/ de ni rlung gis
339a5(gso rig): gzhan gyur yin// de bzhin mig ni yon po dang // chung pa rlung gi phyin ci log/ mkhris pa'i mchi 'jug mtshan ma ni// tsha skrangs du ba 'byung snyam sems// mig mchu'i phyi rol gnag pa dang // nang na rnag 'drul mchi ma che// ser zhing
339a6(gso rig): mig sman ser por mthong // rma la lan tshwa btab snyam sems// mau mdag gtor ma 'dra ba dang // mdzer pa'i gong bu lta bur snang // mig nad gdung bar gyur pa yin// bang kan las gyur mchi 'dzag ni// tshor ba med skrangs rab tu
339b1(gso rig): g.ya'// gsher zhing snum la shas cher dkar// mig tu sbyin bag 'dzag pa yin// gdung ba des ni nag po dma'// 'bras bu dkar po mthong ba dang // cham pas 'debs shing sna rgyas la// mig ni rdul gyis gang snyam sems// khrag
339b2(gso rig): 'gyur dmar ris mig sngo dmar// mig 'bras dkar po dmar ba dang // khrag 'dzag dmar po mthong ba dang // mkhris pa'i mchi 'dzag mtshan nyid yin// gdung bas mig ni mtha' dmar zhing // gyur pa dang ni mtshungs par na/ me

339b6(gso rig): 'byung bar 'gyur// mchi ma grang zhing dro ba dang // sbyin bgo ska sla res kyis 'byung // skrangs chung cung zad skyengs zhes bya// de bzhin mtshan nyid gzhan gyis smin// mig smin pas nyen snang ba yi// rtsom che mchi ma rnyog can 'dzag/
340a1(gso rig): bang kun gyis bskos mig 'bras ni// dkar po dmar zhing 'dul ba dang // tsha zhing mthong ba nyams pa dang // nad ni ma la na mi gnas min// khrag mkhris shas che'i nad kyi ni// zas kyi dngas ma skyur po'i 'gyur//
340a2(gso rig): mig gi rtsar ni song nas ni// mig ni dmar por byed par 'gyur// skrangs tshe smin zhing mchi ma 'dzag/ shin tu long long por mthong ba// sbyar gyis bskyed pa'i nad ces bya// de ltar kun rtog nad bcu drug/ de la gdung bas bcom pa ni//

340b1(gso rig): pa shing mngar ram nye ba// bad kan las gyur bri yang ku// ldong ros sbrang rtsi sbyar bas bsku// 'dus pa las gyur kun gyis bsku// na le sham ni dkar po cha gcig dang // ldong ros cha bzhi seng phrom cha bcu drug/ zhib tu btags

340b3(gso rig): pab myur du zhi bar byed// shu ti shing mngar spangs a a ru ra// zhib btags ris kyi thum po lhod par bcings// zangs kyi snod du skyur rtsa bas nang du bcug/ mig tu bzhag na mig nad sna tshogs sil// skyer ba srang gcig chu bre phyed

342a1(gso rig): dur byid mar bcas bkru sman+da btang // seng brom dkar po mar la brngos// phye mar byas te ras la gtums// chu dron la mnyes thigs pa blug/ gzer 'joms pa yi mchog yin no// skyer zla pra

343a3(gso rig): spos a ru ra'i khu bar// dngul rdo btags pas mig tshag sel// thang shing snum dang bcas pa ni// ra gcin nang du spangs pa'ang phan// rgya ma chi 'bras gsum po pi ling // dung gi snying po bu tse shel// zangs ma'i phye mar bcaso ril bu//
343a4(gso rig): mig tshag ling tog sel bar byed// yang na nag tshur phye ma ni// bye'u rug pa'i khu bar sngangs// zangs ma'i snod du zhag bcu bzhag/ de yi mig chag chu ser 'dzag/ rdzi ma 'bri ba sel bar byed// ldong ros dang ni skyer pa khaN+Da dang // de mnyam zangs
343a5(gso rig): ma'i phye ma zhib tu btags// phye ma mig sman thur ma gcig gis kyang // rdzi ma bskyed cing mig chag 'di yis sel// rgya skyegs pri yang skyer ba nir kun+ni// khu ba ras kyi dum bu lan bdun spangs// sdong bu'i ma ra mo de bus las byung ba'i//
343a6(gso rig): gnag tshe mig tshil sel bar byed mchog yin// mig mchu mang du zhal zhal bya// de bzhin gtar ga bya ba dang // bkru sman yang yang bya ba ni// mig chag can gyis nad pas bsten// rnag gi chu 'dzag ma zhi'i mthar// thur ma phra
343b1(gso rig): mos bsreg par bya// de ltar mig nas dgu bcu bzhi// nad bzhi mtshan nyid gso ba dag/ phan tshun 'dres pa med par ni// ma lus par ni bshad pa yin// skyes bu nad med pa yis kyang // nad dang gro rnying drug cu pa// sa lu khre
343b2(gso rig): rgod rnying pa dang // mung+ga la sogs bad mkhris 'joms// zhun mar mang du btab pa dang // tshod ma de 'dra skam sa yi// sha dang se 'bru khA ra dkar// bsten zhing char chu btung ba dang // gdugs bcang lham ni bgo ba dang // cho
343b3(gso rig): ga bzhin du nang sbyangs pa// rnam pa kun tu bsten par bya// shugs bkag pa dang ma zhur za// phyed zhu zas dang rtug 'gags za// tsha dang phyi sa 'gags byed pa'i// zas dang spyod lam sman kun spang // rkang pa gnyis kyi dbus
343b4(gso rig): na rtsa sbom pa// gnyis gnas de yis mig ni nang du khyab// de bskus byug dang dril ba la sogs pa// rkang par byas nas mig tu 'gro bor 'gyur// dri mo tshwa dang snad pa la sogs pa// de snod gyur na mig la gnod par 'gyur//
343b5(gso rig): de bas mig la phan 'dod lham dang ni// de bskus dril dang byug la sogs bsten bya// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu drug pa'o// / de nas rna ba'i nad kyi dmigs
343b6(gso rig): shes pa bshad par bya'o// tsham pas btab dang chu la rtse// rna ba blung pas rlung 'khrugs shing // sgra yi log par sbyor ba dang // ldang ba'i rgyu gzhan gyis 'khrugs nas// rna ba'i rtsar ni rlung zhugs te// rna ba'i bu gar shugs drag gzer//
344a1(gso rig): gzhogs byed na zhing rengs pa dang // grang ba dag ni mi 'phrod cing // ring nas mnags shing smin nas kyang // chu ser cung zad 'dzag par byed// rgyu med rna ba stong snyam sems// zhum dang rgyas pa
344a2(gso rig): snyam du byed// mkhris 'gyur tsha bcas na zhing gzer// grang 'dod skrang zhings rims kyis 'debs// myur du smin zhing smin nas kyang // chu ser ser po 'dzag par byed// chu ser des ni gang gang du// reg pa de dang der gnas
344a3(gso rig): 'gyur// bad kan las gyur mgo 'gram pa// mgrin pa lci zhing nad shugs dal// g.ya' zhing grang la dro ba 'dor// smin nas gnag dkar ska ba 'dzag/ snad la sogs pas gnod 'gyur ba// rna ba gzer bar byed par
344a4(gso rig): 'gyur// khrag dang mkhris pa ltar nad dang // mtshan nyid cung zad lhag pa yin// nang gzhi 'dus pas gzer ba dang // skang bcas rims 'debs mi bzad na// res kyis grang dang dro ba 'dod// 'on pa lta bu nyid du 'gyur//
344a5(gso rig): smin nas rnag ni dkar dang gnag/ dmar dang ska ba 'dzag par 'gyur// sgra thos rtsar ni rlung zhugs pa// rgyu med par ni sna tshogs pa'i// sgra ni yang dang yang du thos// de ni rna ba'i sgra zhes bshad// rlung ni bad kan dang 'dres
344a6(gso rig): ba'i// rna sgra yal bar 'or na ni// skad gsang mthon por smra ba thos// rim gyis 'on pa nyid du 'gyur// rlung gi bang kan bskams gyur pas// de la rna ba gos gyur na// na zhing lci la 'gags gyur pa// de ni rna ba 'gags
344b1(gso rig): zhes bshad// bad+ma kan las ni rna ba g.ya'// sbyangs pa de yi ming gis bshad// mkhris pas bAd kan tshig gyur pa// nad bcas pa 'am nad med kyang // gnag skra 'dzag cing mang du 'drul// rna ba rnag bcad byed par 'gyur//

344b5(gso rig): 'tsho ba dka' bar 'gyur// rma 'tsho bas nas kyang nyes par ni// rna ba'i sho ni zhum par 'gyur// rtsa la gnas pa'i rlung gis ni// rna sha lA bskams pa de ming can// rna shal bi waM rgyud ltar phra// sra ba rgyud can zhes bya'o// gzhon

345a1(gso rig): dang mkhris pa 'khrugs gyur pas// dmar zhing tsha na smin pa dang // skrangs dang 'brum bu 'brum phran dang // dmar zhing tsha la gnag pa yin// rlung dang bad kan gyi rna bshal// sbyangs shing nud med
345a2(gso rig): sra ba dang // brtan zhing mdog 'dra g.ya' ba dang // de ni mnye ba zhes byar bshad// phug nyes rna ba brgyangs pa las// g.ya' bcas tsha grang smin zhing na// 'dus pa las gyur sbrengs pa de// sdug bsngal 'phel byed ces bya'o// bang

349b6(gso rig): 'gyur ba// de ni sna nang rul ba yin// 'dus pa 'am snad pa las gyur ba'i// snag dang khrag ni mgo nas 'dzag/ mgo bo tsha zhing na byed pa// de ni nag khrag can zhes bshang // rlung gis mkhris pa bad kan dag/ sna ni bskams
350a1(gso rig): par gyur pa las// bad kan bskams te gong bar 'gyur// de ni bsgongs pa zhes bya'o// 'brum bu thor bu nad gzhi yi// mtshan nyid ci 'dra dag las dbye// kun las dbugs 'byung dka' ba dang // rgyun
350a2(gso rig): du chu 'dzag sbrid pa 'byung // sna 'gags lta bur smra ba dang // sna nas rnag 'dzag klad pa na// de ltar rnam pa bco brgyad las// cham pa ma rungs 'tsho ba tsam// yan log brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// phyi ma'i
350a3(gso rig): gnas kyi le'u bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas sna nad gso ba bshad par bya'o// sna nad kun la dang por no// rlung med khang par 'dug nas ni// snum chos dugs dang smyug sman dang // dud pa rngub dang mkhur bkang
350a4(gso rig): bsten// gos ni lci zhing dro ba bgo// mgo bo shin tu mthug pas dkri/ kha zas yang sbyar lan tshe snum// dro ba dang ni bska ba bza'// bu ram 'o ma skams se'i sha/ lan tshwa tsha ba gsum shas che// nas dang gro ni mang po
350a5(gso rig): yang // zho dang se'u 'bru'i khu ba bsten// la phug gzhon nu'i khu ba dang // ku lang+tha yi khu ba'ang bsngags// rtsa ba bcu'i khu dro 'jam mama?// chang rnying dngas ma brud par bya// ag+ni man+da tsa rong+ka// shu dag zi ra go snyod ma nAM//
350a6(gso rig): bal bu'i lo ma tsha ba gsum// dbyi mong da trig star bu dang // zi ra tsi tra srang gnyis gnyis// shing che gan ta pa tra dang // sug smel zho ni gnyis gnyis dang // bu ram rnying pa sring lnga bcu// bsgrol te ril bur byas pa ni//
350b1(gso rig): zos na chum pa dbugs mi bde// lung pa lu ba 'joms byed yin// skad snyan yi ga 'byed mchog yin// shu ti shun pa byA la dang // so na ka dang e rat+na// bilba'i rtsa ba dong kar bcas// zhag mar spra tshil dud pa rdug/
350b2(gso rig): yang na phye dang mar dang bcas// kham por sbyar ba'i nang du bcug/ bsreg pa'i dud pa rngub par byed// khrus dang mya ngan khro ba dang // shas cher gnyid log chu grung spang // rlung 'gyur chum pa rlung 'joms pa'i// sman ni
350b3(gso rig): bskol ba'i khu ba'am// lan tshwa lnga ni bskol ba 'am// bi da ri sogs sde bskol blud// dugs dang sna sman la sogs bya// gzhogs phyed mar bshad gso ba'ang bya// khrag mkhris las gyur thug pa ni// mir sar
350b4(gso rig): mngar ba'i sman bskol blud// sman chu blugs shing byug pa dang // nus bsil grang mo dag gis bya// da ba'i shun pa 'bras bu gsum// shiM dri par ni pri yang ku// shing mngar seng phrom til mar gyi// bcu 'gyur skyer pa
350b5(gso rig): 'o mar bcas// bskol ba'i sgra sman btang bar bya// bad kan las gyur smyung ba dang // yungs kar-i lde gus mgo bsku 'am// thal sman bcas pa'i mar blud de// smon gzhug rgya ma tsha tsha ba gsum// bi TAng+ga dang dugo mo
350b6(gso rig): nyung / zi ra ra gcin sbyar ba yi// sna sman dog ni btang bar bya// 'dus gyur tsha dang rno sbyar ba'i// mer gyi sna sman drug pas gso// gcong chen srin gso rims kyis ni// cham pa ma rungs 'tshe tsam bye// tsha ba gsum
351a1(gso rig): dang e raN+Da// thang shing ru rta bi tang+ka// bong nga dkar po ing+ku dang // dur byid brta ka'i sa bon// yungs kar nye'u phran rul ba dang // a ka ni man+da'i me tog dang // pi lu shi kru'i sa bon dang // NA
351a2(gso rig): spangs khu ba gcin dang ni// glang po'i gcin dang gcig tu sbyar// zar ma'i skud dkris reng bu yi// dud pa kha dang sna nas rngub// smin dang sbrid pa byung zhes byar// sne sman rnon po bud pa phan// bca' ska ru r+N+Na pi pi ling //
351a3(gso rig): rgun 'brum bi TAng+ka'i lde gu// mar ram til mar bcas bskol ba'i// sna sman sbrid pa rnags pa sel// sna bskams pa la ba li'i bar// btung sogs sha khur sbyar ba bza'// snum gyi dud pa dugs kyis gso// sna rgyas
351a4(gso rig): la yang cho ga 'di'o// sna rnags 'bar la mkhris 'joms sman// chu 'dzag sna sman sogs rnos bya// rnag can lA ni bad kan gyi// gso ba dang ni 'dra bar bya// rgya skyegs dang ni ki rany+dza// na le sham dang bi TAng+ga//
351a5(gso rig): shing kun bu ram pi pri ling // lug thug gcin sbyar sna sman ni// smon byas 'og tu btang bar bya// shi kru dan da bri ha taM// tsha ba gsum dang lce myang tshwa// byi rug pA dong bI DAng+ga// til mar bskol ba'i sA sman+na yang // btang
351a6(gso rig): na mchog tu phan pa yin// rnag dang khrag can sa ra pa ni// khrag gi cham pa lta bur gso// shin tu 'phel la rma'i khyims ltar// 'brum bu rman bu che ba la// dan+ti dur byid lce myang tsha// ldong ros dang ni pi pi ling // tsi tra ka
351b1(gso rig): yi lde gu ni// mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba yi// reng bu snar ni gzhugs par bya// shi kru la sogs sna sman yang // rnag can gso ba'i skabasu bshad// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// phyi ma'i gnas
351b2(gso rig): kyi le'u nyi shu ba'o// // de nas kha nad kyi dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o// nya dang ma he phag gi ni// sha dang la phug rjen pa dang // ma sha'i sran tshed 'o ma zho// tshe dang bu ram shing khu dang // 'brum
351b3(gso rig): phra kha sbub nyal bsten dang // so shing gis snad goms pa spos// dud pa mkhur bkang skyog pa dang // gtar ga dbugs ni nyes pa yin// bad kan shas che'i nad 'khrugs nas// kha yi nang gi nad bskyed 'gyur//
351b4(gso rig): de la rlung gis chu 'gags 'gyur// mchu ral ba yi nad ces bshad// rlung gis mchu la gnod 'gyur ba// mchu sra nad tshabs che ba yin// mchu 'gags brdol byar 'gyur ba dang // gnag cing rtsub pa mchu 'khrugs
351b5(gso rig): yin// mkhris pa tsha ba mi bzod ser// 'brum phran yungs kar 'dra bas khyab// myur smin mang du rnags pa yin// bad kan las gyur grang ba ni// mi bzod spo zhing skrangs pa dang // 'brum phran dkar pos khyab pa
351b6(gso rig): yin// 'dus gyur sna tshogs par snang zhing // dri nga'i sbyin bag 'dzag pa dang // glo bur shas che skrangs shing zhum// na dang mi na rnag mi snyoms// khrag las gyur pa khrag 'dzag cing // khrag gi mdog dang 'dra ba dang // 'di la
352a1(gso rig): 'bra go lta bu yin// khrag zad chu bur 'byung ba yin// sha g+hur sha yi gong po 'dra// rims kyis srin bu skye zhing 'gul// tshil gyur g.ya' zhing 'gul ba dang // sbyangs 'jam til mar lta bur 'dzag/ snang
352a2(gso rig): pa las gyur gas pa dang // yang dang yang du 'bye 'gyur la// slar yang 'grub par gyur pa dang // mchun g.ya' zer kod pa yin// rlung dang bod kan 'dres pa las// chu yi chu bur lta bur 'byung // mkhur ba'i 'bras
352a3(gso rig): byed skrangs shing brtan// mkhur ba che zhing rims dang bcas// rlung 'gyur so nad dro la srid// grang bas reg na lhag par na// gzer zhing bcag pa snyam du sems// grang bas zhig par de bshad// rlung dang chu yis so rtse ba//
352a4(gso rig): grong dang sbyar bas mi bzod par// sbyar ba zos pa nyid kyis 'gyur// nad bcas 'gul bar byed pa yin// sogs ni zegs pa dang // na zhing zug la g.yo ba yin// so 'gul so ni so yo bA dang // za ba'i tshe na lhag par na// /
352a5(gso rig): so sto so ni mi sdug par// so rnams skye bar 'gyur ba yin// so lhag so ni skyes pa ste// de ni 'phel ba zhes kyang bshad// skye bar gyur pa'i tshe na ni// na zhing skyes na de zhi byed// mA bkrus so yi dri ma 'am// bad kan rlung gis
352a6(gso rig): bskams pa las// dri nga brtan 'gyur so dreg yin// de ni yal bar bor ba las// so ni dum kur zegs gyur pa// grugs shing so ni gogs pa yin// khrag dang mkhris po rlung gis so// sngon por gyur pa so sngon yin// nad kyis/
352b1(gso rig): rlung ni shas cher gyur// rtsa bar bcas pa'i so la brten// so dbugs bskum+ba t+ye stongs par byas// sor ni zas kyi dri mas+t+ra gang+gA// rul bas srin bu phra mo ni// skye bar gyur te de 'og tu// rgyu med gnag skra ljang dub can//
352b2(gso rig): sbom che gnag la shas cher na// bcad pa 'drar snang rnag khrag 'dzag/ de ni so sron can zhes bya// bad kan dang ni khrag gis rnyil// mnags shing rul bar 'gyur ba dang // gnyen pa zag shing gnas pa de// grung
352b3(gso rig): bas nyen pa yin par bshad// khrag mkhris rnag pa las byung ba// rnyil ni tsha bar byed pa dang // khrag gis skrangs pa mthong ba dang // g.ya' zhing khrag ni 'dzag pa dang // khrag chad nas ni rgyas par 'gyur// so ni
352b4(gso rig): 'gul zhing na tshabs chung // kha dri mnam 'gyur nye 'dar yin// so naM gnyis sam gsum thad kar// bad kan las gyur rgya shugs tsam// skrangs pa sra zhing mi bzad na// myur du smin pa so 'bur yin// rnyil ni
352b5(gso rig): nAnd bcas khrag gis ni// phyi dang nang du skrangs shing lci// na zhing tsha la gas pa las// rnag khrag so yi khong 'bras yin// so rtsar khrag mkhris las gyur nAd// skrangs shing na dang bcas pa dang // kha chu 'dzag cing
352b6(gso rig): rnyil 'drul ba// khong stong gi ni nad ces bya// 'dus pa las gyur rims dang bcas// rnag dang bcas pa'i khrag 'dzag la// so yi sbrel mtshams zhigs pa ni// khong stong chen po zhes bshad// bad kan gyis ni so
353a1(gso rig): yi mthur// sha mdzer ltar snang 'gram pa dang // rna ba na byed spyod lam nyams// de ni sha lcug ces byar bshad// rnyil ni bdar bar gyur pA las// nad tshabs chen por 'byung 'gyur zhing // gang
353a2(gso rig): zhig so ni 'gul gyur pa// de ni nad pa las byung yin// rnyil la rten par byed pa'i nad// gsor rung yal bAr bor bA gang // nang du de ni nad 'dzags pas// de ni rgyun lam phra ba bskyed// de ni yang yang rnag 'jug
353a3(gso rig): pags pa sha dang rus pa 'bigs// de yang rang rang mtshan nyid ni// ji skad bshad pa sngar shes bya// lce ni sha kha'i lo ltar rtsub// tshor ba med gas rlung gnod yin// mkhris pas tsho zhing nad bcas 'gyur// mdzer ba
353a4(gso rig): dmar pos khyab pa yin// bad kan las gyur shal mA li'i// tsher mas khyab 'gyur lci zhing mthug/ bad kan mkhris pa 'og tu sbyangs// mthong zhing gyong bar byed pa dang // sbyin nas nya yi dri 'dra la// sha'adrul chu
353a5(gso rig): ser can zhes bya// lce rtsa'i 'og dung 'bel ba ni// skung zhing lce yi rtse mo 'dra// mdzer ba 'byung zhing kha chu 'dzag/ lce ni rengs shing rtsub pa dang // g.ya' dang nad bcas tshig mi than// za bar mi nus lnga lhag yin// de dang
353a6(gso rig): 'dra bar lce steng na// gnas pa'i nye ba'i lce zhes bya// rlung 'khrugs pa ni rkan gyi shar// 'brum phran sra zhing nad bcas 'gyur// mang zhing mthug la 'dzag par bcas// rkan gyi 'brum phran zhes de bshang// bad kan khrag
353b1(gso rig): gis rkan pugasu// nywa yi lgang pa 'dra zhing 'jam// 'phyong zhing skrangs la sprin bag can// kha zas sna nas 'byung bar byed// lkog 'gags skom dad lud pa dang // smon byed lkog ma'i sha lhag yin// rkan gyi phugasu nad med sha
353b2(gso rig): 'dus pa rkan 'dus zhes bya'o// rkan gyi dbus su pad+ma 'dra// khrag las skyes pa chu bur yin// bad kanA 'khrugs pas ring nas 'phel// nad med rus sbal 'dri zhes bya// bad kan tshil gyis rgya sran 'dra// nad med
353b3(gso rig): brtan pa 'bur ba yin// mkhris pa rnags pa smin zhes bya// rnag 'dzag nod dkyil che ba yin// rlung mkhris las gyur tsha nyon mongs// rkan bskams de yi ming can yin// lce dang 'brel pa lkog ma'i nad// sha yi myu gu
353b4(gso rig): myur 'phel zhing // mi bzad lam ni dag byed la// myurang gsod byed pa grag pa yin// de ni rlung 'gyur lkog ma kha// skam byed 'gram pa sna nad bskyed// mkhris pas rims skom rmongs brag can// lkogs 'gags dud
353b5(gso rig): bas bdugs snyam sems// myur smin myur du 'phel ba dang // dmar zhing re na mi bde byed// bad kun gyis dkar 'byar bag can// khrag gyur 'bum bus khyab pa dang // me mdag 'dra zhing sna nad bskyed// mkhris pa las
353b6(gso rig): gyur mtshan nyid mtshungs// 'dus gyur snag phugs gting ring zhing // mtshan ma kun dong ldan pa yin// bad kan shas cher skrangs pa la// rmen bu rgya shugs 'dra zhing mtho// gra ma tsher mas gang snyam byed// lam 'gags
354a1(gso rig): byed pa rtsa ba yin// zlum zhing mtho la tsha ba dang // lkog ma'i ngos nas 'dus pa yin// 'gram pa'i mtshams nas 'gul ba'i nang // ras b.lA sa bon lta bur zlum// sprin bgra nad tshabs chung bar
354a2(gso rig): skrasbrang // sra ba mchu rtse can zhes bya// phyi dang nang du mi bzad sbyang // lkog ma'i lam gyi gtan pa 'dra// mgo lci snum dang kha chu 'dzag/ rims bskyed lkog ma chu 'byings yin// sbyangs pa shas cher mi na zhing // mchu
354a3(gso rig): zhing de 'dra gdu bu yin// nad kyis lkog ma sha mdzer ni// gcig gam mang bskyed nad tsarba chung// dbugs 'byin dka' zhing zas ming dka'// rtsa bo che ba lkog ma'o mtshon// sha yaM mdzer ba mang pos khyab// rab sgom
354a4(gso rig): tshetsha la mgo bo ni// mdung ltar shin nad skyed byed// mdzer bas khyab pas mdung 'dra yin// lkog ma kun ni myur khyab cing // myur skye smin 'gyur shas cher na// rul ba'i rnag 'dra 'dzag gyur pa// skrangs pa lkog ma'i
354a5(gso rig): khong 'bras yin// lce yi mtha' ma lkog ma sogs// skrangs shing smin pa med pa'i nad// brtan pas khrag gis skyed byed pas// nad med lkog ma'i rmen bu yin// rlung dang bad kan tshil gyis ni// lkog ma'i phyi rol lnga
354a6(gso rig): bskyed// de ni 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i tshe// rlig pa ltar 'byeng na ba med// de ni rlung 'gyur dmar ba'am gnag/ rab zug rtse ris nag por bcas// 'phel bas lkog me kha bskams shing // lce yis ro mi tshor bar byed//
354b1(gso rig): bad kan las ci reg na grang // brtan zhing skya la g.ya' dang bcas// 'phel na rkan dang lkog mAr chags// kha ni mngar ba bro bar byed// tshil 'gyur bad kan lta bur ni// de ni 'phel 'bri lus 'dar 'byed//
354b2(gso rig): 'phel bar byed pa'i tshe na nI// lkog mar sgra bcas skad gsang nyams// bad+ma kan gyis ni rlung rgyun bkag/ lkog nyams skad gsang nyams pa dang // dka' bas dbugs 'jigs mun zhugs snyom
354b3(gso rig): rlung las skad nyams gang yin 'gyur// rlung ni kun tu 'gro byed pas// kha na rma ni 'pho bar byed// dmar la rtsub pa skyed byed yin// mchu dmar pags pa lhod pa dang // lce yis grang ba mi bzod lci// gas
354b4(gso rig): shing tsher mas khyab 'drar snang // kha ba rnags gdong bar dkro' ba ni// kha yI shu ba zhes byar bshad// bad kan gzhang 'brum sman sogs kyi// 'og tu gnod par byas pa'i rlung // gyen du kha naM dri mi zhim/
354b5(gso rig): de ni steng gi sgrub ces bya// mkhris gyur kha shu khu rnags shing // tshe na kha ni kha bro la// rma la lan tshwas byugs snyam sems// khrag lus gyur pa'ang de dang 'dra// bad kan las gyur kha mngar bro//
354b6(gso rig): g.ya'i rma ni 'byil bag can// mkhur chos nang du bsten nas ni// 'brum bu gnag cing skya ba 'byung // de ni mnye zhing bcad pa dang // bskyod na 'phel bar byed pa yin// nad ni khrag bcas gyur khe shu/
355a1(gso rig): kha shu nad ni khrag bcas 'gyur// 'dus pa mtshan nyid kun dang ldan// de nyid gso shing la sogs la// mi dga' kha dri mi zhim 'gyur// mchu dang khwa dri mi thim 'gyu// mchu dang 'khur chos rtsa dang // lce dang
355a2(gso rig): rkan dang mgul ba dang // kha dang thams cad dag gis ni// nad ni bdun cu rtsa dgu yin// bcu gcig gcig dang bcu dang ni// bcu gsum de dang drug dang brgyad// bco brgyad bcu gnyis dang ni// de dag go rim bzhin du
355a3(gso rig): sbyar/ so sto sha dang khrag 'gyur mchu// chu bur chu ni med pa dang // rkan gyi rus sbal 'brum phran dang // rnyil khong stong stong che chung 'dzings// skad nyams so sngon steng gi rkug/ mdung 'dra gdu'u chu ser can// 'dus gyur
355a4(gso rig): med pa mchu nad dang // khrag dang 'dus gyur grag pa dang // so gog so nI chag pa dang // smin pa'i nye bA'i lce dang ni// lkog ma'i lba ba skad nyams dang // dbugs mi thon pa lo gcig lon// so brtse gsang ba 'chi
355a5(gso rig): ba tsam// lhag ma mtshon dang sman gyis gso// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas kha nad gso ba bshang bar bya'o// mchu ral ba yi
355a6(gso rig): mtha' blud de// btsems pa rma ltar gso bar bya// shing mngar song phrom kra kru ni// thal tres ut+pal sra pa la ni// mon sne'u rme ru pa to la// til mar bskol bas bsku bar bya// rlung 'joms mngar po'i sde tshan dang //
355b1(gso rig): bskol ba'i til mar sna sman btang // rlung 'gyur mchu dang sra rtsi pog/ pra tshil gu gul thang shing ni// snum chen bskol ba'i ras bal dag/ spangs pa'i ye'us glan par bya// shIng mngar phye mar bcas pa dang // de
355b2(gso rig): nyid kyis ni bsku bar bya// e raN+Da yi lo mA ni// 'o mar bcas pas sbubs dugs bya'o// mchu ral skabs bshad sna sman dang // mgo be rtas pa dag kyang bya// mkhris pa snang ba'i mchu nad la// srin bu pad+mas khrag
355b3(gso rig): dbyung ngo // seng phrom sbrang rtsi sra rtsi bog/ shing mngar bcas pa'i phye mas gdab// sle tr-is shing mngar rma shing dang // bskol ba'i mar gyis bskus na'ang phan// mkhris pa'i khring 'bras ltar yang gso// khrag las
355b4(gso rig): gyur pa sar pa la// de dag nyid kyis gso bar bya// bad kan las gyur mchu nad la// pra ta'i thal bu tsho ba gsum// sbrang rtsi dang ni sbyar ba bsku// gtar gA byas nas phye ma gdab// bad klan 'joms par byed pa
355b5(gso rig): yi// dung rngub sna sman mkhur bkang bya// tshil 'gyur ro dugs byas dpral nas ni// me yis nges par bsreg par bya// pri yang gu dang 'bras bu gsum// seng phro mo sbrang rtsi sbyor bas bsku// chu yi chu bur brtol naso sbyar
355b6(gso rig): sman snod sbrang rtsis bsku bar bya// gting ring ba 'am rab 'phel la// thal sman dag gam me btsas gso// mkhur ba'i chu ser smin skabasu// sbyangs pa'i nad ltar gso bar bya// so grang ba la dugs byas la// so
356a1(gso rig): drung de til mar bsreg/ gla skrad rgyum tsha sbrang rtsi dang // se 'bru'i shun pa 'bras bu gsum// skyer pa khaN+Da 'dam bu'i rkang // bca' sgra sbyar bas bsku bar bya// 'o ma tshan bskol mkhur ba
356a2(gso rig): bkang // e raN+Da'i mar sna sman btang // saM rtse de bzhin bye ba la// rlung 'joms gso ba thams cad bya// til dang shing mngar sbrang rtsi ni// 'o mar bskol ba'i mkhur bkang bcang // so 'gul ba la rtsa ba bcu'i//
356a3(gso rig): khu ba mang bskol mkhur bri bkang // spang ma seng phrom bi pi ling // 'bras bu gsum dang rma shing dang // rgyum tsha yis ni bdar bar bya// snum sman gyi ni sna sman dang // mkhur bkang sna sman ji bzhin bsten// sau
356a4(gso rig): lhag skyes pa thal sman gyis// bskus te goms par gyur pa dang // srin can so ltar phyung nas ni// de tshe de dang 'dra bar gso// khrag ni tshong par ma gyur ni// bsregs la rma ltar gso bar bya// so dreg chags
356a5(gso rig): la so rtsol// gnod pa med par bsil bar bya// thal sman sbrang rtsir bcas pas ni// de yi 'og tu bsku bar bya// so gog pa'ang de nyid dang // so rtser bshad pas gso bar bya// srin can so no ma 'gul la/
356a6(gso rig): gdugs byas nas ni khrag dbyung bya// snum gyis bsku zhing mkhur bkang dang // sna sman kha zas rlung 'joms sbyin// khong stong bu ram spra tshil gyis// gang ba'i thur mas bsregs par bya// lo ma bdun pa
356b1(gso rig): arga yi// 'o mas bkang na srin gzer 'joms// shing ku nag tshur kat+pa la// sa rtsi ka dang bi T+Te ka/ ru rta'i phye ma ras bal gtums// sor glan zug gzer myur du 'joms// yang na 'di nyid bskol ba yi// til
356b2(gso rig): mar mkhur bas bcang bar bya// yang na bri ha tI rnam gnyis// bu ga dam pa e raN+Da// bskol ba'i khu bo mkhur ba dgang // de ltar gso ba mang po yis// nang ni zhi bar ma gyur na// skam pa phra mo dag gis
356b3(gso rig): sam// so dbyung ba yi cha dpyad kyis// dang po rtsa ba nas bslang ste// gtan nas de ni dbyung bar bya// til mar shing mngar phyer bcas pa 'am// sbrang rtsis de 'og mkhur bkang bya// de 'og shing mngar bi dA ri// sring ka
356b4(gso rig): dang ka she ru// til mar bcu 'gyur 'o ma dang // bsgrol ba'i sna spyan btang bar bya// rid cing nyams chung rgad po dang // rlung nad kyis nyen so mo dbyung // ya so dbyung bar mi bya ste// de ni bla gnyen mang po bskyed// de

357a4(gso rig): sman gyi so ni smin mi gzhug/ smin na dral la gting ring bsreg/ khong stong bcang blud nas ni// sla sgang sang pro 'bras bu gsum// shu tai rme shing skyer khaN+Da// rgya skyegs shing mang ra kad+ga la// sbra ngo rtsir sbyar bas

363a4(gso rig): kyi 'gyur ba las byung ba// bcud kyi len gyis gso bar bya// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas mgo ba'i nad gso ba bshad par bya'o// rlung las
363a5(gso rig): gyur pa'i mgo nad la// rlung nad gso ba'i cho ga bshad// 'di ni mtshan mo zhun mar blud// de rjes 'o ma dron po blung // ma sha rgya sran mung+ga 'ang rung // mar dang ldan pa de bzhin sbyin// til mar til gyi lde gu ni// 'o ma dang ni lhan
363a6(gso rig): cig drung // gran dang bcings pa'i dugs dag ni// sha dang 'u su las byas phan// rlung 'joms rtsa ba bcu la sogs// bskol ba'i 'o ma sdum can blung // sna sman dung rngub snum can dang // mgo dang rna ba rtas par bya// ba ran
363b1(gso rig): sogs sde tshan brdungs// 'o ma chu byed bskol ba yi// 'o ma lus pa de bsgrangs la// bsrubs te snying po blangs nas ni// de nas mngar ba'i sde tshan bskol// mar gyi sna sman blug pa bsngags// 'dir ni 'o ma'i sde tshan bskol// mar
363b2(gso rig): dang kha ra bcas pa blud// ras bal sa bon shing tsha dang // gla sgang dzA ti khaM 'bus pa// chu dron gtigs pa'i sna sman ni// mgo ba'i nang kun 'joms byed yin// khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur la// kha ra gur gum mar bskol btang //
363b3(gso rig): ru rta rgya spos ut+pa la// tsan ngan mar sbyangs mgo bskus phan// rlung shas che la 'jigs yod pas// gtar ga 'di la mi bya'o// des ma zhi na bad rlung la// me btsa' ji skad bshad par bya// gzhogs phyed na la'ang de bzhin de/
363b4(gso rig): nang dang 'brel ba gso bar bya// sha ri shI yi sa bon dang // a pa marga'i rtsa ba dang // kha ru tsha bcas sna sman btang // yang na sa lo paN+Di 'o laM/ kra marda ga'ang rung // skyur bu dang sbyar lde gu bsku// nyi ma ltar 'khor de yi tshe// gtar gas khrag ni
363b5(gso rig): dbyung bar bya// mkhris pa l-is gyur mgo nang la// snum chos byas nas gtar ga gdab// mgo dang gdong byug sman chu blug/ slon khrus mas btang bsil bar bya// 'tsho byed dang bskol 'o ma dang // mar ni sna sman btung ba blang //
363b6(gso rig): khrag las gyur pa'ang 'di bzhin bya// mu 'gram can la gtar ga spang // bang kan mgo nad mar rnying dang // snum tha rkos byas la tsha bas smon// dugs dang dbyug pa sna smon sogs// rtsub dro rno ba'i sman gyis gso// 'dir ni
364a1(gso rig): myang ba'ang bsngags pa yin// 'dus pa las ni 'dren mAr gso// srin gyur sna sman khrag blugs te// de yis 'bu ni brgyal bar 'gyur// khrag gi dri yis ra ro nas// kha dang sna nas 'byung bar 'gyur// de
364a2(gso rig): nas sna sman dud rngub zlos// de ni nye bar 'byung bar 'gyur// yungs kar nrim+ba i gu dang // pi lu'i mar dang sbyar ba yi// bI TA ga dang sardzi ka/ dan+da shing kun pa gcin bskol// sna sman so sor btang bar bya// bI tsA gA ni ra
364a3(gso rig): gcin dang // sbyar ba'i sna sman 'bu 'joms mchog/ nya rul bcas pa'i sna sman dang // dud pa dag kyang brngub par bya// srin bus khrag ni 'thungs pa'i phyir// 'di la khrag ni dbyung mi 'byung // mgo 'dar rlung gi mgo nad kyi//
364a4(gso rig): gso ba me btso' ma gtogs bya// nye ba'i mgo nad skyes pa yi// rjes dang skyes ma thag la ni// rlung nad kyi ni gso ba bya// smin nas khong 'bras gso las bya// 'brum phran 'brum bu khong 'bras la// smin dang ma smin ji
364a5(gso rig): bzhin bya// srin las sprin bu pad+ma yi// gtar ga byas twa nim+ba'i chu// blugs shing rta spangs khu ba ni// lan tshwa shas che ro btab pas bsku// nim+ba pa to la'i lo ma// yung bar bcas pa zhib btags bsku// ba gcin 'bra' cha
364a6(gso rig): rnying par sbyar// khyim bya'i rtug pa dag gis bsgo// gyo mor ru rta brdos pa dang // til gyi phye mar bcas pa yis// srog pa bskus na g.ya' ba 'am// chu 'dzag g.ya' ba sel bar byed// ma la dzaM dang tsi tra ka/ ka ra bi ra
364b1(gso rig): ka rany+dza// til mar spu gris bregs pa yi// rjes bsku kor ler 'byi ba sel// des ma zhi nA mgo bo yi// sbyang byas slon smas sogs pa bya// mi bzad pa la dang por ni// dpral ba'i rtsa ba gtar ka bya// mgo bo'i bkru spyan
364b2(gso rig): sna smane btang // shing mngar bi la ya'i sa bon// ru rta yungs kar ma sha bcas// sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i lde gu bsku// rgya skyegs dong kau'i lo ma dang // tsakra mar dang skyu ru ra// spring rtsir btsas pa bskus nA phan// khri rgod
364b3(gso rig): tshetshi bsregs thal ba ni// chu dang sbyar bas bskus na phan// kor lar skra 'byi ji ltar ni// nye bar gtar ga gdab pa dang // zhal zhal byas te nA le sham// ldong ros spangs ma nag tshur bsku// yang na 'ba' cha'i thang shing ngam//
364b4(gso rig): 'ol ma se yi 'bras bu'i rtsa// yong na lat+sA li rtsa 'am// kA ra bi ra'i khu ba'am// kaN+Da kA rI'i khu ba ni// sbrang rtsir sbyar ba bsku bar bya// d+ha d+hu rA yi lo ma 'am// bse shing 'bras bu'i khu bas bsku// til gyi me tog gze ma dang //
364b5(gso rig): mar dang sbrang rtsi bcas pa 'am// glang po so bsregs til mar bsres// ko ler 'byi ba'i sman mchog yin// skra dkar skye l-i lug gau rA// snag tshas de bzhin bsku bar bya// ji srid skra ni skyes kyi bAr// chu blugs pa ni spang

365b3(gso rig): gang do/ 'o ma bre gang bcas bskol ba// mngar ba'i lde gu'i sman sde btab// de btung mas btang bsku ba dang // sna sman dag tu bsten pa yi// nam tshong yan chad nang kun sel// sman 'di dag ni lde gu dang // dzI ba ma tI dang
365b4(gso rig): 'bras bu gsum// me ta rgun 'brum dbyi mo dang // be ru sha ka sa mang ka/ ga bra'i rtsa ba tang pal dang // kar+k+ka ti sr-ing kha sral phre'u// ma hA me ta ta la dang // 'bra gau pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang // pad+ma'i sdong po khardzu na// shing
365b5(gso rig): mngar nye'u shing dzI ba ka/ byai de ri dang bu rom shing // thal t+nes rnam gnyis brih+ma ti// murba gan+d+he ma zangs rtsi ba// sring ge ta dang ka she ru// rA s+yA sti rA lbu ba dang // sug skyel zur ba ma nu dang // ba sU ba dang cu gang dang // ram
365b6(gso rig): nye ba dang byi tsher ba dang // mau du ka dang star ka dang // a bi shu ka muny+dza ka/ zho ni gnyis gnyis phyer btags dang // mar bre gang dang 'o ma ni// bzhi 'gyur dag dang bskol ba'i mar// 'di ni rma bya chen mo ste// rma bya las ni

366a3(gso rig): rtsa ba la gnod pa'i// nad de myur du gso bAr bya// gad+ha la dbang po kun bsten zhing // gang la srog ni gnas byed pas// des na yan lag dam pa yin// bsrung ba la ni 'bad par bya'o// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po

366b1(gso rig): ba la sogs bla gnyen bcas// yun ring du ni 'tsho ba dka'// rma rnyed mtshan mar shes par bya// de ni khrag bcas nad bco lnga// de la rlung las gyur pa'i rma// gnag cing rmug dmyur thal mdog dang // thi ba rus pa lta bur
366b2(gso rig): snang // zho gu chu 'am 'bras bkru chu// 'dra ba'i chu bla nyung ngu 'jog/ sha zad shas cher na zhing zug/ rtsub cing tsheg tshwag che ba yin// mkhris gyur myur nAg ser ba dang // sngo zhing ser skya 'am kham par 'dug/ gcin dang
366b3(gso rig): thil chu rgya skyegs chu// til mar 'dra chu mang du 'dzeg/ rma la thal sman btab ltar na// dmar zhing tsha la gnag pa yin// bad kan las gyur mdog skya g.ya'// chu ni ska ba mang du 'jog/ rma kha sbom zhing na ba dang // rtsa rgyud

367a2(gso rig): mchan khung nu mar byung // dbu ba rnag 'dzag rlung 'byung zhing // zug rngu bcas shing stong nas 'dzag/ mtshan mar brdol zhing nang bltas// de bzhin rked pa'i rus par gnas// mdze can dug gis phog pa dang // lus skem gcin
367a3(gso rig): nad sbrang rtsi 'dra// rma'i steng rma ni byung ba gang // rma de gso ba dka' ba yin// me dpal rims dang chad par 'khru// lung pa lu dang skom nAd che// gnyid med pa dang dbugs mi bde// mi drod chung bar gyur pa yi// rma ni 'tsho

369a1(gso rig): byed pa'i mchog/ rnag dang sha ni med pa dang // sha yi gnas su ma 'drubs pa// til dang shing mngar bcas pa yi// lde gus rma ni 'tshe bar bya// snum dro mngar dang kha ba dang // ska bas thams

369a5(gso rig): 'dzam bu seng phroma? kat+kA la// ku ku seng phrom phye mas gdab// pags pa myur du skyed par byed// rgya skyegs ldong ros bcod drang ni// ba la dang ni ser po gnyis// sbrang rtsi mar sbyar ldi gu yis// bskus na bags pa

370a1(gso rig): rnam par bcad// rab tu 'chang dang lhung ba dang // phug dang bshags dang grugs pa'o// de la bshus pa chu sder ram// khrag ni nyung zad 'byung 'gyur zhing // pags pa chod pas rtsa 'gyur yin//
370a2(gso rig): de las chod 'gyur bcad pa yin// de la chod pa rnam bcad yin// rab 'phyang rus pa lhag ma lus// lhungs pa lus las bog pa yin// zug rngu pra mo 'bigs pas phug/ khong pa ma gtogs snum pa yin// snga
370a3(gso rig): ma las gzhan bshags pa yin// khrag dang rkang ni 'dres gyur ba// mtshon gyis drag tu bsnam pa yis// rus bcas rgya cherla snang grugs pa// de la 'phral du byung ba'i rma// zug gzer shin tu che ba la// shing
370a4(gso rig): mngar mar dwang bskol ba 'am// ba bla'i til mar dro 'jam blug/ nad pa'i tsha ba zhi bya'i phyir// bsgri ba la sogs snum pa dang // bsil mngar ba yi sman gyis ni// ngi yi mod la blug par bya// 'phral gyi rma ni rgya che la//
370a5(gso rig): sbyangs pa'i phyir ni sbrang rtsi dang // mar gyis mchog tu bsku bya zhing // mkhris 'joms bsil ba'i gso ba bya// nid kyis rtsom pa che ba la// steng dang 'og nas sbyang bar bya// smyung ba bya zhing 'bras chen bzhin// rgyun du
370a6(gso rig): go tar pa gdab par bya// bshus dang grugs pa 'di nyid de// cho ga 'di nyid lhag par sbyar// de gnyis khrag ni nyung shas 'dzag/ smin pa 'am myur ba nyid du 'gyur// phal cher rmo ni shas cher 'byung // gzhan las
370b1(gso rig): khrag ni 'byung gyur la// de yis khrag ni zang gyur bas// rlung 'khrugs nad kyi bskyed pa la// rlung 'joms sman dang bskol ba yi// snum blugs pa dang sman chu blugs pa dang sman chu blug/ dugs dang bsku dang dkri
370b2(gso rig): pa dang // snum gyi 'jam rtsi rnams kyang bya// de ltar zhag bdun par bshad pa'i// 'phral gyi rma byung cho ga bshad// zhag bdun nas ni shugs zad nas// sngar bshad pa yi cho ga spyad// 'dir ni phal cher spyi cho ga/ re re
370b3(gso rig): gso ba bshad bya ste// bshus la na ba myur bsal phyir// rma la phan pa'i phye ma gdab// bcad pa rma sel lde gus bsku// rnam par bcad dang rab 'phyang la// cho ga bzhin du btsem pa dang // bcing ba dang ni btsi ra \u0f7f// tshig par bani
370b4(gso rig): gsor ri gas phyir ni 'phyang ba la// rang gi gnasu legs bzhag cing // rtsa ma 'chol bar byas nas ni// pad+ma'i 'dab mas g.yogs nas ni// lag pas dal gyi mnan par bya// de nas shing mngar dzI ba ka/ zangs
370b5(gso rig): rtsa ba dang ut+pa la// maur dang 'o bcas bskol ba'i// sman thigs blugs dang sna sman dang // rta ba'i cho ga dag kyang bya// mig nang thams cad sel mchog yin// mig phugs zhugs la mgul ba bsdam// smon
370b6(gso rig): dang lud pa sbrid pa dbyung // yang na dbugs rngub dbugs dbyung bsdam// rma byung mig gi gso ba bya// rna ba phog pa tsams nas ni// bu ga til mar dag gi dgang // lhag pa'i sum mdo chod gyur te// rlung gi
371a1(gso rig): 'byung bar gyur pa la'ang // mnyam du bzhag ste bar mtshams ni// med par btsems te bcing bar bya// 'di lA ra yi mar sngar gyis// blugs pa dag ni rab tu bsngags// gan rkyal bzhag
371a2(gso rig): ste kha zas sbyin// legs par spyod lam bsdams te nyal// yan lag thad kar gnas pa yi// rma byung yan lag legs bzhog ste// btsems la bkri zhing bcing byi zhing // gos ni mthug bos bcing bar bya//
371a3(gso rig): klas pa'i ra mthil bcing pos ni// 'phrog pa'i rma la bcing bar bya// rlig pa 'phyang la sbang pa ni// sbu gus chu ni gtor nas kyang // rlig pa bcug ste ras b.liM dang // bcas pa'i khab kyisra btsem par bya// 'ur
371a4(gso rig): mthil bcing bar byas pa la// rkeng pa nas ni srad bus gdags// de no rma ni 'drul gyur pas// snum dang dugs kyi las mi bya// pri yang ku dang a ka ru// sug srelA dzA ti paR+Ya ta// tsan dam ldong ros skyer pa dang //

371b1(gso rig): nas ni rims kyis ni// sgra ni dal gyis dbyung bar bya// klung+ga rgyas 'dzag la srog chags ni// gzhan gyi grad pa bcing bar bya// gzhan las zug rngu phyud+hA nas ni// rmA red re bu snum tsan+da gzhug/ phug ring kha ni chung bra dang //
371b2(gso rig): rma khar rnag dang khrag 'dzag la// 'khor los btsir ba'i til mar blugs// de ni sbu gu chung ngus btang // khong pa brtol to khrag gis gang // brgyal zhing snying ga rtsibs logs na// rims 'debs lus tsha lho sngo skom/

371b4(gso rig): khrag tu yang ni skyug par byed// shin tu shes cher lto sbom zhing // gzer nad kyis kyang gnos par byed// zhu ba'i gnas na gnas pa'i khrag/ gzer bcas lus ni lci bar byed// lte bya man chung grang ba dang // bu ga las
371b5(gso rig): kyang khrag 'byung 'gyur// gnas ni zhig par ma gyur kyang // khrag ni 'dzag par gyur pa yis// bu go lus ni 'gengs byed de// lgang po'i ngos nas 'gengs dang 'dra// khrog nad yod pa de la ni// sag grang zhing dbun grang zhing //

372a1(gso rig): gyi// khu ba snum ni med pa dang // nas thug kha zlas bza' ba dang // lce myang tsha dang ldan pa sbyin// khrag ni mang du 'dzag pa dang // khyong ba snad la khrag blug bya// rgyu ma 'byar dang chad pa nyen// khong pa

372a5(gso rig): mgul ba mnye ba dang // chu yis kyang ni gtor bar bya// de ltar rgyu ma nang zhugs nas// de yi tshe na betsir bar bya// rma kha chung dang sbom pa yi sI// rgyu ma khong bar ma chung na// de yi tshang tsam lto bar ni// bkrol te nang du /

372b1(gso rig): par bya// de nas dan+da til mar dang // sbyar ba'i 'o ma dro 'jom blud // des ni bshad pa snyi ba dang // rlung ni bde bar 'byung bar 'gyur// ji skad bshad pa'i spyod pa bsrung // lho gcig bar du 'bad par bya// lho las tshul ni byung
372b2(gso rig): gyur no// thal ba 'am ni sa bdag gom// ro bsko ba yi rtsa ba drag/ zhig tu btag pra btab nas ni// de nas srang bu dam+ba du bcing // sman pa mkhas pras bsod par bya// mtshon rnon med la bsregs po yis// lan cig khe nA
372b3(gso rig): gcad par bya// gzhan du byas nas gcod pa'i tshe// na zhing spo ba 'am 'chi bar 'gyur// sbrang rtsi bcas pa rma bcings la// kha zas zhu nas 'o ma mar// dan+ti rgya skyegs gze ma dang // shing mngar kha ra bskol ba blung // shing

372b5(gso rig): bon ser po gnyis// u shi ra dang shing mngar bcas// bskol ba 'phral gyi rma la ni// 'tsho bar byed pa'i dam par bshad// mtshon gyis bsnun pas mi mngon pa// g.yang sa mthon po nas lhung ba// rlung mkhris 'joms
