377a1(gso rig): gdab// rma skyes pa la re thag bcad// zug rngu chung ba'i cho ga bzhin// zug rngu chung ste srin 'joms pa'i// bza' dang byug pa spyad par bya// glan dugs sbu gu can la sogs// rlung chos
377a2(gso rig): legs sbyar nad la phan// ko tshags 'dra dang thams cad la// ba lang dogs dang kun tu bzang // gzhor phyed pa dang gzhol gyis bya// btags te nye bar sbyor bar bya// dngosu 'debs par byed pa'i mtshon// ba lang
377a3(gso rig): dogs zhes bya bar bshad// kun tu gtong ba kun tu bzang // spos la gcod pa gzhol phyed pa// ngos gnyisu ni gzhol gyis bya// 'dzag pa'i lam ni ma lus par// thams cad me yis bsreg par bya// slar yang
377a4(gso rig): 'di lta'i gnod mi bskyed// sman bas de yi bar bor du// de yi lto spyang la 'bang bya// byi lo'i rus pa 'bras bu gsum// khu ba lde gur byas pa bsku// dzo ti sle ti ma la s+phu// bu sman+da pAka ki sha li// dur b+h+r-id pa ti pa
377a5(gso rig): tra kaHkA ra bI ra sra rtsi pog/ shu dag su ra shi ra dang // arga'i lo ma til morA bskol// mtshan par rdol la bskus nas ni// 'di ni phan byed mchog tu bshad// shing mngar seng pr-im pi pi ling // sug smel r-i ru ka dang /
377a6(gso rig): ser po gnyis dang pri yang ku// rgyam tsha thal tres shug pa dang // pad+ma'i snying po da da ki/ pra tshil ru rta sra rtsi pog/ kha lung 'o mar btsos pa dang // til mar lhan cig bskol ba yis// bskus na 'brum bu mdze dang ma
377b1(gso rig): gcin nang sbrang rtsi 'dra ba 'joms// bi TA ka'i snying 'bras bu pa sum// ki pi ling rtsa pi pi ling // sbrang rtsi til mar sbyar ba yi// lde gu zos na srin bu'i nad// mtshan mar rdol dang mdze yi nang // gcin snyi ba dang smin pa dang //
377b2(gso rig): rma 'khyams 'tsho bar byed pa yin// sle tris sug smen bi nI ka/ dug mo nyung dang ba ru ra// skyu ru ra dang a ru ra// gu gul rim gyis cha re bskyed// sbrang rtsi rA sbyar ba 'dri zos naM// 'brum bu sdom dang mtshan mar brdol// nad ni sel//
377b3(gso rig): bar byed pa yin// pau pi ling dang tsi tr-i ke/ bya nAM ka dang dug mo nyung // cha mnyam phyed kyi 'bras bu gsum// kun dang cha mnyam gu gul dang // sbrang rtsi ro sbyar ba'i lde gu yis// nang no thams cang 'joms par byed // gu
377b4(gso rig): gul srang lnga pi pi ling // 'bras bu gsum ni srang re dang // shing tshwa sug smel-i zho gnyis gnyis// sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu ni// zos na mtshan pa brdol ba dang // mdze dang skar nang 'joms par byed// de nyid dang ni
377b5(gso rig): bca' sga'i bya// legs par bsres par gyur pa dang // rtsa ba bcu pa'i khu ba bsres// mchog tu rlung ki nad sel byed // seng ldeng snying po sa bu gsuM gyi phye// a sa na bskol khu ba dang bsres dang // cha ma'om gu gul sbrang
377b6(gso rig): lde gu byas// mdze 'brum gcin snyi mtshan par brdol nad sel// 'di ni mtshan par brdol gso'i bye brag bshing // sman gyi mtshan nyid lhag ma gang yin pa// rma yi dbang byas yongasu bsten pa dang // gso thabs
378a1(gso rig): dgos pa legs par brtags te sbyar// rta zhon stobs 'gyed shugs ni 'gegs pa dang // chang 'thungs nyal po ma zhu ma goms dang // drag shul las ni sna tshogs rma 'drubs nA// lo
378a2(gso rig): gcig par ram de las lhag pa spang // yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas rmen bu dang thor bu dang rkang bam dang 'bras kyi phreng ba'i
378a3(gso rig): nad dmigs bshad par bya'o// nad ni bad kan shas che ba// khrag dang sha dang tshil la brten// zlum zhing mtho bar skrangs pa de// mdud pa 'dra bas rmen bur bshang// de ni nad gzhi sha khrag tshil// rus rtsa rma las gyur ba
378a4(gso rig): dgu/ de las rlung 'gyur rgya che zhing // zug cing bye ba snyam sems na// gnas nas gnas gzhan dag tu 'pho// rgyu med par ni 'phel zhing 'bri// 'jam zhing lgang pA lta bur rgyas// brtol na khrag ni sla ba 'dzag/ mkhris gyur
378a5(gso rig): tshwa zhing mdog ser la// dmar zhing myur du smin pa yin// brtol na khAg ni dron mo 'dzag/ bad kan las gyur nadI med sra// reg na grang zhing dkar la gra ya'o// smin na rnag ni ska ba 'dzag/ nad 'khrugs khrag las gyur
378a6(gso rig): rmen bu// srin bu dang ni bcas par gyur// shi dang rtsa la gnas pa yi// rmen bu tshor ba chung ba dang // mkhris pa'i mtshon nyid 'dra ba yin// shas che'i gnod 'gyur shi las ni// sha bskyed zas la rmen bu 'byung // snum
378b1(gso rig): zhing che la sra ba dang // rtsa yis khyab cing bad kan 'dra// tshil bskyed pa yis tshil 'phel ba// sha pags bar du phyin gyur pa// rlung gi rmen bu shin tu snum// 'jam dang brtan par byed pa yin// bad kan dang ni mtshan nyid
378b2(gso rig): mtshungs// lus 'phel 'bri bo mtshungs pa yin// de brtol tshol mthug dmar ba dang // dkar dang gnag pa 'dzag par 'gyur// rus pa chag dang snying pa la// mtho dang dma' bor 'gyur ba de// rus pa'i rmen bu zhes
378b3(gso rig): bya'o// rkang gis song ba 'am drag shul gyis// dub par gyur na chu brgal bas// rlung gis rtsa yi khrag bcas pas// rlung gis btsir te 'khums nas ni// yon por byas te bskams pa dang // mig 'phar nad nyung rmen bu
378b4(gso rig): chags// de ni rtswa yi rmen bur bshad// rma ni ma 'drubs 'drubs ma thag/ ro ni thams cad zos gyur pa 'am// rlon pa spyis ma med pa 'am// yang na lus ni snang gyur pa'am// rlung ni nad khrag ma phyung ba// rma sbyang rma ni bsrubs
378b5(gso rig): pa las// che zhing g.ya' dang bcas gyur pa// rma yi rmen bur de bshad// gsor rung nad gzhi khrag tshol gyur// sra zhing 'gyur dang sbom pa dang // gnad dang mgul pa lhor gnas yin// mdud bu cher tshogs thor bu ste//
378b6(gso rig): rmen bu de yi mtshan nyid can// nad gzhi la sogs gyur drug yin// phal cher bad kan tshil rgyas yin// brtan pas smin par mi 'gyur// rtsa la gnas pa'i khrag nad kyis// 'khum spa yi ni gnod 'gyur zhing // smin pa
379a1(gso rig): de tshe rgyas byar 'gyur// sha yi myur sa khyab gyur cing // skyes pa de las nad khrag ni// rgyun mi 'chad par mang du 'dzag/ de ni khrag gi thur bu yin// de las sha khrag las gyur spang // bzhi po
379a2(gso rig): gzhan dag gso bar bya// dang por chu sor gnas pa 'am// ro smad la brten bod kan rgyas// sha khrag nad kyis rkang pararA ni// dusu skrangs par byed 'gyur zhing // rim gyis stug po nyid du 'gyur// de ni rkang bam zhes
379a3(gso rig): bya'o// rlung gyur gas shing gnag pa dang // rgyu med na zhing rtsub cing na// mkhris par gyur la ser ba dang // tshe dang rims kyis 'debs pa dang // bod kan snum lci na tshabs chung // sha yi 'dzer bu chen pos khyab// de ni
379a4(gso rig): myong du 'dzag pa dang // lo gcig 'das pa spang bar bya// kha cig lag pa sna dang mchu// rna ba rkang pa ltar 'byung zer// rkang bam skyes par gyur pa de// rlan can gnas su mi bzang skye// nad ni tshil mgrin 'jing ba
379a5(gso rig): mig/ mchan khung chu sno gnas pa dag/ mdog 'dra sr-i zhing snum pa dang // bi r+t+ta skyu ru ra 'dra dang // gting zug 'bras ni cher 'byung ba// ring zhig lon nas smin par byed // de las kha cig nad med smin// kha cig
379a6(gso rig): 'dzag dang g.ya' ba yin// kha cig bskams shing kha cig skyes// yun ring du ni gnas par byed// du rba bzhin du 'bri zhing 'phel// 'brum chen 'bras chen zhes bya'o// de ni rim bcas skyug pa dang // cham lung
379b1(gso rig): rtsib logs zug pa spang // rma la mi 'phrod bsten pa yis// skrangs dang smin pa khyad par med// sha sogs nang du rnag zhugs 'gyur// ring du 'gro bar byed pa yin// de ni ring du 'gro blas 'gro/ sbubs ltar 'dzag pa sA
379b2(gso rig): gu yin// drang po sbu gu gcig yin te// de nyid sna tshogs 'gro bas 'gro/ de ni nad ga wI re re 'dus// zug rngu'i rgyus 'byung lngar 'gyuraro// rlung 'gyur nad bcas rma sgo phra// mdog mi sdug cong lbu ba 'jig/ nub mo
379b3(gso rig): lhag par 'dzag pa yin// mkhris gyur skom dad rims kyis 'debs// ser dro nag ni dri mnam 'dzag/ nyin par lhag par 'dzeg pa yin// bad kan ska zhing sbyin bag 'dzag/ g.ya' zhing sra bar gyur pa dang // mtshan//
379b4(gso rig): maumo lhag par 'dzag pa yin// 'dus rgyur mtshan ma kun ldan sbyang // nang na gnas bu'i zug rngu ma phyung zhing // sbu gu skyes par gyur pa gang yin de// lnga ba can la smra zhing dro ba dang // lhag bcas rnag ni nang bcas
379b5(gso rig): rtag tu 'byung // yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtswa dgu pa'o// / de nas rmen bu la sogs pa'i nad gso ba bshad par bya'o// rmen bu ma smin pa la ni// rang
379b6(gso rig): rang skrangs pa'i nad ltar gso// kaN+Da ka ri bri ha tI// tsi tra ka dang po pi ling // bskol ba'i mar gyis lus sbyang bar// 'dod pa dag ni snum 'chos bya// sbyang byas sman rno lde gu bsku// rmon bu lan mang dugs byas te/
380a1(gso rig): yang dang yang du mnye bar bya// 'di ni mchog tu rlung la bya// khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'ang // gtA ra ga bsil ba'i sbyor kun bya// bad kan las gyur rlung ltar gso// 'on kyang smin+da na de
380a2(gso rig): bcad de// khrag yod pa ni mes bsregs bya// mA lus par bcad lus gyur na// slar yang 'phel bar byed par 'gyur// sha yi rma las gyur rmen bu// de bzhin 'tsho ba tsam du bya// tshil las gyur pa'ang 'di nyid dang //
380a3(gso rig): til dang 'o ma'i lde gus bsku// ras ni nyis rim dag gis dkri/ thong lcags la sogs bsregs pas gso// yang na mtshon gyis dral nas ni// tshil byung nas ni legs par bsreg/ rtsa yi thor bu sar pa la//
380a4(gso rig): sa ha ra tsa'i til mer blugs// rlung 'joms sman gyiswa dkri dugs bya// 'jam rtsi dang ni gter ga gdab// thor bu smin bu lta bur ni// rang gi ji bzhin byas rab phran// rkang bam rlung gyur 'phel ba la// snum zhing
380a5(gso rig): dugs byas lci ba dang // long mo'i sor gnyis gong du ni// gtA ra ga gdab par bya ba dang // e raN+Da mar 'o mA dang // bi gcin sbyar ba zla gcig blud// zhu nus 'bru snying bca' sga dang // 'o ma dang sbyar kha zasti sbyin//
380a6(gso rig): de bzhi ni dur byed 'o ma blung // des ma zhi na mis bsreg bya// mkhris gyur long mo'i 'og tu ni// khrag dbyung mkhris pa sel kun sbyar// bad kan las gyur mthe bo las// khrag gtar nas kyi kha zas ni// sbrang rtsi bcas
380b1(gso rig): pa'i sman khu brud// 'phel ba'i tshe na pi bi lIng // a ru ra ni bstan par bya// yungs kar 'bri ha ti gnyis kyi// rtsa ba'i lde gus byug par bya// yang na 'u su'i lde gus byug/ 'bras kyi phreng ba steng 'og nas// sbyang zhing ngan+da dra baM
380b2(gso rig): tI dur byid kau sha ta ki dang // de ba ta la'i mar bskol blung // bad kon+da tshil ni 'joms pa yi// durba sa mkhur bkang sna sman btang // gtar gas khrag ngan dbyung ba dang // skyer pa khaN+Das gcin yang brud// rmen bu ma
380b3(gso rig): smin pa l-i ni// rgyam tshwa bca' sga nA gu li// bsku zhing sra ba rgyam che yi// thum bus dugs bya mnye bar bya// shwa mi la bug shri kru yi// sa bon nas dang yungs kar bcas// dA ra bar skyur po btags bskus na// rmen bu'i
380b4(gso rig): mdud pa zhu bar byed// smin par 'phrigs na khrag dbyung zhing // bad kan mkhris pa sel bas so// ma smin pa ni phyung nas kyang // thal sman me btsas gso bar bya// dzA ti sh+ma tI laM kA l-i'i// shu ka na sa'i 'bras bu dang // ka ka
380b5(gso rig): tik+ta karko ti// dau ba ta la'i sa bon+da dang // bi shwa lwa dang ni rkun+ti// kro sha ta kA'i pa ta rnams// srang nI phye dang dug zho gnyis// karany+dza yi mar bre grang // nir gun+ti yau khu ba ni// bre bzhi bskol bar gyur pa 'di'i// btung dang
380b6(gso rig): bsku byug snar btang na// 'bras kyi phreng ba gsor mi rung // yun ring lon shing rnag 'dzag sel// la kau li yi sdong bu yi// lde gu til mar de bzhi 'gyur// ni raraM kun+ti yi khu bar bskol// sna sman sogs btang 'bras phreng sel/
381a1(gso rig): tsan dan thang shing na le sham// dur bying gla skad ser po gnyis// srang re dug ni srang phyed dang // pa gcin sbyar te zhib tu btags// b+hUm+b+hi'i khu ba arga yi// lo ma bA lang lci khur bcas// yungs mar bre gang
381a2(gso rig): bcas bskol ba// btung ba la sogs par bsten na// mdze dang rma ni 'khyims pa dang // 'bras kyi phreng bau myur du sel// shu dog rgya skyegs a ru ra// pu tsi shel dang tsan ngan dang // til mar bskol ba blud ni ni// 'bras phreng
381a3(gso rig): rtsa ba bcas pa sel// sha ra pung+ga'i rtsa ba ni// 'bras kyi chu dang btagaso gyur pa// sna sman bsku bas 'brum bu dang // dug srin 'bras kyi phreng ba 'joms// u dum ka ri'i rtsa ba dang // pi lu'i lo ma seng phrom dang // swa ha ra
381a4(gso rig): tsaShI a ru ra/ shing mngar shu ti tsi tra kA/ thang shing til maR+Sha 'o ma mnyam// sna sman bsku byug byas pa'ang phanra// ba lang rA lug rta rmig bsregs// yungs mAr sbyar te bsku ba 'amA// s+phul nug bya rogA rang nyid shi/ ing+ku
381a5(gso rig): tarni sbyar ba bsku// de ltar ma zho nad kyi ni// logs gzhan byin pA la gnas pa// chu so steng ma 'og nas ni// tshil phyung nas ni mes bsreg bya// gyen du 'gre ba'i rkang pa gzhal// de yi tshad kyi rting po ru// de la rmen+da bu dbyung
381a6(gso rig): bya zhes// drang srong mu khyud kyis bshad do// rting pa nas bzung sor ni bcu gnyis na// dbang po'i chu so yong spang nad kyi ni// g.yon du bral te nyo sgong 'dra dbus nas// dra ba drang zhes legs thos kyis bshad do// mi yi long mo
381b1(gso rig): rna ba'i bar du bzhag/ de yi brgyad pa btang ba'i chu bgos te// byin snying gAnd kyi drang thang ma gtogs dral// tshil ni dbyung bar bya zhes gzhan dag 'chad// rlung 'gyur sbu gu dugs byas la// dpral te a ba marga yi// sbu gus ti
381b2(gso rig): dedang rgyam tshor bcas// btags pa'i lde gu legs par bsgo// mkhris pa las gyur til dang btsod// nA ga dan+ti ser po gnyis// bang kan las g+hur rgya ma tshwa ti la// dan+da nim+ba lan ches bskus// zug rngu las byung dral
381b3(gso rig): dbyung // til dang mAr dang sbrang rtsis bskus// mtshan dral mi rung chu tshod kyis// legs par btsal te nang du dbug/ thal sman la spangs skud pa yis// rma tshol kha ni shes tshwar dral// rma red kha ni dog pa dang // phug ring la
381b4(gso rig): yang sbyar bar bya// ring bu gang dang til mar gang // de ni 'khyims pa la yang bsngags// e raN+Da 'bras lde gus bsku// sbu gu'i rma sbyong byed mchog yin// rgya shugs 'bras bu'i shun pa dang // lan tshwa rgya skyegs bcas pa dang
381b5(gso rig): skra go ro zho shi'i lo ma dang // prI yaM ku dang nu zho dang // Argi sU hA'i 'o mar sbyar// reng bus rma 'khyims myur 'tsho ba byid// rgya mtsho'i cha dong rtsabs ru tsha// lho myang tshwa ni legs par bsregs// skra gor zho sha khyim dung pA/
381b6(gso rig): i mra ta ka seng ldeng gi/ lo ma btsir nas skyer pa gnyis// lde gus bsku ba sogs bsten nau// bag med mi brten skyes bu yi// 'byor pa bzhin du 'grib par byed// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus po las// phyi ma'i
382a1(gso rig): gnas kyi le'u sum cu pa'o// // de nas nad phra mo'i dmigs shes par bya ba bshad par bya'o// bad rlung las gyur 'brum phran ni// snum zhing mdog 'dra mdud pa can//
382a2(gso rig): nad med mung+ga 'dra ba ni// byis pa las skyes ra'i 'gram pa// de gnyis las byung shar gnas zug/ nas 'dra nAs shel bya ba yin// 'bras byer zlum po rtse mo med// rnag nyung stug mtho 'bras byer yin//
382a3(gso rig): rmen bu lnga 'am drug 'byung zhing // rus sbal ltar mthu rus sbrul yin// rna ba'i steng na kun tu ni// 'brum pran sra zhing mi bzod na// ut+pal rtsa 'dra pa na sa// skrangs shing cung zad na la brtan// 'gram pa'i mtshams
382a4(gso rig): su de gnyis las// 'byung ba rdo yi bung bu yin// shal+lA la yi tshur ma 'dra// 'brum phran nad bcas mthug mo ni// nang na tshil yod lang cho lnga// 'byung ba bzhin ni ma rungs byed// badra kan rlung gyur pad+ma yi// tsher ma
382a5(gso rig): 'dra bas khyab 'gyur zhing // dkar zhing nud ni med pa dag/ pad+ma'i tsher ma can zhes bya// mkhris pa las gyur 'brum phran lum// u dum ra'i 'byas smin 'dra// shas chero tsha zhing rims 'debs byed// gas pa
382a6(gso rig): kha bye zhes bya'o// lus kyi rnams dad gdong la ni// tsha zhing nad dang rims bskyed cing // sran chung tsam la de'i mdog can// 'brum phran mthug po sran chung yin// de bas 'brum bu nad tshabs che// sdug bsngal

382b3(gso rig): can zhes ni grags pa yin// tsha ba'i rdul gyis lus brdungs la// 'brum phran nad bcas stug mo ni// dbyibs dang tshad mdog skye tshe 'dra// de ni skye tsha zhes bya'o// mkhris pa shas che'i nad kyis ni// me dpal lta
382b4(gso rig): bur ngal gyis mched// skrangs shing sman la srab cing dmar// rims bskyod dra ba'i bum bu'i yin// mkhris pa shas che'i 'brum bu ni// rims bskyed sha l-i gnod byed pa// mchan khung phyogasu me'i mdog can//
382b5(gso rig): 'dra ba de nI me bskyed yin// zhag lnga 'am ni zhag bdun nam// zla ba phyed de srog 'phrog byed// nad gzhi gsum skyes 'brum bu zlum// nam tshong yan chad skyes sa 'khor// mtshan khung chu sau bi da ri// rtsa ba ltar sra
382b6(gso rig): bi ta ri// tshil dang bad kan las gyur ba'i// rmin bu rtsa rgyus sha li gnas// brtol na mar bzhag sbrang rtsi 'dra// 'dzag gyur de la rlung shas che// sha skam rmen bur byas nas ni// bsreg ma lta bur skyed par byed// khrag
383a1(gso rig): ni dri mnam brnags pa dang // kha dog sna tshogs 'byung ba yi// nad kyi de la khrag 'dzag pa// de ni 'brum bu gseg ma dang // lag pa rkang mthil tshigs dang ni// nam tshong yan chad grog
383a2(gso rig): ma yi// mgo ltar rim gyi rmen bu ni// phra mo mang pos khyab byed pa// na zhing tshwa la g.ya' zhing 'drul// kun tu skyes te grog ma'i mgo/ rkang mthil bshag mas brud pa'am// tsher ma sogs kyis snad pa yi// 'brum

383a4(gso rig): gzhang 'gags pa zhes bya bar 'dod// rlung mkhris kyis ni sen mo yi// nang gi ga smin nad bskyed pa// ma snang nang dang tshim pA dang // nye ba'i son mo zhes bya'o// snang pas brnags shing rtsub pa dang // sra bau sen mo ngan
383a5(gso rig): zhes bya// 'dam ni gnod byed la reg nas// nang na g.ya' zhing rnag bcas pa// sor mo'i 'bras byer zhes bya'o// pags pa til 'dra gnag pa la// nang med 'byung 'gyur rme ba ste// de nyid 'bur ba mdzer pa yin//
383a6(gso rig): mdzer pa las kyang chen por 'gyur// dkar nag pags pa'i mdzer pa yin// de 'dra'i 'brum bu skyes pa ni// dmar po rgya sgyogs nor bu yin// dkar ba 'am gnag par lhan cig skyes// zlum pa 'am mtshan ma zhes
383b1(gso rig): bya'o// mya ngan khro dang rlung mkhris sogs// 'khrugs te gdong ni srab 'gyur zhing // thig le nag pa ba shig can// gdong la gzhan 'byung khabs zhes bya// rlung 'gyur ba shig rtsub par snang // reg na rtsub cing
383b2(gso rig): gnag pa yin// mkhris gyur mtha' ma cung zad sngo// bad kanA las mtha' dkar la g.ya'// khrag gyur mtha' ma zangs mdog can// skam zhing tsha ba tsog cag byed// rlung gis bad kan slongs gyur pa// pags
383b3(gso rig): par phyin te bskams gyur pa// de las pags pa skye 'gyur zhing // rim gyis tshor ba med 'gyur la// graya' ba chung zhing 'drul ba med// bem po de ni tshor med yin// skyug sman nyes dang ma zhu dang // bad mkhris
383b4(gso rig): lus la granas skyongs pas// rab g.yar zlum po ri g+hor gor po// dmar po mang du 'byung 'gyur zhing // rjes 'brel ldan pa zlum por bshad// de ltar nad ni phra mo yi// dbye ba sum cu drug tu bstan// yan lag
383b5(gso rig): brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu gcig pa'o// / de nas nang phra mo gso ba bshad par bya'o// ra yi 'gram pa ma smin pa// srin bu pad+mas khrag dbyung zhing // nas 'dra
383b6(gso rig): dugs ni byas nasu// thang shing ru rta l+r-ing ros dang // ba bla'i lde gu bskus te bzhu// rdo yi bung bu'ang de ltar gso// smin pa ra 'gram rma ltar gau so// bzhin gnod seng phrom 'u su dang // shu dag btags pa'i lde gu 'am//
384a1(gso rig): n+ya gro d+ha yi lo ma 'am// rgya sbyar lo ma tsha sbyar bsku// des ma zhin skyug sman dang // sna sman dpral bar gtar ga gdab// pad+ma'i tshe ra ma nim+ba yi// khu ba 'am nim pa mar bskol bar// sbrang rtsi
384a2(gso rig): dang ni bcas pa blung // ni pa dong ga sbyar ba byug/ kha byo sogs nas rdo bong bu re// sa bskor bcas pa mkhris pa yi// me dpal lta bur gso bar bya// me bskyed pa ni spang bar bya// dra ba'i bong bu sbyang ba dang // gtar
384a3(gso rig): ga gdab dang rtsub chos dang // lus kyi sbyang ba skyu ru ro'i// sbyor ba'i bsil sman byug pas gso// bi da ra la khrag gtar zhing // bad kan rmen bu lta bur goso// gsig ma lto bu'i 'brum phran li// tshil gyi rmen bu
384a4(gso rig): lta bur gso// grog ma'i mgo 'dra bu ga maung // cher skyes skongs shing gnad la gnas// rkang pa lag pa byung ba spang // cig shos la ni khrag phyung la// rgyam che dong ka'i sle tres dang // ci co rgya sran rtsa ba dang // dan+taM
384a5(gso rig): til btags nas phye bsku// smin pa la ni nad can sha/ thams cad legs par sbyar bar bya// mtshon gyis bcad la de rjes la// thal sman yang na me yis bsreg/ mdzer ba 'dra la btsags bu yis// ma lus
384a6(gso rig): bcad la snum gyis bsreg/ gzhang 'gags pa la nor bu ni// 'gags pa lta bur gso bar bya// nye ba'i sen mo sbyang ba yis// tsha ba bsal te mtshon gyis gso// sen mo ngan la'ang de bzhin bya// rkang pa'i chu ser ngag
384b1(gso rig): la yang // 'bras bu skyur po nag tshurar+ya bcas// tilA dang 'gi wAng nim+ma yi// lho ma'i lde gus bslu bar bya// rme ba mdzer pa bcwaswa pa ni// me shel thal sman ngag gis bsreg/ yang na me btsa' gdab par bya//
384b2(gso rig): de bzhin pags mdze ra rgya skyegs nor// mtshon gyis bcad de de bzhin gso// mtshan ma can sogs gsum po la// nye ba'i phyogs la gtar ga gdab// 'o ma can shing myu gu shun// 'o ma btags pos
384b3(gso rig): bsku bar bya// ngo shig ardzu na'i shun pa'am// btsod dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba yi// lde gu 'am ga tAr gar dmigs pa ni// bsregs pa'i snag tsha mar sbyar bsku// tsan dan dramar po btsong dang ni// ru rta seng phrom
384b4(gso rig): pri yaM ku/ sra chung n+ya gro d+ha myu gu/ lde gus ngo shig sel byed cing // bzhin mdangs gsal bar byed pa yin// zi ra gnyis dang til nag dang // yungs kar 'o mar bcas pa ni// btags pa'i lde gus gdong bskus
384b5(gso rig): ni// ngo shi ga sel zhing zla 'drar byed// sran chung phub mo med brngos la// 'o ma sbrang rtsi mar btogs bsku// tsher ma rno ba'i shAl+la li// 'o mar btags nas bskus na phan// rgya shug tshog gu bu ram bcas// sbrang
384b6(gso rig): rtsi ri bong khrag sbyar bsku// ru rto kha lung khu ba yi// nang spangs sbrang rtsir bcas pa 'am// rkang mar rtsa bar ra'i 'o ma// sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i lde gu'ang phan// rkang mar rtsa ba ba lang rus// spang rtsa mar dang bcos
385a1(gso rig): pa bsku// 'dzamA bu a mA'i lo ma drang // ser po rnam gnyis zho kha chu// bu ram sAr ba sbyar ba 'am// tin+tu ka yi lo mA yI// khu bar btags pa mdog gsal byed// ut+pal sngo dang ru rtA dang
385a2(gso rig): tsan+da dAn ser po pri yaM ku/ rgya shug tshig gu'i lde gu yis// gdong ni bskus shing dril gyur na// pad+ma'i mdog dang 'dra bar byed// sman ni 'di dag btags pa dang // shing mang rA dang bcas bskol snum ni// nad

390b3(gso rig): tshan nyer shing dang // pa ru sha ka rgun 'brum dang // bi la ya dang ba bla gnyis// shing mngar zho ni gnyis gnyis phye// bskol te bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi dang // pi pi ling ni srang brgyad brgyad// ka ra dkar po srang bcu gzhug
390b4(gso rig): de las srang ni phyed phyed sbyin// mngal khrag khu ba'i nad sel zhing // ro ce bu skyed byed mchog yin// glo rdol zad byed khrag mkhris dang // lud pa dbugs mi bde ba dang // mig ser rlung dang khrag dang ni// me dpal dang ni snying
390b5(gso rig): nad dang // rjed byed kyis nyon du rgan dang // myos dang skem byed 'joms par byed// de bzhin 'o ma zhun mar dang // 'tsho byed sde chen bskol ba ni// bu bskyed mkhris pa las gyur pa'i// mngal nad sel ba'i dam pa yin//
390b6(gso rig): brabla bri ni sum tsu gnyis// bskol ba til mar mar bre bzhi// 'o ma bzhi 'gyur pi pi ling // ka ka na si ka ra dkar// dzi biM tI dang ram nye ba// sti ra nye shing zi ra gnyis// mon sran dri'u pa yas sa// mA Sha par+Ni sra ba ni// pi lu'i lo
391a1(gso rig): ma lhan cig bskol// blud na rlung mkhris las gyur pa'i// mngal nad sel zhing bu skyed byed// khrag gi mngal nad khrag mdog las// rjesu 'brel pa brtags nas kyang // nad bzhi bsags pa'i tshul
391a2(gso rig): las nI// khrag bcad pa yi sman btAng bya// shing mngar sbrang rtsi chu shing rtsa// ta lA'i sa bon skyer pa'i rtsa// pr-i yang ku dang 'bras bkrus chu// sbyar ba blud na khrag 'dzeg pa// mdog sgyu dmar po sel ba byed// ba tA 'dzam bu a
391a3(gso rig): mr-i da// tshig khu dang ni brag zhun dang // skyer ba khaN+Da aM baM shr-I// btsod dang shal+lA m+ba li'i thang chu// dug mo nyung ga shun pags dang // gur gum bil+li bo nga dkar// seng phrom bla sgang btsag yug snam// shing mngar tsan dan dmar
391a4(gso rig): po dang // kat+pal dang tsa mi ka/ ka to ga dong dug mo nyung // byi tshir ba dang da da kaM/ mi du kA dang steng zil ni// skar ma rgyal la bab pa nA// btus shing btags pa sbrang rtsi dang // 'bras kyi chu sbyar blung na ni// gzhang 'brum tshang par
391a5(gso rig): 'khru ba dang // gang yang khrag tu 'khru ba dang // gang yang srin bu'i nang rnams dang // byis pa'i nad gang yin pa 'joms// mngal ni nad dang zla mtshan nang // gnag cing dkar dang dmar gsol// phye ma rgyal gyi rjes 'gro ba// phan
391a6(gso rig): sa rgyun shes bu yis bsngags// bad kan las gyur mngal nad la// rtsub dang dro ba'i sman kun sbyar// skyu ru ra'i lo da da ki/ shing mngar ut+pal lig bu mig/ 'dzam bu a mra tshig gu dang // seng phrom sa nag kat+sa la// se'u 'bru
391b1(gso rig): shIng tshwa tin+tu kA/ u dum+bA ra bil+la bzhon// zho ni gnyis gnyis btags pa'i phye// ra gcin 'o ma nyis 'gyur dang // til mar bre gang bskol bar bya// de bskus pa dang 'jam rtsi dang // ras bal ye 'usra gzhug par bya// skrangs
391b2(gso rig): shing phyir ldog mtho zhing sra// de bzhin sbyin bag 'dzag pa dang // phyir 'bur nang du zhum pa dang // 'brum bu gzer dang bcas la phan// nas zon a ru re'i sbyar chang // bu ram chang dang til mar bsten// pi pi li dang
391b3(gso rig): lcags phye dang // a ru ra sbyor sbrang rtsi pha nau// nag tshur rgyam che 'bras bu gsum// a mra 'dzam bu'i tshig gu bcas// da da ki phye sbrang rtsir sbyar// sprin bag 'dzag pa dag par byed// rgya skyegs 'dzam bu da da ki/ so ma ra dza la lang
391b4(gso rig): gi/ sra rtsi pog gi phye ma yis// dri mI zhim dang sbyin bag 'dzag/ brnags shing sra ba sel bar byed// dong ka la sogs sde tshon no// bskol ba'i khu ba thug par bya// swa zhing rtsub par gyur pa la// mnyen pa'i cho ga bya ba dang //
391b5(gso rig): sha brdungs pa yi glan pa dang // kri sa ra dwang 'o thug gzhug/ dri nga til mar dri zhim pa'am// l-I gu dri zhim bsku ba 'am// dri zangs kun gyi phye ma 'am// rul po'i dr-i ni sel byed gzhug/ bang kan can la phal cher sman// tsha
391b6(gso rig): ba ba gcin nas btang phan// mkhris pa shing mngar 'o mar bcas// rlung 'gyur sbyar bcas til mar phan// 'dus pa las gyur nad la ni// thun mong gis ni gso ba phan// de ltar mngal ni dag gyur na// sa bon skyon
392a1(gso rig): med tha mal bar// rnam par shes pa 'jug pas na// bud med la ni bu chags 'gyu ro// skyes pa yi ni dbang po yang // las rnams lnga yis dag bya zhing // mdog las nad bzhi brtags nas ni// nang
392a2(gso rig): bcas de 'joms sman gyi gso// ru rta rgya skyes shing mngar btsod// 'bras bu gsum dang ka ra dkar// shing mngar me da ser po gnyis// la la phud dang pu tse shel// shing kun ram nye pa ya s+ya// a kra ga d+ha nye'u shing pa//
392a3(gso rig): po ni gnyis gnyis btags pa'i phye// mAr bro gang dang 'o ma ni// bzhi 'gyur bcas pa bskol bar bya// blud na mngal dang khu ba yi// nyes pa thams cad sel byed cing // tshe ring lus ni rgyas byed la// yid gzhu e ya dang pa
392a4(gso rig): sa dang // bu skyed par ni byed mchog yin// 'bras bu'i sman mar zhes byur bshad// zla mtsha rgyu ldeng thungs gyur na// bu ni 'chi bar byed pa yang // 'tsho zhing sprul ma rnams la bsngags// 'di ni mchog tu brim pa
392a5(gso rig): lus rgyas gdon 'joms byed pa yin// yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// phyi mo'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// la
392a6(gso rig): bso ba'o yan lag rdzogs// / de nas dug nang gso ba bshad par bya'o// sngon ni lha dang lha ma yin// bdud rtsi 'dod pa bsrubs pa na// bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i sngon rol tu// skyes bu shin tu 'jig
392b1(gso rig): ba'i gzugs// mchi ba bzhi pa gzi brjid 'bar// skra ser mig ni me 'bar ba// de mthong 'gro ba sdug bsngal 'gyur// des na 'di ni dug ces bya// tshangs pa hUM zhes brjod pa dang // bslu ba'i bdag nyid can spangs te/
392b2(gso rig): gzugs de rgyu dang mi rgyu ba'i// gzugs la de ni zhugs par 'gyur// brtan dug nus pa mi bzod par// sdong bu la ni gnas pa gang // ka la gu ta dbang po'i bu// btsan dug haM la ha la sogs// rgyu ba'i dug ni mi
392b3(gso rig): bzang 'gyur// sbrul dang phag dang mche ba dang // rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba'i// bcos ma ma yin dug du bshad// bcos ma sna tshogs sman las ni// sbyar ba sbyar ba'i dug ces bya// de ni sbyor ba'i dbang las ni// shin tu
392b4(gso rig): ring nas gsod pa 'am// skrangs dang skya rbab chu rdzing dang // smyo byed gzhang 'brum la sogs bskyed// rno dro rtsub cing dang ba dang // khyab cing myur gsod yang po dang // 'dar zhi 'phral la ro mi gsal// 'ju bar mi
392b5(gso rig): byed pa yi ni// rno sogs yin tAn dang ldan pas// de ni mdongos las mgo bzlog yin// mig ni rlung mkhris shas che ba// srog ni 'phral du 'phrog par byed// dug gis mi lus phyin pa dang // dang por khrag la
392b6(gso rig): gnod par byed// bad kan mkhris pa rlung rjes la// nad gzhi grogs dang lhan cig 'byung // de nas snying la gnas nas ni// lus la gnod par byed par 'gyur// mi rgyu'i dug ni btang gyur na// lce nag lus ni
393a1(gso rig): rangs pa dang // brgyal dang sron dang sbubs dang ngal// gnas skabs dang po 'byung bar 'gyur// gnyis par 'dar zhing rdul pa da // tsha zhing lkog ma na ba dang // dug gri ma zhug rnga phyin na// snying ni na bar
393a2(gso rig): byed par 'gyur// gsuM pa rka ni bskams pa dang // ma thu'i gnas su shin tu gzir// de mig nyams chung ser ba dang // sbyangs pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang // zhu ba'i gnas phyin zug pa dang // skyigs bu lud pa rgyu ma 'khrugs//
393a3(gso rig): dug gi shugs ni bzhi pa la// mgo bo lhag par lci bar 'gyur// lnga par mchil snabs 'dzag pa dang // lha tshogs na bar 'byung 'gyur la// mdog mi sdug cing nad kun 'khrugs// zhu ba'i gnas kyi 'og tu na// drug
393a4(gso rig): par 'du shes nyams pa dang // shin tu 'khru bar byed par 'gyur// bdun pa phra gong sgal tshigs dang // dpyi tshigs bye na 'chi 'gyur yin// du gi shugs ni dang po la// smon zhing chu grang dag gis gtor// mar dang sbrang
393a5(gso rig): rtsir bcas pa yi// dug gi sman ni myur du blung // gnyis pa skyugs sman bkru sman btang // snga ma bzhin du dug sman blud// gsum par dug gi sman bud cing // de bzhin mig sman sna sman btang // bzhi pa snum dang bcas
393a6(gso rig): pa yi// dug gi sman ni btang na pan// lnga pa shing mngar khu ba dang // sbrang rtsi sbyar ba blud na pa na// drug pa 'khru ba lta bur gau so// bdun pa sna sran dud pa dang // spyi bor brgya gram byas nas ni// sha 'am khrag ni gzhugs par
393b1(gso rig): bya/ ko sha tA ki laM ka li// pa ta lcam ba a ru ra// sa lu sle tres shi ri sha/ gi ri gar+Ni yung ba dang // a hA sbrang rtsi ba sU ba// bri ha ti gnyis che ba gsum// sha ri ba dang ba bla sde// 'di rnams bskol ba'i khu ba dang //
393b2(gso rig): bskol ba'i nas thag bslangs par ni// sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas pa gzhugs// gnas skabs gzhan la dugs 'joms pa'i// sman dang gso ba thams cad bya// shing mngar tsan dan ma du ka/ pad+ma gre sar de
393b3(gso rig): bzhin bya// dngul rdo rgya spos ru rta dang // ba blu ldong ros pri yAng ku// tsha ba gsum dang 'bu su haM// nA ga puSh+pa ge sar bcas// shing mngar spyang spos ha re nu// 'gi wang mon sne'u rme ru dang // shi ri be Tha sr-i rtsi phog/
393b4(gso rig): shu ti gur gu ba bla dang // bal bu ta mi le'i lo ma// stag pA dang ni pu shel tse// ser po gnyis ni sbrang rtsir sbyar// bu mo khrus dang sbyang ba byas// gos dkar bgos pa byas nas ni// dge sbyong bram ze mchod byas te// dug/
393b5(gso rig): sman mchog ni sbyar bar bya// de tshe sman pas sngags 'di ni// bdag nyid bsdams te brjod par bya// skyes bu seng ge phyag 'tshalo// sred ming bu la phyag 'tshalo// ji ltar khyab 'jug g.yul dor ni// gzhan+da gyis pha ma par
393b6(gso rig): mi mthong ste// bden pa'i tshig ni 'di yis kyang // bdag la dug med grub par shog/ na mo bai DUr+ya ma dau// tu DU ra hu n+du ro rakA mA ma// sarba bi shre b+h+ya// gau r-I g+hat+tA ri// tsaN+DA li/ mA tau ki/ swA hA// 'thag pa'i sngags gnyis pa ni// ha ra
394a1(gso rig): mA ye swA hA// pa hA ri mA ye swA hA// / ma lus dug dang ro langs dang // gdon dang sdig pa'i las kun dang // gsod deng rang dang mu ge dang // 'thab par 'dod dang 'jigs pa la// sman
394a2(gso rig): dadung sna sman mig spyan bsku// gdu bu la sogs la sbyar ba// 'di ni zla shar zhes bya ste// zhi dang bde legs byed mchog yin// dug rnying dug sel smar zil ma na pa// nags me rlung dang nyi tshan gyis bskams pa'im/
394a3(gso rig): rang bzhin gyis ni yon tan mi ldan pas// nyams pa'i dug ces bya ba'i dug du 'gyur// 'di ni nus pa chung bas mi rtogs te// bad kan dang 'dres li ni mang por gnas// nges nyen gyur pa mdog ngan 'khru bar byed// nang
394a4(gso rig): khrag skom dang yi ga 'chus pas nyen// brgyal zhing smon la rnam rmongs skud 'dzer dang // dug gi dmu rdzing mtshan mas gnod par 'gyur// ma zhu'i gnas brtan ba kan rlung nang bskyed// zhu ba'i gnas dri mkhris dang rlung dag
394a5(gso rig): bskyed// mi yi yan lag zhigs shing skra 'byi bas// ji ltar bya ni spu btogs lta bur bskyed// dngas ma 'am khrag la gnas par byed na ni// lus zungs las byung nad ni sna tshogs bskyed// mdun gyi rlung dang ma zhu drang //
394a6(gso rig): yul dmus gnod zas nyin par nyal// lus gzungs gnod par byas pa na// de bas gnod pa'i dug ces bshad// gnod pa'i dug nyen dug bcas la// steng dang 'og nas sbyang bar bya// gnod pa'i dug ni sel ba'i sman//
394b1(gso rig): sbrad rtsi sbyar te lde gu sbyim/ pa~M pi ling dang bya ma ka/ spang spos seng brom sug spel dang // ku dan+ta trA sa rtsi ka/ ru rta shing mngar tsan+da dan dang // yug snum cag dang sbyar ba'i sman// gnod pa'i dug sel bya ba ste// gzhan yang zlog par byed pa
394b2(gso rig): po yin// dug mdos phog pas gyur pa dag/ yang dang yang du mun 'thibs byed// mdog ni li sdug gyur pa dang // myur du yid 'byung sdug bsngal 'thob// 'ongs ni srin bus khyab pa ltar// lus tsha tshag tshag por 'gyur ro// gdong mo
394b3(gso rig): rgyab dang phrag pa mgo// lbu tshogs rnam su na bar bgyi// khrig ni nang can gnag pa 'jig/ skom dang brgya le tsha rims kyis 'debs// mig ni gnag cing slon pa dang // rtad par lud par dbugs mi bde// rma dmar mtha' ma ser ba dang /
394b4(gso rig): dbus ni gnag cing shin tu na// 'phral du bskangs shIng brnags pa dang // sha yang nag por gyur nas ni// brnags shing shin tu 'drul bar byed// sprin bag can du 'jog par byed// gnAd du phog par ma gyur pa// myur du snying la phan
394b5(gso rig): byed bya// zug rngu phyung la lcags bsregs pas// rma ni legs par bsreg par bya'o// yanganga? na mung+ga ga dang ni// gi ri kArni dkar ba dang // kat+sa l-i yi shun pa dang // btsod dang shiR+YA bya rgod spen// bsregs pa'i thal bas bsku bar bya//
394b6(gso rig): shu ka na sa bong dkar// kaN+Da kA ri rtsi bas bsdu// dug 'thungs sos btab gso ba dag/ ci rigs par ni de la bya// rma yi sha ni brnags pa la// mkhris pa'i me dpal lte bur gso// bde phyir khyod la bu med dang // rgyal po le ni dkris
395a1(gso rig): bslabs te// zas dang sbyar ba'i dug bsres pa'i// nyen 'khor skye bo ster bar 'gyur// sna tshogs lus kyi dri mar bcas// mi mthun sman dang thal ba dang // nus pa chung bar 'gyur ba'i dug
395a2(gso rig): sbyar ba'i dug ni sbyar ma yin// des nyen mdog smyo ring pa dang // me drod nyams shing lung po dang // dbugs mi bde dang rims kyi nyen// rlung ni mi mthun rgyu ba dang // gnyid che yid ni zhum par byed// gcin snyi lto ba
395a3(gso rig): mchin pa dang // mtshar ba na zhing skad gsang dma'o// nyams chung skying ni zhan pa dang // skrangs shing rtag tu sba ba dang // rkang pa lag pa skam zhing zad// rmi lam du ni lce spyang dang // bI la sbrul dang ne'u li dang // spre'u mthong
395a4(gso rig): zhing phal cher ni// nags tshal mtsho ni bskams par mthong // bdag nyid nag por mthong 'gyur zhing // ser po nag por mthong bar byed// mig sna rna ba med pa dang // de yis dbang po nyams par mthong // 'di dang

395a6(gso rig): nas gser ni bsten bya zhing // mdo gnas bstan pa bzhin du bya// gser dang zangs kyi phye ma ni// sbrang rtsi kha ra dkar por sbyar// lde gus dug ni mi bzod pa// dbyig dug thams cad sel bar byed// murba sle tris
395b1(gso rig): pi bi ling // rgya spos dbyi mong pa to la// glu sga shu thag tsi tra kA/ bi da ka ni dar ba dang // chu dron zho kha chu sbyar ba// skyur khu dang sbyar blud na ni// dbyig dug gis bcom me drong sbyong // zur bA ma nu phug ron gyi// sha bskol
395b2(gso rig): khu ba bsgrangs pa yis// dbyig dug skom dad lung pa na// skyegs bu dbugs mi bde rims sel// dus kyi ring bzhin dus dang zas// nang gzhi lus zungs tshogs 'dus pa// dug gi nyam pa zhes bshad de// bkres
395b3(gso rig): skyom nyams ni chung ba dang // khro dang mya ngan 'jigs drang ngalA// ma zhu ba dang 'khru ba dang // mkhris pa rlung nI 'phel ba dang // til gyi me tog 'bras bu snum// sa yi rlangs pa 'brug sgra dang // gling bu pi thaM Dol
395b4(gso rig): mo yi// sgra dang mdun gyi ser bu dang // ut+pal dri dang myos pa yis// dug gi nyam nga 'phel bar byed// dbyar ni char gyi dus yin pas// bu ram lnga bur zan can 'gyur// lus la khyab byed dbyar 'das nas// ri yi
395b5(gso rig): 'char bas de med byeng // de bas sprin bral dus su ni// nus pa chung ba nyid du 'gyur// de ltar rang bzhin goms pa dang // gnas dus shugs stobs che chung ba// brtags te mkhas pas shes byas la// de rjes gso

396a1(gso rig): bska dang kha dang mngar ba dang // mar bcas kha zas sbyin pas gso// rlung gi bdag nyid can mngar dang // skyur dang lan tshwa mar bcas pa'i// bza' ba mar can bsku byug dang // de bzhin sha ni

396a3(gso rig): che la phan// bad kan gnas zhugs gso bar sla// mkhris pa'i gnas brten 'bad pas gso// rlung gi gnas su zhugs pa'i dug/ shin tu gso dka' gsor mi rung // yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las// /
396a4(gso rig): phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas sbrul gyis zin pa bshad par bya'o// mdor nas steng na ni sbrul// gsum+ba ste gdengs kA can lus 'khyil// khro bo yin te de yi ni// dbye ba
396a5(gso rig): mtha' yas myur ba dag/ skye gnas dbye ba rgyas par ni// dgos pa med phyir ma bshad do// mchog tu rtsub dang tsha ba dang // skyur dri mngar bsil dgra las ni// gdengs ka can la sogs pa'i dug/ rim gyis rlung
396a6(gso rig): sogs 'khrugs par byed// gzhon dang rgad po bar ma dang // dbyar dang dgun dang sos kar ni// 'di dag dug ni 'phel 'gyur zhing // gzhan dag dus tshigs rnamasu 'gyur// 'khor lo gzhol dang g.yung drung gdugs/
396b1(gso rig): lcags kyu'i mtshan mar ldan pa yi// gdengs ka can ni myur du 'gro ba// thams cad gdengs ka can zhes bya// lus 'khyil sna tshogs pa yi ni// zlum po 'dug pa lus 'khyil yin// ring zhing 'gros ni bul ba
396b2(gso rig): yin// ra mo sna tshogs ldan pa dang // snum zhing kha dog sna tshogs pas// mchu zheng dris 'gyur khra bo yin// go ta'i bu ni go ta can// dug ni gdangs ka can nyams la// rkang bzhi po yi sbrul gzha ni// 'di dag nyams
396b3(gso rig): ni 'dres pa las// 'dren ma'i mtshan nyid can te des/ 'dus pa'i nid ni ldang bar byed// zas kyi don dang 'jigs pa dang // rkang pas reg pas dug rab 'khrug/ rkang gis rgyu dang 'gras pa dang // lha dang drang srong shin rjes
396b4(gso rig): bskul// sbrul gyis zin par gang bshang ba// phyi ma bzhin du dug shes che// 'jug pa'i rgyu ni shes byas nas// gso ba ji bzhin bya ba yin// phal pa sdig can dang tshul bas// lam bkag nas ni gnas pa yin//
396b5(gso rig): gang du kha chu gsher ba tsamA// lus la snang por byed 'gyur gyi// mche ba'i rma nI mi mngon gang // de ni mchun gnon byed ces bya// mche ba gcig la rjes gnyis mngon// khrag med gyur pa bldags shes bya// mcha
396b6(gso rig): ba'i rjes ni khrag bcas gnyis// rnam par gcad pa'o de gsum ni// sha chad shin du bug pa dang // khrag 'byung po yis zin zhes bya// mche ba'i rjes ni bzhi snang ba// de bzhin sos 'dzin btsir bar bshang // de las dug
397a1(gso rig): mad dang po gnyis// phyi ma gnyis po gsor mi rung // sbrul gyi dug ni khrag dag la// ma brten lus la gnod mi byed// khrag ni cung zad la brten yang // til mar thig pa bzhin du mched//
397a2(gso rig): sngar ma sbrul gyis reg pa las// 'jigs pa rlung gis khrug par byed// lan 'ga' sbyangs par byed pa des// sbrul g+hi lus kyis bco mo zhes bya// bgrod dkar mun pas zug gyur pas// la la rtogs pas zin
397a3(gso rig): ba dang // dug gi shug dang slon dang rims// brgyal ba 'am tsha ba spro ba 'am// na zhing rmongs bgo 'khru bar byed// de ni rtog pa'i dug ces bya// dug bcas nad kyis zug pa dang // sbyangs dang g.ya' dang rims bcas
397a4(gso rig): pa/ la la tshwa zhing rmen bur bcas// de las bzlog pa dug med yin// gdengs ka can shugs dang po la// nang khrag nag po 'dzag par 'gyur// mig dang gdong sogs gnag pa dang // srin bu 'gro ba snyam du sems
397a5(gso rig): shugs gnyis par ni rmen bu skye// gsum par mgo ni lci bar 'gyur// bzhi pa mig 'byed dka' ba dang // sos btab brnags shing mchil ma slon// lnga pa tshotshigs 'byed snyam sems dang // rgyud gzhan tshigs ni
397a6(gso rig): 'jig pa dang // lus tsha skyigs bu 'byung ba yin// sdug par snying na lus lci zhing // brgya lo zhing 'khru la zas mi 'ju// bdun par khu ba'i gnas phyin nas// phrag gong rgya bo dang rgal tshigs dang // rkang pa zhig pa snyam
397b1(gso rig): sems shing // spyod lam thams cad las nyams 'gyur// de nas lus sgril bas zin na// nang khrag ser por 'gyur ba dang // de yi lus ser che ba bskyed// gnyis par skrangs par 'gyur ba yin// gsum pas sos
397b2(gso rig): btab mnags pa dang // rdul dang skom dang skye bar 'gyur// bzhi par khong tsha rims kyis 'debs// lnga bar lus kun khyab par tsha// sbrul ni khra bos zin gyur na// khrag ni skya bor 'gyur ba dang // des ni lus
397b3(gso rig): mdog skya bor 'gyur// gnyis pa lus ni lci bar 'gyur// gsum pas sos btab brnags pa dang // mig dang kha sne las 'dzag 'gyur// bzhi par mgo lci gnyi'u rengs 'gyur// lnga par lus tshogs na ba dang // grang
397b4(gso rig): ba'i rims kyis 'debs par byed// lhag ma gnyis po lnga bar mtshungs// lugs ni lnga par gso ba dag/ bya yi de las phan chad min// chu yis g.yengs dang chags pas zad// skrag dang ne les pham pa dang // grang
397b5(gso rig): lcags nyi mtshan rlung dang nang // bkres skom ngal bas gzir ba dang // phyogs gzhan nas ni rings par 'ongs// dug spungs pag spa ba rjes pa dang // 'jug ma sman dang tsher ma can// nags tshal rgyu ba grang yin dang //
397b6(gso rig): rig pa la sogs bsten phyogs gnas// sbrul de dug ni chung bar 'dod// dur khrod bsti gnas shing gcig sogs// tshes lnga dang ni dus tshigs dang // tshes brgyud tshes dgu thun mtshams dang // nam phyed dang ni nyi
398a1(gso rig): ma'i gung // dra nye smid drug mchu dang skag/ sa ga chu stong khrums bstod dang / ska bas dang pra De yud tsam la// gnang du bzung ba sa rA bya// zin pa'i mong la bzhin skya zhing // skra ni
398a2(gso rig): dbyi bar byed pa dang // lce 'khums yang dang yang du brgyal// dbugs grong gang yin de yAM sdigs sa bugs mi bde zhing sron// lus canayi pa'i mod la ni// snying nas gzer bIr 'gyur ba dang /
398a3(gso rig): cig car 'byung ba de mi 'tshe// 'du shes stor zhing lbu bar skyug/ rkang pa lag papA bzhin gnag cing // sna rA la zhigs pa dang // tshigs lhod bshad pa 'khru ba yi// dug 'thungs pa dang sbrul gyis zin// dug
398a4(gso rig): can mda' yas phog gyur na// tshul ni 'di dag snang 'gyur ba// srog zad par ni 'gyur pa yin// sna sman rnon po ma tshor zhing // rma nas khrag ni maM 'byung la// dbyug pas bsnan na rjes mi mngon// gshin rje'i thang du
398a5(gso rig): 'gro ba yin// de las gzhan du sman pa yis// 'bar ba'i khyim nas 'byung ba bzhin// lkog mar phyin pa'i srog bsrung zhing // dug ni myur du bsal bar bya// lus can dug gis zir gyur na// grangs rgya'i bar du gnas
398a6(gso rig): nas ni// lus zungs khrag sogs la gnod cing // lus l-i khyab par byed pa yin// dus 'di bar du 'dug pa yi// mche bas zin pa bcang sogs los// bya zhing ci nas lus la ni// dug gi yal ga ma 'phros bya//
398b1(gso rig): zin pa'i mod las myur du ni// sbrul ni de nyid za ba 'am// sa 'am bong ba gcod byed na// rings par gyur na sman pa yis// mchil mas byug par bya ba 'am// rna rlabs kyis ni so rjes bsku// mche bas btab pa'i
398b2(gso rig): gong du ni// sor bzhi ras ma las byas pa// gso ma 'am 'odra ma la sogs cing // sngags shes pa yis grub sngags bzlas// chu lon gyis ni chu lta bur// bcings pas dug ni 'phrog mi 'gyur// dug gi bcings
398b3(gso rig): sogs nyen pa yi// rtswa las rgyu bar mi 'gyur ro// btsir nas sos btab dbyung bya zhing // tshigs dang gnang du ma chudade de// sa bon nyams pa'i myu gu bzhin// dug shugs nges ni 'byung mi 'gyur// lus 'khyil so
398b4(gso rig): rjes mkhris skyes pa'i// de ma gtogs pas gzhan dag ni// lcags dang gsor la sogs pas sam// 'gal me yis ni myur du bsreg/ me yis thal bar byed 'gyur na// ci byed de ni 'byung bar 'gyur// sa
398b5(gso rig): dang lci ba sman sogs kyis// kha bkang nas ni gzhib bar bya// chings ma'i nang nang sha che'i phyogs// mchog tu zhal zhal bya ba dang // yan lag mche bas zin bcas pa// dug sman gyis ni yang yang bsku// can
398b6(gso rig): ngan bu shel tsar ldan pa// chu yis kyang ni blugs par bya// dug gis khyab par gyur pa la// gtar ga gdab pa gso mchog ste// khrag ni phyung bar gyur pa dang // ma lus dug ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dug bcas khrag ni
399a1(gso rig): dri mI zhim// mer bsregs sgra ni tseg tsog zer// nad bzhi ji bzhin dag 'gyur ba// khrag ni snga ma bzhin shes bya// rtsa ni snga ma bzhin shes bya// rtsa ni snad par ma gyur na// sngabs ra srin bu pad
399a2(gso rig): mas sbyar// khrag phyung ba yi lhag ma ni// dug gi drod kyis zhu gyur pa// shin tu bsil ba'i sman bsku dang // blug pa yi ni bsal bor bya// dug gi shugs kyis mi zhu bas// brgyal dang myos dang snying 'dzag 'byung // da
399a3(gso rig): nIni bsil sman blug pa dang // rlung yab spu ldang byed pas bsal// khrag ni sra bar gyur na dug/ 'phral du shugs ni zhi bar 'gyur// dug ni rno bas snying 'dar byed// de bsrung phyir ni zhun mar ram// mar dang bcas pa'i sbrang
399a4(gso rig): 'am// dug smin mar dang smras pa blung // 'dra yis snying ni 'gags byed pas// snying gar bang kun sog par byed// lus lci nang ni slongs pa dang // snying 'phar de ni sngon du gzhug/ ga shwer rdzas sbyar rtsabs rgya sran dang //
399a5(gso rig): til dang chang sogs ma gtogs pa// dug sel ba yi smon sman btang // des ni lus la khyab mi 'gyur// sbrul dang nyes pa rang bzhin dang // gnas dang shugs kyi khyad par ni// phra mo yan chad rab brtags la//
399a6(gso rig): gso ba khyad par can bya'o// srin bu bi ri'i rtsa ba dang // gi ri karni dkar po'i chu// btung ba gdeng ko can bzhin sbyar// sna sman ru rta sbrang rtsi btang // sbrul nagaM gis ni zin pa la// khrag gtar nas ni btsa' ba dang //
399b1(gso rig): na go li ni sbyar ba bsku// yang na rtsa rnon dug gis bsku// btung ba btsod dang sbrang rtsi dang // kha la'i dud pa mA ra sbyar blud// gdengs ka tsan dang ri mo can// mi bzang dug gi zin pa la// tAng du li ya taM bal dang // ki ri ku/
399b2(gso rig): rnam gnyis dang // kha lung kha ra se'u ni// btung dang sna sman mig sman bya// a shwa gar+b+ha rgun 'brum dang // ke ri karni saM nag dang // ha ti pi pi ling dang ni// bye rug pa yi lo ma dang // bil+la saM 'bru ka pi ta// cha ni phyed phyed/
399b3(gso rig): sbrang rdzir sbyar// dug sman yin te khyad par du// lus dkyil sbrul gyi dug la phan// lo ma lnga dang 'bras bu gsum// shing mngar nA ga puSh+pa dang // e la baM du dzaM bA ka/ zangs rtsi ba dang bu shel tse// kha ra shug pa ut+pa l-i//
399b4(gso rig): sprisbrang rtsi dang sbyar kha ba can// zhes byA lus 'khyil dug 'jom so// bskus na skrangasA dang shu ba mched// 'brum bu lus dang lus lci se lA// ti pal n+ya gro d+ha'i myu gu// dzi ba ka dang zangs rtsi ba// kha ra dkar po shing mngar btsod//
399b5(gso rig): khu ba lus dkyil dug la blung // 'o ma'i shun pa sa bon dang // bca' sgra pa ti la'i sa bon// shing sha'i sa bon pu tsa shel// 'bras kyi rtsa ba bong nga dkar// shu dag pa gcin bcas par btags// yan lag brgyad pa zhes
399b6(gso rig): bya ste// go sa na yi dug 'jomaso// ru rta bong nga pu rtse shel// ha ri nu ka khyim dud pa// rgya spos sbrang rtsi tsha ba gsum// sbyar bas ri mo can dug sel// 'dam bu khra bo 'dras zin na// sa rkos 'og tu thun gnyis gzhug/ phyung
400a1(gso rig): ste bzhar la mAr sar dang // 'bras dang sa yi lde gus byug/ 'bras bu gsum phyes btab pa yi// maR+Sha ni rnying pa blud par bya// zhu zhing bkrus nas nas zun ni// sran chod dang ni bcas pa sbyin// ka ra bi ra aH/
400a2(gso rig): yi// me tog laM ka li'i rtsa ba// pi pi ling dang na le sham// pa ta sgyur rtsabs lde gur bcas// 'di ni sbrul gzhan gyis zin pa'i// sbrul gyis dug kun sel ba yin// shir sha'i me tog khu ba dang // na le sham kor zhag bdun spangs//
400a3(gso rig): btung dang sna sman byas gyur na// sbrul gyi mche bas zin pa sel// rgya spos ru rta srang gnyis gnyis// mar dang sbrang rtsi srang bzhi bzhi// 'di blud 'jog pos zin pa spang // bde ba skyed par byed pa yin// de nas gdengs kA can gyi shugs
400a4(gso rig): dang por khrag ni dbyung bar bya// dus sman sbrang rtsi zhun mar dang // bcas pa myur du brud par bya// gnyis pa slon sman btang nas ni// de bzhin dug sman blud par bya// gsum po dug sman sbyar bya zhing // mig sman dang ni sna sman btang //
400a5(gso rig): bzhi par skyug sman btang nas ni// sngar bshad pa yi nas thug blung // lnga pa drug pa bsil smyon gyis// bsku zhing sman tshwa yang yang blugs// slon sman rnon po btang bya zhing // dug sel nas thug byung bar bya// bdun pas dug
400a6(gso rig): sman rnon po yi// mig sman dang ni sna sman btang // de nas spyi bor rgya gram du// zab mo'i mtshon gyis dpral nas ni// dir ni sha 'am khrag gam ni// pags pa dgo ni gzhug par bya// lus dkyil shugs ni gsum pa la//
400b1(gso rig): smoslon sman btang la nas thug sad// drug par sman ni rtum po 'am// shug pa la sogs sde chen blung // khrag po'i shugs ni dang po la// zhal zhal zab tu gdab bya zhing // bkru bas khrag ni bton nas ni// snga ba bzhin du dug
400b2(gso rig): sman blung / drug par mig sman sna rnon po dang // sna sman phye ma bud pa btang // ma smos pa yi shugs las ni// dengs ka can+da stabs bshad lngar gso// s+thAm+ba ma byis pa rgang po la// gratar gra mi gdeng 'jam pos gso//
400b3(gso rig): shing cha ldong ros rgyu smos yung // ku sha'i khu ba chu srin sau na// ta ma la yi gaM saraM dang // 'bras bu grang mo sbyar ba blung// 'di yis dbang po'i rdo rje ni// lha min lta bur dug 'joms byed// bilpa'i rtsa ba bye rug pa'i me
400b4(gso rig): tog/ rgya spos thang shing ka rany+dza'i 'bras bu// sa rA bau rnam gnyis 'bras bu gsum dang ni// tsha ba gsum po ra gucin zhi ba btags la// btung dang sna sman mIg sman sbyar bA yis// sbrul dang lu ta byi ba sdig pa sogs//
400b5(gso rig): dug dang dbyigs ga ma zhu gsung dang rims// mi ni gdon gyis zin pa bde bar byed// sos btab bsku ba la sogs kyis// ma lus bton par gyur kyang ni// nyams pa'i dug nI ji bzhin dang // slar ying shugs na skye
400b6(gso rig): bar byed// dug dang bral nas rlung 'khrugs na// snum la sogs pas gso bya zhing // til mar chang dang rgya sran chu// ma rtogs rlung ni sel ba sbyin// mkhris par mkhris pa'i rims sel ba'i// sman khu sman mar 'jom
401a1(gso rig): rtsis gso// bang kan sbrang rtsi bcas pa yi// dong ga la sogs sde yis gso// sbrul gyi rus pa gnod 'gyur dang // de bzhin rtog pa'i dug gis nyen// khyu ra rgun 'brum pa yas sa// shing
401a2(gso rig): mAdA ra kha ra sbrang rtsir sbyar// sngags kyis btab pa'i rgyu dang bcas// tor zhing sgro sring dga' byar bya// ke ke nr-i dang mu tig margad dang // bai DUr+ya dang rdo rje mthon khwa che// ras+ya bal sa bon dug gis gnod pa 'am// khu ba can
401a3(gso rig): gyi ri las skyes pa yi// so ma ra dza dang ni ba spu ba// de bzhin gro na ma hA g+ho na dang // sbrul la yod po'i nor bu mA NA si// nus pa dang ni ldan par gyur pa yi// dug ni dug gzhom bya phyir bcang bar bya// nub mo'i dusu rgyu tshe khyad
401a4(gso rig): par dang // gdugs dang 'khar gsil sgra dang bcas pa bcang // de yi grib ma sgra yau skad byung nas// sbrul gyi tshogs ni 'byer byar byed par 'gyur// yan lagra brgyad pa'i snying po bsduswa pA las// phyi ma'i granas kyi le'u
401a5(gso rig): sum cu drug pa'o// / de nas srin bu'i dug nAd gso ba bshad par bya'o// sbrul nyid rkye ni bshang gci dang // khu chu sgo nga lus 'drul skyes// nang ni re re 'dus pa dang // ldan po'i srin bu dug rnam bzhi// rlung gi srin
401a6(gso rig): thus zin gyur na// shas cher na zhing thug par byed// maM yi srin bu 'dzag pa chung // tshe zhing dmar la shung mched// ba lu'i 'bras bu smon pa 'am// 'br-i go'i 'bras bu smin pa 'dra// bad kan shas chen che bas chung // u dum+ba ra
401b1(gso rig): sman pa 'dra// shas cher 'dzag pa'o 'dus pa yi// mtshan nyid thams cad ldan pa dang // shugs ni sbrul dang 'dra ba dang // skrangs pa 'phel zhing khrag dri mnam// mgo dang mig lci brgya la mgo 'khor// dbugs mi bden
401b2(gso rig): spang bar bya// kun kyang skrangs pa lte ba can// tsha ba g.yo zhing yi ga 'chus// sdig pa'i dug ni rno ba ste// dang po me ltar sreg par byed// steng du myur du mched byed cing // mche ba'i 'og tu gdug pa yin// zin ma thag ni
401b3(gso rig): rab na gno/ gas pa snyem du sems shing zug/ de ni ba lci sogs rul dang // dug gis phog sogs rul ba dang // sbrul rus pa las skyes pa ni// dug tshabs chung dang 'bring dang che// tshabs chung ser zhing dkar dang gnag/
401b4(gso rig): rtsub dang khra zhing gzi mdog yin// spu dang tshig ni dmar bya dang // dmar zhing lto ba dkar ba yin// bar ma lhong du tshigs gsum ba// bskyed pa cher skya dmar ba yin// dug che ser skya khri ba dang // ri mo can la khrag
401b5(gso rig): 'dra zhing // me 'dra tshigs ni gnyis sam gcig/ lto ba dkar zhing dmar ram gnag/ des ni lce ni sbyangs pa dang // lus rengs rims kyis nyen po dang // bu ga las ni khrag rnag rlon// dbang po'i don ni mi shes
401b6(gso rig): shing // rdul zhing rgyal la kha skam dang // rmongs shing nad kyis nyen pa dang // ni zhigs par byed pa ste// phal cher srog ni 'dor bar byed// mchu sbom pa yi kha yis ni// 'debs shing gsor rung sdig pa las//
402a1(gso rig): lhag par na byed lus rengs shing // mtshan gyi spu ni ldang ba dang // lus ni rdul bar byed 'gyur zhing // sos 'debs chu grang sgyum du sems// de nyid rnga mo rung kha dang // mtshan mo rgyu bas mtshan
402a2(gso rig): mo can// srin bu rlung mkhris shas che zhing // rnga mo byi ba bad kAn can// rnga mo dud pa zhes bya ba// phal cher rlung shas che ba yin// nad nI gang dang gong gi ni// mtshan ma shas che ba las brtag/ de dang de las gso ba'i
402a3(gso rig): sman da yon tan mi mthun pa yis gso// snying gozer stong rlung gri redra shing // rtsa mi snang zhing rus tshigs ni// mgo 'khor lus bcing snyam du sems// mdog mnag rlung las gyur pa'i dug/ dran nyams dbugs ni
402a4(gso rig): che bar byed// snying tsha kha ni kha bro lA// sha 'gags skrangs par byed pa dang // khrag ser ba ni mkhris pa can// smon zhing snying na yi ga 'chus// kha chu 'dzeg cing 'cham pas 'debs// grang bcas kha ni mngar ba bro// bad kan shas
402a5(gso rig): che'i dug nad yin// 'ba' chas rma ni bsku ba dang // rlung sel til mar gyis bsku dang // sbu gu ma smin 'bru dugs dang // rtas par bya ba'i cho ga 'ang phan// mkhris pa can la sman chu blugs// shin tu grang ba'i lde gus bsku// bad kan
402a6(gso rig): la ni bzhar zhing bcang // dug dang skyugs sman btang bla gso// srin bu rna ba gsum po la// gso ba rna ba gsuM po phan// dug dang sku dang sman chu blug/ phal cher dro 'jam btang bar bya// gzhan du brgyal dang mche ba yis// rnag dang 'drul bar byed ma
402b1(gso rig): gtogs// ma skra yungs kar ser po dang // bu ram rnying pa'i dud pas bdug/ dug dang mche ba'i dug kun lnga// mchog tu phan par 'gron skyob 'chad// dug sel sman ni thams cad dang // sbyang ba'i lasu kyang bya ba yin+da/ sprin/
402b2(gso rig): bu sdig pa mi bzang dug/ 'bus zin sbrul gyis zinA ltar gso// gtan du li ya cha mnyam pa'i// dur byid dang ni zhun mar blud// bu yi dug gis gangs can ltar// bskyod par nus pa ma yin// 'o mo can shing sde
402b3(gso rig): gus bsku// sbyang byas srin bu'i dug sel byed// mu tigaM lde gus bskus pa'ang phan// skrangs dang dug drang tsha ba sel// shu dAg shing kun bi D+ha ka/ rgyam tshwa ha ti pi bi ling // ba tra bod dA tsha ba gsum// 'dro ba skyong gis ni
402b4(gso rig): bshad pa yino// yan lag bcu pa'i dug sman ni// 'dro ba skyong gis ni bshad pa dag/ blud na srin bu'i dug kyang sel// sdig pa'i dug gis 'phrol zin la// 'khor los bcing bI til mar bsku// sa la paur+Na bskol ba yi/
402b5(gso rig): dro 'jam yang na gzhan dag blug/ rgyam cha dang ni bcas pa yi// zhun mar yang dang yang du blug/ yang na sgyur rtsabs dro 'jam mAm// rgyu ma tsha 'o ma bcas pa brug/ mar dang brngos pa'i go snyed de dang // rgyu ma tshur bcas te
402b6(gso rig): dkri bar bya// mche bas zin pa dug byas la// zhal zhal btab ste 'bras bu gsum// ser po gnyis dang chi ba gsum// shir sha'i me tog bsku bar bya// rgyam che kha lung ba gcin sgyur// bya 'u rug pa'i rtse mo btags//
403a1(gso rig): 'ba' cha 'am lci ba d+mo 'jam tsam// bskus na'ang phan par 'gyur ba yin// btung bar zhun mar sbrang rtsir bcas// yang na 'o mar kha ra btab// phug ron rtug pa a ru ra// rgya spos bca' sga kha lung
403a2(gso rig): gri/ khu bA dang sbyar blud pa ni// sdig pas zin pI sman mchog yin// rnga mo'i so ni chu bal bcas// sdig pa'i dug ni 'joms par byed// shing kun pa bla ba lung gi/ khu ba dang sbyar lde gu dang // mig sman ril bu byas nas mi//
403a3(gso rig): sdig pa'i dug nau sel mchog yin// ka rany+dza dang ardzu na// gi ri karni se lu nA// sher shA'i me tog dug mo nyung // zho kha chu dang btags bskus na// sdig pa'i dug ni sel b.raro byed// gang zhig rmugs shing rngam pa thon//
403a4(gso rig): bla zhing mi bzad na 'gyur ba// de la yung dang a ru ra// btsod dang bong nga pi pi ling // bil+la gzhonu na li sham// ban+ta ka yaM khu bar btags// lde gus byugs na phan pa yin// sbrang ma gdug pa'i dug kun la// zho dang
403a5(gso rig): mar ni blung bya zhing // gtar ga gdab cing sna sman dang // mig sman gyi ni cho ga bya// dri zhim snum dang sgyur ba dang // rlung 'joms khA zas sbyin par bya// dong grwa b+hi ba'i rtug pa dang // ba lung khru ba pra dang // rgyu ma tshwa bu
403a6(gso rig): shel sbyar po yi// lde gus sbrang ma'i dug myur 'joms// sdig pas zin pa'i tha mar ni// dug ni shas cher langs 'gyur bar// zin pa'i rmal dugau gis bsgo// u tsi ti ka'i gso ba'ang 'di// glang po che yi rtug pa de//
403b1(gso rig): ro hI sha tsA se lu'u chu// lde gur byas btags bskus nas ni// 'di ni sbrang ma'i dug 'joms mchog/ shrir shA'i sa bon arga yi// 'o mas lan gsum+b+ha bsgos pas nI// pI pi ling gi phye mar bsgres// dug sman 'dis
403b2(gso rig): ni smin bu'i dug/ sbrul dang lu tau byi ba yi// dug ni sel bar byed pa yin// shir sha'i sa bon ka rany+dza'i sa bon// gur gum+ba ru rta ldong ros bcas pa yi// dug sman 'dis ni mtshan rgyu sdig pas zin// sel bar byed
403b3(gso rig): ba yin par rgyal pos gsungs// srin bu las ni rab gdug po// ba ni bcu drug yin par bshad par tha shad// gzhan dag nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'dod // kha cig de bas mang bar 'dod// nyi mo'i 'od kyi rjes 'brang ba// stong phrag
403b4(gso rig): yod ces gzhan dag 'chad// bla gnyen gzugs ni mang 'gyur na// dug can pa ni gcig tu 'dod// de yi gzugs dang ming dag ni// shin tu 'dres pas shes par dka'// gnas kyi nges pa yod min pas// de phyir
403b5(gso rig): nad las bshad par bya// nad gzhi so so'i gso ba dka'// 'dus pa las gyur gsor mi rung // des zin mkhris gyur tsha ba dang // skom dang chu bur rims kyis 'debs// rmongs bgra rab tsha dmar ser mdog/ brnags
403b6(gso rig): shing rgun 'bum 'bras bu 'dra// bad kan las gyur sra zhing skya// ba ru sha ka'i 'bras bu 'dra// gnyid che grang rims lung ba lu// shin tu g.ya' bar byed pa yin// rlung 'gyur rtsub cing gnag pa dang // tshogs ma
404a1(gso rig): rims kyis 'debs par byed// de yi dbye ba nad kyi ni// rang gi mtshan nyid las shes bya// gsor mi rung ba snying tsha zhing // lung pa skyigs bu mgo nang dang // 'brum phran dkar dang ser dang gnag/
404a2(gso rig): dmar dang skya ba las byung 'gyur// 'dar dang skangs la tsha ba dang // skom dad lo zhing sna 'chus la// mchu na go so ni yo ba dang // rgyab dang ming pa bcom snyam sems// 'jam du'i 'bras bu smin 'ang ba'i// khrag ni
404a3(gso rig): markus brdzogs rma las 'jig/ 'dus 'gyur mtshan nyid kun ldan zhing // ming ni mang por gyur pa yin// de dug rnon po bar ma dang // dman pa'i dbye bsna gsum du 'gyur/ bcos zhag 'dun zhig nga// zla ba phyed
404a4(gso rig): kyi mas kyi gsod// ba dang mchu rings thams cad kyang // glang shu kor kor por byed cing // dkar da gnag dang dmar dang ser// gnas pa 'am 'dzom zhing mthe ba dang // dbu su gnag pa 'am sngo ma las// mtha' ma drwa ba
404a5(gso rig): bus khebs// mched cing sbyangs par byed pa dang // tsha zhing nang du na ba dang // rims 'debs myur du brnags ying 'drul// rul ni dgas par byed pa dang / rag gi gang du rog 'gyur ba'i// phyogs der yang na rma skyed byed//

410b6(gso rig): grags pa yin// tshul bzhin bsten na skyes bu ni// nyams stobs zad kyang 'phel bar byed// gang zhig ut+pal sdong lo ma// rtsa ba ge sar ldan bskol po// ut+pal bzhi par grags pa yin// gser dang bcas pa'i bcud
411a1(gso rig): len gyis// sbyor ba bsten na ba lang yang // yid gzhungs 'gyur na mi ci smos// bra hI shu dag shAM ka puSh+pa dang // rgyam tshe mats+tsha kA ra bI shwa la// b+ha mi so brtsa la pi pi lding // re re nas nri gsum gsum tsam
411a2(gso rig): gyi ched// gser ni nas gnyis dug ni til 'bru tsam// zhun mar srang gcig 'di dag zhib tu sbyar// legs par btang ste zhu bar gyur nas ni// ma ri bcas kha zas lo gcig bar du bsten// dran dang yid gzhungs blo ni
411a3(gso rig): 'phel 'gyur zhing // nad dang rgas pa dag las 'das pa dang // snyom dang ngal dub sel byed lo brgya 'tsho// dpal dang gzi brjid mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur// khyad par du ni mdze nad sha bkra skran// dug dang dbyig dug rims dang
411a4(gso rig): smyo byed dang // srid srung rig byed sngags byas gshed byed dang // rlung nang stobs chen 'dis ni zhi bar byed// na ga ba bla ston gyi tshe// skar ma rgyal la bab par btung // de yi rtsa ba zho gnyis tsam// phyer btags 'o ma sbyar te
411a5(gso rig): ba tung // yang na mar dang sbyong rtsir sbyar// bldag cing zas med 'o mas 'tsho// de ltar lo gcig zos gyur na// lo brgya 'tsho zhing stobs ldan 'gyur// gze ma 'bras bu skyes pa rtsa bar bcas// grib mar bskams tau zhib
411a6(gso rig): tu btags nas ni// rang gi khu bso spangs pa de la ni// che tshad khyor gang tshad du byas gyur gang // de dang 'o mar sbyar nas bza' bya zhing // zhu nas 'o ma srang ni nyis brgya zos// gzugs bzang skal ldan lo brgya thub pa dang //
411b1(gso rig): 'dod spyod khyu mchog pa lang tshogs gnas 'dra// ba ra hi yi sdong bu rlon pa ni// 'o mar sbyar ba zos shing 'o ma btung // zla gcig bar du kha zas 'o mas 'tsho// rgas pa'i tshogs las nges par rgyal bar 'gyur// yang na de
411b2(gso rig): yi sdong bu'i phye zhib mo// rang gi khu ba dang ni legs sbyar ba// mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu bza'// yang na de bskol mar ni btung bar bya// de bzhin a ti pa la bi da ri// shing mngar dang ni sne'u me ru ra// dzI baM ti
411b3(gso rig): drang ra sna a ru ra// sa la par+Ni sle twes skyu ru ra// shaM ka pud+ba man+tu ga brni// a shr-i gAn+d+ha dang ni nya shing rnams// sbyar ba btang na yid gzhung sau blo dang ni// rgas sra na chod brtan zhing stobs skyed byed// tsi tra ka yi me tog ni//
411b4(gso rig): ser po dkar nag lam shes bya// cho ga bzhin du bcud ldan bya// go rim bzhin du yon tan che// de yi rtsa ba grib mor bskams// phye mar btags pa sbrang rtsi mar// 'o ma chu dang zla gtsig par// brtul shugs can gyis
411b5(gso rig): bsten byas la// phan pa'i zas ni za byed na// lo brgya 'tshe zhing nad med la// yid gzhungs stobs dang mdangs ldan zhing // lus rgyas me drod 'bar bar 'gyur// til mar lde gu zla gcig par// bsten na rlung nad gso
411b6(gso rig): dka' 'joms// gcin skyur sha bkr-i ma dze nang 'joms// dar bar bcas pa gzhang 'brum sel// go bye legs par smin pa ni// 'bras kyi phung po'i nang du gzhug/ sos ka'i tshe btus dgun tshe dbyung // mngar zhing snum dang
412a1(gso rig): bsil ba yi// sman+na sbyar de yi rdog ma brgyad// brgyad 'gyur chur ni bskol nas ni// khu ba de yi brgyad cha lus// 'o ma dang sbyar grang mo btung // de rjes nyi ma re re zhing // go bye rdog mA re re bsgred//
412a2(gso rig): nyi shu rtsa gcig bar du ni// gsum gsum gyis bskyed de phan chad// bzhi bcu'i bar bskyed de 'og ni// bskyed pa bzhin du bri bar bya// bdun phrag bdun gyi bar du ni// stong gri bar du btang bar bya// bdag nyid bsdams
412a3(gso rig): shing 'o ma mar// sa lu drug cu'i 'bras chan bza'// de bzhin dus ni sum 'gyur bya// sbyor ba'i mthar yang spyad par bya// sngon gyi legs smon thob gyur zhing // khyad par du ni me drod skye// gcin sti srin bu gzhang 'brus
412a4(gso rig): mdzetshil las gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum 'joms// go bye'i 'bras bu skyon med pa// brdungs shing zhib tu btags pa ni// bum par bcug ste sa nag bskus// sa rkos pa yi nang du gzhug// kun nas pa yi lci bas bskor// de
412a5(gso rig): sbyar me da bcos nas ni// de las 'dzag ma'i khu ba gang // blang ba nyid zhog bzhag la ni// de yi brgyad 'gyur sbrang rtsi dang // nyis 'gyur mar drang bcas pa ni// cho ga snga ma bzhin bsdams te// bsten na yon tan de nyid
412a6(gso rig): thob/ go bya'i 'bras bu smin te lhung gyur pa// bre bzhi'i tshad tsam dang ni so phag dang // bdar ba'i phye ma dag ni chu dang mnye// bkrus te rlung la legs par bskams nas ni// brdungs te chu bre bcu drug nang du bskol// bzhi cha
412b1(gso rig): lus pa btsags pa bsgrangs pa yi// khu ba de dang 'o ma bre bcu drug/ bskol te bzhi cha lus par gyur ba dang // de dang mnyam pa'i zhun mar bcas par bskol// de'i nang kha ra'i phye ma ci ran gzhug/ de ni gzar bus
412b2(gso rig): dkrugs pa'i gcig tu 'gyur// 'bras kyi phung por zhag bdun legs par sba// bdud rtsi 'dra bar de bsten skyes bu gang // chu dang 'o ma sha khu 'thungs gyur na// dran dang yid gzhungs blo gros dad stobs ldan//
412b3(gso rig): snying stobs ldan pa gser gyi mdog dang 'dra// tshwa ring bu yang des ni thob par 'gyur// chu bre bcu drug nang du gau bye ni// sum brgya bskol te bIn tshwa lus pau ru// til mar bre ba ni der ni bcug nas kyang // tig+ne bo d+ha
412b4(gso rig): gnyis dang 'bras bu gsum// brag zhun skyer khaN+Da yi phye ma gdab// bskol na mdze nad ma lus 'joms par byed// go byaM skyu ru ra 'am tshwa 'am nI// zho yaM spris mA tril mar 'o ma dang // bu ram 'o thug mar ram sbrang rtsi
412b5(gso rig): 'am de nas zan dag gam til btags lde gur byos// sran tshod dag dang lhan cig sbyar ba ni// lus rgyad yad gzhi ngas tshe ring byed mchog yin// go bye'i 'bras bu rnon po ni// smin pa me dang 'dra gyur ba// cho ga
412b6(gso rig): bzhin du sbyar ba ni// bdud rtsi dang ni 'dra bar 'gyur// bse shing 'bras bus ma bcom po'i// bad kan nad dang nad rnying ni// 'brel pa gang yin de med cing // me yi drod kyang myur bar bskyed// rlung dang chad par
413a1(gso rig): 'dug pa ni// khyad par du ni spang bya zhing // rgya sran zho dung tsha dang ni// til mar bsku dang me bsten spang // du pa ra yi shing zhes bya// nub phyogs rgya mtsho'i ngos nas sde// chu rlabs gAyo bas
413a2(gso rig): bskyod pa dang // rlung gi lo ma g.yengs pa yin// de yi 'bras bu dbyar gyi tshe// legs par smin pa btu bar bya// 'bras bu de la rkang 'byung ste// bskams tau phye mar btags nas ni// tol bzhin btsir bar bya ba
413a3(gso rig): 'am le brgan me tog bzhin du bskol// de yi mar bsags gyur pa ni// cung zad pa yi bar du bskol// phab ste ba yaM lci ba yi// nang du zla phyi tsam du gzhug/ de 'og de las phyung nas ni// snum zhing dugs byas dri
413a4(gso rig): ma bsal// zas kyi dus ni bzhis chod par// nang bar zho gnyis tsam gcig btung // mar ni nyi ma shis pa la// sngags 'di yis ni dag par bya// rkang dang snying po brtson pa che// lus zungs thams cad sbyong byed
413a5(gso rig): par na 'khor lo dbyug pa mdung thogs par// mi 'pho bas ni khyod la bsgo// des gang 'di'i nang sbed dang ni// 'og gi nad ni du ma'ang sel// rgongs ka snum dang lan tshar bcas// nas thug grang mo btung bar bya//
413a6(gso rig): mar de zhag lnga'i bar du btung // spang bar bya ba thams cad spang // zla phyed mung+ga'i khu ba btung // mdze nad kun las thar bar 'gyur// de nyid seng ldeng khu ba ni// sum 'gyur dag ni legs par bskol// snga ma
413b1(gso rig): bzhin du zla phyed bzhag/ legs par bsdams te zla gcig btung // de yis lus ni bsku ba dang // ji skad bshad pa'i zas zos pa'i// sbyor ba 'di yis myur du ni// mdze can mi ni gso bar bya// de nyid seng ldeng med
413b2(gso rig): par ni// zhun mar sbrang rtsi ldan par btung // zla phyed bar du sha khu btung // lo ni nyes brgya 'tsho bar 'gyur// de nyid zhag ni lnga bcu'i bar// sna sman du ni btang 'gyur na// lus rgyas thob pa 'dzin pa dang // lo ni sum brgyar
413b3(gso rig): 'tsho bar 'gyur// pI pi lidA ni pa la sha'i// thal chur spangs shing mar dang brngos// rdog ma gsum gsum snga dro dang // zas kyi sngon du bza' bar bya// bcud len yon tan 'dod pa yi// sbrang rtsi dang ni sbyar te bza'//
413b4(gso rig): pi ling bcu nyin re ba zhing // rims gyis skye bar gyur ba dag/ de bzhin 'o mar sbyar te bza'// de bzhin du ni dbri bar bar bya// sman zhu nas ni drug tsu ba'i// 'bras bcas 'o ma mar bcas bza'// pi pi long nr-i stong gi bar
413b5(gso rig): btang na 'di ni bcud len 'gyur// stobs dang ldan la de btags sbyin// stobs bri ba la bskol te blud// de bzhin ra yi 'o ma dang // nyis stong gi ni bar du btang // pri pi ling gi sbyor ba 'dis// lud pa dbugs mi bde mgul
413b6(gso rig): nad// btsong chen gzhang 'brum pho ba'i nad// gcin snyi skya rbab mi bozad rims// 'or nad slon dang skyegs bu dang // mcher ba dreg nang 'joms par byed// pi pi ling ni srang phyed lde gur bcas// lcags kyi snod bskus nub
414a1(gso rig): gcig bzhag/ de dang chu ni snyim gang nang par btung // lo gcig bza' btung spyod pa ci 'dod bsten// bcu' sga sle tres shing mdar bi TAn// ba bla a ti ba bla 'bras bu gsum// smyung thung shing yung
414a2(gso rig): ba a ka ru// mu thi pad+ma ut+pal kru krug tres// dra ta a sha kaR+ShA a sa na// ba bla'i lo ma 'am snying po de bzhin du// pi pi ling bzhin lcags snod bsku sogs bya// lo brgya 'tsho zhing rgas dang na las thar// 'o mo snyim gang gis
414a3(gso rig): ni bcud len sma nau// sbyar po 'di yis lcags snod bskus nas ni// sngar bshad yon tan bas kyang lhag skyed cing // tshe yang de las nyis 'gyur skyed par byed// a sA nau dang seng ldeng gi/ khu ba so ma ra dzaM spangs// sbrang rtsi
414a4(gso rig): ruN+Da mar dAng ni// oM ru ra dang lcags phye bcas// lde gu lho gcig par zos na// rgas dang mi 'phrod zos pa las// nad ni yongasu 'dir bar byed// mdzi nad mi bzad pA yis ni// lus nyen gyur pa gang yin pas//
414a5(gso rig): sosau ma rA dza tIl nag gnyis// l-i gcig bar du bsten nas ni// de ni zla rgyas lta bur gyur// gang zhig so ma rA dza spun pa med// btogs pa 'o mo lhan cig zhor mnan pa'i// snying po byung la sbrang rtsi lde gur bldags//
414a6(gso rig): rjes de nyid kyi ni dar ba 'atungs// mdze yi nad kyis yan lag nyams pa dang // sna chad sor mo brul pa la sogs pa// shing bcad rjes la lcug ma skyes pa ltar// de ni nges par skyes par 'gyur ba yin// sgra
414b1(gso rig): gcan bdud rtsi bskus pa na// skye bcad pa la 'dzags gyur pa'i// bdud rtsi'i thigs pa sar lhung ba// sgog sgra nyid du gyur pa yin// lha min lus las 'byung bas na// de phyir bram ze de mi bza'// mngon du bdud rtsi
414b2(gso rig): pas byung bas// de ni bcud kyi len mchog yin// grang po'i dus na'ang sgog sgyu bstan// dpyid dus bad kanA shas cher bza'// sos ka'i dus su'ang spyad bya zhing // dbyar ni rlung gis gzir tshe bza'// dgu ni snum zhing bsil ba dang
414b3(gso rig): mdAr bas nye bar bsdus pa dang // de ni phreng ba rgyan dag dang // 'khor dang ljon cig bston par bya// de yi lde gu dpyid kyi tshe// kha ba can gyi yul skyes pa// shun po bshus nas mtshan po ni// chang sogs lnga ni spang bar bya/
414b4(gso rig): de yi khu ba nang par ni// ras ni gtsang mas btsags nas kyang // chang ni legs par langs gyur pa// tsha ba gsumo ni sbyar ba'am// chang gzhan dog gram til mar ram// rang skyur ram ni zho kha chu// de tshe nyid sbyar nang bar ni//
414b5(gso rig): tshad dang ldan par sbyin bya zhing // 'o ma zhun mar zhag dang rkang // skam sa'i sha khu so sor ni// bskol ba nad gzhi ji bzhi no blud// yang na sman khu 'ba' zhig blud// dang por mkhur geng+ge tsam 'thung nas// mid pa'i stobs ni dag par
414b6(gso rig): byed// rgyun du drugs po'i dugs byas na// na zhig zug pa dag la phan// skyug cing brgyal ba'i nad la ni// 'phral du chu grong dag kyang brud// ngal ba med cing lus kyi ni// gzi mdangs brtan pas lhag ma sbyin// tsha ba
415a1(gso rig): bsal bar bya ba'i phyir// shin tu bsil bas bsku bya zhing // mu tig ga pur phreng ba can// chu thigs 'phre'u bsten par bya// 'di yi tshad chen phul gang ste// nyi tshad la ni de yi phyed// sgrog skya srang
415a2(gso rig): gcig btags pa ni// bas dang btsos pa bsten par bya// zhu nas sa lu rnying pa'i chan// dung dang kun+da ltar dkar ba// yu sha 'o ma skam sa yi// sha khu dang ni lhan cig bza'// skom par gyur na chang dang ni// chu sbyar
415a3(gso rig): ba ni blud pa'am// chang mi 'thung na rang skyur ram// rgun 'brum chu ni blud par bya// de yi lde gu mar dang btsas// mar gyi snod du gzar bus gdu// zhag bcu bzhag gam de bzhin du// zhag dang mnyam bzhag spyad par bya//
415a4(gso rig): sgog skya shun pa bshus pa'i snying po ni// bsreg shi dag gom bza' ba sna tshogs sam// shar gtubs pa 'am ma ri dang char bcas bza'// kha zas nyung ba ci 'dod spyad par bya// khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad ni ma gtogs
415a5(gso rig): pa// nod gzhi ma lus ldan par gyur pa 'am// rlung nad zhi tshegs dang ni ldan 'gyur ba// sgog pa las lhag gzhan sman yod ma yin// chu dang bu ram 'o mar sred// sha chang sbyor la mi dga' zhing // ma zhu ba nI spong mi
415a6(gso rig): nus// sgog skya nges par gnod pa bskyed// mkhris pa ldan pa'i 'jigs pa yis// mtha' ma bkru sman 'jam po btang // de ltar bcud len yon tan ni// yongasu rdzogs pa thib par 'gyur// sos ka'i che ba'i gdungs
415b1(gso rig): drags las// rgyu skyegs khu ba ltar 'dzag gang // guser sogs 'byung ba drug gi bcud // de ni brag zhun zhes byar bshad// de ni kun kyang kha zhing tshwa// shas che rA me drod zhu rjes che// gcod par byed de de la ni//
415b2(gso rig): lcags las byung po rab tu bsngags// ba gcin dri bro gnag pa dang // gu gul 'dra zhing gseg ma med// sbyinau bag snum zhing skyur ba dang // skra zhing 'jam la lci ba yi// brag zhun de ni mchog yi no// nad dang nang
415b3(gso rig): pa rjes mthun par// sman dang breg zhun cha mnyam byas// lcags kyi snong du sbyar bar bya// dang po chu ni nyi tshes bkra/ de 'og bska mas la bskol dang zhi// brag zhun sman dang mnyam byas la// brgyad tshwa'i nang du
415b4(gso rig): bskol bas bya// khu ba brgyad che lus btsags lo// dro 'jam nang du brag zhon gzhug/ de dang 'dres gyur bskams nas ni// sman chu'i nang du slar yang gzhug/ de ltar rang rang sman 'phrod ni// bskol ba'i khu bar
415b5(gso rig): lan bdun sngangs// de nas tig ta'i sman mar gyis// snum 'chos byas nas sbyang byas te// 'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba dang / shing mngar pa two la'i khu ba// brag zhun dag ni re re yang // zhag gsum bar du brud par bya//
415b6(gso rig): de nas de la sbyor ba ni// dus dang sbyar te blud par bya// de ltar brag zhon mi rnams la// shin tu phan par byed pa yin// yon tan ma lus skyed byed cing // 'phral du gnod par mi byed// zhag bdun phrag gcig
416a1(gso rig): phrag gsum dang // phrag bdun zho gnyis srang phyed gcig/ dman dang bar ma chen po yi// brag zhun go rim bzhin du sbyar// lus ni shin tu ma sbyangs la// brag zhun sbyangs pa btang /
416a2(gso rig): bar bya// zangs dang lcags drang dngul dang gser// kun dang yang nA bai r-i ra sbyar// 'o ma dang ni lhan cig btang // bcud len 'bras bu myur du 'grub// rgya sran mon sne'u dmi ru dang // phug ron shi ni rtag tu
416a3(gso rig): spang // gang zhig brag zhun gyis ni mngon sum du// ma bsal nad ni sa steng yod ma yin// dus su cho ga bzhin du bsten gyur na// nad med nyams stobs rgya chen skyed par byed// khang par gnas pa'i khom
416a4(gso rig): ldan can// phuna? sum tshogs dang ldan la phan// de las gzhan du de rnams la// nyi ma rlung gi cho ga bsten// rlung dang nyi chen bcas sbyor ba// bde ba'i longs spyod med na yang // gang zhig yus la mi
416a5(gso rig): gnod pa// mchog tu de ni bshad par bya// chu grang 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang // mar ni re re granyis gnyis dang // gsum pa 'am yang na thams cad ni// zas sngar 'thung sau na rgas sra byed// bu ram sbrang rtsi bca' skra

416b1(gso rig): ni 'phel bar byed 'gyur te// ji ltar dma' ba byas gzo ba// lan cig phan 'dogs ji bzhi no// skyu ru ra'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang // kha rA mar dang lde gur bcas// bsten zhing 'phrod pa za ba'i mi// rgas pa'i
416b2(gso rig): gnod pa 'jig 'gyur te// nyes bsrungs bstan bcos rgya chen mtshungs// skyu ru ra dang bi nAng+ka// oM si na yi snying po phye// lcags phye til mar sbrang rtsi yi// mar bcas lde gu bsten na ni// na tshong mdzes pa
