519a2(gso rig): du 'brum bu sngon po 'byung ba'i nad dang / rmen bu la sogs pa dang / phyi rol gyi sman dang / gzhung ka'i gzhang 'brum dang / sna 'am rna bar thug chen byung ba las/ khrag tu zad pa dang / sha dang pags pa'i bar gyi skran dang / lus
519a3(gso rig): skangs pa'i 'or nad la sogs pa 'di dag ni phyi rol gyi yan lag gi nad ces bya'o// khong pa'i nang grol gyi nang ni rtsa'i rgyun chen po bcu dang / ma zhu ba'i gnas pho ba dang / zhu ba'i sa 'di dag la nang grol rnams brten te/
519a4(gso rig): nad grol gyi nang du skyug pa 'byung ba tshad par 'khru ba/ lud par lu ba/ dbugs mi bde ba/ dmu rdzing dang / rims la sogs pa dang / lus skrangs pa'i 'or dang / nang nI gzhang 'brum dang / khrag tshad dang / skran dang / 'brum
519a5(gso rig): bu cig pa'i nad dang / 'brum chen dang / 'di rnams ni nang gi nang du gtog so// mgo bo dang / snying dang / chu sro dang / gnad rnams dang / rus pa rnams kyi nad ni tshigs kyi nad ces bya'o// tshigs de rnams 'brel ba'i rtsa
519a6(gso rig): ba dang / chu ba dang / chub chen po la sogs pa 'di dag ni bar gyi nad kyi lam srang zhes bya'o// bar gyi nad kyi lam srang zhes bya'o// bar gyi nad kyi lam srang de la nad ni tsong gso dka' ba dang / gzhog phye na ba dang /
519b1(gso rig): mjing pa dang / kha yon por gyur pa'i nad dang / klad pa na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / sna la sogs pa na bA dang / tshigs thams cad na ba dang / rus pa na ba dang / dpyin pa dang / gdon nad la sogs pa 'di rnams ni bar na
519b2(gso rig): gnas pa'i nad ces bya'o// lus la gnas pa'i rlung gi las sna tshogs bstan pa/ rlung gi las ni bshang gci'i dri ma thur du 'byin par byed/ rlung gis nau lus la khyab par byed/ snang pa snyam du lhangs lhangs byed
519b3(gso rig): pa dang / res 'ga' rlung khong du zhi na gnyid log pa bzhin dub par byed/ lus kyi drong chung / yan lag zug bya bzhin du na bu dang / so sor bye ba snyam du byed pa'i nu ba dang / lus dang yan lag 'byar ba snyam du
519b4(gso rig): byed cing na ba dang / sha rus cag pa snyam du byed pa drang / rkang lag 'khums pa dang / 'dug langs kyi bskyod pa dang / so dang sha rtse ba dang / lus rtas par byed pa dang / lus dang rkang lag 'dar ba dang /
519b5(gso rig): lus rtsub pa dang / lus kyi sbu gu dong pa dang / sha skem par byed pa dang / lus kyi sha mgul ba dang / lus bya sbyangs byed pa dang / rlung nAd kyis btab te lus rengs pa dang / rlung nad du na nA kha'i nang ro bska bar
519b6(gso rig): bro'o// rlung che ba'i bzhin mdog ni rtsa gnag gam/ thabs 'di rnams lta bur gyur pa ni rlung las gyur par blta'o// mau'i lus la mkhris pa'i las kyi 'gyur ba bstan pa/ lus la mkhris pa rgyas na
520a1(gso rig): lus tshe/ mdog dmar por 'gyur/ lus kyi drod dang zas 'ju bar byed/ lus rdul/ lus phyi nang rul bag tu mnam/ thor bu 'byung zhing rnag khrag tu 'dzag rma re cing 'khrul/ brgyal zhing myos/ kha'i
520a2(gso rig): nang ro khA ba dang / sgyur bar bro/ bzhin mdog ni ser skyar 'dug la rtsa dmar ba ma yauno// bad kan gyi las kyi lus 'gyur ba bstan pa/ lus la bad kan che ba ni lus kyi sha mdog bsnum/ sha ma khrang / lus g.ya'/ khong drang
520a3(gso rig): sa lci/ lus tshigs thams cad mi 'khrul bar dam por 'brel bar bya/ lus thams cad sha rgyas par byed/ bad kan chen sems ni rmongs bag tu byed/ lus skangs/ zas mi 'ju/ gnyid rab tu che/ lus dang bzhin
520a4(gso rig): gyi mdog ni dkaro// ro kha ni mngar dang lanra tshwa bro'o// las ci bye dro cog la 'dam rIng ngo // de ltar nad do tsog thams cad ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kun gyi rang bzhin las gyur cing des nad la khyab par balnga'o//
520a5(gso rig): nad pa'i nang brtag pa'i thabs bshad pa/ ci na pa brtag pa ni/ bzhin mdog dang / mig dang / lce dang / sen mo dang / blta ba dang / rtsa la lag pas myangs te blta ba dang / nang pa'i thebs dri ba dang / ji ltar na ba dang / ji tsam
520a6(gso rig): na nang ldang ba dang / mi na ba'i snga rol tu kha zas ci zos/ las ci dag byas pa zhig tu legs par brtags te shes par byas la/ rtsing po yal bar mi bya'o// de lta bas na sman pa'i nad kyi bye brag dang / nad tshabs che zhing
520b1(gso rig): dam la bab par shes shing mthong nas/ phyi bshol ma byed cig/ yong ni sran sbyar ba'i thabs dang / btang ba dang / gso ba'i thabs 'di rnams kyi las mthong ste lobs par bya ba dang / lag bsod par bya ba dang /
520b2(gso rig): sman pa la btam snyan par grags par bya ba 'di rnams kun kyang lan mang du goms/ gdod 'grub par 'gyur ro// dper na nor bu rin po che 'ching bu mi lta bu bzang ngan lta ba dpyad kyi yi ges shes par mi 'gyur gyi/
520b3(gso rig): mthong ba mang po la lobs te shes pa dang 'dra'o// mI'i nad kyang mi tshugs te/ lA la ni tshe 'di nyid kyi kha zas mI 'phrod pa las nad du gyur bzhin du nAd ldang bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi nyes sdig las nad du gyur pa ni/
520b4(gso rig): nAnang ldang ba'i kha zas mi 'phrod pa lta bu ma zos bzhin du nang lda ngo // nang ldang ba'i rgyu dang sngon gyi nyes sdig gnyis ka 'dres pa las nad du 'gyur ba'i chung ngu las nad tshabs dkyil chen 'gyur ba'o// de la da lngar
520b5(gso rig): gyi tshe 'di'i zas mi 'phrod pa la sogs pa la nad du gyur pa la sogs pa'i thabs ni/ nad dang mi mthun pa la brten na phan te/ dper nu snum nad lnga kha zas snum bag dang / drong bag phan pa lta bu/ mkhris
520b6(gso rig): pa'i nang la bsil ba dang / mngar bag phan pa lta bu/ bad kan la kha zas rtsub pa dang / drod bag bsten na nang zhi bar 'gyuraro// tshe snga ma'i nyes sdig gi las las byung ba'i rang ni/ bsod nams dang / dge ba cher
521a1(gso rig): byas te/ las byas na nad 'tsho'o// rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nang gzhi dang / sngon gyi las gnyis ka las byung ba'i nad ni/ rlung dang mkhris pa la sogs pI nad gzhi de nyid dang / sdig pa'i
521a2(gso rig): las de byang zhing zad na 'tsho'o// nod do cog la rnam pa gnyis te/ rlung nad dang mkhris pa'i nad lta bu rang gi gnas nyid na nang du gyur pa de ni rang gi gnas kyi nang rang dbang can zhes bya'o// rlung nad dang mkhris pa'i nang
521a3(gso rig): lta bu rang rang gis ma yin pa/ pha rol po mkhris pa 'am/ bad kan gyi gnas su rlung nad zhugs par gyur na/ de ni gzhan gyi gan su nad zhugs te gzhan la rag lus pa'i nad ces bya'o// rang gi gnas dang gzhan
521a4(gso rig): gyi gnas de gnyis la yang / nad rnam pa gnyis gnyis su shes par bya'o// de ji ltar zhe na/ nad gang yang rung ba zhig gis btab pa las/ sngar nad gang gi tshul yin par shes pa dang / nad de las dkyil skyes te//
521a5(gso rig): ban bon gyi gnod pa'i nad ci yin par shes par bya ba dang rnam pa gnyis// nang 'di gnyis ni rang gi gnas rang dbang can dang / gzhan gyi gnas rang dbang med pa gnyis la/ de ltar nad kyi tshul gnyis sa
521a6(gso rig): par bya'o// de la rlung nad dang mkhris pa lta bu rang gi gnas nyid nas rang gi gnas nyid nad ladra pa rang dbang zhes bya pa de ni/ nas kyi tshul mngon te shes par sra ba yino// khris pa 'am 'ang kan lja bu'i
521b1(gso rig): zhugs te langs pa de ni/ gzhan gyi sar nang zhugs pa gzhan dbang zhes bya ste/ de ni mkhris pa 'am bad kan gang gi sar nang zhugs kyang rung ste/ de la ni mkhris pa 'am bad kan ltar gso ba'i cho ga byas na rlung
521b2(gso rig): nArlung de gsos par 'gyur ro// dri ma gshang gci dang rdul ba la yang nad rang gi sa dang / gzhan gyi gnas rnams pa gnyis shes par rlung nad dam mkhris pa'i nang gang yang rung rgyun tu na ba las/ khwa zas
521b3(gso rig): mAM 'phrod pa zos sam/ zas ma zhu 'am/ srog zungs bdun po nyams te nang du 'gyur ba ni nad glang thabs zhes bya'o// 'di lta bur nang glang thabasu gyur pa la sman pa mig mi g.yengs par nan tan cher
521b4(gso rig): gyis shig/ de la dang po nad kyis btAb nAs nad kyi tshul ci yin par shes pa/ dang por de nyid gsos na/ nad de las gyur pa'i ban bon g+hi n+yAng gyur pa'i nang dang / gnyi ga 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// gal te nang dpyang
521b5(gso rig): de de ltar byas te ma btub na lan bon gyi rlung gyur pa'i nAd tshabs che ste/ lus la gnod pa'i nang ngan pa de bye sos la/ thag nas snga ma ni phyis sos shig/ lan gyi lan bon+da dang klang thab su na ba de lta bu'i
521b6(gso rig): nad kyi ming nges pa med de/ nang de lta bu'i ming sman pas mi shes zhes ngo tsha nam yang ma byed par nad kyi tshul dang sbyor te dpyad gyis shig/ rlung nang mkhris pa dang bang kan gyi nang gang yang rung ba nad langs
522a1(gso rig): ba'i nAng tshabs kyi dmigs dang / nang de rlung ngam mkhris pa'i gnas gzhan lta bur 'phros pa las/ nad de sngar dang mi 'dra bar mang por 'gyuraro// de lta bas nA nang bla gnyen du gyur pa
522a2(gso rig): de la nad nyid rlung ngam mkhris pa 'am bad kan gyi rang bzhin gang ba dang yang sbyar/ nad de yang nad rang gi gnas na 'dug gam/ nad de gnas gzhan du 'phos sam/ nad de gzhi ci las nad du gyur pa'i bye
522a3(gso rig): brag sman pas shes par gyis la/ sman dpyad myur du gyis shig/ nad gso ba de yang srog zungs bdun po ci 'dra ba dang / nad pa'i nyams stobs dang / dbyar dgun ci 'dra ba'i dus dang sbyar ba dang / nad pa'i
522a4(gso rig): khong pa me'i drod che chung dang / nad pa rlung ngamo mkhris pa'i rang bzhin ci yin pa dang / nad pa'i na med dang / nad pa'i snying stobs che chung dang / nang pa'i lus thogs kha zas gang gis bskyed bskyed po dang / da ltar kha zla ba
522a5(gso rig): dang ci 'phrod pa dang / tshabs che chung dang / tshul 'di lta bu'i bye brag tha dad pa phra mo chung ngu yan chad zhib tu brtags la/ nad dang sman gyi tshul du sbyar zhing nad pa gso bar byed pa de lta bu ni/ sran bcad rnams kyang
522a6(gso rig): 'khrul pa med pa zhes bya'o// nad pa'i nang dkyil tshe 'am/ tshobs chung ngam/ sman dang 'brum bu la sogs pa lta bu nad kyi dbyibs sna tshogs kyi tshul ci 'dra ba dang / nad pa'i phog sna tshe chung dang / lus tshe dang / nang
522b1(gso rig): pa'i nyams che chung gi tshul yang shes par byas la/ nad kyang rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du gyur par snang yang / de'i tshe sman pa ma yengs par legs par rtogs shig/ sman pas nang ba lci yang gi drod tshan zin nas
522b2(gso rig): gso ba'i dpyad smos shig/ gal te yang nAd dmigs chung snyam du bsams te/ kha zas mi 'byid pa zar bcug gam/ khwa zlas kyi cho ga tshong ma zin no// nang tshabs cher 'gyur ro// nang dkyil che ba zhig la/ bkru
522b3(gso rig): sman nyungs som/ bkru sman gyi stobs chung na/ de ni sman thun chung ngur sbyong ba zhes bya ste/ nges nang slongs la 'khyil te nang mi phyin mi 'byung // bkru sman gyi mthu yang che/ sman rno ste mthu dang yang dag ldan par
522b4(gso rig): btang na/ de ni sman thun cher sbyor ba zhes bya ste/ des ni nang phyin cing 'khru bar byi// yang bkru sman ha cang rno la drag po thun cha ches par btang na/ de ni log par sbyor ba zhes bya ste/ bshad gci'i dri ma thur du
522b5(gso rig): 'khrus par ma zad kyi/ lus yod ma rung por 'gyur ro// de'i phyir sman pas nang gauso ba ni rtag tu brtson 'grus bskyed de/ nad pa'i nang dang / nang pa'i nyam drod kyi tshul ci 'dra ba legs par rab tu brtags te shes
522b6(gso rig): bar byas la/ nad 'byang zhing 'tsho ba'i tshul du 'tsho ba'i dpyad rtog tu gyis shig/ lus la bang kan dang / mkhris pa dang // rlung gang dang / gang na gnas pa dang / rlub dang bad kan dang / mkhris pa las so so'i nang dmigs
523a1(gso rig): cir gyur pa bstan pa'i le'u bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so// / rlung nad dang mkhris pa'i nang dang bad kan gyi nang gso thabs bstan pa'i le'u bcu gsum pa bshad par bya'o// de la rlung nang du gyur
523a2(gso rig): pa la gso ba'i thabs ni/ mar dang / rkang dang / tshil dang / til mar dang dang // bzhi po 'di dag ni sngam zhes bya'o// 'di dag dang yang rlung 'byin pa lums dang / dugs dang / gtAr ba'i dugs dang / bkru smon 'jam pos bkru
523a3(gso rig): dang / lus mnye ba dang / lag pa rkang lag dang lus la bcu zhing skor ba dang / zas mngar bag dang / sbyar bag dang / lan tshwa dang / drong bag gi kha zas de lta bur sbyar te sbyin pa dang / thabs gzhan yang dngas par bya
523a4(gso rig): dang sman e raN+Da dang / nye'u shing dang / gze ma la sogs pa bskol ba'i chus lus bkru zhing chu dron gyi nang du gzhugs pa dang / kha zas snum bgra gsod pa zos pa'i tsha lAlnga nan ni 'bras chang dang / bu ram chang dang /
523a5(gso rig): gro chang bzang // rlung nang la phan pa'i sman+da mas btang ba skum brag dron por sbyar la bde zhing phan pa'i phyir rta tu btango // kha zas kyi cho ga ni shA tshon po dang / drong che zhing 'ju ba'i spyod sman dang / snum thag sde
523a6(gso rig): du mar sbyar te chos par bdus pa'i khu ba'i bcud de lta bu bza'o// rlung nang la ni til mar dang sbyar te sman bces pa mas btang na mchog tu pha no// mkhris pa'i nang la ni bkru sman mngar zhing bsil bar bkru'o//
523b1(gso rig): zas ni mngar zhing kha ba dang / bska ba'i kha zas sman de lta bu bza'o// skom ni 'o ma dang mar du sbyar pa / pa'i chu skom du bza // ka pur dang / tsan dan dang / li shi la sogs pa la bsil zhing dri zhim pos bzang po dang /
523b2(gso rig): me tog de lta bu bsnam zhing lus la byug pa dang / gdags par bya'o// mgul pa do shal dang / seM ya de dang / nor bu rnams mgul dang byang la bcang zhing gdag so// nyin par ni rtag tu ga pur dang / tsan dan dung
523b3(gso rig): sman u shi ra dang / 'di rnams zhib tu btags pa'i 'di gus skad tsog cing lus la rgyun du bsku'o// mtshan mo ni snga gang zhal zhal dkar por byas la/ bsil ba'i nang du zla nyi mo la 'du la/ drung du gru snun pa yid du
523b4(gso rig): 'ong ba lan du bcug la/ gser bu bsil ba'i dang ldang ba lus la bab par bya zhing / grogs po bde ba bgra phebs pa dang / nyams rab su 'dug cing bru la zhing skad kyis tshigs nyams rangasu smra'o// bdag gi
523b5(gso rig): chung ma yang yid du 'ong zhing yon tan gyis brgyan pa/ khyo'i yid bzhin du byed pa de lta bu la rim gro bya zhing / nyin par che ba'i tshe khang pa bsil ba khang pa nyis rim gyi nang na 'dug cing / chu grang mo de sil ba rgyun 'bang
523b6(gso rig): du blugs pa dang / bskyed mos tshal gyi nang na rdzing bu bzang po rgya che ga chu bsil ba stegs legs par bcas pa dang / bye ma'i bsil ba yod pa'i drung du 'dug cing / chu 'gram na pad+mo bzang po 'khrungs pa'i
524a1(gso rig): drung na/ rgyasab kyi bsil khang phub pa/ me tog dang 'bras bu yod pa'i shing gi yal ga mang po thib par chags pa'i gnas bsil ba de lta bu na 'dug cing / kha zas bsil 'o ma dang /
524a2(gso rig): mar dag bza'o// yo nga ni che ba'i nad la mchog tu bkru sman bsil bas bkrus pa bza'o// bad kan rgyas pa'i nang la ni skyug sman dang bkru sman rnon pos skyug cing bkru'o// kha zas ni rtsub pa chung ba/ rno ba drong che ba
524a3(gso rig): tsha ba dang / kha ba ska ba de lta bu'i zas dang sman sbyin no// 'tshal nan ni yun ring por gzhag gzhug pa btung / mtshan mo gnyid kyis mi log pa dang / bud med dang nyal bar bya/ lus bcag cing sbyang ba dang / bsil
524a4(gso rig): bab rnam pa sna tshogs bya// lus la rtsub pos mnye/ sems las bskyed/ bad kan rgyas pa la ni mchog tu skyug sman pa no// chu tshan bskol ba chen po 'thungs na bad kan 'bri/ s+thadwau rtsi dang sman rtsub bor sbyar te zos na/ bang
524a5(gso rig): kan dang tshil zad par 'gyur ro// zas bsnyung bar bya ba dang / dud pas bdug pa dang / sman btsos pa'i khu ba bzhag cing dbo ba dang / thabs 'di lta bur byas na bang ken gyi nad phyin te bde bar 'gyur/ rung nang dang /
524a6(gso rig): mkhris pa'i nad dang / bde kan gyi nang bsal zhing gso ba'i thabs ni de ltar bstan pa yino// yang rlung nang dang / bang kan gyi nang du 'dom mam/ mkhris pa dang rlung nang du 'dom ma ma/ rlung nang bad kan du 'dom
524b1(gso rig): yang rung / nang 'di sna gnyi su 'dren pa 'di lta bu dang / rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum char gyi nang 'dres par gyur pa de lta bu la 'dres pa'i nang dang / 'dus pa'i nad so so'i tshul bzhin du brtag cing dpyod//
524b2(gso rig): dpyid dang sos ka dang ston gyi tshe bde kun dang mkhris pa la sogs pa'i nang langs na/ gso ba'i dpyad bya ba dpyid kyi dus ni bad+ma kan gyi nad langs pa'i tshe/ bad kan gyi nad zla la rlung nad kyang g.yos te/ de gnyis lhan
524b3(gso rig): cig tu 'byung ba yin mod kyi/ dpyid bad kan gyi nang gsos na rlung nad kyang de'i zla la zhi bar 'gyuraro// spos ka'i tshe tsha ches te pal cher mkhris pa'i nang mang du ldang ste/ de'i zla la rlung nad kyang 'byung mod kyi
524b4(gso rig): mkhris pa'i nad gsos na rlung nad kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro// ston ka mkhris pa'i nang ldang ba'i dus la bab ste/ de'i zla rlung nad kyang langs te/ gnyis ka lhan cig tu 'doms mod kyi/ mkhris pa'i nad gsos na/ rlung
524b5(gso rig): nad kyang zhar la zhi bar 'gyur ro// yod ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kun gsum gyi nad dang po nad dkyil du sogs pa nyid kyi tshe na/ brtsal te nad zhi bar byas na bzang // gal te sngar de ltar nAd sel ma nus
524b6(gso rig): yang / rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa'i nad yang rung langs shing g.yos pa'i tshe/ nad nang ma 'dom na so so'i thabs bzhin du gsos shig/ gal te rlung nad dang mkhris pa'i nad dang bad kan gyi nad thams
525a1(gso rig): cad cig car 'doms shing nA te mi bde na/ rlung nad drang mkhris pa'i nad gang tshabs che bA de sngar gso zhing / nad tshabs mi che ba lhag ma gzhan la yang mI gnod mi ldang ba de lta bu'i thabasu gso'o// nang
525a2(gso rig): bsal zhing gso ba'i thabs ni nang dmigs gang mi bde ba yang gsos shing zhi bar byed la/ nad gzhan yang mi ldang bar bya'o// yang la la nad langs pa ni dub cing gsos par mi nus la/ nu bre gsar glang thabs slong bar byed pa
525a3(gso rig): de lta bu ni dpyad ngan pa mi mkhas pa zhes bya'o// dpyad mkhas pa ni nang gang mi bde bo de yang sos par byed la/ nad gzhan ldang ba'i nyen du mi 'gyur bar nus pa de ni mkhas pa zhes bya'o// rlung nad la sogs par 'gyur
525a4(gso rig): ba'i tshul nau las drag shul lta bu byas pa dang / zos drod che ba lta bu'i bag zos pa dang / tsha ba'i bag zos pa dang / gnod par 'gyur ba rnams byas pa nad lus kyi khong na yod pa'i rnams dkyil skyes nas/ lus kyi yan lag
525a5(gso rig): dang / rus pa dang / gnas la sogs pa kun gyi nang du rlung nad la sogs pa 'gro zhing 'jug par 'gyu ro// de lta bu'i rlung nad la sogs zhugs par gyur nas/ nad dkyil skyes pa yang skyug sman dang bkru sman la sogs
525a6(gso rig): pas rtsa sgo thams cad nas nang bkru ste/ bsal na nang dkyil skyes pa de bkrus shing gzags pa dang / sbyangs shing bsal du rung bar smin par byas pa dang / 'di rnams kyi nad rtse gzhil zhing nang khong du bsdu bar bya'o// rlung rtse
525b1(gso rig): bci lA te khong na gnas pa de yang nad tan nas ma phyin cing 'dug na/ nad de ldang bar 'dug pa'i rgyu kha zas mi 'phrod pa dang / nam ma 'phrad kyi bar du khong na sdod cing thogs te/ rlung nad la sogs pa srong ba'i gzhi kha
525b2(gso rig): zas mi 'phrod pa dang / dpyid dang / dbyar ston drang / dgun nad la sogs pa nad so so'i ljang ba'i dus kyi stobs dang ldan par gyur na yang nad lnga // yang ni so so'i nang ldang ba'i dus su zas mi 'phrod pa rjer zos
525b3(gso rig): sam/ de bsten pa'i rkyen gyis dus kyi na ma yin la mkhris pa dang bad kan gzhan la sogs pa yang ldang ngo // gzhan yang nad lding ba'i ni rlung ngam mkhris pa lta bu'i bon gyis bad kan gyi nad lta bu yang gcig la
525b4(gso rig): gcig bsten nas ljang ngo // de la yang bang kan gyi sar rlung nad zhugs sam/ mkhris pa'i sar rlung nang zhugs sam/ rlung gi sar mkhris pa 'am/ bad kan zhugs kyang rung ste/ nad glang thabs zhugs pa ni mthu che sngan
525b5(gso rig): gnas pa'i snying ni stobs chung zhing zhan par 'gyur te/ mi bde na/ de la gso ba'i dpyad ni snga na gnas pa gang yang rung ba de mgu bskyed cing gsos na/ glang thabasu zhugs pa zhar la phyin cing 'byung ngo // yang na nang gzhan
525b6(gso rig): gyi sar nad glang thabasu zhugs pa de nyid sman dpyad kyi cho ga'i stobs kyis nad bsal te zhi bar byas na/ bad kan nam mkhris pa rong gi sa nas nas gnas pa de ni gso mi dgos por rang 'tsho'i/ rtsibs logs so//
526a1(gso rig): glo g.yas g.yon nam/ rkang lag g.yas g.yon du nad zhugs par gyur na dkyilnga che ste/ nad pa yun ringasu nyon mongs par 'gyuraro// de gso ba'i cho ga yang 'phral du rings thabasu byas na/
526a2(gso rig): lus dang / khongs pa nang gi me'i drod dang nyams mthu la gnod par 'gyur gyis/ rings thebs su ni mi bya'i/ de ni sman dang dpyad kyi rtsibs logs g.yas g.yon dang / yan lag g.yas kyi nang de lus kyi khong du
526a3(gso rig): bsdu zhing brlan te bde bar zhi bar bya zhing gso'o// de ltar na nad kun khong du 'dus pa shes nas/ nad gang du nyo bar 'ongs pa bzhin du gyen du slon pa dang / zur du bkru ba dang / sman mas btang bas nang bsal ba de lnga
526a4(gso rig): bus nang dbyung ngo // nad pa gzhi na ni/ rlung ngam mkhris pa 'am/ bad kan gyi nad gang yang rung sde/ nang rtse ma gzhil na/ nang tshabs che ste/ nad ma smin pa'i rtags ni/ bu ga dgu nas 'byung ba rnams 'gag/ nyams stobs
526a5(gso rig): chung zhing nyams/ lus lce/ lto ba'i nang na rlung 'khrul zhing 'u ru ru zer/ khong snyom/ kha zas mi 'dra/ bar kan dang mchil ma yang / bshang lha snga zhing 'gag/ kha zas yi gar mi 'ong / khong mya la te 'di ni nad ngo cog gang
526a6(gso rig): gis btab yang rung ste/ rtse ma bzhi la na ma thub pa'i rtags yino// nang thabs 'di lta bu las bzlogs dang rdza zil te smid yi no// de di la zhe ma/ khong pa'i drod chung / nyams stobs chung / khams bdun pa
526b1(gso rig): la drang po'i khams bcud ces bya ba khong du mi 'ju/ nang khong du drod kyis pho ba'i nang du zhugasu traHdwe na bcud drangs ma yang ma zhu bar 'dug pas na/ de'i tshe de lnga bu ni nang rtse zhil te smin pa'i rtags yino// nad tshabs po
526b2(gso rig): che zhig gis btab pa'i steng du// nang glang thabs gzhan zhig kyang btab te/ rnam pa gnyisu 'odo lnga ste na ba ni dper ko tra pa zhes bya ba ci tshe las dug tu gyur pa dang 'dra ste/ nad tshabs chen por gyur pa zhes bya'o// de lta
526b3(gso rig): bur nad tshabs chen po dang dris shing 'doms pa'i nad kyis btab ste/ rlung dang bad dan dang mkhris pa 'dres par gyur na/ khamaso bdun la yang gnod pa'i nang du 'gyur te/ de lta bu ni nang smin pa bsngo zhing tshobs che ba
526b4(gso rig): zhes bya'o// de lta bu'i nad las nang gzhan yang gsar du 'byung ste/ lus thog thag tu nad zhugs te na na/ rtse ma zhil gyi bar du bAk+Sha sman dang / skyug sman lta bu mi btang // ji lta zhe na/ nang nang du zhugs te phyir ma phyung ba ni/
526b5(gso rig): dap+ta shing tog ma smin pa las khu ba mi 'byung ba dang 'dra ste/ de lta bu la sman btang na lus me rungs par 'gyur la/ nad kyang mi phyin no// de lte bas na nad bsal du rung bar srin te/ rtse zhil bar bya ba dang / drod che
526b6(gso rig): ba'i zas kyis drod bskyed pa dang / rlung nad la snum bag gis brta ba dang / dugs dang lums la sogs pas rtsi bcil te nad bsil du rung bar bya'o// nad gsal du rung bar gyur nas nad dmigs dang sbyar la nad
527a1(gso rig): gang du nye bar gyur pa las/ gyen du bskon pa dang / thur du bkru ba nad pa'i nyams stobs dang sbya rA la/ bkru zhing smon par 'gyur na/ nad 'byung ba la rang gis 'byung du mi snang bar rung gis ma bkag shig/
527a2(gso rig): mnag ste ma slon ma 'khrus par byas na/ de nyid la nad du 'gyur ro// de ltar stod smad du nang 'khrus shing byung nas/ nad phyin phyin gyi bar du ni/ ci nas kyang 'khru zhing slon la/ nad phyin phyin gyi bar du bsdadado// nang phyin par gyur nas
527a3(gso rig): gdon phan pa'i kha zas bza'o// yang skyug sman dang bkru sman btang ba las/ sman 'khyil te mi slon mi 'khru bar gyur na/ nang 'byung bar 'gyur ba rtse gzhil zhing smin par byed pa'i sman gyis bsal du rung bar byas la/ slon
527a4(gso rig): pabapa'am bkru bas sbyang ngo // skyug sman dang bkru sman gyis sbyang zhing / bsal ba'i dus ni dbyar zla the chung gi ngo la rlung nang bsal ba'i duso// ston zla tha chung gi ngo la/ mkhris pa'i nad gsal ba'i dus yino// dpyid zlo 'bring po la
527a5(gso rig): badra kan gyi nad bsol ba'i dus yAn te/ nad sbyar zhing bsal ba'i rim pa ni de lta bu'o// de la nad dkyil du sogs pa'i rim pa na de lta bu'o// de lu nad dkyil du sogs pa'i rim pa ni sosa? ka'i dus dbyor zla ba dang / dbyar zla
527a6(gso rig): 'bring po la che ba'i nad mkhris pa ni langs so// rlung nad ni khong du sogaso// dbyar gyi dus na dbyar zla tha chung dang / ston zla ra bI ngo la rlung nad ni langaso// mkhris pa'i nad ni sogaso// ston zla 'bring po dang ston zla tha chung la tsho ba'i
527b1(gso rig): mkhris pa'i nad ni langs/ glang ba'i rlung nang ni sogs so// dbun spyod dang dgun smad ni langs/ bang kan gyi nad ni sogaso// dpyid zla ni bad kan gyi nang ldango // de ltar dus re re la nang sogs pa dang / ldang ba'i dmigs
527b2(gso rig): dang sbyar te/ dwe la bad+ma kun gyi nad ni stod du skyug cing drang ngo // mkhris pa'i nad ni thur du bkru'o// rlung nad ni sman mas gdang zhing bsalo// de lta byas na sos ka rab tu tsha ba'i dus dang / dbyar zla rlung nad langs pa'i dus dang /
527b3(gso rig): dgun grang ba'i tshe/ so so'i nad langs shing sbed pa'i dus su sman gyis bkru zhing skyug cing grang ngo // de bas na dgun dang dpyid kyi mams dpyid dang sos ka'i mtshams/ sos ka darje dbyar gyi mutshams/ dbyar ston dang dgun gyi
527b4(gso rig): mtshams 'di lta bu so so'i nad ma langs/ ma byung ba'i skab su bkru sman dang skyug sman gyi nang sbyang zhing bsal na rtag tu nang zhi zhing / bde ba tha mal par gnas par 'gyur ro// rtag par mi na bla 'dod na sdang thabs 'di ltar
527b5(gso rig): gyis shig/ nad kyi dbang du gyur te mi bde ba zhig na/ yang thabs 'di lta bur bya'o// sos ka dang dbya dang dgun gyi sngo so'i dpyad dang / cho ga tshul bzhin du nad kyi dmigs rim pa dang sbyor la gyis shig/ so so'i babs skabs
527b6(gso rig): su skyug sman dang bkru sman la sogs pa btang ba cho ga bya ba'i dus su ma shel mo yol par gyis shig/ sman btang zhing bza' ba'i bye brag bshad pa rnam pa bcu la/ kha zas ma zos par khye'u sus la sman btang ba dang / gro gar
528a1(gso rig): sman btang ba'i rjes la zan bza' ba dang / zan phyed zos na sman bza' ba dang / zan zos skom 'thungs zin pa'i rjes la sman gyis mnan pa dang / nang par gyi khye'u sus dang / phyi 'phred kyi zas kyi bar nyi
528a2(gso rig): ma gung la sman btang ba dang zan dang sman bag cing bza' ba dang / yong dang mang tsheg pur bza' ba dang / 'bras chan nam zan dang sman lhan cig bcos te bza' ba 'am/ yang na so sor bsos pa las sreg te bza' ba dang /
528a3(gso rig): sngar sman bting la de'i rjes la kha zas spang ba cung zad zos nas sran btang ba dang / mtshan mo nyal gar smen btung ba dang / rnam pa de bcu'o// yod sman btango cog kyang nang pa'i nang dmigs dang sbyar la/ smyan btang ba'i dus
528a4(gso rig): las ma gyur par btangango // de la nang par khye'u sus la kha zas ma zos par sman bza' ba ni/ nang pa po ba'i drod che la be'u snabs kyang med po ba'i rtsa sgo rnams kyang ma 'gags la/ nad pa'i nyams stobs dang ldan/ bad
528a5(gso rig): kan shas kyis che ba'i mi de lta bu la/ sman khye'u sos la btAng na sman mthu rab tu che bar 'gyu ro// de la dro khar sman btang ba'i rjes la zan bza' ba ni/ rlung nang a ba na thur du sel ba zhes bya ba'i nad kyis btab pa bsal
528a6(gso rig): ba dang / lus kyi nyams stobs bskyed pa dang / sha skem zhing grims par bya ba'i phyir/ gro kha sman 'thungs pa'i rjes la zan bza' bar bya'o// zan phyed zos na sman bza' ba ni rlung nad sa ma na me'i drod dang mnyam du
528b1(gso rig): gnas pa zhes bya ba las nad du gyur pa de lnga bu la/ zan phyed zos na sman btang la 'jug kyang zan dang skom gyis mnan to// thabs 'di ltar btung na rlung nad de lta bu'i nad dang khong pa'i nang gi nang rnam dang / mkhris
528b2(gso rig): pa brgyas pa'i nod la phan no// zan zos skom 'thungs pa'i rjes la sman gyis gnan ces bya ba ni/ rlung khyab byed ces bya ba las nad du gyur te mi bde ba dang / rlung nad a pa na zhes thur du sel bar byed pa'i nang khye'u
528b3(gso rig): sus la sman btang bas ma phan pa dang / mtshan mo ni bde ba'i nAd ma zhi ba lnga phan par bya ba dang / ro stong yan chad la bde zhing stobs mthu bskyed pa dang bad+ma kan las nad du gyur pa la zhi bar bya ba dang / sha mchog skye
528b4(gso rig): zhing sbom por bya ba 'di lta bu la/ kha zas kyi 'jug la spun gyis mnan cing bza' sto/ gro kha'i zan gyi 'jug la spar bza' zhing gnan to// nad par gyi khye'u sus dang / phyi 'phred kyi zas kyi byar nyi ma gung la sman

528b6(gso rig): par bya ba med de/ 'dir 'du so// zan khar re dang / sman thun re sbal zhing bza' ba zhes bya kha ni/ srog ces bya ba'i rlung las nad du gyur pa dang / pho ba'i dred skyes pa dang / bud med la nyal phod par bya ba dang / snying na ba dang /
529a1(gso rig): skyug pa bshang ba 'di lta bu la zan la kham re zos shing sman bcur nis phye ba 'am/ sman 'de gu'am/ sman ril bu thun re dang spel zhing bza'o// yang dang yang tsheg bur bza' ba ni zan zos kyang rung /
529a2(gso rig): gas mi bde ba dang lud pa lu ba dang / skyigs bus btab pa dang / skom gyis gdungs pa dang / dug gis phog pa dang / sdug bro ba 'di lta bu la sogs pa sman cag pur yang dang yang bza'o// 'bras chen nam zan
529a3(gso rig): sman lhan cig btsos te/ bza' ba 'am/ yang na so sor btsos pa la bsregs te bza' ba ni/ byis pa chung ngu sman 'thung mi nus pa dang / sman stobs chung ngus sman 'thungs pa la zhan pa dang / sman dang kha zas yi

529a6(gso rig): la sman 'thungs na phan no// mtshan mo nyal khar smon btang ba ni/ mgul pa yan chad sdod kyi nang la mtshan mo nyal khar sman btang na phan te/ de la skom 'am/ yang na chu 'thungs par ma gyur tam/ zas ma zhu 'am

529b2(gso rig): nyams stobs brta zhing gso ba'i thabs dang / nang yang bar bya ba'i phyi ra zas dbri ba dang / sbyang bar bya ba dang / rnam pa gnyis kyi le'u bcu bzhi pa bshad par bya'o// dpyad rnam pa gnyisu bshad pa de la cig gis lus kyi

530a4(gso rig): pa dang / nyi ma tshwa ba la 'de ba dang / tsha ba'i nad lA bser bu bsil ba dang sbyar ba 'dri dag ni 'phral du nang dub cing zhi bar bya ba yin/ rlung nad dang mokhris pa'i nad gnyis la ni brta ba'i cho ga dang / dub cing zhi bar bya ba'i dpyang bya'o//

531b1(gso rig): sbyaspya ba la sogs pa cung bad tsam byu rung // sbyin gos shing nyams mchog brtsa ba'i dbyung bya ba dang skyug spyan dang bkru spun+d+ha dang spyang bar byas te/ nyams mchog sbyang bar bya ba yang yul gyi snrums dang / dus dang

531b5(gso rig): khong gsung pa'i sgregs pa mnam po mi zhim pa med pa tha me la bAr 'byung ba la/ sems kyang gsal/ dang grwa dang / gre ba yang sang sang por gyur la/ nA ba dang mi bde ba yang rtse zhil la/ khong yang zhing ci bya'o cog
531b6(gso rig): la sems spro ba yod/ myong myong po snyom pa'i bag med pa de lta bu ni/ kha zas smrang byas pas phan par mngon pa yin// nyam mchog badz+ra ste shi bskyed pa'i cho ga tshod ma zin te ha cang drags pas ha cang che ro skyes
532a1(gso rig): sam/ kha zas bri zhing smad pa dang / sbyang bar byas pa drags pa ha cang skem por gyur pa 'di gnyis lta bu la sman dpyad kyi cho gar bya ba ni/ sha cher skyes pa dang / kha zas sbyang bar byas pa las nad cir gyur
532a2(gso rig): pa'i tshul mngon te/ lus sha ha cang che zhing tsho ba la ni nad 'brum bu dang / gcin snyi ba'i nad dang / rims nad dang / dmu rdzing lta bu gsus pa tshor skyes pa'i nang dang / bshang gci 'byung ba'i mtsham su mtshan mar brdol
532a3(gso rig): ba'i nad dang / lud pa lu ba dang / rims rmongs bus 'debs pa dang / gcin sri ba dang pho byar be'u snabs chags te zas mi 'ju ba dang / mdze la sogs pa'i nad mi bzad pa rnams 'byung ngo // de la sha che zhing tshan po ni tshil
532a4(gso rig): zad par bya ba dang / rlung dang bad kan bsal bar bya ba lta bu'i dpyad thams cad bzang ngo // de la mi tshon po skem po grims par bya ba'i kha zas ni/ rgya sran ku la ta dang / dzurna dang / shwa marka khre rgod dang / nas dang /
532a5(gso rig): sran chung mon sran rde'u dang / 'di rnams g.yo su byas pa bzang zhing / skom du ni sbrang rtsi chu dang sbyang ba dang / zho ga chu dang / dar ba dang / 'di rnams btung ngo // yang sman a ri ta'i khu ba skom du bsnan pa btung ngo //
532a6(gso rig): sems la bskyed pa dang / skyug sman dang bkru sman btang ba dang / lus gsig cing bcag pa dang mtshan mo 'dod 'dod mi nyal bar bya'o// sman ni a ru ra dang / ba ru ra dang / skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu gsum zhi ba tu
532b1(gso rig): btags la/ sbrang rtsi lde gus sbrus te bza'o// yang sman gu ru tse sle tres dang / a ru ra dang / gla sgang chen po 'di gsum btags te sbrang rtsi las sbrus pa bza'o// yang sman ra tsany+dzan zhes bya ba skyer khaN+Da dang /
532b2(gso rig): rtsa ba chen po lnga zhes bya ba sa la par+Ni dang / pi na par+Na dang / pra ha ti dang / kaN+Da kA ri dang / gze ma dang / 'di lnga btang ngo // yang gu gul btang ba'i dpyad dang / sman brag zhun btang ba'i dpyad bya'o// sman ag+ni
532b3(gso rig): sman ta'i khu ba yang btang na yang sha 'bri'o// yang sman bi tang+ga dang / skra dang / ya bak+ShA ra nas tshig 'khrus pa'i cha dang / lcags kyi tshe tshA phye ma nAg po dang / nas dang skyu ru ra dang / 'di rnamos phye mar byas
532b4(gso rig): la/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te btang na/ sha che zhing tsho ba'i nang sel zhing sha grims par 'ong ngo // yang tsha ba rnam pa gsum po bcwa sga dang / piM pi ling dang / na le sham dang / ka ti tA dang / ba ru ro dang skyu ru
532b5(gso rig): rA dang gsum dang / shi gru dang / byi nAM ka dang / bod nga dang / thi ra dang / shing kun dang / lan tshwa nag po dang / go snyod dang / la la phud dang / 'u su dang / kru trug tres dang / skyer pa dang / chu rtsi mo drang
532b6(gso rig): bri ha tI rnam gnyis dang / spa ma'i 'bras bu dang / ba thA dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / chu las skyes pa ke'u ka dang / 'di rnams zhig tu btags pa'i phye ma cha snyam pa dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang 'atil
533a1(gso rig): mar gsum mnyam par byas te/ sman 'di rnams las nus phye cha bcu drug gis bskyed de sbyar ba 'di 'thungs na/ lus sha rab tu che zhing sbom po dang / lus sha chen po las byung bya'i
533a2(gso rig): nad thams cad dang / nang gzhan yang 'byung la sha yang grims shing phra bar 'ong / gzhan yang snying na po dang / yig ser dang / sha kra dang / dbugs mI bde ba dang / lud pa lu ba dang / lkog
533a3(gso rig): ma nA ba dang / 'di rnams sel te phyan/ yid rno// yid gzhungs sems dran pa la phan/ khong pa'i drod sbyi/ zas 'ju ba la phan no// ha cang khwa zas bsdams shing sbyang ba bya ba drags pa na/ lus sha rab tu skem/
533a4(gso rig): mgo 'khor/ lung pa skams por 'ong/ skom dad che/ kha zas yi grar mI 'ong ba dang / lus kyi khong na tshil dang snum bag zad pa dang / khong pa'i nad kyi drong nyams te zad/ gnyid med/ mig rtul/ rna ba ma
533a5(gso rig): gsang / kha chu zud/ gzi dang mdangs nyams te/ zas yi gar 'ong ba mi skyes/ skad 'gag/ chu sor zug snying na/ klad pa na/ byin pa dang brla ne/ sku do dang rtsib logs na/ rlung nang+ga las gyur
533a6(gso rig): pa'i rims nad kyis 'debs/ spa ba'i tshig ma/ lus kyi bstod du rlung nang 'jug/ skyug bro/ rus pa'i tshigs kun bcag pa snyam byed cing na/ bshang gci dri ma sri ba la sogs pa 'di lta bu ni kha sa
533b1(gso rig): bsdams pa dang / sbyang ba dang / sman gyis bkru rnying sbyangs te/ skem por gyur pa 'ang nad de 'dra bar 'gyur ro// myong ni lus sha bAd+d+ha zhing tshun blo bya ba 'am/ sem por bya ba yang rung ste/ skam par na
533b2(gso rig): nad dkon la/ sman dpying sla ste rlung ngo // chen po na ba ni sman dpyad byar med de mi rung ngu/ ha cang tshe chis pa ni tshil ches pas khong pa'i me'i drod kyang 'bri/ rlung nad kyang sel te/ zas mngar bag
533b3(gso rig): bza' zhing bsod pas tshim par byed pa dang / bde ba nyams phag tu byed pas nI sha skem po las chen por 'gyur ro// de bas na nA rkun pa dang / kha zas mi 'phrod m+b+hi mthun pa bza' bas/ lus
533b4(gso rig): skem zhing rid par gyur pa 'di lta bu la lus sha skyes shing rgyas par 'o chung ba'i kha zas skom thams cad dang sman btang zhing sems las myed pa la rtag tu snying dga' bar 'dug pa dang / rtag
533b5(gso rig): tuskom 'thungs shing nyin par nyal bya ni phag bzhin du chen por 'gyuraro// lus brtan zhing tshon por bya ba ni/ sha las lhag pa ni gang yang med do// de bas mi chen po sha phal gyis snying mi tshim pa
533b6(gso rig): dang sha mtshag brta zhing tshon por blta ba dang / gcan gzan dang / khra lta bus lus gsos shing bskyed pa'i sha lhag par bzang ngo // skem por bya ba la sha yang ba phan no// nas dang gro ni
534a1(gso rig): tshon po dang / skem po gnyid ka'i zas su bzang ngo // yong ni nad kyi rnam grangs mangs pas bkru sman btang ba la sogs pa dang / 'khru ba gcad pa la sogs pa dpyad mang po du ma
534a2(gso rig): yod kyis kyang mdor na nang pa gso zhing brtas par bya ba dang / kha zas bsdam zhing sha dwabri bar b+hA ba dang / sman gyis bkru zhing gsal ba dang / zhi bar byas pa gang yang rung dpyad kyi mdo rnam gnyis
534a3(gso rig): su 'dus te/ dper na nad kyi rnam grangs brgya nyi shu yod kyis kyang / nAd thams cad kyi gzhi ni rlung dang bradra kan dang mkhris pa gsum du 'dus pa dang 'dra'o// nad pa blta zhing gso ba'i thabs dang
534a4(gso rig): nang yang bar bya ba'i phyir zas dbri ba 'am smyung bar bya ba dang / gso ba'i thabs rnam pa gnyis bshad pa'i le'u bcu bzhi pa rdzogaso// / mang+ga laM/
534a5(gso rig): bsod nams stobs rgyas kyis mtshon mar gyur 'gro ba yis// tshe rabs du mar bsags pa'i sdig sgrib ma lus kun// dge 'dis dug lnga'i me lce chu yis bcil ba bzhin// ring min byang chub snying po'i go 'phang myur thob
534a6(gso rig): shog/ ces mi dbang po lta bas sgo gsum tshig dril gyi smon lam btab pa'o// bkra shis//
